commentaires: Nous avons passé une très bonne semaine. Incroyablement bien situé pour les amoureux de Paris! Un lieu idyllique que je recommande! Rachel est à l’écoute et réactive!
Très bien placé , appartement très convenable très recommandé...
Super séjour dans un bel endroit, je recommande vivement. Camille et son équipe sont très efficaces !
Super hôtel! Accueil charmant! Chambre très confortable.
Top dans tous les domaines

Hôtel que je recommande sans aucune hésitation. Avec une amie, nous y avons passé un agréable week-end. Proche de la Tour Eiffel, dans une rue au calme mais proche de nombreux commerces, chambre confortable et impeccable, espace piscine et sauna incontournable. Par ailleurs, l’ensemble du personnel se montre très accessible et à l’écoute si besoin.

Excellent hôtel rapport qualité/prix sur Paris. 
Le personnel est réactif et à l’écoute.
Je recommande vivement !
Un bel endroit au calme, hyper bien situé (proche palais des sports,parc des expos),prestations en rapport avec le tarif,propreté au top ,accueil (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande sans soucis

Un seul mot pour résumer notre week-end sur Paris « parfait »
Nous n’avons pas eu l’occasion de rencontrer Camille, mais il n’y a strictement rien à reprocher.
Personnel agréable et accueillant, chambre parfaite, propre, silencieuse...
Le petit déjeuner, excellent !
Bref, c’était parfait !
Merci pour tout
Super hôtel, chambre très propre. Un personnel très gentil, à l’écoute, serviable. Très bien placé

Hôtel propre personnel accueillant et très professionnel 
Petit déjeuner excellent 
A recommander sans hésitation

L'hotel est bien equipé, le petit déjeuner (non inclus) est bien fourni, la Chambre est petite mais jolie, par contre arriver à 23h sans lit bébé installé comme promis et devoir monter sois même le lit bébé je trouve ça très limite ! Pas de réponse de Camille 1 semaine après le sejour.. N'ayez pas de demande particulière avant de réserver !

Superbe hôtel tant par sa localisation que par le silence de la rue, l’espace spa et la présence du mini bar.
Prix tout doux ce qui en fait une très bonne adresse !
Hébergement parfaitement propre dans un quartier calme de la capitale. Piscine et hamam particulièrement appréciés.
Aucune compréhension si vous avez un empêchement (lié aux grèves par exemple, ce qui assez « tendance »). Sinon, bel établissement, mais je ne prendrai plus le risque.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans cet hôtel. La chambre n'est pas très grande mais très bien décorée et équipé 
Le plus : l'espace bien être avec la piscine. C'est parfait pour se détendre après une journée de marche dans Paris.
Un endroit parfait!
Superbe expérience ! Rien à redire !
Excellente accueil, très propre et confortable.
Très bon accueil, emplacement idéal, lieux très propres. Pour le prix on aurait aimé le petit déjeuner inclus.
Agréable séjour, la chambre était très confortable, tout l'équipement nécessaire était présent.

Hôtel parfait : la deco, le buffet, la piscine !, le sauna, le jacuzzi ! le personnel...
Merveilleux au cœur de l’hiver, dans un Paris en grève !

Nous avons passé un très bon week-end dans cet hôtel.  Il est propre et confortable. Le personnel est accueillant et disponible.  L'espace SPA est un vrai plus. L'hôtel est assez bien situé puisque nous avons pu faire tout ce que nous avions prévu, avec une grève des transports (avec de bonnes chaussures).  Deux petits bémols : un manque de réactivité aux messages (mon dernier message envoyé un jour et demi avant est resté sans réponse), et selon moi l'annonce n'est pas claire concernant les petits-déjeuners (non inclus),  mais cela n'a pas gâché le reste !
Très bel hôtel, dans un quartier calme, parfait pour un week-end à deux

Très belle chambre calme.
Propreté et équipement largement à la hauteur de mes attentes.
Piscine et espace détente top (idéal après avoir arpenté les rues parisiennes...)
je recommande volontiers cet hôtel

Très jolie chambre bien équipée et calme. Accès spa et fitness avec bel espace idéal après une journée parisienne.
Bon emplacement
Parfait ! je recommande ce lieu !
Très belle chambre et très bel accueil.
Merci pour le séjour parfait

Hôtel conforme à la description, nous avions une chambre donnant sur la rue mais très calme malgré tout.
Bonne literie très propre.
Métro VAUGIRARD à cinq minutes et vingt minutes des CHAMPS ÉLYSÉE.
Personnel très professionnel.
Je conseille cet hôtel.
Juste parfait
Top, très bel hôtel avec une superbe piscine, accueil chaleureux et petit plus pour la terrasse ! Proche du métro !

L’hôtel Eiffel Blomet est vraiment superbe - Le sous sol avec la piscine et le spa sont très agréables. 
J’ai beaucoup aimé le design et la décoration de l’hôtel - ce fut un séjour très reposant.
Très bon hôtel
Merci beaucoup !
Merci beaucoup c’était génial

Propreté irréprochable. Charmante chambre avec literie au top.
Belle découverte. Au plaisir de revenir
Très belle chambre, propreté impeccable, beau mobilier.
Très bon séjour

L’emplacement est central, il est proche d’un métro. La chambre est un peu chère pour une seule personne sinon elle est design, assez grande et jolie. Par contre très mal isolée sur la rue et en hiver le froid passe au travers des fenêtres. La piscine est un peu froide. Sinon très bon accueil et beau standing.
Très bien, petit dej au top !
Tout est parfait

Très bel hôtel situé à 2 min du métro Vaugirard.
Accueil chic mais pas guindé.
La chute donnait sur cour donc très calme. Excellent équipement (bouilloire, machine à café, mini bar, coffre...).
Déco recherchée. 
Le.gros plus : piscine / sauna / hammam au sous sol sans supplément. 
Ajoutez à cela un petit déjeuner ultra complet (sucré et salé) et c'est un sans faute. 
Nous reviendrons.

Une perle au cœur de Paris. Tout était parfait : l’accueil très professionnel, la chambre parfaitement propre et très bien équipée, l’espace spa et piscine particulièrement apprécié par ces fortes températures et un petit-déjeuner royal. 
Un excellent rapport qualité / prix que l’on aurait envie de garder jalousement pour soi...
Le logement est parfait  proche de bons restaurants et de la Tour Eiffel
Très bon hôtel et très bonnes prestations. Les chambres sont spacieuses et très propres !
Cet hôtel Art déco, très bien situé dans un merveilleux quartier de Paris est un endroit où l’on se sent très bien. Petit déjeuner buffet excellent. Un endroit où l’on revient
Très bon acceuil spa propre et très design
Nous avons passé un séjour exceptionnel grâce à l'hospitalité du personnel. La piscine est incroyable et offre des moments hors du temps. Nous reviendrons forcément !
Un accueil chaleureux, personnel à disposition et un emplacement au cœur du centre avec des transports à proximité.
L'hôtel est superbe, les chambres très belles et bien décorées. Les services sont exceptionnels (soins, petit déjeuner, piscine)
Notre séjour était exceptionnel dans ce magnifique hôtel! Le personnel était très chaleureux et à l’écoute! Les équipements et les services étaient d’une excellente qualité! Je recommande vivement!

Une chambre au top, propreté nickel! Literie très confortable.
Hôte très réactive.
Merci bcp Camille !
Cette offre nous a permis de découvrir un magnifique hôtel, mon amie et moi avons pu profiter d’un séjour répondant à nos attentes à la perfection. Merci pour l’accueil !
Un excellent séjour. Le service est impeccable, le spa parfait et la déco superbe. Idéal pour un séjour pro ou touristique à Paris

Accueil chaleureux et bel hôtel. 
Dommage pour le petit oubli de nos contraintes alimentaires au petit déjeuner.
L'hôtel et la chambre sont vraiment très beau. Le personnel était très sympa et serviable. Nous avons particulièrement apprécié l'espace spa.
Jolie chambre dans un hôtel calme et très bien situé.
The stay was One of the most amazing experience till date.
The hotel is lovely and nicely located in a quiet street but close enough to everything necessary. The amenities were great and the pool/spa is worth enjoying. Overall it’s a good catch!
Wonderful boutique hotel! Sparkling clean and very nice decorated. I’ll certainly book again here!
The spa is excellent!
The place was really nice and had cute interior. The staff are absolutely lovely and very helpful!

We had a lovely time in Paris, the wellness area in the basement is really great and the swimming pool is really large for a hotel in the middle of Paris! It’s so relaxing to come home after a busy day being a tourist in Paris :-) And then relax in the sauna and pool! The area is also perfect, lively during the day but quiet at night, metro close.

Hotel incredibile, in una delle zone a mio parere più carine di Parigi e molto vicino a due stazioni della metro. Ci vogliono circa 20' a piedi dalla Tour Eiffel e la passeggiata è bellissima. Stanze ottime, comode, insonorizzate e prodotti di altissima qualità. 

SPA davvero comoda e perfetta dopo una camminata per la città, non ho parole se non "dovete andare qui"!
Отличное место для туриста! Все необходимое есть: удобная кровать, тишина, бассейн, удобное местонахождение.

Its a lovely clean place to stay with very inviting (but expensive shops and cafes locally). The room seemed a bit cramp occasionally but when you're in Paris you go out and experience the city. The sauna and swimming pool in the basement definitely made the morning and evenings more relaxing and we would stay again for the rare luxury.
Beautiful hotel with a great location!

The hotel staff is amazing! Very clean hotel, but the room is awfully small, the bathroom is more impressive and roomier than the room itself. But if you just care about a place to sleep at night like we did, then it doesn’t matter much.
Muito boa localização, quarto muito acolhedor. Recomendo a 100%. Espero voltar em breve
Excellent hotel, well located and amazing customer service! Really good value for money.

Great location! Loved that the area was quiet at night. Slept peacefully and was centrally located. Close to buses and subway. Unfortunately, with the strike, we weren’t able to use the subway but we made the best of it.

This hotel was wonderful. Everything was so clean and and modern. It had an amazing French breakfast with croissants and sausage and fruit, etc. Our room was on the small side but so beautiful. The shower had a rainfall shower head and a little balcony which was really pretty and the bed was pretty comfy.
The hotel also had a nice pool with 2 different saunas which we used a couple times to relax after a long day exploring. The location was pretty good. It was walking distance from the Eiffel Tower (20-30) mins. 
Overall, I would for sure stay here again and recommend to anyone!
Great Hotel in a great location with friendly and helpful staff.  All amenities are spot on and we would not hesitate to stay here again
Beautiful hotel and great location!
Fantastic stay, great location and very friendly staff.
Great place to stay. With a short walk to the Eiffel tower

The hotel is amazing. The room was small but very comfortable. The bed is perfect and the shower as well. Lot of nice attentions in the room. The pool and spa room were outstanding. The breakfast was very convenient and good but the price is not included in your reservation price.  Also I would watch the very strict cancellation policy. Because of the grèves we wanted to postpone the stay and it was impossible even a week before.
Lovely hotel, clean and good service. Hotel is in a great location, walking distance from eiffel tower.
The room is beautiful and really close to the centre. Camille made sure we could check in when we arrived and made sure we knew how to get to the hotel.
Amazing place to stay. Sauna, hamam, swimming pool, room itself + a very good price for a breakfast and the breakfast itself. Everything is great. Highly recommend!

Had to upgrade after seeing how small the standard room was. Overall it was great value for money though and staff was lovely. Maybe just a bit far from the city centre - we were there during the strike so had to walk everywhere or be stuck in Paris traffic

Great comfy stay in Paris. Pool and spa area perfect for relaxing after a busy day in the city. Hosts and staff are great and helped with anything we needed. Would come back and stay the next time we are in Paris. Lovely stay
Lovely hotel in Paris. Would definitely come back!
Amazing! Beautiful Hotel with incredible spa and Pool
Awesome little boutique hotel in Cambrone

Wonderful hotel in a genuine Parisian neighborhood. Room was on the smaller size but  the bathroom was nicely sized and all was very clean. Breakfast was nice but just out the door were multiple bakeries and cafes to enjoy. Close to metro, pharmacy, grocery, and plenty of shops to explore. Walking distance to Eiffel Tower and other nearby sights. So glad we stayed here. Staff was wonderful and accommodating. Highest recommendation.

Really lovely spa hotel! They did well in putting together the surprise I planned. Hotel was in a lovely and convenient location, great staff etc. Clean lovely quiet peaceful hotel & bedroom was lovely too! & comfortable. Camille you really welcomed us well!! & even prior was great in helping organise the trip. Thanks so much for putting together the surprise! It went very well to plan 
Will definitely use again. Thank you!
Great, clean hotel in a very nice area!
Great location. Close to metro. Staff is friendly.
Well worth a look.  Everything was perfect and there are Metros and buses nearby direct to the centre of Paris
Great stay in a nice area of Paris! Short walk (20-30 mins) to Eiffel Tower!
위치가 조금 애매하지만 조금만 걸으면 지하철 버스 이용 가능하고 가성비가 너무 좋아요 매우 추천합니다

This small hotel is just wonderful.  Absolutely as described, friendliest staff ever, all of whom speak excellent English.  Located in a great neighborhood with lots of decent and reasonable restaurants about.  Close to the Metro.  Best stop of the trip.

Wonderful boutique hotel. Great location.
Amazing shower and comfy bed!
Will be back again.
Fantastic Hotel, great location & beautiful rooms.
Excellent boutique hotel in accessible part of 15th arrondissement
Good stay, good location

Very nice hotel with great facilities. The room was nicely designed, good bathroom, and was well equipped (coffee, tea, kettle, towels, radio/speaker, minibar) for a short stay. They also have umbrellas in the lobby which you can use during the day for free if it's raining.

The pool, hammam, and sauna were great to have and it was great to be able to relax after a busy day (there's also a gym).

The location is nice and quiet, as it's mainly residential. However, you still have everything you need nearby as there are bakeries, small supermarkets, and a few bars that also serve food (I recommend Le Général Beuret that's about 50m away from the hotel!) all within walking distance.

There is a metro stop (Vaugirard) just around the corner, so it's very easy to get to other parts of Paris.

Check-in and check-out were seamless, and all of the staff were very friendly and professional. 

**It should be noted that you need to pay an extra security deposit on arrival of €50/night (refunded when you check-out) as this is a room in a hotel, rather than an apartment.**
Highly recommended, didn't want to leave. The hotel is in a lovely location with a great variety of independent shops in the area. Metro is 2 minute walk and takes you anywhere at a very cheap price.

방이 생각보다 많이 작아요. 
조식은 그럭저럭 먹을 만 했습니다.
다 괜찮았는데 마지막 날 뜨거운 물이 나오지 않아 겨울날씨에 찬 물로 손 발만 씻고 잤네요 ㅠㅠ
체크인 전에 에어비앤비를 통해 메시지를 보냈는데 호스트가 처음 예약 후에만 대답이 오고 그 이후에는 질문해도 전혀 답변이 없습니다. 결국 호텔로 직접 전화하니깐 안내 해 주네요. 

뜨거운 물 건에대해서는 여행자보험을 들어서 여행자보험사에 제출 할 관련 서류를 요청했는데 카운터에서 이메일로 보내준다는 확인 받고 이메일 주소 남겨줬는데 한국 도착 후에 이메일 조차 안보내주네요.
Great location, close to multiple metro stations.  loved the ammenities.  great cafe near by.  would definately stay there again.

We had a great stay at Camille’s listing. The place was exactly how it was shown in the booking page. Very accomodating staff during checkin/checkout and a really comfortable bed to rest on after hours of walking tours in the streets of Paris. I’d highly recommend this place for couples.
Exceeded all expectations! Absolutely in love with the place!
This is a nice hotel with  great amenities. Location was excellent and the staff were very polite.  Had the breakfast on our last day and it was excellent. Great shower!
Lovely rom with a fantastic little spa and good cafes nearby
Un gran alojamiento, habitación impecable y con estilo y los servicios de lujo!
Nice hotel in a good location and very clean.
An amazing hotel in a great location. Excellent facilities with the pool, spa, gym, sauna. Helpful staff and a beautifully presented room.
Great location and a lovely hotel to come back to away the busy areas

Close to Eiffel Tower, and metro and other local amenities 
comfy bed and shower was great
pool etc was nice to have in a city hotel
Lovely place and we especially enjoyed the pool and sauna .

We had a lovely short stay. Beautiful decorated hotel and rooms- very clean with a cozy feeling. Friendly staff. 
On a side note. Maybe a few more hangers in the bathroom for the towels. Also the temperature of the swimming pool could be warmer, but that’s a personal preference. We enjoyed the complementary products for the bathroom, the necessity kit and slippers for the pool area. Although we would have also appreciated a more environmental friendly solution. 
Having complementary coffee and tea on the room was great. The bed was big and comfortable, with nice cushions and a big duvet cover. The hotel is a bit clairaudient in the morning, when people depart with their luggage - so maybe take earplugs with you. We didn’t had breakfast, but it looked good. We went to one of the Cafés around the corner full of locals. The neighborhood is more residential, nice and lively and well connected by metro and bus.. in some streets you might see the Eiffel tower in the distance. 
Overall the value for the price we paid on Airbnb was good and the hotel is really beautifully done, but we wouldn’t pay more for a room like we had.

He estado con mi pareja. 
Nos ha gustado mucho el alojamiento. 
Tiene muchos detalles que se agradecen.
Atencion muy amable y atenta.
Great location to see some of the sights and do some shopping during our quick 23hr layover! The staff was very friendly.
Beautiful boutique hotel loved the space easy to get everywhere from would definitely stay again!

Our stay was great! Communication was very easy as most employees spoke English. We arrived a couple hours early to check in, and they allowed us to use the facilities( spa, sauna, pool, steam room etc.). Rooms were a little small, but the bathroom was huge! Overall, great stay especially for the money. Would definitely recommend!!

Wonderful place at the heart of Paris, really close to the Eiffel tower! Great and very sweet hosts. The apartment was super clean, stylish and comfy. Definetely would stay there again next time we are in Paris! Highly recommend it.

The hotel is perfectly located, close to many metro stations, 15mins walk from Eiffel tower, but not in a too touristic area. The room was clean, stylish and well equipped, the shower was huge. Nice touches like bathrobes and Nuxe toiletries  All in all, we loved our stay and will be coming back!
Beautiful room in a excellent location, clean , beautiful decor

The hotel is beautiful and it's located in such a lovely non-touristy neighborhood of Paris. Communication prior to my arrival was excellent and I highly recommend staying here. Future guests should know that a credit card deposit is required at check-in.

Excellent hotel in a great location. The hotel was exceptionally clean as a whole, and rooms were thoroughly cleaned daily. All staff were very friendly and all facilities/amenities were fantastic. Would definitely stay here again.
no thanks
Beautiful place! Check-in was a breeze.
Highly recommend. Everything was perfect, great location, friendly staff, the breakfast was delicious. Special mention to the bed being super comfortable and the shower was to die for

Wonderful hotel! A bit odd that a hotel was on AirBnB and I had to provide ID and a credit card upon arrival (not typical for this service), but the overall stay was amazing. Very clean and perfectly comfortable after a long day of walking around Paris.
My stay was wonderful and room was clean and sufficient enough and didn't find any difficulty to reach. Arrangement was good.  Go and book. Will definitely suggest other people to book it.

Where to start...
Beautiful, elegant, classy hotel in a great part of Paris, not too far from the Eiffel Tower with many restaurants close by. We received a very warm welcome by the receptionist who spoke perfect English. After checking in our details, we took the spacious lift to our floor - we were in Room 106 which faced out on the front (very quiet street). It was very well air-conditioned, with double-glazed windows if fresh air were required.

The room had statement, soft carpet and was furnished with beautiful contemporary rosewood cupboards which hid a mini-bar, a Nespresso coffee pod, a variety of Kusmi teas, a safe, cut glass tumblers, a proper hair dryer and a lighted wardrobe.

The bed was a Superking, with a real leather, duck egg blue headboard, beautiful velvety-soft sheets and wonderful pillows. The mattress also had a lovely mattress topper, so sliding into bed was fabulous.

In the corner of the room was a small circular table, with a chair and a solid rosewood stool.

Facing the bed was a huge wall-mounted Samsung TV.

The room lighting was excellent, with spots everywhere and tiny but powerful halogen pencil-shaped reading lights on each side of the bed.

The showerroom was fully tiled with a white suite, black and white tiled walls and floor, a large quadrant shower with a drench shower head and a separate body shower. There were towelling robes and slippers, Nuxe toiletries including shampoo, body wash, conditioner and body lotion. There was plenty of hot water. The toilet was a good "flusher".

We slept like logs in the beautiful bed after returning from dinner with our daughter and son-in-law.

Next morning, check-out was a very civilised 12 o'clock. This left time for the best breakfast we have had in Paris for a long time!

Breakfast was attractively presented on a buffet in the dining room. The hot choice included scrambled eggs, streaky bacon, sausages and boiled eggs. There was fresh fruit salad, organic yogurts in little glass jars, several cereals, freshly squeezed orange, pink grapefruit, pineapple and apple juices, divine croissants, plump pain au chocolate, olive-oil type baguettes, butter, honey, Nutella and various jams. There was also a toaster, sliced brioche, ordinary toasting bread, biscuits.

The cold selection included very tender Prosciutto ham, roast ham, chicken breast, Milano salami, Chèvre goat cheese, Cantal, cream cheese and a mild sliced cheese. 

There was a Nespresso coffee machine producing wonderful coffees, Kusmi teas, chocolate, water, milk.

Is your mouth watering yet?

The staff are lovely - nothing is too much trouble - someone came immediately to our room after we rang to say our TV remote was dead. Breakfast staff are friendly and helpful and do not hurry you to eat up and move on.

There is a wonderful lounge on the ground floor with a proper fireplace, multi-language newspapers, magazines and an honesty bar with a good selection of drinks. In the basement is a swimming pool, gym, hamman and sauna, although we had no time to visit these facilities.

All in all - an exceptional hotel in the heart of Paris. I can't wait to stay again!

Our stay was great! The hotel is beautiful and the staff was very friendly. We did have to wait a bit until the room was ready but the staff was very accommodating and helpful. Beautiful location and place to stay.

Lovely stylish hotel in perfect location to central Paris. Staff were warm, friendly and really helpful. Great breakfast every morning.  Fantastic pool/ gym facilities. We’d definitely love to stay again at Hotel Blomet the next time we are in Paris!
El hotel súper cómodo, bonito y súper limpio, la ubicación no es la mejor pero no está mal, el personal súper amable siempre, definitivamente me volvería a hospedar ahí
Nice hotel with wonderful breakfast

Located on a quiet side street but only 15min away from the Eiffel Tower and 25min away from all other main attractions. If you choose there is a yummy buffet breakfast available for each morning. (Best to get there early) but all together it is a very nice and clean Stylish Hotel. Would recommend to anyone wanting to stay in Paris.
Great room and amenities in a nice area of Paris.

Lovely hotel in a great neighbourhood. Leah was wonderful for our check-in, and all of the staff were helpful with suggestions. The room was great and had everything you could need. I will definitely stay here again!
Super
We loved our stay. Very nice boutique hotel in a lovely neighbourhood. The pool was amazing! 20min walk to the Eiffel Tower. Excellent restaurants to choose from nearby.

We loved our hotel! The rooms were super chic, everyone was really friendly, and the location is great. Lots of things to walk to, as well as a metro close by for those things that are slightly farther away. The neighbourhood is also really charming! We definitely will be back!

This is a complete and utter gem of a place - a real find. The building is an Art Deco delight and the interiors pay homage to that (including the best black and white tiled bathrooms). It is clean (incredibly so), central, great value (it even has a pool) and the staff are super-friendly and helpful. Highly recommend. I’ll definitely be going back.
Very clean hotel! Pool/spa facilities were awesome. Would highly recommend.
Great place, I do recommend it!
Great place to stay! Very modern, spacious, and comfortable. Great location, within walking distance of the Eiffel Tower. Lovely quite area with lots of charm. Highly recommend!
Great place to stay!! Really close to the metro and a few essential markets!

Totally recommend for a short stay in Paris without the hustle and bustle of the tourist areas. Closely located to Metro stations up the street and the Eiffel Tower is about 25 min walk away 

Stylish hotel with great amenities, buffet breakfast was a great surprise. As with most of Paris, don’t expect a lot of space in the room!
Great , but this is a lovely hotel ,which we did nt realize while booking .

The good: clean, modern hotel with beautiful rooms and strong showers. Very accommodating staff that spoke multiple languages.

The bad: This is a hotel advertising via the Airbnb platform. They require you pay a deposit onsite with a credit card, provide an email, and provide an ID. While typical requirements for a hotel, these requirements break the most important part of the Airbnb experience: not having to provide your ID/CC information to an unknown person in a foreign country.

Also there is no early check in and our room wasn't available at the check in time (3PM), we had to wait about 20 minutes for it to be cleaned.
Loved Camille’s place! Def recommend it!
Amazing location. Beautiful hotel. Everything we expected and more!

Wonderful boutique hotel. The size of the room was reasonable (perhaps good by Paris standards). It felt luxurious and stylish. The room had a nice coffee machine and breakfast was included, which was a good spread of cereals, pastries, fruits, and a few hot items.

The swimming pool and spa area were just great, we used them everyday. The pool was a lovely temperature and had a few nice jets/jacuzzi areas.

This space was perfect for us! Nice boutique hotel in a very safe and pretty part of Paris. Would highly recommend and would definitely stay here again on my next trip to Paris. We felt very lucky to have such a nice stay and the room is great value. Really enjoyed the breakfast too. Thank you for having us!’
Clean hotel
It was good
Very clean and swank place, close to metro (line 12), comfortable and relaxing stay
Very nice hotel. The spa an pool are amazing. Very nice location with lots af things to do nearby.

Awesome place! Breakfast was AMAZING GOOD! Very sweet employees and good communication. They made us feel welcomed and answered all our question. Walking distance  to the Eiffel Tower, but somewhat of a drive/walk/boat ride, to the rest of the attractions (Notre Dame, The Louvre, Pantheon, etc).  
Overall a good place to stay quite location and small restaurants near by.
We really liked this place! Much better than expected. If we ever come back to Paris we would choose this place again for sure.

This hotel is very stylish. The rooms are perfect. There is a JBL speaker which you can connect to right next to the bed. Nespresso machine also in the room. The bathroom amenities were so nice! The breakfast was also delicious. The area is very nice and the room was quite. We would stay here again!

A gem of a hotel a short walk from the Eiffel tower and well connected to public transportation to see the rest of Paris. Room is not very big but plenty of room for 2 to relax after a long day. Very comfortable bed, strong air conditioning, and perfectly maintained bathroom. The fact that the pool (small, but serviceable for some laps or a relaxing float), sauna (clean and hot!), and breakfast (a delicious spread of salumi, cheese, breads, pastries, eggs, jams, and more) are included is icing on the cake. It is a little far from the airport (both CDG and Orly), but still accessible by public transportation if you plan ahead.
Incredible value in Paris! Lovely decor and very clean. But the breakfast is the true surprise--it was delicious and perfect for a traveler setting out to explore the city.

The hotel was extremely nice. LOVED the breakfast and LOVED the location. We used (Hidden by Airbnb) maps to take the train (RER) from the airport to the location and it was perfect. close to the Eiffel Tower and in a great part of town. Would 100% go back.

We really enjoyed our stay at the hotel! Very clean, stylish, modern. Loved the small balcony and small touches in the room such as dressing gowns and the coffee machine. The highlight of our stay was the free use of pool/steam room. Only slight let down was the quality of the breakfast.

Outstanding small boutique hotel only a 2km walk to the Eiffel Tower.
The rooms are extremely serviceable, with the bed being super comfortable. The pool area is also a massive bonus. 
Highly recommend.
Stunning room- we got upgraded! Amazing pool and spa facilities. Delicious breakfast

My son and I thoroughly enjoyed staying at the boutique hotel during our visit to Paris. We enjoyed use of the pool and spa area after long days of sightseeing. The staff was very friendly and accommodating. The breakfast was superb. The rooms were comfortable and had chic decorations.

Nice place to stay.
I loved the spa and gym...
Good breakfast!
Very nice. Much better than we expected.
Great place, beautiful location. Very friendly and helpful, very beautiful hotel.
The place was great! In a nice location, clean and friendly
Great location surrounded by lots of restaurants and bars. Beautiful hotel at less than half the price normally charged. Facilities were amazing. The pool, sauna (dry and steam) were awesome.
The room was great. Exactly as pictured. Hotel had a cute pool and was in good location.

Prachtig gerenoveerd hotel, waarbij de basic chambre vrij klein is maar helemaal compleet. Superluxe dat er een zwembad, turks stoombad en sauna bij zit en dat er op de hotelkamer badjassen en slipper beschikbaar zijn gesteld! Dit maakt Blomet uniek. Het hotel zit in een vriendelijke, parijse buurt met snelle verbindingen naar het centrum. Zeker een plek om naar terug te komen.

I booked this for my girlfriend’s 30th birthday and she was over the moon.
The room was really nicely decorated, the toiletries were lovely and the bed was so comfortable. The best bit might be the indoor pool. It’s not huge but plenty big enough, warm and with brilliant Spa facilities. The complimentary robe and flip flops were a nice touch.
The staff on reception were very friendly and breakfast was good.
Thank you and hopefully see you again : )
IT was super
Great location, clean and friendly hotel

Amazing amazing amazing! 10/10. Fantastic value for money. Highly recommended. Felt like luxury throughout. Amazing spa/pool/gym area. We plan to come back soon! Local area is amazing and very close to Eiffel Tower. Uber very cheap to get around to main sites from hotel. Worth every penny, thank you for a fantastic stay!
Beautiful place to stay and location. Camille’s hospitality was great also !
Personnelle très serviable
Je conseille
Très bel hôtel et personnel très sympathique
Un établissement génial et hors du temp!
Un séjour de qualité, merci beaucoup !

Hôtel avec une déco que j'ai grandement apprécié et qui change des hôtels classiques, pour une même gamme de prix qui plus est. De plus, l'hôtel se trouve à une vingtaine de minute de beaucoup de lieux touristiques
Superbe boutique hôtel. L emplacement au calme et au cœur de Paris, l originalité des chambres + l accueil chaleureux en font un lieu unique. Une seule envie y revenir !!!
Boutique hôtel très agréable : accueil, literie, propreté, calme. Tout est nickel  !!!

Superbe logement! L'endroit est très cosy et charmant comme tout. Nous avons passé une merveilleuse soirée. Il y a tout ce qu'il faut pour passer un bon moment et se détendre. Ce lieu est très bien équipé, il y a de quoi cuisiner, se laver et même prendre un petit café. Le jacuzzi est fantastique.
 L'hôte a eu gentillesse de nous prévoir sa place de parking, il est réactif et très aimable.
On peut entendre un peu de bruits vis à vis de la maison du haut et l'image de la télé a eu du mal à se régler correctement mais à part tout ça c'était génial! Ce n'est qu'un petit détail. Je vous recommande fortement ce lieu, vous ne serez pas déçu!

Appartement Super Cosy , encore mieux que sur les photos , on s’y sent bien , merci à Laurent et sa femme pour leurs hospitalités et réactivités. Petite  touche de décoration pour anniversaire surprise qui a fait son effet  .  Nous y reviendrons sans hésitation. Merci encore à vous .

Alors où commencer.... 
Comment expliquer que nous sommes restés 10mns top chrono dans ce logement, où plutôt cette cave. 
Si vous êtes claustrophobe, à ÉVITER ! Et si vous faites plus d’1m80 également ! 
Le ménage laisse à désirer, le logement n’est pas fini (on se croirait sur un chantier) et l’odeur.... 
Le jacuzzi, l’atout principal du logement, remplit de calcaire. Ah oui et vous qui me lisez, pensez au 30€ supplémentaire pour le jacuzzi ! Belle arnaque !
En tout cas BIG UP à Laurent et sa superbe présentation du logement, dommage qu’il ne soit pas aussi enthousiaste lorsque je lui demande remboursement... 
J’attend toujours

Stylish.  Clean. Nice roomservice. Will deffenetly stay there again!
Nice accommodation!
Was very close to the metro and a good deal

The place is well connected with metro to City centre. Very close to metro station. 

Access to wellness room is very good. Rooms are clean, a bit small so not good for people with kids but no problem for us as a couple.

It was a very pleasant stay.
This place is really great. Wish I found it a bit sooner than I did. Staff is really friendly & they helped to make my last 2 days the best. Would stay here again.
Great little spot, in a nice neighborhood
Das Hotel ist formidable! Gratulation, neben der Metro Station. Das Zimmer ist superbequem eingerichtet, mit separatem WC. Das Frühstück ist empfehlenswert. Ich habe mich super wohl gefühlt.
Lovely stay in Clichy.
Buen servicio y excelente ubicación, llegamos antes de lo esperado y pudimos dejar las maletas y regresar más tarde a la habitación

We had a very nice stay at the Atypik hotel. It's a modern and cosy hotel with all the facilities that you need. The location is perfect , a little outside the city but not too far (there is a subwaystation next to the hotel). We certainly recommend this hotel ! :)
The room is very clean but smaller than expected. Check in was smooth.

We had a really nice stay at Camilles! The place is easily reachable from the city centre and the room was nice, clean and really comfortable. Would definitely recommend to stay here if you think about visiting Paris!

We had a wonderful stay here!! Our favourite thing about the location is that it is a little bit away from the “tourist” part of Paris, where prices were a little better, and local people far outnumbered tourists. This is excellent for those who want to see and experience the authentic Paris and modern Parisian lifestyle. Of course, if one wants to go to the city centre it is easily accessible by a nearby subway stop, literally a lot 2 minutes walk from the hotel. 

Staff are incredibly outgoing and responsive. They helped us with local restaurant suggestions, tips regarding public transportation, and helping us plan our sightseeing. This was a fantastic experience overall! Thanks ATYPIK staff for the hospitality!
I LOVED my stay there! I even booked another night after. The staff is extremely welcoming and the it’s extremely clean! Best place I stayed in in Paris. The location is reaally good!
Mostly what we expected

If you really want a great value and you want an amazing staff of people that are more than helpful please stay here. 

They are really close to the metro and they have a supermarket on the same block and next to them is a dry cleaners. 

Anyone who is traveling will love this place they have a wonderful tiny cafe at the bottom and a nice place out back to sit and relax outside should you want to.

The bedding and pillows were extremely comfortable and the room itself was sized perfectly for a single traveler. 

There is a school that plays out back during weekdays but is not too loud and is decent ambient noise in my opinion. 

Lastly just in case you are traveling with more than one person keep in mind the bath tub is in open view to the bedroom so if your not comfortable with who ever you are traveling with consider a second room for them.

I can without a doubt say that the wooden floors, elevator, morning buffet, and the people here are what make this place much more special than a lot of other places.

Note: this is my first time in Paris and staying here made it extremely easy to move around the city.
This super clean and modern space is great for one night stays. Great staff and amenities. Highly recommend!

Adoramos a estadia no Hotel! O quarto é aconchegante e a cama é maravilhosa. Tudo disponível é de qualidade!! Tivemos uma excelente noite.
Um ponto de atenção é que a região parece ser comercial/business então a noite não tem opções de restaurantes que de para ir a pé por perto, mas o metro fica na esquina do hotel, onde é possível ir para qualquer lugar de Paris.
Thank you for your warm hospitality :)
It was a very nice stay, with just a couple flaws from being perfect.

The place is really nice, receptionists give great tips about travelling around Paris, what public transportation to use. Metro is really close, a local market as well. Overall a great place to stay in Paris.
Great place, great price and great location!
Great Airbnb with small, but clean rooms. Peacefull.

Séjour super reposant chez Grégoire. Discrétion et gentillesse: Grégoire est un hôte parfait et vraiment serviable. Les chambres sont à l’opposé de l’appartement et j’ai été comme à la maison sans aucune intrusion mutuelle. La Propreté absolue, le calme et l’ensoleillement de la chambre sont très appréciables. Grégoire est un hôte habitué, aucun problème de communication avec lui au contraire. Je recommande sa chambre à tarif très bas pour un séjour paisible en solo. On ne peut être mieux placé dans Paris! Pour finir Grégoire est aussi soucieux de l’hygiène et du confort que cool et arrangeant dans l’utilisation des espaces communs... Pas d’exigence de sa part (sauf respect qui va de soi) on est à l’aise. Un immense merci et je recommande à tous toutes très sincèrement.

Très bel appartement! Il est bien placé et l’hôte est très accueillant. Je recommande totalement :) !

Merci pour cet accueil,
Hôte très sympathique et très respectueux.

super accueil ! Disponible et de bons conseils 
Bonne continuation à toi
Appartement très bien situé et soigné, accueil et hospitalité de Grégoire impeccable,  je recommande! :)

Je tiens à remercier Grégoire pour son accueil chaleureux, son hospitalité et pour sa compréhension malgré mon retard le jour du check-in. Son appartement est entretenu, et plutôt bien situé. Ce qui fait la différence ? Ses appréciables petits conseils pour manger dans de bons restaurants aux alentours !
Belle chambre lumineuse avec balcon et vue sur Paris. À côté du métro et en plein quartier latin. Grégoire est un hôte charmant, très attentionné et plein de bons conseils. Je recommande
Grégoire est sympathique,  discret et debons conseils,  le restaurant était très bon ! La chambre est très bien située,  je conseille vivement.
Chambre sobre et calme où vous êtes assez indépendant, chouette quartier et hôte très accueillant, je recommande

Merci à Grégoire pour la mise à disposition de cette chambre ! Très bien placée, dans un appartement au charme très parisien (tout comme l'ascenseur). Le logement est sain et les équipements/fournitures aussi.
À y dormir les yeux fermés !
Très bien - Grégoire est un hôte très accueillant, disponible et très agréable

Excellent accueil Grégoire et super discret et vraiment sympathique, c'est le meilleur accueil que j'ai eu jusqu'à présent. L'appartement est super et très bien situé à 2 pas de la station Jussieu.
Excellent rapport/qualité/Prix

Petite chambre toute simple, et très agréable. Accueil de Grégoire très agréable aussi.
Hébergement Idéalement placée.Rien à redire.
Super accueil de la part de Grégoire, qui s'est montré très dispo et arrangeant. Merci encore !
Super séjour ! Grégoire est quelqu’un de très respectueux et très soigné. Son accueil est chaleureux et sa chambre est super ! Très pratique et proche des meilleurs spots de la ville, je recommande !

Grégoire est très accueillant et discret ! 
Appartement propre et parfaitement situé: j’ai pu tout faire à pied. 
J’y retournerai sans hésiter !
Excellent situation. Discrétion et disponibilité à la fois.
Super séjour !
Grégoire est un super hôte. Il est très arrangeant et accueillant. Je recommande !
Grégoire est très gentil et ouvert ! La vue de la chambre est vraiment pittoresque
Super ! Grégoire m’a accueilli comme il se doit. De plus, aucun soucis avec mon vélo. Le plus de la chambre le balcon !
n'hésitez pas à choisir cette belle chambre

Chambre très agréable dans un super quartier. Excellent accueil de Grégoire.

Parfait ! Ce chambre est située dans le cœur de Paris ! Calme tranquille et tu peux promener à côté ! Et il y a un balcon très cool aussi ! Et monsieur Grégoire est sympa et il vous respecte beaucoup ! C’était vraiment une bonne journée ! Je vous recommande vivement ! Merci ! À bientôt !
Appartement propre!! Emplacement impeccable à deux de métro c’est royal

Une chambre spacieuse et lumineuse au cœur de Paris pour un tarif tout à fait raisonnable … L'offre est parfaite. De plus, Grégoire est un hôte sympathique, attentionné, ayant l'habitude de recevoir. Je recommande sans hésitation !

Excellent accueil par Grégoire et la chambre est impeccable. Je recommande !

Superbe logement dans un immeuble typiquement parisien. Grande chambre calme et propre. Grégoire est très sympa et discret. Logement idéalement situé dans le centre de Paris tout en étant proche de restaurants abordables (rue mouffetard) . Je recommande sans aucune hésitation.
Chambre agréable dans un bel appartement haussmannien avec une superbe vue sur les toits parisiens.

Le salon séparera votre chambre de celle de Grégoire, garantissant un espace privé à chacun. Très beau balcon, miroir, rangements, lit confortable, tout est à disposition pour un séjour très agréable. Merci mille fois !

Grande chambre propre et calme avec le plus du balcon haussmannnien du 5°étage - avec ascenseur !- et la vue sur les toits de Paris. Toutefois le lit bas et l'exiguïté de la douche ne conviendraient pas à tout le monde mais pour moi, c'était parfait et Gregoire sait mettre facilement à l'aise.
Je recommande vivement.

Très bon emplacement dans un quartier agréable et accessible.Grégoire est discret, à l'écoute, sait recevoir et fin connaisseur de Paris. Je me suis senti comme à la maison. Grand plus : la vue dégagée sur les toits de Paris !
Emplacement idéal pour ce charmant appartement. Grégoire est accueillant, arrangeant et très pro. Mis à part l'odeur de cigarette déjà mentionnée, rien à redire ! À recommander.
Bel appartement à deux pas du métro et proche de plusieurs lieux culturels.

Très bon séjour chez Grégoire qui est très accueillant et sympathique.
Appart grand et fonctionnel. Le charme parisien. Grégoire est cool, nickel pour une arrivée en douceur.
Très bon accueil, j'ai trouvé facilement l'appartement et Grégoire se plie en quatre pour que le séjour soit parfait. Quartier latin, métro à deux pas de l'immeuble, restos ....

L'appartement de Grégoire est extrêmement bien situé, à proximité immédiate de deux lignes de métro, proche de lieux animés mais parfaitement calme. La vue est agréable depuis le balcon traversant. L'appartement est typique d'un Hausmanien, et la chambre très agréable. Grégoire est parfaitement discret, mais sait aussi prendre le temps d'échanger. Je conseille donc un séjour chez lui. En revanche si vous n'aimez pas les planchers qui grincent, les poignées de portes à l'ancienne, si vous avez besoin de mettre de l'eau partout quand vous vous douchez, je vous le déconseille. ça fait pourtant partie du charme des appartements anciens, et moi c'est exactement ce que je cherche.

Séjour fort agréable.
 Grégoire s'est organisé pour me remettre les clés à l'heure d'arrivée que j'avais choisie, de même pour mon départ, il s'est organisé pour m'éviter d'avoir à trimballer mes bagages toute la journée.
Logement agréable, chambre spacieuse au cœur de Paris et au calme!

Grégoire est très accueillant et très discret, la chambre est spacieuse et très sympa, l'appartement est fonctionnel et très propre. L'immeuble est calme et le quartier offre de nombreuses possibilités.

la chambre est correspond à la décrite. La nuit est relativement calme dans ce quartier.

Accueil très cordial et tout était très clair sur les conditions. La description de l'appartement correspond bien.

J'ai beaucoup apprécié mon séjour chez Grégoire. Le check-in a été très facile, son appartement est super bien situé, la chambres est lumineuse et Grégoire est très accueillant. Son attitude a été très rassurante pour moi. J'ai séjourné chez-lui lors du début du confinement lié à la crise du COVID 19 et je me suis senti en sécurité chez-lui. Je recommande.
A recommander ! Check-in très sympa, bel appartement avec beaucoup de charme, joli quartier et accueil exceptionnel.
Gregoire est hyper gentil, il a un grand sourire. Le lieu est hyper facile a trouver. Il m'a donne plein de l'information qui m'aide beaucoup.  Je souhaite que habiter chez Gregoire une autre fois.

The room was clean and great in a beautifull flat and house, a quiet street and a nice neighbourhood ideally located!
I strongly recommand and would come back with great pleasure.
Très central, ok pour flâner dans les grandes avenues !

Un chambre simple, propre, bien localisé près de UPMC. Comme indiqué dans l'annonce, il ne faut pas attendre à un chambre non-fumeur, mais je ne fume pas, et je trouvais cela supportable. Grégoire était sympathique et a bien communiqué pour s'organiser. Il a recommandé un très bon resto Vietnamien dans le coin. Il ne faut pas s'attendre à un chambre de luxe, mais pour le prix c'était excellent, avec tous qu'il me fallait.

A simple clean room conveniently located next to the UPMC university. As indicated in the posting, don't expect a non-smoking room, but I'm a non-smoker and I found it tolerable, if not ideal. Grégoire was friendly and communicated well for the planning. He recommended an excellent Vietnamese restaurant in the neighborhood. Don't expect a luxury room, but for the price it was excellent with everything needed.
Emplacement parfait dans le 5e. Hôte accueillant.
Le logement le meilleur où j'ai habité à Paris!

La localisation de l'appartement est très bonne, près du Phantéon. Il y a beaucoup de restaurants et cafés dans le quartier. L'appartement et sympa, malgré petit. Je n'ai pas eu de problème. Bonne expérience!
L'appartement est très bien situé, idéal pour les amoureux du quartier latin et de la littérature ! Chambre propre avec une belle vue, et Grégoire est très serviable :-)
Un tout grand merci à Greg pour son accueil et son dévouement quand un pied de votre lit est un peu bancale :)
Super emplacement ! Endroit très chic et très calme. Je recommande. Grégoire est très attentionné et facilite le séjour.

Très belle chambre, hôte très sympathique, accueil chaleureux ,séjour très agréable.
