A bientôt
Chambre agréable située dans un super quartier: à la fois calme et proche de tout! Greg est très tranquille. Je recommande!
Amazing place to stay in the Quartier Latin ! Grégoire is a great source for local food joints and wine bars, make sure to get recommendations from him!

This place is not recommended at all!!
The photos are inaccurate 
The place was a complete mess, stinks everywhere, full of dust and hair!
No bed, the mattress is simply on the floor.
The photos don’t show the actual state of the apartment!!

I left the place and went to a hotel!
Great !

The location of this place is perfect.  very central and in one of my favourite neighbourhoods in Paris. The place is just how it is described. The room is large and comfortable, with everything you need, it has a small balcony which makes it even better. I was not there for vacation, I needed a place quiet and private because these were very stressful days for me (student life), and the place was perfect for it. For someone on vacation is even better, this is a very good location in Paris.  Grégoire had every room super clean as well, that it's  something I really appreciate. I totally recomend it.
Great host communication, location and neighbourhood. Grégoire's apartment is exactly as described and perfect for a solo traveller looking for an easy and convenient place to sleep.
Greg is a very friendly & uncomplicated host. Beautyful apartment. Had a very pleasent stay. Many, many thanks !!

Gregoire was very nice. I didnt see him much as i spent most of my time outside. Place is very central, in a very nice and touristic area. The apartment is a nice and old parisian apartment. Walking through the apartment is a bit noisy due to the original parquet floor, but i still didn't hear gregoire in the morning.
Room is spacious, bedbis small, but you don't need anything bigger for one person.
My overall stay was nice. It was my first time in a private room and i did not feel uncomfortable nor interfering with the host's privacy as we each had our space.i would defenetly recommend this apartment.

My stay in the apartment was great. Greg was very friendly when I first arrived and explained everything in detail, and then basically gave me all the space I wanted. The room is large and has its own balcony, which is nice, although it was too cold to take advantage of it when I was there. The neighbourhood was very convenient, many bakeries and grocery stores right down the street, two metro stations within a block and walking distance to many things.

It was my second time staying there and Grégoire was super kind like the first time. Thank you for giving me such useful advices for travelling, helping me feel safe during my trip, and thank you for the treats.

----中文评论在下面----
The place was in a safe area and conveniently located, full of pupils and students. I got to the place from the airport by RER B without any problem and got around quite well.

The host was quite accommodating, he let me put my luggage in before the check-in time, which would solve a huge problem for you if you arrive early. 

The room was very comfortable and has adequate things. For example, the fire place acted perfectly as a dressing table and there were enough slots for me to charge my devices. The toilet, the shower, and kitchen were clean and arranged. I felt like I had all of those for myself when I was there at night, the host really respects your privacy. 

If you need travel advice, Greg is very willing to help you. Also, I was able to chat with him for a bit which was super awesome and inspiring.

单身女生自助游可以选这里,很方便,很安全｡屋子虽然不是五星酒店但是很简单齐全,周围很文艺很唯美很有书卷气息｡周围都是大中小学｡从机场坐捷运b线到卢森堡公园下再拉行李虽说不轻松但绝对没问题,我拉了一个大箱子和大双肩包｡

房间住的挺舒服,壁炉上面的台子有个镜子可以当梳妆台｡桌子下有插头充电很方便｡

房东人属于高冷内心暖男类型,永远不会打扰你｡想问问题他甚至会给你认真用纸写下来｡会点法语的朋友可以和他聊天,会很有收获的｡

Bien reçu, comfortable et bien situé au quartier latin. Greg was very accommodating and helpful. Offered recommendations for restaurants not far from the flat. Wish I could have stayed for longer! Merci et bonne continuation.
Great location, great hospitality!
Excellent location only seconds from the metro. Very spacious room with a lovely balcony.
Grégoire’s place was very nice, had a lovely view, balcony and all the essentials! He was very welcoming and offered tips about the area. Thank you for having me!
It was absolutely perfect- no faults!
位置很棒
Is situated in a very good place, the room is nice and confortable, is not just perfectly clean, Gregoire  is polite and taking car

The room has an amazing view and a lot of character. I only spent one night but Grégoire was an excelent host,  very quick to answer questions and gave some amazing suggestions for food and visiting the surrounding areas. Recommend the room wholeheartedly for anyone visiting  Paris.
Grégoire ist sehr hilfsbereit! Die Atmosphäre von Raum gefällt mir sehr. Ich empfehle das!
Delightful appartment, host and neighborhood. It’s close to the Notre Dame, there is a subway station just a few steps away. Loved my time there.
Beautiful spot, excellent host, a real gem!
Amazing stay! Great location! Great room. The host is very communicative and nice. The place is very clean :)

Great place to stay for a few nights in Paris. Great location, close to Our Lady of Paris Cathedral, Louxembourg Gardens and right in the middle of the Latni Neighbourhood. Gregoire is the kindest host, easy to communicate with and very respectfull with your privacy.
Un host muy amable y una muy bella habitación en un excelente sitio. 100% recomendado
nice stay
Gregoire is a great guy with good local tips, and the room has a killer view+balcony
Very nice place, the view is so cool and it’s 10 min walking from the main tourist spots. I totally recommend :)

Charming and cozy room perfect for a young professional or student. Quiet and suitable amenities for working such as coffee machine, full kitchen WiFi. Awesome rooftop view and and incredible shower! There’s a wide array of grocery store choices nearby and the cathedral and zoo are a short walk away.
Although I got to Paris really late (3am) he still received me and everything was great. In the next day I reserved it again. The location is perfect and Grégoire is really nice.

Greg was an amazing host, He was  so gentle and careful about the details.
Location of the apartment is great!
I had a great stay at Grégoire! A beautiful apartment in the city center. He was nice and welcoming! The room is big and has a stunning balcony.
Great place, in a great location. The room is simple but all you need a base whilst in Paris
Nice and centric place to stay.
The apartment is quiet and at a good location, close to several Metro stations, Notre Dame, Pantheon, and Paris 6 University.
Excellent location, very clean and comfortable room, I very much enjoyed it

Grégoire's apartment is in a very convenient area of Paris, with a great vibrant atmosphere. You are very close to the river and to fantastic sightseeing, and there are many nice cafés and restaurants at walking distance.
Grégoire is a very kind host and was extremely helpful in arranging a late evening check in for me.

The host was fantastic and the studio was exactly want I wanted for my experience. It is in the heart of a vibrant and cultured part of Paris. I would recommend it to everyone looking for a retreat for themselves.

Grégoire’s place is excellent, and situated at the very heart of Paris. A must if you want to have a Parisian experience. The room is lovely and Gregoire himself a great host who ensured everything was fine. Grégoire made sure to provide excellent local suggestions for food too. Overall, a great stay and a fantastic experience. Ilook forward to staying at Grégoire’s place when the wind brings me in again in Paris.
Grégoire is a nice and friendly host, and the room is simple but sufficient. My favourite thing is the location. The area around the flat is great with good access, bars, cafés and restaurants
Great place, great location, Grégoire is very nice.

Pick this place! Perfect location, kind host, everything you need for « un pied a terre » in Paris! 

Others mentioned the smell of cigarettes to be a bother - I agree with the the host - you would have to be very sensitive for it to affect you much. :)

Gregoire é um ótimo anfitrião. Ele foi muito gentil e deu todas as dicas sobre a casa e sobre os pontos turísticos mais próximos. Ele tbm é muito reservado e te deixa com total privacidade. A localização da casa é excelente e tem estação de metrô na esquina.

For the price, this was a great deal. Very good location, friendly communicative host, private room with independence and overall clean house and room. I'll note one thing people should be aware of - there is a slight smell of smoke in the room - one recent reviewer did mention it, but I'm surprised nobody else did, so I wasn't sure if this was a recent issue or not. It wasn't a big deal for me since I'm not too sensitive to it and I was only there for one night, but folks should be aware and ideally the smell can be removed/cleaned up.
It’s a great spot to crash for a short period. Well located close to the metro. Grégoire is amenable
예약하고 파리파업때문에 이용은 못했습니다

Appartamentocomodi per posizione, veduta i paragonabile alla mattina e al tramonto. Greg è molto simpatico e mi ha consigliato alcuni locali dove mangiare perfettamente in linea con ciò che cercavo! Bellissimo soggiorno.

Grégorie is very friendly and helpful. He welcomed me personally and showed me everything I could possibly need in the apartment. He was a very quiet host, which I really like. 
The apartment was really nice and clean. It also has a wonderful location— close to Notre Dame as well as lots of food stalls. Especially, the crepes are very delicious.
I would recommend this apartment to every single traveler in Paris.
Great place!
Grégoire's place is in a great location, very comfortable and quiet.
하루만 있었는데 아쉬웠어요

I have been using Airbnb for more than 8 years and all over the world and I have never experience this issue. The smoke and the smell of cigarettes was overwhelming all over the apartment. I had to sleep with the window open in 33 degree weather because the smell was so bad. The next day I wake up with a big headed and cough. Gregoire seems like a nice guy and I don't have anything against smokers but this place is unfit for hosting.

i cannot say enough good things!! Grégoire was so accommodating as soon as i arrives; i was given a thorough tour and made to feel right at home. the space itself was so lovely, with a balcony overlooking a perfectly Parisian street. perfect for solo travelers!
Wonderful apartment !

The place is very near to two subway stations and it is very useful for mobility in the city. Grégoire is a super friendly and discrete guy. An important tip is that if you have allergy to cigarette smoke you may be disturbed in your stay.
Greg’s place was amazing ! Such a nice Parisian flat and the location is prime I can get anywhere in Paris from his flat!! Love it and I highly recommend it!

Gregoire was an amazing host! Easy appartement to find and the directions given were on point. I didnt stay long but the place is well divided and you have your own space. All in all it was an nice stay, clean and well situated.

A good space with view over Paris.  Bed on the floor. Kitchen at hand. Nice hot shower with clean towel. I was received very kindly by Greg, who lives at the same house.  Nearby metro station at 50 meter.  Elevator to the 5th floor. My two night stay in Paris was well and I slept good.
場所的に便利な所｡
地理位置很好非常好,楼下很多小酒馆和中餐药妆店｡门是全部不能锁的,房间厕所浴室都无法锁,但是房东会充分给你隐私不打扰你,电梯一次只能进入两个人｡性价比很高,带阳台,适合抽烟的人
Great location and spot for a quick stay in Paris!
ﾊﾟﾘのほぼ中心にあって交通の便が良く､静か｡

Good spot for a quick affordable night in Paris. Thanks to Gregoire who was friendly and explained everything. Good location, close to the tube, perhaps the slight feel of a bachelor pad and a smoker's den, but otherwise fine all round.

Grégoire's place is in a wonderful central location in Paris. He is a kind and gracious host, and very happy to help with any questions you may have. The room was perfect for a solo traveler and will definitely look to stay again next trip to Paris!
It’s a really nice location near two metro station, you can go everywhere easily. Greg is a very warm and enthusiastic person. I had a great time here to enjoy my Paris trip.

1､Grégoire is very nice and makes a very detailed description of his house.
2､The house has a very convenient position and has a wonderful view.
房间很宽敞,房东很友好｡也很安全,但房间门没办法上锁,没有电吹风,其他都很好
very wonderful experience. Excellent location. Clean and comfortable room. I will recommend to my friends.

It was an amazing experience, one of the best stays ever. Grégoire was so kind, welcoming and communicative. Nothing was too much trouble for him. It's a beautiful place, with a balcony with lovely views over Paris. Very well located, near two metro stations. Very quiet and clean. It's a great place for smokers to stay - for me as a smoker, it was ideal. Many thanks Grégoire and I hope to stay again!
Great location in the heart of the Latin Quarter. Gregoire is responsive and friendly.

The location is amazing - metro is right around the corner, lots of restaurants and pretty area. 
The room was ok and seemed clean however bathroom (floor) and kitchen (from handles to teapot) were quite dirty and greasy. 
It’s not possible to check in without the owner, so when I said I will be able to arrive after 8:30, Gregoire said he will be waiting for me until 9:15 tops because it’s Saturday and he might wanna go see some friends. I think this is unacceptable response as there might be delays in traffic/airport and if the host hasn’t figured out the way to check in his guests without being present in the apartment, he has to adjust his schedule to guests’ needs - he takes money for that in the first place. 
Also, apartment and everything in it has cigarette smell. 
But on the bright side, he gave me some nice tips when I arrived about what to do around the area.

Wonderful location and all the iconic Parisian touches in abundance as well as 2 metros close by. Only complaint was bed was a matress on floor but loved everything else about staying at Gregoires place.

Grégoire's appartment is very nice and located in a   safe neighborhood. Most importantly, it is very close to RER B ( airport train ). You can also walk to the Pantheon, the quarter latin and other attractions. I definitely recommend this apartment.

Can’t top this location. I literally walked everywhere, although it’s seconds away from 2 metro stations. The room is quite large for Paris, and the balcony is lovely. There’s an elevator which is a god send! Quite a lively area so you get some noise at night but really the neighbourhood is phenomenal. Greg was very helpful with specific check in instructions and also very respectful of privacy. Absolutely recommend!
Very good location, big room with adorable balcony and Greg was super nice and welcoming! Would definitely recommend his place.

Gregoire was kind and welcoming during check-in when I arrived. We only met once while I was there. I asked for privacy so I could sleep off my jet lag, and he made that happen. In fact, I had no idea when he was there and when he was not. The apartment is safe and cozy. I enjoyed waking up and going to sleep in a room with a gorgeous view and lots of fresh air each day.  No hesitation about staying there again. It really is the perfect place for resting after a long trip and having a central base from which to explore Paris.

Grégoire é uma pessoa super tranquila e a hospitalidade foi ótima. 
Estava com receio, pois foi minha primeira experiência no Airbnb, mas no final tudo ocorreu muito bem! Apartamento super bem localizado e quarto com uma vista maravilhosa. Próximo ao metrô, o que facilita nos deslocamentos, mas também é possível fazer tudo andando, uma vez que o flat fica próximo de alguns pontos turísticos.
Everything was correct.

Greg was an excellent host! He welcomed me very friendly and showed me everything. We ended up talking for like 20 minutes on the balcony of the room I was staying in! The room was very (!!!) tidy and clean, very minimalistic, but everything you needed was there! He gave me a lot of tips on how to spend my time in Paris and everything he recommended was really good! I would definitly stay again in Gregs appartment! He is a great host!
It is a nice experience to be in Greg’s home. The location is great. The street is calm. Beautiful view from the balcony.
The apartment is very spacious, comfortable, and in a very convenient location. Grégoire had many recommendations and is very friendly!
Absolutely amazing! Would stay again!
Muy buena ubicación, una zona muy segura, a 50 metros del metro. La  habitación esta muy bien es espaciosa  y luminosa. para 1 persona súper bien.  El colchón es cómodo.
Very good! The room was clean and spacious. The location is excellent, lots of restaurants, bars etc in the area. Greg was very helpful and friendly and was quick to answer any questions.
The location is perfect very close to the subway station
The host was kind and helpful. Location right outside was the metro.  Didn’t use the feather pillow . There was another one. No worries here. Would definitely stay again:
I had a great stay in Paris at Grégoire’s place. It was a great place with a great location and a great price!

Gregoire was an excellent host, his place is charming and clean. It is a very simple space: I lacked a washcloth, a lighter blanket for my bed, and the luxury of a fan... but had confirmed that I could not expect amenities such as a hairdryer. The location, price, and ease made it all worth it.
Highly recommended! Really nice and warm apartment. Good location and beautiful view from the balcony.

The place is super convenient and safe. Only 100 m from the subway station “Cardinal Lemoine”. The road in front of the apartment is always bright with lights. When I checked in, Grégoire explained very kindly and briefly with warm hospitality. After that, I could use the room very flexibly as if it were my own room. I will definitely book when I visit next time. Thank you very much, Grégoire!
great location.Greg is nice person.
Grégoire was an excellent host. His apartment was beautiful, and in an incredible location. I recommend anyone visiting Paris alone and needing a place to stay to stay with Grégoire!
It is a good place and Grégoire is quite a nice guy.
Everything was as expected. Great location.  Easy access to Metro.  Grocery store right around the corner.
Muy buena ubicación. Espacio grande para ser París. Dueño muy silencioso. No se oía música ni ruidos externos. Muy cerca de los metros. Mucho olor a cigarrillo todo el tiempo
super clean, the balcony is amazing. best airbnb experience ever.
Grégoire’s home is great - perfect location to see Paris by foot, and Greg is such a great host.

Grégoire’s place is amazing,  I wish I could have stayed for longer. His studio has a warm and rustic feel about it which I loved. Grégoire was really friendly. He showed me around the place and gave me local recommendations which I found to be really useful. The place is very close to some popular attractions and is at walking distance to the river Seine and Notre Dame. I definitely would stay again. Thanks Grégoire.
Great location, great room , great host .. would definitely stay again when I next visit Paris

Grégoire's place is amazing. You are at a short walk from the most famous Paris monuments such as Pantheon and Notre Dame. The Latin Quarter neighbourhood it's a really nice place for restaurants, boulangeries!! and it's very safe at night. The view from balcony of the room it's beyond words and Grégoire it's a very pleasant guy. I totally recommend this place :)

GREGOIRE'S PLACE IS VERY CONVENIENCE AND CLOSE TO METRO STATION. IT TAKES LESS THAN 20 MINUTES TO ALL FAMOUS PLACES IN PARIS DOWNTOWN. THERE ARE SOME BARS AND RESTAURANTS NEAR TO HIS PLACE.  GREGOIRO IS NICE GUY.HE GAVE ME SOME SAFETY ADVISE WHEN I GO TO THE TOURIST AREAS.

地下鉄の駅からすぐにある眺めのよいｱﾊﾟｰﾄです｡とても雰囲気のあるｴﾚﾍﾞｰﾀを使用します(荷物が大きいと大変かもですが､一人旅なら問題ないでしょう)家主のｸﾞﾚｯｸﾞ氏はﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞﾘｰでとても親切な方でした｡
近くには大学があり､週末の夜中は学生が騒いでいますが､特に危険とは思いませんでした｡またｱﾊﾟｰﾄの目の前は静かな通りです｡大学の近くには漫画を売っているお店があり､夜遅くまで繁盛していました｡

ｷｯﾁﾝで食器をお借りできるので､近くのｽｰﾊﾟｰで食材やﾜｲﾝを買ってきて､そこで生活をしている気分を味わえました｡
一人旅の最高の体験でした｡

This was my first airbnb experience and it went perfect! Gregoire was super friendly, he showed me the place, then gave me recommendations of where I could go, and then gave me Independence the whole time. The place is very easy to find, just a minute away from a metro. Its about 10 min away from Luxemburg Garden, where I got off from the RER train from the CDG airport and I walked. It is a lovely walk to the Notre Dame and Seine. The room is very spacios and you have access to the kitchen. I loved the balcony, it was great to wake up and be at the window. Thank you Gregoire!!
good location, convenient and safe. balcony view is great.

La ubicación es inmejorable, a unos pasos de Notre Dame, es fácil llegar a cualquier punto de la ciudad pues tiene dos líneas del metro muy cerca y en realidad se puede ir caminando a todos los sitios cercanos al Sena. Altamente recomendable. La habitación tiene un balcón con una vista genial de la ciudad. Cuenta con todos los servicios y la comunicación con Greg es rápida. Lo único que no me gustó es que huele mucho a cigarro, pero fuera de eso es altamente recomendable, sin duda volvería a hospedarme aquí
This is a no-frills place to stay, but the price, location, and balcony view definitely make it worth it!
Classic Paris apartment with a balcony!

Gregoire's place is in a fantastic location just 10 minutes walk to Notre Dame. There is one metro stop just 2 minutes from the front door and another from another line just 3 minutes in the opposite direction, giving you great metro flexibility. There is also a great patissarie  just one minute from the front door. I went there for an affordable breakfast/lunch every day. The 5th floor balcony is also a very nice touch and a great place to sit if the temperature allows. On the negative side, the decoration in the room and elsewhere is spartan at best. The bed is on the floor with no frame or headboard. And there is noticeable cigarette smoke smell throughout.
Clean and lovely place with a nice view, close enough to the tourist spots :)

beautiful place. close to two metro stations. and most of everything is within walking distance.  he is quite respectful of your privacy. it is, like he says, like you have your own space. i had a beautiful however brief stay.

Fantastic location, very safe, 1 min walk to metro, 10 min walk to Norte dame. Couldn’t be better. Apartment was simple but stylish and clean enough. Great shower and beautiful balcony. Gregoire was nice to chat with, he lives there too but his room is on the other side of the house so it feels like you have a lot of privacy and you don’t hear each other. I would definitely book again the next time I’m in Paris.

Greg is a wonderful host. Very knowledgeable about the area and provides a clean and cozy space. The balcony is a nice little nook to relax on before or after your day. The flat is not too far from a  big beautiful park and is surrounded by tons of cafes. The tourists traps aren’t too far away but far enough that you can get lost in the alleys of the Latin quarter and instantly be transported to another time. Would definitely come back!
位置好,很安全
It’s in classic style apart in center of Paris. I was surprise about hospitality! I’m of course recommend it place and host! If u see that’s place not busy by someone, book immediately!

Located at 3 mins walk from either metro 7 or metro 10.
Private room but the host lives in the apartment too.
almost perfect in terms of tourism route, convenience of life, and comfort of accommodation. easily find a metro station if go downstairs. the lovely room with a balcony stuns everyone always.

Gregoire is a welcoming, humorous host. He was available for all my pre-arrival questions and accommodating to my request to drop my bags of earlier. 
This is a smokers venue - I missed that detail when booking. The bedroom and common areas needed regular airing.

El departamento de Grégoire se encuentra muy bien ubicado, a pasos de dos estaciones del metro. Desde alli pueden recorrerse las zonas turísticas e incluso algunas a pie. El balcón tiene una hermosa vista.
Grégoire ist sehr freundlicher und hilfsbereiter Gastgeber. Die Wohnung ist spartanisch eingerichtet, was mir gefällt. Würde wieder hier absteigen.
Greg's place was perfect for me, great central location and all the basics covered. He was easy to communicate with and the room is cozy!

I was looking for 2 very important things for my first trip to Paris, and this place delivered on both: a lovely view from a balcony and a super cool neighbourhood. I couldn't have stayed anywhere better!

Greg’s place is in the city center and only 2 mins walk to the metro. The neighborhood is incredibly safe even if you come back at late night. Greg is considerable and friendly. He even help me lift my luggage cuz the lift was broken. Thank you Greg

Grégoire’s place was in a perfect location, between 2 subway lines and an incredible boulangerie. The balcony offered a beautiful view; the room itself is simple with a bathroom and WC across the hall for private use. If you are hoping to spend a lot of time in your room, you might want something with more amenities (this is recommended for solo travelers only), but if you are hoping to sleep in a safe location and explore Paris otherwise, this is the place for you!

Greg is a very welcoming, intelligent and nice person, who would take his time to introduce the area to you. Also the apartment is pretty beautiful. Unfortunately Greg had a renovation in his bathroom/toilet on one day of my stay. There was also a huge renovation in the neighbours' appartment all the time. In such case I'd recommend to inform the guest upfront. Also a little bit weird was the fact to offer the towel of the previous guest because the new one wasn't washed yet. Hmm, maybe this was a misunderstanding. Anyways, afterwards I was sad that I didn't book a hostel or hotel instead. 
Greg is mentioning this in the rules, I wasn't paying that much attention, my fault: be aware - it is a non plus ultra smokers apartment!
Was a great and relaxing weekend. thanks G and thank you Paris

Loved this place - very old style and had a top floor with amazing views of the Latin Quartier. Gregoire was quick to respond and waited for me even though it took me forever to get here! Will def come back

Grégoire's Airbnb location is perfect for someone traveling solo in Paris, whether it's a short weekend trip or an extended stay. The host responded to my booking quickly, and also responded quickly when I messaged him about changed arrival plans coming from the airport. He welcomed me very warmly and gave me a thorough tour of all the amenities in the Airbnb. The room itself is quaint and met every need I had (I was out of the apartment often, so I really just needed a place to sleep and relax). The room has a balcony as pictured, which was very nice to look out of in the morning. The location is pretty close to a lot of attractions, if not by foot then by Metro. I walked to the Notre Dame Cathedral my first day there, as well as the Louvre. The M10 station is close, which I used frequently when I was in Paris. There are also many bus lines that run through the area, if you prefer this transportation. I did not use the kitchen, but it appeared that it was fully stocked if you did want to use it. The toilet, sink, and shower were all very clean. I would gladly stay at Grégoire's Airbnb when I return to Paris.
Greg was AWESOME! If I could give him 100 stars I would. Place is beautiful, in a beautiful location. I felt safe walking the streets at all hours.
Muy bueno el departamento mucha luz excelente ubicación todo a mano para conocer lugares subtes colectivos mucha privacidad el departamento al nuevo el baño y la ducha muy buen aire gracias

Grégoire’s place was great I was the first person to try out his new renovated restroom, it is very nice! The place is very close to the metro (about a 3-5 minute walk) definitely took advantage of that. The balcony was my favorite part, also just having a huge window/door to go outside and have light shine in. Grégoire gave me tips on where to visit around the area to have a few euros which was nice. And the place has an elevator so that was great too. I’ve gotten a lot of friends asking for the link. It became very popular to the people I shared it with. Also wanted to mention I’m a 21 year old female solo traveler and the environment was beyond safe. Arriving home late as well and taking the metro it’s last hour of run at night I felt extremely safe. I recommend to any other female travelers out there looking for a safe place to say :) Definitely would stay here again.
Great location and great host! Grégoire hosted my friend while he waited for me to visit Paris.

The host is really nice.
If you have any problem,he will help you to deal with.
The house is cozy. Near metro station,you can arrive city center fast.
The location is safe ,even I came back home around 12pm. If I come back to Paris again, I will choose this room.

The location is perfect for getting to other stations. Everything connects with the lines by this apartment. A 10 minute walk to Notre-Dame, with a supermarket right around the corner for the little things you don’t wanna spend tons of money on, like breakfast.

Perfect place and perfect location. Virtually no distance to the metro station. Situated in the heart of Latin quartier, which easily leads you to the major touristic sites. The house is very clean and spacious. Grégoire is also a super host. Recommended to anyone who will have a stay in Paris.
在拉丁区一幢老房子的5楼,可以步行到达各著名景点(毕竟巴黎市区也不太大),住的三天每天都挺晚到家,也没觉得不安全｡离地铁也近,不愿意走路搭地铁也方便｡房东人很nice,房间里有阳台,可以说是很parisian了｡

Gregoire’s flat is in a great location in the Latin Quarter and ideal for a solo traveler.  I enjoyed  coffee on the balcony every morning, taking in my little slice of Paris. Gregoire was a very gracious host, and was very accommodating throughout my stay and check-in process.  If you are sensitive to cigarette smoke, this may not be an ideal place to stay.

I had a great stay at Greg's place in the Latin Quarter of Paris. The location is very good, close to both the quaint, hip streets near the Sorbonne (e.g. Rue Mouffetard) and also close to the upscale area of Saint-Germain-des-Pres (6th arrondissement). It is an easy walk to the Pantheon and Jardin du Luxembourg, and if you're up for a longer but still manageable walk you can reach Notre Dame, Musee d'Orsay, Louvre, and Pompidou Center on foot as well. If you'd rather take the metro, which was surprisingly convenient and easy to use, there is a stop on Greg's street not even a block away.

The apartment itself is a very cool 19th Century apartment in one of the historic buildings that have made Paris's boulevards famous. Of course, it has a few quirks which any apartment of this age would have: small kitchen, toilet in separate room than sink and shower, creaky floors, etc. But I did not mind any of this-it's what gives it its charm, afterall, and the space is very clean and tidy. My bedroom had nice big windows which opened on to a long balcony which you can step right out onto, so plenty of fresh air and great views, too. 

Although Greg was there while I was, he made it clear to me that I could come and go as I pleased, and we only crossed paths a few times. Even though I spent most of my days and nights out in the city, when I was home it felt mostly like I was alone in the apartment. He gave me use of the kitchen and dining area, and there are a few times I walked to a market less than a block away to bring food back to the apartment. 

There is a faint smell of cigarette smoke as Greg does smoke in the apartment, so if you're hyper-sensitive to this then you should take note. I don't smoke but it was faint enough that I wasn't bothered by it. Also, the bed is small (twin), so if you're a couple you might want to note that as well. 

Greg is very friendly and will give you recommendations/tips if you need them. All in all a great stay, great value for the money, and I would absolutely stay with Greg again. It felt like an authentic Paris experience!
Grégoire’s place is a true gem—fantastic location and view, charming in every sense. He’s also a great host. You’d be lucky to stay here!

Greg’s apartment has a great view with a balcony sure to make your friends jealous. The bed is a single size mattress and the room is fairly large for one person. I had everything I needed. While in Paris, one shouldn’t be so focused on staying in the AirBnB. You must explore the magic the city offers. Greg’s place was perfect for my short stay.

I stayed at Grégoire’s for five nights, it was my first time visiting Paris and I was so excited. The apartment is gorgeous, the room is just as shown in pictures, everything is super clean and feels super comfortable. THE LOCATION IS GREAT, the Latin quarter is a great place to stay in Paris, felt really safe, the metro stations are a few steps away. Greg was super sweet and gave me total privacy, I felt like the place was my own! I 100% recommend staying here, thank you Greg!!
Spacious clean apt with a panorama of Paris in a splendid quarter withterrific transport and amenities A real Parisian gem
Lovely place to stay! Would recommend.

Ubicación excelente a 10 min caminando de la Catedral a 2 min de la estación de Metro. Anfitrión amable,  que permite libertad para entrar y salir . Excellent location 10 min walk from the Cathedral 2 min from the Metro station. Friendly host, which allows freedom to enter and exit.
Greg’s place was great! Can’t really fault it... I especially LOVED the balcony and being able to wake up to the Paris rooftops as well as sitting out there on the evenings and having a drink!

Greg's place locates amazing. 2-4min to metro and there's 1 bakery just around the corner.
On 5th floor (but with a lift! Thank god with the lift) so can experience like a Parisian -the rooftop vibe. I only wished Greg can reply msg slightly more often- I msged him when I booked the room 2months ago but he never replied... Made me a bit anxious to be honest... He finally replied me the day before I arrived. One more thing is you can smell the smoke even if you are in the room, not sure it's from Greg or the neighbor...  Overall it was a good experience. The location and the lift made it wonderful.

位置很方便,机场打的过来还路过巴黎圣母院,附近87/63都可以到埃菲尔铁塔,卢浮宫走过去20来分钟,最主要真的很安全,附近就是学校
The landlord is very good. This place is really safe. It's not inconvenient for you to live here.

El departamento tiene una ubicación inmejorable, a 50 m del metro. La calle es tranquila y el edificio está en excelentes condiciones. Al rentar esa habitación uno no pierde privacidad, y tiene acceso a cocina y baño. Grégoire, el anfitrión, es joven, discreto y muy gentil. Sin duda volvería en un siguiente viaje.

The room is beautiful with a wonderful balcony.  I loved the location.  Convenient to the metro for flying in the CDG and just about everything you want to do is walkable from Grégoire’s apartment.  I loved the restaurant just around the corner, Bonviviant.  Great food, wine and service.  The perfect place for a late night drink and an easy walk back to your airbnb.  The room is a little smokey as other people have commented, but pretty much everything in Paris is.  I really don't like cigarette smoke and still didn't find it to be an issue.

I used to live in Paris, but on the other side of the city. Apartment is exactly as described, on fifth floor, but has the lift. Visited places I had never been to before, because they were 'on the doorstep'  Saint Chapelle on the last day, Jardin de Luxembourg for breakfast, ........ walked for miles! 
Was visiting friends and so didn't spend time with Grégoire, but he has great guide books (The Top 10) is perfect and sent me his own list of places to visit, eat, drink, which was excellent, as local knowledge is always the best.
I had access to anything in the kitchen that I needed, but since I was only there to sleep, didn't use. All in all a great little 'pied ã terre' in my favourite city. Merci Grėgoire!
Es un departamento muy bien ubicado y con un cuarto amplio, muy limpio y muy luminoso.

Grégoire’s flat is so incredible. The view from the balcony alone will entice envy in anyone who follows you on social media. Grégoire makes sure to give you your own space, too, so it almost felt like I had the whole place to myself. Can’t recommend it enough!

Sehr empfehlenswerte Unterkunft, sehr gute Lage, alles Wichtige zu Fuss erreichbar. Der Gastgeber ist ein netter Typ, der gute Tipps gibt und zuvorkommend sowie kommunikativ ist. Zudem lässt er einem seine Privatsphäre, d.h. habe mich eigentlich so gefühlt, als ob ich allein in der Wohnung bin. Das Zimmer ist wie auf dem Foto, das Bett bequem und der kleine Balkon mit Aussicht ist einfach wunderbar. Alles in allem also top und absolut empfehlenswert.
Lo recomiendo muchísimo por todo: rapidez en las respuestas, flexibilidad, ayuda, atención, hospitalidad. El alojamiento es lindísimo y super bien ubicado!!!! Todo 10 puntos!
It is really great experience. Lovely room and nice host.
Great location in the heart of the Latin Quarter. You essentially have the place to yourself. Quick and clear communication from Grégoire
Grégoire was very helpful,  nice room in great location.

No tuve el agrado de conocer personalmente a Grégoire, ya que se encontraba de viaje durante mi estadía en París; igualmente estuvimos en contacto y la persona que me recibió fue muy amable. 
Las instalaciones eran tal cual se ve en las fotos. La ubicación me resultó muy práctica para manejarme tanto a pie como en transporte público (tiene una parada de metro a menos de una cuadra); y también el barrio me resultó muy seguro para manejarme en cualquier horario del día.
A lovely place - authentic Paris experience a simple room adequate facilities and a proper Paris style lift in the house. Easy access to the Latin quarter experience.

It was very nice. He was very kind and helpful. And room was clean and location was perfect, safe and close with 2 metro stations. I didn't know that he stayed the other room, so I was surprised at first. But he respected my private space, my room and bathroom, kitchen. So it was not big matter. Merci, Gregoire.

Gregoire's home is wonderfully located in a neighbourhood that I felt totally at home in - Supermarket, Boulangerie, Cinema all within minutes; plenty of traditional cafe's and restaurants, and a great Ramen place around the corner. The attractions are accessible by foot if you enjoy walking, as they say it's the journey not the destination - so many wonderful places to explore along the way.  Also you are only moments from two metro and bus stops. The bed was comfy and the room was quiet and dark for a good nights rest. Gregoire's communication was clear and prompt, his English is perfect which made it very easy for me. Fond memory - freshly baked croissant and espresso on the balcony while soaking up the Parisian charm. {part of the charm, whilst not an active participant - embracing the tradition of cigarette smoking;)}

great place for a solo traveler to stay on a short trip to Paris. Lovely typical Parisian flat in the heart of the Latin quarter (very lively area with loads of places to eat) and readily accessible to rest of the city by public transit. Grégoire was welcoming and very responsive and flexible with check-in and check-out arrangements.

This was the worst AirBnB experience I had.
First, even though I had informed Gregoire of my arrival time three days before my trip I received an email from him less than five hours before my planned arrival at the flat that he would not be there to meet me. I was forced to drag my suitcase through wintry cold Paris for two hours. 
When I finally got to the flat it was late. The bedsheets and towel felt and smelled used, but I didn’t quite want to believe that someone would actually not change the linens. However, this was confirmed when I came back to the flat on the afternoon of my departure in order to pick up my suitcase.  The new guest had just arrived to the same towel and bed linens.
The room was so dusty that I had sneeze attacks. The rubbish from the previous occupant was still in the waste basket and the bathroom was not clean. 
Avoid!

Gregoire’s flat is at a very central location, 3 minutes walk to 2 metro stations and nicely surrounded by cafes and restaurants. He responded to my messages quickly, being extra helpful like giving detailed instructions on how to arrive to the flat. He kindly offered tips and suggestions around the neighborhood. I had a very comfortable and relaxed stay at his place. I highly recommend his flat for everyone who wishes to visit Paris with a reasonable budget.

Grégoire’s flat was just as described! Close to public transport or a lovely stroll down to Notre-Dame! Even walked back from the Eiffel Tower a fair few times. 

Very quintessential Parisian room! Would definitely recommend and would happily stay again :)

Really good location, just 5 mins walk to Notre Dame, really nice guy. The instructions to enter the department were really consistent and easy to understand. Really flexible and allowed me to leave my bags after the checkout time. He gave me good advises and the subway station is really close.
La casa está muy bien situada y fácil de encontrar. La habitación amplia y todo limpio. Grégoire es muy atento.   Espero volver en mi próxima visita a París.

Grégoire was the perfect host (even offered me croissants) and the apartment is located in a great spot, very close to two metro stations that can basically take you anywhere in Paris. Plus, there is a vibrant nightlife some blocks ahead, and the street of the apartment would remain silent like it was soundproof, amazing.

Great location, very near public transport and big attractions such as Notre Dame, Pantheon and Luxembourg Gardens.

Gregoire was super nice and welcoming. The room was basic- very comfortable bed- and is great for a short stay in Paris. I'd definitely recommend!
Happy to stay at Gregorie's place. The location is great and very accessible. Will surely stay again in the future.

Incredibly well situated apartment.  Gregoire was a thoughtful and patient host during my first four nights in France.  I would highly recommend his apartment for anyone planning to stay in Paris.  Please note that there is a light residual scent of smoke.  It wasn’t off-putting to me, though others may be more sensitive.
A nice, friendly host located in a central and quiet part of Paris.

This is a perfect place for someone looking for a quintessentially styled Parisian apartment experience. Gregoire was fantastic helping me check in, and strikes a great balance in providing local knowledge, while happily respecting your privacy and letting you enjoy some time on your own as well. Would love to come back here if I am travelling solo to Paris again!
Clean, quiet, fantastic location, and Gregoire responded to any questions I had very promptly.

A real Parisian room with wooden floors and balcony views. A great spot to stay when checking out Paris. You definitely feel like a local. Gregoire has great tips for exploring Paris, and was a thoughtful host who was always up for a chat.
Great place to stay in Paris
Beautiful room in a beautiful area of Paris with a great & friendly host!! Perfect!
Great location and very friendly and handsome Grégoire))) strongly recommend))) and thanks to Grégoire)))

Mejor de lo que se ve en fotos, zona muy segura, metro a pocos metros, banco, tiendas, supermercado, restaurantes, el punto y zona ideal para estar en Paris. Caminando llegas a Notre-Dame. Todo excelente, Grégoire es muy atento, te da consejos, ofrece café, la ducha es muy cómoda y tiene calefacción en la bañera, la habitación es muy amplia, tiene balcón con bonita vista, escritorio, etc. Elevador y zona segura para caminar de noche.
Beautiful place with a beautiful view!
Such a great hidden gem in the Latin Quarter! The best place to stay if you want the real Paris, with a terrace view and just a few minutes walk from Rue Mouffetard.
Great location for the Metro, every major landmark is within a 45 minute walk. Greg was very accommodating and it almost feels like you have the place to yourself. Thanks Gregorie
Excelente.

Gregoire's place is in a great area of Paris, close to nice restaurants, the river and 25-30 mins walk to the louvre, even closer to Notre dame. Also the area itself is not too busy or noisey, with a nice sculpture park and herb garden 15 mins walk away. The flat itself has nice wooden floors and the bedroom is fitted out usefully with cupboards and a comfortable bed for a single person. It also comes with a nice balcony which you can bring your chair out and enjoy. The kitchen and bathroom are easy to use and Gregoire was a polite and helpful host.

Grégoire was very helpful and very easy to communicate with. He gave me great tips to visit local restaurants with french food. The apartment had a great location close to public transport, Cafés and restaurants. Moreover, the location close to Notre Dame and the Luxemburg gardens. However, the apartment was not so clean the bedsheets had a strange odor, the bathroom and the kitchen were not very hygienic. Last point, there was no bed but only a mattress on the floor. 
Overall the location and Grégoire were very nice however, the flat needs better cleaning.

It is very comfortable house for sightseeing Paris.
Because it is near Notre-Dame or Louvre.
You can see a nice Paris city view from this house's veranda.
Es tal cual como se describe. Cerca de todo. Un barrio excelente. Todo muy bien. Volvería
Wonderful location, quiet and cozy room!

Traveling alone and light this was a great place. 15 minute walk to Notre Dame, close to public transport. It's clearly written in French, but if smoking bothers you, you may want to pass. Greg smokes and he allows smoking in the apartment. The mattress was an Ikea mattress on the floor, it was not uncomfortable. The apartment and bathroom were clean. The view is incredible, he has a great balcony. I did not see Greg much, but when I did he was friendly and helpful. He works at home but stays on his side of the apartment. I would stay here again.
Muy buen lugar, me quería quedar a vivir ahí.
Okay for a one night stay. Don't think it's great for more than 2 nights stay.

Agréable et spacieux studio. Bonne localisation par rapport au métro. Un grand merci à Jonathan pour son accueil, malgré mon arrivée tardive.
Canapé très confortable. Séjour agréable.

Jonathan est très arrangeant et généreux ! Arrivée en fin de soirée après un concert, ne connaissant pas Paris, ses explications pour trouver son logement étaient parfait; accueil chaleureux et souriant; l'annonce n'est pas trompeuse et le canapé-lit bien confortable je ne peux que le recommander ! :)

Hôte plein de générosité et de Simplicité! Tout ce que je cherchais! Disponibilité et surtout il en faut avec moi.... : de grandes capacités d'adaptation! ! ;-) merci merc (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) pour ces supers moments d'échange! Et.... à très bientôt c'est sûr! ;-)

Jonathan est très agréable. Son appartement est situé dans un quartier plutôt calme. Le lit propose est vraiment confortable, situé dans la même pièce que celui de Jonathan mais cela ne pose aucun souci car il est très silencieux et soucieux du bien-être de des hôtes.
Tout c'est très bien passé, aucune remarque négative !
beau studio  , un confort assuré , johanthan est agréable , j’hésitai pas de revenir quand je serai à Paris , Merci pour le thé

Grand chambre très bien meublé avec une belle balcon ou on peut avoir belle vue. Propriétaire est très gentil. J'ai déjà présenter ce chambre à mes amis. C'est génial !!

On se sent rapidement chez soi! 
je recommande vivement, très bon rapport qualité/prix!

Le logement correspondait tout a fait a ce qu'il  y avait de noté sur l annonce, très bien situé a deux pas de la station de métro. L hôte a été  très  sympa en nous laissant déposer  nos bagages tôt  dans la matinée pour que nous puissions profiter pleinement de notre journée, retour tard dans la soirée  l hôte était là  pour nous accueillir sans soucis. Un bon moment partagé  en sa compagnie avec un super petit déjeuner le lendemain  matin!! Merci Jonathan! !
Séjours au Top, rien à dire
Toujours bien.je recommande
Tout était parfait !!
Jonathan est un bon hôte et je vraiment recommande rester chez lui.

Jonathan a été un excellent hôte une des deux nuits je suis arrivé après minuit - cela n’a pas posé de problèmes pour lui. Son appartement est en très bon état et était parfait pour deux nuits. Hautement recommandable
Parfait. Jonathan est un hôte exceptionnel, très attentif. Il m'a laissé rester un peu plus de temps par rapport à ce qui était prévu.
Très bien
Une personne  sympathique qui sait mettre les gens à l aise.je recommande.
Appart petit mais très propre.
Excellent accueil ! Nuit calme et tranquille. Excellente réactivité et communication.
Je me sens comme chez moi ici. Merci Jonathan!
Accueil chaleureux,hôte sympathique.Bon rapportqualité-prix.
Espace confortable et bien chauffe. Jonathan a ete tres sympa et nous a donne les bons conseils pour visiter Paris
Jonathan est un hôte très gentil et attentionné. L’appartement est situé à environ 30 à 40 min du centre de Paris. Le divan lit est confortable. En bref, c’est un bon rapport qualité prix pour Paris!

Très cordiale, excellente hospitalité et en plus des bonnes discours avec Jonathan m'on change le WE.
L'appartement étais très propre et il y avez de l'espace pour vivre. 
Franchement top.
Merci pour ta gentillesse et ton accueil Jonathan!
Lieu impeccable, facile à trouver, pas trop mal placé, et joli appartement. Un accueil chaleureux, j'invite à choisir ce lieu !
Bien

Très bon accueil et l'hôte est trop gentil. Bien que l'appartement ne soit pas dans la ville de Paris le métro qui n'est pas du tout loin vous permets d'y aller très facilement. L'hôte ne donne aucune clé donc il faut lui dire quand on pense rentrer pour qu'il soit là pour ouvrir la porte. C'était bien, je recommande.
Le lit était très confortable, Jonathan est sympathique et agréable.
Très agréable studio, a côté d'une station de métro.

C'était une très bon temps pendant mes jours ici. Près de la station de métro, ssez calme et tout équipé pour faire nous-mêmes. Jonathan il a beaucoup de talents qui nous attirent. Je suis très content de l'avoir rencontré.

Je vous remercie pour toute l'aide  avec les transport en commun - je suis vraiment reconnaissant... Juste que m'ai manqué c'est une photo ensemble autographié, car Jonathan est aussi bien un star du cinéma... Sûrement je vais garder les souvenirs comment une des mes meilleures voyages....jusqu'à la prochaine.
Logement correspond à la description ainsi qu'aux photos
Very nice french guy with good attitudes, who will always wants to help you.
Все хорошо. Цена низкая, принял заявку почти сразу. На контакты всегда отвечал
Preocupacion confiable una persona que no se mete en tu privacidad es perfecto con muchos valores RECOMENDABLE
Very nice, calm and caring person.
Sofa was okay to sleep on. Check in was easy
ok

Jonathan is a very nice. He is very welcoming, and interesting to talk with. My stay was of only 1 night but I totally recommend him. Plus the place is very luminous and spacious, and i have never slept on a couch so comfy ahah! I recommend!

Jonathan was a wonderful host. He was very accommodating and considerate. He gave quick tips for travel in Paris. My family shared great time with him in his studio. He is a great host and that made our time enjoyable despite any unfortunate incidents. His place is nearer to metro. The place has good security in place. The elevators and all facilities work perfectly. There is a cafe downstairs where you can grab some dinner or drinks. Jonathan is an interesting person as well. He has great stories to listen to.i would recommend his place anytime.
Jonathan é um cara muito legal e atencioso! O apartamento é muito  perto da estação de metrô, embora não tão perto dos pontos turísticos, mas nada que não dê pra chegar de metrô.
不错
Nickel
I changed my mind temporarily so I didn't check in.
A wonderful host! I arrived later than we had planned, and Jonathan waited for me despite his dinner plans.
Amost impossible to sleep because of the mosquitoes. If you travel not in winter, bring with you something really effective
Really nice place to stay, the host was really friendly and helpful. Even recommended me where to get some breakfast.
Super!
Great place, easy to find. Experienced host happy to give recommendations for places to visit
Great value for money, great host, 100% recommend
Schöne Wohnung am Stadtrand von Paris. Mit der Metro (Linie 12) gut zu erreichen. Jonathan ist ein guter Host mit dem man auch so mal gut quatschen kann. Gerne wieder.
Perfect!
Muito bom, recomendo para todos.
Justo what I needed for a brief stay in Paris!
Wszystko OK

Hice la reserva para la hija de mi pareja en el medio de la cuarentena que afecto a todos los paises por la pandemia, y Jonathan fue sumamente atento con ella, permitiendole ingresar antes y haciéndola sentir como en su casa. El departamento es bello, con todas las comodidades y muy prolijo y limpio. Valoro por sobre todo la calidad como persona de Jonathan en un momento tan difícil para una niña de 19 años que se encontraba sin poder regresar a su país, brindándole calidez de hogar en un país tan lejano. Gracias!

Jonathon was an amazing host! I got in earlier than check in and he was able to assist me with that no problem. He was very sweet, offered wonderful places to eat for cheap (but delicious!) and visit free museums and such. 

He was very sweet and understanding of me coming in a bit later as I enjoyed roaming at night to experience the Eiffel Tower under the moonlight. Make sure you plan out the metros though! I was silly and ended up walking most of Paris (since I didn’t have WiFi for an Uber). 

The place was as pictured and 30 minutes from the Eiffel Tower. Only five minutes from the metro which is perfect. The café below was a great spot to grab coffee before an adventure. Very local feeling. Felt very safe as a solo female traveler. 

Overall, great experience. I was very happy with my stay even though it was short. Merci beaucoup !
Una gran persona, puedes hablar con él en español, pero sería mucho si te comunicas con él en inglés, así de paso prácticas para no tener problemas de comunicación en Paris

The place was sparkling clean. Clear instructions were given on how to enter the place and things to use in the house. The host was very flexible with the checkin timing. The host welcomed nicely at the place.
Great location, wonderful host with very convenient local tips.
Convenient to get to the center by taking M4. Big plus that I can prepare food and doing laundry. Saved a good amount of money by staying here in Paris.

Jonathan é uma pessoa atenciosa, cordial e está disposto a ajudar. Mesmo com minha dificuldade dentro o idioma, o anfitrião fez o possível para me ajudar e se comunicar.  O apartamento é um loft e você dorme em um sofá cama (como descrito no anúncio) confortável.
i really enjoyed my stay at his place. bonus points for him for being a french teacher :)

Es un lugar muy práctico para viajeros independientes, Jonathan tiene todo para tu comodidad si te quieres cocinar algo por tu cuenta. Es una persona muy amable y atento con quien se hospeda. Al inicio me perdí pero sus vecinos muy amablemente me ayudaron a contactarlo. Me herí un dedo y el me proporcionó ayuda. Definitivamente lo recomiendo
Always a pleasure to stay with Jonathan!
Jonathan was great to talk to and quick to respond! I had to come check-in a little earlier and he helped me do so with no issues! Definitely recommend.

La habitación no estaba sucia pero no luce como en las fotos, un poco menos acogedor pero el precio lo vale. No incluye el desayuno como dice. En las fotografías se aprecia a ver una cama pero es donde duerme el anfitrión (Jonathan) tú dormirás en un sofá-cama, su cama está junto y se aprecia a escuchar sus ronquidos (no recomendable para los de sueño ligero), para taparte ofreció unas tipo sábanas (no recomendable para los friolentos). Si te quieres bañar y llegas noche, como mi caso, es muy incomodo usarla por el ruido al igual temprano porque el sigue durmiendo, el precio lo vale 100%, y Jonathan es amable. No habla bien el español como lo muestra su descripción.
Everything is good
침대가 소파 접이식입니다
I never recommend
Jonathan is very kind and responsive. I felt comfortable and well received with everything I needed.
Adorei o lugar, simples, porém acolhedor, só não tive sorte com o transporte, devido a greve, o que tornou tudo mais longe, mas não é culpa do anfitrião, o Jonathan é super atencioso. Recomendo!

The host is very nice. There was some misunderstanding but he was willing to resolve it by contacting Airbnb. Make sure to read the house description throughly because it’s wordy. Basically you are sharing the studio with the host and you only get the sofa bed to sleep on. It was our fault not reading it carefully before booking. But we still appreciate our stay.
It was really bad. Worst.

Jonathan was a very nice body. Though I haven't managed to meet him in person due to our different schedules, he was very helpful helping me with everything I needed. It was pretty easy to check in into his place. The altrimenti Is located around 15-20 minutes walk from the RER line that takes you directly to the airport, so if you don't mind walking is good. The only small thing is that the photos didn't match completly, as the house was clean but a bit messy.
Jonathan is a great Hoster and gave me really nice tips of Paris. The location is really good with restaurants and transportation around.
Thanks
Buen lugar
Great place to crash at night. Close to train.

There is a nearby metro (RER) which is good going to the airport. Jonathan was very kind, respectful, and pleasant to talk with. I really enjoyed our conversation. I was traveling as a solo female and felt very comfortable with the shared room. I checked in too early and the apt. wasn’t clean, but after I came back it was very very clean, so don’t be surprised if you check in early too. He made me tea before bed, shared local tips, and helped me rent a car. Thank you Jonathan, best of luck with everything!
The Place is as described... I was close to the metro which means you can reach any place without any problem...
Ótimo lugar. Perto de estação de metrô e ponto de ônibus e de conveniência.  Sofá cama realmente confortável. Só não há lugar para guardar bagagem.

Jonathan ha sido muy amable, pero a pesar de ser compartido el apartamento no teníamos ni el sofá cama preparado para dormir. Además, el piso estaba todo desordenado y sucio. No había ni un sitio para dejar nuestras maletas.
Repito, fue amable, pero el espacio para alojarnos era pésimo, desordenado y nada acogedor. 
Su alojamiento no es nada recomendable. Las fotos son engañosas. Se ve una cama que es la suya, la cual los huespedes no pueden usar. Nosotros nos buscamos otro alojamiento.

Es un apartamento muy limpio y organizado, está cerca tanto de una estación de bus como de metro desde el cual se puede llegar fácilmente al centro de la ciudad. Jonathan es muy amable y es agradable platicar con él. Me ha ayudado mucho para  poder usar el transporte y llegar a los atractivos turísticos. También me ha dado recomendaciones de otros lugares no tan conocidos por los turistas y se agradece. En fin, me la he pasado muy bien y recomiendo el lugar :)
Jonathan es genial, indicaciones precisas, una aventura muy interesante. Saint Denis es un poco apartado del centro pero el metro y las conexiones de Paris solucionan cualquier distancia.
Jonathan pretty friendly and calm guy. It was nice to meet him.
人很好,房间很干净,住起来很舒服

Ich war das zweite mal mit meiner Hündin bei Jonathan und wieder sehr zufrieden. Preis, Sauberkeit, Tipps, Weg zur Metro,  was wir benutzen durften und der Kaffee morgens nicht zu vergessen. Wir werden wieder bei Ihm buchen!
It a great house and has terrace that can see Tour Eiffel and the host was great man
Jonathan’s place was really nice. Just a short taxi ride away from the Eiffel Tower. I would recommend to anyone visiting the area!
A estadia está em conformidade com o anunciado.
El lugar esta algo retirado del centro de Paris, pero llegas rapido en metro, en general todo bien
Excelente lugar, cómodo y recomendable. El anfitrión, Jonathan muy gentil y amable.
Nice

Il loft di Jonathan è incredibilmente accogliente e pulito. La casa si trova vicino ad una fermata della metro che in una ventina di minuti arriva a Montmarte e al centro di Parigi. Jonathan è un host fantastico, piacevole, intelligente e accogliente. La sua casa è molto pulita e il divano letto è comodissimo. Jonathan è stato davvero gentile nel venirmi incontro con l’orario di check in e con il darmi dei consigli personalizzati su cosa visitare a Parigi. Se dovessi tornare a Parigi ritornerei sicuramente nel suo alloggio. Merci Jonathan, à bientôt!

Great value and a lovely view! Very respectful host. 

Definitely recommend!

Toller Gastgeber! Er verlässt sich auf Einen, lässt einem seinen Freiraum und ist ein sehr guter Gesprächspartner! Mit der U-Bahn und dann ein paar hunderte Meter zu Fuß, erreicht ihr super die Unterkunft.

I only stayed one night however communication was great, Jonathan left keys for me so I could check in early. Apartment is small but right next to a Metro station - Paris is at your doorstep. It was very clean and Jonathan is a great person,
can recommend :)

It is around 30 mins by metro from the main attractions in Paris. There is a metro station just about 5 mins walking. It is a common place, which means you will share the same room with Jonathan. In general the place is ok, Jonathan is a nice host. Just consider that the checkin is at 8pm and checkout is at 8am. This is because Jonathan’s work schedule.

Die Lage der Unterkunft ist perfekt wenn man tagsüber in der Stadt ist und Abends den Stadtlärm entfliehen will. Man hat einen wunderschönen Ausblick auf die Sacre-Coeur. Besonders ab Abend ein toller Anblick. Der Balkon ist auch sonst sehr gemütlich. Der Check-In verlief problemlos und Jonathan ist da auch sehr flexibel. Jonathan ist sehr nett und hilfsbereit. Er gibt sehr tolle Tipps für Unternehmungen, Essen, Trinkn,....
Die Unterkuft war sehr sauber und gepflegt und das Sofa super bequem.
Jonathan was friendly and helpful!
Podría ser mejor.
Everything was really good. I meet a really nice person. Good conversation. It was a pity that I couldn't stay longer to know him better. Merci pour tout, monsieur !

Had a wonderful stay at Jonathan’s flat! It was very clean, everything needed was there, including host himself :) Jonathan was very responsive and communicated a lot with me, he is a guy with good thoughts and healthy life. And was very fun to talk with. Metro was very near and supermarket also! Thank you for your care. Will come next time if I were to visit Paris again. 
끈뗴 한꾺뿐뜰(튺히 여썽뿐뜰)  씨냬예써는 떄쭝꾜통 싸오씨뿐 쩡또 껄려써 화이트예폘이라떤까.. 썌뼊까찌 놀따까 뜰어오끼옌 이민짜뜰또 많이 싸는 동네인뗴따까 찌하철 쫑찪엮이라 쫌 무써워요. 끄껀 꼬려하쎠야 할뜼!
It was very nice to meet Johnathan. He shared a lot of things with me.
Jonathan is such a great host. He makes you feel at home and provides some local tips. 100% recommended

Jonathan is a very Nice host. He gives some good advice were to go in terms of restaurants, bars and city highlights. The appartment is located next to a metro station. The appartment wasnt as organized as in the pictures, however still clean though. If you dont mind sharing the room with the owner, this is the place for you.
Local extremamente limpo,  metrô e ônibus proximos e sofá cama confortável.
O apartamento é muito bom! Fácil acesso ao metrô e com um ótimo custo benéfico. Sem dúvidas indico o lugar!
Jonathan turned out to be incredibly friendly and open minded guy. And free parking nearby was a huge plus for us guys traveling all the way from Amsterdam. We would highly recommend this apartment!
A stay that's accomodating between Paris and the airport.
The place was nice, easy access to metro station. Jonathan gave good tips about Paris.

Jonathan’s place was nice. He was welcoming and kind enough to tell extra tips about paris and help me. Also his place is large and has a balcony, close to bus station. But I recommend you to take the bus to get to home, not by walk cause it’s not that safe to walk to at night. Overall, if you want to stay at paris at amazingly cheap price this is the place.
Jonathan was a very lovely host, his flat is nice and tidy - I really enjoyed my short stay!
Jonathan was very friendly and helpful. The place almost the same as my expectation. Only 5mins walk from tram station, very convenient!
I great place for spend night, Jonathan is a nice host.

Тихий квартал, рядом метро. Джонатан оказался очень гостеприимным человеком. Диван удобный. За такие деньги в центре Парижа просто невозможно найти жилье лучше. 
Спасибо, Джонатан!

Jonathan is a amazing guy. Me and my boyfriend loved him.
He was so gentle, gave us tips of places to go, how to come home after the subway closes, good talk. No complains at all.
His house is beautiful and clean. If we came back to Paris, I would definitely be here again.
Jonathan is very nice. He provided me some tipps about the trip in Paris. His appartment is comfortable.
The place is nice and really clean, the host is really friendly and if you need help he’s always there to help, he’s very laidback and likes get to know his guests, I recommend this place 100%.
Very attentive.  Your space is neat and organized.  Thank you Jonathan for a great stay.  I hope to return soon.

Great place to stay. The apartment is 5 minutes walk from the métro, and in neighbourhood with new buildings. There was no trouble walking from the métro even at night.
The apartment was as described and there was a partition between the sofa where I slept & Jonathan's private space, it was comfortable.
Es hat mir super gefallen!
Sehr freundlich
It's good place and nice people!

Jonathan was very friendly and inviting. When he say's it is a shared space in an apartment, that is quite literally what he means. It is a single room studio apartment so please bare that in mind when you are booking because you will be sleeping in the same room as Jonathan. It's not a problem at all, it just might come as a surprise otherwise!

Jonathan’s apartment was very clean, comfortable and a peaceful place to come to after arriving in Paris. He and his partner were very friendly and welcoming, offering me coffee and directing me to a lovely nearby cafe where I had dinner. On top of everything it was very affordable. Merci Jonathan!

If you’re trying to save money but still want to stay somewhere relatively central then this is a great option. The apartment is a 5 minute walk from the metro which takes you to the city centre. Jonathan was a great host and answered any questions I had quickly too. The apartment has everything you need and the “bed” is surprisingly comfortable too!
The place looked bigger in the pic., but it was very clean and secured.!  He is a very Good Host.!! I recommend him.!!!

I stayed 5 nights and it was very comfortable. Jonathan is very kind. He gave me a lot of information and conversation.I had wonderful days thanks to him.
The subway station is nearby and you can go to the Musee d'Orsay(Solferino station) and Concorde without a change.
I highly recommend this room:)
Een goed verblijf gehad, Jonathan is heel vriendelijk en behulpzaam.
Great modern place conveniently located close to cdg airport train line and with metro connections to the rest of the city. Jonathan is an excellent host and I enjoyed my stay in his apartment.

Great host. A good place to stay on a budget - close to the metro (end of the line) 
Basically it’s a couch in the kitchen area (but it works ok), with use of amenities.

The perfect place for spending a night. It's an open plan apartment, with a pull-out-couch with sheets, pillow and blankets. Towels are provided if you need any and the host has some great local tips!
I would definitely stay here again!! It is so easy to get in and out

John its a pretty cool guy. He hosted me with all the atention an information that i needed to meet Paris.

His apartment is very cosy. I felt like at home.

I really recomend.
Es muy bonito pero si es más reducido que en las fotos, la atención fue muy buena y muy buenos anfitriones!
Nice host! Lovely building and great food downstairs!!

O espaço é bem localizado e bem próximo do metrô. Em, no máximo, 40 minutos se chega aos principais pontos turísticos de Paris. O valor cobrado pelo anfitrião é justo e está de acordo. Todavia, caso haja 2 hóspede ou se trate de pessoa que deseje mais privacidade, talvez não se sinta muito à vontade. O Jonathan e o Patrick são muito acolhedores , prestativos e muito muito simpáticos. São pessoas adoráveis e de ótima convivência. Super recomendo o espaço, principalmente para quem está viajando sozinho, como foi o meu caso.

Jonathan is a really nice and friendly guy. He wasn't there himself when i arrived but he had managed everything easily so that i had no problems to get into the apartment. It was clean and warm, i already had gotten all details how things work and when he came back home he give me good suggestions where to go in Paris. So that i won't see only touristc attractions and get good deals for my money. The apartment is not far from the metro and when you arrive at CDG Airport it is really close from the apartment too. Thank you so much <3
Great place for the price!
Jonathon keeps a pretty busy day at the theater for work, but is still super responsive, and provided all I needed. Looking forward to the next visit.
localidade boa, muito solícito, simpático.

Jonathan y Patrick son personas cálidas, atentas y amables: son geniales, en todo sentido! El apartamento (con todos los servicios en perfecto estado) se encuentra a 3 minutos caminando, por tanto tienes conexión con toda París. Volvería sin pensarlo!
Jonathan and his partner were fantastic. Thanks!

El lugar tiene muy buena ubicación, es muy tranquilo la mayoria del tiempo y el acceso al transporte es muy fácil, sin problemas se puede llegar rapidamente a cualquier lugar de Paris, Jonathan es muy atento y cualquier duda te ayuda, muy recomendable.
It was a very nice stay in Johns place. He and his friend were very kindly and gave us many tips where to eat or drink. High recommended.
Perfect for a solo traveler looking for a place to crash! Jonathan was super nice!

Jonathon is super responsive. His place is close to the train, and there is a Franprix right when you come out of the train as well. You have everything you might need, and when I did have questions Jon answered them right away, and also sent some links to a few sites with places that he thought, (and were), of interest.

His place seems to get booked pretty quick and for good reason. It’s accurately listed with the photos, very well priced, and of course comfortable and fun. This is an perfect AirBNB for someone who really likes to travel, maybe has been around the area before, and wants to do something a little different but still only be a train away from the typical sightseeing stuff.

Wir waren sehr gerne bei Jonathan. Werde auf jeden Fall wieder buchen. Meine Hündin und ich waren sehr willkommen. Er hat sich sehr gut gekümmert. Mir viele Tipps gegeben. Ich durfte alles(Netflix ;-)) benutzen. Es gab auch interessante Gespräche.  Der Kaffee ist großartig! Bis bald....Nele und Tanja

Es un espacio compartido, si lo que necesitan es privacidad y descanso definitivamente este no es el lugar. Jon y su pareja son muy amables y buenas personas te ayudan y tienen muchísima comunicación.

Por las jornadas laborales de los anfitriones  despertaban muy temprano y para las personas con sueño ligero no es recomendable puesto que impide descansar.

Duermes en un sofá cama que diario debes poner. 

Dice que tiene desayuno incluido, pero no lo hubo.

El departamento sumamente desordenado.

El metro es cercano de la habitación y  el centro está a 46 minutos.

Jon y su novio muy amables.
perto do metro e facil chegar nos pontos turisticos.

Jonathan is a very helpful person and takes care of any problem you face. He is a considering person and a great Host. 
The accommodation was clean and easy to access. It is situated at 5 min walk from Front Populaire metro station and takes 15-20mins  to reach the city. Great price good location and fantastic hospitality. Would recommend him for sure if u want to Visit.

If you unexpectedly make great friends in an unknown city,what more do you want :) Jonathan & his fiance are one of the loveliest people I have ever met.  Location is great with plenty of restaurants just down the building. Easily accessible transport 2 min to bus & 6 min walking to metro. Jonathan makes you feel at home, takes care of your every need. I was offered a coffee every morning & I even had a chance to try the yummy homemade cake :)

Place is neat& clean with all facilities. I had an excellent joyful stay at his place and definitely recommend to everyone.
Excelente lugar para descansar. Transporte cercanos.

Jonathan was just EXCELLENT. Beginning with the uncomplicated communicated and check-in, a real customer centricity during the stay with excellent recommendations for Paris and finally a very, very intelligent guy :-)

I really liked to stay there and can just give 5 stars.

EXZELLENT!

Jonathan was a great person, and his place was as listed. However, you are like roommates, not flat mates, roommates. And I reminder now why I moved out of the dorms after one semester. The last two nights I stayed there his fiancé also stayed there, so it was more awkward at night then it already was going to be because the futon is four feet from the foot of their bed. The second night I was there they were up cooking until 2am. And every night they would fall asleep with their light on, so I had to get out of bed to turn it off in order to finally sleep. Granted it is a very low priced Airbnb, so it’s either deal with little things like this, or pay $150 a night in the city, which is also stated in the description. On my backpacking trip I appreciate the place to sleep and a shower for so little money, but it was just really awkward.
Jonathan is really warm-hearted and offer nice suggestions, we had a good journey.
Excellent host! Very understanding and easy to communicate with. Highly recommend.
Great place, near subway station, 20 minutes from the center of Paris. Jonathan is a good host!
Great hospitality. Wonderful place
Very nice and cosy place to stay for a short trip. Very close to metro station, easy to access and the host was very welcoming and interesting person.

숙소는 넓고 되게 좋았어요 위치도 교통편과 멀지 않고 가까워서 되게 좋았구요
이줴 한꾹인듈먄 얄야뵬슈닜께 후귀 냠귈꿰효 냠쟈틴규량 걑이 갸서 울이 듈먄 쑤눈쥴 얄얐뉸대 죠냐댠꺄쥐 솃히 갸티 쎠효ㅜ 컾흘은 븨츄입내뎌 지쨔료ㅠ 먈됴 별류엾규 섕갹뵤댜 뷸푠해써효
Espaço legal. Perto do metro. Anfitrião atencioso.
Excelente persona y anfitrión. Jonathan se esforzó por hablarnos en Español y darnos buenas recomendaciones de donde comer, que lugares visitar y como transportarnos.
Nice host! ☺️

we enjoyed Jonathan place ... he is very supportive kind of... as well stay connected to walking metro station.... I highly recommend this (Website hidden by Airbnb) well thank for being a great host...

Very good & attentive host. Helped answer any questions I had. Jonathan had the place ready and set up even for my last minute booking when a previous host cancelled unexpectedly.The location is close to the train and not far from Paris.
Average place to stay, Cool location but cleaning was an issue, I had good 2 nights and 3 days stay, value for money
Muy amable y muy bien ubicado
lugar excelente para personas que van de pasó o quisieran dejar sus maletas y explorar París todo el día. no es un hotel, es un espacio compartido. muy amable

This booking was in the first place intended as a test to see whether airbnb had accepted my ID.
Since the booking was accepted I figured it was ok. Alas, it seems that certain bookings are accepted without ID. Anyway I was still going to stay at the address until I found out that check in was only after 8 pm and the room was shared. My bad, I should have read more careful, but that was the reason I didn’t stay there eventually.
This place would be value for your money, though it is located a bit far from the city, the place is near to metro 12 and about 15 min from the metro line red b

Jonathan is very friendly and the accomadation was as described, which is great for such a cheap price.
this is recomendable for people who would normally book a bed in a dorm/hostel.
very close to the trams

Jonathan is a really friendly guy and knows a ton about Paris. He engages with his guests and helps them navigate the city.

However... he was super late to checking us in. I’m not sure if that’s a regular thing, but it did cause a huge inconvenience. Additionally, if you have back problems like me, his couch may not be the best. It’s a little hard and small.
Basic Comfort, 5 Min. walk to Metro, Restaurant and Shops.

we particularly like how closely jonathan's apartment is situated to the metro, which makes it very convenient for travelling around paris. one thing we appreciated about jonathan is that he was very easygoing and respectful of our privacy. he generally kept to himself but was eager to share with us tips and recommendations on food and places to check out in paris when the opportunity arose.
I’m from Miami and I have such a good time l come back again and thank you Jonathan
Nice guy, good host, and very good tips!
Nice
A nice place for a quick, cheap stay
Todo muy bien, una persona amable y agradable, el departamento es cómodo y el precio muy bueno.

The location is nowhere near the Eiffel tower, it is actually 30 minutes away by train! The place was rather dirty, and couch was uncomfortable. The Pillows were about 2cm thick and definitely needed a wash; we did not even receive pillowcases for them. The fridge smelled awful, there was barely any light in the bathroom, and the washer smelled like mouldy laundry. Not worth the cost whatsoever. Many of the amenities were either lacking in quality or missing completely (no TV, computer, clean towels).

A great value for Paris! Johnathan will give you your personal space if you need it. Ask him for tips on places to explore and eat and he will willingly share it with you. All the best for your TV show and your shorts!
Had a pleasant stay at Jonathan's place. A bit far from the city, but the apartment was impeccably maintained and offered a nice view from the balcony.
Jonathan is really friendly, he even arranged his working schedule to let us check in earlier than normal time. His place is really nice, I love the view from his room so much :<

Jonathan was a great host and he was incredibly understanding regarding my late arrival :) Although we did not cross paths often, each time he was very helpful and kind! 

His place is a quick walk to the metro so it is easy to get around!
