Acceuil très chaleur, j'ai passé un super moment dans un endroit entièrement en parquet, tres propre, situé dans un cartier très calme, le matin je n'avais aucune envie de me lever du lit,  j'ai très bien dormi.
Un très bon séjour, très accueillant et  agréable, merci encore
Belle chambre, juste un peu petite
je recommande vivement

Accueil chaleureux 24/24
Très réactif, très propre, nourriture peu chère. Très proche de la ligne 14 du métro  
Je recommande fortement !
chez Camille vous aurez droit d'accéder au SPA
L'hôtel est très bien situé et surtout magnifique les espaces communs sont de toutes beauté et le personnel super accueillant! Franchement rien à redire c'était un vrai plaisir

Hôtel original au niveau décoration chambres à thème petites certes mais très soignées avec juste ce qu il faut ! Sdb mériterait qq portes manteaux pour les serviettes qui viennent de servir et qq tablettes supplémentaires et un peu plus de rangement pour pouvoir vider la valise !! Petit déjeuner top ! Accueil parfait ! À refaire pour des cours séjours

Y ayant séjourné pour un court séjour, j’ai pu néanmoins profiter de tous les espaces de détentes mis à disposition, l’hotel est décoré avec soin et très moderne pour ma chambre. Bref je recommande vivement !
Parfait pour un déplacement professionnel sur Clichy, je recommande !

Parfait pour un couple et pour une nuit. Le coin spa et hammam est appréciable. Notre hôte était très agréable et à notre disposition. J'ai particulièrement aimé la décoration de la chambre avec les LED qui donnaient une ambiance très cosy. 
Seuls problèmes : la chambre est un peu petite si vous voulez rester plus longtemps qu'un weekend et la douche n'était pas impeccable en terme de propreté.
Je recommande !
Chambre très sympa avec le petit plus du hammam spa rien de tel pour un petit séjour en couple
Très bien. Chambre propre légèrement petite mais très bien pour une nuit
Très bel hôtel et très belle chambre, proche du métro, l'accès au spa est un vrai plus pour un séjour!
Très bon séjour, je reviendrais avec grand plaisir
Accueil agréable par Camille. Chambre moderne et propre. Bonne literie. Le petit plus : terrasse extérieure arborée, sans bruit.
Parfait

Pratique et peu cher, mais les murs ne sont pas du tout isolés! Nous avons logé un samedi soir et de ce fait (j'imagine) l'hôtel était très rempli et beaucoup de bruits même tard dans la nuit, soirée dans les chambres, etc. La chambre en soit est équipée du nécessaire, mais la douche et WC sont très petits! On peut a peine bouger à l'intérieur 
Sinon très propre et déco assez sympa! Réception dispo h24
Super sympas , belle expérience
Cosy, accueillant, peu cher !
Chambre design et très agréable. L'accès au spa est un vrai plus.

Hôtel avec une décoration charmante , agréable pour un court séjour 
Métro à proximité
Une adresse sympathique dans Paris à prix correct, je recommande

Super chambre, très calme et design. Elle est petite mais suffit bien. Nous avons passé une excellente nuit. 

Petit bémol sur le coin spa qui n'était pas prêt à l'heure prévue (jacuzzi froid) et le jacuzzi n'est pas accessible le matin.

Sinon c'était top :)
L’espace détente est un plus indéniable

Tres bon accueil et bon emplacement ! 
Le réceptionniste est charmant
Chambre propre et silencieuse à deux pas du metro Marie de Clichy. Je recommande +++
Chambre un peu petite mais à la décoration dépaysante. L'accès à l'espace détente est appréciable mais celui ci mériterait plus d'attention au niveau de la propreté. Personnel sympathique.
Station vélib et métro à proximité

Logement et lieu très agréables.
Conformes à nos attentes !

Logement situé 2 deux pas de Paris. Calme bien entretenu.  Chambre assez petite mais très joliment équipée et éclairée... la cour est charmante... et l'espace  privatisé..  Globalement un sejour agréable et un bon rapport qualité prix.
Personnel très sympathique
Séjour très très agréable dans un Atypik hôtel! Style, accueil, confort, tout était bien, merci beaucoup.
Personnel au petit soin. Endroit design et pratique avec des prises USB partout et un spa. Rapport qualité prix imbattable sur Paris avec un emplacement idéal à 20 mètres du métro
Très bon rapport qualité prix. Je recommande.
Toujours aussi agréable de séjourner chez Camille.
Excellent accueil, propreté irréprochable!

Propreté, tranquillité, localisation, literie parfaite.
Je recommande vivement cet hôtel! 
Vous ne serez pas déçu.
Très bon séjour
Chambre très agréable et personnel très sympathique. À deux pas du metro je recommande sans hésité!
La chambre semble plus petite que sur la photo mais le séjour s'est bien passé dans son semble ! L'espace spa est super !
Des chambres petites mais fonctionnelles. Une propreté irréprochable et un petit-déjeuner sympa.
Nous avons passé un très bon séjour et nous recommandons donc vivement ce lieu !
Merci pour l'accueil
Plutôt très bien, c'est juste la taille de la chambre qui est un peu petite. Sinon c'est parfait.
Très bonne opportunité Airbnb, situé dans un quartier comportant pas mal de commerces et restaurants. Très bon accueil et chambre confortable.
Agréable !
Il s'agit d'un hôtel très bien équipé et décoré.

Hotel très sympa avec chambre "atypik" comme le nom de l'hôtel l'indique. Certes un peu petite mais rien à redire sur le lieu, l'accueil et la propreté. Nous recommandons très fortement! Bon rapport qualité prix.
Très bon séjour dans un cadre agréable. La chambre Helsinki est épurée et très charmante. Personnel très agréable, accessible, et réactif.
L'hôtel est très bien, même si les chambres sont plus petites qu'elles en ont l'air. La spa et l'accueil au top!
on a adorée
Cher comme hôtel et faudra faire attention à la fuite d'eau au dessous des coulisses de la salle de bain
Merci !
Très bonne accueil, personnel disponible et à l’ecoute. Le jacuzzi était super je vous le recommande fortement

Le staff fut super sympa en particulier Joséphine!
Nous avons pu laisser nos bagages avant l’heure du Check in. Bon emplacement avec la ligne 13 à côté.
Seul bémol chambre un peu petite mais fort confortable.
A refaire!
Chambre Helsinki très agréable

La chambre est beaucoup plus petite qu'elle n'y paraît et l'espace "salle de bain" n'est pas fort pratique (pas de miroir près de l'évier, un grand miroir à côté des toilettes mais pas de prise sauf dans les toilettes mais si elles ne sont pas utilisées. Sinon c'est très confort, l'accueil était hyper sympathique, nous avons mangé en room service, plats simples mais très bons et les prix sont raisonnables. L'espace détente pourrait être mieux tenu mais c'était déjà très bien ! 
Malheureusement, l'hôtel est situé dans une ville peu rassurante et le parking sous terrain n'est pas du tout évident. Excellent rapport qualité/prix.

Excellente adresse pour les visites parisiennes. Proximité du métro 13. Quartier fort calme. Chambres petites mais très bien aménagées. Literie de très bonne qualité. Accueil chaleureux. Possibilité de parking. Petit déjeuner varié et bien servi. Excellent rapport qualité / prix. Imbattable...
Nous avons apprécié le service. La chambre paraît plus grande en photo, mais elle est fonctionnelle.

Bonne adresse globalement même si la zone n est pas Glamour...mais à ce prix on peut pas tout avoir. Architecture tres sympa. Quelques mauvaises note sur la propreté des parties communes mais l hotel est encore en travaux...mais la chambre était bien propre. Endroit donc conseillé...seule note réellement négative concernant l espace de la salle de bain à proscrire aux personnes de forte corpulance.
Top
Excellent

Great place to relax in Paris!! I really loved the courtyard garden, hot tub and the wonderful service! 

And I loved my visit to the impressionist gardens walking distance away!
Excellent place, very close to the Métro (subway) and near Paris center. The staff were very friendly and helpful.  Room were clean and comfortable.
ras
Correct
Everything was great, the staff was lovely and we enjoyed the spa and jacuzzi alone! a great deal!

Hotel very nice! And close to a metro station.
The room was clean and nice, relaxing. But what I liked above all is the access to the small garden, quiet, where you can dine in the fresh air in summer!
I totaly recommend :)
Tres bien
Compact room, but very comfortable
amazing place!
Top

I took a solo trip to Paris for a week and this Airbnb was perfect for my stay. The metro was around the corner which was it very convenient to get around. I stayed in Helsinki due to the size its good for 1 and possibly people 2. I love coming back to a clean room at the end of my day. The amenities were great, even though I didn't use them much it's good to know they were available. Would stay here again!
Four star by me based on the jolly and helpful behavior by the host, artistic design and cleanliness of the space, easy to find also.... but it is a bit cramped,
The staff was really nice but it was kind of smaller than we expected. And very close to metro, which was nice

Atypik is a lovely hotel perfectly located in Clichy. The room was clean and modern *but* very small — which is to be expected in Paris! I was lucky enough to get the jacuzzi all to myself when I used my guest access pass and the staff was helpful & accommodating along the way. The hotel is so close to the metro I was able to get around the city quickly & safely. Great location for solo travelers!
Atypik Hotel was perfect for a quick trip to Paris. Clean rooms, right by the metro. Would stay again.

If you’re wanting a nice clean safe and comfortable place to rest after a day exploring this is perfect and the bed was amazingly comfortable. It’s a little out the way location wise but still very easy to get to all the attractions.

The white floor has aged poorly and make the space feel very unclean. The cleaning product smell doesn’t help. I also think the bathroom sink needs to be fixed. Also, It would make fit a better atmosphere if the lights on the wall were dimmer.

This was one the places we splurged on and we regret it. The place was very small and the walls to the other rooms were very thin. The room itself was very cramped & not the cleanest. The location was not specific. We ended up being 45-60minute drive away from the airport & 25min drive from the tourist parts of paris (eiffel tower & arch). The breakfast & parking were additional costs as well which we were unable to afford. It was fine for one night, but I wouldn’t have stayed there longer.

Mi estancia aunque corta, fue de lo mejor en este hotel. La ubicación es excelente, así como la atención y las habitaciones. Los recepcionistas siempre tenían muy buena disposición para resolver cualquier duda. Definitivamente regresaré con ustedes.
Perfecto para pasar un fin de semana. Trato agradable. Habitación muy limpia
The staff was so accommodating and kind, and my room was so clean and cute (and had AC and WiFi!). would recommend for anyone staying in Paris.
Very beautiful and clean place!!

I enjoyed my stay at Atypik Hotel. I stayed for just one night but it was perfect after a long flight coming into Paris. My room was fresh and beautiful and I found a good restaurant nearby for dinner. The staff were friendly and the breakfast was great.

We had a lovely stay at the hotel! We were upgraded to the Amsterdam room on arrival as it was more spacious which was a nice surprise! Room and common areas were clean, modern and beautiful designed. We made great use of both the spa and garden and couldn’t fault either. Only thing we would comment on is there are no doors on the bathroom/shower curtain so this room was only really suitable for couples.

Great place! The concierge was super helpful. Rida (one of the front desk employees) went above and beyond because he spoke English. It was tiny but cozy. I slept great. Nice and quiet. 
The spa wasn’t in great shape but I didn’t end up working out anyways. The location was right by the train station where I took the train right to the Eiffel Tower. 
Highly recommend.
Very clean, good service, very small.
Great location. Great hosts and clean hotel. Room was a bit smaller than expected but we had a great night's sleep nonetheless. I can recommend this hotel!
Very nice place to stay for my Paris trip! Close to Mateo station and convenient to get some food in 300 meters. The room is not big but tidy and well designed.

Great place. Rooms are small but well furnished so everything you need is available. They also are serviced - so new towels and bed made each morning. 
The location is fantastic!! A few steps from the metro which runs well until very late night. It is on the outerskirts of the main touristy area so you travel everyday for about 20 min but there aren’t a lot of tourists around so the area isn’t crowded. 
We couldn’t find a night time restaurant close by but there’s bakery on the way to the metro for the morning.
清潔でした

Room is clean and housekeeping comes and cleans room every day with fresh towels. Which is nice because towels are quite small. Also no hooks to hang them to dry. 

Room is super small! Shower is no bigger than airplane bathroom. I’m a tiny women and I definitely bruised myself trying to fit. Doors hardly closed.

Heater works but air conditioning does not.

Clichy is right outside of Paris and fortunately main Metro line (13 blue) is just two blocks away. Clichy has little to no great restaurants or night life. 

Front desk was super nice. Check out is normally 12pm but they were kind enough to let me check out a bit later. 

The offered additional charge breakfast is definitely not worth the price. I went around 9:45am to eat and place was packed with not much food left. Luckily I wasn’t charged because of that.
Very nice place, very good location , quiet place and helpful staff.
Great place

Atypik Hotel were great hosts. I initially booked my room for the wrong day by accident and they were able to correct this for me quickly and easily. The rooms are well decorated and make good use of the space. It's a stone's throw from a metro station which makes it easy to get around. All in all, it's the perfect spot for a good value stay in Paris.
Very near to metro, clean and hygenic. Rare to find properties at this cost range.

A stylish and modern hotel very close to the metro, and a 15 minute journey into the centre of Paris. Great value for money and the staff are lovely and welcoming, always happy to help. We did not use it, but there is also free access to the spa and gym which looked great!
Super cute boutique hotel near everything in Paris! I love the themed rooms and they have wonderful breakfast. Amazing value, highly recommend.
Nice!
the room was very stylish and very clean. someone was always present in the lobby and very helpful with any questions or requests. would stay again :)

Overall a pleasurable stay. Nice unique room and a very comfy bed. Receptionist was pleasant and cleanliness was impeccable. Only real downer was the breakfast; not a vast amount of choice, just expected a lot better
Amazing place! Small and intimate but perfect location and great staff.
Great location m! Great service!
The room was as expected! Small, but cute and the wellness center is nice addition. VERY pleaseant staff at check in!
Great stay!
Great place, nice staff, great price/value ratio

the room is much smaller than what you percieve from the picts and the spa and jacuzzi are only avalible for few hours during the day:early morning or later in the afternoon. so not good if you think to go and spend a day enjoying those services.
shower is very small and a big leakage made all the water getting into the room while showering. :-(

Great value, fantastic location right next to a train station. Very stylish but extremely small rooms, even for Paris. The steam room was nice. Overall, I'd stay here again for the convinience and affordability.

Cute hotel 1 minute walk away from Mairie de Clichy Metro stop on the 13 line. Rooms are tiny but enough for a European vacation room for 2 competent travelers. There was an issue with the water in our room the first night and they took care of it immediately and without fuss.
Awesome space. Cozy and comfortable.
Very beautiful room, nice Wellness Room. Highly Recommend.

Thank you, Camille, and ATYPIK Hotel! The stay in Paris was very comfortable for my husband and I. The location of the place was really easy to travel to and from, the Metro was close by and convenient. I love how different each style of room is, even though it was smaller than expected (coming from the USA), the place was very cozy and clean! The front desk staff there was extremely nice and accommodating, not to mention that they spoke English, whew! The front desk also gave great recommendations and directions on how to navigate through the beautiful city of Paris. I would recommend this hotel and wouldn’t mind coming back!
This place is PERFECT if you’re wanting to stay in Paris for a few days and just want a clean stylish place that’s reasonably priced and have the friendliest staff ever. Totally recommend
Lovely rooms with all you need and very clean, warm and helpful staff, very pleasant stay
This hotel room air bnb was fantastic! The bed was very comfy and the room very stylish! Highly recommend staying here :)
Beautiful place, very clean. Very recommended
Great place, easy metro access and friendly staff! Would recommend!

I highly recommend. Absolutely would stay here again. It’s a 2 minute walk to the train station and a 20 minute train ride to the heart of Paris. Hotel was extremely clean, with great breakfast, and nice outdoor lounge area. Staff was excellent and super helpful and let us leave our luggage while we explored the city before check in. Rooms are very clean and well kept with nice amenities and the bed was great as well. 10/10. Couldn’t have been better.
Fijn hotel, goeie locatie
Muy buena la habitación

Great hotel! Small space (as advertised) but it is perfect for two people. The staff was very friendly and spoke English which is very helpful for people like me who did not speak french. We came back around 1am and the hotel front entrance was locked, however they had a 24 hour bell which alerted someone to open the door for us. This took some time but we got in no problem. great place for the price and also fun location.
Despite it being a tiny room the place was very clean and modern. I would only recommend for couples as there is no space and the shower is open viewing to the rest of the room.
모든게 다 만족하지만 위치는 중심과 좀 멀리 떨어져있음

Great place with lovely staffs and beautiful clean room!!
The location very near Metro!
High recommended!
Lovely cute hip hotel. Great for the price! Location only 15/20 mins from central paris. Helpful staff

Winzige aber schöne Zimmer. Badezimmer könnte sauberer sein, Mülleimer wurde nicht geleert. Spa Bereich hat leider nach Schimmel gestunken. Wir haben es lieber nicht benutz, obwohl wir uns darauf gefreut haben. Frühstück war nicht besonders vielfältig, aber ok. Nur leider durch Reparaturen im Hotel ziemlich laut. Aber für den Preis war es insgesamt ok.
Lovely little place with good  location ,near the metro, spa was excellent .would definitely recommend .

The rooms weten't that big, but very tidy, cheap and modernly accomodated. We really enjoyed our stay. The hotel was close to the Subway so we could reach everything in Paris easily. Overall a really nice and affordable hotel.

Well located as very close to a metro station - the room was small but had everything you need for a comfortable stay. Good value for money and friendly staff that speak English which was a great plus for two non French speaking couple. Would definitely stay again
Das Zimmer war sehr schön und sauber. Ein paar Meter von der Unterkunft entfernt war eine Metro Station und so ist auch das Zentrum schnell zu erreichen. Würde jederzeit wiederkommen :-)
Small rooms but very modern and clean, ideal for a weekend trip away
Great place to stay for a couple of days in paris, metro 100 metres away and accessible to most tourist sights in 20-30 mins, rooms small but tastefully decorated and comfortable. Would stay again :)
Wij hebben heerlijk geslapen in dit hotel, ligt heel erg vlakbij een metro station!

Das Hotel ist wunderschön und die Zimmer sind alle in individuellem Stil eingerichtet. Alles ist super modern und sauber. Das Hotel liegt in einer hübschen Straße in einem Vorort von Paris, direkt an einer Metro Station. Für einen Paristrip die perfekte Unterkunft - wir kommen auf jedem Fall wieder!

Not a bad place to stay for a few nights. Close to a metro stop and in a decent neighborhood. Room was nice but small. The bath towels definitely had some age on them and could use replacing. The maid entered twice while I was asleep without knocking. The Wi-Fi on my floor cut out about once every 15 minutes. These are minor issues. Overall the stay was decent.

We were disappointed with the accuracy of the reviews. We can agree that the staff was very friendly though. Unfortunately, the room was much smaller than expected. If you are traveling with your partner, I would recommend a different place. My partner was unable to shave his face because there was no mirror in the bathroom over the sink. The sink was dirty with discoloration. The area was very loud, I would suggest ear plugs. The bed was very clean, but if you plan to place a large suitcase in the room it will be quite difficult. There is barely any walking space. Will not stay here again.

If you read the comments everything people say is pretty accurate: definitely smaller room but the hotel staff is excellent and friendly and the room is clean and cute. Not far at all from metro stop and we enjoyed just grabbing food from grocery stores nearby at night. While it is outside of paris slightly the metro system is great and cheap and we used it tons to get into the heart of paris for sightseeing. The location is great to get out of the tourist part of paris and things are cheaper here but paris is just a metro ride away. Also the jacuzzi and exercise center looked nice although didn't use it. overall great stay and wonderful staff!

Room is small ( but good sized by Paris standards!), very clean and cosy and very quiet. Great shower, tea and coffee facilities, the whole place is very well sound proofed, easily accessible by bus and metro to and from Paris central and we had a very enjoyable stay. Would recommend.

El hotel se encuentra ubicado a 2 minutos de una estación de metro (a pie), y dado que el sistema de metro en París es muy completo nos fue muy bien con los desplazamientos. La atención fue buena, el cuarto limpio, y el desayuno estuvo rico.

The place was basically a hotel. There was a 24hour concierge, a jacuzzi, sauna, daily cleaning service and good wifi. However, the place was small and although close to a metro stop, far from the center of Paris. Overall a good place to stay and would come again.

Wir genossen Camilles Unterkunft für drei Tage, während unseres Parisaufenthalts. Es ist ein kleines Zimmer - kein Luxus, aber außergewöhnlich eingerichtet, ein bequemes Bett und sauber. Insgesamt ist es ruhig im Hotel, lediglich am Morgen hört man etwas Staßenlärm, wenn man bei offenem Fenster geschlafen hat.  Das Frühstücksbuffet war prima und immer war jemand da, der uns freundlich beraten konnte. Wir sind mit dem Auto angereist, was auch mit dem Navi gut möglich war. Lediglich ein kleines Stück führt am Schluss durch das Stadviertel von Clichy, was aber recht stressfrei zu bewältigen war. Am Hotel angekommen, konnten wir das Auto in der Tiefgarage unterstellen. Die Metrostation ist gleich um die Ecke, von dort aus kann man Paris super erkunden. Ein toller Preis für diese Unterkunft! Wir empfehlen es gerne weiter!
We stayed one day, everything was perfect. The room is small but very cozy. I reallly liked the concept too. It's a great place to stay if you want to go to a concert at the stade de France.

Great place to stay outside of the city. There is a bike rental place just outside of the hotel which made travel easy. There were a lot of younger people staying in the hotel so there was some noise, which didn't bother me. Parking was in a locked garage. Highly recommend for staying in Paris!
The hotel staff was very caring and made sure my stay was pleasing and that I was provided with whatever I needed

Very close to train station .. good breakfast .. didnt see the host .. more like a hotel .. small but comfy room . No french restaurants open on a sunday night . Pre book your taxi to the Airport.. dont leave it till the morning of your departure
Nice hotel, with optional parking space. Excelent for a short stay in Paris.
It's out of Paris, but its okay. The staff was very friendly and the place very chic.

The hotel was very chic, staff very friendly and it was very close to the Metro. The room was compact and cigarette smoke from the next room filtered through to my room which wasn't ideal but... I'd definitely stay here again. Great value for money!!!
Very small room but besides that my stay was great. I would recommend this place to anyone who doesn't mind the small space. Great for a two or three night trip.

Very nice hotel, great location just minutes from the tube station. Room is small but very modern, comfortable bed. Hosts are very lovely. We also bought breakfast, which had a selection of different food and wasn't too pricey. In overal, we had a very nice stay and would definitely recommend this hotel.
Great hotel and room! Small but no more space is needed when you are in Paris! Very close to metro,  so great location! Would go again for sure
Alles goed. Vriendelijke mensen. Netjes. Wel kleine kamers, maar wel trendy. Airco, goede douche en heerlijk bed.
Amazing location, clean and classy hotel. I enjoyed everything about the stay. I'll definitely be back
Great place! Very clean. Perfect location. We spent 2 nights, and it was really nice

Very nice and cozy room, made with taste and great attention to details (which we truly appreciated). 
Proximity to metro and underground parking for the car (additional fee applies). 
Staff very helpful and friendly :)

The best place to stay while visit Paris, close to the metro and other transportation, best bakery just around the corner, supermarket around the corner, hotel staff super kind and very helpful, loved the hotel lobby, nice place to read and very tranquil. Thanks for all of your help! We had a great time.
Clean and neat.
Leuk hotelletje in Clichy. Kamer is wel erg klein maar alles wat je nodig hebt is er. Dichtbij de metro in een rustige straat. Vriendelijk personeel!
Wonderful place!
Nuestra estadía fue muy buena...El lugar queda cerca de la estación del metro. París es hermoso y el lugar muy acogedor... Siempre limpio
A nice modern hotel about 25 minutes from the center of Paris by Metro. It was a great opportunity for us to see different parts of the city outside of Paris.
Great services and price
Everything was great, as I expected to be.
Lovely hotel in a convenient location. Great design and very helpful staff. Very recommendable.
Het is een aangenaam hotel, modern ingericht. Een echte aanrader! 1 min stappen van de metro, waar je op 10 min rijden in het centrum bent.

This is the best in everything 
Location, good people, Very very clean
pas de commentaire
Très bonne accueil, le séjour c’est très bien passer et pour finir l’hôte répondait très rapidement à toutes questions ou autre !
Un pur bonheur, que ce soit l’accueil, la propreté, la réactivité de Brahim ou l’appart en lui même... mention spéciale pour le balcon qui est somptueux. Hâte d’y repasser un moment!!

Brahim est super réactif et arrangeant 
Logement propre, spacieux avec une belle vue 
Je recommande
Appartement vraiment TOP avec le spacieux balcon qui est une vrai valeur ajoutée du logement. Commerce et métro à proximité. Je recommande vivement.

J’ai passé un séjour agréable.
Vue sur la Tour Effel.
Conforme aux attentes.
Je vous le recommande vraiment.
Superbe, vue époustouflante. Parfait pour deux personnes. Proche des commerces, métros etc..Je recommande fortement !
C’était juste magnifique Je le recommande

Superbe abnb. Personne accueillante et Disponible. 
A recommander chaleureusement.
Très bien accueilli lieu convivial

Super communication et accueil. La chambre est grande et très bien décorée. Les volets sont un vrai plus pour dormir tranquille tout comme le couvre feu ;)
Logement hyper bien situé pour prendre son train sans se lever tôt. Plein de touches d attention. Je recommande sans hésitation.

The room and the whole place is gorgeous! Marie is also a very friendly and helpful host, gave us many recommendations as well. Location is good overall, close to metro although not in the most quiet and safest neighborhood. Bus still I’d be very happy to stay at her place again in the future!

J’ai passé un très bon week-end ! 
L’hôtel est beau et sent très bon, on se sent tout de suite à l’aise. 
La chambres est super design et propre, il y a vraiment tout ce qu’il faut. Léger bémol sur la localisation mais il reste accessible avec plusieurs commerces à proximité. 
Merci :)
Je recommande !
Séjour parfait  !
Très bel accueil je recommande !
Superbe déco des l’entrée dans l’hôtel, bien accueilli, je recommande
Très bel endroit.
Très bon séjour

Super séjour !

Nous avons passé une très mauvaise nuit dans cet hôtel. La chambre n’était pas DU TOUT insonorisée, si bien qu’on a entendu nos voisins de chambre TOUTE LA NUIT sans discontinuer (télé, musique, disputes, claquages de portes). Même quand nos voisins parlaient (très rarement) à un niveau sonore normal on les entendait parfaitement. Le tapage a duré jusqu’à 5h du matin bien que nous leur aillons demandé de faire moins de bruit, et la réception est restée injoignable. Nous avons même senti jusque dans notre chambre des odeurs de cigarette et de chicha en pleine nuit. L’hôtel semble surtout fréquenté par un public très jeune et s’apparente plus à une auberge de jeunesse. Bref, je ne recommande pas et ne réserverai plus d’hôtel sur Airbnb car c’est la première fois que j’ai une telle déconvenue sur le site alors que mes séjours chez des hôtes se passent toujours très bien.

Hotel Bridget while somewhat not very central is located in a vibrant part of Paris. The reception is very welcoming. The room are well decorated, small but with very comfortable bed and very clean. The lighting design is very nice, giving a sense of being welcome in the room. The shower is spacious and the bathroom is clean. And despite being located on a slightly busy street, the sound insulation is very good. I would definitely recommend!

En ce qui concerne le logement, l'appartement est très lumineux et correspond aux attentes et à la description. L'emplacement est idéal pour se balader dans Paris, très proche de la gare de l'Est. Benjamin est très sympathique et accueillant, ce qui contribue à l'impression d'être chez soi.
Bel appartement et très bon accueil, très bon rapport qualité prix.
super

Located right next to a metro and the Gare de l’Est, it’s perfectly situated for those wanting to explore the city. During the brisk 30 minute downhill walk to the main sights of Paris, such as the Notre Dam, you pass through an abundance of restaurants and bars and bustling side streets only matched by Benjamin’s warm, catering, and agreeable hospitality. Offering advice and guidance on exploring the city, Ben perfectly combines a respect for privacy with an easygoing and inclusive attitude to his communal areas where we talked and drank. Would recommend to anyone wanting a full Parisian experience, and will be staying there again I’m sure! Thanks Ben, J and E

Very cute room! Amazing view and very nice flat, we really enjoyed our stay here. Benjamin was always friendly and offered help if we needed it. The only thing we missed was soap in the bathroom/ kitchen to wash our hands. :)

Helaas hebben we helemaal geen gebruik kunnen maken van de woning wegens het plotseling afkondigen van Corona code rood voor Parijs. Jammer dat de gastheer Benjamin  helemaal niet bereid was een handreiking naar ons te doen, ons niets heeft terug betaald en ons ook niet op de een of andere manier tegemoet kwam. Geen fijn gevoel.

Une excellente semaine passée chez Christine qui m’a accueilli comme je ne l’aurai jamais imaginé. Rapidement mise à l’aise, le séjour était parfait. Literie comme à l’hôtel (vrai bonheur), petit déjeuner offert... une hospitalité unique qui m’a donné envie de revenir rapidement lors de mes déplacement pro. L’appartement est très bien situé et le rapport qualité prix défie toute concurrence ! Encore merci à vous pour votre bienveillance et sympathie.

Christine est très attentionnée et aime les rencontres. La chambre et l’appartement sont très propres, proches de Paris, confortables et bien situé. Tout était au top.
 Une précision cependant la rue est assez passante et un peu bruyante malgré un bon isolement. Ce n’est pas très bruyant et ça ne m’a pas gênée mais quelqu’un qui aurait le sommeil très léger pourrait l’être.

Le logement est au rdc, peu lumineux, mais intérieurement très astucieusement aménagé et agréable à l'oeil (qu'il fait voyager).

Cependant, deux hics : l'humidité de la salle de bain et le peu d'espace pour utiliser le sanibrouilleur rend cet espace des sanitaires désagréable ; le bruit, la nuit, du chauffe-eau, installé à 1,5m de lit, qui se relance et se déclenche régulièrement et qui m'a fait (j'ai le sommeil léger) passer une nuit infernale.

Ce lieu reste une bonne alternative aux hôtels, pour qui veut un lieu privatif à moindre coût. A noter la présence d'un seul micro-ondes pour cuisiner - que j'ai vu pour ma part trop tard.

Mais compensé par une résidence très calme durant mon séjour.

petit logement mais bien agencé

Points positifs :
- Le quartier ! Très safe, calme, j'ai pu m'y ballader à n'importe quelle heure sans soucis et sans stress. Il est par ailleurs très agréable, avec de bonnes adresses aux alentours (par exemple le resto "Table Métis" rue des Boulets; la Coulée Verte Dumont pour se ballader; etc), et des commerçants et voisins souriants et sympas. Le logement est aussi très bien situé, on peut se rendre facilement partout en bus ou métro.
- Julien est vraiment d'une efficacité au top ! Très réactif et très arrangeant, tout était simple ! Super communication !

Points négatifs :
- On y capte très mal la 3G/4G!! Puisqu'il n'y a pas de wifi (c'est précisé dans l'annonce), c'est assez contraignant...
- La propreté n'est clairement pas au top. Quelques exemples : un problème d'humidité qui provoque des moisissures, vaisselle empoussiérée, bouilloire complètement entartrée, les coins poussiéreux, etc. Personnellement ça ne m'a pas empêchée de passer un super séjour, mais tout dépend de la sensibilité de chacun ! Cependant les frais de ménage me semblent donc tout de même excessifs.

Bref, un logement très bien pour de courts séjours pratiques et sans prises de tête!
Logement pratique pour une nuit.

Julien est très réactif et agréable. 
La chambre est conforme par rapport à sa taille et la localisation. 
Toutefois on frise l'insalubrité avec des moisissures dans tout l'appartement notamment sur tout le mur à côté du lit. Moisissures cachées derrière un panneau de bois. Matelas à changer. Frais de ménage excessif par rapport à la surface et à la propreté de la chambre. A fuir
C'est la première fois que je laisse un commentaire aussi négatif et je ne comprends pas les commentaires des autres personnes qui m'ont fait réserver la chambre.

I had a nice 3 nights stay at Julien's appartment. It was exactly as described, he even wrote me when I requested the booking, to emphasis on the fact the appartment is very small, and that I still cancel if I want. Communication went perfectly with him. The appartment is very well situated ( metro station, Gare de Lyon rail way station, bus stations, not far from place de La Nation and Republique) quiet a.number of restaurants and bistro all arround) I recommend the place but only for short stays (not more than 2 or 3 nights) and not during hot seasons, cause except a small fan there is no air conditioning and I think that it should be hell in that room when it's more than 28°. The appartment got a small kitchenette with minimum equipments. Not really done for cooking, but ok for preparing a breakfast or a salad/sandwiche (that what I did) All in all, good value for the cost.

The flat is small, but you know it, and Julien has also written to me to advise me. So this is ok
The problem is that he told that there is a Kitchen... ok there are a silk and ONE electric cooker (that can barely warm up the water)... I don't think it's a kitchen properly. He also written to me "I DON'T WANT YOU TO COOK THERE, IS NOT REALLY SAFE..."
last but not least, take care to one electrical socket that is not fixed to the wall

Julien's place is Paris size, but has everything needed. Communication and check-in went super smooth. I was a bit surprised that there is no WiFi, but I guess I should have better read the description. Happy to visit again some time in the future.

Christele’s place is très cozy and very convenient location from the airport. I would totally recommend for anyone looking for a relaxing place to stay.

Christele's wooden house is small but beautiful and with all the amenities you would need or see in a modern-day small house. The place was very clean with fresh towels, sheets, and other perks like milk, water, cornflakes, etc. that are offered in the house free of cost. I and my girlfriend spent a great day there. The locality is very nice and coffee shops and restaurants are just nearby. 
Christele is a very caring person and makes sure to communicate with the guests at all times or in case if there is an issue, she is just next door or a call away. 
We'll gladly consider this place for our next stay in Paris. Thank you so much.
We had a great stay at the chalet. The check-in was easy, the place super clean and cozy. The breakfast in the morning was our lifesaver before our early flight back home. Thank you!

Christele’s place was perfect for us! It was gorgeous, offered easy access to Paris and CDG, and was right next to an amazing bakery. Christele was an excellent hostess and even offered to help us in light of the US’s travel ban. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone looking to explore Paris.
Me fascino sin duda volveré tuve un vuelo super pesado la flexibilidad de la dueña y la estancia reconfortante vaya que mejoraron todo tiene todo lo necesario cada detalle :)

allerdings 1 h um von Paris zur Unterkunft zu kommen.

Check-in und Check-out war super einfach und ganz ohne Probleme. Danke Christèle!

Von der Unterkunft 10-15 min zu Fuß bis zur Bahnhaltestelle. Mit dem Taxi ca 7-8€ von der Bahnhaltestelle. Direkt vor der Tür der Unterkunft gibt es einen tollen kleinen Einkaufsladen (Trinken, Snacks, Lebensmittel zum Kochen, Gemüse/Obst) und eine Bäckerei. Auch eine Apotheke. 

Wir haben uns zu keiner Zeit unsicher gefühlt. Auch nicht mitten in der Nacht, als wir sonntags um 1 Uhr nach Hause kamen.

Auf jeden Fall sehr zu empfehlen.
Perfect! A squeaky-clean lovely little cabin, peaceful and quiet but still very close to Paris. Great communication, easy check in and out, would love to stay here again!
Clean and cosy!
Lovely place, had everything we needed! The bed sloped towards the middle a bit from both sides, but other than that a super nice place and great experience.
Wonderful stay at Christèles chalet, nice amenities and close to the city

It's my second time at Christele's studio. She received me very kindly, helped me with some places and especially served me a delicious meal, juice and water as a welcome. He was very attentive at all times. Finally, she gave me a small present. The studio always impeccable. After a walk you can get to the train to be in Paris. I definitely recommend being in this place. Merci Christele!
Great place. Wonderful host. Good little cottage
The studio chalet felt like home. It was convenient, private, warm with a comfy bed. Christele was great in checking that i was ok and had everything i needed. Thank you.
Great spot Christele has. Fast communication and easy check-in. Host very accommodating. Extra’s also added such as tea, coffee, cake. The room is clean and comfortable with everything you need.
Really cute place and great hospitality. They really thought of everything

The Christele's  house is an oasis near Paris. Everything is ideal.  An incredible garden at the entrance for relaxing time.  And good and easy way to get to Paris. I'll be again there in a few weeks. Merci beaucoup Christele!

Once you become accustomed to finding your way around the neighborhood, this location is very good for catching the RER B line towards central Paris and experiencing ordinary Parisian shopping. Christele was very accommodating and the cottage is private and quiet...perfect for a couple or single who wishes to experience an ordinary French residential community.

This was a very comfortable and clean place to stay with many amenities and thoughtful touches. We were only there for one night before an early morning flight but Christele greeted us personally and was very welcoming. Communication and responses were very prompt.

Christele is the best host I never met and her apartment was beautiful. Christele provided detailed instruction before we arrived which is super helpful when we checked in late night. The apartment was stylish and full of all necessaries items for our stays. We were really satisfied with our stay here and high-recommended you to book here.
Christele 's place is lovely. She is a very helpful host and goes out of her way to assist.
Apartment is great, about a 10-15 min walk from RER station

Christele’s place was sparkling clean, adorable, and really comfortable. Christele was great with communication and met us at the gate when we arrived. We only stayed for one night before heading back home, but we definitely would’ve stayed longer if we had had more time.
Place is great and host was super helpful! Check-in was super easy and home is convenient to bus stop and RER B.

The cottage matched the Airbnb description and we enjoyed our 1 night stay.  The cottage was not big but it had everything a traveler would require including extra touches like coffee, milk and bottled water.  Christele kindly offered to arrange an Uber in the morning to take us to the airport.  I recommend staying here.
This place is super cozy, close to the airport and the host was amazing to us.

Christéle’s place is great! A cozy little cottage with everything you need set in a cute town outside of Paris. There was even homemade jam in the fridge! Wish we could have stayed longer. Highly recommend!
A cute DIY space with all the necessary appointments for a short stay. Host gave helpful information. Parking was a problematic.

Great little place to stay, we booked the day before for a one night trip so very last minute. Our train was delayed by 9-10 hours but Christele was extremely accommodating especially at times when we didn’t even know if we would make it. Communication with Christele was really excellent and the place is perfect for a short stay. We wish we could have stayed longer!

Very friendly and hospitable hosts, made us feel welcome over coffee at their home upon arrival, and gave travel and sights recommendations for Paris. The cottage is self contained, clean and quiet, the bed warm and very comfortable for my wife and I after a long day sightseeing. Christelle responded very promply to any queries beforehand and during our stay. The 15min walk from the station might be long for pulling suitcases so consider a short local cab ride. Our Uber straight to the airport on departure was just 10mins and ended up cheaper than two train tickets to CDG Airport.
Highly recommended.
Christele's place is a gem!  We highly recommend it!
Excelente espaço, muito conforto, com pequeno almoço básico, cereais, chá etc. incluído. Proprietários amigáveis. obrigado

Lovely stay in a sweet space. The village is just the perfect distance from the high intensity of Paris with amazing French charm. I felt cozy and safe and able to unwind after a long Europe trip. Christele was wonderful and even made an espresso for me in the morning.

Christele’s cottage is the perfect place to stay if you are visiting Paris, but don’t want to be right in the city. The cottage is cozy, clean and quiet with everything you need. Walking distance to the town and train station made it easy to get around without a car. We stayed one night as a pit stop between flying to Rome as a way to get rest and get over jet lag. The local town was perfect for dinner and walking. Christele and her husband are very kind and  generous and have excellent communication! We loved it!
Christele‘s place is so cute and full of charm. Her hospitality was so generous - we will stay here again if ever we visit again.
The host is amazing! The place is perfect.
Christele's place was so beautiful. She has a very good garden. The place has a well equipped kitchen. But little difficult to reach with public transportation.

Super coole Unterkunft in einem
Vorort von Paris. Christele ist sehr aufgeschlossen und hat uns bei jeglicher Frage geholfen. Danke - wir würden wieder kommen
Lovely chalet in a beautiful garden!

Very quiet "in laws quarter" style house. The shower was bigger than most European showers and had an actual shower head that is nice for Americans, like us. Christele recommended a French restaurant called Auberge Des Saints Péres, a must if you stay here!!! More than worth the price. 10 min walk. We would definitely stay here again. Thanks Christele!!!
Beautiful garden studio in a peaceful location. I loved my stay
Lovely stay! Christele was very helpful and went out of her way to make sure we had a great experience!
Christele is so nice and accommodating! She stayed up late for us when our travel plans fell through. She also had some breakfast snacks available in the morning.
Christele was very hospitable making sure we were happy with the place and gave us tips about some of our activities. We loved our stay here it was very cozy.
Christèle’s place was exactly what I needed - a quiet retreat, not far from Paris. The space was private, and it had everything that I was looking for. Thank you again for a great stay! Joshua
Christèle and her husband are very nice and helpful. The place is cozy, clean and offers everything you need.

Christèle’s chalet is exactly what we were looking for on our trip to Paris. My wife and I spent a lovely 5 days there, and were incredibly pleased with the place. The chalet was very clean and comfortable and included everything we needed for our stay. Christèle was really accommodating and friendly—she speaks good English as well which was very helpful for us. Would love to stay here again if we’re ever coming through!

If you're thinking of booking this place, do it! Christele is the best host I've had.  She is kind, thoughtful, and speaks great English! She is just the greatest. Provided laundry, and washed clothes :-) The amenities is superb. The studio is very peaceful. Getting to and from Paris and CDG airport is so easy. This space is highly recommended.
Great location to explore Paris. Easy parking, good amenities. Would recommend.
Pleasant entertainment.  I recommend.

Exceptional host. Very generous in all respects. Great little cottage in handy location. Great restaurants close by (walking). On main trainline from CDG airport to city center. We stayed in 5 Airbnb places all over France and Christele was the best hostess. A Super host indeed.
Great place, Christele is helpful!
I can only recommend this very cosy place.
If you are flying into CDG this is a great place to stay for a few days in the city . Even if you want the Paris tour with also so peace and quiet , this is the place for you ! Highly recommend
Nice and cosy, close to the airport, train station and eating houses. All you need!

This was a wonderful place to stay in a nice quiet and pretty neighborhood.  Easy access to Paris (10 minute walk from RER B station).  There is a great boulangerie on the corner of the street which you shouldn't miss.  It's also close to a picturesque canal for running/walking.  I'll definitely try to stay here again next time I'm in Paris.
Nice Place to stay outside the Buzz of paris though eazily accessible via RER. Christele is a nice host and she responds quite well for any queries we have.
Christele's place is super. I recommend it for anyone visiting Maison Objet or Paris in general. The train station is very close and the house cost and clean.
A wonderful host and a great shack

Christele is the kindest person. Our trip didn't work out as we planned and she was very flexible and willing to help us out. We are so grateful to her and highly recommend her to everyone. Thank you Christele!
Para recomendar si qiees algo muy tranquilo cerca de CDG aeropuerto de Paris.
very cozy room. private access.
Amazing and lovely
As described, super close and convenient to CDG airport. Had a good stay!
A perfect place to stay if you need to be close to the airport and Christele could not have been nicer!

Great private place with plentiful free street parking on a dead-end road.

Small grocery store and restaurant near by. About a 15 minute walk from the metro station.

Kitchenette and breakfast amenities made the stay even better. The espresso machine was very nice! Highly recommend!

La casetta è veramente graziosa. Christele è stata molto gentile , è anche venuta a prenderci in fiera dove eravamo per lavoro. nella casetta c'e tutto cio che serve per soggiornare in totale relax., è arredata con gusto e non manca nulla! Christele è molto gentile e ospitale , ci ha anche offerto oltre alla colazione , la marmellata fatta in casa. Ritorneremo sicuramente.
Christele was a wonderful and thoughtful host. Good communication. Good location to park a car and walk to the train station into Paris.
You can expect everything your heart desires I promise you

Lovely and quiet stay just outside of Paris! Very close to the CDG airport as well. We arrived on a holiday where most restaurants were closed, and Christele was very helpful and ordered delivery for us.
Great spot away from the hustle & bustle of downtown Paris but within short walk to RER so you can be in town within 1/2 hr. Perfect, quiet retreat and Cristele is the perfect host.
Very clean and cozy. It was a comfortable stay in Christele's place :)

Christele was a great host and clearly prepared a house for our stay. Home is well equipped with all you need for a shorter and longer stay. We traveled by car so we don’t know how much time it takes to travel to Paris by public transport, but if you need a cozy place to stay near Paris is perfect.

Staying at Christele's home was the perfect choice! She is a very kind and humble host. Christele went out of her way to ensure that our stay was as comfortable as possible. I cannot recommend staying here enough. Stop looking at other AirBnB choices, and book Christele's now! :-)

Best Airbnb ever!! Christele was an amazing host and was gracious. The room was wonderful. It had beautiful old wooden floors, quaint windows with plenty of light and a even featured a kitchen and nicely furnished bathroom. The bed was very comfortable and warm. The room was very clean. The area felt very quiet and safe. Christele treated us with great kindness and was a very gracious host. We couldnt have asked for more. To date this has been my best Airbnb experience overall.

Christele y su marido fueron muy amables y serviciales,  nos cuidaron como si fueramos sus hijos, se esforzaron en comunicarse en todo momento aún con las diferencias del idioma. El estudio es 5 estrellas: toda la cocina a estrenar, completa, baño hermoso con todos los implementos, total independencia y tranquilidad.
El acceso a Paris es facil y rápido. Si van con auto es ideal porque el aparcamiento sobre esa calle es gratuito y seguro las 24 hs.
Absolutamente recomendable!

Stéphane est vraiment un hôte super sympa il y a tout ce qu'il faut chez lui on ne manque vraiment de rien, j'ai vraiment passé un agréable moment et j'y retournerai sans aucune hésitation, il est dans mon top 3

Un grand merci Stéphane pour cet accueil chaleureux, d’être venu me chercher en plein confinement, pour cette succulente paella et votre solidarité en cette période de psychose collective. J’ai beaucoup apprécié tous les efforts,  surtout qu’en étant évacuée du Niger et en arrivant à 23.00 à Roissy dans un pays en plein pic du COVID-19 et à l’arrêt, je ne savais pas comment faire! Je profite du joli parc avant de me plonger dans les transports en commun !

Emplacement au top (non loin de la gare RER B Villepinte, le reste est faisable à pied en 15min). Petits détails appréciables dans la chambre (café, livres, espaces de rangement). Stéphane propose un dîner pour 9eur, encore un plus. Par contre le gros point noir, il y avait du sable et des cheveux dans mes draps.. Ils n’étaient à l’évidence pas changés. Etait-ce un oubli? C’est pourtant le plus crucial, l’hygiène et la propreté doivent être sans faille, surtout en cette période d’attention particulière liée à la circulation du covid19. Je pense que suite à ce commentaire, Stéphane sera désormais plus consciencieux.
Chambre sympa et calme
Chambre correcte pour une personne de passage dans le secteur. Je valide

Hôte agréable, serviable et l'endroit est propre et confortable. Parfait pour une escale près de l'aéroport. Je conseille.

Stéphane est un hôte très accueillant, qui se prend bien soin des gens qu'il héberge chez lui!  Sa maison est très jolie et bien placé près de l'aéroport CDG et du RER B, qu'on rejoint en traversant un beau parc. La chambre était bien aménagée, propre et silencieuse, et le lit confortable.
Stéphane a été très clair et précis dans toutes ses communications, et très disponible – il m'a donné toutes les indications nécessaires pour regagner ma chamber en autonomie comme j'arrivais assez tard le soir. Absolument conseillé!

Stéphane was a very pleasant host. I stayed here for the night to catch the flight next morning.

Stéphane’s place was brilliant, great value for money and great location close to the airport. I feel so lucky to have found this super host thank you for helping me at the airport . Stephane is kind and he didn’t leave until I resolve my problem. Merci :D
Pretty nice service and the hosts take all the cares with you, they reply pretty soon to your needs.
Fantastic host, peaceful location. Highly recommended.

A great place to stay, Stephane was very responsive in all communications prior to arrival and made me feel very welcome into his home. Very convenient to get to CDG, it was the perfect place to stay prior to flying out.

Stephane is an amazing superhot.  Flexible for check-in, ready to hel you to improve your journey,  you can have a quick transfer to the airport (you might listen some reallly good music in his car), and he is also ready to offer youhis bike to help you reaching a market store before closing hour.
Lovely family home, a great place to feel home from home. Stephane is the best!
Very clean and cosy place to stay before or after a long journey with takeoff / landing at CDG Paris Airport. He can drive and catch you back with private car.
The host is very helpful, It was clean and a nice house, too close to the airport CDG, but should have been more secure and safe.
In transit at CDG ? Stephane's place is your 'go to' option. Comfortable accommodation with a very hospitable host.
pretty beautiful place, but the transport to airport is not very convinent. It is recommended to take the landlord's car.

Stéphane's place is near the airport and a park and is also relatively easy to arrive by train. The place is comfortable, but could have some other amenities like blackout in the room's window. Stéphane is also very atencious.
It's a good option if you need to stay somewhere near the airport and cannot pay for a hotel. The room was quite good and the bed comfortable.
没有看到房东,但是从细节上能看出它是很贴心的人,比如他会在桌子上摆上糖果,速溶咖啡和茶,在床头边放好纸抽｡缺点的话可能是我的门好像锁不上,夜晚灯光不强

When I go back to Paris again, I would definitely consider staying at his house again. Merci Stéphane :)
Convenient location, quiet place, easy check-in and check-out, very handy for a night in transit to/from CDG airport.
Stephane was very easy to communicate with, picked me up and dropped me off at the airport. Even for an early morning flight.
There is quick response and excellent consideration, and great hospitality... Also please eat Stéphane's cuisine.
Close to the airport, and comfy room. Just what I needed after a long flight.
I really recomend, Stéphane is really helpfulness and he cooks very well, is a great option pay to eat in her house

Great place if you need to stay near the airport. There’s not much to do nearby, nor is it close to a train station, but it serves a great purpose for someone who needs access to the airport. 

Also his skills as a chef are amazing; dinner was great (with ingredients from his garden), as was the conversation. 

Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a nice short term stay by the airport.
Very nice place near the CDG. Takes around 15-20 euros to the airport by Uber. Around 30mins journey without traffic

I was very pleased with Stéphane. He is, as the rest of reviewers said, a very friendly helpful man. The communication was very good, the location near airport and easy to access.

Great for a night going to or from the airport. Easy to find and well priced for what it is - nothing spectacular but perfect for the price . The host is very friendly and will help you with everything even if he is not there.

Great place! Highly recommend.
The location is very convenient to the airport. The room is unlocked. I didn’t met Stéphane. But he gave me all the information. Reply is very fast.

I was at Stephane's for one night, and he was away at the time so we did not get to meet. But he was very patient with my questions and answered his messages immediately. 

After a long flight, it was perfect to have a clean and cozy room to come to. I didn't have time to make use of the kitchen but what I saw was well equipped. The toilet and shower were both impeccably clean and Stephane had even left the window open so it would not be too stuffy in the room when I arrived!

The place was also easy to get to from CDG - I took the bus rather than the train, and it stopped about 5-10 minutes from the house. Would definitely stay here again!
Great place.
Amazing place! Stephane has a very cute home, the train was very easy to get to the center of Paris, and his car service to and from the airport was very nice! Highly recommend :D

Hôte très respectueux, soucieux du confort de ses hôtes, et très intéressant ! Accueil irréprochable et vue imprenable sur Paris en bonus pour un prix raisonnable, rien a redire !

Excellent stay ))

Lyon goes out of his way to make you feel at home and comfortable, I would really recommend staying with them, you won't be disappointed.

Rapport qualité/prix excellent pour qui cherche simplement un lieu propre, chaud et confortable pour passer une nuit sur Paris. Accueil très agréable et courtois. Emplacement idéal (10min station métro ligne 4). François a été très réactif et très précis dans ses informations. Il a aussi gentiment accepté une modification de l'horaire d'arrivée (en lui ayant demandé  avant de réserver si une modification était possible).
Appartement bien situé, propre et super accueil de François.
Très bon séjour

Bonjour. J’ai eu quelques minutes de retard lors du check in et François m’a tout simplement indiqué qu’il n’acceptait aucun retard. Donc j’ai dû payer un hôtel pour le soir même puisqu’il ne m’a pas accepté chez lui. C’est désastreux. Il a empoché l’argent sans même m’envoyer un message d’excuse ou d’explication. C’est clairement honteux et j’ai évidemment   entamé  la procédure pour qu’une sanction soit appliquée.  Je ne comprends pas comment peut-on être aussi démuni d’esprit pour laisser un hôte dans la rue, le soir, pour quelques minutes de retard alors que je lui avais envoyé un message pour indiquer que j'étais en chemin et que j’avais eu des problèmes de transport. 
Par ailleurs, je trouve le prix excessif pour le service proposé (à savoir un canapé et c’est tout, même pas de clé pour une onde d’indépendance). Je n’ai rien contre François particulièrement, mais il a des horaires qui ne conviennent pas pour tout le monde et surtout pour Paris, puisqu’il y a toujours des problèmes de transport. Je pense que François devrait être plus flexible sur les horaires. 

Donc si vous souhaitez être à l’aise sur les horaires et pas paniquer à l’arrivée, je conseil de ne pas prendre ce canapé. 

De plus, le logement n’est pas du tout proche de Paris et pas assez bien desservie donc les retards, même sans problème de transport, peuvent arriver et François devrait les considérer ABSOLUMENT. 

Bien évidemment je ne le recommande pas.

François place was perfect! Let me start off by mentioning that he is everything you could want in a host, especially in a foreign country. He speaks English very well, gave me a lot of helpful tips, and knows his hometown of Paris very well. Everything was clean, privacy was respected, very safe neighborhood, and close to all of the major trains/busses. It was pretty reasonable to get to the main part of Paris (Eiffel Tower, water chanel etc.) from his place via train. It ended up costing me €1.90 each way. If you're going to be staying over 3 days and plan on doing a lot of local traveling, I would suggest looking into a 2,3, or 5 day transportation pass. They can be purchased from any train station booth. All kinds of food and grocery stores are within walking distance of his place too, which was great for me as I relied solely on public transportation. 

Thanks for everything, François! Keep up the great work!

Overall great time with Francois!

Un endroit très propre. Chambre qui donne sur une cours intérieure. Bon rapport qualité prix. Ligne de métro pas très loin. Petit bémol sur le petit déjeuner et les oreillers qui n’étaient pas extraordinaires.
Second séjour dans ce charmant. L’expérience est toujours aussi satisfaisante. Les chambres sont propres et joliment décorées. A recommander sans réfléchir !

Hotel très sympa, bon déco, taille de la chambr correcte et très propre, surtout les personnes de la reception sont très accueillants, j'ai pu imprimer mes documents à la réception et laisser ma valise là bàs après le check out. Merci!

Chambre de très bon rapport qualité prix. Les photos ne correspondent pas forcément mais la chambre était correcte !

Bien situé, permettant ainsi de visiter facilement.

Wouldn’t recommend this place even for just one night, it is too noisy and also very bright even with all the curtains closed and people are smoking in the hotel
This was a great place to stay if you've never been to Paris before! It is close to everything, very safe and great hospitality! Highly recommend!

Good value for an affordable, quick one-night stay. The one man at the front desk was very kind, though he did take about 40min to assist with check in. Rooms are very small but clean and the best part of this boutique hotel was the breakfast - the baguette bread and the fresh grapefruit juice were lovely!

Location is good - not far from the metro stop. (And also a short metro ride to Sacre Ceour.)

A very nice room in a boutique hotel in Paris. My only criticism is the parking situation. Though not specifically the hotel's fault, parking was a bit frustrating. They have a deal with the local parking garage, a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Parking is difficult in Paris and this is no exception. Multiple prices were quoted, each time higher than the one before. In the end, I had to pay more than initially stated. A minor quibble, but future travellers should be aware that this will likely happen to them as well.
24 hour check-in was very handy. Some rooms maybe smaller than the main photo but very clean and good value.
It’s in great location and the room is clean and comfortable. Nice reception and cozy experience.
Great value! In a neighborhood filled with unrevealing but very tasty restaurants and take-aways. Room isn’t enormous but for Paris, it’s a good size. Nice bed, and a clean and pleasant shower.
Not what I expected. It's not that bad neither. It's an ok hotel (for the price). The location is very nice tho.
Room was basic but good value. It was smaller than what was shown in the pictures but fine for one person. Good location.
nice place. good location and nice attention to details.
Nichts zu bemängeln, für Paris ein guter Preis.
Sauberkeit war teilweise etwas problematisch. Ansonsten ist die Rezeption 24/7 offen. Personal ist sehr nett

This was one of the most incredible finds on Airbnb. This adorable hotel is so centrally located and truly a great value. I can’t recommend it enough. One thing that is important to keep in mind, because it is a hotel it’s likely you won’t get the exact room they show in the pictures here on Airbnb. While it’s generally the same, I thought the actual room I was getting was a bit bigger like the one in the pictures. That being said, it’s not a complaint but an observation. I would stay here again.
Muy buena y amable. Ubicación buena y la limpieza de la habitación excelente, no había ruido y perfecta para descansar.

good location !!

Based on a good location! Definitely worth it

great location! I just needed a bed to sleep on for a layover. It was perfect.

Nice stay in a nice neighbourhood. Metro is close by, also a cornucopia of restaurants to choose from. 
The room itself is small but has everything you need and is even very clean. The only thing I did not like about the room was the colour of one of the bed tables was splintering off and the hairdryer was a little dirty in the socket. Then again, all this for a reasonable price (depending on the time of course). The worst for me was the staircase which does look a lot cheaper then needed, it did not at all capture the flair of Paris low cost living. I especially was find if the gentleman in the lobby, that helped me find everything I needed and even called me a taxi in the early morning. 
All in all a good stay.
gute lage, gute anbindung, gute service allerdings kleines zimmer. Dafür doch ganz schön viel geld. aber für paris vielleicht normal
Good value for money in a charming arrondissement off of the traditional tourist tracks.
Very small and comfortable room. No AC, just fan. Shower stall- clean bathroom. Big windows. Comfy bed. Super nice staff. You can metro/bus/walk anywhere from there.
Great location and price, clean small room. Exactly what I needed!

This is a commercial hotel, not someone's home, so if you're looking for a personal touch you won't find it here. The rooms are smaller than they appear in photos, but they have everything you need. Clean ensuite, lift. No AC/central heat but a fan and a radiator. Top floor windows open onto a pretty courtyard. Easy walking distance to the metro.
Very nice and stylish room near the  metrostation 'Rome'. Only the smell in the room was a little problem for me, but in overal just perfect.
Wonderful place

J'ai passé mes séjours à Paris confortablement dans cet établissement. Tout était comme la description.

Un merveilleux séjour au calme, dans une jolie chambre avec baignoire... Le personnel de l'hôtel a été extrêmement bienveillant et aidant... Bonjour le principe de AirBnB est d' aider les voyageur à trouver des logements non? J'ai été déçu de me retrouver dans un hôtel qui n'a pas été à la hauteur des l'annonce. Déception.

Endroit assez bruyant, la chambre n'était  pas vraiment insonorisée donc assez gênant pour un sommeil profond! Acceuil sympa mais c'est un hotel et pour moi ce n'est pas vraiment le concept Airbnb! Je ne recommande pas.

Endroit vraiment bien propre, confort. 
Chambre vraiment bien, très confortable...
Personne à l'accueille gentille et souriante notre séjours c'est vraiment bien passer.

La chambre est conforme à l'annonce. L'accueil est chaleureux.

Bon rapport qualité prix . Chambre un peu décevante, trop vétuste.
