Marie's place is lovely as pictured, though I found it cold there in December. Even with the radiator turned up, I could have used an extra blanket. The neighborhood was very nice.
Great space for couples or solo travelers visiting Paris. Centrally located & easy to find - overall perfect place to stay.

Stylish Parisian studio located literally 5mins from the Louvre. The building is safe as there is a courtyard with a gate. I didn’t really stay inside the apt long but I really liked the apt. Small but with comprehensive amenities
Such a wonderful place in the heart of Paris! The cafes and unparalleled location to Les Marais and the Louvre made our stay perfection.

Marie was extremely quick to respond.  She allowed us to drop out bags for storage the day we arrived before check in.  Her place is extremely clean, it was quiet on the courtyard, and has a huge bath. It is close to the Louvre and near to a metro station. It was a perfect location for us to walk to nearby attractions or hop on the metro for places further off. The bed was comfortable and there is a beautiful chandelier in the space.
Good place and location

This place is PERFECT! So clean, easily the best WiFi we got in France (we stayed at several Airbnb’s on this trip) and a stones throw from major attractions. Definitely would stay again! 

A small note- there is a large window in the room with no blackout curtain. It is private, but light does get in. If you’re someone who needs total darkness to sleep, this may bother you. (I slept great though.) 

Don’t miss out on this Paris gem.

I always look for security when booking my stays via airbnb and Marie's place definitely provides that in a central and happening area of Paris. The space is larger than most Parisian hotel rooms and was incredibly clean with all the necessary amenities provided. It made for a comfortable stay and i would plan on returning to the same space when i make my way down to Paris again. Highly recommend for pairs/couples.

This is the perfect place to base yourself in Paris, particularly if you plan to spend a lot of time near the Louvre. I have never seen a small space used so well before. This is the most secure Airbnb I have ever stayed in - requiring a keycode to enter the courtyard, and then another keypad to enter the building. The place was spotless when we checked in. The bed is extremely comfortable. The bathroom had all the necessities. The kitchen has everything you need to self cater (stovetop, pots, plates, microwave); Nespresso machine. There is a Franprix across the street where you can buy whatever you need (water, snacks). We got around everywhere using Uber/Kapten/Bolt, but you could get around with public transportation if you wanted to easily. Some important notes is that this studio is immediately by the entrance door so everytime someone enters/leaves you hear the door and some inconsiderate people do slam the door. Additionally, everytime people go up/down the stairs you will hear every step. Finally, something vitally important about this space is the electronic blackout shutter that you can make the studio completely dark for peaceful sleep, as well as dampening some of the noises. It was a cool feature I have never seen anywhere else and I think along with the security, it is a vital feature that makes this place perfect to stay at. There is a heater. We did get hot sometimes during our stay - opening the windows and leaving the shutter open just enough so there was some air circulation helped with this, but in summer months I can imagine it must get really hot. We love this place and would recommend it to people visiting Paris for the value, security, design, and comfort.
Great location, very clean. We will definitely come back during our next stay in Paris.

Perfect location! This apartment is walking distance to so many great attractions (including the Louvre). It's exactly as pictured and spotless. Marie was a great host and the entry instructions are very clear. It felt like a very safe location - gated courtyard and locked door to the building etc. I would stay here again.
This apartment is beautiful. Situated in a private, gated courtyard, it's the perfect place to be. In the middle of the city but perfectly quiet. Hopefully we will be back soon!
Fantastic location and wonderfully clean.  We would stay there again.
Impeccable!

Marie’s place is a great little studio in an awesome Paris location, close to the Louvre and metro connections.  We appreciated the beautiful finishes and thoughtful extras (plenty of Nespesso pods) as well as the local cafes and patisseries.  Highly recommend for a single or couple visiting Paris for a few days!
Great place to stay!! So beautiful and well located.
Amazing space in Paris.  So convenient to everything. Very thoughtfully put together space. We loved it.

This studio just a 10
Minute walk from the Lourve and between two main Metro stations, is perfectly situated and in a secure gated community. Plenty of cafes, brasseries, and restaurants in the area. It is a perfect studio apartment for a couple with a comfortable bed, surprisingly large bathroom, small refrigerator and 2-burner cooktop, and Nespresso-style coffeemaker (a few pods are provided to get you started and can be replaced at the local grocery stores - there are two within a 5-minute walk).
Marie’s place is perfectly located and great for one or two people. It is as described, in a great neighborhood, inside of a courtyard (so it’s very quiet). We had a great stay!

Fantastic studio apartment in a fantastic location (the Louvre is literally down the street)!   It suited our needs perfectly, and I hope to book here again on my next trip to Paris.  Marie's communication and instructions were spot on.  Best Airbnb experience I've had to date!
Marie’s place was very clean and in an excellent location. It felt like a home away from home during our stay in Paris.
Incredible location steps to cafes, the louvre and many other great places in Paris.  Would definitely stay again.
The apartment was small, but very cute and romantic. We absolutely loved it. Location was perfect.
Amazing apartment in a great location. Communication was great. We had an excellent time in Paris, which was made even better by staying here.
Amazing location, everything is in walking distance. Easy check in process. Apartment is stylish and clean
Amazing host and great place to stay in Paris that is within walking distance to main sights to see
As described in the post. Lovely place and fantastic location!
Lovely studio in a beautiful part of Paris. Only steps from the Louvre!
Well positioned for Paris highlights. Very clean.
Great location, as advertised.  Thanks!!
Marie’s apartment was in a safe and great location. We loved the area and walked everywhere. The apartment was clean and fresh, and the shower was great.

I LOVE LOVE LOVED THIS PLACE!!!!!! I can’t recommend this place more! Marie had clear check in instructions which was a huge help as it could have been very confusing otherwise. The apartment is so conveniently located and in an extremely secure building as a single woman I felt super safe! I literally would move into the apartment tomorrow if I could that’s how much I loved it!! Can’t wait for my next trip to Paris to stay here again!
An incredible place for such good value! Location is perfect to explore Paris! Couldn’t recommend this place more!

Great place at a fantastic location. Nested inside a courtyard, it allows you access to everything the city offers, whilst still having a peaceful corner.

Downsides: a tiny bit claustrophobic, as the windows are tainted (as opposed to curtains) and the only access to fresh air is by means of two small windows near the ceiling - gets stuffy at times.

Having said that, the studio is beautiful, with a well appointed bathroom (great shower).

I do recommend it!
Well located place but gets a bit hot in summer! The window doesn't open

Marie’s place is perfect.  The location is close to everything “fun” in Paris.  Check in was a breeze with easy to follow instructions.  We felt very safe in this gated community.  The apartment maximizes all the space needed for 2 people to be comfortable.  The place was spotless.   We arrived early in the morning so we took advantage of the nannybag service literally a block over ( a suggestion by Marie).  We were able to enjoy the city and the return for our bags and check in.  The city was definitely warm during the day but the apartment was cool in the evening along with a fan.  All the personal touches were very nice. I would highly recommend Marie’s place.

Marie es excelente anfritiona, preocupada. La dirección un poco difícil
De entender primero, pero muy bien ubicado. Limpio y central.
Spotless, well furnished with everything you need for a few days in Paris!

A terrific, chic little nest in a wonderful neighborhood. It’s a killer location, we walked everywhere! There’s public access to anything you need. 

Marie was very responsive and the place was clean and nice, precisely like the photos. 

Two slight downsides: there’s no air conditioning and the windows only open a bit near the ceiling, so air flow does not come in. Marie thankfully provided a fan, but the apartment was routinely hotter than the outdoors, even in the warm July days we were there. Also, the WiFi is very bad, and the modem needs to be frequently reset. This is a little frustrating when you need internet for daily planning and directions. 

Still a terrific spot, though.
A compact studio, but super well designed and a very spacious bathroom. We loved the location and comfort of this apartment, and it is on the ground floor so no need to carry luggage upstairs.
Wonderful. Charming, clean, central to everything
Amazing location, very clean apartment.
The location was convenient, self checking was seamless, the place was clean and tidy, just wasn’t so fortunate for me when the heat wave hits Europe without air conditioning.
Great location. Stylish unit. Watch out for hot days.
Marie is a great host with quick responses and very detailed check-in directions. The place was perfect for two people and an amazing location. Would recommend to anyone!

Lovely place to stay if you want to be close to the Louvre. Remember when you get out of the station to turn left and the first street left again. You can’t go wrong if you choose this  apartment. We enjoyed our stay.

The location, setup and decor of this apartment was absolutely perfect! It’s located on the ground floor  which was perfect for us so that we didn’t need to carry our luggage upstairs. It’s located behind a locked courtyard so we felt very secure. We would definitely stay here again the next time we’re in Paris!
Wonderful location, elegant clean space.  Will come back!
Terrific, safe location!
Great central location that is incredibly easy to get to. Perfect for anyone who prefers to stay on ground floor but not street facing. Also the shutters were a perfect touch allowing us to sleep in.

Marie’s place is one of the few places in Paris that’s EXACTLY nice and cozy as it looks in the pictures. Squeaky clean, extremely quiet considering how centrally placed, and her check-in instruction is very straight forward and hassle-free. The little details are fantastic—coffee, kettle, the little umbrella right next to the door—the whole place was thoughtful and welcoming. Would definitely stay in again when we come to Paris.
Great location
Awesome location, bright and the tall ceilings felt really special. The courtyard access was nice for reading a book by the fountain. Truly a 5 star experience and not much more to say otherwise.
Great location for walking around Paris! The space was clean and comfortable, although I was expecting more natural light from the photos.

We couldn’t have asked for a better place for spending 4 nights in Paris! The location can’t be beat. It’s a short walk to the Louvre and the Seine and everywhere else we wanted to go was walkable as well. The studio is beautiful, clean, well decorated, and equipped with everything you need. It is small but was perfect for two people. It sits within a courtyard, and we always felt very safe and secure. We loved our time here and would definitely return!
This was a great stay. Exactly what we needed.

My husband and I stayed in Marie's luxurious studio during our first trip to Paris. The apartment was spotless and looked even lovelier in person. The property is centrally located and there are tons of great restaurants within walking distance. It's also very easy to catch the train or Uber, which is exactly what we did for a day trip to visit Versailles. There is a massage place right across the street which was a heaven-sent for our sore legs/feet since we walked many miles every day while exploring the city. The room is on the first floor but the courtyard is locked in the evening and only residents have access to the building, so it was very peaceful! Also, the black-out curtains were great. Overall, we had a wonderful experience and highly recommend Marie's apartment.

ABSOLUTELY AMAZING! Marie's studio was sparkling clean and very cozy. We loved our stay here, it is close to many great restaurants, shops, and attractions. Marie was great to communicate with and does her best to accommodate you. We would definitely love to stay here again.
Space was very clean, seamless check in, great location. Would recommend to anybody going to Paris.
This apt. Is in an excellent location. It is perfect for two. Clean and comfortable. We would stay here again.
A nice and clean place, with very convenient location. Only within 6mins can get to the Louvre :). Also, near most of the spots. We enjoyed our time a lot.

My husband and I loved our stay here for a weekend in Paris! The apartment is well located just steps from the metro and plenty of attractions, cafes, shops, etc. It is the perfect size for 2 people and provided a hotel-like experience that also felt homey. Note the apartment is on the first/ground floor- first door to your right when you enter the building (it wasn’t immediately clear to me but Marie responded right away). 
Highly recommend and would definitely stay here again.
Clean, stylish, and perfectly located. Was a fantastic home base for my wife and I while exploring all that Paris as to offer!

This apartment was perfect for my stay in Paris. The location is great, the courtyard is lovely, the WiFi worked great and it had everything I needed for a short stay. It's a studio and very well laid out with a stunning bathroom. The closet is perfect, the kitchenette was enough to make a meal if needed, the eating nook is cute and the check in was smooth. I would stay here again when in Paris and recommend. Merci!
Perfect location to visit the Louvre and enjoy the best of Paris!

Marie's studio is beautiful, spotless, and perfectly located.  When you step into the courtyard, you leave the noise of the city behind, it's so quiet.  Her instructions for check in and TV are extremely clear and detailed.  She was also very thoughtful and provides everything you would need like a hairdryer, adapter plug, and even an umbrella.  We absolutely loved our stay here.
Apartment only big enough for 2 but the location was amazing! Marie answered promptly and her food tips were dead on. Will be staying there the next time we come through Paris!

Beautiful, small perfectly decorated studio. For how small it is, the bathroom is very luxurious & spotless. We were able to walk everywhere. Some places are far @ mass transit is super easy but walking down streets of museum quality is so fun. I loved everything about it. The courtyard is locked st night, very secure. Located to a wonderful square with cafes, supermarkets and so close to the Louvre & Musée de Orsay. I can’t say enough good things about our experience. Exquisite!

Marie’s place was perfect for my stay in Paris. It felt very safe and secure and was also spotless. Marie was also very quick to respond if I needed anything. I would highly recommend her place and I would stay there again myself when I return to Paris. Thank you Marie!!!

Marie’s place was in a great location that made it easy to get around to all the sights of Paris with multiple transit options in walking distance. The apartment was on the ground floor but had a shutter so it was very quiet and we slept great! The decor was chic and very Parisian. Check in was super easy. Loved our stay and would highly recommend!
The location couldn’t be better. Right in the middle of some of great shopping, the train, and the Louvre! Beautiful room, comfy bed, and a perfect spot for our first time in Paris.
It’s amazing !
Great comfortable space, and Marie has been so helpful with all her responses :) Would recommend to everyone

Marie's place is in a great location - walking distance to the Louvre and Notre Dame. It is very clean and the self check-in was super easy and convenient since we arrived late in the evening. 

The apartment is in a safe neighborhood and we felt safe even at night. 

Great restaurants near by also. We really enjoyed our stay!
The space is very clean and stylish. Great location and very quiet, private building. Marie is quick to respond with any concerns, great for US travelers.

What a perfect location in Paris. We walked so easily to everything we wanted to see and do, and were surprised by how quickly and easily we found the place after exiting the RER at Les Halles. Great find.
Very clean and lovely studio. Good location and beautiful.
Lovely clean apartment in a great location to explore Paris for the first time. Good communication. Would definitely recommend.
Lovely apartment and great location ! Highly recommended
This is a lovely home base for visiting the Louvre.  It is clean, welcoming and all the essentials of home.  Marie is very helpful and accommodating.  We enjoyed this stylish apartment.
La ubicación es excelente.  El patio interior muy hermoso. El apartamento es pequeño pero impecable.

The studio is beautiful with everything thought about such as shower gel, hand soap, a hair dryer, plug converter.  In many ways it was more homely and luxurious than many hotel rooms.

The place was very clean and the bathroom was impeccable.

The location was a 2 min walk from Les Halles so it was very easy to arrive to the room from le gard du nord on the metro, it was in a safe street in an internal court yard with a locked gate at the entrance.

The room is smaller than it looks in the pictures but still a good size for two sharing.  The only thing that bothered us (as we are light sleepers) was that as the room is right by the front door so when people open and closed the door it creaked and slammed and this could be heard from inside the room.  Luckily it was incredibly silent most of the time but from around 7am on Saturday morning people started to use the door to leave the building.
MarieAnne gave us wonderful recommendations on where to eat, delicious french food at a great price!
Marie's place is amazing, even better than expected! Very clean, amazing location, and a great host. Would definitely stay again next time in Paris.

You cannot beat this location: minutes from the Louvre and the Marais, seconds from Les Halles and the best restaurant and shopping. The building is magnificent: quintessential Hausmann 19th century Paris, littérale jaw dropping. The apartment is on the first floor, overlooking a patio which makes it very quiet and pleasing. The space is spotless clean and the bathroom is extremely comfortable. So is the bed. I loved it and will come back.

Marie’s place is AWESOME. You cannot find a better location.. we were able to walk everywhere. The space is very clean and just what you need in Paris. She made the check in process seamless. I will 100% be back.

MarieAnne’s home was clean, conveniently located, and very safe! The complex is gated from the street and locked by a code, once inside the actual building number with her apartment is locked and can only be opened with a key fob that is provided for you. Then the apartment also has a retractable steel window protectant! It blocks out all light and helps with some of the noise associated with being in an apartment on the ground floor. Make sure you set an alarm! We accidentally slept in due to the darkness, whoops! 
The location was amazing. About a 5-10 min walk to the louvre, and plenty of yummy restaurants and bakeries right across the street or a block or two down! Our favorite bakery was Gosselin, it is open sundays when most things are closed and their pastries and breads were delicious! 
Tip, the hot water runs out fairly quick! After my husband finished showering, I was left with ice water halfway through my shower with still plenty of shampoo in my hair. 
All in all we were very happy with our stay and felt at home! Thank you Marie!

地点非常好并安全,紧邻地铁,去景点､机场､都很方便~
房东提供的入住流程很清晰跟明确,小区也同样非常安全,房间在1楼,拖拿行李也很方便,房间的层高非常高,设备很新,我们冬天入住并不冷,厨具设施很全,烤箱,电磁炉,冰箱,电视,热水器,香槟杯,红酒杯,白葡萄酒杯,威士忌杯等,法国的房间不是很隔音,好在这个小区跟邻居都很安静,中餐做不了,西餐是没问题的｡
房东品味很好,装修风格不非常不错,很舒服~推荐给了其他朋友,如果再来巴黎还会选择~
We absolutely love MarieAnne’s place. Amazing location , and very clean. We stayed at the beginning of our trip and the last 3 days! We can not wait to be back in Paris and stay at her pretty place !

An amazing apartment, in an amazing location! Easy to get around, and close to public transport. Much cheaper than any other hotel in the area. Especially loved it was so safe, which multiple locked entrances. Will recommend to all I know travelling to Paris!

Exceptional location right in the centre of Paris, with all sites easily accessible by public transport or via walking. The place was very clean and comfortable. Highly recommend this place if you want a hassle free stay!
Location was terrific! Perfect space for 1-2 guests. Check in was also smooth with the step by step instructions. Would love to stay here again!
Great location, very nice bathroom and a comfortable bed. Very clean and comfortable. Marie Ann was a pleasure and easy to communicate with.

This place was perfect. So centrally located. Super close to rail stations and attractions. Pro tip… Turn on the refrigerator when you get there. Also the window shade control is to the left of the door. Unless you like sleeping With a whole bunch of light coming in you’re going to want to know that right away.  The host was super fast with any questions we had. But the only thing we had was a Wi-Fi drop out that was resolved by power cycling the router. We will definitely stay here again and it has probably been
The best Airbnb experience so far.

MarieAnne’s place is sparkling clean and very convenient to the Louvre. My husband and I stayed here one night to go to the museum early in the morning and it was a four minute walk away. 

It’s a bit small, but enough space for two people who are out exploring the city all day and just need a clean and safe place to sleep. It is on the bottom floor so there was some noise late at night but nothing outside of what you’d expect from a big city. There are dishes and cups and a few snacks that were provided. But really, the most impressive part was how clean the space was for a popular space. 

Would recommend.
Our stay at Maria’s was amazing! Perfect location, walking distance to the Louvre. Maria was available and provided great check in instructions. Apartment was perfect for a couple staying in Paris!
Perfect location and lovely little studio. Everything you need for a wonderful weekend in Paris!

Marie’s place is well located, easy to find, in a lovely building, and really well-appointed, with nice little touches. It’s easy to get to CDG on the RER-B line, which is a 5 minute walk from the apartment. I highly recommend Marie’s!

We absolutely loved staying at Marie’s! Such a charming beautiful place. It’s on the ground floor in a gated courtyard and we felt very safe the whole time with not much noise in the evening. Very walkable to many places! I think we walked most of the time during our stay and only ubered or limed a couple of times so super convenient!

The Studio was an amazing hidden jewel in the very center of Paris. Marie is a perfect host and was very easy to communicate with. The Studio was stylish and comfortable with lots of thoughtful amenities. The location is perfect and very convenient to all of the main Paris attractions. We would love to return!
루브르에서도 가깝고 걸어서 10분내로 한인마트가 위치해있어 조리해먹기 편리합니다 깔끔하고 둘이 쓰기 딱 좋아요
Espectacular todo
Marie’s place in wonderful!  Very clean, comfortable, and amazing location!  Just a short walk to the Louvre, it really is a perfect location.  Highly recommend!

This was my second time staying at Marie's place. The location is hard to beat -- easy train ride to CDG on the RER B station and a short walk to the Louvre, among many other sights and activities. Marie is a wonderful host. Great place to stay.
Beautiful apartment in a fabulous location!
Great location (super walkable!!) , super clean, everything we needed for an awesome stay. Would definitely stay here again. So much to see, do, and eat!

Perfect location to enjyo sightseeing. 
Aprtment is cosy place. Also the security is perfect.

A great studio apartment, beautiful and clean, exactly as pictured and described. Very nicely prepared with great amenities. Marie made it very easy for check in and check out. Thanks for a great stay!
A very comfortable, quiet, clean studio in an amazingly central location.  Everything went smoothly and was very clear and easy.  I would definitely recommend her space, and stay there again!

Apartment was excellent, it was clean, warm and had everything needed for a city break in terms of cutlery, crockery, glasses, mugs etc.  It was in an excellent  location, easy walking distance to many of the top attractions, but was nice & quiet at night as it was set back from the main road in a nice courtyard.
For somewhere classy and cosy right in the centre of Paris, this is it. Marie was extremely quick with responses when we had questions, and the room itself is perfect. Awesome.

Just as sparkling clean and organized as it was for my first stay earlier this year.  Communication with Marie was quick and easy. No problem with check-in and check-out, and access to apartment was secure. Amenities were good, and bed and pillows were comfortable. Good quality hangers and enough closet space  for 2 guests for a brief stay. Wifi was reliable. Very convenient location - discovered more restaurants and sights nearby. I highly recommend this place.
It was nice and very clean. Walking distance to Louvre and my favorite Saint Honore Ave. Thank you, Marie!!

The location is super good with accessible to museums, restaurants, shopping malls by foot!
The apartment is compact, clean and well-decorated.
We enjoyed our stay. Perfect location for those who wish to see the Louvre. Very easy check in and out.
This is a great location, clean and well thought out place.  It is small, so better for short stays.  It also can get a little stuffy.
Very friendly, easy check in, also very great at responding quickly when questions arise. Would recommend to others!

The location of this place is great, it is very close to the Sainte-Chapelle and the Notre Dame, as well as the Louvre, and the very stylish Saint Germain neighborhood. I only wish we had the time to have stayed longer! The place was extremely clean and the bed was very comfortable. I would definitely stay here again if in Paris again.
Very cute little space in a great location not far from shops, metro  and Louve

Clean and in a great location. Marie provided very detailed check-in instructions, which made checking in effortless. She was also very quick and detailed with her responses when questions arose during our stay. Would stay again, highly recommend.

This location is safe and secure with everything one would need for a Paris getaway. Thank you Marie-Anne for the amazing stay and place to recharge in such an awesome city. Great communication and instructions. A+ WiFi and hospitality.

Marie-Anne’s place worked out great for our short 3 night stay in Paris. It was super clean, which is the most important to me. But also, the location was amazing. We didn’t really have to travel by train/bus too often because everything was walking distance. If you’re a first timer in Paris and don’t have too much time, pick this place. It will save you time. 

My only complaint is that it got really cold the last two days and there was no way of turning on the heat since it’s operated by the building, not the unit. So we were pretty cold every morning and late at night. I guess the tenants of the building thought 50 degrees Fahrenheit was not cold enough for some heat. Thankfully the bed was warm. 

Other than that, everything was a breeze and we were overall very happy with our stay! :)

A wonderful place to stay - location was awesome, very clean, and we loved the black out window shade. It’s accessed from an inner courtyard, which helps reduce noise. We would happily stay again on a future trip.
Clean and cozy room, nice location and safe.

Marie-Anne graciously helped me to extend our stay one day so I repeat my earlier review:  
Marie-Anne’s studio apartment is a perfect option for tourists visiting Paris.  The flat is exquisitely designed and furnished.  The bathroom is beautiful and has many shelves, bars and hooks that are so appreciated by travelers.  The coffee maker, iron, window powered shutter shade and numerous power outlets were much appreciated.  The apartment is located in a quiet and secure building off a secure interior courtyard.  The neighborhood is very safe and has numerous and convenient cafes, grocery stores and shops.  Many Paris sights are within walking distance and numerous bus and Metro/Train lines are easily accessible.  We downloaded and used the G7 taxi App numerous times to reduce travel time and walking distance.   While Paris offers many wonderful tourist attractions we especially liked the less visited Musee Nissim de Camondo and outside Paris Chateau de Vaux-le-Vicomte.  If you have time and €30 have breakfast/brunch at Claus Palais Royal just steps from Marie-Anne’s apartment.  If you like classical music seek out (Website hidden by Airbnb)   We saw them perform at Sainte Chapelle but they appear at other church’s and venues.

The bathroom is beautiful and has many shelves, bars and hooks that are so appreciated by travelers.  The coffee maker, iron, window powered shutter shade and numerous power outlets were much appreciated.  The apartment is located in a quiet and secure building off a secure interior courtyard.  The neighborhood is very safe and has numerous and convenient cafes, grocery stores and shops. While Paris offers many wonderful tourist attractions we especially liked the less visited Musee Nissim de Camondo and outside Paris Chateau de Vaux-le-Vicomte.  If you have time and €30 have breakfast/brunch at Claus Palais Royal just steps from Marie-Anne’s apartment.  If you like classical music seek out (Website hidden by Airbnb)   We saw them perform at Sainte Chapelle but they appear at other church’s and venues.

A beautiful location with convenience to the Louvre and other sights downtown Paris. Close to Chatalet, a very central transit hub. The room was on the first floor, so great, for those tired of stairs. The room was clean, beautifully styled and included just the right amount for 2 people.

Thanks again, would stay here again.

We had a wonderful time staying at Marie-Anne's studio. It was so close to the louvre and many delicious restaurants. It was perfect for us - a young couple that needed a launching pad for seeing the sights, and we loved the black out curtain for catching up on our sleep.  It was also very clean and super easy to check in/out. We strongly recommend you stay here if you need a convenient place to rest your head while exploring Paris!

Amazing location in Paris. 5 min walk from Chatelet-les Halles station. Very close to the Louvre, Notre Dame, the Seine, tons of restaurants and bars. 

Security behind a gate and access door. Ground floor. Small, but clean and stylish space with mini fridge and stove. Very nice shower and firm bed. 

If you want to see Paris, this is a great location!
The location is phenomenal. The space itself is cozy and beautiful. I will definitely try to book this house again the next time I visit Paris.
Alloggio carino in un’ottima posizione ma la comunicazione rende il soggiorno meno piacevole.
Beautiful place- great location.

Marie-Anne's central Paris studio is absolutely wonderful. The location, right within a three minute walk of the Louvre and the busiest metro stop in Paris, is worth the money alone. The studio is full of great little homely touches and as it faces into a courtyard is very quiet both day and night. I wouldn't hesitate to book another stay here. 10/10
nice experience . good localisation

My boyfriend and I stayed at this AirBnb for 3 days in Paris. Marie-Anne is extremely responsive and provided directions for a super easy check-in. The place was spotless and designed very well. It was spacious enough for the two of us. We both agreed it felt like a luxury modern hotel. We would definitely like to stay here again!
The location was great, the place perfect for two & communication was very easy.
Our visit was quick but we enjoyed our stay at Marie-Anne's place!

Marie-Anne’s place was a wonderful place to stay and looks bigger than the pictures suggest! It was in a great location, it was clean and comfortable, and great value for money - thank you! We would stay again and will recommend it to all our friends who come to Paris!
Perfect location, safe place, well explanation for the check-in. Little bit small than expectation but super good!

We absolutely loved our stay at Marie-Anne’s place, we never want to stay anywhere else in Paris. 

LOCATION: Perfect. Right in the middle of everything. Short walk to our train that we took in from the airport, and we took the same train to Brussels. Totally walkable to the Louvre, Saint-Chapelle, Notre Dame, Opera House, Rue Montorgueil (street market). 

SAFETY: The gated entrance is excellent. We stayed safely behind three locked doors at all times. 

CLEANLINESS: The apartment was spotless. So very clean. 

CONVENIENCE: There are restaurants, bakeries, and everything else all around the location. 

HOST: Marie-Anne was excellent. We got confused about exiting to the courtyard (make sure you read the full check-in instructions! We didn’t at first.) and she was so very quick to respond to us. 

CHECK-IN: Very easy. Just follow the instructions! 

AMENITIES: We had everything we needed. Fridge was great to store waters to be kept cold in the dead of summer. The blackout shutters were great for a full night’s sleep. The hair dryer included within the bathroom was helpful. We made coffee in the pod machine a few mornings, she included a few pods. 

All in all, we could not recommend this place more! 100%. Excellent spot.

Marie-Anne is a fantastic host! She replies very promptly and has a very clean and comfortable studio complete with whatever you need (e.g. ironing board, adapter plug, etc.) at an unbeatable location! It’s easy to choose her place over any nearby hotels!!
This is a fantastic apartment.  Perfect location, super cute, and convenient for up to 2 people.  Communication with Marie-Anne was very easy.  It was also very safe. I can't wait to go back!
Marie-Annes is everything you could need for a short stay in Paris. Clean, central and bright
The room is beautiful with high end finishes.  Very clean! It was hot when we were in Paris, and the place really needed an extra fan or portable AC.  That will only be an issue in high temperatures.

Marie-Anne’s studio is perfect, tastefully decorated, sparkling clean and ideally located.  It is a 5 minute walk from the Louvre, Metro and bus tours.  Marie-Anne provides everything you need for your stay and there are multiple cafes and markets all around her studio.  Her studio also has full shutters that help with the heat and provide excellent privacy and darkness to sleep.  I would highly recommend this studio to anyone wanting to visit Paris.
Terrific location, perfect for a single traveller or a couple to have a base to explore Paris. Highly recommended.
Great place. Great location. Small but all you really need for a quick Paris trip. A+ service.
Lovely apartment in a great area of Paris. Felt very secure staying alone in the apartment. The bathroom was great and would definitely come back to stay in this home. Highly recommend it :)

By far, one of my favorite places to stay when we traveled Europe. The studio was in a great location, a quick couple of minutes walk to the Louvre with a ton of restaurants nearby. The studio was very clean, made us feel very safe, and it was quiet.

Thanks for being a great host!
The flat was in a great location close to the Louvre, the mall, and a lot of resturants.
The fan in the room saved us as it was hot!

Bastille Day weekend is a must in France!

Beautiful apartment in a secure gated area. Close to every you need! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Only issue was it was a bit hot. Only a small fan in room. Great communication from host. Would stay here again.
Perfect spot to stay in central Paris for a couple or solo traveler.

Marie-Anne is a great host. Her instructions for check in were super clear, the space was cleaner than any hotel, and it's so beautifully decorated. Great location and perfect for female solo travelers (felt super safe in the area and the apt)! I can't wait to go back to Paris and just hope that this apt is free on the dates I return.
The check in,  while a bit complicated, was explained very clearly.  The location is great-very close to the Louvre, Seine, shopping and restaurants.
The location is wonderful which near the Musée du Louvre , Georges-Pompidou so many nice restaurants.

We had an amazing stay in Paris at Marie-Anne’s studio!! We walked to all the attractions from this perfect location.  It felt very safe and was surprisingly quiet for where it’s located.  Marie-Anne was very conscious to be sure we found her place and that everything was what we expected!  Would recommend!

Very nice apartment, close to everything. The check in/out was very easy. 
It made our trip so much nicer.

Highly recommend this accommodation. The place is very clean and stylish, and is at a convenient location. Marie-Anne is very responsive to any questions and inquiries. We had a great stay here while in Paris.
Great area and place.

The three biggest positives of Marie-Anne’s place are:  1. Outstanding location  within close walking distance to major attractions like the Louvre, Centre Pompidoux, public transportation, vast restaurant and shopping choices and more.   2. The place was spotless with all key amenities and 3. The place was inside a quiet courtyard allowing you a decent sleep.  Now if you are looking for a spectacular view, you will find that a challenge unless you head out some distance from Paris city center... but if you want to stay close to the acton at a reasonable cost, Marie-Anne’s place is an excellent choice.

Marie-Anne’s place is just as it appears. She was accommodating on our request to check-in early and the apartment was extremely clean when we arrived. The apartment is located on the ground floor but within a gated courtyard. The blackout shade was a nice option. The bathroom amenities were perfect. We enjoyed our stay and definitely recommend Marie-Anne’s place.

Marie-Anne's place could not be more ideally located for easy walking to and along the Seine and to nearby Rue Montorgueil, which has a fabulous restaurant scene. The studio is clean and Marie-Anne has everything you need to make a meal or just enjoy a cup of coffee. It is ground floor, easy access, and opens to a courtyard so it is delightfully quiet at night. Marie-Anne's communication (which includes pictures) is stellar. The only drawback is that you cannot see out the windows, which are covered for privacy, though you can open the high ones. Overall, I give both the place and the host 5/5.
Marie-Anne's place was wonderful!  It is in a great location and very clean.  Marie-Anne was very quick to respond to any questions or concerns about our stay.  I would highly recommend her place.

Very clean studio apartment located on the ground floor facing a quiet courtyard.  Bed is comfortable, bathroom is large for Paris standards and is modern and very clean.  Conveniently located near the Louvre Museum with easy access to excellent restaurants, pubs, and public transportation.  Window is frosted on lower half.  Black out blinds offer privacy and ease for sleep.  Over the years, I have stayed between 7-10 Airbnb’s, this has been the one of the best experience yet.  Highly recommend.  If this apartment is available, we will definitely stay again the next time we are in town.  Thank you Ann-Marie for allowing us to stay at your apartment.
Hospedagem maravilhosa para duas pessoas. Localização excelente, local limpo, bonito e confortável. A anfitriã é atenciosa e educada. Adorei tudo!!!
The apartment is beautiful and in a very central location. I’d highly recommend staying here.

The perfect location in Paris! You are a quick walk to the Louvre or great shopping. You are also right next to a bus stop and close to a metro station making this a great place to get around Paris. We found a local bakery nearby that we went to each morning for breakfast. There are also many great places to eat nearby and at night we would walk over to the Louvre and enjoy the scenery. As for the place itself, it was immaculately clean and is perfectly decorated. The space is really all you need for 2 people. The bathroom is actually a really great size and there is a heated towel rack! Also, there are black out curtains which made sleeping great. Every now and then you hear some street noise or the neighbors making some noise but it’s nothing too crazy. Also, is in a secure building which made me feel very safe! I would stay here again and again!

Marie-Anne made it super easy to check in and out. Her communication was so fast and she even sent pictures to make it easy to find things. I would rent from Marie-Anne again for my future stay in Paris.
This is a great spot in a central location in Paris, perfect for exploring the city. The apartment is very clean and well kept

Marie-Anne 非常友善,回覆很快｡
房間整齊清潔,地點十分好,只要3min到metro. 走路到羅浮宮都只是10min
Very clean and nice apartment, just a stone’s throw away from the Louvre and nearest metro
It seems a bit small at first, but really, for one person it’s all you need

Marie-Anne's appartement is the best! We loved it soooo much we didn't want to leave. It's so well situated with all the aménité. We could literally walk everywhere--the Louvre, Jardin des Tuileries, Basilique Notre Dame, Musée d'Orsay... There are also good restos around the place and a train station with a full-sized mall with cineplex as well. We would recommend Marie-Anne's place to everyone and would definitely stay there ourselves on our next visits to Paris.

Great studio for one or two people near everything you would want to do in Paris!  If you plan to spend a large amount of time in the studio, just know the window is extremely big and wonderful for light, but the bottom half is opaque and you cannot see into the lovely courtyard.

To stay in Marie-Anne’s flat was a great experience for us. The check-in was very unproblematic and the location of the flat is very (!) central and easy to find. The studio itself is very cozy and includes a comfortable bed and a luxurious, very clean and spacious bathroom (among all other things travelers need). Even though it is located on the ground floor it was never noisy or disturbing since the house is secluded in a beautiful courtyard. We would definitely stay again.
Great place, great neighborhood....

MarieAnne's place was absolutely perfect for our short trip to Paris. It's in an awesome location, just a couple blocks from the Louvre. The bed was SO comfortable (and I'm quite hard to please when it comes to beds), and there is a blackout shade for in-between-adventures naps. There is a Nespresso, which is perfect for making a quick espresso before heading out for the day. My husband and I thought it was perfect–one of the best in about a dozen Airbnb experiences.

We absolutely loved Marie-Anne’s place! One of our favorite spots we stayed in our trip to France. It was extremely clean, very comfortable bed, great shower, and the best part... automatic shades that make the room 100% dark for the best sleep possible. Highly recommend!
Thank you for the clear check in instructions and quick responses. Especially loved the option to check in earlier to drop off our luggage.

The location is perfect, near the Louvre and plenty of cafes within walking distance. The metro and RER trains are right across the street which was incredibly helpful. The space itself is very nice; stylish and modern and very clean. It felt like staying at an upscale hotel. WiFi was spotty during our stay and the water pressure wasn’t great in the shower. Other than that communication was great and overall I would definitely recommend staying here.
Amazing apartment in a fantastic location
The location was amazing and the space perfect!  I loved the court yard and the bathroom was amazing!

The flat was ideal for our weekend stay in Paris: great location, smart and clean flat with all necessary amenities. Marie-Anne was very prompt in her communication and very flexible with our check in/our times which was useful! Would definitely stay again.

Marie-Anne's apartment was bigger than I expected and very lovely. The bathroom is a dream, especially the size! The apartment was so clean, more spacious than anticipated, and adorably decorative. It was nice to come back to after a long day working a trade show, to get refreshed before dinner. Marie-Anne was very responsive and left everything we needed to know about the space in the emails and apartment. I would definitely recommend her apartment and would look to stay there again for my next work trips. Merci!
我很喜欢这套studio!房间的装修很新很有风格｡位于巴黎的市中心,紧邻地铁站｡希望下次来巴黎还有机会可以入住!谢谢!
Very nice apartment in a very good location!
This was a wonderful location that I have already recommended to family and friends planning a trip to Paris.

Marie-Anne’s studio is very clean and true to the description in the site, it felt luxurious with the layout, lighting fixtures and color theme. 

The WC is spacious and  functional. Hooks and counter space are helpful. The towels are the best quality I have had among all the AirBnBs I have stayed at. Towel warmer is a plus. The bed, pillows and linens are comfortable, clean snd conducive for restful sleep.

Other pluses: 1. many sockets available throughout the studio so plenty of places to charge your gadgets; 2. Ample closet space and sturdy hangers; 3. Many lighting options within the studio; 4. Full-length mirror outside of the WC; and 5. Thoughtful touches with the chocolates/caramel, coffee pods and madeleines (thank you!)

Location is convenient: bus station, supermarket, pharmacy, ATMs and many dining options are within a few minutes’ walk.

We felt very comfortable and safe during our stay. There is a secured front entrance to the building. I especially liked that this is on the ground floor so no worries about a lift.

Communication with Marie-Anne was prompt and efficient. She accommodated our requests. She dropped by personally to attend to a wi-fi problem, which was immediately resolved.

I highly recommend this place and would not think twice about staying here again for another visit to Paris.

Merci beaucoup, Marie-Anne.

Do not hesitate - Marie-Anne’s apartment is the only place we will be staying in from now on. 

It absolutely glows with cleanliness and everything is brand new. Bathroom I spectacular for a little flat in Paris, and the building is like a fortress - had no worries about safety whatsoever! 

We walked everywhere from this apartment, so central without being “too” busy or touristy. Neighbors were quiet and everyone clearly takes pride in the building they live in. 

Bed was very comfortable, amenities were just enough and I cannot commend Marie-Anne more on the cleanliness of the place. Absolutely SPOTLESS- and I am a harsh critic! 

Also VERY easy arrival - she sets up everything for you so you have zero questions!

Marie- Anne’s place is so well located to explore Paris - a stones throw from the Louvre and some great bars/restaurants/shops at les halles. We had a great time staying here, Marie-Anne was very helpful at all times and quick to respond to messages. The room itself was quiet, despite being on the ground floor, with shutters (if you wanted!) to keep it nice and dark in the mornings. There is also a small supermarket just across the road, which was very handy! I would love to stay here again when I next visit Paris - merci beaucoup Marie-Anne!

Lo studio si trova in una zona prestigiosa e centrale. Tutto è a portata di mano sia con il Metro che con l'autobus che funzionano bene. Lo studio è perfetto per le coppie, fornito di tutte le comodità, è pulito, curato e molto confortevole, Marie-Anne sempre disponibile, ospitale e pronta a qualsiasi esigenza.  Non potevamo fare scelta migliore
Very well located!

This place was PERFECT for our stay in Paris!!! I’m so glad we chose Marie-Anne’s flat because the location is within walking distance to everything, it’s really close to the metro station if you don’t feel like walking, near amazing restaurants, and super clean! She also was very flexible with our check in and check outs. I would highly recommend booking her place!
Beautiful place in a central location and gorgeous old Parisian building. Studio is comfortable and quiet. Highly recommended.

Marie-Anne was a great host. She was very detailed with the check in instructions, and accommodated us when we arrived early to leave our luggage in the studio. The studio is in a great area, walking distance to museums, restaurants, shops, and bars. Very safe area. The studio is comfortable and clean. This was our first time to Paris and the accommodations were perfect. Recommended studio!
Très bon accueil de la Maman d'Alvin. Bon emplacement  tout c'est bien passé.
Propre et sympa, je recommande
Bonne adresse !

Accueil HYPER chaleureux de la maman d'Alvin
Tout est confortable, très propre et très calme
On s'y sent comme à la maison
Nous recommandons ce lieu situé à 4 stations de métro de la gare de Lyon : très pratique
Propre et sympathique

Je n'ai pas eu l'occasion de rencontrer Alvin, mais sa maman est très sympathique et accueillante !
Je recommande
Bon accueil et propre :)
Tres bon accueil. Tout a fait adapté pour une femme seule.
Propre, calme et discrétion des hôtes. Parfait pour les travailleurs :)
Accueil chaleureux, je recommande
Tres bon accueil !
Nous avons été très bien accueillies la maman d’Alvin était adorable et toujours prête à aider et à prendre des nouvelles merci beaucoup!

Chambre très bien située, dans un quartier très sympathique, calme et bien desservi.
Alvin est quelqu’un de très réactif par message et très précis, quant à sa maman, c’est une très belle personne, chaleureuse et d’une extrême gentillesse. 
Nous recommandons fortement ce logement, et nous-mêmes penserons à eux lors de nos prochains séjours sur la capitale.

J'ai réservé pour 2 nuit à chez lui ,  quand je suis arrivé vers 13h30 ? Il y a eu sa mere à la maison . Nous avons parlé dans 10 mins pour se présenter le chambre et la maison . J'ai été dedans , changer le vetement et prendre le salle de bain pour se laver . Ensuite , elle m'a dit :  douchement avec les portes et je lui dit :  oui , j'ai fait douchement . De plus je lui ai demandé :  pouvez-vous fermer la porte dans la salle d'attendre parce que la salle a utiliser un pafum que j'avais mal la tête . Elle a commencé de m'énerver . Elle est rentré dans mon chambre direct et crier : pourquoi tu as fermé la porte ?????  Et tu n'a pas le droit ici . Elle a parlé vraiment force et me parler mal (  un peu raciste ) pendant 15 mins . Elle m'a demandé de sortir tout de suite ! Je suis vraiment choque jusqu'au maintemant . Je suis pas content et avoir peur  . Maintenant j'ai posé les commentaire ici pour vous faire attention comme même !

L'emplacement est idéal pour se poser à Paris et profiter des restos et ballades alentours. La chambre est un peu exiguë, sans charme particulier mais on y dort. On a l'essentiel pour passer quelques nuits. LM
Très bon séjour.
Un accueil très chaleureux, endroit très très propre et quartier très sécurisé je recommande fortement cet appartement!! Encore merci à la maman d'Alvin pour sa générosité, à très bientôt :)
Séjour dans une chambre très agréable à proximité des commerces et des transports. Gros point positif : les petites attentions des hôtes
Je recommande, un accueil très chaleureux, à l'écoute des besoins.. Plutôt bien situé.
L'accueil chez Alvin est un élément central. Nous nous sommes de suite senti bien. Le logement est bien situé. Je recommande.
Super, merci !
Accueil très sympathique, les hôtes sont très gentils et l emplacement est calme et idéalement situé. Je recommande les yeux fermés
Merci pour votre hospitalité. A bientôt :)
Logement parfaitement adapté pour un séjour court à Paris
Nous avons passé une nuit, un endroit idéal pour un court séjour bien situé près du métro,  flexibilité à l'arrivée, propreté impeccable, je recommande.

Ne vous fiez pas aux (Website hidden by Airbnb) ceux ci ne correspondent pas à la (Website hidden by Airbnb) ne comprends même pas comment on peux proposer un tel (Website hidden by Airbnb) plus tu te retrouves avec des recommandations placardées au mur qui t expliquent que tout est limitées.Pour un week-end romantique à Paris, prenez vos jambes à votre coup pour ne pas séjourner la.
De plus, Monsieur Alvin se permet de vous menacer alors que nous sommes restés courtois alors que nous avions décidé de ne pas rester.

My stay was amazing. The apartment was sparkling clean. Both Alvin and his mum were very kind and welcoming.We enjoyed our stay there. 

I would highly recommend this residence whenever one wants to visit Paris. It's close to all one of the major stations "Paris gare de Lyon"  where you can get metros to all the places one would want to visit.
Impeccable !

Alvin and his mother were great hosts! They were even flexible with me. The room is nice as it is in the picture and the location is in a good quiet spot. You’re in walking distance to the metro station, Gare de Lyon train station, and the 5th district, where there are many restaurants/bars. I highly recommend staying here if you’re going to visit Paris!
We spent one night in Alvin's flat, everything was nice and good.
It was a great stay for a night in Paris. Nothing to complain about.
Nice room, convenient location near different train stations. Very friendly and forthcoming welcome by the mother of Alvin, who is living there, too.
Very nice, open welcome and easy to find
Muy buen lugar para pasar una noche, es fácil tomar el metro e ir al centro de la ciudad , Alvin y su madre son muy amables y te hacen sentir bienvenido . Lo recomiendo.
Un appartement idéalement situé et une hôtesse très agréable !

Très belle adresse, petit appartement d'artiste en plein coeur de Paris, très facilement trouvable et bien placé. India vous reservera le meilleur accueil possible tout en vous laissant une liberté très appréciable. Bon séjour chez elle, comme chez vous, mais en mieux !
Un accueil chaleureux, attentif et efficace. Merci India, notre séjour fut parfait. Le logement est bien placé et impeccable. À recommander !
Chambre bien placée et bien tenue, décoration originale et hôte sympathique.

Suite à un petit problème familiale de dernière minute, India a été super compréhensive et s'est adaptée aussitôt à nos modifications ! Sans elle, nous n'aurions pas pu maintenir notre séjour à Paris qui s'est super bien passé, faisant deux heureux avec pleins de souvenirs ! Merci India !

Séjour d'une seule nuit mais très sympathique ! India est à l'écoute de ses hôtes et partage beaucoup d'anecdotes. L'appartement est super bien situé et la décoration est vraiment unique ! Il a beaucoup de personnalité et est très chaleureux.
India est très sympathique, beaucoup de petites attentions et un petit appartement décoré avec beaucoup d'humour. Merci

India est une personne très accueillante et dynamique. L'appartement est nickel. Elle nous à fait découvrir son quartier le temps d'une soirée pendant le festival de jazz, c'était super.
Je recommande sans hésiter.

Le logement d'India est parfaitement situé, très propre et confortable. India est très sympathique et vous pourriez passer des heures à observer tous les détails de décoration assez atypique. On a super bien dormi et il n'y a même pas eu de bruit ! Merci encore

Très bon accueil, chambre confortable, très propre avec toutes les commodités sur place. L'appartement d'India est chaleureux et idéalement situé pour une petite escapade sur Paris.
Tout est simple avec India. Je recommande vivement.
A réserver sans réserve

Nous nous sommes sentis très à l'aise chez india.. india est une personne charmante, très disponible.
Le lit est très confortable. La chambre et la douche sont très propres.
L'emplacement, à côté  des métros, bus et à proximité de restos, commerces,est très appréciable. Quel plaisir aussi de visiter le marché des enfants rouge,les bords de Seine , Beaubourg...en partant à pied de chez india.
Une adresse où l'on a envie de revenir.
Merci india pour tes nombreux conseils

Appartement de caractère très jolie, bien situé, chambre privé propre et fonctionnelle. très bon accueil, India est une hôte très sympathique, bonne communication, à l’écoute de vos besoins et de bon conseils pour profiter du quartier. Je recommande fortement.
Personne arrangeante.
personne très sympa et très accueillante
Excellent séjour dans un appartement plein de charme et de fantaisie tout comme l’hote India !

Voilà un Acceuil digne de ce nom ! India aime recevoir et cela se voit. Son appart super cosy, sa situation géo idéale pour rayonner ds Paris, son humour et sa gentillesse nous ont permis de passer qq jours formidables à Paris . A recommander !!!

Je ne savais pas qu'elle est américaine, elle est super gentille et elle parle parfaitement la langue française! Mon amie ne comprend pas cette langue donc elles ont parlé l'anglais. Nous avons discuté beaucoup de choses.
La location de l'appartement est vraiment parfait! Il est au centre ville parce que l'on a marché pour aller les monuments. 
Je vous commende cet appartement!

L'appartement de India est très agréable, accueillant et chaleureux, à son image ! On s'y sent très vite chez soi. La cohabitation est facile, India est très respectueuse et aussi très ouverte à la discussion, on peut donc rester en toute intimité quand on le souhaite, ou profiter de son agréable compagnie quand l'occasion se présente.
L'appart est très bien situé : central, dans un quartier touristique mais agréable et vivant, on a tout ce qu'on veut en marchant 2 minutes. Malgré cela l'appart est très silencieux et calme.
Je ne trouve rien de négatif à dire, j'aurais aimé rester encore !

Son appartement est vraiment magnifique et elle est super gentille et accueillante. Elle est cultivée et sympa. L’appartement est très propre et dans un quartier très agréable. 5 stars! <3

Her apartment is really beautiful and she is super nice and welcoming.  She is cultured and friendly.  The apartment is very clean and in a very nice area.  5 stars!  <3
Une superbe expérience au cœur de Paris avec l’impression de se sentir « chez nous » grâce à India!
India nous a très bien accueilli, son appartement est bien situé et confortable

L'appartement de India est magnifique, typiquement parisien avec beaucoup de petits détails. La chambre se trouve dans un bel immeuble haussmannien. Il est situé dans le Haut Marais, l’un des meilleurs quartiers de Paris. En tant que personne ayant vécu à Paris, je ne peux que recommander cet endroit. Nous avons passé un week-end extraordinaire à Paris chez India.

Nous reviendrons
India est très gentille et très accueillante. La chambre était très propre. Nous n'avons eu aucun soucis. Proche des transports il a été facile de visiter Paris.

Ce fut un réel plaisir de partager un peu de notre voyage avec India et son compagnon. L’accueil était chaleureux comme tous les échanges que nous avons eu (merci pour cette initiation à la guitare sèche). Malgré le partage des lieux communs, l’intimité de chacun est très bien respectée. Tout était propre et à disposition (draps, serviettes, savon, équipement de cuisine) pour un séjour confortable, sans compter toutes les bonnes adresses conseillées par la maîtresse de maison ! Nous avons trouvé là tout ce qui signifie être dans une chambre d’hôtes, en bref, merci pour tout !

Accueil chaleureux et jolie chambre en plein coeur de Paris !
Quartier très agréable et plein de petits restaurants à proximité.
India est une hôte très à l'écoute, qui nous a donné de bons conseils.

chambre claire, confortable et spacieuse pour un petit logement  parisien. Avec de quoi suspendre ranger aisément les vêtements.
Un bon rapport qualité-prix, un bel accueil et une disponibilité pour des horaires d'arrivée plus flexible ou des moments d'échange - si désirés - comme une grande discrétion si vous préférez rentrer directement dans l'espace qui vous est réservé.
Super accueil et emplacement idéal, on vous le conseille sans hésiter. :)
India est une hôte parfait, dans un charmant petit appartement dans le marais. L'emplacement est idéal, et les conseils aussi. A recommander sans hésiter
India est une super hote avec un appart qui lui ressemble, cool et original
Cosy room in a nice flat ideally placed. The interior decoration is amazing and India is a perfect host. Highly recommended!

India's place is great! Great location in a good price! The beds were comfortable and room was clean, the shower was amazing. The appartment is small and lacking a bit of privacy to our opinion. Besides, India is very kind and welcoming and helpful beyond expectations !
India is an amazing person!  Like her apartment.  It is the representation of the bohemian of Paris. It's perfeeect!!!

Ich hatte explizit nach einer Vermieterin gesucht, die den ursprünglichen Airbnb-Gedanken des persönlichen Kontakts und Austausches mit den Gästen bewusst lebt. Genau das habe ich bei India gefunden. Sie ist eine zuvorkommende Gastgeberin, die für Fragen und Gespräche gerne zur Verfügung steht, ohne sich dabei in irgendeiner Form aufzudrängen.
We stayed here for 4 nights and we loved it! Great location, lovely host and delightful apartment.
clear, clean, cosy, lovely host.
Very close to Metro, helpful advice and kind host.

India was lovely and welcoming and her home is the coolest place I've seen in my life. Towels and bedding was provided and the check in couldn't have been more uncomplicated! The location of the house was also absolutely perfect. It was my first time in Paris and Marais was a really fun place to see.
Top

Charming little flat in the middle of city, a lot of things in walking distance. A lot of interesting details like the winding staircase and the hand crafted kitchen. India is a very friendly and helpful host with a passion for art. The area is a good mix of a busy urban and relaxed bohemian neighbourbood.

Toppen bra placerad i Paris. Värden var väldigt välkomnande och hjälpsam. Jag rekommenderar.

The apartment was well located in Paris. The host was inviting and helpful. Totally recommend.
A very good ambience, and a very social host

India is a lovely person and a great host! The room is cozy and has everything you need for a great stay in Paris. On top, the location is adorable to explore the city! I definitely recommend this experience :)
Charming hostess, with a lovely place, clean and convenient. She offered many local suggestions. Would highly recommend her to a stay in Paris
India is super great host!

메트로랑 가까워서 좋았습니다
방도 화장실이랑 연결되어서 좋았구요
주방도 자유롭게 사용할수 있어서 좋았습니다 냄비 후라이팬 전자레인지 냉장냉동고 식기류 와인잔 젓가락 칼 도마 세탁기 등등 다있습니다. 
무엇보다 India 너무 유쾌하시고 미국사람이셔서 영어도 잘통해서 편했습니다.
This is a very authentic place, a real Parisien flat as you find them described in many  french novels.
Great stay! This is place is lovely and comfortable. Great location in the centre of the Marais. Highly recommended!!
위치 좋고 방 좋고 연락도 잘 되고 다 좋음. 굳이 단점을 찾자면 방음이 잘 안되는 것? 그래도 아주 훌룡한 숙소였습니다.

메트로도 집 바로 앞에 있고 근처에 시장도 있고 마트도 많고 쇼핑할 곳도 많고 좋았어요, 집은 사진보다 조금 아담하긴 했구, 크고 무거운 캐리어를 가지고 올라가기엔 계단이 좀 비좁고 높아여,, 가벼운짐이 있을 때 묵으면 더 좋을 것 같아요. 공동욕실을 쓰긴 했지만 겹치는 시간이 없어서 큰 불편함은 없었어요. 밤에 좀 추우니까 이불은 꼭 덮구 자면 좋을 것 같아요. 인디아는 친절해요, 다른 후기처럼 함께 많은 시간을 못 보낸게 아쉬울 정도로.. 파리 구경하기에 좋은 위치의 집이라고 생각해요!

India 정말 착하시고 귀여운 분이세요!!
집에서도 항상 좋은 냄새나고 침대도 너무 편해요!!!!!
샤워실도 깨끗합니다!!!
위치도 루브르 박물관 샤펠 성당 등 걸어서 20분 안에 갈 수 있었고
집 근처에 monoprix라는 큰 마트가 있어서 정말 편했어요!!

パリの中心に位置するこの場所はストライキ中のパリを観光するにはとても便利がよく、効率的に移動することができました。
キッチンを使い近くの市場で食材を買い、料理ができ、パリの日常を感じることができました。Indiaは沢山の情報を提供してくれます。明るくて、楽しくて、優しい。
また是非この場所に戻ってきたい。

Highly recommend this place! India is a great host who helps you have a better experience in Paris. She shows you all of the best food and drink spots and her place is in such a great location. Her personalised map linked to google also made our trip so much easier. Don’t think just book it!

Such a perfect Airbnb experience. India is the best host! I felt like a welcome guest in her home and thoroughly enjoyed our conversations. It was easy and relaxing to be there. The location is terrific for exploring Paris - a great neighborhood feel with close access to the big sites as well. India's place is charming and the bed is very comfortable!  I am eager to return on my next visit to Paris!
난 수원사는 한국인이다 일부러 번역 이상한거 있다해서 이런 말투로 남김 호스트 정말 착하고 영어 정말 잘하고 재즈바 가고싶다하니까 바로 초대해주고 상상도 못할 기억을 남겨주심 세탁기도 있어서 진짜 좋았고 너무 친하게 많이 말도 같이하고 자주 지내서 꼭 가면 정말 좋아해주시고 엄마같으심 나 믿고 가삼

No accommodation can be perfect. If the location is perfect, the rooms might be small. If the price is fantastic, the place will be on the fifth floor without a lift… .Airbnb guests need to choose the parameters that are most important for them which would render their stay a success.

My husband and I have come to Paris for 5 days to celebrate our 25th anniversary. Our number one concern was to find a place in a central location that would allow us to walk everywhere, which will have easy access to the metro and enjoy a lively night scene but still feel safe to walk home late at night. The location has exceeded our every expectation. The metro is on your doorstep, main city centre attractions (Pompidou centre, hotel de Ville, Notre dame, place de la Republique…) are a short walking distance away. “Le Marais” is a neighbourhood that never sleeps. It’s colourful, full of markets and shops, bistrots and bars. We came home at all hours of the night and never felt a moment of concern.

Our second concern when staying at someone’s house is the quality of sleep. India invested in quality mattresses, pillows and covers. We slept like babies! The room is completely isolated, so no noise comes in from the street.

The shower was wonderfully luxurious, and we’ve never experienced any discomfort for the fact it was shared.

“Bedroom in haut marais” is a charming old apartment which was lovingly restored by keeping its original charm.

The best part about this stay was hands down – its host. India fits perfectly in her surroundings, she’s wonderfully quirky, intelligent, original and creative. She will give you all the space and privacy you need and be a great friend to hang around with and get information from. She has generously given us advice, help and her friendship and made our trip all the more memorable.

This apartment listing honestly describes the advantages and disadvantages of the place, if you take the time to read it carefully, you’ll have a perfect idea of what you’ll be getting, with no surprises.

I’ve been to Paris many times before and have always stayed with Airbnb people, this has been my best experience so far! Thank you India, be definitely seeing you next time I’m in town.
India is a super nice host, and location is really good, I highly recommend this place.

India is very hospitable! The apartment is inventive, cozy and clean. We can sincerely recommend it.

Dies ist Airbnb wie man es sich so gerne wünscht! Für Euch, die Ihr gerne Kontakt mit den Gastgebern haben wollt, ist dieses Privatzimmer in einer originellen “typischen” Pariser Wohnung das richtige! 
Wie India richtig auf Ihrer Seite vermerkt, nichts für Leute die einfach nur ein Zimmer mit maximaler Privatsphäre haben wollen. 
Wir hatten ein perfektes Wochenende in Paris bei einer sehr netten Gastgeberin in einem originellen schönen Apartment, in einem bezaubernden Viertel ! 
Immer gerne wieder!
India's place was amazing! Very well located, close to Centre Pompidou and Picasso museum. Also the communication and check-in was fast and easy. Loved the place. We hope to come back soon!

Great place to stay in one of the best neighbourhoods of Paris, centrally located and very easy to discover the rest of the city (we did most things walking). The apartment was clean, authentic and comfortable. India is a great host, she was very friendly, easy-going and gave us many local tips!

India’s place is in a very well located part of the city. The nearby metro gives easy access to main destinations. There are many restaurants, shops, etc. nearby. India is an excellent host, willing to share her knowledge of the city. The room is quite cozy for two people, but India is willing to share her living space. My wife and I had a wonderful experience staying here.
India’s place is in a great location. She describes her space well and is so very friendly. Have a special time in Paris!

Really love India so much for her considerate details such as check in instruction, locker information, recommended restaurant and local brand cosmetics. We do enjoy the stay with India and she treated us as friends and was willing to share thoughts with us. We spent some nights chatting with each other to have culture immersion. 
For the room, the bed smelt so good and soft to have a nice dream. The tiny balcony is my favorite place to stay in India’s house. You can have a cup of coffee watching people and cars at street. Besides, the location is pretty nice with 3 exits of metro nearby. Wherever you go, it only took us within 30 min. Perfect location!
The apartment is well located and nicely decorated
Couldn’t have been better. Apartment was beautiful and equipped with everything I needed. The host was very kind!! and the location was really great. Would definitely stay here again!
India's place is delightfully quirky. The apartment was clean and spacious for two guests. There were lots of little details too which made you feel at home. We would definitely stay there again!
Great location to explore Paris from. We were able to do lots of our things by foot, especially with Le Marais right at the doorstep.

India’s apartment is quaint and comfortable.  My wife and I really enjoyed our short stay!!  Bringing our luggage up the tight spiral staircase was a little challenging, but fun and well worth the effort.  India is very personable and knowledgeable about the area and it was a great pleasure to visit with her.

India is a super host who makes you welcomed and comfortable staying at her appartment. Her place is central, very clean and has many of her personal touches making it enjoyable and helping get to know Paris life style. Definitely recommended to friends and fellow travelers!
Lovely host

The Apartement is in the best location. It is very nice and cosy.
India is superbe!!

India is the best!!! Great host, wonderful conversations, and she's fantastically funny. She takes good care of her guests, all the amenities are there, really nothing could be better. And of course her English is really perfect, crystal clear, so you'll have no problem understanding her. Just don't ask for English lessons!!! 

The location is great, very easy to walk to a bunch of major Paris sites, esp. Centre Pompidou and Notre Dame. The area can be a little pricey, but then again, so is all of Paris. Kitchen is very nice, and lots of nice touches all around the house. It feels very comfortable to live in the house, you'll feel right at home. We recommend! You won't regret it.

India is one of the most friendliest hosts we ever stayed with. I will always remember the conversations we had over a bottle of wine she opened for us. Her place is in a great location. Easy walk/ tram ride to all the tourist sights. Some great restaurants around the place. She gave us very nice food suggestions and local tips. We would have never been able to watch a free movie at the open air theater if not for her which turned out to be a great evening. Her place itself is very interesting and has very creative touches. She provided us all the required amenities. We definitely got a very Parisian feel at her place. Highly recommend to future guests.
India’s place was so unique and genuinely her. She has thought of everything a traveler may need and was very accommodating and made us feel at home.
This place was just what I was looking for. Clean, friendly, easy to live in environment. Great location in a nice neighborhood convenient to the metro. And India is really a super host!
Great place in an amazing location, highly recommend!
India was super nice and helpfull, as well as welcomming! Her place was unique and we felt like home there. We would like to come back

숙소 위치기 마레지구나 메트로 역과 가까워서 좋았어요! 이동하기에 적당한 위치인거 같아요! 호스트분과 독립된 공간이여서 생활하는데에 문제없어요! 가끔 만나면 안부 전하는 정도예요! 조금 놀랐던건 볼일 보는 화장실과 샤워실이 따로 있는거 그래서 좀 놀랐는데 프랑스에서는 일반적인 거라고 하니 신기했어요!ㅋㅋ 생활적인 부분에서는 선풍기랑 공동 냉장고와 세탁기가 있어서 좋았어요! 호스트분도 유쾌하신 분이여서 좋습니당!!

정말 추천해요!! 마레지구 북쪽에 있어서 접근성도 좋고, 동네는 오히려 조용해서 이용하기 편리했어요. 인디아는 정말 친절하고 신경을 많이써주는 호스트구요. 에펠탑이나 샹젤리제 쪽 주로 구경하신다면 위치가 베스트는 아닐수도 있겠지만 저한테는 위치도 최상이었어요 메트로 역이 가까워서 사실상 어디라도 갈 수 있구요. 샤워기도 따뜻한 물 잘 나오고, 사진에서보다 훨씬 깔끔하고 귀여운 방이에요.

India was a fantastic host! She welcomed us in her home, and allowed us to have a cosy experience. The bedroom is perfect for two people, with an attached place to shower. There is tea and coffee in the kitchen. The location is very central and there are bars, restaurants all around. There is a market called Les Enfants Rouge where you can grab fresh groceries or a meal if you'd like right around the corner. India knows a lot about Paris,  and can give you great advice. We had an overall amazing experience, and would recommend you to stay here too.
India is a very good host. Her place is very cozy and nice. The location is great and she will give you some helpful advice on things around. The room is clean. She has a narrow stairs to her house.
Great location and India  has all.the local tips and  knowledge you'll  need. Great place for a stay in Paris. Thanks so much!
This place was great! Great location, close to metros and public transit options, and within a bit-so-far walking distance to The Louvre and other landmarks. Would recommend!
A beautiful and stylish apartment located in Le Marais. India was a friendly and informative host who gave great local recommendations. Would stay again!
India was a great host, and we enjoyed very much staying with her during our trip. The place is also conveniently located, cozy and clean. Would highly recommend.
India is very nice host. And the place is lovely and cozy. I really wanna stay here again :)
Nice host in a fun neighborhood by a beautiful park.
We really enjoyed staying with India! She is super nice, helpful and her little apartment is very charming. We would stay with her any time again!

India has a lovely place, very clean and perfectly located for good access and area. . She is an excellent host & helpful in organizing and answering all our questions immediately.  We felt welcomed. I have to commend India as she took the trouble to have my charger sent to a friend in town who was visiting as well to get to me.. she didnt need to do that but she is a lovely person, helpful and friendly.  You will love it at her place.!

If it’s your first time traveling to Paris but you want to feel like a local, stay with India. Her home is a sparkling clean work of art and centrally located. My trip wouldn’t have been have as great if it weren’t for India. She was always there to answer questions, had all sorts of recommendations, was exceptionally generous, and knew so much about her neighborhood and city.
A cute little apartment at a very nice location, well connected by metro, great hospitality and perfect for solo travellers like me :))

We love Paris the first day we arrived.But without India,our trip in Paris wouldn't be a wonderful experience.She is totally amazing,we were affected by her honest,sincere and her passion for enjoying life.You can always find interesting decorations in her house.We will cherish the beautiful memories with India ,and we really wish to see her again in the future.Hug,India.Love from Hu and Matt.

You go to India's place to have a truly AirBnb experience. She is a great host! She was very kind with us, gave us privacy and was available for us if we needed it. Her place is walking distance from the Notre Dame and  coffee places and bakeries. The room, bathroom and shared spaces were sparkly clean. She was even kind enough to invited us to a dinner party with her friends (the food was delicious). I highly recommend her place to have a great stay in Paris!!!
Very good.

India的房间非常的干净舒适！一切都很方便！位置非常棒！在市中心！去哪儿都很近…楼下有超市和地铁站！还有很多好吃的餐厅！后面的街上还有很多中国超市和餐厅！India非常友好！在一起聊天开心！如果你来巴黎~真的非常推荐她家的民宿！
India's house are very clean and comfortable! Everything is very convenient! The location is especially good! In the center of the Paris! It is very convenient to go anywhere! There are many delicious restaurants downstairs!  Walk to the metro station in one minute ! The India's room is the best home in Paris!

My friend and I were traveling through Europe and Paris was our last stop. India was so helpful in getting to know the area in only 3 days. The place was perfectly located, very walkable. Would definitely stay again, thanks India!

India's place is very comfortable, easy to access by metro, and pretty close to Notre Dame and other interesting places. She has this map with restaurants, bakerys, etc., by type of food and price, very helpful. And she allows you to self check-in, so you don't need to worry about the time of arriving or leaving.
India was a great host! She was very hospitable and was kind to us throughout. The accommodation itself was clean, comfortable, and cozy. We had a fantastic stay.

지하철역에서 가깝고 방이 청결하고
침대가 트윈이라 좋았습니다. 
샤워실은 불편하지 않았지만 화장실은 약간 멀었습니다. 
2층에 있던 집이었는데 엘레베이터가 없어서 캐리어를 들고 올라가느라 힘들었습니다. 
하지만 인디아는 아주 친절했고 정말 좋은 사람입니다!

A very cool, quirky space in the middle of a very nice part of town. 

India is very helpful with her tips and was a very friendly host.

The space is quite communal so if that is not your thing then I would recommend booking somewhere else. If, like us, it is your thing then I would recommend this home.

We stay 5night in India's home,she's very nice and we had good time in paris.Everything is  convince and ver clean! Thanks !
我们一共两个女生在她家住的，麻雀虽小五脏俱全，地理位置非常棒，冬天暖气的温度也调的刚好，她还有些小魔法在房子里给我们展示了一下，很有趣！如果在巴黎玩住这是很棒的选择了，主要卫生真的很干净。

India’s hospitality as well as the amazing location of the apartment made for the perfect Paris experience!
