Tout était parfait : le logement, le quartier ainsi que la fluidité des instructions d'Inès. Je ne peux que vivement recommander pour un séjour à Paris !
Appartement idéal pour découvrir le cœur de Paris ! Très bien décoré et plein de charme. Localisation idéale !!!

Appartement conforme à l’annonce, très sympa et calme 
Idéalement situé.
Inès est très réactive. Je le recommande.
Appartement fonctionnel et bien situé, je recommande.
Excellente communication et emplacement très pratique!

Appartement mignon et bien agencé, 
Idéal pour un séjour sur paris !
Décoration de bon goût et emplacement parfait, rien à ajouter. Au sujet de mon arrivé, tout était bien expliqué. Mon séjour était très agréable.
L'appartement est très propre et bien situé et il est effectivement plus grand que sur les photos. Super rapport qualité-prix. Je recommande.

L'arrivée dans l'appartement se fait en autonomie, c'est un réel plus car il y a un stress en moins.
L'appartement est vraiment cosy et je me suis sentie très bien dedans. La salle de bain est en effet petite mais l'ensemble étant bien aménagé cela ne m'a pas posé de problème :)

Je reviendrais avec plaisir.
Petit appartement agréable, au calme, sur deux niveaux, dans un quartier très central. Très bonne communication avec Inès.
Appart cosy bien placé. Attention juste aux personnes trop grandes dans la salle de bain !

Appartement très bien située dans Paris avec un accès métro très proche. Possibilité de se rendre à pied en visite dans énormément de lieux ( place de la république 10 min, Marais etc...).
Quartier vivant et animé.
Une très agréable semaine passée sur Paris.

Quartier décevant, voire dangereux.
Logement cosy, propre, semblable aux descriptions.
Réactivité de Inès très appréciable, arrangeante pour le dépôt des bagages.
À éviter en période canicule.. Car sous les toits.

J'ai passé un agréable séjour dans cet appartement malgré la canicule! Le quartier est très pratique pour rejoindre différents lieux parisiens. L'appartement est fonctionnel. A noter toutefois un escalier un peu étroit pour monter à l'étage couchage et une salle de bain très basse de plafond (pas pratique pour les grands). L'accueil est sympathique avec une petite attention bienvenue pour le petit déjeuner.
Inès et son conjoint ont été très accueillants et disponibles. Le logement est spacieux et confortable. Merci pour tout !

Superbe studio, proche du métro, commerces et de la Gare de Lyon. 
Idéal pour notre court séjour d’une nuit. 
Très propre et bien agencé ! 
Le quartier est le seul bémol, quant aux fréquentations.
Logement et hôte au top ne pas hésité a réserver pour visiter la capital

Le duplex d'Ines est très bien agencé, cosy et au coeur d'un quartier vivant!
Attention aux grands pour la salle de bains qui est un peu basse de plafond.
Appartement conforme à la description, bonne communication avec Inès, très bon séjour.
Très belle appartement! Nous avons une très bonne soirée! L’hôte était très sympathique, et tout le nécessaire était présent dans l’appartement.
Un appartement vraiment très agréable, et un hôte particulièrement attentionné ! Je reviendrai !
Appartement très bien placé, décoré et aménagé! Inès a été très réactive, vraiment tout était parfait !!

L'appartement est idéalement situé, à proximité, à pied ou en métro, de tous les centres d'intérêt. La literie est confortable et il règne un calme absolu (rarissime à Paris !). Pour être honnêtes, nous avons été déçus à notre arrivée : le ménage avait été mal fait et c'était assez désagréable de devoir nettoyer soi-même les toilettes quand on paye 140 euros par nuit. Heureusement, il a suffi d'un coup de téléphone à Inès pour régler le problème : le ménage a été refait le lendemain et nous avons beaucoup apprécié sa réactivité ! Finalement, un très beau séjour dans ce logement.

Appartement bien situé, Ines et son ami on était très réactif, appartement sympa, 
salle de bain adapté au gens de petite (1m70 max pour avoir du confort au niveau de la douche).
Merci pour l’hospitalité

séjour très agréable dans un logement très beau et soigné 
au top
Joli appartement plein de charme, qui est plus grand que ce que j'imaginais en voyant les photos ! Inès est très réactive, ce fut un plaisir :)

L'appartement est calme, confortable et décoré avec goût. Il est plus grand qu'il ne parait sur les photos ! Attention tout de même à la salle de bain qui est basse sous plafond. Le petit déjeuner (avec tout ce qu'il faut !) est très appréciable !
Emplacement idéal , l'appartement d'Inès est un pied à terre idéal pour visiter Paris !
Un petit appartement avec cachet en plein coeur de Paris
Un petit appart très cosy très propre en plein cœur de paris
Logement cosy et idéalement placé si l’on souhaite découvrir Paris à pieds.
appartement très propre, sympa car en mezzanine. seule la sdb basse de plafond est peu pratique. très bon accueil d'Inès
Logement joliment décoré et très propre. RAS. Il est bien situé et très proche du métro.
Bon rapport qualité prix et bien placé. Par contre attention pour les personnes de plus 1,70 la salle de bain est très basse de plafond.

ines super réactive 
arrivée tardive parfaitement tarėe
jus d'Orange... brioche... cafe ... thė parfait
tout pour cuisiner et un vrai four
merci pour tout 2 nuits parfaites
sejour parfait Ines et top je recommande
Le séjour était top, merci!

Petit nid parisien typique.
Accueil chaleureux, merci.

L'appartement d'Inès était impeccable (propreté, appartement chaleureux, joliment décoré et bien organisé) pour ces quelques jours à Paris, avec des petites attentions (petit déj prévu notamment). Hyper central et dans le même temps, très calme.
Appartement charmant très propre et très bien situé. Inès nous a très bien accueillis. Nous étions 3 et très à l’aise. Je recommande
L’appartement d’Ines est très joliment décoré, et il possède en réalité deux lits. Il est idéalement situé et très bien agencé, et l’accueil fut très bon. Je vous le conseille !

L’appartement est super bien placé avec tout ce dont on pourrait avoir envie ou besoin accessible à pied 
Inès est tres réactive et agréable, je recommande vraiment cet apartment si vous comptez faire une petite virée sur Paris
Great place super cool flat

Amazing location in central Paris, much better and cheaper than any hotel. The duplex is like a big studio apartment downstairs, with separate second bedroom and bathroom upstairs.
Very comfortable double bed (upstairs) and single (downstairs) with lots of towels and spare bedding.
The kitchen has two electric rings, toaster, oven, microwave, fridge, coffee maker with coffee, lots of crockery and cutlery, table and chairs. The tv box has Youtube if you fancy relaxing.
The supermarket around the corner sells everything you need.
You should know: fourth floor with no elevator; very quiet except when it rains on the roof of the upstairs room when earplugs are recommended if you are a light sleeper; bathroom ceiling is quite low, but no problem for people of average height, I am 5'8" (171cm) and it was fine.
Inès replies instantly to any questions. Key pickup was from an agency a few minutes walk away, very convenient.
Highly recommended for the fantastic central and quiet location, comfortable beds, amazing value compared to a hotel, well equipped kitchen and helpful host.
We had a great stay at Ines’ place. There are a lot of stairs so I would keep that in mind. Location was convenient.

Clean, well appointed, comfortable, and only a short walk to Rue Montorgueil (One of our favorites), the Seine, the Louvre, and other historic sites.  The bathroom is quite small, and if you are taller than 5'5, be prepared to squat.  We brought a chair upstairs which made doing our hair a little easier.

Ines was very responsive and it was centrally located to certain extent.  No complain there. However- there is no elevator so hiking up to 4th floor (5th floor for US standard) was not pleasant at all specially with bags in those narrow stairs.   Living room was cute (even though floor seems dusty) but had to take another set of stairs (duplex) to go to a very small bedroom.  Bathroom was the worst.  One cannot stand up completely, one needs to duck down while using bathroom and shower.  Water from shower would take time to drain completely.  Apt is  located at a very quite end of a somewhat busy street, it felt bit unsafe with questionable people on the street.   I was there for a night so i just dealt with it.  Will not be back at this apt even for a night let alone couple of nights.  Price per night is totally unfair.  I would rather pay more for a better place.

The place is in a great location and seemed to be a good value for the price. Be aware of the low bathroom ceiling - neither my girlfriend nor I could stand up in the bathroom or shower (she is 5'8, I am 5'11)
Cute little apartment in a central and colorful area ;) Probably not ideal for anyone close to 6 feet tall or difficulty with stairs. I really enjoyed staying here and would book again.
By far, the best flat for this price. 30minutes away from the Louvre, 5 from Notre Dame, 15 from hop-on hop-off bus and so on. If available, take it!
Great space, great location!
Ines was really nice and kind to us. She made great effort to welcome us.
Very well positioned apartment in a nice area and 1minute-walk to the metro station. The apartment is like you can see it in the photos. Ceilings are a bit low, be careful if you are a tall person!

Ines is a wonderful host with the cutest apartment. She was accommodating of our requests and her house is fully equipped with everything you need. Her space is extremely clean and has personal touches to make the stay even more pleasant. If we ever go back to Paris, we will 100% stay at her place.

We had a great stay and really enjoyed the location. The neighborhood has
many lively cafés and we always felt safe.  It was easy to walk into the center of Paris, and the metro station was very close and convenient as well. The apartment was very cute.  It was extremely clean and the bed was very comfortable.  The stairs into the upper level are a bit  steep and the shower is a a little tricky if you are tall , but it really wasn’t a problem
Very cute apartment! Clean, stylish & comfortable. Would definitely stay here again.

Inizialmente ci sono stati un po’ di problemi , non capendoci bene sul orario dell check-in. Ma poi tutto risolto. Casa pulita , molto carina e accogliente. Unico difetto 4 piano senza ascensore. Per persone con problemi o valige troppo pesanti potrebbe essere un po’ faticoso..
Very nice appartment, good location for exploring Paris and easy access to and from Gare du Nord. Host was very helpful with checking in and communication was good
Perfect stay, perfect welcome, perfect place! Highly recommendable
Highly recommended!  Great location
This was a really good place to stay - flat, area, communication all perfect. Also thanks for the snacks !
Nice place in the heart of Paris! Highly recommend!

Joli appartement décoré, parquet magnifique! Nous avons réalisé un shooting et il a été à la hauteur de nos attentes. Anne et Ulysse ont été adorables, le logement est idéalement situé.

Petit bémol uniquement pour ceux qui veulent faire un shooting photo, absolument pas dérangeant pour les autres : L'appart manque un peu de luminosité pour la photo en hiver, prévoyez le matériel.
rien a redire, c etait tres bien
Un des plus beaux appartements de la capitale !
Appartement très beau, agréable, vous avez tout à disposition que ce soit dans l’appartement ou dans le quartier et hôtes très sympas, nous recommandons sans hésitation !
Appartement superbe et lumineux
un appartement très très sympa, très propre et il y a de decor l'historique. Conseille forcement.
Nous recommandons :)
Excellent appartement, très bel emplacement et surtout hôtes très chaleureux.

Le logement est superbe et agréable. 
Un véritable havre de paix romantique, idéalement situé, en plein coeur de Paris.
Tout y est raffiné, propre et soigné. 
J'y ai passé un séjour fabuleux et ai appris beaucoup de choses sur ce quartier historique (entre Notre Dame et le Panthéon) grâce aux hôtes qui sont très accueillants et chaleureux. 
Merci de mettre de bijou à notre disposition!
Je recommande à 200% !
Que du plaisir, merci et à bientôt. L'équipe Rivecour

Hôtes accueillants et avec une grande compréhension. Le lieu est vraiment remarquable !
J’ai loué ce Airbnb pour tourner un clip avec beaucoup de gens (un peu plus que prévu). Malgré ce petit débordement Anne a été très compréhensive et nous avons pu résoudre les choses à l’amiable.

L’appartement est magnifique, fidèle aux photos. Les hôtes sont des personnes adorables toujours disponibles et se mettent à disposition en cas de nécessité. Tout était parfait, notre séjour était très agréable. Recommandé à 200% les hôtes et leur appartement ✨✨
magnifique appartement idéalement situé au cœur de paris et des hôtes très très serviables. Je recommande chaudement
Appartement magnifique! Tout était parfait.
Très bel et très confortable appartement, où l’on se sent tout de suite bien, à ressentir le parquet sous ses pieds et à admirer la décoration. Très bien situé.
Super accueille, grand salon super agréable!!
Toujours un plaisir de venir dans le logement d'Anne&Ulysse ! merci à eux !
Un appartement vraiment unique et des hôtes au top ! Merci a eux !!
Appartement magnifique et tres bien decoré. Ulysse et ses parents sont tres disponibles et sympathiques, un excellent air bnb !
Ulysse et sa famille m'ont tres bien acceuilli. L'appartement est tres spacieux, tres bien decore, hyper bien place. C est calme, on s'y sent bien. J'y reviendrais des que je peux ! Un perfect 10/10.
Un accueil très chaleureux, un emplacement parfait et un appartement très bien équipé, propre, tel que sur les photos. Tous les ingrédients sont réunis pour passer un séjour parisien parfait !
Je vous recommande ce logement. Tout était parfait
Tout est parfait!

Recommandé vivement bien situé , st Michel à pied.. hôte très réceptif et sympa il est à notre écoute, appartement confortable, et bien équipé 
Conforme à l annonce à voir mieux ...
Accueil formidable. Emplacement tres agréable. Appartepent charmant et calme. Nous avons apprécié ce logement et le recommandons avec plaisir.
Super merci
Tout était parfait, Ulysse est chaleureux, accueillant et bienveillant. Nous l'avons trouvé très disponible pour que notre court séjour se passe au mieux!

Superbe appartement très lumineux, avec beaucoup d'espace, de plantes vertes et dont la multitude d'objets anciens lui donne un air de petit musée (on passe un certain temps a en faire le tour).  Parfaitement conforme aux photos. La cuisine est parfaite pour cuisiner ce qui était très agréable en cette période de confinement nous empêchant de tester la multitude de restaurants aux alentours... Un appartement atypique dans lequel on se sent bien et que je relouerais sans hésiter.
Très beau séjour- merci beaucoup!
L'appartemment est super! Très beau et lumineux, à coté de Notre Dame! L'accueil est aussi très bien.

L'appartement d'Ulis est très lumineux et calme avec un joli décor! À notre arrivée, on nous attendait dans l'appartement avec de délicieux bonbons. Dans le réfrigérateur, il y avait de l'eau, de la bière, du cola, du lait et des céréales pour le petit déjeuner! L'appartement avait tout ce dont vous avez besoin: literie propre, assez de serviettes, la cuisine avait du sel, des épices, de l'huile d'olive, de la sauce balsamique, du sucre, des serviettes de table! Très bonne qualité internet! Merci aux parents d'Ulysse Anna et Jean-Luc! En partant, ils nous ont beaucoup aidés! Nous avons gentiment convenu que nos valises seraient avec eux pendant plusieurs heures, car nous avions un départ tardif. De plus, le père d'Ulysse, Jean-Luc, nous a aidés à baisser nos valises et a ouvert les portes de l'entrée de la rue, afin que nous puissions facilement passer! Merci beaucoup!
Quartier bien placer mais très dispendieux
Super endroit, et très bon rapport qualité-prix! Merci Ulysse!
Tous etait parfait chez Ulysse! Tres propre, la communication etait super, vraiment merci pour tous!
Warm welcoming, amazing space, and beautiful area. I highly recommend staying here.
Beautiful appartement located in the center of Paris

Anne was absolutely amazing, being so helpful and kind.
The flat is very charming and lovely to stay in ( had to rest and stay a lot in) 
It is light, very well thought and so pleasant to leave in.
Location is great.
It was the best place I ever stayed in Paris and go there very often
Very nice and well decorated apartment, well located. I will recommend  I enjoyed my stay
Lovely place. Makes you feel like home. Would definitely visit again!

This apartment is just wonderful.  It is large, tastefully (and interestingly!) decorated, with many amenities. Anne goes over the top to make sure you are comfortable -- she even brought us fresh flowers to decorate the apartment and left us a bottle of wine, refreshments in the fridge, and fresh fruit. The bathroom is large and has everything you need - abundant soft towels, toiletries, etc.   The apartment also has a desk and several tables, so it works very well for working from home.  The only minor complaint I could have -- which is not the fault of the owners -- is that the floors (beautiful as they are) are very old and thus very creaky, and the noise from people walking in the apartment above can be very loud (and they seem to be walking around at all times of the night, including 4am).  I would highly recommend ear plugs for any light sleepers!

Anne & Ulysse’s place was very clean, lovely and amazing! It’s very spacious considering the usual apartment size in Paris. We definitely had a wonderful time at her place. Check in and out process was so easy! I’d highly recommend this place to other place!

Logeren bij goede vrienden. Zo voelde deze prachtige plek. Als een warm bad. We waren geen toerist maar leefden te midden van de parijzenaar en zijn ritme. Het stijlvolle interieur, de liefde in ieder detail, de centrale lokatie met zowel bezienswaardigheden als dagelijkse benodigdheden op loopafstand. Gewoonweg perfect. 

We waren er met onze kinderen van 14 en 16 en de lokatie was een uitkomst voor hen. Konden heerlijk hun eigen gang gaan. 

En dan Anne zelf. En haar man. Zo warm, liefdevol, charmant en gastvrij. Alsof we hen al jaren kenden zo vertrouwd. 

Mijn man en ik hopen dit najaar of komende winter zeker terug te komen. We missen het nu al.
We had a fantastic stay.  The place was spotless and every detail was so thought out. Anne was extremely helpful and very kind.  Great location. Would definitely recommend it.
Great location and amazing appartement full of French style! We loved it and would recommend it to any couple visiting Paris!
Anne was a really wonderful host. The apartment is in an amazing location with tons of space. Would definitely recommend this stay!

Super Charming place. Enjoyed our stay a lot. Although there was a misunderstanding with the host about the piano and noise complaints incident one night. We did our best to communicate at our best and apologized regardless
Great location. Warm and welcoming hosts they made our return to Paris after 49 years a memorable one. I’d return here if I  we came back to Paris again!
Wonderful charming Parisian living in a perfect location, and brilliant hosts.

We had a wonderful stay at Anne’s beautiful apartment. Anne made us feel extremely welcome, and could not have done more to make sure we had a great time in Paris. The decor was stunning, the bed was comfortable and the location was perfect (less than a 10 minute walk to Notre Dam). 

I would highly recommend Anne’s apartment to anyone and I look forward to staying with her again in the future.

Anne was wonderful & in constant communication. She was very thoughtful in bringing my wife flowers for her birthday.

The apartment was in a great location near the metro, shops and restaurants. The photos represent the apartment perfectly. 

We truly enjoyed staying at this apartment and highly recommend it!

Anne的房子很温馨也很干净,屋内有很多绿植,并且还准备了水果和点心,入住很简单,Anne给了很多帮助,并且她就住在对面,有什么问题可以随时沟通,非常方便｡房子的位置也很方便,出门就有地铁,停车场在距离步行5min的地方｡
这里有个插曲,退房两个星期后,我突然发现自己的东西落在了anne的房子里,anne人很好,耐心帮我沟通cleaners,并且答应帮我寄回国内,真心的感谢Anne｡她本可以不这么做｡
Definitely would stay here again! Anne was so kind and accommodating! The location was great, really close to the Metro but not in a tourist-y area.
Great location

This was one of the most beautiful apartments I’ve stayed in. It was a bit big for one person / one bedroom but I enjoyed the space and how conveniently located it was. Would be great for a couple or a small family. Anne helped me with a dinner reservation by phone and left nice touches that soothed me upon arriving. Easy walk to the 1st, the famous cafes and boutiques of the 6th, and to the Marais. I actually did not take the metro except for the arrival from CDG via the RER, which was an easy walk along the Seine to the apartment. Note that you may not wish to go via the RER if you have a lot of luggage, since there aren’t lifts / elevators, or escalators.

We absolutely loved our stay! The apartment was in a perfect location, close to the metro and walking distance to Notre dam and plenty of great restaurants. The apartment itself is large, bright, and beautifully decorated. It was the perfect Parisian apartment. Anne was a wonderful host- she had fresh fruit, wine and chocolates for us on arrival, and went above and beyond to help us during our stay. She also had a cot, high chair, and plenty of toys for our 1 year old. We would highly recommend staying at Anne & Ulysse’s place!

We absolutely loved staying in Anne and Ulysse's apartment which is a stunning and stylish place to stay, full of interesting & quirky features. Whilst it felt very luxurious it was also extremely comfortable and we enjoyed relaxing there, and just enjoying the apartment, when we weren't exploring the city. It's in a great location - just walk to the end of the road and there's a metro as well as an open-air market (not sure if this is just on a Saturday or on other days too?)  and  a row of lovely local food shops - butchers, bakers, greengrocer and cheese shop and also plenty of bars and restaurants. Anne is an excellent host and the lovely fruit, chocolate and wine she left for us were much appreciated.  We would definitely stay here again!
Great location and vey quaint details inside the apartment. Hosts were very helpful and responsive.
Anne and Ulysse made our family of 5 feel very welcome. Great location, homely, very Parisian decor and warm hosts.

A fantastic host, apartment, and location. Anne truly made our visit to Paris special with exceptional hospitality checking in, during our stay, and while checking out. The apartment was immaculate and Anne's decorating of the apartment showed a level of attention to detail not normally seen in short term rental apartments. The location is convenient to walk to many of Paris's top sights as well as being surrounded by excellent restaurants and cafes. We would highly recommend staying here and look forward to returning one day for a longer visit.
A wonderful apartment in the heart of Paris with everything you could need. Anne was an amazing host and her hospitality went above and beyond. Highly recommend.

From the second I walked into the house I felt like I never wanted to leave. Even tho I was in Paris, I wanted to extend my stay longer just so I can hang out in this beautiful home. It’s such a whimsical feeling that plays on all your senses. It’s definitely a magical romantic experience.
Amazing apartment very well located. Anne is very welcoming and was very helpful.
This was our favorite place on our travels.  Anne was lovely and everything was beautiful.  It even smelled pretty.  Our only regret is that we could not stay longer

I had short stay with mom and 15 month old daughter at Anne's place. It was very nice stay that we fell at home, Anne and Ulysse welcome us on the street and show us around the apartment and a lots of tips to travel around Paris. Anne takes care of my kid so well, she prepared baby cot, high chair and even little rice for me to cook asian food for her, and many drinks, fruit, chocolate at welcome. There are so many toys for my kid she loves to stay and play. The apartment is close to many shop so we can cook our dinner after travel around Paris in day time, and we met nice neighbours. Amenities (shampoo, shower gel, ...) are plenty and very high quality, my mom loves to use. I will definitely come back in future travel to Paris. Thank you so much Anne.
Anne & Ulysse were so friendly and communicative, and their home is simply beautiful! It has so much style and is very centrally located. I will definitely stay again next time I’m in Paris!
Anne & Ulysses place is wonderful and charming and they are incredible hosts! Would highly recommend!

This property exceeded all our expectations- every detail was thought of and the pictures were 100% accurate. Great location - quiet yet only meters away from cafes and the action. The host was lovely! Couldn’t rate it better

The location for our stay was ideal. Several shops were a short walking distance from the apartment. Also just a short walk to most metro stops. The host was super friendly and made sure we were all settled and had everything we needed. It really felt like a home and had no trouble adjusting to the area (aside from the jet lag).

Our stay here was nothing less than perfect! Anne made us feel at home and the organisation and communication were flawless. Location, style and general feel for this property is simply unprecedented We will be returning for sure ❤️
Wonderful stay and excellent host!
Good

Anne and Ulysses apartment and hospitality was very beautiful and thoughtful. Anne was very helpful and accommodating and their stylish touches and generosity made this a very special stay. The apartment is quiet yet perfectly located, you are very central and a fantastic market to buy delicious fresh food is on your doorstep. It is a very comfortable space and Anne is very kind and helpful. I would highly recommend if you want a fantastic stay in paris!

한마디로 완벽한 숙소였습니다. It’s Perfect!!!
- 교통 : 파리 중심부에 위치하고 있고, 7호선이 코앞에 그 외에도 조금만 걸으면 RER이나 Bus 등 교통 접근성이 아주 뛰어납니다. 리옹역과도 가깝구요.
- 호스트: Anne은 세심하고 친철하셨어요. 기차를 놓치는 바람에 체크인 시간이 급 늦어졌음에도 이해해주는 건 물론, 저를 달래(?)주셨어요 ㅋㅋㅋ밤 늦은 시간 도착했음에도 기다리고 계시다가 들어가는 것을 도와주셨습니다. 그리고 집안 곳곳에 섬세하게 신경쓴 살림살이들이 있어서 원래 제 서울집보다도 잘 지냈네요. 자그마한 웰커밍 기프트들이나 냉장고에 준비해주신 음료까지 ㅠㅜ 감동
- 인테리어: 지립니다. 이게 빠리지앵의 감각인가? 싶을 정도로 앤티크하면서도 감각적인 소품들이 구석구석 있고, 폭신한 쇼파가 2개나 있고 침대도 좋고 욕실 부엌 곳곳이 예뻐서 계속 사진 찍었어요. 킬링 포인트는 거실 티테이블에 있는 화병 가득한 장미꽃(생화)...! 
- 청결하고, 없는 거 없고(수건, 식기 등... 샴푸린스도 뭔가 좋은 거임요. 머리가 찰랑찰랑!! 향수도 있음 심지어), 동네도 안전하고(바로 앞이 파출소고, 동네 분위기가 차분하고 깔끔) 엘리베이터 있어요. 저는 춥지도 덥지도 않은 계절에 갔는지라 냉난방은 잘 모르겠네요

This apartment is an absolute dream for two people, the sofa bed would be fine for kids. It’s quintessential Paris, just walk away from the traffic and you find hidden gems in a beautiful neighbourhood.

Possibly the most beautiful place to stay in Paris? Myself and my friends had a wonderful stay here and the host was always available to answer any questions! 

Perfect location in a perfect apartment, will definitely be visiting again! Thank you for making us all feel so welcome!
Wonderful place in heart of Latin quarter . The full Parisian experience with such a gracious and kind host and all the convenience of modern life.
Anne was such an incredible host! The apartment is so adorable and well situated, I would love to stay again soon.

Beautiful apartment with loads of character, and the host was so warm and friendly. There is early morning construction happening on the floor below, which woke us up around 7am each morning- this was a bit of a nightmare for a relaxing vacation. There is nothing the host can do if this is happening in another apartment, but it might be worth checking to see if the renovation is completed if you plan to stay here and prefer to sleep past 7.

What a fantastic and supremely Parisian apartment in a fantastic location! The flat is amazing - so well decorated and interesting with little quirky items that worked well together. Anne was thoughtful and attentive and a fantastic host. Would definitely recommend for other air bnb travellers! Will be coming back

Anne’s apartment in the Latin Quarter of Paris is positively enchanting.  Anne made us feel special with flowers, fruit and chocolates.  We had everything we needed and then some.  The spacious living room with relaxing sofas were welcome after a long day exploring Paris.  The market and metro are right down the block.  We highly recommend this unique gem! 
Fondly, Dianne and Neil

Thank you Anne and Ulysse! You were wonderful hosts! Your hospitality was above and beyond what we expected. Ulysse welcomed us at check-in and gave us a tour of the place and he was at our disposal whenever we had questions during our stay. The apartment is spacious and very central in Paris.  We enjoyed our stay here very much!
Úžasní, ochotní, pozitivní lidé. Byt je krásný, na pěkném i strategickém místě. V okolí je vše co potřebujete. Není co vytknout. Děkujeme

My wife and I were glad we chose to stay in this charming Parisian sun filled airy apartment. The hosts were perfect, extremely helpful and attentive, and this is one of the reasons we were glad we didn't choose a hotel. The location is perfect and a much better option than Montmarte. Coffee, fruit bowls, cereal, indoor plants, metro cards, power adaptor,...  They have thought of every need for travellers.

We had a great stay. The floors were a little squeaky but we understand that there isn't much they can do about it. There were many thoughtful touches and Anne was very accommodating to our needs. We'd love to stay here again.

Anne and Ulysse's apartment was beautiful, spacious, and centrally located in the Latin Quarter.  It was within walking distance to the Seine River, Notre Dame, Pantheon, Luxembourg Gardens, shopping, restaurants, and more.  On top of that, the metro station was right there.  Our stay was wonderful, and we would definitely return in the future!

Excellent place, location, you feel like being at home. Excellent hostes!!!
When I’ll return to Paris for sure will rey to rent it again
Amazing Airbnb
La hospitalidad de Anne maravillosa, atenta a cualquier necesidad que se nos presentara. La ubicación inmejorable con todo lo necesario muy cerca. Todo genial

Five start accommodations in the Latin Quarter!  What a sweet apartment and equally lovely hostess. We only had 1 night at Anne’s lovely place but it was the perfect way to end our European vacation.  She truly thought of everything! From welcome fruit and beverages to “turndown” service for the pullout sofa, it was delivered flawlessly. We’re already trying to figure out when we can go to Paris again to stay longer at this apartment.

Don’t hesitate. Just go ahead and book this place. It was absolutely amazing. The decor is amazing, the location is great, and the host is a delight. Anne really made us feel at home. From providing metro cards, to stocking the fridge with drinks, providing fresh chocolates....we really were blown away. My only regret is that we ever had to leave!

Our experience, from beginning to end, at Anne and Ulysses' apartment was top notch.   The location in St. Germain was fantastic - restaurants and markets are just around the corner.   You can walk anywhere from their place in short order.   If you don't want to walk, the subway, and busses are there if you need them.    We were met by the hosts upon our arrival, and shared some rose with them while they provided us with all the information we would need for our stay.   They had gone to the extra effort to have flowers in a vase, coffee for breakfast, fruit in a tray, and items in the fridge for our welcome.   They couldn't have been more delightful.   Anne was very quick to answer any questions I had prior to our arrival.   Their charming apartment was spotless, beautifully decorated, spacious and very comfortable.   There is an elevator in the building, so no lugging your luggage up the stairs.   It was absolutely ideal for us, in every way, and we would highly recommend it to our friends and family.   It's a gem.   We will be back in the future!
这个地处拉丁区的公寓位于中心区域的2楼,有电梯可以直达,公寓内厨房洗衣机冰箱等生活设施一应俱全,是在巴黎小住的理想场所,安全舒适,不要犹豫可以直接订下这个plus房源

Our stay was amazing, Anne and Jean-Luc are so nice and helpful. There are a few details that make this place really special. First, Anne and Jean-Luc are available literally at all times, they live next door, and they are very quick to answer questions. Second, they thought of every possible detail - everything from groceries that they left in the fridge, toothbrushes in case you forget your own, chocolate, and little gifts for our children. Third, the apartment has many details that brings up the history of the place, including for example the scooter that Anne used in her childhood, an antique beer brewer, and so on - this makes the stay in the apartment truly romantic. Finally, the location of the apartment is superb - it's right next to the Pantheon, many of the universities, the Notre-Dame, Luxemburg, and so there are many restaurants, cafes, etc. There's also a nice outdoor market half a block a way, so you can get all your groceries there, including bread, cheese, and produce. Overall, we loved our stay and will definitely be back.

This was a beautiful apartment in a perfect location in the Latin Quarter. Anne and Jean Luc was very communicative and kind. We loved the well stocked fridge and the spacious living room. We will definitely stay here again when in Paris.

Words cannot describe how PERFECT our stay was. This is such a lovely home! Check-in was very easy, and we were greeted by Anne's husband, Jean luc. He gave my sister & I such a warm welcome, walked us through and made sure we had everything we needed. Anne was always available if needed, and quick to reply to all messages. The home itself is STUNNING! There were moments we had to force ourselves to leave and wander the city :) It is also in a perfect location. You can walk just about anywhere, and the metro is steps away.  There's a variety of bars, restaurants & shops in every direction. My sister & I are already planning our next trip back! Anne & Jean luc both made sure to come and say goodbye, and he was kind enough to walk us out and get us a taxi. Two incredibly kind & thoughtful hosts. 110% Recommend :)
Nice apartment in great location (minus the immediate view). Pleasant hosts and overall as described.  Compared with other places I’ve rented in Paris, perhaps a bit on the pricey side, but cute.

One of the best Airbnb's we've stayed in yet!  We're fellow longtime hosts and also we have rented a lot of Airbnb homes during our travels. PRIME LOCATION, whimsically decorated, immaculately clean, and full of wonderful amenities -  Anne's apartment was a lovely and comfortable stay in Paris. We especially appreciated all the details that made us and our two small children feel at home. 

LOCATION: The apartment is truly in the heart of the Latin Quarter and surrounded by so many restaurants and shops. Additionally, it's a block away from a Metro station making it easy to get here from CDG. 

COMMUNICATION: Anne was very easy to communicate with and quick to respond. 

CHECK-IN + ACCESSIBILITY: Super easy to access the apartment and there's even a tiny elevator that fits one adult and our Babyzen Yoyo+ stroller perfectly. The flat is just one flight upstairs. 

THE APARTMENT ITSELF: It was very eclectic, posh, and CLEAN. As I host often, I am super particular about cleanliness and Anne's apartment did not disappoint. All the towels and linens are of high quality. Other thoughtful amenities were the stocked fridge, children's toys,  plenty of guides and books about Paris, a lovely assortment of toiletries, and very thoughtful gifts for our small travelers, etc. It actually gives me some more ideas about my own place and guests! 

Merci beaucoup, Anne, for such a wonderful stay in Paris! We wish you a wonderful and busy summer of guests.
We simply love this apartment! Best location and perfect hosts. We will definitely stay here again!
Absolutely beautiful apartment in a great location. A short walk from Notre Dame and lots of great restaurants in the neighborhood. We could not have been more pleased with our stay here!

It’s the best house in paris.
 Very safe and the market opens to the front of the house.
It’s very useful. 
Hosts are friendly and the house is clean.
Also I like the interior. If i have my house in the future, I would like to have such a Anne&Ulysse ‘s house. 
If I visit paris again, I will stay here. 
Thank you everything.

There is a reason why Anne & Ulysses are Super Hosts - they welcome you with open arms into their beautiful apartment, take the time to answer questions and check on you during your stay. The combination of their warm hospitality and the authentic atmosphere of this apartment make you feel as if you are a special guest.

Anne includes thoughtful touches, such as water and soft drinks in the refrigerator, fresh flowers and best of all - artisan chocolates! The bathroom contains botanical soap and shampoo and luxurious towels. 

We have been to Paris several times, and now we have found our next place to stay!

Our stay at Anne’s place greatly exceeded our expectations. First off, the place was even cuter than in the photos: we loved the creaky hardwood, French-Esque bedding and decor, and majesty palms. They greeted us with a full tour of the place, including some local tips for food and amenities — and they topped it off with flowers, chocolates, a stocked fridge, and a gift for our baby girl, which was completely unexpected and very adorable! Finally, they helped us call a taxi to get to the train on our way out of town and even helped us with our bags. 

Some quick kid info:
- This apartment is one floor up. There is a wide spiral staircase and a tiny lift (though it was too small for our uppababy minu). The staircase is easy to use but we still found it easier to carry our girl and the collapsed stroller
- despite our poor jet-lagged daughter screaming her face off several nights, no cops were called, so the neighbors are seemingly  copacetic with the noise
- they provided a crib, bedding, and even clean toys for our little girl — amazing!
- the freezer does not keep items frozen, so don’t travel with frozen breastmilk to this place
- my wife is a clean freak, her eyes ceaselessly scanning for errant hairs and dust bunnies, and even she described this place as extremely  clean. 

Amenities:
- it is very close to a metro station
- there is a pharmacy, grocery store, and organic store all close by
- there is an excellent patisserie,  charcuterie shop, cheese shop, wine shop, and farmers market all nestled together about 50 paces away. Loved the croissants, palmiers, cheeses and pâtés!

Our hosts went above and beyond our expectations for hospitality. Incroyable! 

The only “weaknesses” are the mini fridge that didn’t seem to keep things terribly cold and the lack of sharp knives. These are extremely minor, however, and we wouldn’t want this to deter anyone’s stay — and to be honest, only one Airbnb in my entire life had good knives. 

Between the charm, beauty, and hospitality of our stay, this is the best Airbnb we’ve ever stayed in (and we’ve stayed in at least 20).

Tivemos uma estadia excelente! 
Ótima localização do apartamento, conseguimos ir a vários pontos turísticos caminhando. 
Apartamento confortável, limpo, arejado, claro, além de super aconchegante.
Anfitriões nos receberam na chegada com material pronto sobre os principais pontos, meios de locomoção para chegar até lá, com principais telefones para emergência. Como estávamos em lua de mel, nos recepcionaram com agrados para que pudéssemos comemorar. Muito carinhosos e preocupados com o nosso bem estar. Incrivelmente atenciosos.

Nos hospedamos no apartamento por 9 noites, então os anfitriões foram ao apartamento para trocar as toalhas de banho, cama e limparam os principais cômodos (com nossa prévia autorização para entrarem no apartamento em um momento que não (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza recomendamos este apartamento e em uma próxima oportunidade, voltaremos a nos hospedar.

Extraordinary hosts, Anne & Ulysses, own an exceptional charming, spacious, home-like apartment in the Latin Quarter, 5e. Old world ambiance with modern conveniences. Extremely well appointed & perfectly located a block from the Metro, convenient to shopping & sight seeing. If I could, I would make this my annual home base in Paris. Highly recommended!!

Anne & Ulysses deserve the highest possible recommendation. The location in the Latin Quarter is perfect, one block from the Metro & great shopping for all your needs & sight seeing. 

Apartment exceeded my expectations: spacious, charming, warm, personalized, quintessential comfortable  Parisian apartment. Anne & Ulysses are outstanding hosts, way above my previous Airbnb experiences.

I hope one day to return to Anne & Ulysses place. Highly recommended.

This apartment is even better in real life. No misleading pictures here.  It's so lovely and open and bright and charming. It looks very Parisian including the views. The location is PERFECT. A market just outside the door. Good patisseries 1-2 minute walk away. I wish we would have spent our entire time in Paris here. The hosts were so accommodating, kind, and hospitable. They were so welcoming and respectful to our 3.5 year old as well. Linens were comfy.

Our stay at Anne and Ulysse's apartment was wonderful. Anne was a wonderful, warm, welcoming host that even gave us a sweet little gift upon arrival. Communication was top notch, check in was easy and Anne provided suggestions when needed. The apartment is well located and beautiful. Would definitely recommend to anyone staying in Paris, especially families, and will definitely be staying again sometime! Thank you, Anne!

This beautiful Parisian apartment is perfectly located in the north part of the famous Latin Quarter, just a short walk from the Notre Dam, Rue Mouftard and the Sorbonne.
Indeed it is with good reason that Woody Allen chose this street to  shoot the time-travelling car picking up Owen Wilson in 'Midnight in Paris'.  The apartment itself is decorated with real vintage - all in good french taste. 

Every morning you'll have to choose between to superb boulangeries conveniently located 2 min away and every evening between 10's of restaurants - all within a 10 min walk.

Finally it is with great pleasure that I'm writing this recommendation to Anna and Ulysses - both prefect hosts, kind warm and always happy to help.
Perfect apartment for a Paris visit; quick response time in all circumstances.

Our stay at Anne & Ulysse's house was a really memorable one. Their house is very stylish and well equipped. You'll have a Parisien experience when you stay there. They add personal touches to their house design and provide us with absolutely everything we need. They provide us with baby cribs, toys, and even some chocolates for our daughter. One thing that makes us really impressed by this house is the host's hospitality. Anne and her husband Jean Luc is the best host that we ever met. We arrived early at their house so the house isn't prepared yet and it was our fault. But, Anne still accepted us and even treat us at nearby cafe to spend our time waiting for her preparing the house. Then we met her husband Jean Luc. He can't speak English fluently but he tried very hard to approach us and we definitely can feel his kindness and sincerity. Definitely the most recommend stay for your time at Paris
Loved our stay, what a great neighborhood; it was safe but also lively with great restaurants and shops all around us.  The apartment was lovely and Anne was such a sweet hostess.  Merci beucoup!

fantastic "sejour" in the heart of Paris. We - five women - enjoyed the spacious, charmant and very beautiful apartement. The hosts are very communicativ and in any way very nice and supportiv. Everything went perfect. absolutly recommended.

Anne and Ulysse’s place is perfect! It’s in a perfect location just a quick walk to either Notre Dame or the Pantheon. The metro is just up the block too. The place is sparkling clean and spacious with a great shower and a kitchen for storing some drinks or making espresso and tea. They even had toothbrushes in the bathroom. The bed is comfortable and the towels are soft and big, much better than any hotel! Great restaurants nearby too and the best butter croissants in Paris! Anne and Jean Luc always responded quickly to questions and left us plenty of maps and tips for getting around the city. We can’t wait to go back!

This was a GREAT space - we throughly enjoyed our time here. It is a SAFE and secure building (located right across the police station), well appointed and within walking distance from wonderful cheese shops, butcher shop, wine shop and the BEST patisserie (award winning croissants). There is also a great wine shop, where we got the best recommendation to be paired with the cheese we just purchased. Our first dinner was literally wine, cheese and a fresh baguette! Our hosts were AMAZINGLY accommodating and so kind. The apartment was ready for us upon arrival (a little early, after we communicated our arrival time), they shared tips on where to go and gave us a good tour of the apartment so that we would have a successful stay. GREAT hospitality professionals! I would highly recommend this place if available! Within walking distance to Notre Dame too!

Everything was so good!!  
Anne and Ulysse's dad are very hospitality persons.   
They are wonderful host! 
They were always responds quickly if we needed anything. 
And This apartment is great location. 
It's walking distance to market and many other sights, close to all forms of public transport as well. 
We had the most wonderful time and would absolutely stay at this apartment again!
I hope to be back soon. Thank you!!!!
Awesome location, beautiful apartment, would absolutely stay again! Couldn't have asked for more.
A great place, and you won’t regret choosing it.

Anne’s place was absolutely perfect for our family of 4 (2 young children). The apartment is even more beautiful than the photos. We loved the location, just steps from the farmers market, an award-winning croissant bakery, Notre Dame.  Anne was also incredibly thoughtful about what we might need for the kids (down to a bed rail and pack & play). We hope to be back soon!
Really well located, large apartment close to Notre Dame, the Pantheon and metro line! Beautifully decorated with everything you need for a stay in Paris! Thanks Anne and Jean-Luc
Had a really pleasant stay at this beautiful and spacious apartment. Very close to the river and metro stops, lots of light and lively atmosphere. Would highly recommend
집 진짜 넓고 예뻐요. 파리에서 생활하는 내내 행복했습니다. 파리 구경하고 집 들어오면 캬~ 집이 예뻐서 피로가 풀려요. 그리고 주인이 정말 친절하세요! 위치도 좋습니다. 근처에 버스 정류장 많아요. 걷는 거 좋아하시면 주요 관광지까지 걸어서 가도 될 만한 거리예요! :-)
The house is like small museum to know the home life in Paris. Anne and Ulysee is friendly and communicative. Highly recommended.

현지인처럼 살아 보기 위해서 10일 일정중 4일 정도를 큰맘 먹고 아파텔에서 생활했답니다. 
노트르담 성당 위치에 있어서 걸어서 박물관 투어에도 좋았으며 경찰서고 맞은 편에 있어서 치안에 대해서는 말할껏도 없이 좋았답니다. 1분걸이에 있는 최고급 빵집은 한국에 와서도 계속 생각 나게 하는 최고의 빵집이였답니다^^ 음식점이 밑에 있어서 밤늦게까지도 사람들의 소리가 안방에서 들려서 거실에서 잠을 청하기도 하였고 바닦의 삐걱 거리는 소리 때문에 거실에서 자는 사람에게 미안 하기도 했답니다. ^^ 그래도 다시 파리 가라고 하면.. 꼭 이 호텔을 가고 싶을정도로 위치와 청결도와 주인은 저희를 매료 시겼답니다.

Anna’s home is nice and clean. There are many rooms inside the house. There are a lot of plants and flowers. I am sure that you will love it very much. There are many shops and markets nearby. There is a small elevator too. I love. that cute little elevator.

Ulysses’ mother Anne was very kind and courteous for the entirety of our stay. She gave great food recommendations as well as quick responses whenever we needed anything. The apartment felt very safe and was in a prime location with lots to do all around. Shops, markets, and historic landmarks around every corner. Lots of great bars within walking distance that were very easy to navigate back from.  An amazing stay in every aspect!

We loved everything about the place. It was walking distance from multiple transportation and attractions. It was spacious, and comfy enough that we even took a day to just cook, read, watch Netflix and overall just enjoy the comfort of the place. It is equipped with everything you need during a trip from iron, to toiletries, full kitchen, etc.  Ulysses was vacation during our stay so we interacted with his parents, Anne and Jean-Luc. Both were really nice and eager to help us with anything and answer any questions we had. They were flexible, non intrusive, and overall just really pleasant to deal with. 

We would definitely stay there again.

La estancia fue maravillosa, los padres de Ulysse, Anne y Jean luc son encantadores, amables, nos explicaron todo muy bien. El apartamento es muy bonito, limpio, tiene calefacción, con todo lo necesario en cocina, baño y demás, nosotros éramos 5 personas y el espacio era ideal y muy acogedor. Está cerca del metro, supermercados, tiendas, etc.  Pudimos ir  andando perfectamente a muchas zonas turísticas. 
Sin duda  volveremos a París y a éste apartamento.
 Quedamos muy felices.

Thank you so much for this wonderful stay in your wonderful flat. It was even nicer than the pictures already suggested. And thank you for your hospitality. We (family of three) highly recommend your flat to other visitors and we sincerely hope that we may come again.

Amazing Location, brilliant hosts, clean and an all around excellent experience.
I hope to stay again!
You can easily walk anywhere, and Ulysses’ Mom And Dad are charming and so gracious.

Ulysse's place is centrally located right in the center of the Left bank, close to many restaurants and historic sights. It's walking distance to Notre Dame and many other sights, close to all forms of public transportation as well. Apartment itself is excellent and shows old Parisian charm. Overall an excellent experience.
A beautiful light and airy flat,  with homely touches and family history.  Spacious and light , kind and welcoming host.  Highly recommend.

O ESPAÇO DE ULISSE E ESPETACULAR. SUPEROU MINHAS EXPECTATIVAS, SEUS PAIS FORAM ÓTIMOS ANFITRIÕES, A LOCALIZAÇÃO É ÓTIMA, PRÓXIMO A FARMÁCIA, RESTAURANTE, MERCADO, METRO E UMA CENTRAL DE POLICIA O QUE O TORNA EXTREMAMENTE SEGURO. O ESPAÇO E IMPAR, MUITO BEM DECORADO, ESPAÇOSO, CONFORTÁVEL E EXTREMAMENTE LIMPO, COM CERTEZA NA MINHA PROXIMA VIAGEM QUERO FICAR NESTE ESPAÇO. SUPER RECOMENDADO.

Our stay at Ulysee's place was fantastic. Anne was very accomodating allowing us to leave our bag with them so as we could get to an exhibition early of our check in time. When we checked in the flat really did have the wow factor, a really beautifully decorated and cool flat. Locationwise its a 5 minute walk from Notre Damm Cathedral, it has a little market just down the road which was great. If you come out the flat and head left up the road towards the church Saint Etienne Du Mont there are some really cool bars, we really liked one called Le Piano Vache.
We really enjoyed our stay at Ulysee's flat and would definatley like to stay here again one day for longer.
This was a wonderful place to stay and I would recommend it it anyone. It’s location and charm were highlights for our trip to Paris.

Very nice apartment with charming and attentive guests. And the location is simply top : very nearby is a market with quality shops (best croissants of Paris 2018, very good cheese shop, ...) and at 500m of Notre-Dame.

Great location! Spacious flat about to be updated with additional amenities. Second floor with lift makes this place very desirable. Walking distance to most museums and attractions - also charming outdoor market, fabulous boulangeries and restaurants minutes away. Would rent again-
Really nice appartment and a perfect location. Next time we are en Paris we would love to stay herr again

Location is perfect for visiting Paris. Lots of restaurants and markets within easy walking distance. The apartment is very comfortable and bright. We were greeted by Ulysse’s parents and made to feel very welcome. Definitely hope to return in the future.

Ulysse welcomed us friendly and offered to take our luggage, because we arrived too early. The appartement is as shown in the photos - so in few words: Beautiful with a wooden oak floor and vintage living accesoires with style. We felt very comfortable there. The sleeping room is on the backyard site - very calm. Just around the corner, you´ll get delicious croissants, Baguettes, Cakes, Fishes, Vegetables and there is also an everyday market. For us, it´s definitely a place to visit again on our next trip to Paris. Thank you very much, Ulysse!

Communication : Ulysse and his mom were easily reachable, reactive and accommodating. 

Apartment : lovely 19th century building with hardwood floor and lovely decoration. Honestly, it's nicer there than at my own place.

Location : Only 2 metro stations away from the train station, very centrally located close to many major Paris hot spots. 

Conclusion : there's nothing bad to be said about this apartment, our stay was an excellent experience. As a bonus, if you're a cat lover you can enjoy some feline company as well !
Ulysee非常细心周到,就住在隔壁,有什么问题都很方便｡房子的布置传统,客厅非常大,感觉只有住在这样的地方才能感受巴黎人真正的生活｡有电梯,带着娃也没有遇到任何问题｡窗外就能看到巴黎圣母院,交通非常方便,周围小店一应俱全而又不失安静,简直不能更棒了｡Merci beaucoup Ulysee!
Fantastic appartment. Great charm and location. Ulysse is a very pleasant host. Couldn’t find fault with anything
Great place, great host!

As described - close to everything, bustling area, fully equipped apartment, perfect amount of space for 2-3 people. The family who owns the listing are accommodating and very sweet. I love that they give a bit of family history in their posting description - it gives the home life.
Apartment was in a great location!Ulysse and his family were very welcoming and great hosts!
Muy recomendable!

Paramos en el departamente de Ulysse del 15 al 17 de julio, excelente departamento, ubicado en un lugar inmejorable, cerca de todo, muy limpio y con todos los elementos básicos para disfrutar de nuestra estadía,  es tal cuál lo expresa la página! 
El anfitrión siempre respondió rapidamente antes de nuestra llegada, especialmente para poder acordar nuestro ingreso.
Si bien a Ulysse no lo conocimos, su madre Ana nos esperó y estuvo siempre atenta a nuestros requerimientos, nos ayudó mucho con sugerencias y orientaciones, sobre todo intentando hacerse entender en español! Bellísima persona
Lo recomendaría sin dudarlo!!

An amazing apartment! Very stylish and had everything we needed. The location is incredible, and both Ulysse and his mother were great hosts, always available with local tips and to help with anything. A great stay, and we'll definitely be back!

Please note that this place is unliveable and claustrophobic. The bedroom is located at one end with bunk beds. The window of the bedroom cannot be opened since the owner who stays adjacent has cats who can jump in. The only option is to open the windows of the living room. Unfortunately thats not an option either. Since this house is on a Main Street you end up hearing loud sirens, honking, music, people talking, garbage vans clearing the street and you feel as if you are on a footpath. House without airconditioning, fan, television makes it hot,boring, claustrophobic. The pic on airbnb depicts a television but sadly there isnt any. We canceled our reservation after 1 sleepless night. Ended up paying extra for a hotel near the same street as the house with all facilities( airconditioning, television). It was a relief to be out of the house. We had to keep on hopping between living room and bed room all through the night. Stay at a hotel and not here.

This is a beautiful place! Quintessential French, stylish, magnificent...
It will make you want to come back as soon as you leave. 
There is also an incredible cat there, so you will not only fall in love with this beautiful French apartment, but with the adorable cat too!
Ulysse is a kind and accommodating host.
Absolutely superb, exceeding all my expectations!
A lovely family, helpful and accommodating. The apartment is in a great location. Fantastic stay!
Great location and beautiful place. Hosts were very friendly and helpful.

Loved the location of this apartment, close to transport, restaurants, bars, and markets and 5 minutes walk to Notre Dame. The apartment was clean, well lit and very spacious.  Ulysee and his mother Ann are great hosts who are flexible, helpful and easy to communicate with.

We really enjoyed our stay and would stay here again.

Leuk appartement met ruime woonkamer, vlakbij de Notre-Dame. Erg vriendelijk ontvangen door de ouders van Ulysse, die in het appartement tegenover wonen en ze zijn makkelijk bereikbaar. Zou hier zeker nog eens terugkomen bij een volgend bezoek aan Parijs.

Ulysses made it so much easier for my parents stay in Paris! Great communication, flexible with check in time, even came down to get my parents when he saw them looking for the entrance out the window. I didn't stay with them but I was told the location was prime, close to restaurants, stores, many must see attractions, as well as public transportation and even a laundromat. Sink waterflow was a bit of a downside mentioned and the squeaky wooden floor, but not so much of a problem in such a spacious apartment in Paris! Overall value and I'm happy my parents had a wonderful stay. Thank you Ulysse!

Partially modernised, average comfort, perfect location.

Ulysse was a very good host - flexible, helpful and easy to communicate with.

An airy and bright apartment just off Boulevard St Germain. 
It was always cool inside despite some quite warm days during our stay. 
There are lovely boulangeries, butchers, cheese shops etc within a stones throw and the centre of Paris is just a short walk away. 
The host was easy to communicate with and very helpful and flexible. 
My two children & I enjoyed staying there and found it comfortable and easy to connect with local transport
我太喜欢Ulysee家了,干净整洁,最重要的是大,客厅差不多有40平方米｡家对面警察局,很安全,买东西很方便｡附近交通通达度高,有直达两大机场和主火车站的地铁和捷运火车｡步行到一些主要景点很近,拉丁区5分钟,先贤祠5分钟,巴黎圣母院10分钟,卢浮宫20分钟｡全5星推荐!!!
Ulysee's place was great! Very large space. He was very easy to deal with!

We had a great stay Ulysse's amazing apartment.  The apartment is even more beautiful than in looks in the photographs!  It was very clean and spacious and in an excellent location - 5 minutes walk from Notre Dame with shops and restaurants located nearby.  Communication with Ulysse was quick and easy.  Would certainly recommend and hope to stay here again!!

위치가 노틀담성당에서 정말가깝고 집창문에서도 성당이보여요 바로앞에가 경찰서라서 치안은 최고로 안전해요 집옆에는 코인세탁소도있고 마트도 여러개있고 지하철역도 짱짱 가까워요! 집도 진짜좋고 집주인이 너무너무너무 착해요! 아파트안에 작은 방에서 아주머니가 일하러오시는데 방해하나도안되고 밖에나가있을때 일하러오셔서 신경도안쓰여요 만나면 인사도잘해주시고 정보도 알려주셨어요 부엌에있는조리도구랑 그릇들 다 사용가능하고 냉장고랑 오븐,토스트기 커피머신도있어요 침대는 이층침대인데 세명이서 충분히 사용했습니다 욕실도 진짜 짱좋음 여기 있으면서 교통비 진짜아꼇어요 걸어서 30분이면 거의다 갈수있는위치에요:) 파리에 한번더간다면 다시묵고싶은 숙소입니다 정말추천해요'!!
l miss u:) you are super host!!
Logement super bien
Soirée impeccable
Nous avons passé un très bon moment, studio un peu petit, mais très bien pour 1 ou 2nuits et profiter du jacuzzi..

Voisins insupportables bruit cris d’enfants la journée et la nuit les parents font la fête (musique beaucoup beaucoup trop forte) et finissent par se battre avec leurs amis et à s’insulter très très très très fortement jusqu’à 6h du matin, impossible de bien dormir nous sommes parti à 8h.

Dommage c’était pourtant mignon cosy et très propre, mais ça a tout gâché !!!!!
Endroit propre beau tranquille hôte réactive super séjour
R. A. S
Super endroit pour se poser avant/après un examen. Les hôtes sont extrêmement sympathiques et le chat vient dire bonjour de temps en temps. Je recommande vivement
Ras, chambre au calme idéalement située par rapport à la maison des examens

Chambre agréable et spacieuse. Bien située, proche transport et centre d'examen. 
Accueil chaleureux par les propriétaires. 
Je recommande.

à refaire sans problème !
Accueil très chaleureux dans cette maison calme et plaisante, merci Thierry pour le café !

Pas de surprise par rapport à la description parfaitement détaillée ! Thierry est très réactif pour répondre aux éventuelles questions complémentaires. Accueil du couple très agréable et chambre confortable. Idéal pour passer une soutenance ou tout autre examen à la Maison des Examens !
Je suis venu dans le cadre d’un examen et ai trouvé la tranquillité dont j’avais besoin

Merci à Thierry pour son accueil. La chambre est conforme et très confortable. Le logement est idéalement situé et le parking est un vrai plus....une note particulière pour le café qui est remarquable !

Séjour très agréable chez Thierry et son épouse. Très accueillants et arrangeants, vous passerez un séjour au calme et à proximité des commerces essentiels pour un séjour tranquille. Je les recommande avec plaisir
Si je devais revenir, je reviendrai sans aucun soucis, avec grand plaisir
Hôtes très gentils et accommodants. Chambre parfaitement insonorisée et lit très confortable. Tout est très propre et le café est absolument délicieux.

Hôtes très agréables et accommodants. J’ai passé un très bon séjour
Je recommande fortement
Très bon accueil, logement conforme à mes attentes et aux commentaires des autres voyageurs.
Accueil chaleureux et lit confortable, merci !
Vous pouvez venir vous poser sans souci, vous ne serez pas déçu. Bonne découverte !
Très bon accueil. Thierry est très arrangeant et a le sens de l’hospitalité!
très bon accueil , appartement confortable

Très bon accueil,
Parfait pour passer un examen au SIEC
Bel accueil propre et parfait pr la proximité  avec la maison des examens
Tres contente de cette location, où j'ai  pu être au calme. Thierry est charmant et la propreté irréprochable. Je recommande.

C’est une chambre avec vue dégagée, une bonne literie, un espace propre et un bel accueil. La salle de bain commune est propre, équipée. C’est une chambre mais Thierry fait tout de suite confiance et vous accueille avec chaleur, vous offre un rafraîchissement et les clefs de chez lui. Merci Thierry!

Emplacement parfait pour passer un examen ( calme, proximité maison des examens et transports), accueil et échanges agréables tout au long du séjour, chambre fonctionnelle et accès à la cuisine accepté. Bref, très bien!
Je suis venue pour un concours, la maison est très calme, l’accueil charmant et le chat, clochette, adorable !
Literie confortable, lieu calme et très propre et accueil parfait avant examen.
Très belle chambre avec un lit de qualité. Merci pour ce beau séjour je recommande vivement de venir séjourner dans cette belle maison.
Maison très propre et hôtes très accueillants (et chat très sympathique)

Accueillants chaleureux.
Comme a la maison
Chambre très confortable à deux pas de la maison des examens je recommande

J'ai passé une nuit chez Thierry et sa femme, afin de passer mon concours le lendemain matin à la maison des examens (qui se trouve à 5min à pied).
La chambre est très confortable (le lit super, le store qui ne laisse passer aucune lumière <3 ), propre et calme. Merci pour votre accueil, votre conversation (et le café qui est super bon) ! J'étais dans des conditions parfaites pour mon concours :) J'ai même pu me reposer tranquillement à l'appartement avant de repartir avec mes affaires.
Je reviendrai avec plaisir! (si besoin ;) )
Une bonne nuit dans un endroit propre et un accueil sympathique. A 5 min de la maison d'examen.

La maison est très agréable, on s’y sent bien. Proche des commodités, superette, resto, bar, snack, elle se situe surtout à 5 minutes à pied du centre des examens et du RER B. Donc vraiment idéal pour ceux qui passent leur concours. Très bon accueil de Thierry et son épouse qui ont accepté de me garder mon sac jusqu’à la fin des examens. 
Je recommande !
Logement conforme à la description donnée.Accueil attentionné.
Logement proche rer, pratique et Thierry et pascale ont été très arrangeant. Je recommande !
Super hôte , chambre propre nickel

Hôtes très sympathiques, à l'écoute et très réactifs aux messages. Je recommande
Accueil agréable chambre confortable et propre ainsi que la salle de bain.

Nous avons passé une nuit, nous avons fort bien dormi ! 
Notre soucis à était le retour car faute des grèves, il n'y a que le RER b qui arrive et un bus de nuit (ligne 21).
Je recommande !
Bon accueil et bon emplacement
Rien à redire

Thierry est facilement joignable et très réactif.
La literie est un piège dont vous aurez du mal à vous échapper au matin, de part son confort... 
Logement très bien situé à Arcueil, à proximité quasi-immédiate de la gare RER B.
Thierry est un hôte très attentionné et arrangeant. Je me suis sentie comme a la maison. Merci beaucoup pour votre accueil. Je conseille vivement ce logement !!
Chambre propre et calme, parfaite pour y préparer des examens. Maisons des examens à 2 pas, donc super pratique. Rer B tout proche. Hôtes très accueillants.
Bon accueil, bien situé, chambre confortable et sans bruit.
Je passais mes examens à côté et pour se faire j’avais besoin d’un logement de proximité où je ne serai pas dérangé. Le deal était très bien. Merci d’avoir gardé la valise le temps de l’examen

Chambre correcte, le matelas pas vraiment confortable, les autres occupants pas trop respectueux de la propreté des lieux!

Bon rapport qualité prix, proche du siec. Très bonne accueil.

Thierry et ça compagne sont très sympathiques si on fait abstraction de l’odeur pestilentielle de tabac froid régnant dans la maison. Par ailleurs pourtant pas sujet au mal de dos je me suis réveillé complètement cassé, la literie est vraiment déplorable.
Mon séjour chez Thierry était parfait, accueil chaleureux, l'appartement est bien situé et la chambre était confortable. Je recommende un séjour chez Thierry.
Chambre propre et calme, à 2 pas de la gare RER. Hôtes accueillants à recommander. Bonne adresse.

Hôtes très sympathiques, chaleureux et à l'écoute. La chambre est très bien, calme et idéalement situé proche du RER et de la maison des examens. Je recommande cette chambre pour y passer quelques jours !

Merci de votre accueil et de votre sympathie !
De super hôtes! Très accueillant
Chambre chez l'habitant trés propre, super calme et proche RER pour se rendre rapidement au centre de Paris
Accueil sympathique et le lit est confortable…
La chambre est située dans une maison très calme .Les hôtes sont des gents sympathiques,réactifs et discrets.
Merci Thierry pour le très bon accueil ! La maison se trouve à seulement 5 minutes à pied du centre des examens et du RER si vous voulez explorer Paris. Le logement est propre, calme est agréable.
Bonne adresse très proche de la maison des examens et du RER.
Personnes très accueillantes, à 5min de la maison des examens. Lieu propre, je recommande fortement.
Très bon accueil

Bon accueil. Proche de la gare Laplace. Chambre confortable et calme

Chambre très calme avec tout le confort nécessaire, les hôtes sont super accueillants et conviviaux, le cadre est parfait pour passer ses concours !!

Accueil sympathique avec un petit cafe, la chambre est propre, je recommande vivement cette location avec un atout proche du rer.
Maison idéalement située par rapport à la maison des examens.  Bon rapport qualité prix et accueil très gentil de la part de Thierry et son épouse.
Très bonne nuit. Belle chambre
Emplacement parfait, juste à côté du centre des examens.

Bonjour.

Hôtes discrets.
Rien à redire, je les recommande, hôtes réactifs, accueillants et bienveillants ! Emplacement idéal si vous souhaitez vous rendre au rentre des examens. De plus leur chat est adorable !
Très bon emplacement pour passer l’examen l’hôte et sa femme sont très sympa et accueillant !
Une chambre confortable et propre !

Hôtes très accueillants et chaleureux ! Chambre propre et bien équipée

Thierry et sa femme sont très accueillants, on se sent chez eux comme chez soi et c'est agréable.
