Oliviers apartment is really beautifully decorated, spacious and is located a few minutes from the T2 tramline, and it even has a dedicated underground car park which was really useful.
The apartment is beautiful, spacious and bright when the sun seeps through the windows and the bed is very comfortable.
Olivier responds quickly, is very friendly and check in and check out was made simple using self check-in. 
It’s a fantastic deal and I will surely be back again soon.
Many thanks for your hospitality.

I wish we could have stayed longer than one night in Olivier’s apartment. It’s a great place, we loved the deco and having a private parking lot in a garage for our car was a big plus. Communication with Olivier was easy, he is very reactive and friendly.

A fantastic address for those looking for an alternative to a hotel in La Défense for much less. Olivier's cozy Parisian loft is homely, stylishly decorated and located in an ideal part of town. Quiet, easy to commute to through public transport and a walk away from the heart of Suresnes village with its selection of trendy restaurants. Olivier was the perfect host from the start and knows how to make you feel at home. I would highly recommend this address to anyone looking at business travel differently or travelling through the west part of Paris. Thanks Olivier.

This place was amazing we were so lucky to find this place before our trip! Oliver was so helpful and the location was right by the train station so if you really want to go out and explore there’s no problem there. Oliver was very caring as well and would text us to make sure everything was going ok with our stay. We really appreciated that we had a place to park our car to leave for the duration of the trip. But I HIGHLY recommend his place.
Stylish apartment with secure parking which is great.  Very good communication with Olivier, who made our stay very easy.  We walked into central Paris, which took about an hour. Thank you

Fantastic space with views across Paris. The check in was painless and parking a great benefit. Communication was faultless with some nice touches when I arrived (the wine perfect after a long drive and breakfast already provided for the first few days). I always bring my nespresso machine as well but it wasn't needed as that had already been provided as well!

Olivier’s apartment was the perfect base for our 3 nights in Paris - it was spotlessly clean and extremely comfortable, with plenty of room to relax after a long day exploring! It was very easy and quick to get an Uber directly into the city centre (the tram stop was also close by). The secure underground parking was a particular bonus! Communication with Olivier was excellent throughout-nothing was too much trouble! Merci, Olivier-we hope to return soon!
Beautiful place, good location,receptive host.
The appartment is very clean in a nice neighbourhood. The parking place under the building was perfect for our car with bikes. Olivier is a great host.
Nice place with private parking. Good communication and I would be happy to stay again.

I stayed here for a week with a friend and we felt like we got a true Parisian feel. The design was lovely. The tub is a bit small to shower in but overall we made it work. We bought paper towels and were good to go. Walking distance to market, a few food spots, the train and everything. No car needed. Highly recommend.
Great stay and location. The train station is just up the hill for the flat. The flat has a very nice touch and personality to it. I definitely recommend staying here.
Cute apartment in a nice area.  Comfortable2 beds.  Nice host.
Clean place, available safe parking, near to eiffel tower, availability of host. Will recommend him to anyone.
Brilliant location, nice & quiet but not too far ;)
Great host, great appartement. Clean, cosy and very close to the station.
Very nice and modern apartment to stay at. The area is quiet and the apartment was sparkling clean. Would highly recommend.

Olivier’s place was large, clean, nicely decorated, and conveniently close to the train station which gave us easy access to both downtown Paris and Versailles. Olivier also provided us with local tips and recommendations which helped us out a lot since it was our first time in Paris. The area is quiet and safe as well - many times we came home late at night and never felt unsafe.
Great flat and very responsive host.
Super geklappt schnelle Antworten immer bereit es gab sogar einen Parkplatz in der Tiefgarage

The house is well located, just 50 m to the train station, 3 stops and you are at Grande Arche de la Défense, from here you can go everywhere.
You have free cover parking for you car. Oliver is a nice person at the beginning he explened all the things we need to know about the house. Easy to comunícate with. Have a great day!     Emilio

As this was our first trip to Paris, we did not want to stay in a hotel.  We wanted to experience French culture. Olivier left us a bottle of wine upon our arrival.  The neighborhood Suresnes was very lovely.  We felt safe as well.   Unfortunately, I lost the apartment key on the first day.   Olivier was kind enough to replace the key no problem.  Thank you!  The bed(s) were extremely comfortable!  My only complaint about our 4 night stay is there were only 3 towels for 3 adults for 4 days.   I have long hair and use 2 towels myself.   I reached out to Olivier who said there were extra towels.  I found 2 small towels.  The washer does not dry, so I was left to wash and hang clothes to dry.   There was only 1 washcloth and no hand towels.   I guess it’s an American thing to use paper towels to dry your hands or napkins.  None provided.  We had to purchase them ourselves.  We also had to purchase liquid dish soap to wash our daily breakfast dishes.  The WiFi was great.   Note, if you are traveling from the US, you will need to bring your plug converters.   If you are not looking for US extra comforts that we expect (like extra towels, ice, smart TV, larger spaces,) then this is the place for you!   Very chic!
The number one ,oliver,kindly thank you so much from our heart as family
Nice, quiet, safe with private parking. Near metro station. Very good!

We loved our stay in Paris and that is partly thanks to Olivier.
So thank you so much Olivier!
Excellent apartment three Metro stops from La Defence. Highly recommended
Sehr schön eingerichtet Wohnung. Gute Metro Anbindung. Wir haben uns wohlgefühlt. Check in hat auch super geklappt. Pluspunkt war der Parkplatzin der Tiefgarage.

A one of a kind bnb place(decoration). Little far off Gare du nord train station which many people come from. 
If you know or understand the public transport routes will be straightfoward

Just 2 bus away to Eiffel Tower. Lots of shops a street down

Perfect location in the nice suburban area right outside Paris. Apartment is spacious,  clean and well equipped. The covered  parking is private and convenient. There are many shops and nice restaurants just a few minutes walk from the apartment. Highly recommended

Olivier’s place was great value for our money. It’s close to transit, making it really easy to get into Paris and the surrounding areas. There was a bit of construction taking place while we were there, but thankfully we only heard it on one of the mornings during our 6-day trip. The place itself has everything you need and size-wise is typical for most European homes. Olivier was a great host as he was always available to answer questions and even left us a bottle of wine to welcome us to Paris. It is located in zone 3, which was maybe 10 minutes on the train into Paris. I would recommend Olivier’s place to anyone looking for clean, safe accommodations at a reasonable price. Thanks again Olivier!

Spacious, comfortable and well equipped for cooking (but no range hood hence fries or steak cooking is not suggested). Very close to tram lines and it’s pretty quiet and safe there. Olivier offered us many tips of local restaurant and where to buy groceries, his hospitality is warm. Though it’s not in Paris downtown, it’s pretty easy to get there by REB that comes every 5min.
I did enjoy my stay. Olivier was so nice and easy to reach.

Really cool spot to stay if visiting Paris, metro station is nearby to hop on and take to any destination around Paris. Area has plenty of shops and amenities. Safe community and very local atmosphere. If you stay in Suresnes make sure you visit Fournil Henri IV for great pastries and baguettes!
房间很有特色,小摆设很多,很有意思｡距离地铁很近,在停车库中有自己的停车位,生活设施很全,附近就有一个中型超市,很方便｡入住前发来详细的入住图片,沟通反应迅速,非常满意的一次体验!
The apartment said it was for 6 people, however, one of the beds is a bit small, 5 people sleep comfortably.  The place is very modern and very quiet.  The train station is about 5 minutes walking.

Não é o mais próximo dos principais lugares, mas tem uma estação bem perto.
O anfitrião é sensacional e o apartamento é maravilhoso, bem completo, limpo e a cama é maravilhosa!!!
Recomendo muito!!!

Oliver was a great host. Welcomed me into his home and told me how everything worked, along with his reviews of local eateries. His home was clean and thoughtful. Energy genuine and caring. Would definitely come back to this place. For the price and experience, it’s well worth staying here

Olivier’s place is nice, cosy, and clean. We enjoyed staying there. It is very close to the train station (very important) and the deco was pretty. We really felt home there. Also, communication was great. Olivier and his team are helpful. You can contact them anytime if you need them. I would stay there again for sure when I am back in Paris. 
Thank you again Olivier :)
Helpful host. Location to heart of city is quick by train. Neighborhood surrounding worth exploring.

Olivier’s home is conveniently situated within walking distance to bakeries, the metro and restaurants. We caught Uber’s into Paris which averaged 10 to 20 euro so very reasonable. Parking was great as is very limited and expensive in Paris. Thanks Olivier
It was the most wonderful space

Olivier’s place was immaculate! Exactly as described! We wish we would have been able to stay longer than one night! But for sure we will stay again when back in Paris! Olivier was an awesome host! Welcomed us with wine! Also offered to purchase breakfast for us ahead of time! The location was great! Short Uber ride (10-15 min) to the tower! Lots of shops/restaurants nearby as well as the metro station. We highly recommend staying at Olivier’s place if visiting Paris! You will not be disappointed!

Olivier is a fantastic host. He greeted us and made us feel at home especially after traveling for 15 hours. He gave wonderful advice to use Waze app for driving and citymap app for getting around the city and metro. He responded quickly to every question or issue we had. We would love to stay with him again if we ever get back to Paris.
Olivier is nice ! The room is clean! He is patiently. He also tell us where can eat and buy things!
Olivier was very helpful by giving many tips and advice about places to go in Paris. He was very kind and accommodating. He had a lovely place. I would definitely stay here again.
Gorgeous apt. Ideal location. Accommodation clean. Needed for nothing. Host very helpful and accommodating.
Olivier was a great host who was always quick to respond. The apartment suited my family of five well for our stay. Very easy to reach the metro. All around great stay.

Tolle Lage der Wohnung und hervorragende Tiefgarage. Kurzer Weg zu öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in unmittelbarer Nähe. Ein herzliches  Dankeschön an Olivier für die Vermietung seiner schönen Wohnung.
The apartment was beautiful and had everything we needed. Communication from Olivier was excellent, earlier check in was greatly appreciated.

Oliver’s place is a great place to stay, so close to central Paris.
Suresnes croissants were delicious too

Olivier is such a nice guy with excellent communication. The house is at an excellent location just outside central paris (40 min by metro/ tram). It was perfect that it also had a parking spot since we had a rented car. Check-in was easy. The place itself was charming with lots of decorations and looked cosy and relaxing. However we were disappointed that it wasn't prepared and well-cleaned to receive us. We had to clean the toilet, wash the towels and change all bed linens upon arrival as  apparently the cleaning lady, unfortunately, hadn't done a very good job at getting the apartment ready. We always chose Airbnbs that have excellent cleanliness. This was the only downside to this apartment, otherwiseit would have been perfect. Olivier was notified with the above as soon we checked in and he apologised and he tried to help as much as possible as he was away from Paris, which was very kind on his part. We recommend this place yet it's important to keep the standards as high as possible, especially cleanliness, for such a nice Airbnb.

L’appartamento è propio come si vede dalle foto . È comodo al centro e in una zona tranquilla e carina. Noi eravamo in 5 e siamo stati benissimo. Oliver è gentilissimo e attento a qualunque richiesta o necessità si abbia. Da consigliare

This is a great place for a family looking to explore Paris. We got Uber from here into central Paris for €15 most days. So easy. Very quiet. Some lovely restaurants within 5 minutes walk. Very cool pace. Very clean and comfortable
Great apartment, easy to get to the city centre. Olivier was kind and quick to respond to any questions we had. We really enjoyed our stay.
Apartamento muy bien comunicado, a 25min en transporte publico del centro de Paris. Con tiendas y restaurantes cercanos. Muy recomendable para pasar unos dias.

The apartment was spacious and very suitable for our family, of 6. I love the location and the area. Close to lots of green space and really just a little stroll down the hill to restaurants for supper and croissants for breakfast.

Communication was clear and quick, the location was just right for us and the parking was super in a city like Paris. Olivier was always attentive and answered everyone of our question promptly. The place was full of extras that we enjoyed...recommend when staying in Paris

The apartment is perfect for 3-4 people and has a nice open space. It is directly outside of Paris, and near a train station where you only need about 15-20mins to the city center. In the town, where the apartment is located, there are also some nice restaurants and a supermarket in walking distance. It was a great place for people looking to stay close to Paris. The car park was also very helpful. The apartment also had a nice kitchen space.

A lovely stylish apartment. Olivier is very helpful and swift to respond. He looked after my family very well.  Very close to central Paris so a good base for exploring. Olivier recommended a charming local restaurant too.

Very stylish apartment 2 minutes from the tram to la Défense which is an excellent jumping off point to visiting Paris. La Défense has the third in the series of arches that includes l’arc de triumphe, making it a great start to the visit.

Teams are every 3-5 minutes.

There are shops about 5 minutes walk downhill from the apartment that sell all the essentials., and La Défense has a huge shopping centre, including a three level Auchan.

Olivier is extremely helpful, and very fast in responding to any queries. 

We really enjoyed our stay in Paris, based in his apartment.
El apartamento de Oliver es muy confortable. Además es un buen anfitrión

Lovely apartment, very clean and comfortable. Great hospitality, easy directions and access to the property with clear and really helpful instructions which made navigating in Paris alot easier. Had a beautiful meal walking distance from the apartment at Olivier's recommendation.

This was my first stay in an air b&b and I was more than impressed with everything! The apartment is exactly as pictured... there were 5 of us staying...The double bed which is pictured was huge and very comfortable and two people slept on the sofa bed and one on a single mattress on the floor all of which were very comfortable too! Olivier was very responsive and answered all my questions about travel, etc, even though we never met him in person. Would 100% recommend!
An unique decoration and a wonderful apartment.

Olivier was very responsive and provided us recommendations on local restaurants and things to do. The apartment was in a great location and close to everything we needed. We highly recommend staying at Olivier’s apartment.

We loved our stay at Olivier's place! It was a short trip and we did not give much notice for a booking. Olivier was able to accommodate our all of our needs for a great rate. Also while treating us like VIP guest. Recommendations for transportation to Paris and also local neighborhood treasures were very helpful for our overall experience. We loved the little town of Suresnes was a charm! We enjoyed our walk around and family dinner in the town square just as much as our time in Paris. We would recommend this spot to our traveling friends and family.
Wonderful apartment in town! Safe, easy access and close to everything we needed!

The space and location were ideal for a comfortable stay close to Paris and airports. The apartment was very spacious and beautifully decorated. 
Thanks for hosting us at the last minute.
The appartment is tidy, nicely ventilated and spacious. Very close to the city center aswell.

Great for overnight stay and close to Les Parc Des Princes stadium where Woman’s  team was playing for World Cup. Comfortable beds and clean. We did not take advantage of coffee or tea but Olivier let us know we were welcome to amenities.

I never seen a more luxurious apartment than Olivier's apartment.  Photos do not convey the atmosphere and the thoughtfulness of every detail.  Delightful modern gothic style.  bedroom with a huge bed with clean linen very comfortable mattress and pillows.  Olivier also offers you a dry breakfast, coffee, cocoa and tea with a choice of sugar and milk.  easy check-in and check-out with a code lock.  I did not meet Olivier but he was always in touch with me on (Hidden by Airbnb) .  Olivier thank you so much for the great pleasure of visiting your magnificent, delightful apartment.  Highly recommend !
very nice service and good apartment
Highly recommended for a stay in Paris, nice balance quality-price for Parisian standards.
Sehr schön eingerichtet und sauberes Appartement. Olivier ist ein großartiger Gastgeber und die Kommunikation klappt reibungslos.

Great space. Immaculately clean. This is a true self-checkin location.  Great for people traveling late so there is no annoying pressure to be on the host time. I would definitely recommend this to anyone.

A clean, convenient apartment near a train stop and relatively close to the Eiffel Tower.  Olivier is quick to respond and helpful with access to the apartment.  It does have a separate sleeping space/bedroom, but isn’t fully walled off from the main apartment for those traveling with more than two people.  It was everything we needed our first night in France and I would stay here again!
Good location

Beautiful flat with a bit of punk. Loved the decor. Olivier was helpful with navigating the metro and helping us get to the heart of Paris. Suresnes is gorgeous and it felt like a safe place even late at night. He offered an organic breakfast which was simple and elegant with fresh baguettes! Recommended if you want a place just outside the city of Paris with easy access to everything
Amazing place I will highly recommend it
Es un apartamento muy lindo, impecable y su ubicación es buena porque está el tren y el metro muy cerca.
Toller Gastgeber, schönes Appartement und unkomplizierte Kommunikation
Great place to stay when visiting Paris, close to the station, restaurants and shops within walkable distance, host is very nice.

Muy bien ubicado, muy cerca de la estación del metro muy cómodo!
Olivier muy atento y amable en todo momento!

Olivier is a great host. We didn’t get the chance to see him as we arrived to Paris quite late but he was very present in terms of communication. He gave us clear indication for the check-in, he prepared the sofa bed for us because he knew we were gonna arrive late therefore be tired, he bought some bread and croissants for the next day, he suggested where to go near the flat... in summary we had a good time in Olivier’s place which I recommend!
Hemos estado confortables.
Great stop, close to Bois de Boulogne, Neuilly, Parcs... and hospital if needed!

Great host but I'm sorry to say that place was not clean,  dusty all over and unwashed sheet and towel. Smell like smoke with some kind of perfume to diffuse odor caused me allergy reaction. Olivier needs a good house cleaner. Thank you for the wine bottle. I'm sorry, I had to be honest.
Beautiful apartment. Pictures don’t do it justice. Great area.  Easy to get too and fantastic host.  We will definitely request this place again
Stylish apartment very close to the Metro line made for quick and easy access to the city center. Definitely recommend!

Olivier was an amazing host! He’s extremely helpful - it was our first time in Paris and Olivier took the time to answer all of our questions within a few minutes of asking! 
Excellent and quick communication.
The place has an interesting decor and was sparkling clean.

Highly recommended!
Location excellent with public transport available for a short commute into Paris.
Easy and convenient check in (particularly as antisocial hours). Welcomed to a stylish, warm, homely apartment that was clean and had everything we needed!
Oliver was more than happy to give recommendations and advice when asked; we had an amazing meal at a local restaurant! 
Would definitely visit again!

El alojamiento es perfecto para unos días en Paris. Está un poco alejado del centro pero tiene tren y autobús cerca del apartamento. Es igual a como se ve en las fotografías. Una experiencia muy agradable

Olivier’s place was very comfortable and just as advertised. Communication with Olivier was exceptional from the time of booking to departure. Eve was very accommodating and willing to help with questions about the apartment and transit into Paris. 
The metro and buses are near by ...took bus route 244 from Suresnes Longchamp stop to Porte Maillot then transferred to bus route 82 Luxembourg to get to the Eiffel Tower.
Great Stay!

Für unseren Kurztrip nach Paris war das Appartement genau das Richtige. Wir fanden es sehr schön, etwas außerhalb zu wohnen; eine ruhige Lage und kleiner Ort, mit Restaurants und Geschäften. Die Kommunikation und Absprache mit Olivier hat super geklappt, er hat uns sofort empfangen als wir ankamen. Wir konnten den Tiefgaragen-Parkplatz nutzen und fanden es sehr praktisch, mit unserem Gepäck den Aufzug zu nutzen. Das Appartement ist - wie auf den Fotos zu sehen - sehr geschmackvoll eingerichtet, es bietet alles, was man braucht. Olivier hat uns alles gezeigt und erklärt und wir durften uns auch an den Lebensmitteln im Kühlschrank bedienen - wirklich sehr nett. Wir hatten zu dritt ausreichend Platz und haben die kurze Zeit sehr genossen. Die Fahrt nach Paris ist unproblematisch und schnell; der Bahnsteig ganz in der Nähe.
Wir werden bestimmt nochmal wiederkommen und dann ein bisschen mehr Zeit mitbringen. Es lohnt sich bestimmt auch, Suresnes zu erkunden und einen Spaziergang durch den nahegelegenen Bois de Boulogne zu machen...
A very nice, cosy and stylish place to stay near Paris. Olivier is a perfect friendly host, responded quickly and answered all questions we had.

Highly recommend. host was extremely helpful for check - in and with any questions. host also helped find tickets for a show and got back to me very efficiently. very tidy property in great location and would go back to same location again.

Olivier's place is located in a nice neighborhood and very close to transport. It was extremely easy to get into the city. Olivier was very responsive in answering all questions that I had throughout my stay. Apartment was very clean, cozy, stylish. Highly recommended!
Great spot in Paris! Great communication and nice ambience.

Oliver’s place is well located in a safe area that is very close to the metro.  We traveled with our two girls, 17 and 11.  Oliver went the extra mile to make us feel special, greeting us with a bottle of champagne while also making arrangements to let us check in early since we arrived before the official check in time.  The extra amenities such as expresso and toiletries were appreciated. The parking was also a major bonus since we brought our vehicle. Communication with Oliver was excellent throughout our stay.  I would highly recommend if traveling with family.
Olivier is the best host! We had a great time here! Thank you for everything!!
Olivier was a fantastic host. From the beginning was easy to get a hold of. Clean and comfortable. Would recommend to anyone staying in Paris.
A great stylish flat. Good position in East Berlin. Easy to access transport and restuarants. Thank you Olivier.
Olivier was very welcoming and hospitable, was willing to accommodate our needs (we came very late). The apartment was close to the public transport where you can easily rich the city center.
very well described good value excellent host
amazing place to stay. very close to tram station. the appartment was clean and had all the amenities one needs. if I come again to Paris will stay with Oliver.
Good host and a good location to Discover Paris.
謝謝Olivier的招待,公寓不是巴黎市區,不過因為有停車位非常方便,離車站也很近,在巴黎停車不容易且很貴,因此非常推薦開車的旅客選擇Olivier的公寓｡同時,公寓明亮寬敞,住起來非常舒適!

We are a family of three and had a wonderful time staying at Olivier's place. It is really tastefully decorated, very comfy and inviting. The place was very clean, very quiet and the neighbourhood is really nice. The Tram line T2 is just a few steps away and it brings you to "La Defense" where you can transfer to the Metro. The train ride into Paris Center was really easy for us, with a child in tow it is important for us to be close to transportation and have a grocery store nearby. There is a grocery store, restaurants and some nice shops a few minutes away, so this was perfect for shopping. Also, we really appreciated the washing machine and dishwasher, as well as all the amenities that Olivier provided. He even had some basics and a wine for us ready in the fridge when we got there! Having a parking space was perfect, since we travelled by car and needed a safe place to keep it without paying extra or getting a parking ticket. This is definitely one of the best AirBnb places that we stayed at! We would come back in a heart beat when we go back to Paris in the future.

Nach einem 2 wöchigen Urlaub in der Bretagne mit meiner Familie wollten wir zum Abschluss nach Paris.Nach einer kurzen Suche bei Air BnB bin ich auf Oliviers Wohnung gestossen.Die Wohnung  ist wahnsinnig schön und toll eingerichtet.Olivier ist ein super Gastgeber.Die Kommunikation war schnell und sehr sehr  freundlich. Die Wohnung ist sehr gut gelegen.Auf Wunsch kann man in der Tiefgarage parken.
Fazit: Alles TipTop und definitv weiter zu empfehlen!!

Excellent apartment perfectly located just 2 minutes from train station. 
Sparkling clean, fabulous space. I’m sure we’ll return for another visit. 
Communication with Olivier was excellent at all times and the organisation for access was perfect too. Highly recommended.

Fabulous chic and spacious apartment with one of the comfiest beds I have ever slept in! We loved the location as it was quiet but close to local amenities and so quick and easy to get into the centre of Paris. We were a family of 4 and there was room for everyone.  The apartment is well equipped and the youngest son particularly loved the remote control lighting! It was really useful to have parking at the apartment and Olivier was a great host. We would definitely stay again.

We had great stay at Oliver’s place. He was very communicative and even made arrangements for check in as our train got bit delayed. His place is very close to station is an added advantage. Overall great place to stay

The apartment block is on a steep hill, not good for us as we are older. We had to clean out the refrigerator of foods and drinks that had been opened or were past their 'use-by' date. Towels from the previous quests were still in the washing machine, the dishwasher wasn't unpacked, and the coffee machine was full of used coffee pods. A friend of Olivier's let us in, but we had to wait for a while until she arrived. She then asked us to wait while she went and changed the sheets. The weather was particularly hot and the only thing to help with the heat in the apartment was a fan. We felt it was as hot inside as it was outside.
The apartment is stylish and airy and the location was great for our stay - just a 20 minute commute into Paris.

Ha sido una estancia fantástica. El apartamento de Olivier está muy bien ubicado dentro de Suresnes. 
En tan solo 2 minutos encuentras la estación de metro que conecta con el centro de París.
El apartamento está bastante bien equipado y a tan solo 5-8 minutos encuentras el Carrefour más cercano. El anfitrión es muy atento y en todo momento puedes escribirle para cualquier duda. 
Es muy aconsejable está estancia! Un saludo, animaros a ir!

Great place to say if you are planning a trip to Paris. The train station to city center just nearby the place. Everything were perfect also with nice room and fantastic hospitality. I am sure gonna miss this place!
The apartment was clean, bright and beautiful. With an easy comute into Paris, this apartment was perfect.
Great place to stay. Centrally located. Quite and very clean. Olivier was a great host had cheese, marmalade and milk for us in the fridge. Will defintly stay here again!

Upon arrival we were greeted by Olivier. He gave us a tour of the apartment and made us feel extremely welcomed.  His place is very clean, stylish and comfortable. The only “con” about the place is that there is no AC.  However, he does provide a portable fan. The location of the apartment is not central to the major tourist attractions, however the metro and train stations are nearby so getting around is not an issue. I definitely recommend Olivier’s place.

Die Unterkunft ist sehr schön eingerichtet mit vielen kleinen Details.
Sie liegt nur 3 Minuten von der T2 entfernt wo man in kurzer Zeit überall hinkommt.
Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind direkt vor Ort ca.2 min entfernt.
immer wieder gerne.
mfg Michael
Olivier is friendly. Stylish studio with a touch of humor. Close to the tram station.
한밤에 흑인 여자분이 이웃이 와서 문 두드며 뭐라함 헉! 우린 아이들도 없고 밤에 도착해서 짐풀고 있는데... 난감함
Fabulous flat, very stylish and comfortable. Olivier has been a perfect host! Strongly recommend!

Olivier is a very friendly individual. His place is great! Good location, near the train station. Apartment is beautiful.
Olivier even went the extra step and ordered us an uber to the airport on our day of departure.
Thank you!
Olivier is very responsive to our questions about local services, including transport info and guidance. Merci!

Olivier‘s Apartment is near la Defense. The apartment looks the same as in the pics. Olivier is a very nice host and he is always available for you, for any help. The tram and bus station are very near to the apartment. You have an under ground parking which for us , is a real relief in Paris. If you need to go to central Paris , you may have to change to M1 in la defense. All in all the stay was really great and I would recommend this place .
Good apartment, nice room and a reliable host!

A lovely flat in a great location outside Paris with private parking space. Very close to La Defense, only a short trip on the T2 tram. Then from La Defense you have access to the Metro and RER. There are many restaurants and a pub and many shops a short walk downhil to Suresnes. The 1-bedroom apartment is nicely decorated and spacious for 4 people. Olivier is also a great host. Highly recommended.
Die Wohnung ist super gelegen. Sie ist schön hell und wir haben uns dort sehr wohl gefühlt. Die Kommunikation mit dem Olivier hat super geklappt. Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt in Paris!

Oliviers place is stylish and comfortable. You can access the centre of Paris easily as the tram is only a 2 minute walk away. He greeted us so warmly and replied to any messages very promptly during our stay. He even left some French wine and beers for our arrival. 

Would recommend.

Olivier was a very good host. Very polite, respectful and very quick in answering any queries.
The place is stylish, safe, close to 2 train stations.
All in all, we had a great stay in Paris and one of the reasons we accomplished that was because we got this apartment at the right time and at the right location!

Wir waren überglücklich die Wohnung von Olivier gefunden zu haben. Sie ist modern und detailreich eingerichtet; ein sehr angenehmes Wohnerlebnis!!
Olivier war sehr zuvorkommend und freundlich und hat uns Frühstück nach unseren Wünschen bereitgestellt; mit den Check-In und -Out Zeiten war er sehr flexibel. Insgesamt eine wunderbar gelungene Reise. Wir würden jederzeit gerne wieder dort übernachten!

Everything was perfect. Good location, 20 min to the city center. Good neighbourhood, very calm and safe. Oliver was very kind, always attentive and concerned that we were well. Check in and check out was perfect. The apartment is super nice, beautiful decoration and with all details very well maintained, perfect for a stay in Paris. We would repeat in other chance!!

Although our stay in Paris was short, our time in Olivier’s apartment was so enjoyable. He was very welcoming and attentive to our needs.  Beautiful, modern,  cozy, with a great location, we highly recommend Olivier’s place. You will not be disappointed!

Very much enjoyed my stay at Olivier’s flat. The area is quiet and relaxing, but just a short jaunt away from central Paris. The flat itself was clean and comfortable, and I would be happy to stay again.
pas de commentaire
pas de commentaire
Un appartement idéalement situé et une hôtesse très agréable !

Très belle adresse, petit appartement d'artiste en plein coeur de Paris, très facilement trouvable et bien placé. India vous reservera le meilleur accueil possible tout en vous laissant une liberté très appréciable. Bon séjour chez elle, comme chez vous, mais en mieux !
Un accueil chaleureux, attentif et efficace. Merci India, notre séjour fut parfait. Le logement est bien placé et impeccable. À recommander !
Chambre bien placée et bien tenue, décoration originale et hôte sympathique.

Suite à un petit problème familiale de dernière minute, India a été super compréhensive et s'est adaptée aussitôt à nos modifications ! Sans elle, nous n'aurions pas pu maintenir notre séjour à Paris qui s'est super bien passé, faisant deux heureux avec pleins de souvenirs ! Merci India !

Séjour d'une seule nuit mais très sympathique ! India est à l'écoute de ses hôtes et partage beaucoup d'anecdotes. L'appartement est super bien situé et la décoration est vraiment unique ! Il a beaucoup de personnalité et est très chaleureux.
India est très sympathique, beaucoup de petites attentions et un petit appartement décoré avec beaucoup d'humour. Merci

India est une personne très accueillante et dynamique. L'appartement est nickel. Elle nous à fait découvrir son quartier le temps d'une soirée pendant le festival de jazz, c'était super.
Je recommande sans hésiter.

Le logement d'India est parfaitement situé, très propre et confortable. India est très sympathique et vous pourriez passer des heures à observer tous les détails de décoration assez atypique. On a super bien dormi et il n'y a même pas eu de bruit ! Merci encore

Très bon accueil, chambre confortable, très propre avec toutes les commodités sur place. L'appartement d'India est chaleureux et idéalement situé pour une petite escapade sur Paris.
Tout est simple avec India. Je recommande vivement.
A réserver sans réserve

Nous nous sommes sentis très à l'aise chez india.. india est une personne charmante, très disponible.
Le lit est très confortable. La chambre et la douche sont très propres.
L'emplacement, à côté  des métros, bus et à proximité de restos, commerces,est très appréciable. Quel plaisir aussi de visiter le marché des enfants rouge,les bords de Seine , Beaubourg...en partant à pied de chez india.
Une adresse où l'on a envie de revenir.
Merci india pour tes nombreux conseils

Appartement de caractère très jolie, bien situé, chambre privé propre et fonctionnelle. très bon accueil, India est une hôte très sympathique, bonne communication, à l’écoute de vos besoins et de bon conseils pour profiter du quartier. Je recommande fortement.
Personne arrangeante.
personne très sympa et très accueillante
Excellent séjour dans un appartement plein de charme et de fantaisie tout comme l’hote India !

Voilà un Acceuil digne de ce nom ! India aime recevoir et cela se voit. Son appart super cosy, sa situation géo idéale pour rayonner ds Paris, son humour et sa gentillesse nous ont permis de passer qq jours formidables à Paris . A recommander !!!

Je ne savais pas qu'elle est américaine, elle est super gentille et elle parle parfaitement la langue française! Mon amie ne comprend pas cette langue donc elles ont parlé l'anglais. Nous avons discuté beaucoup de choses.
La location de l'appartement est vraiment parfait! Il est au centre ville parce que l'on a marché pour aller les monuments. 
Je vous commende cet appartement!

L'appartement de India est très agréable, accueillant et chaleureux, à son image ! On s'y sent très vite chez soi. La cohabitation est facile, India est très respectueuse et aussi très ouverte à la discussion, on peut donc rester en toute intimité quand on le souhaite, ou profiter de son agréable compagnie quand l'occasion se présente.
L'appart est très bien situé : central, dans un quartier touristique mais agréable et vivant, on a tout ce qu'on veut en marchant 2 minutes. Malgré cela l'appart est très silencieux et calme.
Je ne trouve rien de négatif à dire, j'aurais aimé rester encore !

Son appartement est vraiment magnifique et elle est super gentille et accueillante. Elle est cultivée et sympa. L’appartement est très propre et dans un quartier très agréable. 5 stars! <3

Her apartment is really beautiful and she is super nice and welcoming.  She is cultured and friendly.  The apartment is very clean and in a very nice area.  5 stars!  <3
Une superbe expérience au cœur de Paris avec l’impression de se sentir « chez nous » grâce à India!
India nous a très bien accueilli, son appartement est bien situé et confortable

L'appartement de India est magnifique, typiquement parisien avec beaucoup de petits détails. La chambre se trouve dans un bel immeuble haussmannien. Il est situé dans le Haut Marais, l’un des meilleurs quartiers de Paris. En tant que personne ayant vécu à Paris, je ne peux que recommander cet endroit. Nous avons passé un week-end extraordinaire à Paris chez India.

Nous reviendrons
India est très gentille et très accueillante. La chambre était très propre. Nous n'avons eu aucun soucis. Proche des transports il a été facile de visiter Paris.

Ce fut un réel plaisir de partager un peu de notre voyage avec India et son compagnon. L’accueil était chaleureux comme tous les échanges que nous avons eu (merci pour cette initiation à la guitare sèche). Malgré le partage des lieux communs, l’intimité de chacun est très bien respectée. Tout était propre et à disposition (draps, serviettes, savon, équipement de cuisine) pour un séjour confortable, sans compter toutes les bonnes adresses conseillées par la maîtresse de maison ! Nous avons trouvé là tout ce qui signifie être dans une chambre d’hôtes, en bref, merci pour tout !

Accueil chaleureux et jolie chambre en plein coeur de Paris !
Quartier très agréable et plein de petits restaurants à proximité.
India est une hôte très à l'écoute, qui nous a donné de bons conseils.

chambre claire, confortable et spacieuse pour un petit logement  parisien. Avec de quoi suspendre ranger aisément les vêtements.
Un bon rapport qualité-prix, un bel accueil et une disponibilité pour des horaires d'arrivée plus flexible ou des moments d'échange - si désirés - comme une grande discrétion si vous préférez rentrer directement dans l'espace qui vous est réservé.
Super accueil et emplacement idéal, on vous le conseille sans hésiter. :)
India est une hôte parfait, dans un charmant petit appartement dans le marais. L'emplacement est idéal, et les conseils aussi. A recommander sans hésiter
India est une super hote avec un appart qui lui ressemble, cool et original
Cosy room in a nice flat ideally placed. The interior decoration is amazing and India is a perfect host. Highly recommended!

India's place is great! Great location in a good price! The beds were comfortable and room was clean, the shower was amazing. The appartment is small and lacking a bit of privacy to our opinion. Besides, India is very kind and welcoming and helpful beyond expectations !
India is an amazing person!  Like her apartment.  It is the representation of the bohemian of Paris. It's perfeeect!!!

Ich hatte explizit nach einer Vermieterin gesucht, die den ursprünglichen Airbnb-Gedanken des persönlichen Kontakts und Austausches mit den Gästen bewusst lebt. Genau das habe ich bei India gefunden. Sie ist eine zuvorkommende Gastgeberin, die für Fragen und Gespräche gerne zur Verfügung steht, ohne sich dabei in irgendeiner Form aufzudrängen.
We stayed here for 4 nights and we loved it! Great location, lovely host and delightful apartment.
clear, clean, cosy, lovely host.
Very close to Metro, helpful advice and kind host.

India was lovely and welcoming and her home is the coolest place I've seen in my life. Towels and bedding was provided and the check in couldn't have been more uncomplicated! The location of the house was also absolutely perfect. It was my first time in Paris and Marais was a really fun place to see.
Top

Charming little flat in the middle of city, a lot of things in walking distance. A lot of interesting details like the winding staircase and the hand crafted kitchen. India is a very friendly and helpful host with a passion for art. The area is a good mix of a busy urban and relaxed bohemian neighbourbood.

Toppen bra placerad i Paris. Värden var väldigt välkomnande och hjälpsam. Jag rekommenderar.

The apartment was well located in Paris. The host was inviting and helpful. Totally recommend.
A very good ambience, and a very social host

India is a lovely person and a great host! The room is cozy and has everything you need for a great stay in Paris. On top, the location is adorable to explore the city! I definitely recommend this experience :)
Charming hostess, with a lovely place, clean and convenient. She offered many local suggestions. Would highly recommend her to a stay in Paris
India is super great host!

메트로랑 가까워서 좋았습니다
방도 화장실이랑 연결되어서 좋았구요
주방도 자유롭게 사용할수 있어서 좋았습니다 냄비 후라이팬 전자레인지 냉장냉동고 식기류 와인잔 젓가락 칼 도마 세탁기 등등 다있습니다. 
무엇보다 India 너무 유쾌하시고 미국사람이셔서 영어도 잘통해서 편했습니다.
This is a very authentic place, a real Parisien flat as you find them described in many  french novels.
Great stay! This is place is lovely and comfortable. Great location in the centre of the Marais. Highly recommended!!
위치 좋고 방 좋고 연락도 잘 되고 다 좋음. 굳이 단점을 찾자면 방음이 잘 안되는 것? 그래도 아주 훌룡한 숙소였습니다.

메트로도 집 바로 앞에 있고 근처에 시장도 있고 마트도 많고 쇼핑할 곳도 많고 좋았어요, 집은 사진보다 조금 아담하긴 했구, 크고 무거운 캐리어를 가지고 올라가기엔 계단이 좀 비좁고 높아여,, 가벼운짐이 있을 때 묵으면 더 좋을 것 같아요. 공동욕실을 쓰긴 했지만 겹치는 시간이 없어서 큰 불편함은 없었어요. 밤에 좀 추우니까 이불은 꼭 덮구 자면 좋을 것 같아요. 인디아는 친절해요, 다른 후기처럼 함께 많은 시간을 못 보낸게 아쉬울 정도로.. 파리 구경하기에 좋은 위치의 집이라고 생각해요!

India 정말 착하시고 귀여운 분이세요!!
집에서도 항상 좋은 냄새나고 침대도 너무 편해요!!!!!
