집 근처에 monoprix라는 큰 마트가 있어서 정말 편했어요!!

ﾊﾟﾘの中心に位置するこの場所はｽﾄﾗｲｷ中のﾊﾟﾘを観光するにはとても便利がよく､効率的に移動することができました｡
ｷｯﾁﾝを使い近くの市場で食材を買い､料理ができ､ﾊﾟﾘの日常を感じることができました｡Indiaは沢山の情報を提供してくれます｡明るくて､楽しくて､優しい｡
また是非この場所に戻ってきたい｡

Highly recommend this place! India is a great host who helps you have a better experience in Paris. She shows you all of the best food and drink spots and her place is in such a great location. Her personalised map linked to (Hidden by Airbnb) also made our trip so much easier. Don’t think just book it!

Such a perfect Airbnb experience. India is the best host! I felt like a welcome guest in her home and thoroughly enjoyed our conversations. It was easy and relaxing to be there. The location is terrific for exploring Paris - a great neighborhood feel with close access to the big sites as well. India's place is charming and the bed is very comfortable!  I am eager to return on my next visit to Paris!
난 수원사는 한국인이다 일부러 번역 이상한거 있다해서 이런 말투로 남김 호스트 정말 착하고 영어 정말 잘하고 재즈바 가고싶다하니까 바로 초대해주고 상상도 못할 기억을 남겨주심 세탁기도 있어서 진짜 좋았고 너무 친하게 많이 말도 같이하고 자주 지내서 꼭 가면 정말 좋아해주시고 엄마같으심 나 믿고 가삼

No accommodation can be perfect. If the location is perfect, the rooms might be small. If the price is fantastic, the place will be on the fifth floor without a lift… .Airbnb guests need to choose the parameters that are most important for them which would render their stay a success.

My husband and I have come to Paris for 5 days to celebrate our 25th anniversary. Our number one concern was to find a place in a central location that would allow us to walk everywhere, which will have easy access to the metro and enjoy a lively night scene but still feel safe to walk home late at night. The location has exceeded our every expectation. The metro is on your doorstep, main city centre attractions (Pompidou centre, hotel de Ville, Notre dame, place de la Republique…) are a short walking distance away. “Le Marais” is a neighbourhood that never sleeps. It’s colourful, full of markets and shops, bistrots and bars. We came home at all hours of the night and never felt a moment of concern.

Our second concern when staying at someone’s house is the quality of sleep. India invested in quality mattresses, pillows and covers. We slept like babies! The room is completely isolated, so no noise comes in from the street.

The shower was wonderfully luxurious, and we’ve never experienced any discomfort for the fact it was shared.

“Bedroom in haut marais” is a charming old apartment which was lovingly restored by keeping its original charm.

The best part about this stay was hands down – its host. India fits perfectly in her surroundings, she’s wonderfully quirky, intelligent, original and creative. She will give you all the space and privacy you need and be a great friend to hang around with and get information from. She has generously given us advice, help and her friendship and made our trip all the more memorable.

This apartment listing honestly describes the advantages and disadvantages of the place, if you take the time to read it carefully, you’ll have a perfect idea of what you’ll be getting, with no surprises.

I’ve been to Paris many times before and have always stayed with Airbnb people, this has been my best experience so far! Thank you India, be definitely seeing you next time I’m in town.
India is a super nice host, and location is really good, I highly recommend this place.

India is very hospitable! The apartment is inventive, cozy and clean. We can sincerely recommend it.

Dies ist Airbnb wie man es sich so gerne wünscht! Für Euch, die Ihr gerne Kontakt mit den Gastgebern haben wollt, ist dieses Privatzimmer in einer originellen “typischen” Pariser Wohnung das richtige! 
Wie India richtig auf Ihrer Seite vermerkt, nichts für Leute die einfach nur ein Zimmer mit maximaler Privatsphäre haben wollen. 
Wir hatten ein perfektes Wochenende in Paris bei einer sehr netten Gastgeberin in einem originellen schönen Apartment, in einem bezaubernden Viertel ! 
Immer gerne wieder!
India's place was amazing! Very well located, close to Centre Pompidou and Picasso museum. Also the communication and check-in was fast and easy. Loved the place. We hope to come back soon!

Great place to stay in one of the best neighbourhoods of Paris, centrally located and very easy to discover the rest of the city (we did most things walking). The apartment was clean, authentic and comfortable. India is a great host, she was very friendly, easy-going and gave us many local tips!

India’s place is in a very well located part of the city. The nearby metro gives easy access to main destinations. There are many restaurants, shops, etc. nearby. India is an excellent host, willing to share her knowledge of the city. The room is quite cozy for two people, but India is willing to share her living space. My wife and I had a wonderful experience staying here.
India’s place is in a great location. She describes her space well and is so very friendly. Have a special time in Paris!

Really love India so much for her considerate details such as check in instruction, locker information, recommended restaurant and local brand cosmetics. We do enjoy the stay with India and she treated us as friends and was willing to share thoughts with us. We spent some nights chatting with each other to have culture immersion. 
For the room, the bed smelt so good and soft to have a nice dream. The tiny balcony is my favorite place to stay in India’s house. You can have a cup of coffee watching people and cars at street. Besides, the location is pretty nice with 3 exits of metro nearby. Wherever you go, it only took us within 30 min. Perfect location!
The apartment is well located and nicely decorated
Couldn’t have been better. Apartment was beautiful and equipped with everything I needed. The host was very kind!! and the location was really great. Would definitely stay here again!
India's place is delightfully quirky. The apartment was clean and spacious for two guests. There were lots of little details too which made you feel at home. We would definitely stay there again!
Great location to explore Paris from. We were able to do lots of our things by foot, especially with Le Marais right at the doorstep.

India’s apartment is quaint and comfortable.  My wife and I really enjoyed our short stay!!  Bringing our luggage up the tight spiral staircase was a little challenging, but fun and well worth the effort.  India is very personable and knowledgeable about the area and it was a great pleasure to visit with her.

India is a super host who makes you welcomed and comfortable staying at her appartment. Her place is central, very clean and has many of her personal touches making it enjoyable and helping get to know Paris life style. Definitely recommended to friends and fellow travelers!
Lovely host

The Apartement is in the best location. It is very nice and cosy.
India is superbe!!

India is the best!!! Great host, wonderful conversations, and she's fantastically funny. She takes good care of her guests, all the amenities are there, really nothing could be better. And of course her English is really perfect, crystal clear, so you'll have no problem understanding her. Just don't ask for English lessons!!! 

The location is great, very easy to walk to a bunch of major Paris sites, esp. Centre Pompidou and Notre Dame. The area can be a little pricey, but then again, so is all of Paris. Kitchen is very nice, and lots of nice touches all around the house. It feels very comfortable to live in the house, you'll feel right at home. We recommend! You won't regret it.

India is one of the most friendliest hosts we ever stayed with. I will always remember the conversations we had over a bottle of wine she opened for us. Her place is in a great location. Easy walk/ tram ride to all the tourist sights. Some great restaurants around the place. She gave us very nice food suggestions and local tips. We would have never been able to watch a free movie at the open air theater if not for her which turned out to be a great evening. Her place itself is very interesting and has very creative touches. She provided us all the required amenities. We definitely got a very Parisian feel at her place. Highly recommend to future guests.
India’s place was so unique and genuinely her. She has thought of everything a traveler may need and was very accommodating and made us feel at home.
This place was just what I was looking for. Clean, friendly, easy to live in environment. Great location in a nice neighborhood convenient to the metro. And India is really a super host!
Great place in an amazing location, highly recommend!
India was super nice and helpfull, as well as welcomming! Her place was unique and we felt like home there. We would like to come back

숙소 위치기 마레지구나 메트로 역과 가까워서 좋았어요! 이동하기에 적당한 위치인거 같아요! 호스트분과 독립된 공간이여서 생활하는데에 문제없어요! 가끔 만나면 안부 전하는 정도예요! 조금 놀랐던건 볼일 보는 화장실과 샤워실이 따로 있는거 그래서 좀 놀랐는데 프랑스에서는 일반적인 거라고 하니 신기했어요!ㅋㅋ 생활적인 부분에서는 선풍기랑 공동 냉장고와 세탁기가 있어서 좋았어요! 호스트분도 유쾌하신 분이여서 좋습니당!!

정말 추천해요!! 마레지구 북쪽에 있어서 접근성도 좋고, 동네는 오히려 조용해서 이용하기 편리했어요. 인디아는 정말 친절하고 신경을 많이써주는 호스트구요. 에펠탑이나 샹젤리제 쪽 주로 구경하신다면 위치가 베스트는 아닐수도 있겠지만 저한테는 위치도 최상이었어요 메트로 역이 가까워서 사실상 어디라도 갈 수 있구요. 샤워기도 따뜻한 물 잘 나오고, 사진에서보다 훨씬 깔끔하고 귀여운 방이에요.

India was a fantastic host! She welcomed us in her home, and allowed us to have a cosy experience. The bedroom is perfect for two people, with an attached place to shower. There is tea and coffee in the kitchen. The location is very central and there are bars, restaurants all around. There is a market called Les Enfants Rouge where you can grab fresh groceries or a meal if you'd like right around the corner. India knows a lot about Paris,  and can give you great advice. We had an overall amazing experience, and would recommend you to stay here too.
India is a very good host. Her place is very cozy and nice. The location is great and she will give you some helpful advice on things around. The room is clean. She has a narrow stairs to her house.
Great location and India  has all.the local tips and  knowledge you'll  need. Great place for a stay in Paris. Thanks so much!
This place was great! Great location, close to metros and public transit options, and within a bit-so-far walking distance to The Louvre and other landmarks. Would recommend!
A beautiful and stylish apartment located in Le Marais. India was a friendly and informative host who gave great local recommendations. Would stay again!
India was a great host, and we enjoyed very much staying with her during our trip. The place is also conveniently located, cozy and clean. Would highly recommend.
India is very nice host. And the place is lovely and cozy. I really wanna stay here again :)
Nice host in a fun neighborhood by a beautiful park.
We really enjoyed staying with India! She is super nice, helpful and her little apartment is very charming. We would stay with her any time again!

India has a lovely place, very clean and perfectly located for good access and area. . She is an excellent host & helpful in organizing and answering all our questions immediately.  We felt welcomed. I have to commend India as she took the trouble to have my charger sent to a friend in town who was visiting as well to get to me.. she didnt need to do that but she is a lovely person, helpful and friendly.  You will love it at her place.!

If it’s your first time traveling to Paris but you want to feel like a local, stay with India. Her home is a sparkling clean work of art and centrally located. My trip wouldn’t have been have as great if it weren’t for India. She was always there to answer questions, had all sorts of recommendations, was exceptionally generous, and knew so much about her neighborhood and city.
A cute little apartment at a very nice location, well connected by metro, great hospitality and perfect for solo travellers like me :))

We love Paris the first day we arrived.But without India,our trip in Paris wouldn't be a wonderful experience.She is totally amazing,we were affected by her honest,sincere and her passion for enjoying life.You can always find interesting decorations in her house.We will cherish the beautiful memories with India ,and we really wish to see her again in the future.Hug,India.Love from Hu and Matt.

You go to India's place to have a truly AirBnb experience. She is a great host! She was very kind with us, gave us privacy and was available for us if we needed it. Her place is walking distance from the Notre Dame and  coffee places and bakeries. The room, bathroom and shared spaces were sparkly clean. She was even kind enough to invited us to a dinner party with her friends (the food was delicious). I highly recommend her place to have a great stay in Paris!!!
Very good.

India的房间非常的干净舒适!一切都很方便!位置非常棒!在市中心! (Hidden by Airbnb) 都很近…楼下有超市和地铁站!还有很多好吃的餐厅!后面的街上还有很多中国超市和餐厅!India非常友好!在一起聊天开心!如果你来巴黎~真的非常推荐她家的民宿!
India's house are very clean and comfortable! Everything is very convenient! The location is especially good! In the center of the Paris! It is very convenient to go anywhere! There are many delicious restaurants downstairs!  Walk to the metro station in one minute ! The India's room is the best home in Paris!

My friend and I were traveling through Europe and Paris was our last stop. India was so helpful in getting to know the area in only 3 days. The place was perfectly located, very walkable. Would definitely stay again, thanks India!

India's place is very comfortable, easy to access by metro, and pretty close to Notre Dame and other interesting places. She has this map with restaurants, bakerys, etc., by type of food and price, very helpful. And she allows you to self check-in, so you don't need to worry about the time of arriving or leaving.
India was a great host! She was very hospitable and was kind to us throughout. The accommodation itself was clean, comfortable, and cozy. We had a fantastic stay.

지하철역에서 가깝고 방이 청결하고
침대가 트윈이라 좋았습니다. 
샤워실은 불편하지 않았지만 화장실은 약간 멀었습니다. 
2층에 있던 집이었는데 엘레베이터가 없어서 캐리어를 들고 올라가느라 힘들었습니다. 
하지만 인디아는 아주 친절했고 정말 좋은 사람입니다!

A very cool, quirky space in the middle of a very nice part of town. 

India is very helpful with her tips and was a very friendly host.

The space is quite communal so if that is not your thing then I would recommend booking somewhere else. If, like us, it is your thing then I would recommend this home.

We stay 5night in India's home,she's very nice and we had good time in paris.Everything is  convince and ver clean! Thanks !
我们一共两个女生在她家住的,麻雀虽小五脏俱全,地理位置非常棒,冬天暖气的温度也调的刚好,她还有些小魔法在房子里给我们展示了一下,很有趣!如果在巴黎玩住这是很棒的选择了,主要卫生真的很干净｡

India’s hospitality as well as the amazing location of the apartment made for the perfect Paris experience! Furthermore, the bedroom was much quieter than expected based on the fact that it faces the street and with the exception of the random loud passerby, made for ideal sleeping quarters. The bed itself was very comfortable too, and India was always respectful of my schedule. I’d definitely stay there again!

India's home is very welcoming, the location is very convenient, there are three subways, there are many delicious French and Chinese food nearby, very suitable for living. India is very hospitable and attentive, the rooms are clean and spacious, and everything is very good. India will also give a lot of good advice, very warm and worth visiting.

India’s place is incredibly convenient, clean, and filled with thoughtful touches. Her washing machine was especially handy in my time of need! I had a fantastic time hanging out with her (in the kitchen) and having great conversations. Thank you!

I had an amazing stay at India's flat for a week - her apartment is at a perfect location (you can easily walk everywhere like me, or take metro as there are a lot of different lines around the location).  India was so thoughtful and kind during my stay. I will definitely stay here again when I go back to Paris!
India’s place is great and she’s awesome! She has great recommendations and is always ready to chat! It’s very central and has great restaurants in the area. Definitely would recommend staying here!
정말정말 친절하시고 유쾌하시고 너무 좋으세요 ! 항상 다 배려해주시고 있는동안 너무너무 편하게 있었어요 ! 화장실과 샤워실이 다른 공간에 있다는 이 한가지 빼고는 전부 전부 다 최고였습니당 !
인디아는 아주 세심하고 친절한 호스트였다. 그녀가 일 때문에 잠시 다른 곳에서 머물게 되어서 친구분이 집에 계셨는데, 그도 아주 친절했다. 인디아는 에어비엔비 메시지를 통해 불편한 점을 계속 물어봐 주었고, 집 근처 맛집도 추천해주었다. 숙소도 가격 대비 아주 훌륭했다. 침대도 아주 편했고, 필요한 모든 게 다 있었다.
India was very kind and showed us around her neighborhood the night we got there. The location was very convenient right next to the metro!
India’s Place was neat and tidy and in a great location!
Amazing stay! The hosts are fantastic. You would never regret a stay here! Location is also brilliant.

India is so amazing host. she is very kind, bright, humorous and helpful. The place is perfect. just across the street there is metro line 3,11 and bus stop is also on the same street. I was so happy and comfortable to stay with India. if you're sociable person, make a  wonderful parisian friend. highly recommend.
Loved India’s place! Decor and everything was great, and her guide to the city was so helpful. Would stay here again

위치가 참 좋아요
화장실이 조금 불편한데 괜찮아요 거의 밖에 있을테니
침대는 작은데 되게 편해요
Good location, easy to find and get around Paris, very nice

Staying at India's place was the best decision! Her apartment is charming, funky, comfortable, well-located and comes with an engaging host. There were fluffy pillows, a comfortable duvet, hot water, good web connection, easy to follow access instructions. Haut Marais is a great base to explore Paris and has delicious food choices. We had a fabulous stay in Paris and as much as I love trying new things, I'd stay here again.
We stayed at India’s place twice this trip and had a delightful stay both times :)
India, its  really nice and welcoming host. The location of the apartment its the best. Everything near by.

Perfect location in le Marais, near the metro and many good restaurants .
India is also nice, told us a lot of useful infos about Paris! 
Room is clean and cozy too.
Excelente ubicación, departamento muy bueno y muy limpio. Muy cerca de estación de metro y fácil de llegar. India es una excelente anfitriona! Nos ayudó mucho!

This place is great for a world traveller who is very open and sociable! The bed is comfortable and, since our stay is getting into the colder months, the duvet provided was very warm. I would wake up to a cold morning in other airbnbs, although we stayed only a night at India’s, I was happy to wake up warm and comfortable. Entering the building has a few steps, but if you have stayed at an airbnb in Paris before, this is not uncommon to apartments. Please also note that sometimes France has separated the room for the toilet and the bathroom. We had a good sleep and didn’t need the earplugs she provided; we are from a city and are used to city noises. 

India as a host was kind to invite us to join her and her friend at a taco restaurant. We had such a great time eating, drinking and talking... the evening would be prolonged well into the night! All the food we ate was good. The digital  ( (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps) recommendations for food and places, India linked us, was really cool since you see your own gps location, her airbnb and how far the recommendations are. English is a primary language for her, so you will have no trouble communicating. Your experience will turn out best here if you are more open and sociable, rather than reserved and prefer your privacy.

India's place is fantastic! She is such a wonderful host! I especially enjoyed spending a night out with her and a friend of hers eating Tapas and going dancing! She truly wants to make sure you are comfortable and have a great stay! It's like staying with a friend!

地理位置很方便
房間很舒適
但跟房東住還是有點拘謹
但喜歡跟房東聊天的很適合你

Best Host ever!!!
Thanks for everything.
Amazing location, unique apartment with everything you need! India was a great host and gave us many recommendations for Paris! We were most impressed with the location of the airbnb!

Had an amazing stay at India’s place. It was cozy and very neatly furnished with some amazing artsy stuff. She was super friendly and helpful in every way. She even gave us self-made digital maps of restaurants and shopping places which was very thoughtful. 
We were free to use the kitchen and laundry area which was a huge plus. 
Great location too; very close to the metro and bus stop. This is a very hip area with wonderful cafes at every corner. 
Really enjoyed my stay and would definitely stay again if I get the chance. 
Highly recommended.

房子位置很好,距离最近的地铁站步行5分钟｡距离蓬皮杜也很近,步行大约10分钟,去往蓬皮杜的路上有很多中餐馆｡
India 是一位很有意思的房东,会给我们很多建议,在遇到不清楚的地方时,还会上网给我们查找答案｡非常热情!

The room is very nice and clean ,and location is super convenient in Paris,can walk to some famous museums, or take metro for several stops to get there .and India is very nice and friendly .worthly to recommend it!!

What a lovely stay!  India's place is a tiny Paris apartment at the top of a narrow staircase one floor up from the street.  India is a wonderful host - a native English speaker, very helpful with French language and culture tips, and overall a delightfully lovely human.

The apartment is tiny, packed with art and delightful oddities, with big windows that open to the street below.  The room is the biggest in the apartment, very spacious, feels like a real oasis in but removed from the city.  The shower is as described - plenty of privacy for me but others may not feel as comfortable.  The toilet is in a tiny and curated water closet next to India's bedroom; that's the other place where some might need more privacy.  Noise - not only is the apartment tiny but the apartment building is old and in a hopping neighborhood in the city.  If you are not used to hearing neighbors in close proximity and noises from the street, a pair of earplugs would serve you well (and there were some provided!)

The location is THE BEST.  My goal in Paris was to eat good food and walk a lot.  I barely had to hop on the Metro (about a block away) as I could walk everywhere directly from the apartment.  Some amazing bakeries and restaurants and parks in the immediate neighborhood were lovely.  And all the jewelry shops around the apartment were wholesalers only so I couldn't even be tempted there.

If I were looking for seclusion I wouldn't stay here.  But the next time I wanted to stay in a bustling and fantastic location with lovely people I would absolutely stay with India again.
Although The place located near the city center, but I feel not comfortable with the house owner

진짜 숙소가 사진보다 훨씬 예쁘고 아늑해서 좋았어요!! 방이 진짜 너무 예뻐요. 그리고 진짜 깨끗해서 머무는 동안 진짜 편했어요... 세심하게 이것저것 준비해주셔서 감동도 받았구, 세탁도 가능한데 방에 빨래 널수 있는 곳이 있어서 여러모로 편리했어요. 
방도 넓직해서 캐리어 26인치짜리 두개 펼쳐도 충분했어요. 샤워공간이 오픈형이라 처음에 당황스러웠는데 전혀 문제는 안됐어요. 근데 변기가 호스트 방 바로 옆이고 방음이 잘 안되서 조금 민망했어요 ㅎㅎ 그리고 처음에 집올라갈때 계단이 좁고 높아서 캐리어올릴때 힘들었는데 호스트분이 도와주셔서 편하게 올라갔어요! 주변에 마트도 있고, 마레지구에 위치해서 맛집도 조금만 걸어도 다있어서 좋았어요. 이가격에 이정도 에어비앤비면 진짜 만족스러워요!! 다음에 또 가고 싶어요!

Great location. Very clean and exactly as described. Unfortunately did not get to spend time with the host due to our busy schedule although she offered us to join a meal with her. Would definitely recommend!

India is a great host and was very quick at communicating though she was on vacation. It’s a close walk to the metro and a great neighborhood . She gave us tips and suggestions about the places . We really enjoyed our stay !
El mejor sitio para estar muy a gusto casi como en tu casa, con muy buena ubicación y todos los detalles resueltos. Volvería a elegirlo. Gracias India!!!!

This place was great! Location was amazing and comfortable stay overall. India provided amazing recommendations and a map of her favorite places. She was great with communication and provided really detailed great check in instructions. 10/10 overall!
Amazing location, super stylish and artsy apartment, great host!!
호스트가 너무 친절하시고, 잘 대해주십니다. 위생이나 청결 문제도 없었고 마레지구 쪽에 위치해서 이런저런 경험도 많이 할 수 있었어요! 근처에 지하철 역도 있구요. 호스트가 맛집이나 마트도 알려주니까 편하게 물어보셔도 될 것 같아요. ㅎㅎ 잘 쉬다 가용!
Tolle Lage, sehr nett und gastfreundlich, keine organisatorischen Schwierigkeiten, netter Austausch mit der Gastgeberin, Reisetipps inklusive. Wir haben uns wohlgefühlt!
India's place is fantastic. Incredible location, very cosy and filled with interesting art. Check-in was easy, and we were able to get around very easily. We will be back!

What an adorably cozy stay in a great area of paris for food, culture, easy access to transit! My daughter and I slept very comfortably on our bed and had the great opportunity to stay in the cozy quarters of an artsy home with a warm and welcoming host.  India had excellent recommendations for food and places to visit in this eclectic and multifaceted area of Paris. The transit can be confusing ( especially for directionally challenged people like us) but India insured check in was easy with very specific directions and photos. She also helped us with our local travel plans and transit to the airport. A fantastic stay  with a wonderful host!
Thanks India! We hope to return::)
사진보다 방이 더 예쁘고 아늑했어요.

Very good and safe location in Paris! Great host that makes you feel right at home. The apartment is very clean and the room is very big. There is enough space for 2 people. Bed was comfortable. It was easy to get anywhere in Paris from this location. Would recommend to anyone and would definitely come back!
We had a great time at India's! The apartment is very cool and centrally located. It was perfect for our stay in Paris!

I can definitely recommend staying with India. India was very kind and helpful with giving recommendations. The welcome was very warm. Besides, the apartment is in a very nice area. Almost everything is in walking distances. I would stay with India again.

Stayed at India's for 3 nights this June. India's apartment is unique, wonderful and very homely! Bed and room clean and very comfortable! Places is located right in the city center. Everything you need is right at your doorstep. Thanks for a fantastic time! Will recommend your room to everyone I know
Estadia excelente!! A localização é maravilhosa, o quarto é confortável e India é uma excelente anfitriã! Super recomendo!

India’s place is comfortable clean and a great value. It is very close to many shops and restaurants. India is very cool, responsive, helpful and overall an excellent host!! I would definitely stay here again!

Passei momentos muito agradáveis no apartamento de India. Ela e seu marido são muito educados, gentis e solicitos. O quarto é arejado, tem espaço suficiente, cama confortável e não foi incomodo algum dividir o banheiro com eles. Tudo estava extremamente limpo. A localização do apartamento é excelente e o metrô, literalmente em frente (somente atravessar a rua). O bairro tem vários bares, lojas e restaurantes. Recomendo a todos se hospedarem com a India. E pretendo passar alguns dias la novamente caso volte à Paris. 100% aprovado!!
Nice location, chic apartment. Noise level at night not ideal - was pretty loud until around 4am, but otherwise was a good place.

The location of the apartment is excellent being situated in the upper Marais neighbourhood. The apartment is quite cosy but the host (India) was super nice and informative. We enjoyed our time there!

India’s place was perfectly located to hit all the major spots in Paris. There were some great restaurants and cafes near the apartment and she had wonderful recommendations. If you are just visiting Paris for a quick trip as I was or if you are staying for a while, this is a wonderful Airbnb.

Experience Paris like a local!  This was the perfect home base for two young travelers looking to see as much of the city as we could in 5 short days. First of all, what a charming apartment. India was a gracious host with excellent local recommendations and helpful, accommodating attitude. And what an amazing location - less than 1 block from the Metro, even shorter to a fabulous boulangerie, and a short walk to shops, restaurants, the charm of Le Marais and even the Hotel de Ville and Notre Dame!!  

As a side note, guests should be aware that the space is cozy, lovely, and Parisian in feel - but definitely feels like a shared space with the host.  This suited us well, but those looking for a more private or intimate room might wish to look elsewhere....but then again, what a shame to miss out on India’s lovely home!

India's home was one of the best places we have stayed at.  India was very helpful and accommodating in letting us drop off our bags, helping us decipher the metro station, giving recommendations for food and activities, and overall being a great host. She is very welcoming and easy to talk to and made us feel right at home. The location of the apartment was very central and close to many metro stops.  I would 100% recommend India's place!
India is quick to respond to any questions you have and her place is very clean and centrally located. We would recommend for any future guests.

Indie was very helpful in letting us drop off our bags early, giving us great directions to the apartment, a map of local restaurants etc, and overall being a great host. We felt very comfortable and right at home immediately. She is very welcoming and easy to talk to. Great location right near a metro stop. Would definitely stay here again.

India's home was better than the photos even show. Original hardwoods floors, comfortable bed with nice bedding, and a big shower. She gave me all the info I could have needed right when I arrived and I felt right at home. You can't beat this location in Paris, would definitely come back!
India was a fantastic host! She made us feel right at home! She was very helpful and informative, which made our stay even more enjoyable.

El  departamento está muy limpio, excelente ubicación y tiene lo necesario. Me hubiese gustado mayor privacidad en cuanto al baño, pero la descripción del alojamiento es muy clara sobre este aspecto. India es muy atenta y nos invitó un café delicioso!

India is a fabulous host!  She was very personable and helpful in guiding us where we wanted to go.  Her directions and knowledge of the city were top notch.  The flat is clean and welcoming.  She gave us a personalized tour of the neighborhood and Montmartre that you wouldn't get by a guided tour.  Absolutely loved our stay in Paris!  Will come back again!

Sono tornata volentieri a casa di India, e ho trovato la stessa precisione, disponibilità e voglia di condividere! Sono rimasta una settimana, per motivi di lavoro, la quotidianità è stata come 'vivere a casa'! La camera permette di dormire ma anche lavorare alla scrivania, è sufficientemente grande. Si affaccia su una strada ma con le finestre chiuse non si sentono rumori. Il wc è separato dalla doccia/lavandino, la doccia è calda e il getto è potente (cosa che apprezzo molto!). Lo spazio giorno è  originale, arredato in modo molto curioso! India e il suo compagno sono amichevoli e disponibili, abbiamo fatto delle piacevoli chiacchierate :). Ho anche usato la lavatrice, di qualità e intuitiva. Il quartiere è  meraviglioso, ricco di vita sia di giorno sia di notte, si trova qualcosa da comprare o da mangiare per tutti i gusti! inoltre, il quartiere è pulito e ben tenuto. Ben servito da tutti i mezzi di trasporto. Ci tornerò sicuramente!

La pasamos muy bien en lo de india! Ella es una persona super amable,  muy atenta y divertida! El departamento es super limpio, la habitacion espaciosa y muy comoda. Ademas la ubicacion es genial: fuimos a notre dame caminando (llegamos en 15 minutos), y a los otros lugares turisticos tomandonos el metro que queda en la otra cuadra de la casa. En conclusion, recomiendo totalmente alojarse en lo de india a los que quieren visitar la hermosa ciudad de paris!!!!!!

Amamos nuestra estancia en la casa de India. India es super atenta y divertida, al llegar nos recibió con un café y nos recomendó varios lugares ya sea para cenar, tomar algo o comprar víveres. El departamento es tal cual las fotos si no es más bello, la ubicación es muy buena ya que se encuentra en una zona movida de la ciudad con bares y tiendas, muy cerca del casco histórico si te gusta caminar llegas con facilidad a sitios de interés como el Louvre,  Notre Dame y el centro comercial. Recomendamos 100%.

India is very nice and friendly. She welcomes you not as another hotel's guest but just like her old friends.
Her place is super clean & tidy and in an ideal location; very close to some metro stations, a superb bakery! in few steps and some supermarkets.
I could enjoy very relaxing and heartwarming stay.

India is such a lovely person and makes sure your stay is amazing. We couldn’t have had it better, the bed is comfortable and I loved the fluffy pillows. Her flat is gorgeous and close to a metro station. We would definitely stay here again.

India has been very kind
I suggest her as a host to everybody
Thank you

India is great fun, very interesting, and her place is terribly charming.  There are two twins essentially connected, so it was no problem for me as part of a couple, but would also work for other less cuddly types.  Great recommendations!

Couldn’t have asked for a better stay! This location is very close to local stores, restaurants, and cafes and well-connected by public transport. The rooms were very clean, and we loved India’s hospitality and quirky place. One of the best Airbnb experiences we’ve ever had!
Apartment lokations are great. India is very helpful and friendly. The apartment is stylish and comfortable.

It was really a pleasant stay at India's place. She is very nice. The place is beautiful and clean, and convenient (with many Chinese food shops nearby). Can't really think of any better location to stay in Paris. Everything is great.

아주 좋았어요. 위치는 어느 대중교통이든지 이용하기에 아주 적절한 위치에 있었고 밤에 시끄럽지도 않았어요. 시설도 깨끗하고 따뜻한 물도 잘 나오고 세탁기와 부엌, 화장실과 샤워실도 편히 사용할수있었어요. 영어를 잘 못하지만 인디아가 친절하게 잘 해주었어요. 다만 방이 조금 많이 추웠어요. 그리고 현관에서 방으로 갈때 가파른 계단을 이용해야해서 짐을 옮기기가 조금 힘들었어요. 그걸 빼고는 만족합니다!!!

India is a very nice person, she helped me and gave me advices (things to do, places to eat, which metro is the best..) and she also created a map to show the guests the best places near the apartment. I was with my mother and sister who don't speak english or french but even so she tried to communicate with them making them feel at home. The apartment is really cute, clean and in a perfect position. I really recommend this place.
È stato davvero piacevole conoscere India nel suo curioso angolo del marais! L'alloggio è intimo e gli spazi sono "à la mode"! Tutto molto ordinato, organizzato, pulito e confortevole.

I have stayed in a good number of Paris’s Airbnbs’ and this stay was by far the best! Fantastic location, multiple metro options, cafes, boulangère’s. India is the epitome of what an Airbnb host should be. She should give lessons! If you are familiar with Paris, this is visiting as a Parisien. Great communication, helpful local knowledge and a great personality. Will plan my next trip knowing a key to the Banksy homage door will be as important as my Decourverte card!
Stylish and cozy apartment! Would love to decorate my own apartment like India's. Bedroom is much larger than I expected for Paris, and the bed is very comfy
Perfect host to experience Paris and lovely hospitality from the host as well, highly recommended!!

Communication with India from the start was excellent and gave us every confidence that our stay with her was going to be a very enjoyable one. It was.
Her apartment is unique in character and ideally placed for the metro and therefore all the sights of the city. India herself is a very warm and friendly person and always keen to give you insights into places to eat and drink in the local area. We enjoyed our stay completely and would like to thank India for her part in it.

Where to begin! We had a nightmare experience with a false advertised hotel and India was quick to open her home up to us on a moments notice. The hospitality right off the bat was phenomenal. I felt like we were best friends after talking for a couple of minutes. 

India has her own recommendations for her neighborhood that comes in handy if you want a locals experience. That's exactly what we dreamt of and that's exactly what I got. I was very pleased with my experience and highly recommend India's!

India's place is, like the host herself, very warm and friendly. India gave me a very detailed set of instructions about transportation before my arrival. I had a great time wandering around the city center of Paris by myself and even spent some time enjoying music at the house's cozy kitchen, with India's guitar. If you are a back packer who want to explore the city with convenience and have a comfortable place to stay at, this is the place.
Lovely home in a convenient location and India gave us travel tips which were really nice! Bed was comfy and room was airy and clean. Also loved the rustic decorations.
India was a great hostess. She replied promptly whenever I messaged her, and she gave plenty recommendations for things to do in the area. The apartment is perfect for a short trip.

India is a super host. We met up in the wine bar across the street where she recommended lots of places to eat and things to do over the weekend. Our stay in the flat was great. Stylish, cosy, with everything we needed for our stay. Would highly recommend trusting your stay to India!

Everything went perfect! India is friendly and we had a good time!

Nice place to be!
India's apartment is in a superb location. Her apartment is small and she explains the shared amenities very clearly, beforehand. The guest bedroom is very nice, and all is very clean.
Indiaはとても親切なﾎｽﾄです｡困ったことがあっても相談に乗ってくれます｡環境もどこにもｱｸｾｽしやすい場所です｡おすすめです!
India的房间地理位置很好,距离卢浮宫,巴黎圣母院等景点都跟近,地铁公交方便｡房子有一定年头,不大但是床挺舒服的｡共用洗手间｡早餐自理｡India is nice, friendly and willing to provide useful advise.
房间位置很好,很安全,走不远就是商业区,房间很干净,浴室有两个门,就是有个门仅仅是用帘子拉起来,感觉有点别扭,洗脸池下水不好,入住还是很完美的

Great palce, even better host!
Location is excellent and accomodation is a complete “best buy” option, beeing in the La Marais at that price. 
India is a lovely and carring host. She keeps the apartment very cleen and is highly devoted to her guests having all the info needed. at the same time she is respectfull abot your privacy and doesn’t force her company if you dont feel up for it.  And yet, what a lovely company she is. 
we have enjoyed every moment!
all the best.
We loved staying here!  India was so helpful.  Bedroom was comfortable. She gave us fantastic recommendations.

Wir sind glücklich, dass wir India kennengelernt haben! India und ihre Wohnung sind sehr kreativ, phantasievoll, charmant und witzig. Die Lage der Wohnung ist perfekt, zu Fuss ist man schnell im Marais oder am Centre Pompidou, und um's Eck gibt es jede Menge Bars und Cafes.

India is very friendly and accommodating! She was happy to have a chat. The shower is really good quality and the bed is comfortable. India has a map for visitors of the surrounding area on (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps. She gave us good advice about local tourist attractions. It’s a good neighbourhood, close to a park and the Metro. Gare du Nord is 3 stops away on the Metro, and the centre is really close by. The space was clean and comfortable and had a lot of amenities.

India is very helpful, funny, and easy to talk to. She was great about working around the details of my stay, arrival time, and with suggesting transportation options. Her apartment is fun and quirky, and perfect for a solo traveler who wanted to be in a central area. 

I really enjoyed my stay, and am glad that India opened her home to me. I highly recommend it!

Thank India for your understanding :) my husband and I did not look when booking, that this is only a room, not all apartments. But still! The apartment is very interesting, and if you only need one room you can safely stop! The area is beautiful!

Fellow people on airbnb,
This was my first time in Paris, and let me tell you, it would not have been the same without India as our host! She is extremely kind, helpful, lively, and comforting. She creates several maps for us to use with local restaurants, shops, bakeries, and all. My mom and I wanted to shop, woke up the next morning to a nap especially for shopping. She's the absolute best and honestly a big part of the reason I enjoyed Paris so much! My mom and I left feeling so happy. Her place is adorable and right next to a metro station. I highly recommend India and her place to anyone looking to have a wonderful time in Paris! Thank you India :)

India provided me with the best airbnb experience I've had. She was friendly, welcoming, helpful, and fun. Her apartment is wonderful, very charming and the location couldn't be better. I've stayed in other places in Paris and this is by far the best location. I cannot say enough great things about my stay here.
India is a very nice host. Her room is full of secrets to discover.

India's home was the perfect place for us to stay during our 3 days in Paris. It was really pleasant to share the apparment with her. India gives you the feeling you're at home. She welcomes you and provides you with local tips to explore Paris! 
I would definitely stay there again!!

So, thanks again India!

If you're looking for a great place to stay in Le Marais, look no further. We had the  loveliest week staying in India's home. Her place is a perfect mix of old and new, comfortable (the bed was one of the nicest we've slept in our entire trip) and charming and truly represents all that is Paris. In the heart of Le Marais, right out the door are cafes, restaurants, markets, boulangeries, and all kinds of shops. Within a minutes' walk you can be at the Arts and Metiers Metro stop where you can catch a train to easily visit one of the many museums or any other part of the city.
One of the nicest parts of our stay was meeting India herself. She was warm and welcoming and for us it was right away like visiting an old friend. Sitting in her kitchen, chatting over wine, bread and cheese, she helped us in planning our week and navigating our visit around the city. She was also very respectful of when we wanted to stay in our room and just chill...We already look forward to a return trip to wonderful Paris and a stay with India again...,

Great location, close to metro and plenty of places to eat.  Nicely away from all the other tourists, but close enough to attractions.  We hung out with India a bit and enjoyed our time with a real Parisian.  Her place is nice, with a very comfortable bed, and great character and personality apartment.  it was quiet at night for good sleeping.
Great stay. Awesome apartment, perfect location. Our stay was easy and comfortable. I especially loved the bar and restaurant recommendations from India (host).
India is a very nice host and we had a wonderful time with her. Location is great and close to Paris Metro station. Highly recommended :)

Do not hesitate to book this Airbnb if you have the chance. India is an absolutely incredible host - warm, charismatic, knows all of the best places to eat, and can tell you so much interesting information about the Parisian life that will make your trip so memorable. The bed was very comfortable (the best we have slept on in a long time), the shower was LOVELY, and the kitchen is incredibly well equipped. The style
of the house is perfect for that quintessential but not over the top Parisian feel :) do it! You won't regret it. We had the best time. Thanks India.

The location is amazing! Full of stores, restaurants and nice shops around. Easy to reach public transport and walkable. The apartment is charming, and India, the host, is very flexible and nice. The only problem is that the room is not entirely private since there is a second entrance to the sink and shower area and one can see the light and hear from the room if someone else is on the shower or using the sink. Moreover, the actual entrance to the shower is just with a curtain, so that could also be uncomfortable. In any case, if you don't mind this, the room is great and inexpensive for its location!

India的住处离巴黎重要景点(卢浮宫､巴黎圣母院､蓬皮杜中心)都比较近,去卢浮宫步行大概不到30分钟即可,周围有很多餐馆和酒吧,早上不远处也有面包店可以解决早餐｡离地铁两个方向都比较近,乘坐RER B到Châtelet - Les Halles,再乘坐metro 11到Châtelet步行5分钟不到就到了｡India是个很nice的人,她给了我们很多建议和帮助,我们聊的很愉快,虽然一开始拿钥匙遇到了点小麻烦,但我们也理解是突发状况｡我和我的朋友在巴黎玩的很愉快｡谢谢India｡

The location of India‘s apartment is very good, not far away from some famous place in Paris (Musée du Louvre, Cathédrale Notre-Dame and Le centre Georges Pompidou), less than 30 mins you can walk to the Louvre, there are lot of restaurants and bars around her place, you can eat breakfast not far away from there. The location not far way from 2 metro station, if you arrive at Charles de Gaulle Airport, you can take the RER B to Châtelet - Les Halles, then take the metro 11 stop at Châtelet then just walk less than 5 mins. India is a really nice people, she gave us lot of suggestions and helps, we talk a lot and have fun, although we met a little trouble to get the key at beginning, but it is understandable that is a sudden situation. Me and my friend have fun in Paris, thank for India.

Que dire mise à part parfait, le seul mot qui conviendrait pour décrire notre séjour ! 
L’hôte a été d’une hospitalité unique et très à l’écoute permettant de rendre notre escapade plus agréable. 
Encore MERCI
chambre spacieuse,hôte sympa,accès à tt l' (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande.
Chambre très confortable et  Junior est un hôte très sympathique
Vraiment bien tres propres accueillant une maison tres calme j'ai vraiment aimé et le prix indiscutable
Merci à Junior pour son accueil chaleureux ainsi que la propreté des lieux à vivres l’accessibilité à tous les équipements et accessoires. Je recommande ++ !
Tres bon rapport qualité prix
Agréable séjour tout est nickel , l'hospitalité , le confort une belle vue de l'extérieur merci encore.

Exactitude absolue du logement
Merci et à très bientôt
Parfait merci pour accueil
Une très bonne hospitalité, une chambre propre, l’hôte etait parfaitement à ma disposition, le professionnalisme est au rendez vous.
J’ai adorer l’accueil en plus de ce lieu qui était vraiment bien entretenu et propre ,une communication fluide et efficace et rien à redire sur le design de cette endroit .✅
Junior et sa compagne sont des hôtes très discrets.. L appartement et très propre et fonctionnel. Je recommande

Le logement de Junior est tout à fait conforme à l’annonce. C’est propre et bien desservi tout est fait de façon à se sentir comme à la maison je vous le recommande sans hésiter, encore merci pour l’accueil.
C'est magnifique

15mn de saint lazare emplacement parfait. 

Appartement très propre et grand,j’ai même bénéficié d’un accès à internet en un clic . 

Quant à l’hôte très  sympathique,il a été accueillant et souriant. Il a su s’adapter a mes contraintes franchement rien à dire, j’ai passé un excellent séjour . Je compte réserver quand j’irais de nouveau sur paris . 
 

Je recommande vivement les annonces de Junior .
Junior est un hôte parfait, je recommande fortement ! Un vrai plaisir
Nice and friendly host, would come back next time we are in the area!

Staying at juniors place is like staying at yours.
You can see the effort into putting up a place where you feel like home and I just feel like I could stay here forever.
Getting to Paris is as hard as walking a couple of minutes and waiting 15 mn.
Boom you're where the fun is.
Getting back home is easy
I would really love if you just gave it a chance.
Totally worth it.

Junior is a great host
I would recommend him to everyone:)
great hospitality and  quick response from junior. I recommended highly. Great place to stay and very good location.
pas de commentaire

Je vous recommande de loger chez Lyon et Thierry. Ils sont super accueillants et très ouverts d'esprit. J'ai passé une excellente soirée et nuit chez eux. Ils sont prévenants et veillent à notre confort dans l'appartement. En plus, vous aurez une belle vue sur Paris!
Lyon et Thierry sont très agréables et ont un très jolis appartement dans lequel je me suis tout de suite sentie à l'aise. Merci !
Deux hôtes intéressants, très accueillants et très attachants qui font une place dans leur vie le temps d'un séjour.
Deuxième séjour inoubliable chez Thierry et Lyon ! Je recommande :)
Une petite chambre très propre et calme dans un grand appartement, l'accueil est très sympathique, je recommande
Je recommande, des personnes très accueillantes, gentilles et serviables

L’appartement est très  propre et il y a tous les équipements nécessaires pour passer un super séjour , la chambre est bien équipée , la localisation est géniale proche de beaucoup de magasins et restaurants . Le quartier est sympathique et les hôtes sont super merci Lyon et Thierry ! :)

Une première expérience Airbnb vraiment géniale, j'ai été très bien accueilli par Lyon et Thierry et j'ai eu beaucoup de plaisir à échanger avec eux. Si vous aimez le 13e et que vous êtes en quête d'un séjour agréable, vous êtes à la bonne adresse !
Accueil très  chaleureux de la part de Lyon, de beaux moments de partage.
Lyon et Thierry sont d'excellentes hôtes qui m'ont fait me sentir part de leur coloc même pour une courte durée. Très réactif, Lyon m'a beaucoup aidé sur tout le séjour ! Un grand merci !
Un acceuil chaleureux dans un endroit propre et confortable. J'ai grandement aprécier mon séjour.
Hôte très respectueux, soucieux du confort de ses hôtes, et très intéressant ! Accueil irréprochable et vue imprenable sur Paris en bonus pour un prix raisonnable, rien a redire !
Si vous êtes de passage dans le 13ème arrondissement de Paris et que vous voulez un séjour agréable sans prise de tête, vous êtes à la bonne adresse !

Grand appart avec superbe vue sur Paris. 
La chambre manque peut-être un peu d'espace.
Un endroit propre et accueillant. Ce qu’il faut pour être à l’aise en déplacement. Je recommande.
J'ai passé un très bon séjour chez Lyon et Thierry qui sont deux hôtes agréables et réactifs. Le logement est confortable après une journée de visite de la capitale et d'une propreté irréprochable.
Ils étaient très sympas gentils. Merci du thé et beaucoup de gentillesse.
Très bon accueil.

First Airbnb and what an unforgettable experience to be hosted by Thierry and Lyon ! The apartment is so nice, very clean, well located and easy to access, without forgetting the amazing view. Both hosts are very interesting and friendly, so if you're looking for an unique experience in Paris, you will find it here without any doubt ! Thank you Lyon and Thierry, I'm back soon (:
Excellent stay ))
Lyon是一位人生经历丰富的中国人,和他交流非常愉快!

Truly genuine people! Both hosts are friendly and attentive. The apartment is comfortable, spacious and clean, situated in a nice area with easy access to public transport + uncanny view over Paris.
It really was a positive, insightful experience
I really enjoyed my stay with Thierry and Lyon.

Lyon and Thierry are amazing hosts. They were super responsive and helped me out when I needed to stay for a night on a really short notice. They were beyond welcoming, kind and friendly. Lyon cooked some delicious Chinese food, we had a nice dinner, good chat and they're great company. Lyon goes out of his way to make you feel at home and comfortable, I would really recommend staying with them, you won't be disappointed.

Incredible experience! Wonderful huge apartment with a little cozy room for guests. Very clean and comfortable. 30 min from the center ( by metro) in a very safe area in Chinatown. Well connected and alive. Particularly I would like to say about the host. Never met such an attentive person in my whole airbnb experience. He care about quality of my stay due all my time in Paris. I felt like my best friend is hosting me. Extremely polite, friendly, disponibile, helpful. He make my stay absolutely amazing. I would highly suggest to anyone this place. You will face with absolutely unforgettable hospitality
Great hosts for my short time there
pas de commentaire

Victor est un hôte précis, réactif, attentionné et sympathique sous tous abords ! Appartement parfaitement propre et fonctionnel, parfait pour un séjour solo ou à 2. Idéalement situé à St Germain des Près.
Logement très fonctionnel,  propre et calme. Excellent rapport qualité prix dans le centre de Paris.
Location superbe. Il y avait tout ce qu'il fallait. Communication simple et efficace. A recommender !

L'appartement de Victor est très bien situé, dans l'un des plus beaux quartiers de Paris. La chambre est petite mais joliment décorée et plus que convenable pour un séjour à Paris. Nous n'avons pas pu rencontrer Victor personnellement, mais il a toujours répondu très vite et la remise des clés a également fonctionné sans problème. Merci et à la prochaine fois.

Tal y como muestran las fotos es un alojamiento pequeño pero muy bien organizado. Es un 2° sin ascensor y las escaleras son un poco estrechas, pero nada más. La atención de Víctor antes y durante el viaje fue excelente. Lo más destacable de este alojamiento y el motivo principal por el que lo elegimos fue la ubicación que tiene. Cerca de todo. Es un piso ideal para una pareja.
Super un monsieur très accueillant  merci
Gérard est un hôte adorable et accueillant. L’appartement est très propre, la chambre spacieuse et lumineuse. Je recommande

RAS Gérard est quelqu'unde très gentils, appartement propre, je recommande.
Amusant de se retrouver dans un quartier Parisien ou la police ne verbalise pas les non porteurs de masques !!!!
Gérard est très attentionné, intéressant. La literie est au top. Je vous recommande le lieu.
Gérard est très attentionné et sympathique je recommande !
Séjour parfait chez Gérard, accueillant et vraiment sympathique, je recommande sans hésiter +++
Gérard est un hôte très accueillant, très réactif aux messages pour faciliter l'arrivée dans le logement. le logement est très propre, et le petit déjeuner est très copieux.
Hôte très accueillant, une chambre au top ! A recommander très vivement pour ceux qui veulent passer une nuit sur Paris.

Chambre très propre et hôte plein d'attentions, n'hésitez pas à ajouter le petit dej :  version royale  :) 
Fenêtre sur rue donc un peu bruyant mais en même temps on est sur Paris !

Gérard a été très réactif pour répondre à mes messages et m’a très bien accueilli !

Gérard est adorable et très réactif ! L'appartement est très propre et la chambre agréable.  Chaudement recommandé !
Gérard est très gentil et très attentif. Des discussions intéressantes et un accueil généreux. La chambre proposée est d'un très bon rapport qualité/ prix.

Super host à mon goût. Le séjour fut trop court car j’ai beaucoup apprécié discuter avec Gérard. Un logement très agréable. Un hôte vraiment aux petits soins, ce qui fait vraiment plaisir après de longues heures de route !! Je recommande vivement cet hébergement. Vous ne serez pas déçu par l'accueil.

Très proche du metro.

Bon airbnb près de porte de la chapelle ne pas hésiter à réserver!

L’appartement de Gérard est bien situé juste en face d’une station de métro. L’appartement est très propre et Gérard est au petit soin avec ses hôtes. Un super accueil, bon petit déjeuner et Gérard est très réactive à nos messages. 
Merci beaucoup, Gérard, on reviendra avec plaisir.
Très bonne communication, appartement très propre et proche du métro. Gérard était très chaleureux. Merci pour tout.

Super contact, Gérard est très sympathique, gentil et très  agréable . Un super petit déjeuner copieux et savoureux le matin. Je recommande sans hésiter.

Gérard est une personne charmante, très accueillante et très hospitalière, avec de nombreux centres d'intérêt. Son accueil a été très chaleureux et le petit déjeuner bien agréable et complet. L'appartement, à proximité du métro, est calme et très propre. Je recommande les yeux fermés :)

J'avais reservé cette chambre mais ce sont finalement mes parents qui y ont sejourné. ils on été ravis. Petit déjeuner très sympa, gérard est discret mais tres serviable. excellent rapport qualité-prix.

Chambre très propre, lit confortable, linge de toilette fourni. Plein de délicates attentions de Gérard qui est charmant et fait tout pour nous accueillir chaleureusement.

Gérard est un hôte très agréable et son appartement pratique, je le recommande!

Gérard est un super hôte, très gentil et agréable . Le petit dej était une super attention. Appartement très propre et proche du métro ! Je reviendrais sans hésiter :)
À très bientôt

Avec Gérard, on se sent tout de suite bien accueilli et comme chez soi. La chambre est fonctionnelle et très propre. Alors que je devais partir tôt, Gérard a tenu à ce que j’aie pris un bon petit-déjeuner avant de partir. Vous pouvez réserver chez Gérard en confiance.

L'appartement est très propre et Gérard fait tout pour que l'on s'y sente bien. Il était idéalement placé pour ma formation, par contre il faut s'avoir que c'est une artère passante. Personnellement j'emmène toujours mes boules Quiés. J'ai pu goûter la bonne confiture de rhubarbe faite par mon hôte. Présent pour toute question et discret à la fois. Le seul bémol pour moi est la température de l'eau de la douche.

Gérard est un hôte particulièrement sympathique et disponible. Très arrangeant, il m'a donné la possibilité de déposer ma valise avant l'heure du check-in, afin que je puisse aller à un rendez-vous sans être encombrée.

L'appartement est de taille modeste mais bien tenu, quand à la chambre elle est bien assez spacieuse pour une voire deux personnes. Elle était impeccablement tenue, la literie fraîche, et le matelas...vraiment confortable :) J'ai passé deux nuits forts agréables. 

Il faut prendre en compte que l'appartement est situé dans une zône très populaire de Paris, cela peut surprendre si on ne connaît pas le coin. Les gens habitués au calme absolu pourraient être "dépaysés" - pour ma part je n'ai pas été dérangée par cela. Le logement est à moins de 100m d'une station de métro et d'une station de tramway (à qqes arrêts de la Cité des Sciences). 

Le petit-déjeuner proposé par Gérard était bon et copieux : tartines (pain maison), confiture, beurre, yahourts, jus d'orange, café...j'ai même eu droit à un ptit croissant pour la route et le café restant pour mon thermos :) 
J'ai également eu ma petite tisane avant de me coucher :)

Enfin, Gérard est à la fois très sociable et discret, qui sait nous mettre à l'aise. C'est un hôte que je recommande !
Gérard a été très arrangeant, très accueillant et m'a préparé un super petit déjeuner le lendemain matin ! Sa confiture de rhubarbe vaut le détour !
Gérard est très charmant et son logement très bien tenu

Nous avons été très bien accueilli. Gérard a fait preuve d'une grande souplesse quant à notre heure d'arrivée tardive.
Au petit-déjeuner, pain et confiture maison qui font vite oublier le petit souci d'eau chaude un matin seulement.
Le séjour s'est très bien passé.
Apparemment sympathique. Gérard est très gentil.
Très sympa et accueillant. Je me suis senti en moins de deux minutes comme chez moi. Bruit des véhicules  passant, mais ça c'est indépendant de ta volonté. Très ravi de t'avoir rencontré Gérard.

Propre et sympa pour un prix abordable sur Paris
Gérard se fait discret pendant votre séjour
Excellent rapport qualité/prix, hôte accomodant et sympathique, que demander de plus ? Ah si, le prolongement du T3 ;)

Je suis très satisfaite de mon séjour. Gérard est un hôte très accueillant, gentil et plein d'attentions. Le logement est propre, confortable et très bien situé (très proche du métro 12).
Je recommande vivement cet hôte.
Logement très pratique près d'une bouche de métro. Gérard est disponible et accueillant.

Gérard est un hôte très sympathique et attentionné. Son logement est situé juste à côté du métro (ligne 12) ce qui est bien pratique. Petit déjeuner en prime c'est un gros plus ! Merci encore pour ce séjour très agréable.
parfait, je recommande vivement

Merci Gérard pour votre accueil et votre disponibilité. L'appartement correspond aux photos, très propre, confortable, il est facile d'accès (métro en face). Un plaisir de partager le petit déjeuner (excellent) avec Gérard qui vous aidera à organiser votre séjour. J'y retournerai sans hésitation et je recommande le logement de Gérard.
le hote etait à l'heure, le logement tres agréable et propre.
C'était vraiment super. Je suis allé à Paris pour passer un concours, la chambre a un bureau, de la lumière, un lit confortable. Gérard est accueillant et discret. Le top !
Gérard est un hôte très sympathique et très accueillant. Mon séjour a été particulièrement agréable et le petit déjeuner parfait. Je reviendrai, promis !
Personne très sypathique, très acceuillant,

Gérard est une personne très accueillante, très agréable, nous avons passé un super moment. Et que dire d'un super petit dèj mieux qu'à l'hôtel ! 
Merci encore Gérard ! :)

Que du bon chez Gerard 
Arrivé tard il a été super disponible pour nous et nous a proposé un petit déjeuner pour le lendemain matin qui a été parfait 
Nous recommandons chaudement l'endroit où nous retournerons sûrement au prochain passage à Paris

Gerard et très accueillant. Le petit déjeuner est exquis et préparé avec beaucoup d'attention. Merci pour le pain maison.
La chambre est spacieuse. Le lit est confortable.
On ne peut que recommander Gerard
Excellent séjour chez Gérard.  Accueil très sympa. Un petit déjeuner personnalisé avec pain fait maison . Je recommande !!!
gérard personne tres sympa

Gérard a été un hôte très prévenant.
Mention spéciale pour la table de petit-déjeuner bien garnie.
Je recommande.

Première expérience Airbnb et quelle agréable surprise!
Accueil très sympathique et convivial; discussions agréables et Gérard dispense pleins de bons conseils à propos de Paris
Appartement calme, agréable, lumineux, propre, confortable.... Bref je n'ai que du positif à en dire! 
Le logement est situé en plus juste à côté du métro.

Ah si j'oubliais! Le petit déjeuner était parfait: délicieux et copieux;) Rien ne manquait: pain et confiture maison, yaourt, jus de fruits, croissants et boisson chaude. 
Je recommande vraiment!!
Merci beaucoup et probablement à très vite!

Séjour agréable. Je suis arrivée un peu tard mais Gérard a été très arrangeant. L'appartement est propre et la chambre confortable. Pour ceux qui prennent l'avion, il y a une navette en bas de l'appartement. Il faut compter 45 minutes pour arriver jusqu'à l'aéroport. 
Si je devais revenir, je n'hésiterai pas.

Excellent accueil par Gérard!  Un hôte qui sait recevoir, vous met tout de suite à l'aise et sait donner de bons conseils pour se déplacer dans Paris. Le logement est très propre et la chambre cosy comme sur la description.

Bonjour
Un petit souci de réservation m'a empêché de dormir chez Gérard mais il a été très sympa, a cherché des solutions avec moi et s'est excusé une bonne dizaine de fois. (et j'ai reçu sans délai et tel que promis le remboursement de ma nuit déjà payé sur Rbnb).
A ma prochaine visite sur Paris, s'il est dispo je retenterai ma chance.
Jérôme

Gérard est quelqu'un de très sympathique, et son accueil a été des plus chaleureux ! J'ai passé un court mais très agréable séjour chez lui. La chambre est très confortable et on y dort très bien !
Si vous planifiez un séjour à Paris, je vous conseille vivement de venir chez Gérard ; vous ne serez pas déçus !

Gerard est vraiment quelqu'un de très généreux, attentionné  et convivial. C'est une belle surprise de découvrir un beau logement bien entretenu pour un prix raisonnable. La porte de la Chapelle est animé et populaire, avec des commerces et les transports à proximité. 
Merci pour ce si bon petit déjeuné, et aussi ces petites conversations si agréables !
Un logement très propre et accueillant, Gérard est un hôte discret et cordial.

J'ai passé une bonne soirée avec Gérard.
L'accueil fût bon, la chambre était plus que correcte ainsi que la salle de bain! C'était propre! J'ai pu dîner avec Gérard et discuter de divers sujets tout au long de la soirée! Le matin, malgré que je partais assez tôt (pour un samedi matin! ;) ), il s'était levé pour me préparer le petit-déjeuner qui était bien fourni (croissant, confiture, brioche, pain, café, jus de pamplemousse...), celà était très appréciable !
Je recommande son logement pour celui qui recherche un très bon rapport qualité/prix et qui aime discuter avec son hôte!
Super séjour a Paris ! Je n'ai pas eu beaucoup l'occasion de parler a Gérard mais ce dernier a tout fait pour me mettre a l'aise, ce qu'il a fait avec succes ! Merci encore !!

Mon court séjour chez Gérard a été  fantastique, il est disponible et agréable, on se sent réellement comme chez soi. La chambre est très belle et il prépare le petit déjeuner le matin , je suis ravie. Si je dois prochainement à Paris je n'hésiterai pas une seconde. Vraiment un super séjour

Gérard est un hôte attentionné.
Discret, sensible a notre bien être, respectueux, il fait tout pour que l'on se sente comme a la maison.
Le logement est petit mais très bien entretenu et propre.
Petit déjeuner 4 étoiles !!!!
Je reviendrai avec plaisir revoir Gérard.

Malheureusement, nous n'avons pas logé chez Gérard, on ne s'est pas senti bien dans le quartier , je n'aurais pas osé sortir le soir et le stationnement souterrain avec ses graffiti nous a mise mal à l'aise. J'ai toutefois rejoint Gérard au téléphone et il m'est apparu quelqu'un de bien sympathique. Il a été désolé pour nous.

Gérard est fort sympathique et accueillant.
