Le quartier est un peu bruyant pour quelqu'un comme moi qui vient de la campagne. Mais une fois les fenêtres et volets fermés, c'est tout à fait acceptable.
Petit déjeuner XXL avec pain fait maison !

Un super accueil.  Gérard est à la fois attentif, présent et discret. Il propose un petit déj fort agréable qui est aussi l'occasion d'échanger.  La chambre est propre et fonctionnelle tout autant que la salle de bain. Le lieu est diversifié et très bien desservi en transport en commun.  Bref, j'y ai passé un très chouette séjour.
Gérard est quelqu’un de très agréable et attentionné. Il a même préparé le petit déjeuner sans que je ne l’avais demandé! Maison propre et spacieuse à quelques pas du métro,
Gérard est sympa et gentil.C’est une expérience très agréable.
Gérard est un hôte très sympathique et attentionné. Il est discret et respectueux de ses voyageurs. L'appartement est petit mais chaleureux et d'une propreté irréprochable. Séjour impeccable !
Malgré que je sois arrivé avec beaucoup de retard (1h du matin au lieu de 23h) Gérard m'a accueilli avec le sourire. Séjour agréable, très propre

Super accueil, super petit déjeuner, Gérard est quelqu'un de très sympathique et très ouvert.
N'hésitez pas à réserver chez lui.
Gérard a été très accueillant, il nous a prepare un très délicieux petit dej! Aussi c'était facile de le contacter par telephone!  Merci beaucoup!

Excellent accueil et beaucoup de souplesse et de discrétion, j'ai passé un agréable moment, je me suis bien détendue à l'arrivée et le petit déjeuner était particulièrement reconstituant. Merci Gérard

Accueil très sympathique, naturel.
Appartement simple mais bien organisé, très propre.
Très bon petit-déjeuner.
Le quartier peut surprendre dans un premier temps, mais en réalité tout est calme, il n'y a pas de soucis.
Merci Gérard!
Gerard est un homme hospitalier et gentil. Cela m'a fait plaisir de le connaitre et le sejour chez lui est bien a recommander.
très chouette accueil de Gérard, encore un tout grand merci! La chambre est confortable, l'appartement facile d'accès, et le must ce sont les petits déjeuners concoctés par Gérard :-)

Je ne suis resté qu'une soirée et Gérard m'a très bien accueilli. L'appartement est à deux pas du métro et juste à coté du bus pour Roissy, ce qui a été très utile pour moi. Même si je partais tôt le matin, Gérard s'est levé avant moi pour me préparer le petit déjeuner!
En bref, je recommande ce logement.

Séjour parfait chez Gérard! J'ai passé juste une nuit, ayant un avion le lendemain à CDG. Gérard a été charmant, très accueillant et flexible. Je suis arrivée tard et suis repartie tôt le lendemain et Gérard a été vraiment gentil de m'accueillir ainsi. Très facile à trouver, à moins de 5 min du metro porte de la chapelle, ligne 12 direct de St Lazare. La chambre est très bien. Tout a été parfait. Il y a un bus qui va à Roissy CDG en face de l'immeuble donc pratique quand on est chargé. Le bus prend 1h15-20 pr le terminal 1 (moins pr le 2).  Je recommande et n'hésiterai pas à revenir! Merci encore!

Le logement est très propre et confortable en plus d'être bien situé par rapport au métro (à moins de deux minutes de la Porte de la Chapelle). Gérard est un hôte fantastique, et prendre le petit déjeuner avec lui fut un vrai plaisir.
Merci à Gérard, hôte sympa et disponible. La chambre correspond totalement à celui décrit, propre,  bien située, proche du métro, très accessible.
Friendly, helpful, welcoming owner. Quick and clear communication. A big thank you, Gérard!
The host canceled this reservation 52 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Gerard gave a warm welcome and breakfast was great!

Gerard is an amazing host. For my first time with Airbnb, it was a great experience. I will return and book again with him. The room is a good size for Paris and the bed is comfortable. The appartment is super clean.
I enjoyed Gerard's homemade bread in the morning with an appetizing breakfast with ham and jam. No doubt that Gerard enjoys welcoming people.
Really outstanding hospitality
Ottima ospitalitá
Outstanding hospitality and willingness to help. He keeps his place clean and neat.

Gerard's place is very convenient for airport access. There's a bus that leaves from right across the street and costs 2 Euro to get to CDG (I still half think the bus driver cut me a deal or maybe gave me a senior rate). The Portes de la Chapelle metro is also pretty much right outside the door, so heading South into the city is easy too. There are also local stores, including one that is open late very close by. Gérard himself is very friendly and helpful, and makes a very nice continental breakfast with great coffee! Highly recommended for a budget stay in a convenient part of town.

"Chez Gérard" est très convenable pour accéder à l'aéroport CDG sur autobus nr. 350, et aussi le cité depuis le metro Porte de la Chapelle. Gérard est très accuillant et sympa, et il fait un très bon petit déjuner avec du café.

Orpitalita', cortesia, gentilezza sono le parole d'ordine di Gérard. Lo consiglio vivamente. È tutto quello che si cerca quando si sta in un bnb. Posto molto ben collegato. 30 min a piedi dal sacro cuore, e per qualsiasi cosa basta solo chiedere a Gérard, il suo inglese è molto buono. Saprà consigliarvi.

Gérard was very helpful in recommending restaurants and giving advice on public transportation. He was also one of the most hospitable hosts, he woke up around 5:30 AM to make me coffee because I had to leave at 6. I would highly recommend his place.

Gerard is gentle and kind host. The room is private and comfy. The shower is right out the guest room door, and it is stylish. The location is great. Above all, Gerard helped me - day by day, hour by hour - to navigate Paris, under the strike\transportation collapse. Am very grateful. Highly recommended.
Nice shared room, Gerard is a great host
Had a very good stay at Gérard’s place, and would definitely go again.

Most of the reviews here are legit and I will not repeat them and instead contribute additional information of value. I had a 2 day lay over in Paris before returning home. Gerard’s place right next to a metro station and Porte de la Chapelle is really near Gare du Nord (5 stops, with 1 change of train from line 12 to 5). It’s very ideal if you have a heavy luggage. His apartment is accessed by an elevator!! No need to climb stairs! However, Gerard’s place is located in a neighborhood that some may not be comfortable. I feels like Harlem in NYC. There are many harmless black people loitering in groups in the area. Being a 6 foot tall man, I am not too concerned. One of them did approached me to ask if I needed taxi service. I said no and he promptly left me alone. I don’t think this is a deal breaker, but it may concern others. Also, Gerard’s place is quite far away from the attractions found in the city.. but I don’t think this is a big problem... you just use more time.. I actually prefer that because of Gerard’s place is nearer to Gare du Nord and makes travelling much less stressful (not fun taking metro with luggage). Overall, I give Gerard 5/5 stars taking into consideration the reasonable price of staying with him.

If you have a limited budget and need a place to stay in Paris, I would advise you to stay at Gerard's. He's a friendly person who clearly does his best to host his guests properly. The neighbourhood is the contrary of posh, but (I know Paris well) you are less likely to get bothered by people in the streets there than in other neighbourhoods. Unlike what it seems at first... His appartment is conviniently located just in front of the metro entrance. The room he rents is spacious and clean, as the rest of the appartment and the whole building. Gerard also offers some breakfast, which is nice.

Gérard is an excellent host, extremely polite, made a small breakfast for me in the mornings. A word of warning, this is an extremely busy and VERY loud area. The apartment is on the second floor so you can hear everything on the street and it is a never-ending parade of revving motorcycles, people yelling, sirens, etc. all hours of the day and night. Very highly recommend noise-cancelling headphones or ear-plugs at a minimum or you will not be able to sleep! Otherwise, extremely convenient location, directly next to the metro, easy access to everything. Neighborhood looks rough, but I had no problems walking around at any hour day or night.
Wonderful host. He was very accommodating, even offered to make me breakfast. Would stay again!
Excelente anfitrión, muy recomendado, 100% recomendado
A lovely place to stay!

Gérard is an amazing host. We hit it off from the very first instance. The communication was quick and instructions precise.  The neighbourhood is well connected by public transportation. However, you will need to walk about 10 minutes for better restaurants and bakeries or take the #38 bus or subway.. The apartment faces rue de la Chappelle. It's colourful and very busy throughout the day. Notwithstanding, if you close the window, you hear nothing. The best part about my stay was Gérard. We shared most meals together. I enjoy very much our conversation on various topics from immigration, labour issues, retirement and even day trading. Gérard is truly a gentleman. He prepared daily breakfast and even invited me to ice-cream around Place Pompidou and lunch on the day of my departure. I highly recommend this listing.

He's really nice host.
Everything is clean.
I had to leave in the early morning, but he prepared breakfast for me!
Unbelievable guy; helped me out so much.  So nice, so much fun, great place near the metro
I enjoyed my stay at Gerard's, and he was always happy to help with everything I needed!
Gérard’s place is extremely well connected, tidy and quiet. Gérard has been responsive and very welcoming as a host.
Strong recommend this place ! Value for money and great location go to everywhere , will back again surly ‘
It was an excellent stay at Gerards’ home. He was friendly, welcoming and willing to help. He prepares really good breakfast and cooks great Apple pie. Thanks Gerard!
Amazing. Like always!

Gerard was so sweet. He offered to accomodate me in every way he could. He was baking a pie when I got there and offered some, he lended me his laptop to charge my phone since I lost my EU plug. Thanks Gerard!
Nada
Gerard was a great host. The room is comfortable and breakfast in the morning is a nice touch. The apartment is easy to get to from the metro and tram, each less than 5 five minutes away.

Excelente opción para quedarte en París a unos cuantos pasos de estación de metro y bus, Gerard mantiene limpio el departamento, la habitación cómoda y con todo lo necesario y nos preparó un desayuno delicioso .... Sin duda volveríamos

Gerard's place was great during my stay, if I could change one thing it would be the location. It's a about 30 minute by metro to the all the main attractions Paris has to offer. The area was a tad rough,  but the metro was just steps outside the door which was very convenient. Gerard showed me great hospitality with some suggestions of places to visit breakfast in the morning. I wouldn't hesitate to book with him again.

Paris is an expensive place to visit and Gerard's place is an excellent value for money. Yes it is in a working class area of Paris and the first impression of the neighbourhood is not great, but if you are coming from a big city then it's just normal life.  You may be approached by beggars but just ignore them. I walked in this area quite late in the night but did not feel unsafe at all. Just take normal precautions. 
The metro stop is almost opposite the building, which will take you to central Paris in no time.  The bus/tram stop is also pretty close. Plenty of cheap eateries nearby, a macdonald 10 minutes walk away and a supermarket next door. 
Gerard is a very nice host. He was a bit unwell when I was there but still took the trouble to get up early in the morning to make me a cup of coffee and offer cake and yogurt.  He speaks reasonable English. There is coffee making facility in the room also.  Bed was nice. The room overlooks the busy road but the noise was not too bad. I was very tired and slept well. 
Toilet and shower small but clean and adequate. 
The only note of caution for future travelers ( no fault of Gerard) : the bus 350 route from CDG airport has been cancelled from 30th April.  I waited for 45 minutes before realising that.  Catch the train to Gare du Nord and then to Porte de la Chapelle.  Couple of changes but fairly easy.  
Highly recommended.

ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝ〜ﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄまで素晴らしい時間を過ごすことができました｡
地下鉄の駅も近くて便利です｡
ﾎｽﾄもとても良い人です!
ありがとうございました!
We really enjoyed our stay at Gérard’s place. He was really friendly and accomodating. Especially that he made us breakfast in the morning was super kind. We would definitely recommend it!

Gerard was a great host. He made me breakfast every morning which is awesome, he explained to me cultures and sports of France and was generally super kind and supportive. Would highly recommend this place, metro is literally under the door.
Cozy place. Warm hosting. Nice location. I do recommend.
Clean, comfortable room, with good hospitality, convenient bath
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
we had a pleasant stay, though zi would advise maximum 2 adults we were 3
Perfecr room and sweet host!
He was a nice guy and had a great space for the price!
Location is great. Accessible to the metro :)

Gérardさんのお家はとても清潔で過ごしやすい環境でした!
彼は私達が滞在した2泊3日の間､私達に朝食を準備してくださり､私達は彼との会話を楽しみながらおいしい朝食をいただきました｡
公共交通機関を始めとしたﾛｰｶﾙ情報も提供してくださりました｡
彼の温かい人柄のおかげで､私達のﾊﾟﾘ旅行はより素晴らしいひとときとなりました

Gerard's place is great for a few nights stay. The area, Porte De La Chappelle is not the best to be honest and at times it felt slightly dodgy - but no more so than some parts of London and if you are just mindful you should be fine. It was very convenient for the Metro (right outside the door) and a good Bus line into town (and the Gare Du Nord). For me it was a perfect location as it was close to the Bowling Alley where I was competing in the Gay Olympic Games. Gerard is a lovely guy and every morning he provides breakfast (croissants, toast, butter, jam, orange juice, coffee and yoghurt). What a better way to start the day? If you're 1 person and want a couple of nights in Paris - I would consider using Gerard.
Really nice place, with excellent location in front of the metro station. Gerard was a amazing host, really available to give tips and cooks a really delicious break fast.

Had a wonderful week staying at Gerard’s room! His house is literally a minute walk from the metro. There’s a few bakeries near by too and also a supermarket. To get to the airport. Simply walk 5 min and there is a bus that will take you directly to cdg within 45 min.
Gerard is a great host and one leaves his place in the morning after a hearty breakfast. The Metro station is just a few steps from the building.

Only stayed with Gérard for one night but enjoyed our stay. He was very kind and even made a delicious breakfast. Check in was a little late and check out was a little early but Gérard was accommodating to our schedule so that wasn’t an issue. Would stay here again.
Gerard gave me a very warm welcome with very nice breakfast in every morning. The house is clean and convenient to walk from central station, takes you about 10~15 mins walk. Highly recommend.
Excelente lugar, Gerard es muy atento y de gran ayuda. Amable y agradable, además en Metro es súper sencillo accesar a todos los puntos turísticos desde el departamento de Gerard.

Gérard es super amable. Me acogió bien en todo momento, incluso cuando mis condiciones cambiaron fué flexible y me permitió llegar y salir a una hora diferente. El sitio es limpio y agradable. El acceso al vecindario por transporte público es sencillo

Gérard is absolutely wonderful, he made me a “French breakfast” and also gave me his umbrella. The only downside to Gerard’s flat is the neighborhood. As a woman traveling alone I found it very intimidating and felt unsafe in his neighborhood. I had a very traumatic experience while coming home one evening and ended up moving flats. If you were to be traveling in a pair, or as a male traveling alone I feel there wouldn’t be an issue. But because of my experience, I wouldn’t recommend this place too a single woman. To be warned, there are lots of men standing around and sitting on the streets at all hours of the day. The main train line is a two minute walk to his flat, but even in that time I unfortunately had a very traumatic experience.

The building is a highrise in a working-class neighborhood. It's within 100 yards of a major Metro station near the northern end of the line, which puts all Paris at your doorstep. The flat is small but clean, nicely appointed, and functional, with wifi. The room has a small desk and large bed, but no closet. If you travel with a carry-on bag and just a couple changes of clothes — no problem. If you travel with a steamer trunk and special outfits for every occasion, you won't be happy. Gerard is gracious and flexible, and was a fine host.

Gerard was extraordinary detailed.
He was available for us even we were late on our check in. We were able to get to the metro very close.
Gerard provides a good breakfast and his apartment is close to the metro station.

Had a great stay at Gerard's. Gerards breakfast was good and he helped me practice my French.

Gerards is extremely close to the metro from which you can access all of Paris.
房间很大,房东人很好,地理位置也不错｡
Potvrzení rezervace proběhlo rychle, komunikace rychlá a bezproblémová. Dokonce ráno v ceně i kafe se snídaní ;-)
Gerard's place is very nice and comfortable and he is a great host.
Gerard's apartment is located close to public transport. The room he offered was very cozy and confortable and Gerard's hospitability is outstanding. I highly recommend this listing.

Gerard es una persona muy buena, amable y con una hospitalidad increíble!! Nos trató muy bien , nos preparo un delicioso desayuno, con un pan casero muy rico !! El alojamiento está cercano al metro en el cual se puede ir hasta los lugares más turísticos de paris! Con respecto al departamento es muy limpio y acogedor. Nosotros nos quedamos una noche sola pero es totalmente recomendable!!!

Gerard è una ottima persona, molto gentile e ospitale, subito amichevole, mai invadente. Mi ha preparato la colazione tutte le mattine. L'appartamento è in un edificio a due passi due dalla metro pont de la chapelle, linea 12. La stanza è ottima, confortevole.

Gerard's place is located right in front of a Metro station, so it is pretty convenient. In the mornings he makes a bread and prepares breakfast for his guests. We had problems with hot water while being there, though. Anyways, good value for the money and definitely recommend.

Gerard eh um anfitrião impecável, muito atencioso. O quarto eh limpo e confortável, apenas à alguns passos do metrô. O café da manhã é sempre compartilhado por ele e se quiser a ultima refeição do dia tb não será sozinho. Retornaria sem duvida!

Gérar foi muito gentil e educado comigo o tempo todo! Sempre preocupado comigo! Foi um ótimo anfitrião! Fez mais do que o combinado, até! Se tiver a oportunidade de voltar a Paris, verificarei disponibilidade deste quarto!!

Gerard was really easy to communicate with and worked with my schedule. The flat was just as described and a great place to crash for my night in Paris. He was even kind enough to have a coffee and croissant waiting for me when I woke up!
Gerard é molto disponibile a gentile. Mi ha anche preparato una super colazione il giorno dopo. Sicuramente da consigliare!!
We had a perfect stay at Gerard's place. He made us feel at home & served an awesome home made bread for breakfast. He was a wonderful tourist guide too. Thanks for the warm welcome.

He was very hospitable and a wonderful person to talk to. He provided breakfast which was a plus. Bed and Wi-Fi was very good. The Metro station was in front of the complex. Overall pleasant stay. Definitely recommend.

Gérard 's place was a great experience! It was clean and exactly as represented. He really helped me find my way there and was quick to respond to questions. He even made me breakfast! Nice guy and chill place. I'd stay there again.
Highly recommended!! Gerard is a great host and I had a wonderful time at his fla
Near from the subway(like 100m), easy to find. The apartment is clean and comfortable.  There are several restaurants near the apartment. And  Gérard was a friendly and warm host. Highly recommend :)
Gerard is a brillliant host. Easy communication and very friendly. Great French breakfast and we had lovely chats . Highly recommend
Gérard is a really nice and an easy going person.

Gerard is nice,accommodating guy...even he served breakfast.Everything went smooth.Location is a bit freaky
but not for londoners :-) Apart of that 
I would highly recommend for guy,couples... Merci.

Gerard was such a wonderful host. I had a short stay in Paris to catch a flight early next morning and Gerard woke up at 4am to make me coffee and walk me to the bus station to make sure I'm safe. I really appreciated his kindness and generosity. Recommended!

Gerard was a great host and made my stay very enjoyable.  He had breakfast and coffee for me in the mornings and was very accommodating with my request for an earlier check in time to drop off my bag.

Gérard was a very kind and attentive host. He was very helpful and very accommodating. He makes a nice, big breakfast for you and eats with you, which is quite nice of him. The room was very comfortable. It had everything you might need and the bathroom did as well. Public transportation is extremely close by. Definitely recommend! I hope to go there again when/if I visit Paris again.

Gerard was friendly and cool person i would suggest the place for who is planning to stay in Paris . He made the breakfast for the two days and he was very gentle explaining the most important places to visit in the city . i will choose this place if i decided to visit the city again :)
Very nice stay with Gerard! Location is just next to Metro line 12 n bus to main train station. Supermarket nearby. Gerard been very kind to us during our stay.

Gerard is the man! Definitely the best airbnb host I've stayed with. He makes breakfast and eats it with you every morning, is very welcoming and courteous, and always has a smile on his face. I would recommend anyone to stay with him!

Gérard was a great host -- check-in was very easy and he was happy to offer tips on transportation around the city. He also provided breakfast in the mornings, with home-made bread-- a great perk! The apartment is directly across the street from the metro, and there are a few cafes and restaurants in the area, although it is a bit further out from the center of the city. For the money and as a last-minute booking, Gérard's place was a great value.
Gerard was a friendly and generous host who provided tasty breakfast and good coffee. His room is nice and bed is comfy.

Thank you very much Gerard! I really appreciate your help and your delicious breakfast. Your house was fantastic, and you made my trip in Paris memorable. If my friends are going to Paris I will definitely recommend your house.

I stayed at Gerard's place for 9 days and I find it very comfortable and worth the money I paid. It is a minute away from the metro station and bus stop. There is a grocery shop and restaurant nearby. Gerard is very friendly and helpful. He gave me tips which are helpful for first timers in Paris like myself. The ge makes great coffee and his croissants are yummy. I highly recommend this place.
Gerard's place is very comfortable. Too bad we only stayed to sleep and left early the next day. Gerard was a great host. He even prepared breakfast and ate with us. Thanks a lot Gerard!
Gérard 的公寓很不错,虽然离市中心有点远,但因为有地铁所以交通还是很便利｡Gérard非常好,每天提供早餐,还有自制的面包,对旅行也提供了一些有用的建议｡

Many thanks you Gérard for your attention and hospitality! I totally recomend this place. It is next to The metro station. There are many  restaurants and a supermarket in the zone. Gérard is a very friendly and he prepares you the breakfast all The days. 

¡Gérard muchas gracias por tu atención y hospitalidad! Recomiendo totalmente este lugar. Está al lado de la estación de metro. Hay muchos restaurantes y un supermercado en la zona. Gérard es muy amable y te prepara el desayuno todos los días.
Great place and really close to the train station. Gerard was so kind to welcome us and make us feel like home. He made us breakfast. Great stay in Paris
Gerard es una muy buena persona , las ubicacion es muy buena y cerca de metro . Recomendado el lugar . Gerard tiene mucha paciencia para explicar todo a uno y su hospitalidad es excelente
The host canceled this reservation 28 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I  stayed four nights in Gerard's house. It has good location which is very close to metro station and bus station. It is very convenient to explore Paris. Gerard is very nice and prepare breakfast every morning. I really like his coffee and homemade bread. He also helps me with some transportation information. I got a lot of help from him. By the way, there is a direct bus from airport to his house. I wish I could have stayed more days there. Highly recommended.
Great host! Would recommend to anyone visiting paris

GREAT CHOICE. Metro Line 12 across the street - so easy. To CDG airport, either take Bus 350 (only one block away) or take the Metro to RER-B at Gare du Nord. Gerard was responsive to all inquiries. His friendliness and helpful information (speaking English) made us feel very welcome. His home was clean, good shower,  queen bed plus single mattress, and had a view of greenery. Wait til you taste his homemade bread and jam!

Good location close to Gare du Nord and the metro. Interesting neighborhood; reminded me of Queens, my favorite borough in NYC. Not touristy but lively. Gerard is a kind and generous host. The room was fine, with its own bathroom

Gerard was an amazing host!!! He was incredibly corteous and friendly and his home was lovely - exactly as described. He made a beautiful breakfast (with homemade bread) for me every morning and was happy to fulfill any special request made. I will definitely stay here again! :) 

Gérard était un hôte incroyable !!! Il était incroyablement courtois et sympathique et sa maison était très agréable - exactement comme décrit. Il a fait un beau petit déjeuner (avec du pain maison) pour moi chaque matin et était heureux de répondre à toute demande spéciale faite. Je vais certainement rester ici encore! :)

Gerard was a great host. Easy to meet and talk to. In the morning he insisted on making breakfast ( which included home made bread. He was easily able to answer questions in English. The neighbourhood was ok. A short walk to endless restaurants. Would definitely stay again.Very comfy bed.
Very good place
Gerard is a very welcoming host. He provided a comfortable stay for us. We were only staying for one night, so the space was sufficient for the three of us.

My parents really enjoyed their stay in Paris. Communication was great and all of their needs were tended to. The place was clean and Gérard was very kind and even made them bread. Thanks for everything!

Gerard was awesome and so nice!  He recommended an awesome restaurant!  He is right at easy and less expensive access to the airport. His place was clean and comfortable. He even got up early with us and made us breakfast!  And he speaks English!

Gerard was an excellent host. The room was nice and had a balcony. The apartment was located right next to a metro stop which was vey convenient. He was helpful and gave tips about going around the metro and Paris, and also served breakfast. Overall was a good experience and I recommend this place to anybody looking for a room.

It was a beautiful place, very easy to reach from the airport (only take one bus). The attention brought by Mr Gerard was excellent, he puts attention in a lot of details. It is for sure that next time I visit Paris I will stay in his place. The metro is just outside the department, so you can easily move in the city from this place.
Gerard, is a very helpful person , your apartment is super cozy and very close to the metro . I really liked it and recommend it to anyone fotem to Paris

Mi familia y yo la pasamos de la mejor, la habitación es muy hermosa, Gerard es una excelente persona, nos toco pasar su cumple años con el, fue increíble, nos hizo desayuno los dos días, y la pasamos muy bien, mi familia y yo estamos muy contentos, sin duda alguna si regreso a París, me hospedaría de nuevo con el... Gracias mi gran amigo mi esposa y El Niño y yo te llevaremos en el corazón... Les recomiendo totalmente , excelente ubicación, y muy cerca de la estación de metro!!! Le doy 100 estrellas .. Muchas gracias Gerad .. :)
Everything excellent tks Gerard
Everything was great,  a very nice place to stay,  comfortable room,  good breakfast and Gérard was so kind,  Tks

Gerard was our first experience with Airbnb and he made it a great one. He makes you feel at home. 
Thank you my friend!

Nuestra estancia con Gérard fue extraordinaria. Él nos explicó exactamente cómo llegar a su casa.
A la llegada nos recibió muy amigablemente, siempre muy amable.
Nos ayudó con todo, nos explicó cómo movernos y llegar a los lugares que queríamos visitar.
El desayuno fue muy rico, nos preparó todos los días desayuno con pan y café fresco cada día y hasta nos hizo mermelada de frutas deliciosa.
Cuando tuvimos que irnos nos ayudó bastante, con las maletas y hasta nos acompañó al aeropuerto para asegurarse de que no tuviéramos problemas.
Sin duda nos hospedaríamos de nuevo con Gérard, un magnífico anfitrión.
The room was very nice and breakfast was a nice a nice touch. I found the neighbourhood a little intimidating at times.

My stay at Gérard was lovely. Not only did he let me drop off my backpack a bit before check-in, he also provided a lovely clean room along with a nice breakfast each morning. Overall a very pleasant stay.

Essa foi a segunda vez que ficamos no apartamento do Gérard nesta viagem, ele é um cara fantástico, nos deixou muito a vontade e tem o prezer de receber as pessoas em seu apartamento. Ele nos faz sentir realmente em casa. A descrição do local era exatamente como informado, um apartamento com metro e velib na porta.

Gérard é incrível, tem como missão agradar seus hóspedes. Extremamente educado e solícito, te faz se sentir em sua própria casa. Seu apartamento é muito agradável, o espaço é bem planejado, decorado e limpo. Metro e estação para aluguel de bicicleta na porta do apartamento. Mercado, farmácia, restaurantes perto, em uma distancia que se pode ir a pé. Recomendo este local quando quiser ir a Paris!

Gerard was a fantastic host and a very lovely and welcoming guy. He was great with communication before and was eager to help us out and get settled upon arrival. 
The room was a good size with a comfortable bed and the bathroom was clean with a good shower. 
Gerard provided a continental breakfast for us each morning with freshly brewed coffee and one morning he even cooked us crepes..amazing!
Gerard is full of helpful tips and ways to get around the city to see the sites. I would recommend Gerard to anyone.

Great experience. Gérard was a fantastic host. He was kind, timely, and fun to talk with! The bed was comfy and the breakfast tasty. It was twenty minutes from the river and Gérard's directions were quite helpful.
Gerard was very kind and attentive . He was always available to make my stay a pleasant one. He helped me with all my questions & gave me directions whenever I needed them.

Gérard è stato davvero gentilissimo, inoltre l'appartamento era vicino alla fermata della metro. Inoltre ha preparato la colazione ai miei genitori per due mattine di seguito e sempre disponibile anche con gli orari, lo consiglio davvero!
Great room, very accommodating and friendly host, highly recommend.

The flat was easy to get to, just one or two minutes from the metro stop. Gérard was friendly and helped me with directions and suggested a good pizza place to eat at nearby. The bed was comfortable and breakfast was nice too. I'd ask to stay with Gérard if I'm in Paris again.

Gerard is friendly & accomodating. His place is clean, comfortable, and near the metro station. We stayed for one night, and we had to leave early the next day, Gerard woke up early to make breakfast for us. Thank you so much for welcoming us Gerard!
Great experence in Gerard's house alough i stayed only one night here. Gerad is a very nice person and host. Look forwad to next trip.
Very nice room and really really nice Gerard. I've only stayed one night but everything was allright. If I come back to París I will stay here again.
Gerard was very friendly and served me amazing dinner and breakfast. The location is very near to metro. Overall it is worth the money and I would highly recommend staying here.

What a nice gentleman! What a nice house!.
My flight was too early, I asked Gerard if I can come before check in time to drop off my luggage and he said absolutely. My luggage didn't arrive though! Airline has lost it, so I arrived without it, he was so empathetic and nice. Offered me juice and coffee (that he insisted on making!) Gave me a new toothbrush as I have mine obviously in my luggage. Was very engaging and helpful with directions and what not. Even when I came back late he was there. 
Bathroom and room are really clean and the room is just super duper beautiful.
Highly recommended.
Oh, and he insisted on having breakfast even though I said I don't mind not having one.
P.S. makes his own bread, which is delicious.

My stay at Gerard's was very short but very pleasant,,breakfast every morning gave it a home y feeling .he was also very accomedating and helpful in aiding me with any information about paris,,, and the room was very private,,,would definitely stay there again

Gerard was very accomodating and helpful. The room was comfortable and clean and breakfast was delicious.   The apartment is located in a working class neighbor, but the metro and the bus were only were only a half a block away.  If you're looking for an economical way to see Paris, you couldn't do better than staying with Gerard.
I would put it this way, as simple as possible; It is exactly what all those positive reviews say. I just stayed a short time, but I'm absolutely happy I made the choice. Thanks again Gerard.

Gerard was so helpful at late notice.
Room was so clean and the house was also very clean. I can't comment on the location seeming we arrived late at night and left early in the morning. It was very close
To the metro though. The breakfast was also so good and he went above and beyond to make us feel comfortable!

5+ star. Gerard is a nice guy and very friendly. His home is very worm, clean, and smells good. I did had a very nice moment in his home with a nice lovely breakfast he made by him self. A very big flat with roomy bed and nice decoration. Location is wonderfull just next to a metro 2 min walking. He did his best to make me feel in his home. I just love it and highly recommended.
Thank you very much Gerard

I was urgently looking for an accommodation and was extremely blessed to find Gerard! He was very prompted, and was accommodating to my request to reach his house earlier. Although the neighborhood might be a little doubtful for a single girl like me (no problem for males), Gerard's apartment is just a stone throw away from the metro exit and he has made my stay extremely safe and memorable. His apartment is cosy and clean, and has almost everything you need. The place is just less than 30mins from the main attractions (actually the Parisian metro service is pretty good) and the metro line brings you to Gare Du Nord. There's also a bus that brings you straight to the airport within 1 hour's time. So don't be put off by the far location. He personally see to my safety (texting me to take note of my return timing and even personally fetched me from the metro station when I returned late), accompanied me to the Sacré Coeur when his schedule allowed him, packed bread for me to bring out for lunch. He gave you the privacy you need yet unselfishly shared his lifestyle and good food knowledge to me. He made one of the best breakfasts (homemade bread and jams, missing them already!) and wait for you to eat your meals together. Gerard is sincere, accommodating and one of the sweetest guy I have known. He has done way more than just a host and I'm really glad my original plan didn't work out so that I would have the opportunity to be hosted by him in Paris, especially for a solo girl traveler like me. It will be your good fortunate to stay and know him, whether you like to spend time with a Parisian or just need a safe and cosy accommodation. Thank you so much Gerard, you have no idea how you have touched and made my trip so enjoyable by your warm hospitality and sincerity. :) All the best to you and really hope you can come to Singapore someday so that I can return his favour. Merci Gerard!

Gerard is very nice. He prepared a very good breakfast for me everyday and gave me a very clean guidance to visit the destination. He regards me as his friend and even make a good farewell to me. 

Excellent!

Gérard was an incredibly nice and friendly host. My flight in was delayed and I had no way to reach him, yet he waited up past midnight for me to arrive and welcomed me with a lemonade and conversation. The following morning, he treated me to a generous breakfast featuring homemade jams and yogurt. I am impressed with his hospitality and delighted to have stayed with him. 5 stars--he was an excellent host.

Gérard's apartment is located a short walk from Gare du Nord, which makes his place easy to reach for incoming travelers. The interior is very nice and the room I slept in was spacious and very comfortable. I look forward to reaching out to him again in my next visit to Paris, and highly recommend his place to other AirBnB users.

I stayed with Gérard for only one night, and he clearly went out of his way to be kind. He looked up directions for me, made breakfast before I left for the airport, and was unfailingly polite and enjoyed chatting.
The communication with Gerard was very easy. He quickly respond to all my questions. The flat is nice in a good location.

Staying with Gerard was very nice. He was kind, offered a clean room, gave my space, but was very gracious by providing a good breakfast and making me dinner (pizza!) the first night. The apartment was clean and orderly. The apartment is just outside the La Chapelle underground station which made transportation around Paris super easy! That's super nice because the location is about a 15-20 minute metro ride (w/o metro changes) to the center of Paris. Gerard was very nice and welcoming.  Gerard says his English is not very good but it is much better than most of the people I came across in Paris. It was a good choice.
Gérard was great. He was so nice and gave great advice on places to visit. He even offered a free breakfast which is great too :) the room is very comfortable. I felt I was at home

Gerard was a fantastic host. First, I was already staying at a different place that was not suitable for me so I needed to find something fast and Gerard was very quick to respond. He also was very attentive; he likes to have a conversation and puts you at ease. He called me to assure that I knew he had accepted my request. Gerard also is very generous. He likes to show off his talent for making bread which he offered me for breakfast to make tartines. Gerard speaks English and although he thinks it is not very good, it is one of the better speakers for a non English French hosts that I have encountered. The setup is that you sleep in the private room and sleeps on the couch. This arrangement is very common in Paris so don't be put off by this setup, it went very smoothly and when the timing permits, I will be first to knock on Gerard's door for future stays.

Super hôtel !
Très bonne accueille personne super mieux que ce que je m’attendais

Accueil au top 👌🏽 les trois personnes que j’ai pu voir à l’accueil étaient super. La chambre ? Parfaite!! Literie au top. Le petit dej servi en chambre qu’est ce que c’est agréable et très bon. Je recommande et reviendrai sans hésité. Rapport qualité prix excellent.

The hotel is situated on one of the most touristic top location where is easy to get there and easy to go anywhere from by metro or even by walk.

Très bon séjour chez Marie, l’appartement est charmant et correspond aux photos, voire mieux, avec pleine vue sur le Sacré-Coeur et les toits parisiens.
À deux pas de la station de métro Porte de Clignancourt, il nous a été facile de faire le tour de la ville en seulement 4 jours.
Un tout petit bémol pour le chauffage, un souffleur est mis a disposition mais en dépit de cela il faisait un peu froid.

Je recommande !
Appartement conforme aux photos, très agréable et bien situé. Idéal pour un petit week-end à Paris.
Un appartement lumineux, avec une très belle vue sur Montmartre. Et une petite terrasse pour en profiter. La proximité du métro et du tram est vraiment appréciable.

Super appartement. Conforme aux photos. Le balcon est un plus. Situé juste à proximité des transports cela est très pratique. 

Petit bemol: le sol n'était pas très propre et il n y avait pas de rideaux mais des volets pas très couvrants !

Super séjour chez Marie. L'emplacement de l'appartement est vraiment pratique il y a une magnifique vue sur la basilique sacrée coeur. L'appartement est propre et lumineux comme sur les photos je recommande !!
Je recommande vivement l appartmernt. Il a un charme fou et est très bien situé.

L’hôte a annulé la réservation le jour même de notre arrivée, alors que nous étions à l’aéroport sur le point d’embarquer, nous nous sommes retrouvés à Paris sans logement et sans plan B, autant dire que ce n’est pas la meilleure façon de commencer un voyage. L’hôte n’est clairement pas fiable.

Marie’s appartement is cozy, luminous  and offers an amazing view of Montmartre and the Sacrée Coeur. It’s really next to many options of transport: metro, bus, tram and taxis. There are also a lot of food shops and stores nearby. Marie answers very promptly and is ready to help. We had an amazing stay.
Amazing view! I could even see the Eiffel tower.
This view is spectacular. Pretty much exactly like in the pictures!

Ideale Verbindung zum öffentlichen Verkehr. Wunderbare Lage nah am Zentrum und mit toller Aussicht auf dem Mont-Martre. In der Unterkunft können sie eine tolle geräumes Schlafzimmer erwarten und eine praktische Küche.
Ziemlich am Rand der Stadt gelegen, jedoch super nah an der U-Bahn. Schöne kleine Wohnung mit atemberaubendem Blick vom Balkon. Freundliche Gastgeberin mit schnellen Antworten.

The apartment is located right near public transportation, which makes it convenient to travel wherever you need to go. However, the place was not as clean as it was listed. The bathroom has significant amounts of mold and peeling paint. Also, open food items were left in the refrigerator. The bedroom area was clean and the view was amazing.
very attractive apartment with a beautiful view
A wonderful flat with a spectacular view.
lovely parisian home!

Marie was really helpfull and always answers very quick. The appartment is exactly like the pictures and really cozy. The view is absolutely amazing. The public transport is really close and you can go everywhere really fast. The only thing what we didnt like was the dodgy neighborhood especially at night.

We were very happy staying at Marie's place. The view was very nice and it is as you see in the pictures. Although it is located at a relatively busy street, once you close the balcony doors, the room is quiet. There is a very nice restaurant in front called Le Recyclerie, very nice and interesting. Metro was literally outside the main door. Marie also gave clear instructions to us.

Ein wirklich schönes kleines Appartement, modern, sehr pariserisch eingerichtet und ein fantastischer Panorama über die Dächer, Sacre-Coeur im Blick, hell und sonnig.
Sehr gern wieder!
Beautiful space with amazing views. Will definitely be back!
Very cool little apartment right near the Montmarte neighborhood. We had a good time using this as our central location.

We had an amazing stay at Maries place, the location and the view were stunning. The apartment was cosy and the atmosphere at night was very relaxing. We had no issue check-ing in, the host even announced us that we could check-in earlier. Metro station, cafes, restaurants, fast-food right in front of the buildings' entrance.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

An idyllic place to stay in Paris in a non-tourist area with an incredible view, metro and bus station conveniently located right outside the front door as well as a great patisserie.  It's about a 25 minute metro ride to the main tourist attractions and museums, strongly encourage visitors to walk to the flea market nearby. Look forward to returning to Paris and staying here again!

Marie’s places was a comfy inviting apartment with some amazing views of Paris. Waking up to the smell of fresh baked pastries from the cafe down stairs is something I will always remember. Check in was a bit difficult as the original key pick up location was closed but was able to have if sorted out in a matter of minutes. Be sure to have email and contact number on hand just in case. A great place to stay for singles and couples.

We very much enjoyed our stay. Fantastic balcony and view. Metro on doorstep with access to central Paris. Everything you need for a short stay in Paris with a Parisian feel. More towels needed.. as one large and one hand towel is not enough for 2 people over 4 nights! Also would be great if the cupboard would allow hanging space for guests. Thank you so much :)

This space is exactly as described and is accurate to the photos shared: a clean, open space with a wonderful view of Paris in a fantastic location. I highly recommend to anyone visiting Paris and is hoping to be in a location that makes one feel as though they live in Paris and are not simply a tourist of the town.

It is a nice place to sleep and stay at as many studios are smaller in Paris. It is also very close to the station. Great view. Tip: make sure to take pictures of the entire apartment so nothing gets pinned on you for being broken when it is obvious they didn’t check the apt completely prior to my arrival.

My boyfriend and I spent in Marie's apartment two nights. The apartment is very cozy and located next to the metro station Porte de Clignancourt. Marie always answered very fast to doubts and questions making it very easy to connect and even if she was not there she left the keys in a shop very close to the apartment. The apartment is very nice, well furnished and with an amazing view (you can see the Sacre Coeur directly from the bedroom, it was incredible!) and with many lights that make the atmosphere even more romantic! Unfortunately, it was not possible to use the balcony (that has the same amazing view) because of very bad weather. The kitchen is very cozy as well and even if it's not very big it was enough to cook some things (and save some money too!) and there are two supermarkets very close to the apartment too. Recommended!

Nice apartment for a weekendtrip in paris with a lovely view!
Marie is easy to contact and replies within minutes:)

Marie was very responsive and helpful from the moment of booking and during our stay. 

The apartment was nice, but further out than we expected from the city center. Minimal on comforts such as single towel each & only a thin sheet and single pillow for bedding, no blankets. Apartment is also cluttered with personal items, no storage. 

A good place to lay your head and live out of a suitcase.

Marie’s place was beautiful! It has a great view of the city and Sacré-Cœur. We loved drinking coffee on the balcony in the morning! Place was easy to find and they key was easy to access. The apartment is right next to a metro station and within walking distance of Sacré-Cœur and the Moulin Rouge. Wi-Fi was fantastic. Would definitely recommend! Great place for a couple or solo traveler.

Very chic apartment with the most stunning view of Sacre Coeur. The terrasse is lovely and daylight pours into the main room which is set up with the essentials (desk, comfy chairs). Perfect size for one.

Marie’s place is very charming and welcoming. The view was absolutely incredible and it was great to return to this lovely apartment after a long day of exploring. Marie is a great host and responded to all of our questions quickly.

Nice little flat perfect for a solo traveler. Situated right next to the metro, so you can easily get to most places. Marie is very communicative and responds quickly to messages. Located in a real neighborhood, so you get that living in Paris feeling.
A cozy little bed sit accessible to trains. Easy walk to Sacre Coeur and surrounds. Great for the price.

Hübsches kleines Appartement, 
Metro vor der Tür,  Ausstattung eher spartanisch
She is very responsive. And I had a great time there. Very nice view.

We had such a nice stay in this apartment. It has a small balcony with a beautiful view. The interior was very nice and Marie responded very fast. It is a bit unhandy that there are no curtains, so it was very bright in the morning (plus the white walls that reflect light even more) and other people have the possibility to look inside. Also, we thought the amount of messages we received from Marie was a bit much, but I can imagine other people like it.
Great place! 10 m from the Metro and super nice apartment. Marie was so helpful and answered Every question i had!
Marie is very responsive and helpful, also recommended experiences to do and gave us a coupon, that was very nice!

This is a great unique space. It is quaint and cute, has great views of the city, and is equally bright and sunny. The location is perfect for accessing public transportation and is close to multiple markets and eatery. One of my favorite aspects of the studio was the balcony, as I had my breakfast there on multiple occasions. I also appreciated that the host was just  a quick message away if I needed anything, which was great. Honestly, didn't have any issues with the place itself, aside from the elevator not working on the last night, but that's outside of the host control.

Great place to stay for one or two people. View of Sacre Cour and the tip of eiffel tower. If you want to feel like you live in Paris, this is it. Lift is small if u have lots of luggage but works well. Charming and neat.
Marie’s place was beautiful! Pictures are very accurate. We loved being able to make dinner and eat it on the small, but adorable balcony!
This is a steal. A wonderful view of Paris and a table and chairs on a balcony. Space is light and open. 5 steps away from the metro station too!
This was a great place to stay and I would recommend it if you are looking for a taste of French living, very rustic style.

Marie has opened up to you her brightly lit but shaded rooftop eyrie - with a balcony - for a price to wonder at.  What a great experience to get a little taste of living in the upper floors of Paris!  The elevator one door down from her entry made coming and going super easy.
Marie is quick to respond and positive and helpful.

The ground-floor neighborhood is noisy and a bit of an adventure.  As a single female traveler, I felt a need to be observant; if I had been with my husband it would have been little issue at all.

The metro is at the foot of the building, either left or right - and is the north end last stop of line 4, which goes directly downtown to line 1 that will take you to nearly everything tourist would want.  This was very convenient and easy for getting downtown, and assured a seat when heading into town since the train was always empty at arrival.  : )

Thanks, Marie, for a fun chance to feel like a real Parisian for 4 days!  : )
В целом все понравилось! Отличный вид из окна. Квартира полностью соответствует фото.
un hôtel très bien placé, accueil incomparable !
Excellent séjour. Hôtel propre, très bien situé et design magnifique. Un joli coup de cœur.
Très bien

8호선 역과 가깝고, 깔끔하고 따뜻하고 깨끗했습니다. 유럽에서 호텔을 꽤 다녀봤는데 손에 꼽을정도로 마음에 드네요! C'est très bien parce que le logement est très très commode, propre et chaud. Il est près du métro 8.
Super nice place. Well located, stylish, clean and efficient service. Great value for money especially in Paris!
Amazing hotel, super cool and well decorated room. We loved it so much and we will definitely come back!

Gabriel’s place is located in a charming little boutique hotel. It’s quite Modern with beautiful personal touches. The unit was clean and had everything we needed. The price is amazing for the location!! And the the place was nice cozy. Check in was quick and easy. Our only issue was the elevator stopped working the day we checked out which made it hard to bring our luggage down. But the staff was amazing and came to give us a hand.
Great place to stay, staff are friendly, good location, stylish rooms

El hotel es muy bonito, las habitaciones son pequeñas, pero como en cualquier hotel de Paris, el baño a diferencia era amplio y la ducha es maravillosa! La cama grande y muy muy cómoda. En cuanto a la habitación es estupenda, tienes la parada de metro Felix Faure (linea 8) en la misma calle y parada de patinetes y bicis eléctricas en la puerta. Recomendamos 100%

Amazing location, we walked to the Eiffel Tower every night (20 mins) to watch the light shows that are at o’clock every hour after dark. Everything was around 20 minutes drive away from here in an Uber and we’d 100% stay here again if we visit Paris.  Plenty of local bars and scooters in the area to help you get about.
Nice hotel with very nice and friendly receptionists.
Un hotel súper bien comunicado, a lado De la Torre Eiffel y un excelente trato

This hotel looks a bit more cozy in the photos than in reality. Location is the strong point - within walking distance of two different metro lines, and also several grocery stores and a number of ok restaurants. My biggest issue was with the Eastern European ladies that were cleaning each morning and talking incredibly loud for hours! So if you aren’t an early bird, this can get quite annoying, since the doors don’t block any sound coming from the outside of your room. This also applies to windows - lots of late night noises... Other than that, the room was smaller than I expected, but that’s Paris. Certainly ok for a short 1-2 night stay.
Es un hotel muy céntrico y bien comunicado con todo lo turístico y el personal es muy amable. La habitación está limpia y las camas muy cómodas.

The hotel Rose Bourbon was amazing! Located near Felix Faure metro station it was easy to find and really stylish when you walk in. The atmosphere was friendly, quiet and peaceful. The room was spotlessly clean and looked amazing. It was also amazing value. I would 100% stay here again. We didn’t try the breakfast but for €5 you could have a continental breakfast, which is also good value. Thank you so much!
Would definitely recommend!
Check-in process was very fast and easy, good location and nice room. Would recommend!
Tolle Unterkunft, gerne wieder!

The most amazing hotel ever! So gorgeous and clean. The room was so cutely and stylishly decorated. The staff was so nice as well. I have 0 complaints. It was perfect. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone that visits Paris. It made my trip even better.
Super fint hotel tæt på Eiffel tårnet

Erg schone kamers, vriendelijk personeel. Bovendien werkt de airco heel goed, wat heel fijn was tijdens de hete dagen. Goede waarde voor je geld; een aanrader.

This room in the gorgeous hotel was amazing. My boyfriend and I stayed for one night and it is super central, close to the Eiffel Tower, great bed and beautiful bathroom!
it is a good hotel and cheaply
Amazing room with a beautiful balcony and so close to some great food and sights and metro. The staff were lovely and the room was beautiful and sparkling clean. Would 100% stay here again

Sehr schönes Hotel in einem außergewöhnlichen Stil. Die Lage ist ganz gut, aber zu Fuß ist die Innenstadt schon ein Stück weg. Das Zimmer war etwas kleiner als erwartet und es gibt leider kaum Möglichkeiten seine Kleider unterzubringen. Ansonsten tolle Atmosphäre wirklich schön eingerichtet. Preis ist für die Lage und Ausstattung außergewöhnlich gut.

Very neat place, feels a bit luxurious. However - bad communication... no response via airBNB chat and also not their company email address. When we wanted to have breakfast in the morning, you had to proactively ask them to make eggs etc -> otherwise they just don’t do/propose it and eat dry cereals.
Great location! Helpful staff and really comfy bed, the room was amazing!
Really nice place, great location!! Small room but clean and good airco!
Gutes Hotel in Paris. Die U-Bahn Anbindung ist sehr gut. Die Räume. Sind allerdings sehr klein. Zu den Sehenswürdigkeiten sollte man mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln fahren.

The hotel is just like you see it in the photos, everything was very clean and the staff was really nice. The only detail that I can mention is that we could hear everything that was happening in the room next door because our room had a door connecting with the next room.
Prima hotel vlakbij de Eiffeltoren. Metro op loopafstand. Kamer schoon en lekker groot bed. Ontbijt prima.

Die Unterkunft war hervorragend! Alles super sauber, toll eingerichtet und von der Lage her perfekt. Die nächste Metro Station ist nur die Straße runter. Bäcker, Cafés und Supermärkte befinden sich in Laufweite und zum Eiffelturm sind es gerade mal 20 min zu Fuß! Die Mitarbeiter waren alle sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und kommen gerne wieder!

Die Unterkunft war sehr gut ! :)

The staff at the Rose Bourbon were outstanding. Super friendly, helpful and always ready with tips and suggestions during our stay. We loved our room and all the little touches made the stay perfect. 10/10 will be back!
A lovely gem of a hotel
Although small, it is a great place to stay. The staff was great and made everything super easy!
Thanks :)
Espaço agradável, bastante acolhedor, o staff é 5 estrelas, perto da torre eifel, recomendo.
Safe and convenient location and the room was nicely prepared. Warm showers and cozy bed that relaxes your body after exploring the city all day. And the “bistro du 15e” nearby had really good food!
100% recommend it, the only downside was the fact it was out of the centre and with the metro strikes on it was a pain to get anywhere. Other than that it was perfect
Very stylish hotel, the room and bathroom were very clean, plenty of restaurants in the surrounding streets! Would recommend to all.
chill place, clean room, welcoming and helpful reception, just probably the worst timing to go Paris due to metro strike and it is expensive to use the taxi or uber

Great boutique hotel with friendly staff. Rooms were nicely decorated and just a 20 min walk away from the Eiffel Tower. The bakery just down the road made for excellent breakfast each day we were in Paris.

Stayed here with my boyfriend for our last night in Paris. It was super clean, small but cozy and in a great location. Not super touristy and a perfect location and distance to the Eiffel Tower! Highly recommend this cute place!
We like Gabriels place; everything is fine, nice neighbourhood, but it is noisy at night so we recommend earplugs!
dd

Nice little hotel for a good value. However, the location is a bit far (15th Arr.) from major city attractions so I’d stay here if you would be Ubering/walking around Paris during Metro strike. Had Metro been running, this would be a great location. Despite that, we enjoyed outstanding hospitality from David and his local tips. Room was stylish, modern, and the bed was comfortable.

I loved staying in the hotel. The room is a bit small if you are carrying too much luggage, but it's perfect for few day trip. We had everything we needed. It's very close to the Eiffel Tower and the city. Sparkling clean and well designed.

As others have noted, this is small boutique hotel in the 15th arrondissement of Paris.  I thoroughly enjoyed my stay, and everything from the room, to the service, to the neighborhood all proved to be much better than I anticipated.  Check-in was quick and efficient, and the staff on the various shifts at the reception and housekeeping were always friendly and offered a greeting every time I walked past.  The room was very clean and comfortable. 

The neighborhood became one of my favorites in Paris.  Although it is just about 15-20 mins' walk from the Eiffel Tower, it is not bustling with tourists, and you can interact with everyday Parisians on the street and the plethora of restaurants, cafes, boulangeries, poissoneries, etc., nearby. 

I definitely recommend this room (and hotel) and would seek it out on my next visit without hesitation!
Gorgeously decorated, very clean and good sized room. The staff on the front desk were very helpful and friendly. The hotel is walking distance from the Eiffel Tower. We enjoyed our very short stay.

I had a great, short stay in this cozy and well-decorated hotel. Check-in was easy, the room was very comfortable, and the hotel seems to be close to various sites. My only complaint is that there was a bit of noise coming from within the room during my stay. I’m not sure if it was from the refrigerator or from the heating unit. Despite this, I would definitely stay here again.
The place is nice and beautiful.
Todo perfecto!
Would recommend! Lovely place.
Really stylish small rooms. Perfect for a few nights.

Locul foarte frumos,amplasat foarte aproape de centru si de turnul Eiffel,la 20 de minute de mers pe jos! Curatenia impecabila,angajati zambitori si foarte politicosi. Camera mica dar foarte calduroasa si cu tot ce ai nevoie. Pretul excelent! Cu siguranta ma voi întoarce acolo si va recomand si voua.
Really good! Worth the price
Very cute space! Had a very pleasant stay with Gabriel. Check in and check out were easy.

Very clean and well situated hotel really close to Paris centre, with helpful staff.
Great and modern place to stay with very helpful staff. Would defiantly recommend to those looking to stay in Paris!
Must visit place
A great place to Stay very clean and modern

Excelente ubicación, si te gusta caminar es el lugar perfecto, sino es así, tiene un metro a sólo 3 minutos que te lleva a todas las atracciones principales. La habitación es sumamente cómoda, agradable, el estilo del hotel es muy lindo, la decoración es encantadora y el personal de la recepción es muy amable. Lo único malo para nosotros fue el ruido que hacen los empleados en los pisos, no permiten el descanso si tienes el sueño ligero o quieres descansar un poco más tarde.
Super nice luxury boutique hotel! Friendly staff too.  Comfortable bed. Will stay here again next time. Thank you Gabriel!
Absolutely perfect. Great accommodations, clean, ideally located. Highly recommend!

This hotel was overall, extremely lovely.  Marina, at the front desk was the most accommodating host. She allowed us to drop off our bags before check-in so we were able to travel the area freely. We were located down the street from the train system, and about a 20 minute walk from the Eiffel Tower.  This made using the train system our main mode of transportation. Easy on and off, no matter the destination.  We would highly recommend this accommodation for any experiences or novice Paris travelers.

Loved this little hotel, because it was extremely cosy, nicely designed and well-thought (there is even an iron and a kettle for tea...). The view onto the park is wonderful. Everything went smoothly. Very good value for money!
Small and clean room. One night room was not cleaned and madeup. Credit card was later charged extra without my consent or permission (no reason given)
I didn’t want to leave, it was a lovely and relaxing stay!

I absolutely loved my stay at this hotel room! The entire hotel is very clean and stylish. The room itself is spacious for a solo traveler, especially if you're a carry-on only type of traveler. I loved that this neighborhood was more local than other places I've stayed in Paris, with a lovely shopping center nearby and some cute cafés. I highly recommend staying here!
Шикарное место, очень красивые комнаты и очень доброжелательный персонал. Очень рекомендую!
性价比很高,位置很好找,离地铁站很近,房间干净整洁,推荐!

This place is in a hotel on a corner entry about 15 min walking distance to Eiffel Tower. All amenities are close to it, including metro, food, and further reaching trains to such places as Versailles Palace. There's a tiny fridge, comfy bedding, and even 110V plug (it's still 220v, but great for electronic adapters with 110 plug). Super clean, and we loved every minute of it. Even the city streets don't bring such a Paris feel to it.
A very lovely room situated in a great area. The reception staff were extremely nice so it made our stay even more pleasurable. Thank you.
Place is ideal for a romantic weekend get a way, staff was amazing, they added some romantic touches to the room, room was stylish

방이 살짝 좁지만 깨끗하고 좋아요

so much better than expected, it was perfect for what we needed and such good value!!!
An awesome stay at the this place, very clean and walking distance from metro.

La habitación es muy hermosa, cómoda y muy pulcra. El hotel está en un barrio muy tranquilo de Paris, a unos 20 minutos caminando de la Torre Eiffel y es muy fácil ir al centro en Metro. El servicio ha estado excelente, nos han dejado entrar Antea de la hora de check in, el desayuno es un buffet que cuesta extra pero estuvo muy bueno.
Really nice place! Very clean and quiet at night. Would definitely stay again!
Great hotel in great location.
Great hotel. Great value for money. Great breakfast. Highly recommended  AAA+++
Great find in Paris!
This was amazing and such a great place! 100% recommend time and time again!
Location is very good near the Eiffel Tower. It's very price competitive and super clean to the edges/corners. Strongly recommend.
Es muy bonito el lugar y cómodo, aunque se escucha mucho ruido, fuera de eso es muy acogedor.

great quality price ratio
good breakfast 
vey good. option
The place was so beautiful and clean, exactly like the pictures. We had an amazing stay, for the value I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone!
Comfortable, clean and conveniently located.

Very clean and comfortable pace, but the best thing about Gabriel’s place was the service.
They were very friendly and helpful at any time. 
Great place in the middle of Paris.
I can definitely recommend a stay!

We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. It was located near the Metro, a grocery store, and many cafes. Great hospitality, as they promptly fixed a piece of the terrace we had noticed was broken, provided us with umbrellas during the rain, extra toiletries, and even changed the bed sheets after coffee was spilled. Exceptionally clean and stylishly chic.
Great local. Just 20 min walk from the Eiffel Tower. The front desk is sweet and willing to help with tips and directions. Small but cozy.
Clean and small place. Very quick and easy to get to from Metro. Would recommend to those traveling to Paris!
Perfekt Hotel for a trip to Paris. The hotel was lovely, always clean. The location is perfect.
Tres bien
A good place to stay.
It’s such a great place, in a great location, thanks for everything
Good location and clean.
Annonce conforme à la réalité. Endroit très calme, une bonne literie et faites attention à la tête dans la salle de bain.

Parfaitement parfait, je recommande vivement les séjours dans cet appartement plein de charme où l'on se sent immédiatement confortable ! J'y ai passé un moment hors du temps grâce à Inès qui est d'une réactivité et d'un accompagnement comme on le souhaiterait toujours. Rarement pu profiter d'un rapport qualité-prix comme celui-ci, merci encore !
Appartement propre et design, rapport qualité prix correct
Duplex au charme fou et très bien placé !

Bel appartement et situé près de l’école où je suis. Le logement est très joli, accueillant et on s’y sent bien ! Inès est réactivé et à l’écoute. Je recommande ce logement. La seule chose, il ne faut pas être très grands pour la salle de bain car le plafond est bas. Le micro-onde est très très haut cependant
Joliment agencé, l'appartement est parfaitement propre et proche des commodités. Seul petit hic, la frequentation de la rue. Mais on est tres vite dans des rues plus animees.
Appartement charmant, tes fonctionnel et très bien placé. Je recommande !
Appartement au coeur de la capitale mais parfaitement calme et reposant. Une trouvaille !

Cet appartement est propre, fonctionnel avec avec une arrivée autonome ce qui est pratique pour les clés. L accès est sécurisé. Il est décoré avec goût et doté d'une bibliothèque pleine de livres d' éminents auteurs. Très proche du metro. La propriétaire a été très disponible pour donner à  temps les renseignements pratiques. A recommander.
Tout était parfait : le logement, le quartier ainsi que la fluidité des instructions d'Inès. Je ne peux que vivement recommander pour un séjour à Paris !
Appartement idéal pour découvrir le cœur de Paris ! Très bien décoré et plein de charme. Localisation idéale !!!

Appartement conforme à l’annonce, très sympa et calme 
Idéalement situé.
Inès est très réactive. Je le recommande.
Appartement fonctionnel et bien situé, je recommande.
Excellente communication et emplacement très pratique!

Appartement mignon et bien agencé, 
Idéal pour un séjour sur paris !
Décoration de bon goût et emplacement parfait, rien à ajouter. Au sujet de mon arrivé, tout était bien expliqué. Mon séjour était très agréable.
L'appartement est très propre et bien situé et il est effectivement plus grand que sur les photos. Super rapport qualité-prix. Je recommande.

L'arrivée dans l'appartement se fait en autonomie, c'est un réel plus car il y a un stress en moins.
L'appartement est vraiment cosy et je me suis sentie très bien dedans. La salle de bain est en effet petite mais l'ensemble étant bien aménagé cela ne m'a pas posé de problème :)

Je reviendrais avec plaisir.
Petit appartement agréable, au calme, sur deux niveaux, dans un quartier très central. Très bonne communication avec Inès.
Appart cosy bien placé. Attention juste aux personnes trop grandes dans la salle de bain !

Appartement très bien située dans Paris avec un accès métro très proche. Possibilité de se rendre à pied en visite dans énormément de lieux ( place de la république 10 min, Marais etc...).
Quartier vivant et animé.
Une très agréable semaine passée sur Paris.

Quartier décevant, voire dangereux.
Logement cosy, propre, semblable aux descriptions.
Réactivité de Inès très appréciable, arrangeante pour le dépôt des bagages.
À éviter en période canicule.. Car sous les toits.

J'ai passé un agréable séjour dans cet appartement malgré la canicule! Le quartier est très pratique pour rejoindre différents lieux parisiens. L'appartement est fonctionnel. A noter toutefois un escalier un peu étroit pour monter à l'étage couchage et une salle de bain très basse de plafond (pas pratique pour les grands). L'accueil est sympathique avec une petite attention bienvenue pour le petit déjeuner.
Inès et son conjoint ont été très accueillants et disponibles. Le logement est spacieux et confortable. Merci pour tout !

Superbe studio, proche du métro, commerces et de la Gare de Lyon. 
Idéal pour notre court séjour d’une nuit. 
Très propre et bien agencé ! 
Le quartier est le seul bémol, quant aux fréquentations.
Logement et hôte au top ne pas hésité a réserver pour visiter la capital

Le duplex d'Ines est très bien agencé, cosy et au coeur d'un quartier vivant!
Attention aux grands pour la salle de bains qui est un peu basse de plafond.
Appartement conforme à la description, bonne communication avec Inès, très bon séjour.
Très belle appartement! Nous avons une très bonne soirée! L’hôte était très sympathique, et tout le nécessaire était présent dans l’appartement.
Un appartement vraiment très agréable, et un hôte particulièrement attentionné ! Je reviendrai !
Appartement très bien placé, décoré et aménagé! Inès a été très réactive, vraiment tout était parfait !!

L'appartement est idéalement situé, à proximité, à pied ou en métro, de tous les centres d'intérêt. La literie est confortable et il règne un calme absolu (rarissime à Paris !). Pour être honnêtes, nous avons été déçus à notre arrivée : le ménage avait été mal fait et c'était assez désagréable de devoir nettoyer soi-même les toilettes quand on paye 140 euros par nuit. Heureusement, il a suffi d'un coup de téléphone à Inès pour régler le problème : le ménage a été refait le lendemain et nous avons beaucoup apprécié sa réactivité ! Finalement, un très beau séjour dans ce logement.

Appartement bien situé, Ines et son ami on était très réactif, appartement sympa, 
salle de bain adapté au gens de petite (1m70 max pour avoir du confort au niveau de la douche).
Merci pour l’hospitalité

séjour très agréable dans un logement très beau et soigné 
au top
Joli appartement plein de charme, qui est plus grand que ce que j'imaginais en voyant les photos ! Inès est très réactive, ce fut un plaisir :)

L'appartement est calme, confortable et décoré avec goût. Il est plus grand qu'il ne parait sur les photos ! Attention tout de même à la salle de bain qui est basse sous plafond. Le petit déjeuner (avec tout ce qu'il faut !) est très appréciable !
Emplacement idéal , l'appartement d'Inès est un pied à terre idéal pour visiter Paris !
Un petit appartement avec cachet en plein coeur de Paris
Un petit appart très cosy très propre en plein cœur de paris
Logement cosy et idéalement placé si l’on souhaite découvrir Paris à pieds.
appartement très propre, sympa car en mezzanine. seule la sdb basse de plafond est peu pratique. très bon accueil d'Inès
Logement joliment décoré et très propre. RAS. Il est bien situé et très proche du métro.
Bon rapport qualité prix et bien placé. Par contre attention pour les personnes de plus 1,70 la salle de bain est très basse de plafond.

ines super réactive 
arrivée tardive parfaitement tarėe
jus d'Orange... brioche... cafe ... thė parfait

sejour parfait Ines et top je recommande
