동네가 한적해서 파리에 온것 같지 않아요~^^ 
공원이 너무 좋고~ 다시 가고싶을 정도예요! 
가격대비 너무 괜찮은 방입니다! 

교통이 약간 불편하지만 공원을 가로지르는 도보라 그리 멀게 느껴지지 않습니다^^ 

파리 외곽을 즐기고 싶은 분은 추천! 
도심에서 약간 떨어져 여유를 즐기고싶으면 추천합니다!
Really reliable , thoughtful and genuine host!

Stephane went above and beyond, my flight was delayed, the RER train was no longer running, I had no euros to take bus, and here comes Stephane ready to pick me up. I definitely expected him to be mad and not talk to me, but he had a positive attitude, at least more than expected. His home was great, I recommend him, and I highly RECOMMEND you let him pick you up, don’t make the mistake I did.
Stephane was very accommodating and offered me his bed when he was not there. His house is in a quiet and quaint neighborhood 15min walk through a park to tram that takes you into Paris.

I had booked this place for my wife. Her review - " The place was very clean and comfortable. Even though Stephane was not available when I arrived, he left clear instructions for everything. I would highly recommend his place"

La casa es muy bonita, en un barrio muy bonito y tranquilo. Es muy cómoda para ir al aeropuerto. Está bien conectada con la ciudad (20-25 min de tren). Stephane es muy atento y generoso con su casa. La recomiendo.
I would definitely recommend Stephane's place. It was close to the airport and very comfortable. I appreciate the hospitality and communication with the host.
Stephane’s house was great; his piano playing was relaxing; the bed was super comfortable; he was extremely accommodating and nice! I loved my stay :)
Stéphane is very friendly and hospitable host. He picked me up and prepared very good soup. His house is cozy and comfortable. Highly recommended place to stay at.

Very quiet place to stay.
Pleasant host.
Muy buena persona muy amable y recomiendo ir ahí.

Bien que l’espace soit petit, l’appartement est parfaitement agencé, moderne et propre. Très bien équipé pour un court séjour dans la capitale.
La localisation est idéale pour (re)découvrir Paris et l’appartement calme. 
Alexandre est un hôte très réactif et arrangeant.
Un petit appartement bien situé, charmant et fonctionnel. On se sent comme dans un petit cocon. De plus Alexandre est très reactif aux messages et fait au mieux pour faciliter le séjour.  Merci !

Logement propre, bien placé et fonctionnel 
Alexandre est arrangeant pour l’arrivée, disponible et très réactif
Superbe appart

Un joli petit endroit très bien agencé et cosy
Un bon séjour au cœur d'une cour intérieure très calme
L'appartement est vraiment petit mais bel emplacement pour visiter Paris.

Logement conforme aux photos, l’agencement est idéal. Alexandre est très réactif aux messages et est consciencieux quant à l’arrivée. L’appartement est nickel grâce à la femme de ménage très compétente. De plus le logement est super bien situé

Logement parfaitement situé. Hôte très réactif! 
Je recommande

Bel endroit pour se poser, petite bonbonnière cosy bien située dans une rue calme et typée au cœur d'un quartier bien parisien et très vivant. Alexandre est très réactif et très "arrangeant", avec en plus ce bonus de demeurer assez proche du studio. A conseiller sincèrement.

Le logement se situe dans un  emplacement central de Paris: idéal pour des touristes.
Deplus, l'appartement est très propre et soigné, néanmoins celui-ci est un peu petit et l'accessibilité au lit n'est pas aisé.
Petit studio très propre et bien aménagé dans le quartier latin. Accueil chaleureux et amical d’Alexandre.
super logement ! rien à signaler ! Très  propre et bien placé, Alexandre est très flexible sur les horaires vraiment je recommande les yeux fermés !

Le studio proposé par Alexandre est très bien situé. La propreté est remarquable. Il dispose de nombreux équipements pratiques pour un court séjour tels que l'épicerie de base. 
Alexandre est très accueillant, facile d'organisation et très réactif. 
Je recommande fortement !
Tout y est pour un séjour au cœur de la capital !

2eme séjour chez Alexandre. Je l'ai rencontré pour la première fois et il est très accueillant et aux petits soins. Je vous conseille vraiment ce logement. Petit mais très pratique et très bien situé.

Emplacement idéal pour ce studio très bien agencé et joliment décoré. Le quartier est animé et « safe ».  Alexandre est très réactif et attentionné : j’ai eu plein de conseils  En résumé : séjour par-fait !
Top pour moi !
Très bon séjour passez chez Alexandre
Très recommandable pour une ou deux personnes. Emplacement idéal, bien équipé.
Très bonne situation (au cœur de St Germain des Prés et du quartier latin), ce studio très propre. Alexandre est très disponible pour toutes infos. Le rapport qualité prix emplacement est là.

Le studio d'Alexandre est conforme à la description : design, cosy et fonctionnel.  Il est équipé de 2 ventilateurs qui sont très agréables avec les chaleurs d'été. 
Il est très bien situé. L'immeuble est relativement calme, malgré que l'appartement soit situé au rez de chaussée, les va et viens des autres habitants ne sont pas dérangeant. Je recommande vraiment ce studio pour des cours séjours.
Recommande

Super appartement pour un séjour à Paris. Petit mais très fonctionnel. Très joliment décoré et parfaitement propre. Alexandre est un hôte très sympathique. Je recommande et je reviendrai sans hésitation.

Un plaisir de loger aussi près de tout, Alexandre est très réactif et attentionné. Il nous a fourni un ventilateur un soir où il faisait chaud sans même l’avoir demandé.
L’appartement est petit, mais à 2 pour quelques jours il n’y a pas de soucis. 
Si vous avez le vertige, la mezzanine peut être un peu haute, mais sinon c’est super agréable d’y dormir!
Très bon emplacement dans le 6ème arrondissement et calme. Très bonne réactivité d'Alexandre par téléphone et mails
Très bon séjour !

Appartement cosy, très bien situé au coeur du quartier latin. Alexandre est un hôte très réactif. Seul bémol: l'appartement est situé dans une cour intérieure et les voisins sont extrêmement bruyants et font la fête jusqu'au bout de la nuit. Si vous cherchez à vous reposer, ou si vous êtes étudiant à la recherche de calme, à éviter. Sinon, RAS
Super studio, très bien situé !
Super hôte, et très bon logement
Alexandre est un hôte parfait ,il était ponctuel pour m’accueillir et m’expliquer le fonctionnement de son studio,très propre ,fonctionnel et bien situé .
Logement propre et efficace
Alexandre est un hôte a l'écoute et très arrangeant. L'appartement est soigné.  Bon séjour passé dans ce logement.
Super séjour
Logement très bien, bonne situation, rien a dire c’est parfait.
Très bon emplacement dans un quartier sympa et dynamique de Paris métro à deux pas du logement. Après c’est petit mais bien agencé, logement parfait pour une nuit ou deux

Un bel appartement parisien a proximité des musées, des galleries, le théâtre et de parcs.

Un hote tres reactif de plus que l'appartement très propre.

Appartement très propre, idéalement placé. 
Alexandre est très réactif et accueillant !
Bien
Très bel appartement, propre et très bien situé pour  flâner dans st Germain. En revanche, il me paraissait plus grand sur les photos.
Ras logement bien situé avec Alexandre disponible
Bon séjour. Hôte sympathique et réactif. Appartement propre, fonctionnel et bien situé. Seul petit bémol: un peu bruyant mais davantage lié au quartier qu'à l'appartement en lui-même.

Extrêmement bien placé, tout est propre et douillet et Alexandre très prévenant et chaleureux.Attention, l'échelle pour accéder au lit est un peu raide, il faut être souple !
Excellent séjour pour ma part
Localisation excellente pour visiter Paris sans la contrainte des transports. Alexandre est un hôte disponible et discret. Je recommande cette location pour un séjour touristique agréable !
Tini studio mignon en plein coeur de Paris. Alexandre est disponible et très bien organisé. Le studio et propre et fonctionne, idéal pour un couple. Un peu de bruit venant de l'extérieur.

Appartement fonctionnel décoré avec goût. Il n’y manque rien!
Je recommande!

Alexandre a ete tres acceuillant , flexible sur l heure d arrivee, j etais bien en avance . Merci pour la reactivite aux messages et mail. L appartement est tres cosy, parfaitement equipé, tout est neuf et de qualite, ideal pour un deplacement pro. L appartement est tres bien situe , et est tres bien desservi par les transports en commun.

Appartement petit mais cosy, bien décoré. Suffisant pour une à deux personnes. Très bien équipé avec une super connexion internet. Quartier vivant, avec beaucoup de restaurants, cafés et cinémas. A moins de 5 minutes du métro.

L'appartement loué par Alexandre est de grande qualité (refait à neuf) et superbement bien placé.
Alexandre lui-même est un hôte très disponible, et ses conseils avisés sur Paris vous permettrons de passer un excellent séjour.
L'attention portée à la venue d'invité est également au rendez-vous (eau,thé,café,linge de maison.......).
Tres bon appartement et Alexandre est tres sympa!
Charmant studio dans un bel immeuble du quartier latin, récemment  rénové et aménagé avec goût.  Alexandre est un hôte particulièrement attentionné.

L'appartement est fidèle à la description ; à peine petit mais super bien pensé et agencé. Pour info nous avons pu caser le lit parapluie de notre fille. Mais bon c'est un détail, nous étions surtout là pour profiter de Paris et pour ça l'appartement est idéalement situé ; quartier super intéressant mais la rue reste assez peu passante et, avis aux amateurs, est remplie de restos japonais, chinois, vietnamiens.... bonne surprise ;-) Mais plus que tout, Alexandre a été d'une rare disponibilité que ce soit dans ses réponses à nos demandes ou encore pour nous accueillir ! Bref, nous avons passé un super séjour et nous recommandons fortement cet appartement !
Séjour idéal dans un super quartier. Tout était facile et confortable et agréable... je reviendrai et recommande cette adresse les yeux fermés. Merci Alexandre!
Très agréable séjour dans l’appartement d’Alexandre! C’était super propre et chaleureux! Super bon emplacement. Hautement recommandé! J'aimerais bien revenir!
Petite chambre très bien située. Beaucoup d'équipements. Très propre. Hôte très disponible.

Alexandre est aux petits soins avec ces hôtes. Communication réactive. Propose des idées de parcours de visites et conseils de restaurants.
Appartement conforme aux descriptions. Très bien situé pour les visites et dans un joli quartier. Petit mais très bien agencé . On se sent bienvenue. Le studio se situe dans une rue avec de nombreux restaurants  et au rez de chaussée ( il y a donc du bruit le soir pour les personnes sensibles à ça ) 
Je recommande !
Charmant Studio, joliment aménagé, cosy et très bien placé. Alexandre est sympa, courtois, avec rapide communication. Je recommande et j’y retourne avec plaisir.
Je recommande vivement l’appartement d’Alexandre. Idéalement situé, propre, fonctionnel et très bien décoré. Alexandre est réactif et son accueil chaleureux. Appartement à réserver sans hésiter.

Personne accueillante. 
Attention au lit qui peut être difficile à atteindre du fait que l’escalier pour y monter est assez raide
Parfait

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié l’hospitalité d’Alexandre et ses conseils de parcours de visite de Paris. L’appartement est très bien organisé et très propre. Nous sommes très satisfaits de notre séjour. 
We have well appreciated Alexander’s hospitality and his advice for a self guided walking tour of Paris. The apartment is well organised and very clean. We are very satisfied of our stay.

Fidèle à la description ! 
Idéal pour un séjour à deux ! 
Accueil parfait, proprio attentionné ! 
Nous le recommandons ++ !
Ce charmant petit nid est placé au cœur de Paris ! Proche de tout, il est juste idéal et tellement joli ! Alexandre pense à votre confort et vous accueille personnellement avec grand soin !

Logement parfait pour une personne  ou deux au maximum. Un peu petit mais lorsqu'on le sais dès le départ on s'y fait très bien. De plus on ne réserve pas un logement à Paris pour y passer la journée à  l'intérieur.
Très bien situé, voici une petite liste des endroits que j'ai visité à pied, j'en aurais probablement fait plus mais je n'avais que 3 jours.
- Jardin du Luxembourg / Fontaine de Medicis / Sénat 
- Panthéon / École de droit / Mairie du 5e
- Jardin des plantes 
- Arène de Lutece 
- Louvre 
- Arc de Triomphe et champs Elysées
- Pont Alexandre III
- Basilique Notre-Dame
- Sainte-chapelle
- La Conciergerie
- Hôtel des Invalides 
- Montparnasse 
Et j'en oublie probablement.

Vraiment rien à redire !
Incroyable amenagement pour un tel espace. Beau.calme. fonctionnel. Reposant

Incredible host. Wonderful location. We stayed here as a couple of friends so used both sleeping places. This was comfortable, but the studio is a little bit smaller than it appears in the photos. I still give Alexandre's place five out of five. Alexandre was extremely helpful and the location and amenities of the studio are outstanding. I recommend it highly.
Clean god location, but very tiny place get stuffy with two inside. Neds nee matrasses

Alexandre’s place it’s very cute, sparkly clean and very well located. 
Thank you, Alexandre :)

Excellent studio apartment in a perfect location in the 6th. Not far from the Pantheon / Les jardins du Luxembourg. Really easy communications with Alexandre and the apartment is sparkling clean and tidy.
Great place. Great location. Very clean and has everything you need. Host is very helpful if you have any questions or need ideas on what to do in Paris.

The apartment is very cute and cozy and located in a central neighborhood in Paris. It's very close to many points of interest for tourists and surrounded by excellent restaurants and bookshops. The apartment was very clean and Alexandre responded quickly to my messages and gave clear instructions for how to use all of the appliances and how to check out. Highly recommend!

Lovely stay! Alexandre was very helpful and answered all questions promptly. The apartment is in such a convenient location, right in the centre of Paris. Apartment was lovely and clean. Thank you for a lovely stay, hope to come back and visit soon!
Small but convenient studio.

We had a wonderful stay in Alexandre’s appartement in Paris. The location is amazing, the room tiny but perfectly well equipped and clean! Alexandre was very friendly, explained everything that we needed to know and gave us inside tips to explore the city! He even gave us his two bikes that we could use to cycle around Paris, magnificent! Thank you for making our stay so pleasant!

My stay at Alexandre's was great! The studio is in one of the best Parisian districts - bars, cafés and restaurants are around the corner. Many sights are in walking-distance what definitely is an advantage! Alexandre was a great and open-minded host, always contactable. Thanks again for having me, especially the flexible check-in and the good and easy communication :)

We had an amazing time in Paris to which Alexandre‘s apartment could contribute a lot. The location is superb and he have great recommendations for sightseeing and going out for dinner. Just be aware that the room is REALLY small,  suitcases need to be opened on the small table or on the sofa(bed). Thanks a lot!

Alexandre's flat was very nice clean and cozy.  You couldn’t be better located (you really are in the heart of the 6th). The Luxembourg is a stone’s throw away, and the flat is in the hub of restaurants, etc. The only caveat is that it’s poorly soundproofed ; one can hear everything that’s in the courtyard. Apart from this minor annoyance the place is a find, I would certainly return.
房间虽小,位置很好｡在疫情期间不方便,第二天让我多停留了几个小时｡谢谢房东
It’s a little space located on a fantástica place. Landmarks, restaurants, supermarkets, everything is close!!

Alexandre was an amazing host. I had to cut my stay short due to the outbreak of COVID19 in Paris, but Alexandre was very understanding and helpful through the process. I wish I could have stayed longer! It was a great little apartment in the perfect location. I would recommend it to any single or couple travelers.

This place is wonderfully located.  It a central to almost everything.  The metro and RER stations are within a 5 minute waking distance.  If you’re feeling adventurous, you can walk to some things, too, to see the beautiful streets. 

Alexandre is a quick and efficient communicator. Any question I had was answered thoroughly and in a timely manner. 

The apartment is perfect for a solo traveler or a couple.  It’s in a very safe and secure feeling neighborhood and it’s got a private entrance.  It’s stocked with basic food items should you need them, which you shouldn’t because it’s located near several amazing restaurants (which are English speaker friendly).

My first time in Paris couldn’t have started better. Alexandre was the perfect host and went out of his way to ensure I was safe and comfortable - despite not being able to contact him. The apartment had everything - fast WiFi, good heating, comfort and cleanliness. I would highly recommend.

This place is only big enough for two intimate people, not three. Don't expect to do any cooking as just a hotplate.  You also have to be agile to be able to climb into bed using the ladder. I hope the owner will put up some safety handrails on the ladder and around the bed
Excellent location!!! Alexandre was super responsive and helpful. He gave us a ton of great restaurant recommendations. We will definitely be back!! Thank you!

Alexandre was exceptionally communicative both leading up to and during our stay. He provided a ton of recommendations and even a couple of thoughtful itineraries one could follow. It was a nice touch meeting him in person as well.
The apartment is small, but intuitively laid out. You have all the amenities you’ll ever need, and the bed is very comfortable!
Amazing location!
Great cosy flat, perfect location. Very clean and Alex is a very friendly helpful host!
Alexandre s apartment is a shoe box in the heart of Paris: perfect for solo travelers, great for couples who are not on a first date, cheap for groups of 3.
房子确实非常小,两个行李箱摆开就没有走路的位置了｡但是位置确实非常棒!感觉每天和古迹沉睡在一起,非常酷｡地铁可以去到任何地方｡这是巴黎非常安全的区域,人文氛围浓厚,但又能步行到热闹的商业区｡建议:希望能多一些日用品如沐浴乳之类的供使用｡

This space was absolutely perfect. It’s small, but brilliantly designed so not to feel crowded. It is close to absolutely everything you could want and very easy to get to from CDG via public transit.

Alexandre's place was spotless and perfectly located in the city. He was incredibly responsive, patient, and helpful - our weekend was perfect and I would 100% recommend this place for your future trip to Paris. 

Thank you, Alexandre!

such a cozy and unique use of such a small space. Alexandre was extremely helpful from the day we booked this air BnB with sending us things to do, places to go eat in the area and where to get things like groceries. he helped us out by giving us a heads up about transport strikes on the days we arrived and left. the Loft is in a very central but quiet area of Paris. Alexandre left us some Vegemite in the apartment which was lucky as we didn't bring any with us from home. there were also cleaning supplies and a vacuum in the loft which allowed us to do some cleaning. we will definitely be staying Alexandre's cozy loft again!
Perfectly clean, amazing host, and a great location. We wish we had more time to stay!
Amazing place, beautiful and clean. It’s close to everywhere, have a lots of options to go eat around the building. The host was easy to communicate with.
The place is a bit smaller than it appears in the photos.

This place is perfect for visiting Paris! It sleeps 2 people comfortably and the location is everything. Unfortunately the metro was down due to strikes during our visit but the location of the flat allowed us to walk to most of the tourist attractions such as the Louvre, Eiffel Tower and Arc de Triumph. Alexandre kept us informed on the strikes that were happening in Paris which made it easy for us to plan our day and he also provided us with great info on where to visit and eat! I would definitely stay in this cute flat again!

Such a cute little place! Very comfortable bed, everything you need in a place to stay, with some pretty good restaurants in the area. It’s walking distance to Notre Dame and it’s reasonable to get to busses and metro stations when there isn’t a transportation strike going on. The laundromat next door is great as well! I’d definitely stay again.

A lovely little appartment in the heart of Saint German des Prés! 
I felt like home.  

Big thanks to Alexandre!

Alexandre’s place is a small but cozy warm appartment. Is really modern and perfect for a couple. You will have all you need for a short or long stay at Paris. You can reach all the main spots from the appartment and Alexandre is a perfect host.
Alexandre made sure to make us feel welcome. He was helpful with telling us the best way to see the city. Great and safe location!
Alexandre was a wonderful host! The studio was perfect for my solo getaway in Paris. Location was central and perfect for my 3 day stay. Thank you!
You will not be disappointed staying in Alexander’s place. Great renovated space, very cozy, clean and in a great location.

Fantastic location and very hospitable host! Would highly recommend. Local restaurants are awesome and there is a foot massage place just up the street that we took advantage of- very nice  after a long day of walking tours. Bring earplugs as it is a lively street on the weekends.
Very comfy loft nook - great location to explore Paris walking.
Amazing
Amazing location!  Very cute great for a solo or couple travelers!
Everything at Alexandre's was wonderful. The cost space worked well, was comfortable and the location superb.

Location Location Location!! You are right in the heart of the Latin Quarter, within walking distance of the greatest sights in Paris. Alex is a very helpful host, accommodating to our schedule and also gives tips even beyond his usual list. The space is perfect for two people, but we fit three just fine.
Absolutely incredible host! Alex squeezed me in last minute and I appreciate that wholeheartedly. Alex’s place is very cosy and close to EVERYTHING! Best value for money.
Great location, the loft space is a little cramped. I'm 5'2 so it was just right, but I can see it being a problem for someone taller. Great communication from host. Would def stay again.

Wonderfully located close to Luxembourg Gardens, to multiple metro lines, restaurants, shops and a grocery store.  The studio was small as represented in the listing photos, but exactly what we were looking for.  A great value in my opinion.  Some reviewers said it was a bit loud, I did not find it so.  I am use to city living however.  I can understand that how one might find it loud if you're not used to cities (though this would probably be true with any city property).  The host was responded quickly to all our questions and gave us lots of great tips and recommendations for our stay upon booking.

The studio is in a fantastic location!  The space is clean, charming and in a beautiful, quintessentially Parisian building. Alexandre is a great, attentive host with thoughtful advice of how to make the best of your time there.

Alexandre responds very quickly to any messages and was there waiting for me at the AirBnb on arrival.. He took the time to show me around the AirBnb whilst giving me suggestions on where to visit and how to get there (he even got out a map to show me how to use the metro!! So good!!) Alexandre put in message and in person great destinations in Paris and I could not have been more happy with his place and him as a host! I will definitely be staying again when I’m in Paris! The location is great! Thank you!
Alexandre’s place is super cute and the location is perfect.  Alexandre has added those extra special things that make Airbnb’s like his stand out.  I would definitely stay here again in 2020.
El studio está realmente muy bien ubicado y si bien es muy pequeño, tiene todo lo necesario para tener una buena estadía en Paris.

Alexandre's apartment is in a wonderful location and my daughter and I enjoyed our stay there.  Alexandre met us when we checked in even though we got there 45 minutes late due to traffic problems. The place is very small and perfect for 1 person or a couple. 3 people would not fit in the space. The first 2 pictures show the entire space. The sofa bed is a VERY firm futon and although I managed ok on it, I would not call it comfortable. My 30 year old daughter said the mezzanine bed was comfortable but it took some effort for her to get up and down the steep ladder. I would be happy to recommend Alexandre's place since the location is really great, it was very clean and Alexandre was a great host. Just be aware of the restrictions due to the tight space.
Really nice studio, comfy and in a central zone

This place can’t be beat in terms of location. Just 10 minutes from Ile de la Cite and a super easy train ride from CDG airport. The apartment is very quiet, in a nice neighborhood with lots of restaurants and shops. Felt completely safe. The place is cozy, like a tiny house. Everything just fits. You do need to be able to negotiate a sturdy ladder to the loft bed. Alexandre was a responsive and generous host. Would definitely stay here again!

The host is absolutely wonderful. Before arriving he sent me a message with suggestions of activities, and places to eat, to help figure out the not-so touristy activities. 

He met me upon check and was so helpful. He explained how to read and use the metro, brought water, and coffee for the morning. He then walked me around the neighborhood showing where the metro was, and fun restaurants and areas. 

100% recommend this place, but note it is tiny, but perfect for sleeping!
Could not recommend this charming spot in the heart of Paris more.

Alexandre's place is in the perfect location!  It's close to EVERYTHING which makes it easy to get around and explore especially as a solo traveler. Alexandre is the nicest host I've ever met and he made sure that my stay was comfortable. I got a little lost and he went out of his way to make sure I was able to find it and that I understood how to navigate my way around the city and for that I am very thankful. I had such a wonderful stay here. Thank you!
Both the location and host were absolutely top notch. The perfect place to stay in Paris!
Perfect location to explore Paris for a few days.

Alexandre's incredibly space-efficient place is amazing. I fell in love with the neighbourhood immediately, had a wonderful time walking, eating, drinking and exploring based on some very good recommendations by the host. If I could I would buy the apartment and live there half the year. Very cute, perfect location.
This place was great! Absolutely loved it. It was a great use of space and perfectly located amongst all of the popular locations and food. Will definitely stay here when I visit again!
We loved the location! Close to fun restaurants and things to see. Love the space, definitely no more than two people but perfect for two!

Alexandre is a wonderful host! He responded really quickly to all of my messages and gave awesome suggestions of things to do in the area. His place is in a great location and was very clean & nicely designed. Highly recommend!
Great decor , great location , great host !!

This is a small studio with a loft bed over the kitchen and bathroom plus a sofa bed in the ‘lounge’ area.  In spite of (or because of) its size, it’s well organised and nicely maintained .  It’s located on an internal courtyard and is nice and clean.  It’s location is fantastic- easy walking to major attractions and also fairly directly to the Luxembourg station to get you to and from CDG and Orly.  Odeon station may be a little closer if you’re on the Metro.  There’s a bar across the road (although you can’t hear it) and plenty of good eats around.  Fringing on the touristed area and a university precinct and just off of a major park this is a nice place to camp yourself to explore from.

All was great, small but very practical apartment and super clean.
Alexandre was all time online with me, check in smooth.
Alexandre’s place is a great deal with a perfect location. He is also very friendly and helpful. I strongly recommend!
Place was great, and the perfect area. Alexandre was really helpful too.
Alexandre’s place was lovely and in a great location. It’s very small but comfy and clean. Would stay again!

A lot of thought has been put into making this small space comfortable and pleasant to stay in. A mezzanine bed might be challenging for tall guests or those with mobility issues, but the bed is very comfortable and the ladder is sturdy. If you want to stay in this central part of Paris, this is an excellent value! It was very clean, everything was well organized, and Alexandre sent detailed information in advance that made using the space very easy.
Great space ,close to public transit! And Alexandre gave tons of recommendations for food, drinks, and sight seeing .

This flat is chic and adorable and in an amazing location with so many fantastic Paris sights all in walkable distance. Alexandre was an excellent host with great communication who went above and beyond with help and recommendations. 
I will definitely stay here again when I return to Paris! Highly recommended!!
Wonderful place! Near so much and in a really nice area. Cozy and comfy. Very glad we chose this Airbnb. The host is very nice. Exactly as shown on listing.

Alexandre is an exceptionally great host. We got off the RER on the opposite side of the departure ramp, and when I called him for directions he physically walked to our location in a down pour of rain to rescue us. He also gave very helpful local tips. The flat is like an urban tiny house, which we loved. My husband is 6’6” tall and did not have any trouble in the shower/bed in loft. The flat is in a gorgeous historical district that is within walking distance to Notre Dame/Seine river and Luxembourg Gardens is only one stop away on the RER. Overall our experience was perfect!
It was in a great location! Even though there were fans it was very hot at night as there was no AC. Other than that this place was great and had everything I needed.
It was in the center of the city and perfect for a short city trip and for two people :) and super cozy and clean. And the flat is so close to the city centre
Great Accommodation and Location
Alexandre had great communication and recommendations about the area. Great location.

Pros:
- great location
- close to metro
- very clean
- good use of the small space

Cons:
- very tight space 
- even with fans, it was very stiffling at night (we were there during a heat wave with an overnight low of 91 degrees F)

This is a great place to stay if you have a short trip in Paris and are more concerned with location than comfort.  It worked well for our needs!
Great location, very easy RER B access to CDG.

I've stayed in a lot of tiny apartments, and I've even LIVED in a lot of tiny apartments, so I know how hard it can be to furnish them and deck them out with everything you need and yet still have room to breathe...and Alexandre is a true genius, this little apartment is a well-equipped miracle! Everything works beautifully, the space is brilliantly organized, spotless, efficient and comfortable. The neighborhood happens to be my favorite in all of Paris, and Alexandre was attentive and communicative and check-in went smoothly. Highly recommend!
Very nice place, centrally located.
Very nice neighborhood with easy RER B metro access
위치는 좋았어요 호스트 또한 응답이 빠르고  친절했어요 그리고 역에소 그렇게 안멀고 조금나가면 큰마트들 많아요!!!! 군댕 모오깅 쪼콤 많하요 개애미도 바알견햏어룧 따뤁 슉소에쇼 모키 없욨뉸데.. 고리고 캐뤄어 피묜 자뤼없뚀요

You know that a host is exceptional when things do not go as expected.  We were not able to stay at the apartment due to an avalanche that prevented our trip, but Alexandre tried to help us find routes at different times, and he also showed concern and care for us when the trip became impossible.  He was the epitome of kindness and helpfulness!  We could not have been more thankful for him!  We hope to visit Paris in the coming years, and we will definitely try to stay at one of Alexandre’s homes/apartments.  Thank you, thank you, thank you!!
Alexandre's place was in such a great area and very clean.  As soon as we got to the apartment we were greeted by him. He answered all our questions and was super helpful.

Upon arrival, Alexandre was there to greet us. He gave us an excellent rundown of the neighbourhood and ideas of what to do! The neighbourhood seemed exceptionally safe and entertaining. Close to the Louvre, Sorbonne, Catacombs, and the Notre Dame. Although the room has no a/c Alexandre provided fans which, when coordinated properly, kept the room at a sustainable temperature during the 35°C weather. Great neighbourhood in a cozy place!

접근성 좋고 친절하고 깨끗하지만
뜔이이썻눈데 쪼뽜써 떠웠음ㅜㅜ
Great space for our one day stay in between flights. Alex was very helpful and quick to respond. The apartment is in a great location, and easy to get to from the train! I would recommend.

Very cozy, indeed, but Alexandre kindly left us fans to help with the heat (we came during a heat wave), and gave us great tips for food, sight-seeing and a cafe to leave our bags after checkout. Perfect for our needs.

A small but very functional apartment in a lovely central area of Paris. Alexandre takes care of his guests and communicates quickly and helps out as necessary. I can recommend this apartment as long as you are ok with a loft bed with access by sturdy wooden ladder. Good value for central Paris. Safe neighbourhood too.

My sister and I stay at Alexandre’s place for only two nights, but still, Alexandre gave us a very warm welcome, helpful guide to the apartment and neighborhood when checking in. He is responsive, easy and good to communicate, also treats his guest with care, a super host I would recommend! His place is cozy and chill, the location is good and in a safe neighborhood, it’s also on the ground floor so we don’t need to climb any stairs with our luggages! Though it’s not a too big apartment but equipped with everything you need and pretty enough space for 2 people. Definitely will go back again if ever visiting Paris in the future!

Amazing place in an amazing location. Alexandre is an amazing host that provide a plethora of recommendations and was very helpful. The place was very clean and the lofted bed was nice. Overall enjoyed the space and recommend it to anyone!

This is such a perfect location! I walked everywhere. The space is small but it’s all you need. Alexandre is great at communicating and gets back to you with timely response! I’d definitely stay here again!
위치 좋고, 동네 좋고, 호스트 추천으로 간 음식점 완전 성공했고, 역에서 가깝고, 역 근처에 맛집 많고~ 3명이서 충분히 잘 지냈습니다~ 숙소에서 오랜시간 보내는 분이 아닌 이상 대부분 만족하실 것 같아요~

You can pack light! There is a laundromat several doors away. The location is perfect. The space is like a tiny house with a perfect use of every inch of space. My sister and I get along well so the apartment worked well for us. If needed the loft bed was enough space to have private time. But we were barely there! So much to do and see in the area!
The reference materials were helpful. “Discover Paris Metro” was a godsend. Alexandre’s suggestions were great fun as well! 
I will definitely check for Alexandre’s availability first whenever I return to Paris.

Such a great location and host. Everything you need for a great stay in Paris! We were close to many quaint cafes and restaurants, several options for trains and metros nearby and a very active night life.
Alexandre was extremely helpful and went out of his way to give us additional tips of the neighborhood!  It’s a very tiny place but perfect for our needs. The building and courtyard are beautiful!

Let me start by saying I only write reviews if my experience is horrific or amazing...The following is the latter...

Alexandre's place is AMAZING!  Located in a historical building with a courtyard (as pretty as it looks),  it has everything one could need.  There is a sleeping loft which allows some privacy from the lower level couch (if needed), a TV, a small table to eat or work at, and a nicely equipped little kitchenette.  The space is small but cozy and well laid out with a lovely view of the courtyard.  

The bed was very comfortable, and the shower was great!

I didn't stay in for any coffee or tea in the morning but Alexandre had it all provided for you should you want it.

The location is superb! Easy access to Luxumbourg, Cluny, Sorbonne (all within 5 minutes) Great restaurant across the road if you want amazing fois gras(Polidor) and Gerard Mulot is within 5 minute walk as well.

Alexandre was amazing as well! When I needed to change my check in time to something earlier he was extremely helpful and got me into the apartment at the new time no problem (it was 2.5 hours earlier than expected so THANK YOU!!)
He checked in with me to make sure that everything was okay, and responded immediately when I did have a question!

I cannot say enough wonderful things about Alexandre and his apartment.  I would stay here again, and would highly recommend the location and host.

Know that this place is tiny and that you need to be capable of climbing up and down a ladder to the bed. 

Other than that, the place is very clean, stylish, has great water pressure and hot water for a shower.   The HUGE plus is location, location, location. You are right in the heart of Paris!
Alexandre’s place was very nice! Great location and he provided so much information on what to do around the area
A lovely little spot to enjoy Paris from. Great location, and a fantastic host. Alexandre went out of his way to help us where he could.
Great location, all the amenities you could need. Corner shop right across the street. Perfect space for a couple travelling light.

This is a perfect place for one or two people seeking a comfortable and secure stay bang in the heart of Paris. The Sorbonne, Luxembourg gardens, Odeon metro station are all within 200m as are a multitude of shops, cafes, bars and restaurants. 

The flat has all amenities and is very secure and quiet. You need to be able to climb a ladder to access your comfortable bed. I'm elegible for a senior's card and it was no difficulty for me. And the place is definitely 1-2 guests only.

Alex is an excellent host who met me at the property and explained all the amenities and local highlights. He also provides excellent communication and prompt responses to queries.

I strongly recommend Alex' place to anyone seeking a comfortable, secure and stylish stay in central Paris.

La ubicación fue lo mejor , Alexander fue muy servicial y nos aconsejó en cuanto a donde comer y el transporte, es ideal para una pareja joven ya que el área de la cama es muy pequeña y hay que subir escaleras , no lo recomiendo para alguien con alguna discapacidad o dificultad para subir al segundo piso

Beautiful little apartment, perfectly situated to sightsee and perfect for two people and the space as been used very well! Very clean, strong shower and good hob. Maps and books on Paris. Alexandre was a fantastic host who explained in detail how to use the Metro (that I was initially worried about using). We walked from the apartment to Notre-Dame, then to the Louvre, down the Champs-Elysées to the Arc de Triumph in one day and then got the metro to the Eiffel Tower and river cruises the day after. Luxembourg gardens are a 3 minute walk away and are beautiful to walk around, take a picnic, read a book etc. Alexandre is fast to reply, very pleasant and extremely helpful!
He is an amazing host with tons of information and suggestions on where to go! Definitely would recommend and will be back at some point!
LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION! I didn't have a strict itinerary while visiting Paris, so Saint Germain was a great neighborhood/starting point for exploring. Alexandre was a wonderful host!

Alexandre's space is a fantastic quiet location in a wonderful neighborhood very near the Sorbonne and Luxembourg Gardens.  Everything is laid out with excellent use of space for the savvy traveler who doesn't bring superfluous stuff. We made breakfast for ourselves there using the French press and storing breakfast items in the mini-fridge. There are several nice options for meals nearby for lunch or dinner after a day of sightseeing. Alexandre shared excellent tips for where to eat and what to see in Saint Germain Des Pre. You could walk easily to many sites, but we got a Navigo Pass at the train station on arrival for a week so we could St. Denis and other more far-away places in Paris.  We hope to return!
Great place and great localization

I can't say enough about Alexandre's (Website hidden by Airbnb) is compact but everything we needed. The location can't be beat with the Metro so close and resturants on the same street! Want to visit again!!

Totalmente veraz. Recomiendo visitar a Alexandre un anfitrión con excelentes recomendaciones, muy responsable y amable. La habitación está super ubicada y Alexander dispuesto a absolver cualquier consulta. El wifi funciona exelente y los baños impecable. Acceso fácil y zona muy segura. Un abrazo y gracias por tu hospitalidad Alexandre

Alexandre’s place is perfect! Very clean, modern, and perfect for two people. His place is located near everything you could ever need. Checking in and out with him was very easy. I would definitely rebook with him.

One of my favorite airbnbs of all time. Great location, very well laid out space, thoughtful about travelers needs.  Tiny space but very clean, modern and well maintained.  Alexandre is very helpful with tips and tricks and his maid was so lovely. A very quick walk to lots of sights, the metro,  the grocery store
Great location to explore the best of Paris from. Alexandre was great - available and helpful.

I totally recommend Alexandre’s place. Alexandre is very kind, he welcomed us with lots of tips about what to visit in Paris, where to eat and so on. His flat is really close to everything, 10 min by walk from Notre Dame. It’s in a perfect location, especially if you want to visit Paris by foot. However, it’s also well connected with public transport. The apartment is small, but clean and well organised and with everything you need (girls, there’s also an hairdryer). Alexandre is also very flexible with check in/check out time, trying to accommodate all of your needs. The communication is very good. All I have to say about this flat are good things, so what are you expecting?
Great apartment in a great location!

This place was great, very cozy. Easy check-in and checkout. Great location, close to the metro and lots of good (Email hidden by Airbnb) fortable bed. Nice hot shower with good water pressure. Wifi worked. Alexandre gave a very nice list of recommendations for the city and was extremely easy to communicate with. Thanks very much!
Sem dúvida uma excelente opção para casais em Paris, muito bem localizado, Alexandre é extremamente atencioso. O Studio é muito aconchegante e tem bom custo benéfico!

I was traveling alone through Paris and this was the absolute perfect spot for me in the city. I felt super safe, it was close to the Notre Dame and some amazing restaurants, as well as the college district so it was young and lively. I couldn’t have asked for a better place for my first time in Paris!

Alexandre was super kind, very responsive and gave me a great guide of what to do in Paris. The apartment was in an amazing location and had everything I needed in a compact and convenient place. Would definitely stay again.
One of the best hosts I've stayed with. Helpful, friendly and has a great location.

Alles war super, das Apartment ist sehr schön eingerichtet, gemütlich und sauber, die Lage ist toll. Alexandre ist ein sehr netter Gastgeber, die Kommunikation hat super funktioniert und der Check in war einfach. Wir kommen gerne wieder und können den Gastgeber und das Apartment uneingeschränkt empfehlen.

******************************

Everything was great, the apartment is cosy and very clean, the area around is very nice. Alexandre is a very nice host, communication and check in were very easy. We´d love to come again for a visit and recommend this apartment and Alexandre as a host to everyone.

The location of the apartment is -amazing-. 
The apartment is really really small. the bed is on the second floor - you can't even sit when you are up there. The apartment wasn't very clean though the bathroom could be a bit cleaner. Alexandre the host was very nice and communicative, helped us with everything we needed!

Cosy
Central
Compact
Clean
Convenient 
Would I stay again.... yes I would. 
Thanks Alexandre for creating such a great place to stay in Paris. 

Bed was very comfy for two people
And don’t be put off by being high up, we loved it. 

Great use of the space.

This is a well located studio between Luxemburg garden and Saint Michel. Ground floor. Calm. Alexandre is responding all message promptly and he is willing to help with directions. Do not hesitate to reserve his studio.
Compact ready-made airbnb property. Clean and comfortable and in an excellent location. Alexandre provided helpful tips prior to our trip, check in and out was very easy.
It’s small, and the loft bed is a steep climb, but everything you need is there in a great locationd, at and excellent value and with a responsive host. All is accurately portrayed in the photos.

Alexandre was very helpfull and his space very well located, very clean, quiet, very practical (fuctional), well equipped besides the size!!! very good transport network( buses and metro).Thank you for every thing. I highly recommend Alexandre studio.

This is a fabulous space in a wonderful location of Paris. Easy to walk everywhere. Super safe and a luxury of no stairs. 
It is cosy though . Definitely for the solo traveller or someone you’re very close with. 
Alexandre is super easy to contact and has a wealth of knowledge of things to do in the area. Would definitely stay here again.

My stay here was very wonderful. The place was very cozy and comfortable. He even provided me bottled water which was a nice touch. The area was very safe and was nice to come back to after a long day.  I would recommend staying at this charming studio!

Alexandre é um anfitrião espetacular. Extremamente solícito e atencioso. O apartamento fica localizado numa área fabulosa: 17 minutos a pé para o Louvre; 5 minutos a pé para o jardim de Luxemburgo; 17 minutos do museu de história natural; muito próximo de farmácias e mercados. 15 minutos de Notre Dame. Recomendo o espaço e certamente voltarei em breve. Sensacional!!!
Lovely place

A beautiful, clean, stylish and central apartment that is ideal for those travelling to Paris for a short stay like us!

If you’d like to feel like a local in Paris and enjoy all that the city has to offer, this is your best bet.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and had great communication with our host Alexandre. Two thumbs up!
Great stay, perfect location and hospitality

Alexandre’s place was perfect for our stay in Paris! The apartment is in a fantastic location, close to a number of main attractions, shops, restaurants and public transport options. The apartment itself is small but comfortable, with everything we could have needed for our stay. Alexandre was a great host and was very accommodating when I had to change the booking at the last minute to include another person. I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone looking for a place to stay in central Paris.

The location is amazing - with lots of nice restaurants and very close to odeon metro. The apartment is quite small but makes great use of space and has everything you could need. Alexandre was very quick to respond and easy to deal with.

Cute and comfortable apartment. The choice of decor makes it feel light and welcoming. Alexandre makes an effort to let you check in on arrival. So nice not to carry my bag. Plus he gave me some great suggestions. Loved the feel of the neighborhood as I walked up the street to the apartment. So quiet but so close to everything.

Alexandre’s little place is absolutely stunning. While small, it has everything you need and it’s in a perfect location. My partner and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. Alexandre is a great host, he replies quickly and has lots of tips to explore the local area. We would definitely stay here again!

Un departamento con una ubicación inmejorable! A una cuadra del parque de Luxemburgo, cerca de las estaciones de metro y de autobuses,  ideal para una pareja ya que es un poco pequeño pero si ubicación vale el sacrificio del espacio :)

Alexandre’s place was the perfect spot for a long layover in Paris. We arrived around 10pm and he was there to greet us. The place is clean and stylish. Everything you need is there for you. The street is cute and neighborhood seemed safe. It was easily accessible from CDG airport with just a quick ride on the RER B. It was a 10 minute walk to Notre Dame, Saint Chapelle, Seine river and Conciergerie. Short and cheap Uber to the Eiffel Tower. Would book again!

Charming little apartment in the 6th, very clean and equipped with all you need. It was quiet and I felt safe and all was described exactly as it is. Small but perfect for a quick stay in Paris. Great communication from host with lots of recommend. I would stay again.
Alexandre gets good reviews for a reason. His apartment is in a perfect location and he reached out in advance to offer suggestions of places to eat and visit. Highly recommended.
Very cosy and friendly

My wife and I spent the last part of our honeymoon here, and it was an absolutely fantastic time. Alexandre was there to meet us when we arrived, even though we were running a fair bit late after some issues with transportation, and was incredibly hospitable. He had lots of great recommendations and was quick to respond to all questions. The place itself is quite small, but in a way that makes the stay even more fun. It's kind of like an opportunity to try out tiny home living. Despite the size all the amenities you could need are there, and it's in a great location for getting around the city. I'd highly recommend anyone to book this AirBnB for their trip to Paris. I know we will consider it again in the future!
Great location! Close to everything and Alexandre had great tips. The area is super safe with lots of cafés, bars and a small mini market across the street. Highly recommend.

The apartment is small but comfortable. It is in an awesome location. We felt very safe. It was walking distance to restaurants, grocery store, and the metro. Alexandre was a wonderful host and responds quickly to all questions. He provided a list of recommended restaurants and things to do.
cozy place
Perfect location, very cosy and stylish space, quick and helpful responses. I would definitely recommend Alexandre’s place to anyone looking to stay in Paris.

Alles perfekt. Alexandre ist ein toller Gastgeber. Das Zimmer klein aber fein. Etwas warm zum Schlafen, aber durch den Ventilator keine Probleme gehabt. Ausstattung perfekt! Wir hatten ein tolles Wochenende in Paris.

Alexandre’s apartment was perfect for us (a couple). The location is amazing with many restaurants just steps away. It was close to the metro and RER from the airport. The space is a little tight (it is Paris after all and it was perfect for the two of us) but has everything you might need! Alexandre met us, gave us lots of local suggestions and even allowed us to drop our bags off early while the cleaning was being completed. A perfect spot!

Alexandre's place was a quintessential Parisian flat! He was very organized and gave us great tips for things to do around the city! The space was well done, spotless and in an excellent location! My husband and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

I am not sure what other praise I can give that hasn’t already been given but everything about our stay at Alexandre’s apartment was outstanding! Alexandre took the time out of his day to meet us at the apartment and show us all the features of the apartment and talk with us - greatly appreciated. Alexandre was also thoughtful enough to leave water, coffee, and other general items for our use. The apartment location could not have been better. We enjoyed our stay so much and hope to return to Paris and stay in Alexandre’s apartment again!

The apartment was extremely convenient, safe, and clean. Alexandre was very prompt to respond and kindly accommodated our arrival time. It is so close to great restaurants and just a few blocks from metro. It is small but worked well for 2 people. Great value!!

Lovely little studio apartment in an amazing location! Lots of great restaurants and bars in the area. Communication with Alexandre was great, clear instructions on how to get there and Alexandre gave us loads of information about things to do and restaurants to eat at. We would highly recommended Alexandres flat!

What a find! Alexandre's place is the perfect size for a stay in Paris, and is in a fantastic location. Alexandre was a great host, waited for us for checking in even though our travel was delayed, and even had sparkling and still bottled water in the flat for us! I truly hope we're able to stay there again, it was an amazing price and just what we would have wanted.
Very clean, cute studio in such a prime, cute location! Exactly what is shown in the pictures. Alex was very prompt with his responses and was there to help me check-in. Thanks!

The location is excellent, very close to all Paris’ main attractions and convenient to both Metro and RER.  Alexandre is a welcoming host, full of great suggestions for walking tours, restaurants and anything else.  He is quick to respond and want to ensure you have a wonderful time in Paris.  We highly recommend Alexandre’s flat, and will look for it to be available for our next trip :)

We had a wonderful stay. Alexandre is very responsive, extremely accommodating and offered us a whole list of things to do in the area as well as local tips! The apartment is conveniently located next to  Luxembourg Gardens and only a couple minutes walk to the nearest station. Highly recommend.

Alex was an absolute wonderful host. We arrived later than expected and he was very understanding. He even took the time to walk us down and show us how to get tickets for the bus and where to drop our things off the next day as our flight was late in the evening and he had another guest coming in. The apartment is tiny but perfect for a place to crash after exploring the city all day. It’s in a great area and walking distance to restaurants, shops, and to catch a bus. We highly recommend!
Cute place in great location. It’s very very small but we weren’t led to believe otherwise.

Alexandre was a great host. I really appreciated how responsive he was to all of my questions/requests. The apartment is as described- small, but very cozy. The location is perfect! Only a 5-10 minute walk to Notre Dame. I would definitely recommend staying at Alexandre's apartment!
An unbeatable location. Smaller than I expected, but perfect for one night and if you expect to spend most your time exploring. Comfy bed despite the loft!

5 stars for the city of Paris and 5 stars for Alexandre's apartment. 
Before we had even arrived Alexandre had sent us a huge list of recommendations of restaurants him and his family liked to eat at as well as some suggested itineraries for our days in Paris. I suggest you taken on his recommendations!
The actual apartment is small however this is to be expected in Paris. Alexandre has expertly used all of the space in the stylish apartment. Its perfect for a couple although the sofa can be used as a bed if you want 3 people. The bed was comfortable, the wifi strong and the shower perfect. 
The thing that really cant be beaten about this apartment is the location. There is a metro stop, Odeon, just a few minutes walk away. It is a few minute walk to restaurants like L'avant Comptoir, Saint Sulpice church or the bars on Rue Cannettes st. A 15 minute walk and you are at Pont Neuf crossing the Seine, shopping at Bon Marche department store or heading into Le Marais.
Finally we were lucky enough to meet Alexandre at checkout. He is an extremley friendly family man and really helped us out with flexibility around check out, even though he had more guests arriving that day. A great apartment to stay in Paris!

Alexandre’s place is a little piece of Paris, right in the bubbling city. Great comfortable space. My sister and I had a great time exploring the cities sights. Alexandre welcomed us on arrival making our holiday very welcoming. He suggested great sights and things to see. Communication was fantastic. Would highly recommend his space.
The apartment was so stylish, cosy and conveniently located a short walk from Odeon metro station and lots of restaurants.
A great little place
An adorable, cozy place in an ideal Paris location. Alexandre is a great host, and the place was clean and well stocked with everything I needed. Tiny but perfect! I highly recommend.

We had a great time in this cozy studio, which has everything you need for a short stay. 
We didn‘t meet Alexandre in person, but he always managed to response to our messages very quickly and was a very kind host! He also gave us many useful tips for our stay in Paris. 
The studio is located very well so you can reach everything in just a few minutes.

알렉상드르씨가 친절하고 빠르게 응대해줘요.
진짜 깔끔하고 아늑해요. 침대가 진짜 편해요. 곳곳에서 호스트의 세심한 배려가 느껴집니다. 그러나 조금 좁을 수는 있습니다.

Alexandre’s place is in a wonderful location. He is beyond excellent with his communication and made Check-in and Check-out very easy. The loft is quite small so if you are of any size be prepared to be squeezed. Fortunately my husband and I felt just fine and enjoyed living like kids again climbing up to our fort at night! Enjoyed our stay at Alexandre’s place!

The studio was perfect for exploring the city, close to many attractions! Comfortable accommodations for 2-3 people. The studio was very clean and in a very safe neighborhood of Paris. Lots of cafes and shops near by. I would gladly stay again!

Alexandre was extremely helpful with check-in and providing suggestions. It was very hot in Paris while we were there so he came by with another family. He is very attentive. The flat is in a great location.
Alexande was very kind and clear in all the communications, the flat is very cosy and with a lot beautiful details

Wonderful place!! Although small, the location is awesome and hard to beat! Because of the size, it’s not quite big enough for three plus luggage. We were tripping over our bags a little. However, this place is perfect for light travelers and those who plan to spend most of their time out on the town and have a home base. Thanks Alexandre!
The flat is clean and the space well thought-out, and the location is superb!
This apartment is handy to shops, restaurants and a short walk to Notre Dame etc.

Highly recommend. The space was small but updated and well thought out. Alexandre was a wonderful host and he let us drop off our bags before the check in time which made a huge difference as we have been traveling on foot. Safe location and wonderful neighborhood. Will definitely stay again!

This place is beautiful, cozy and the location is great. Location, location, location is the best description.  The place is perfect for one or two persons, no more (is like a boat cabin). Ideal for travellers with small luggage.

We had an amazing time! my 16 year old son and I hired bikes for a day with Holland bikes and it was the best way to get around the city. the Studio flat was small but very clean and tidy. Two people are plenty for this space. the boghbourhodd was perfect. Ten minutes walk to the Notre Dame and the River Seine. The cafe just down the street I. the corner for breakfast was fantastic and the waiter so friendly. it is a perfect neighbourhood as just off the main tourist trail so is very quiet. I would recommend a stay at this venue and the host Alexandre who sadly was out of town was so helpful.
Small but cozy - great location in the heart of the city. The apartment smelled moldy but hopefully that's getting resolved.
A nice (but small) place in a very central part of Paris. A bit warm in the summer heat, but not more than you can live with. Recommended.
Lovely stay, very helpful host and a lovely area! Would recommend to friends! Only complaint which is of no fault of the host, but it got very warm and was difficult to cool down

I recommend this place for anyone looking for a space in a great location. Ideal for couples or just 2 people. 
We enjoyed our stay. Everything is provided in an efficient manner. 
Alexandre was a helpful host! 
Do not hesitate to rent here if you want the proximity and comfort in a cozy little place!
Restaurants and cafes  and metro nearby are a plus!
Super apartment in a great location!

It has been an ideal place to spend the weekend. 
Alexander is a perfect host, the apartment is clean, well decorated and is located in the best area in the city with a lot of art galleries, restaurants and near to le Jardin du Luxembourg.

Alexandreさんの説明はわかりやすく､丁寧な対応でした｡部屋は小さいですが､とても清潔で､生活に必要なものはほとんど揃っていました｡
ｱﾊﾟｰﾄの立地は素晴らしく良いと思います｡飲食店やｽｰﾊﾟｰに近く､駅やﾊﾞｽ停も近くて便利です｡それに滞在中は問題もなく､安全に過ごせました｡
とても良かった｡

Alexandre was a very informative and welcoming host. He was extremely prompt in his responses and had a list of helpful recommendations for food and entertainment near his place.  I would highly recommend his place to others!

Small but comfortable apartment at an amazing location, with a large window facing an internal courtyard (this gives you natural light).  Host very nice and helpful. He's given me many tips to move around. There is a double bed at the mezzanine that you reach by climbing a ladder and a couch downstairs. Since the apartment is very small, opening the couch up means that there is no space left to move around. I've used the bed at the mezzanine. Beware that there is very little space between the bed and the ceiling in there. Very good shower and wifi. The apartment has fridge and stove but no microwave. Overall, very good.

This little apartment is clean, cute, and has a fantastic location. Only about a 5 minutes walk from the Odéon métro stop, and about the same (in the other direction) from the Luxembourg stop (where you can catch the RER- very convenient for getting to and from the airport). The neighborhood where it is located is great. Plenty of fantastic restaurants, a fun vibe, and not nearly as busy or touristy as somewhere like the Latin Quarter (which is also a very short walk away). The apartment is nicely secluded just off a courtyard, and is a great size for 2 people. The bed was also very comfortable! (Just watch your head in the loft.) We really enjoyed our stay, and will definitely stay here again next time we are in Paris!
The place was exactly what it said it would be and Alexandre gave me great tips about the city. Also, the bar across the street is good

This apartment is tiny and it is excellent!  We loved it and found the location to be perfect for our final days in Paris.  Everything was clean and beautifully appointed.  The bathroom and shower are clean and bright as is the kitchen.  The bed is very comfortable though if you have any difficult with stairs or ladders it may not be for you.  For us all was excellent including Alexandre, an accommodating and helpful host.  We thoroughly enjoyed the restaurant nearby that he recommended.  Having the Luxembourg Jardin nearby was a high light for us.  This place is secure, safe and comfortable!  Thank you for the chance to stay in such a lovely place.
Great little place in a spectacular location with everything you need. Easily accessed by transit and the neighbourhood felt safe to walk in at night.
Alexandre's flat is compact and efficient. It was exactly as described,  great location. He was exceptional host,good communication and helpful. I  recommend.

El departamento es excelente con una ubicación ideal. Es pequeño y sin embargo tiene todo lo necesario para una estadia perfecta en Paris. Alexandre es un excelente host respondiendo rapidísimo a todas nuestras dudas y facilitándonos toda la información para recorrer Paris sin perdernos de nada! Gracias
Top! The house is in a great position. Cosy, silent, complete of everything. It is a very smart place to stay for a weekend in Paris
This place is in a great location in the fifth and it’s clean but be warned—it’s tiny!!

Het was een zeer aangenaam verblijf! Een nette en slim ingerichte plek om savonds thuis te komen. Het appartement is net zoals op de foto's. Een kleine ruimte die toch ruim aanvoelt. Ideaal voor 2. Alexandre stond de hele tijd open voor vragen en suggesties. Een groot aantal bezienswaardigheden kan je makkelijk vanop wandelafstand bezichtigen. De metro is zeer dichtbij en je zal niet verhongeren in deze leuke, sfeervolle buurt.
Superschattig appartementje, piepklein. Voor 2 personen, echt niet meer. Je moet geen hoogtevrees hebben (bed). Superlocatie!

Just wow!  I can not recommend this apartment enough. The location is fantastic with so many bars and restaurants near by, so many attractions in walking distance and the metro and RER Trains so close.  The area is just beautiful. The apartment is quite small and maybe not ideal if you are not a fan of small spaces as you can not sit up in bed in the loft but we loved it!!! The host Alexandre is fantastic and gave us all the information we needed to have a fantastic stay in Paris! I would stay here again!!!!
真的真的真的超棒超棒超棒一次民宿体验!首先,房东特别热情好客和劳心,会告诉你如何抵达,还有告诉你周边的环境;其次,房子的地理位置特别好,在市中心,戴高乐机场RER B直达;最后,房间的布置也特别让人喜欢,虽然狭小但很温馨｡
Lovely cosy place, great location, very nice host and super clean!

Alexandre's space is small but extraordinarily clean and organized! Perfect for a couple or individuals. Even for the 3 of us (3 ladies), we made it work. The location is great for sightseeing as it's very central to a bunch of popular sites. 

Alexandre was a great host. Very good communication and he gave us a ton of places to see and try out. He even designed a 3 tour of the area! 

Definitely recommend!

Great place, location, and close to everything!! This place was perfect place to stay for a few days. Alexandre was very kind to meet us at the place and give a tour of the studio and neighborhood. He gave us great recommendations of places to see and eat. The place is close to the metro, cafes, restaurants, and shops.  I would definitely recommend this place!

Super nice cozy little nook! Great location. It's near great shops, restaurants, train stations, gardens, and tourist attractions. We were planing on taking the train places, but since everything was so close we ended up just walking to a lot of places. 

Host was very nice gave great suggestions and even quickly showed us stops in the area, which was very helpful. Felt very save and secure. Very quick to respond to questions. Also, really strong WiFi connection which was nice. 

Since the bed is lofted, it might not be great for people who are scared of heights, but if you don't mind a lofted bed, its super, super comfortable! Got a really really good nights sleep after long days of touring. 

I would highly recommend a stay at Alexandre's apartment for your trip to Paris!

Great place to stay in Paris that is within walking distance of virtually everything you’d want to see. If you don’t want to walk, this place is still a great location for using public transportation. The host is absolutely fantastic and will go above and beyond to make your stay comfortable. This place is a steal for anyone traveling to Paris.

The flat is in a good location and the bed is pretty comfortable but other than that I did not enjoy my stay. When you first enter the room you are immediately hit with this damp like smell -- the odor stemmed from the toilet/shower area so my best guess is mold. Another issue I came across were pests. I don't mind ants crawling on the floor or on my belongings but once I see a carpet bug on top of all that -- I gotta call it quits.

Alexandre's place is located in the Latin Quarter and is FANTASTIC if you're looking to be right in the middle of the action. It's within walking distance to the Luxembourg Gardens, Pantheon, Notre Dame, St. Chapelle Cathedral, Rue St. Germain (which has tons of shops, restaurants, and vibrant nightlife), Musee de Cluny, and so much more. 

The space itself is rather small, but if you'll be out and about anyway, so that doesn't matter. The loft bed is very comfy, and the sofa bed is fine as well. There is a small refrigerator, so that's great for drinks/leftovers. The neighbors are very friendly as well -they always like to say 'hi'.
Great place in one of the best areas in Paris and the best host with a lot of great local recommendations. Thanks Alexander!!
Excellent location, kind host, clean and calm studio apartment. Enjoyed the stay here.

Paris is filled with a lot of areas that have their own character and this one was perfect for us. Good restaurants, walking distance to trains and buses and plenty to do. The host also has a list of tips ready to help make your visit even more enjoyable. Our stay in Paris was short and this was what we needed for that time. Thank you for being an amazing host and helping us through the details from booking to our arrival and things to add to our trip!
I was in Paris for one night and Alexandre’s place was perfect.  The apartment was so quaint and Alexandre and was helpful with any questions I had.  I would absolutely stay here again!

I loved staying at Alexandre’s studio. It was perfect for one person, but I can see that it could be a little too small for more than two. Just to note, the loft bed is very close to the ceiling and I couldn’t sit up straight when up there, even though I’m a very short person. It didn’t bother me, since I only went up there to sleep, but it could be something to keep in mind for someone else. That aside, the studio was the perfect little sanctuary. It was cozy, comfortable, and very clean. I had everything I needed, and would happily stay here again next time I visit Paris by myself!

A fantastic apartment in a beautiful part of Paris. I stayed for one week and it had every facility I needed for a very comfortable stay. It is within easy walking distance from all of the major attractions but also only minutes walk to both a Metro and RER station. Alexandre is a wonderful host. Before my stay, he sent me a comprehensive list of the best local restaurants and bars. He also sent a suggested daily itinerary of things I might like to do. It was all very useful. He also went out of his way, in his own time, to help me out when I needed it on a couple of occasions. I highly recommend this apartment and would definitely stay here again next time I visit Paris. Thank you Alexandre.

Alexandre was a wonderful host who was responsive and provided a host of tips and recommendations for our stay in Paris!  The place is perfectly situated near two metro stops in an active, central part of Paris (although this of course means that a little noise is inevitable).  As noted, the apartment is small (would not recommend for three people) but the space is used very efficiently and for one or two people, it's perfect.
Absolutely stunning flat in a perfect location. Alexandre took the time to even give me suggestions on where to visit. I look forward to going back and staying there again!

I chose this studio space based on several criteria:  location, photos, price/quality ratio, and previous reviewers' comments.  All in all I was very satisfied with the space and recommend it to a solo traveler or two people very comfortable with each other.  

The description and photos are very accurate;  it's a tight but nicely furnished space, perfectly clean and with all the amenities you'll need for a short stay in a great neighborhood.  Just right if you plan to be out and about during the day and only need a place to lay your head at night.

For me, it was very conveniently located halfway between Luxembourg and Odéon, perfect for traveling around Paris and convenient to the RER B line from/to CDG.  

At the same time, you're in the city and should expect neighborhood sounds; there's a popular watering hole across the street, trash/recycling truck coming by in the morning, etc.

Alexandre was very communicative, flexible as he could be with arrival/departure, a friendly welcome, text message check-ins during the stay, etc.  

Recommended and I'd be happy to stay again.
Enjoyed staying at Alexandre's studio! He was so helpful and we stayed in such a beautiful place! We will definitely come back!
The place was great! Located in the quiet(er) part of Paris, it is close to all major spots in Saint Germain. Clean, cozy and petite, it was a perfect stay. Definitely recommended.
If you’re sightseeing this is the perfect location. Alexandre is a brilliant and accommodating host.
suuuupeer apartamento en paris, es todo lo que necesitas en paris, super ubicacion super host super lugar, no lo piensnes mas esta es la opcion que buscas.

Recently stayed at Alexandre’s place for a couple of nights. It was such a lovely place and what a great host he is! He greeted us there and told us about the great places to visit whilst we were there and ensured we had everything we needed. 100% would recommend and will probably stay here again!

Alexandre was a perfect host! The place was in a fantastic location; close to the metro, restaurants, a grocery, shopping, and sights to see. Excellent accommodations! (Albeit a bit small but perfect for one to two travelers. I wouldn’t suggest any luggage larger than carry on due to the space) Towels and soaps were provided for the bathroom, tea and coffee in the kitchen along with plates, glasses, and utensils. Bottles of water were also provided in the mini fridge. Alexandre also sent me a list of a possible itinerary, things to see and places to eat. We arrived into the city early in the morning and were able to drop off our luggage before check in and then returned after the specified check in time.  After meeting Alexandre and dropping our bags off he gave us some maps of Paris and then walked us over to a main street to show us in which direction to find food and some sights to see. He was an absolute delight and a pleasure to meet. I would absolutely stay here again!!

Lovely apartment, it is small as stated but the location is perfect and the apartment itself was perfect for what we needed. Some people may struggle climbing up to the bed space be warned, but we never found it an issue and loved our stay.

Alexandre's apartment was exactly what I was looking for during my stay in Paris.  Alexandre was kind enough to meet me two hours before the check out time indicated on his listing.  I was able to drop my bags off while the apartment was being cleaned so I could walk around, which was very convenient.  Alexandre showed me all of the amenities in the apartment which was helpful.  He even took the time to write a detailed message of points of interest around the city.
The apartment is quite small - but for one person, it is absolutely perfect.  It is fully equipped with everything you may need.  Alexandre was kind enough to provide still and sparkling water along with high-quality ground coffee and a French press.  The apartment is centrally located in the 6th arrondissement which was perfect for my itinerary.  The only inconvenience that comes to mind was the building's water was turned off for the majority of one day during my stay, but myself nor Alexandre had any control over that.
I look forward to staying at Alexandre's apartment again when I am next in Paris and highly recommend it to all.
Great spot. Close to everything!

I highly recommend this place. This place was percect to travel in Paris. Also Alexandre greeted me warmly and gave me some tips about Paris. It was useful. I had a greet time. Thank you!
숙소가 진짜 깨끗하고, 위치가 뤽상부르, 오데옹, 생미셸 지하철 다 가깝고, 걸어서 산책하기 너무좋아요. 집 자체를 관리한다는 느낌이 딱 들고, 1-2명이 쓰기 딱 적합한 숙소같아요. 집 주인께서도 친절하시고, 하나하나 설명해주고 도와주려고 하세요!

새로 집을 수리해서 그런지 내부도 깨끗했고, 필요한 물품도 거의 다 갖추어져 있어서 매우 만족스럽게 지냈습니다. TV 사용법이나 기타 잘 모르는 것을 물어보았을 때 직접 오거나 문자로 신속하게 응답해 주어 매우 만족스러웠구요. 단지 생각했던 것보다 방이 조금 작았고 2층침대여서 자다가 중간에 화장실가게 되면 잠이 달아나게 되는 불편함은 각오하셔야 될 것 같습니다. 무엇보다 위치가 너무 좋고 집주인이 친절해서 만족스러웠습니다.

Alexandre’s little studio flat was perfect for our trip to Paris. Ideally located in the heart of the city and great transport links around Paris and to the airport. 

Due to delays in our travel to Paris, we arrived at the flat late, yet were incredibly pleased that Alexandre went out of his way to wait for us. On arrival Alexandre was very welcoming and offered great advice on places to see and local things to do. Even though the flat was smaller than we expected, the flat was very clean and well furnished and We really enjoyed staying at this flat and would definitely recommend it to anyone.
If you're looking for a central location in quintessential Paris, this is it. Alexandre was a terrific host and his location in St. Germain was excellent.

Alexandre was super friendly and took extra time to walk me around the neighbourhood and point out things to see and places to eat. The apartment is tiny but perfect for a busy trip to Paris where you just need somewhere convenient, clean and comfortable.  Would definitely recommend!

Such a cute little clean space. Very cozy and well equipped. We loved our 2 night stay here and would love to return. Alex was very helpful and informative. It was in a great location ! Very enjoyable thank you!!

Very cozy. Great prime location  Alexandre was a pleasure. Walked us around the neighborhood, showed us the best places to eat and to sight see. Also assisted us with navigating the metro and gave us a tutorial for purchasing metro tickets. Provided for us was sparkling water, still water, and coffee. It exceeded my expectations. Felt as if i was staying at a friends home. Best holiday in Paris!
Alexandre was a great host. Super hospitality, great flat in an amazing location, and very clean! Thank you and hope to stay at your charming studio in the future.

Alexandre was a great host who even took the time to show us the neighborhood (ask about the bar his family has been going to for decades). The location is perfect, close to metro and RER train that will take you straight to the airport. Walking distance to restaurants, bars and shops. It’s also a short walk to Notre Dame and the Louvre. We will defenitely stay here again next time we go to Paris.
This was a perfect stay in Paris! Alexandre is very polite- great host. The Appartement was very clean and cosy. Everything perfect, fine and calm.
I am so grateful for what Alexandre help us, it was the best memory of Paris for me and I would 100% choose it everytime I am j Paris
Great host, Cozy plane, and close to shops, public transportation, and the gardens. Would gladly stay again.
Alexandre’s apartment was well appointed, clean, and in a fantastic area. Very quick responses and helpful introduction. We’d love to return.
pas de commentaire
Annonce conforme à la réalité. Endroit très calme, une bonne literie et faites attention à la tête dans la salle de bain.

Parfaitement parfait, je recommande vivement les séjours dans cet appartement plein de charme où l'on se sent immédiatement confortable !
