Tatiana est une hôte géniale avec qui la communication est parfaite Et qui est flexible quant aux horaires d'arrivée! Merci pour tout!

Nous avons passé 3 semaines à Tatiana.C'était un agréable séjour.Non loin du métro et dans une maison avec de très beaux voisins. l'appartement avait tout votre coeur désiré. Était aussi fabuleux, Tatiana et son mari ont immédiatement réagi quand des problèmes existent. Merci beaucoup, nous nous sommes sentis très à l'aise.
La propriétaire est très réceptive et ponctuelle. L'appartement est soigné et près d'un métro. Le prix est très intéressant pour ce qui est Paris! Ce fut un séjour agréable.

Logement très beau et propre. Nous serions resté plus longtemps! De l'espace, matelas très confortable. Un peu loin de Paris Centre mais à quelques minutes à pieds du métro. Nous avons été bien dirigés par Tatiana, bien accueillis. Emplacement tranquille et juste à côté du poste de police (rassurant hihi). Merci encore pour ce beau séjour!
Hôte accueillante et très disponible, logement bien situé et bien équipé.
Perfect
Super !
Great location! Very easy to get from airport, gate, centre ville

Tatiana was a nice host. 
She help me find the apartment when i was a bit lost.  

The apartment is near the subway. 
The apartmenet is super cute and super clean !
I recommend this spot.
Just perfect ! Everything is perfect, we enjoyed our stay very much. Cool room with bright kitchen. Just as lovely as the description. I recommend it.
Everything clean and nice. Good location.

A lovely place to stay at. Everything was very clean, the sheets smelled like roses, the couch bed was very comfortable and the apartment had really everything that you could wish for. Tatiana was very friendly and helpful. We definitely recommend her place.

The place is really great for a short stay, close to the metro, and only 20 minutes to the center. The apartment was really clean and cozy, there was everything what you can need, including the kitchen equipment. Tatiana awswers all the questions very quickly, so the communication is really great. There's one thing you can consider when you're not used to living in a busy place: the noises from the street (the police station in the opposite site of the street) and from the corridor can be a little bothering. But for a short stay it's not a big deal. In general, we were surprised to have such a lovely place in a good price in Paris area. I would definitely recommend.
Great apartment, located in a quiet area next to the police station. Metro station (M11) is 5 minutes away. A bit dusty (for my tastes at least) but overall I would definitely recommend it!
Really nice, well equipped and renovated apartment, 5' from the metro station that takes you to the city center in approximately 15'. Safe and quiet neighborhood.

Perfect location near the metro station and services such as pharmacy, supermarket and bakery. Tatiana’s apartment is very nice and clean and she is super fast in answering to every doubt or question. The kitchen is well equipped with everything you can possibly need during your stay. The bed is comfortable and easy to open/close. 
There really are no words to describe our stay! Wonderful experience and we will for sure suggest this accomodation to friends and relatives!

Me encanto la o departamento, fuimos de Luna de miel con mi esposo y nos encanto, muy limpio, acogedor, cerca de la estación, Tatiana te asesora y responde los mensajes a tiempo... volvería a este lugar encantada !!

Cerca del metro, cerca de locales variados, buen vecindario, muy comodo.

Muy recomendado.
Nice and very clean place and Tatiana was very kind and responsive. Thanks very much!
This was a lovely space with everything we needed! We loved staying here!
Local limpo, com tudo que precisa para uma boa estadia.

Un piccolo appartamento ben posizionato vicino alla linea 11 della metropolitana. è leggermente fuori dalla zona dei monopattini elettrici e delle car sharing ma se la metro funziona non ci sono assolutamente problemi! L'appartamento è composto da zona giorno con divano letto, cucina e bagno. In 2 è più che perfetto!

Super Airbnb overnatning for pengene. Les Lilas er en dejlig forstad til Paris, hvor der også er rig mulighed for, at gå på opdagelse i de små franske gader. Helt sikkert anbefalelsesværdigt. Vær dog opmærksom på, at lejligheden er beliggende overfor den lokale politistation, så der kan forekomme en smule støj om natten.
Great stay overall.  Respond from owner not very prompt.
Small but super fomfortable place to stay, looks exactly like the pictures. Loved all the heaters around the apartment :)

Апартаменты брали в аренду на 7 дней. Небольшая уютная чистая квартира. Есть все необходимое для проживания. Все продумано до мелочей. На кухне есть чай, кофе, сахар, соль, макароны… Посуда для приготовления. Удобное место расположения квартиры. 5 минут до метро. На метро ехать 12 минут до центра города – острова Сите. На против квартиры полицейский участок. Это тихий, спокойный и безопасный спальный район. Недалеко 3 супермаркета, 2 пекарни, кафе, аптеки и магазины. Все удобно. На окнах есть жалюзи. Я их закрывал каждую ночь. Спать было комфортно. Отдельное спасибо хозяйке квартиры Татьяне. Прекрасный отзывчивый человек. Нам с женой все понравилось. Рекомендую.

Heel fijn appartement! Je kan er koken, wassen en verder ziet het er netjes uit. Buurt is rustig. Gelegen tegenover een politiebureau dus ook nog eens veilig. 
Op 5 minuten afstand de metro die je gelijk in het hartje van de stad brengt. Geweldig.
Wij hebben enkel online (via Airbnb) contact gehad met Tatiana. Dit ging prima.
Spazio molto carino e confortevole
Tatiana was excellent, my parents had a wonderful time in paris

Отличное соотношение цены и качества. В 5 минутах от станции метро, путь от аэропорта занимает 80-90 минут, до центра Парижа 25 минут. Рядом есть несколько хороших пекарен, Макдоналдс и два отличных супермаркета. В квартире есть всё необходимое для готовки.
La casa cuenta con los servicios básicos para que dos personas tengan una buena estadía.  Estación del metro cerca.
Great place to stay...well connected by metro (Marie de lilas, nearest metro Station). Quick to support & help.. would highly recommend this small but cozy place

The AirBNB is just as described. It is a five minute walk from the metro which has a direct 30min train to the middle of Paris. There are two small supermarkets nearby and a provided hob and fridge to store goods (no oven).

My only advice would beto bring a sleep mask/earplugs, there is a road next to it with thin windows, not that busy at night but the curtains let a lot of light through. There is also a police station opposite. This is amazing, apart from there are no curtains for the kitchen window and you have to walk through it to get to the bathroom... bring a dressing gown!

This flat is gorgeous!!! 

I walked in and it was SO immaculately clean, everything was chic and nicely placed, the decorations are perfect, and I love that there’s plenty of closet space. Of course it’s small - it’s a city flat! But it’s perfect for one or two people. The bathroom was so clean, water pressure great, water got hot very quickly. Towels plush and nice. Bed is a pull out couch bed which was quite comfortable, and I am a total bed snob. 

I noticed some reviews complaining about the street noise and the brightness of the flat - FYI Americans, there are blinds outside the window that you can pull shut to keep out the light. I know we don’t have those in America but you don’t have to sleep in a bright room - you can close the blinds. As for street noise, it wasn’t bad at all, it’s like any other city. You’re in a city. What do you expect? 

I love this flat and I hope to rent it again during my next trip to Paris. It’s a 40€ Uber ride from the airport, the metro is a 4-min walk, and there are tons of restaurants, grocery stores, bars, etc. very close by within walking distance. Taking the metro to the very center of Paris takes approx 25 minutes.

駅から歩いて5分の立地で家もすごく綺麗でした｡
中心部へも30分で行けるのでNavigoとか持ってたら交通費は気にしなくていいし､妥当な値段だと思います｡
Tatiana was extremely responsive and helpful! Great place, clean and stylish!
Buona posizione. Appartamento piccolo ma con tutto ciò che occorre per un breve soggiorno.
All you need.

Great stay.  Close to metro, very cool designed unit, and awesome amenities for all your needs. Was very clean and bed was very comfortable. Was right across the street from a police station which gave us a sense of security. Only down side is that it is very close to the road and unit doesn’t get very dark at night due to street lights. Thank you for a great stay.
Appartamento piccolo, ma carino e con tutto il necessario. È collegato benissimo al centro di Parigi, quindi è molto comodo. Tornerei certamente.

Die Unterkunft von Tatiana liegt ca. 25 Minuten vom Zentrum entfernt und somit durchaus zu verkraften. Die Straße neben der Unterkunft ist tatsächlich etwas belebter, aber nichts was einem den Schlaf raubt. Wir haben die Übernachtung wirklich genossen und können die Unterkunft auch guten Gewissens weiterempfehlen, da das  Preis-Leistungsverhältnis einfach Top ist.

A pesar de estar alejado del centro, el piso está bien conectado en metro (aunque no es buena idea con maletas grandes). No hay mucha flexibilidad con la hora de llegada, pues avisamos que llegaríamos a las 13:45 y nos dijo que no estaría listo hasta las 14. Sin embargo, al final no nos recibió ella sino que nos dejó las llaves (más temprano) en una panadería. El sillón-cama es cómodo y la cocina está muy bien equipada, igual que el baño.

This place is small, but very clean, stylish and comfortable. It has everything my husband and I needed. It is about a 45 minute metro trip into Paris, but it was easy to get there. There's also 2 very good bakeries about a 5 minute walk away.

Tatiana’s place is lovely. Very clean, in a good location and easily accessible. My only concerns are that the bathroom door doesn’t close and a few of the electrical sockets didn’t work. However I would definitely stay here again! Lovely host, great and fast communication.
Sehr nette Host! Die Wohnung war sauber und reicht perfekt für 2, ist allerdings weit vom Zentrum entfernt und sowie nachts als auch tagsüber extrem laut. Ansonsten toll!!!
Clean near good range of shops and cafe.
Very friendly and helpful!
Adorei o lugar, por dentro é Lindo e estiloso.
Tatiana's apartment is comfortable and clean. She's great at communicating quickly and is flexible when it comes to arrivals/departures. All in all, a great host!

Tatiana’s place was as the pictures show, check in was easy, the subway was close, and the apartment was easy to find. The bes is a pull out sofa so the mattress is uncomfortable and unfortunately we ran into spiders in the bathroom. We had to make the bed ourselves, and look all over the house for a second towel because we were 2 guests and they only left one. The house does have nice touches like tea and a life saving plug adapter.

Definitely great value. Just not necessarily what everyone is looking for. Its kinda far out of city which was fine for me. And also a solid 5 mins walk from the closests train station which was also fine for me. Apt was great and comfortable, host was very reponsive. I would repeat.

Tatiana's place is great. It's in a cute neighborhood just outside the city center. This was the last stop for us on a month long trip and it was perfect. It was stupid, clean, secure, and the bed was comfortable. Was perfect for our last night in Europe.

Her place was clean and tidy. She communicated frequently and quickly. It is right next to a police station which was good for safety but the sirens obviously do go off anytime of day or night. She left instant coffee and tea for the morning which was nice. The only unexpected thing was that the bed is actually the pull out couch. It wasn’t super comfortable for my husband and I. We made it through alright for two nights but that is the only thing keeping it from 5 stars!
The apartment is beautiful, very safe, you have a police station in front, near the metro station,  i like this apartment and hope to get back next year.
Great location great place! Totally fits the French feel. Host was very attentive and had prompt responses. I would definitely book this air bnb again.

Tatiana's place was great! Exactly as pictured and very clean! She included nice amenities like tea and sugar. The location was nice. A little bit outside of the city central, but it was fun to explore the more local restaurants and shops! Would most definitely stay again!
Nice cosy little flat just on the edge of Paris, but with easy metro accessibility. Check in and communication with Tatiana all smooth even though I arrived pretty late in the evening.

Beautiful home complete with everything you’ll need and more.. great location, only 5 minuets walk away from the metro (mairie des lilas) which takes you to the center off paris (hôtel de ville) in less than 10 minutes.. for only €1.90!
Small but very cosy! Stylish, very clean, lots of amenities, and a great host! Very much recommended.

The apartment is petite but so pretty! The bed is so comfy even is a sofa bed. The place was clean and it was located a just 5 min from the metro station. Stores and bakeries were close by. We felt very secure to have the police station just in front and the neighborhood was nice and quiet. We love our stay at Tatiana’s place and it was perfect for us as it was our first  visit to Paris

Tatiana’s apt was super cute and clean. It definitely exceeded my expectations. It is a studio perfect for 2 ppl. At night there does seem to be a lot of outside traffic noise and given there is a light post outside, light definitely comes thru at night, but if you close the outside blinds that definitely helps with such issues. Lastly I was so glad she had an adapter for the wall which was a nice touch, who knew there were different wall plugs than those from the US...lol. Lastly the location is definitely in a locals neighborhood, it is about 35 min to the center of Paris by car and if you take the public transportation it is longer. My bf and I didn’t mind it, it allowed us to explore the non tourist parts of Paris. Would definitely recommend Tatiana’s place to everyone specially to those that dont mind the  commute to the heart of Paris.

Tatiana’s apartment has everything you could wish for while in Paris! It’s right next to a the metro, which will get you where you need to be ASAP, it is very centrally located in Les Lila’s, so anything you need is near by, and is just far enough from the “Hustle N Bustle” of Paris that you can get home and simply relax after a long day of traveling and exploring!The apartment was absolutely spotless once we arrived, and it also has some sweet amenities including a Nespresso coffee maker and a TOWEL WARMER! Tatiana was very helpful and quick to reply, she even introduced us to a local bakery that became go to place for sandwiches and snacks! I have never tired such good sandwiches... when staying here, try the Filet minion sandwich at  the bakery (it’s way cheaper than anything you’ll find within Paris, I recommend taking some on your journeys) ... while staying here, I fell in love with Paris!
Very well located small apartment. We really enjoyed staying at Tatiana’s place and wish we could’ve stayed longer! She’s also very communicative and helpful!
Great

It's a really nice and cozy apartment. It was easy to find. It's a bit too far from the center of Paris, but on the other hand it's calm and quiet during the night and the apartment itself is still close to the metro. The place was very clean with lots of equipments, if you want to cook. The bed is noisy and it can be distracting, but overall I had a pleasant experience.
Loved our time at this place! She was great at answering and the appartement was only a 5 minute walk from the metro! Fairly quick travel to city center as well :)

Positives: 
1. Apartment was very cute, cosy, clean and spacious.
2. There were pastas and basic cooking seasonings and tools to use.
3. Heaters were all around the house, toilet included.

Negatives:
1. Bed makes a lot of noise with the slightest movements.
2. There were bright lights from the outside of the apartment. Curtains helped to darken the apartment quite a lot but not fully.

It’s overall a really pleasant stay. I loved the apartment very much. It’s extremely value for money. I’d recommend!
沙发床不是很舒服 床打开了空间就很小 是临街一楼晚上稍微有点吵 总体还不错

The space was very clean and stylish with many cute extra touches. We were running later than expected, but Tatiana found a safe, easy way to get us the key. 

I really appreciate her super quick responses and her attention to detail. 

Recommend!

This is a great place for Paris as it's not in the city centre so it's a quiet place. it's also very safe and close to metro line. The kitchen was great with a lot of stuff that we could use during our stay. loved it !
its really nice place. Near to metro and ships. Really recommended.
Appartamento delizioso, ben collegato dal centro di Parigi. Il nostro soggiorno è stato ottimo.
A lovely, quiet area with a supermarket 5 minutes away. Basic amenities provided and wifi signal was great.
Can’t go wrong! Perfect space for a couple to stay! Would stay again.
Lovely apartment, very clean and the perfect size for two. Great safe location just down the road from a couple of great bakeries and the metro!

Tatiana has created a lovely space with many thoughtful touches. She had turned on the lights and heated towel rail for us and provided everything we could possibly need for a comfortable stay.
Great value and we would stay again if we came back to Paris.

Tatiana’s place was beautiful and clean with all the required amenities. It’s just 5 minutes walk from Metro station. There are bakeries and eateries near Metro Station. The locality is safe. I would recommend this apartment. Since we had to catch an early morning flight, Tatiana helped with the key situation. Our stay was good overall. Thank you.
Muy buen espacio bonito y agradable
Increíble estancia. Gran limpieza, atención incluso a los pequeños detalles. Inmejorable. Sin duda, la mejor opción para aquellos que busquen algo alejado del nucleo de París.

We really enjoyed our stay at Tatiana’s place. She is an incredibly accommodating host who allowed us to check in early and even offered  to store our bags after we checked out. Her place was perfectly clean and included amenities that allowed us to cook breakfast and do laundry. Cons: it’s a bit loud at night (especially with the windows open) and the bed is not the most comfortable BUT the pros definitely outweigh the negatives here. Thank you for such a fun experience! My 2 year old son will definitely miss this “pretty pretty house.” ♥️
Great place to stay !! Very cute / stylish/ washer dryer
Lovely!
Casa muito acolhedora com tudo o que é necessário para se ter uma boa estadia!!
Great value. Very safe (right next to the police station). Easy access to the metro.
This place is perfect because it has access to the metro to take you anywhere you’d like to go in Paris. Right off the m11 which has access to all the main lines. Tatiana made our stay nice and easy.

After a very stressful trip from the airport, this apartment was a very welcoming, comfy place that we needed. Bed was very comfortable, a great tea selection, and a very clean shower! A quiet neighborhood with a great bakery just down the street. All in all very pleased with this apartment. Thank you!
Heel fijn verblijf met mooie kamer
Tatiana and Romain's place was very nice and close to public transportation. They responded quickly to all questions. The area was beautiful. I would recommend to other travelers.
All great, clean and warm.

Tatiana's place is really beautiful.
Apartment was very clean with all amenities.
You will find everything you need for a stay.
Will recommend.

Very great place to stay. We only spent one night there! Super close to the metro to see the Eiffel Tower etc. It was such a lovely little town. Tatiana was GREAT at responding and extended our check out time which was greatly appreciated as our flight was delayed.

Tatiana and Roman are too gentile and helpful!
The ap is very well cared and beautiful and pleasant.
I recommend!
Really nice and clean apartment. Tatiana welcomed kindly and was helpful . No issues at all.
Nice place.  Value for money
Nice place, good for 2 people.
When looking for the building.. look for the blue door! It is a beautiful apartment with all the amenities that you need.. and so stylishly made to! And very close to anything you may need.
The place was how it is described. It is on a street so you can hear street noise with the windows opened. Safe area and easy walk to the metro. We enjoyed our stay

A superb studio apartment in a quiet neighbourhood that can be easily reached on the metro. 

A fantastic economic option the apartment is beautifully clean, modern and well kitted out. 

Very easy and prompt communication with lovely hosts.
Tatiana’s place is in very safe neighborhood. She was kind enough to let us check in early. Always 6 min walking distance from metro. Will recommend this place!

Place is very close to the metro which is great to get around the city center. The place was clean and has lots of natural light. We enjoyed staying there and Tatiana was helpful in check in and getting to the place.

Beautiful space with great kitchen amenities. Very clean and comfortable, however the lack of air conditioning means it is very hot on warmer days. Everything else was great, would definitely stay here again.
The studio is beautiful and the amenities are wonderful. Make sure you really figure out how to unlock the door because it is very difficult! But once you get the hang of it, there is no problem
excellent

Tatiana’s place was wonderful and exceeded our expectations. She was quick to respond to all communication and gave us perfect directions on how to get from the airport to Les Lillas. She met us promptly for check in and took time to ensure we had no trouble using the door key. Les Lillas is only a 15 min metro ride to central Paris and is a very safe and appealing town. It has a great Fromagerie, a fantastic Boulangerie , a good wine shop, and several grocery stores. I would recommend Tatiana’s place to anyone who is looking for a charming place to stay.
Great space for 2 people. About 10 minutes to the train station Great shower and very clean. Opening the door was hard to figure at first but a friendly neighbor helped out!
Clean and convenient spot right outside Paris. Merci Tatiana!

Tatiana’s place was stylish and met our expectations from the online photos. It’s a little hard to find and far from the city center, but it’s in a cute neighborhood and is close to a great café and patisserie

Amazing host! Tatiana was able to let us check in earlier than planned (which allowed us to have more time in the city). The apartment is a beautiful place tucked away on a street corner. Very much an ideal place to get into paris centre! Nice touches throughout the apartment which just added to the experience. would seriously recommend and would stay here again!
Great location, very clean and stylish, great commuincation

Wow! what a great experience.
Tatiana's Airbnb is the place to go when you're staying in Paris. The apartment was very accommodating. It was clean, inviting, and very fashionable. It was nice only being just a few minutes walking distance from anything you need while you are visiting : the subway (metro), grocery store, local fresh bakery, ATM, and restaurants. For me traveling outside the USA for the first time was scary, but I had peace of mind being literally across the street from a police station. haha

We knew very little French but Tatiana and the other residents made us feel very welcome, and they helped tremendously. You CANNOT pass up Tatiana's Airbnb!!!!!!
Tatiana’s place was perfect for our stay in France. It is a little far from the city, but walking distance to a metro station! The apartment is small, but very nice! Plenty of space for two people.
Tatiana’s place was amazing!! It was close to the metro, close to tons of good food, and I felt very safe! It was small but had everything my sister and I needed. Can’t wait to come back!

Great space including everything you will need. Very well located right by an important train stop, but still in a quiet and safe neighborhood. Place was very clean and had a lot of thoughtful touches!

Angenehmer Aufenthalt, aber laut.

Das Ausziehbett ist leider nicht sehr bequem.
Fremdsprachige Fernsehprogramme standen nicht zur Verfügung.
Muy bonito apartamento, cerca del transporte público pero muy retirado del centro de la ciudad
Very comfortable and Tatiana was great host !!!
Great place to stay. Very comfortable, nice kitchen and bathroom. My sister and I enjoyed staying here.

Tatiana was very hospitable during our stay. We had a little trouble finding the place and ran into a few hiccups but she was very responsive and helped us find the location even as far as going out of her way to pick us up from McDonald’s.
Amazing place. Very modern. Great bathroom. Close to Metro. Friendly hosts that gave great directions and restaurant recommendations.
Great location and apartment. Tatiana was very accomodating with our check in. The apartment had everything we needed. We will come back when in Paris next
Great place, close to metro, and very stylish. Tatiana responded very quickly and gave great restaurant recommendations!

El alojamiento de Tatiana está muy bonito, es apapachador y cuenta con todo lo que ofrece. Queda a tan sólo unas cuadras del metro, caminando 4 ó 5 minutos. Te puedes desplazar con facilidad a cualquier punto que desees. Esperamos regresar.
Claus y Gabriela.

El apartamento es tal cual como en las fotos y en las descripciones. Es pequeño pero tiene de todo (cocina completa, toallas, secador de pelo... hasta lavadora/secadora!). También hay wifi (hay que pedírselo).
La ubicación está un poquito lejos (hasta lugares más céntricos son unos 30min.), aunque el metro está muy cerca (a 5 min.). Luego cerca del metro hay de todo: restaurants, supermercados y McDonald's (que puede salvar el bolsillo a más de uno, porque comer en París es caro - teniendo en cuenta que en los menús no incluyen la bebida y pedir para 2 personas puede costar tranquilamente 7 euros).
Otra cosa a tener en cuenta es que la línea de metro (M11 en este caso) está de obras, por lo que hay que cogerlo antes de las 23:30 que es cuando cierra. Esto fue un rollo para nosotros porque nos limitaba mucho de hacer actividades por la noche.
Great place and good location. Closer to the metro where you can access to the city and main attractions in Paris

Eine sehr schöne kleine Wohnung, sehr guter Abschluss an die Metro. Sauberkeit und Ausstattung waren auch überdurchschnittlich gut. Bei Nacht etwas laut da die Wohnung direkt an der Straße liegt aber kein wirkliches Problem. Gerne wieder!
Fantastic location and great communication. I am happy with this experience, I will return in the future.
Appartamento comodo, ben accessoriato! Ben collegato con i mezzi! Lo consiglio!
Her apartment is excellent and she is a very good host. Recommended.
Beautiful studio space! Clean, safe neighborhood. Felt like home away from home. Fantastic experience!!

Tatiana's place was stunning and magnificent! Although it is a pull out bed, wow, it was very comfy! Best pull out bed I have slept on. The rest of the apartment was quaint in size, perfect for one or two travelers. My best friend and I loved the place. Perfect little kitchen and the bathroom and water pressure were better than I imagined. It takes a few metro lines to get to the city, but an underground metro station is less than 10 minutes away walking. I highly recommend!
Nice clean and cozy, near supermarkets, metro and such. Totally recommended!
Me and my husband just left today we really liked the place it is a bit far from main attractions but the metro is only 5 min away walking if you don’t care I will recommend this please!

Overall, host was good but the place was in a weird location and check in was difficult. The bed is a pull out couch. I felt like there was limited information given to us so I was kinda confused the whole time. WiFi also did not work which was a big problem. The place itself tho was clean, safe, and Tatiana was a good host but I would not stay here again.
Lovely apartment! Very helpful hosts!

Ein sehr schöne, gemütliche und sauberer Wohnung. Die Gastgeber waren sehr freundlich, hilfsbereit und zuverlässig. In der Nähe der Wohnung gab es alles was man brauchte, wie ein Supermarkt und eine Metro station. Kann man nur weiterempfehlen und wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen.
Very nice Studio, would book again anytime.
The apartment was perfect for what we needed and it was spotless. Really lovely design and it was very close to the shops and to public transport. We would definetely stay here again :)
Tatiana's place is very nice and she is very helpful and responded quick to questions. Very close to metro station and easy to get too . I reccomend!
studio molto confortevole, pulitissimo, e molto ben accessoriato:Tatiana gentilissima, ed è vicinissimo al metro, linea 11  molto comoda per raggiungere il cuore di parigi

Posto molto grazioso ,alle porte di Parigi , dove puoi godere al meglio la vera vita francese. L’alloggio curato e pulito dotato di tutto l’essenziale. Tatiana è sempre stata presente per ogni domanda. Facilissimo raggiungere il centro di Parigi con la metro che si trova a 10minuti di camminata.
Muy bonito! Tiene todo lo que necesitas! Pequeño pero muy estiloso!
Very clean, close to the Metro, perfect for a weekend city break.

The accommodation was immaculately presented and had everything we could have asked for, including hot drinks and fruit and pasta. Tatiana was very helpful when we got abit lost on the way there and responded very quickly. The metro is very close by and makes it easy to navigate around Paris. Had a fabulous time!
Excelente relação qualidade preço. Vila muito simpática e com comércio. O apartamento fica a 4 minutos do metro.

Tatiana's apartment is simply beautiful. It is super clean, smells amazing and it's carefully decorated. It has everything you could need for your stay, and the hosts left some coffee, tea, fruits and pasta for you to use! The sofa bed was comfy, the bathroom was also very nice, spacious and clean. The location is good, close to a metro station and in a very calm, residential zone. It is really easy to go the city Center in around 30 minutes. I really recommend this spot if you are planning to visit Paris.
Nice small place just outside of Paris. Only downside is there’s a good amount of traffic outside and can be a bit noisy. Other that I had a wonderful visit!

This place is absolutely adorable with the cutest little touches of decor. Everything you need to have a relaxing night in with a home cooked meal & bottle of wine. Make sure to grab some pastries from the corner bakery across from the metro ( 5 min walk). There was a sweet chocolatey surprise waiting for us when we arrived & fruit for breakfast! We will definitely stay here next visit to Paris & recommend anyone else to do the same!
The host canceled this reservation 54 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The place is clean, compact but you will get everything you need. Close to train station and friendly neighborhood, lots of nice bread shop and good food. Recomended for travellers who want to look around paris and enjoy paris

Tatiana's place was very clean and nice! It is very close to the metro and grocery stores! We felt safe in her home. It is a bit small but perfect for two people or less. She was very welcoming and helped us get from the bus station to her place. She even left a very sweet welcome gift. We would definitely stay again!

Tatiana's was a good host. She sent me directions on how to get from the airport to the train station and met me at the train station with a bottle of cold water and French pastries on the day I arrived and then walked me to to the apartment. 

It's an easy walk. The apartment is very secure plus it's right across from a police station so even though I was there by myself I felt very safe. The studio is very clean with modern features.  She adds nice touches like a Nespresso maker with accompanying coffee and tea. Bed was comfortable and lots of  hot water.
Accueil chaleureux et très gentille et un logement propre, je recommande.
Que du bonheur, Paula est très accueillante fait le maximum pour bien nous recevoir. En l'écoutant elle nous fait rêver au Brésil.
Personne sympathique accueillante et discrète. Logements fonctionnel. Je recommande.
Impeccable
5 star host. A great pleasure to meet and talk to her. Nothing to say about her apartment. Very good quality/price ratio. Near to everything
Tres bien
Impeccable
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This was a luxury apartment, amazing host, it's one of best place I ever stayed, she is very helpful,  supportive, above all her apartment is the most romantic view, comfortable bed. I wish I could stayed there longer,  but one of my best experience and best room ever I been in Airbnb.  Thank you very much Paula you're a star.
Endroit très cosy et mimi pour un couple

Super logement pour un court séjour ! Proche de tout c’est génial . 
Nous avons adoré le petit charme du studio et le calme . 
Nous reviendrons sans hésiter ! 
Merci Charles !
Super expérience, petit coin calme et cosy je conseil fortement !

Très beau studio au calme
Propriétaire au top
Logement sympathique et coin très calme pour un séjour tranquille . L’hôte est également très accueillant et réactif
Superbe endroit, calme et très propre. Une très bonne adresse.
Espace chaleureux, calme et propre. Le propriétaire était à l’écoute et précis. J’ai passé un agréable séjour

Charles est un hôte très agréable gentil et très réactive en message et en cas de problème il vient tout de suite j ai passer un bon moment dans son studio très propre rien a reproché la déco est belle . Il y a beaucoup de restaurant magasin a côté je vous conseille vivement ce studio la merci a vous Charles pour cette accueil je reviendrai en tout cas
excellent airbnb   hôte très réactif   tout ce qu'il faut pour passer une nuit ou plus sur PARIS

Nettes kleines Apartment mit allem, was man braucht. Die Küche ist super ausgestattet sodass man sich gut selbst versorgen kann. Sogar eine Musikbox war vorhanden. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und es war auch sehr ruhig. Klein aber fein wäre ein passender Ausdruck. Tee und Kaffee waren auch bereitgestellt. Umliegend gibt es kleine Supermärkte, Bäckereien und Restaurants, wo man alles bekommt, was man braucht.
Man sollte sich doch lediglich im Klaren sein, dass man schon etwas außerhalb wohnt. Die Metro streikt schon seit über einem Monat und wir mussten über 200€ für Taxis ausgeben und wir hatten nicht immer Lust 2km zur nächsten Station zu laufen, wo die Metro fährt. Selbst mit der Metro brauchst man schon etwa mindestens eine halbe bis Dreiviertel Stunde zum Eiffelturm beispielsweise. 
Wenn die Entfernung keine Rolle spielt und man was für den kleineren Geldbeutel sucht können wir die Unterkunft nur empfehlen :-)

The flat was really clean and full of everything but with the host there  were no communication and that made our check in in Paris really uncomfortable. She told us that the flat would have been ready at 11am and let us wait for 3 hours with our suitcase and she didn’t give us information for our vocation, with the bus-metró. There were the strike in Paris for the public trasport and she didn’t tell us anything, there were NO communication. She didn’t help us as we needed.
В целом не плохая квартирка. Были небольшие проблемы с чистотой. Все достаточно новое и приятное.

This might be useful information for new travellers; we staid for 9 days and the kitchen, even though it's quite high quality, is poorly equipped for a longer stay. When we asked Ali for more basic kitchen stuff, he answered he didn't provide those because they break too easily. That is a bit weird, because it's not our fault and most things we requested were not breakable. So if you come: bring your own:
* cutting board * bread knife * tea towel * kitchen towel * cleaning cloth  * dish rack (!) * corkscrew * bottle opener * colander or strainer * cutting knives, peelers or scissors (there's just one small cutting knife) * wine glasses * oil * salt * pepper
Also there is no:
* vacuum cleaner or handheld vacuum for the rug *  kettle/water cooker (use pan) * oven

We decided on making a set ourselves for next visits because we noticed this is our second French apartment in a row with inadequate cooking utensils and we keep on buying corkscrews en kitchen cloths and cutting our vergetables and bread with a teeny knife on plates instead of a board.

It did not stop us from enjoying this apartment tremendously! We might certainly return!

It's a nice apartment with a lot of advantages. It is reasonably big and it has good transport connections to central Paris via 114 bus to Vincennes or the RER A line. It's clean and has some good features including a great bed, lights and kitchen. The TV is great and modern, and the sofas are comfortable. Ali is friendly and really fast to respond to messages. A highly recommended place to stay.

Staying at Ali's house was fantastic. Perfect size for upto 3 people, it's very stylish and clean. The kitchen has a fridge washing machine and a coffee machine, the TV is incredible and you have access to YouTube etc!! The bathroom is nice with a shower. The balcony was lovely to just sit at and enjoy the morning fresh air. Ali was accommodating to anything we needed and any questions about Paris we had. Day 1 we needed an iron Ali made sure to bring us this on the morning of day 2. He was always available if we had any questions responding straight away and checked in to see if we were ok. Day 2 i was unable to work out how to turn the heaters on Ali came over and showed us how to operate it, not as difficult as i thought. Ali is very nice person and if we come to Paris again we will definitely stay with him again. 

Abit about the location - The station Nogent Sur Marne is a 10 minute walk from Ali's house, getting into central Paris is 6-7 minutes, Chatalet is just 5 stops and has many restaurants and shopping places with incredible bakerys, this is also were the Notre Dame Cathedral is. George V is also very easy accessible from the station which takes you to places like the Champs Elysees Avenue again with food places and shops. Arc D Triomph is a few stops from the station and if you like you can walk past it and you'll find yourself on Champs Elysees Avenue. If you don't fancy walking to the station a uber is around £6-£8. Close to the station are small supermarkets where you can buy chocolates and sweets that you may want to take home with you. Disney is very accessible via the station aswell we however got a Uber which cost us £42 and got us to Disney in 30 minutes. Ali's house is in Zone 3, Paris is Zone 1 and Disney is Zone 5. A travel card within Zone 1 to 3 is €10 although sometimes single tickets work out cheaper. So even from a cost point of view the location is perfect!!! I can't recommend Ali's place enough!!!!

We had a great stay at Ali’s place. It was nice to have a quiet relaxing apartment to come back to after a busy day in the city. It was just a quick 20 minute ride on the RER to central Paris so the location was ideal for us

Ali's place was great! I was in Nogent for work and the location is ideal - close to the little town for groceries, restaurants, etc. The place was also great - very clean and easy to find. It's also close to the RER, so easy to get around the city.
This apartment was about a 30 min train ride into Paris it was a lovely stay, very quiet neighborhood, enjoyable amenities,   Thank you for such a great stay for my first time in France.

Ali's place is exactly like the pictures. It is a cute, small apartment located in a quiet neighbourhood perfect for a couple or a single person. Public transport is easily accessible.
Ali  met us at the apartment to hand over the keys and during our trip checked up on us via text and was quick to respond to all my messages.
 The apartment has a full kitchen, bathroom, one bedroom, living room and balcony area.  Netflix is available which was nice and there is a washing machine as well. The bathroom is quite small but still functional. This place worked great for my boyfriend and myself.

 Things to keep in mind is that it is not located in the city (which is why we booked it) and it is a short but uphill walk to the train station. Uber is available in this area. Also this apartment doesn't have air conditioning.  During our stay Paris did have a heatwave (35-43°C most days) and I've suggested to Ali about providing a small pedestal fan but at the time of our stay there wasn't one which made the apartment a bit hot and uncomfortable at times.
The Apartment was very nice and we enjoyed our stay!

J'ai réservé pour 2 nuit à chez lui ,  quand je suis arrivé vers 13h30 ? Il y a eu sa mere à la maison . Nous avons parlé dans 10 mins pour se présenter le chambre et la maison . J'ai été dedans , changer le vetement et prendre le salle de bain pour se laver . Ensuite , elle m'a dit :  douchement avec les portes et je lui dit :  oui , j'ai fait douchement . De plus je lui ai demandé :  pouvez-vous fermer la porte dans la salle d'attendre parce que la salle a utiliser un pafum que j'avais mal la tête . Elle a commencé de m'énerver . Elle est rentré dans mon chambre direct et crier : pourquoi tu as fermé la porte ?????  Et tu n'a pas le droit ici . Elle a parlé vraiment force et me parler mal (  un peu raciste ) pendant 15 mins . Elle m'a demandé de sortir tout de suite ! Je suis vraiment choque jusqu'au maintemant . Je suis pas content et avoir peur  . Maintenant j'ai posé les commentaire ici pour vous faire attention comme même !

Je tenais à remerci Rafik pour sa gentillesse sa réactivité et son écoute pour les différentes questions que j’avais ..merci d’avoir accepter de nous accueillir un peut plus tôt que prévu .. nous avons apprécier notre séjour d’une semaine appartement calme propre d’une tranquilite en même temps proche de toute commodité .. Rafik est gentil il nous a super bien accueilli tout expliquer sur l’agencement de l’appartement .. nous n’avons manquer de rien l’appartement est très complet ( produits ménager que ce sois cuisine ou salle de bain , petite attention café, chocolat, eau, sauces, dsle frigo) rien à redire nous avions fait qq courses mais nous ne manquions de rien on c’est vraiment senti comme chez nous plus envie de partir ... et la terrasse quel terrasse  hyper grande ont peut y manger bronze quand il fait beau nous n’avons pas pu en profiter vu le temps actuel mais ce n’est que partis remise c’est sur nous revriendrons .. c’est la 1ere fois que je n’ai rien à dire sur un airbnb vraiment je recommande a 1000% merci encr et à bientôt je l’espères Sonia & Aïssa

Nettes kleines Apartment mit allem, was man braucht. Die Küche ist super ausgestattet sodass man sich gut selbst versorgen kann. Sogar eine Musikbox war vorhanden. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und es war auch sehr ruhig. Klein aber fein wäre ein passender Ausdruck. Tee und Kaffee waren auch bereitgestellt. Umliegend gibt es kleine Supermärkte, Bäckereien und Restaurants, wo man alles bekommt, was man braucht.
Man sollte sich doch lediglich im Klaren sein, dass man schon etwas außerhalb wohnt. Die Metro streikt schon seit über einem Monat und wir mussten über 200€ für Taxis ausgeben und wir hatten nicht immer Lust 2km zur nächsten Station zu laufen, wo die Metro fährt. Selbst mit der Metro brauchst man schon etwa mindestens eine halbe bis Dreiviertel Stunde zum Eiffelturm beispielsweise. 
Wenn die Entfernung keine Rolle spielt und man was für den kleineren Geldbeutel sucht können wir die Unterkunft nur empfehlen :-)

The flat was really clean and full of everything but with the host there  were no communication and that made our check in in Paris really uncomfortable. She told us that the flat would have been ready at 11am and let us wait for 3 hours with our suitcase and she didn’t give us information for our vocation, with the bus-metró. There were the strike in Paris for the public trasport and she didn’t tell us anything, there were NO communication. She didn’t help us as we needed.
В целом не плохая квартирка. Были небольшие проблемы с чистотой. Все достаточно новое и приятное.
