Luca est un hôte tres attentif et arrangeant  ! Tout était parfait on reviendra ! Je conseille ce logement sans problème !
A bientôt !
accueil parfait, excellente situation pour visiter, vue superbe
Court séjour mais très agréable. L'appartement est très bien situé, la vue magnifique et l'accueil de Lucas très sympathique!

Luca nous  a très chaleureusement accueilli, on ne pouvait espérer mieux ... La communication a été parfaite et l'appartement impeccable  offre une superbe vue sur Paris. Nous  recommandons et reviendrons...
hote et hébergement parfait
Rien a dire sur ce logement. Bon rapport avec le propriétaire.

Luca est adorable et Ns a accueilli de manière très chaleureuse 
Son appartement est idéalement situé
Le logement est formidable, Luca est parfait! Merci pour son formidable accueil!

Appartement très bien situé dans un quartier calme. On a apprécié la piscine sur le toit pour les fins de journées avec les enfants, le supermarché à 5 minutes, la vue sur la tour Eiffel en se penchant un peu. L'appartement est très propre et accueillant, la literie est confortable, et Luca est très accueillant et arrangeant. On y reviendra avec plaisir.
Luca est un super hôte !! Le logement a une vue magnifique et est très propre. Je recommande
Je vous le recommande !!!

Logement parfait, à réserver sans hésiter. Luca est adorable, très pro et investi. 
J’y retournerais au plus vite.

Logement assez incroyable : au trentième étage, une vue imprenable sur l'ouest parisien. En se penchant par la fenêtre, on voit la Tour Eiffel... Et sur le toit : la piscine ! :)
L'appartement est confortable. J'ai toutefois conseillé à Luca de le décorer pour le rendre un peu plus vivant.
Internet est disponible non pas en wifi mais grâce à une carte SIM mise à disposition. Pratique pour les touristes étrangers qui veulent être connectés en se promenant dans Paris. Pour ma part (voyage professionnel), j'aurais préféré un wifi (plus pratique).
Luca a été très accueillant et disponible.
Sous réserve de décorer un peu l'appartement, je recommande !
Très beau logement. Belle vue.

Accueil parfait. Luca est serviable et dévoué pour les touristes de passage. L appartement est idéalement situé. Il est propre et fonctionnel. Rien ne manque car Luca pense à tout. Nous conseillons cette adresse. Et nous savons déjà où nous dormirons pour un prochain séjour.
N’ayez aucune hésitation

Merci a Luca pour sa disponibilité, sa gentillesse et son superbe accueil. Nos 24h a Paris n'auraient pu mieux se dérouler grâce a ses conseils et la vue sur Tout Paris est incroyable du haut du 31ieme étage, absolument Magnifique ! L'appartement est sécurisé, dispose d'une piscine au tout dernier étage toujours Avec vue (Que nous avions pour nous seuls fin septembre!) , nous reviendrons et le recommandons vivement !!!

Luca est adorable, attentionné et disponible. Merci pour son accueil et sa gentillesse. 
L'appartement est super, spacieux, propre, pratique, et la vue est magnifique.
L'accès à la piscine est un réel plaisir et le quartier sympathique.
La meilleure adresse Airbnb que je connaisse !!!

Merci pour ce superbe séjour.

Logement lumineux et fonctionnel.moderne et très propre. La literie est de bonne qualité . Sa situation géographique est idéale pour visiter la tour eiffel. Nous n'y avons passé qu'une nuit  mais  cela a été suffisant pour visiter la tour eiffel, faire une balade en bateaux mouches et profiter de la piscine. La vue est exceptionnelle, si l'on n'a pas peur de se pencher un peu. Lucas est un hôte attentionné. Nous ne manquerons pas de recommander ce logement.
Luca est un hôte très sympathique. L'appartement est très propre avec tout le matériel nécessaire et une belle vue.

Un séjour de qualité pour un prix correct !!!!
Luca est très bon hôte, vraiment très accueillant et aux petits soins !!!
L'appart est super, propre,la literie bonne, l'emplacement au top, dernier étage avec vue imprenable sur Paris, la seine et en plus la tour eiffel en sortant la tête de la fenêtre !!!!!! magique !!!!! La vue est vraiment un régal !!!!!Mon conjoint photographe etait aux anges ^^
La piscine, fut un gros plus pour nous, surtout pour notre fille, avec la table de ping pong !!!! ;)
et la quartier est vraiment sympa, tout est à proximité, de chouettes petits restos,superette, le métro, et la tour Eiffel à 10 min.
La prochaine fois qu'on retourne àParis nous reviendrons chez Luca, c'est certain et nous le conseillerons à nos familles et amis.

Le seul petit mini point négatif, c'est les rideaux qui ne sont pas assez occultants et laisse entrer de la lumière dès le lever du soleil, mais ça n'a "derangé" que moi ;) mais franchement c'est juste un détail !!!!

On a adoré le séjour, l'appart , l'accueil et notre merveilleux hôte !!!!!
Appartement très bien situé, très propre et confortable. Lucas très serviable et disponible. Seul bémol, les rideaux pas assez opacifiant, forte luminosité le matin.

Bel accueil de Luca . L'appart est parfaitement situé car avec un peu de jambe , on peut tout voir les attractions principales de Paris. Pour le reste , transport en commun à proximité. Belle vue de LA tour et la piscine sur le toit a été fort apprécié des enfants comme des (Website hidden by Airbnb) fonctionnelle vous fera sauver des Euros.Merci encore pour cette belle découverte.

Je suis ravie de mon (trop court) séjour chez Luca
Le logement est propre,conforme à la description.
Luca est un hôte charmant,son accueil est chaleureux.

Le logement est tout d’abord parfaitement situé avec une vue imprenable sur la tour Effeil, la seine et le 16ème arrondissement.  Sur le toit de la tour, il y a une piscine et une petite cour avec une vue sur le sud de Paris. L’appartement est proche d’un centre commerciale ou l’on peut faire quelques courses de deux métros et du RER C pour aller à versailles. L’appartement est très propre, la literie l’est aussi et l’hôte est incroyablement sympathique et serviable. Je ne regrette absolument pas et je vous le conseil.

Luca est adorable, serviable et tellement attentionné. Merci pour cet accueil pour notre famille. 
Être dans l’appartement de Luca c’est être à l’endroit parfait pour visiter Paris. 
Son appartement a exactement tout ce qu’il faut pour un parfait séjour dans la capitale. Et cette vue de dingue sur Paris, c’est juste le rêve. Le quartier est complètement safe pour une famille avec de jeunes enfants (les miennes ont 3 et 5 ans). A ce prix là franchement il ne faut pas hésiter, je conseille tres chaleureusement son appartement.
Nous avons passé une période agréable à Paris merci beaucoup! Quand nous revenons à Paris cet studio sera notre 1ère choix!
Nous avons passé une période agréable à Paris merci beaucoup! Quand nous revenons à Paris cet studio sera notre 1ère choix!

L´appartement de Luca c´est super!! Nous avons adoré son appartement très proche a la tour Eiffel, metro, parkings pour garer la voiture, centre commercial, etc.
Aussi, avec une piscine, une grand panoramique du Seine, la tour Eiffel, et la belle ville de Paris!!
Luca est très gentil, sympa et attentionné.
Merci par tout Luca, la prochain fois que je irais à Paris, je vais louer ton appartement a nouveau! 

Luca es un chico estupendo, simpático, agradable, detallista y muy limpio.
El apartamento es de esos lugares que nada mas entrar, sabes que has tenido mucha suerte con la elección. 
El apartamento esta super cuidado, limpio y bonito, pero lo que de verdad lo hace especial son las vistas de todo Paris, y en especial de la torre Eiffel.
Además cuenta con una piscina en la última planta, desde donde puedes ver toda la ciudad a través de sus grandes ventanales.
Sin duda, solo tengo alagos para Luca y su apartamento, y como ya le dije, se lo recomendare a todos mis amigos y familiares que visiten Paris, y en cuanto vuelva a Paris, no tengo duda que repetiré alojamiento.
Gracias por todos los detalles Luca

Estuvimos un fin de semana y nos encantó el lugar ! Es perfecto para salir a pasear y esta súper bien comunicado, es ideal que realmente vale la pena, y las vistas desde la piscina son geniales, Luca estuvo pendiente de que se nos diera toda la información necesaria, muy limpio todo. Volveremos y esperamos poder volver a su apartamento.
Top !!!
眺めの良い部屋で､ｾｰﾇ川が眼下に広がります｡窓から乗り出すとｴｯﾌｪﾙ塔も見えます｡
Excelente ubicación, hospitalidad, amabilidad... El mejor anfitrión... Si vuelvo a París volveré a reservar el piso de Luca. Para rematar el detalle de dejar fruta fresca a nuestra llegada.

Luca's studio is perfectly located and the view from the window is breathtaking. I wish I stayed for more days! The studio was clean, efficiently organized and had provided everything needed for a comfortable stay. Thank you Luca for the clear communication and the warm welcome. I recommend this place for all travelers to Paris.

Excelente ubicacion y accesible a cualquier persona que no conozca muy bien Paris. Luca es muy amable, claro y preciso, brinda la informacion necesaria para al turista o viajero. En relacion al espacio fisico es confortable y con una vista privilegiada de Paris.
Великолепный вид в любую погоду! 31 этаж - это незабываемо. Температуру в студии можно поднять или опустить по Вашему желанию. На кухне есть всё необходимое.
너무 좋았습니다
사진보고 갔지만 사진보다 더욱 만족했습니다
Wohnung mit herrlichem Blick und sehr komfortabel.Sehr schöne Lage.

Il appartamento di Luca, è eccezionale. Pulizia perfetta, molto vicino al torre Eiffel, si trova tutto vicino, supermercato, farmacia, metro, ristoranti, ecc. Una vista sul reale sul la torre! 
Consiglio vivamente il appartamento di Luca!! 
Noi torneremo sicuramente! 
Grazie mille Luca, al prossima
We had a good time in Paris! The apartment is nice and clean. You can see the Eiffel Tower from the apartment which was super nice, especially at night with all the lights!

Great location and an amazing view of the Eiffle Tower. Walking distance to all of the great tourist spots and bars/restaurants. There is a grocery store close by and Luca gave a lot of great directions/explained how to get everywhere at check in. Safe area and building.

Nuestra estadía en el departamento de Luca fue excelente, está muy bien ubicado, tiene detalles increíbles, súper completo. Pero lo mejor sin dudas es Luca cómo anfitrión, nos ayudó y estuvo siempre atento a nuestras necesidades. Volvería siempre!
Amazing place to stay! Wonderful view, comfortable beds and very clean. Luca was a great host! Loved my stay here.

Quien quiera conocer esta maravillosa ciudad puede hospedarse tranquilamente en el depto de Luca. Es un espacio acogedor, limpio y con todo lo que necesitas para estar comodo, ademas de encontrarse en una buena ubicacion y la atencion de Luca es lo mas. Totalmente recomendado!!
에펠탑이랑 가까워서 집 나갈 때 돌아 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 있어서 좋음. 커뮤니케이션 빠르고 친절. 샤워할 때 뜨거운 물 잘 나옴(석회수 때문에 샤워기 헤드 따로 챙겨갔는데 바꾸면 수압 세짐) 빨래가능. 요리가능(소금후추식용유있.ㅇㅌㄱㅎ지남). 하루종일 난방 돌아가서 빨래 그냥 널면 돼요(시애라오니까좀추버따)
정말 생각보다 숙소가 더 좋았어요 목만 내밀면 보이는 에펠탑에 화이트 에펠도 위험하지 않게 집에서 볼 수 있구요, 식기는 오래됬지만 다 갖추어져 있었구요 환풍기에서 담배냄새가 나는거 같은거 말고는 완벽했습니다! 다시 파리에 온다면 또 찾을것 같아요. 쇼핑하기에 좋은 위치는 아니지만 불편하지 않게 안전한 동네에서 잘 다닌거 같습니다
숙소 위치가 일단 너무 좋구요 역에서 가깝고 에펠탑도 잘보이고 안전해서 추천합니다 호스트가 너무 친절하고 배려깊어서 고마웠어요. 응답도 빠르고 신경을 많이 써주셨습니다. 청결도도 높고 만족스러웠던 숙소였습니다.

Apartamento superou as expectativas. Muito melhor pessoalmente do que nas fotos. Camas confortáveis. E o melhor de tudo é a vista para o rio Sena e mais especificamente para a Torre Eiffel. Luca também deu muitas dicas e auxiliou no que foi preciso. Recomendo muito
숙소 근처 먹을 만한 곳이 많아요. 잘 찾아보세요. 31층이라서 야경 보기에 좋은 장소입니다.
環境不錯,有很好的視野風景

Great space and the Eiffel Tower is much closer than it appears in the photos!

View over Paris is also very nice and Luca was a super nice host. It’s easy to see why he’s a super host!
位置非常好,可以看到埃菲尔铁塔夜景｡房东很热情,提供很多信息｡会推荐给朋友!
Apartamento muy bien ubicado, limpio, con todo lo necesario, cerca de las atracciones principales
A todo he puesto maxima puntuación porque de verdad que lo es. Excelente. Sin duda me volvería a alojar allí en caso de volver a Paris

여기서 1박만 한게 너무 아쉬웠어요ㅜ
생각했던 것보다 훨씬 좋았고 아쉬운게 하나도 없었어요 Luca가 영어를 못해서 다른 분이 오셔서 체크인을 도와주셨는데 정말 친절하셨고 설명도 잘 해주셔서 문제 없었어요!
좋은 동네라 치안도 걱정 없었고 31층이라 뷰가 최고예요 숙소도 엄청 깨끗했고 필요한 것들은 다 있었어요 숙소 너무 좋았어요ㅜㅠ
The location is everything ! Closer to the metro , closer to the Eiffel Tower and it have a great view . It was a great choice for us .
머무는 내내 친절하게 궁금증이 있으면 다 해결해주었고 숙소 위치도 너무 좋고 안전하고 에펠탑이 생각보다 크게보여서 좋았습니다! 루카는 매우친절하고 좋은사람입니다! 숙소도 넓고 너무너무 좋아요
The best airbnb I could have possibly chosen for one night in Paris!!
We love the location of Luca’s place. It is CLEAN and has everything we needed. And Luca is the sweetest host! He’s the best!
Luca is friendly. He is willing to help us. Nice and safe location.

El departamento es bellísimo. La ubicación y la vista inmejorables. El único problema que tuvimos fue la llegada, ya que el número de teléfono que nos brindó airbnb era el incorrecto y a pesar de que Luca nos había contactado por el chat de airbnb, no teníamos conexión a internet para leerlo, lo que dificultó mucho la llegada. Airbnb tardó dos horas en resolver el problema, pero finalmente conseguimos el número real y Luca respondió rápidamente. Luca fue muy servicial y el departamento era impecable. Sin duda lo volveríamos a elegir!
Amazing view of the city

대~~~추천합니다. 위치/뷰/시설/청결함/주변 마트 여러개 있어서 장보기 편리한 점 등등 모든 면에서 만족스러웠습니다. 문의에 대한 답변도 빨리해주고, 파리에 새벽에 도착해서 짐 보관과 얼리체크인에 대해 문의했는데 숙박 스케쥴을 확인하고 10시에 짐 보관, 11시 30분에 체크인 할 수 있도록 배려해주었습니다. 아파트의 최고층이라 센강과 에펠탑 등이 보이는 뷰를 볼 수 있어서 숙소에서 화이트에펠까지 편안하게 볼 수 있었어요. 바로 옆 쇼핑센터에 한인마트도 두군데 있습니다. 다시 파리에 간다면 또 묵고싶은 숙소에요:)

Localização perfeita, apartamento com todas comodidades possíveis.
A vista da piscina é sensacional, vale muito a hospedagem aqui!!

Superb place and awesome view of the Eiffel tower from the apartment window as the apartment is located at 30th floor and 6-8 minutes walk to the Eiffel tower. So nice of Luca to allow us to check in at 12 pm on the first day and also to keep luggage till 6 pm at check out as well. Wonderful host and awesome apartment.

This place is magnificent! 15 min walk to the Eiffel, 6 Min walk to the metro. Prime location! And the view is breathtaking! Left me in Awe. Luca was super nice, if I go back ill stay here no where Id rather stay! The Best!!!

Luca’s place is AMAZING. He was so thoughtful with things like usb adapter chargers and extra blankets, and pointed out nearby restaurants, supermarkets and boutique shopping.  It was easy to check in and out.  Luca responded very quickly to messages and he even accommodated us with an early check in.  The view was so spectacular that we just bought baguettes and cheese and watched Paris go from evening to night, and it was beautiful.  The kitchen and bathroom were much appreciated, and we were sure to run the dishwasher and towel laundry before we left.  This accommodation made our first stay in Paris so wonderful. We’ll definitely stay here when we come back!

Es el mejor Airbnb que nos hospedamos, creo que las fotos no muestran lo lindo que es el apartamento, no solo tiene una vista impresionante, si no que es muy lindo y cuenta con todos los servicios necesarios!!

Luca's place is perfect.  It had amazing views, walking distance to restaurants,  the train and Eiffel Tower, among many other places, and was exceptionally clean.  The bed was AMAZING!!! So comfortable and after a very long travel day just what we needed to get a great nights sleep. Luca was available if we needed him with very little wait time. He offered suggestions on things to do, and worked with our schedule with no problems.  I would stay here again in a heartbeat!

Totalmente recomendable, a 10 min de la Torre Eiffel. Con restaurantes cercanos, apartamento moderno con unas vistas impresionantes. Y Luca muy atento, cada día preguntándonos si necesitábamos algo y siempre atento. Un 10 a todo.
Ubicación inmejorable, limpio, todos los servicios y grandes detalles como recomendaciones.  No necesitas más.
Outstanding hospitality, a great location and great apartment. We had a wonderful stay and can’t wait to come again.

Das Apartment von Luca liegt ca. 10 min Fußweg vom Eiffelturm entfernt, hat eine gute Anbindung an die öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel und eine beeindruckende Aussicht über die Stadt. Die Wohnung ist sehr sauber und ist gut ausgestattet.
Luca ist sehr freundlich, immer ansprechbar und hat uns viele gute Tipps gegeben. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt :)
Great view, great location with a short walk to main attractions, and very friendly host. Would stay here again!

15구에 위치해있고 메트로,rer과 7분정도의 거리에 있어 어디든 가기편했다,
2층침대였고 침구도 무척 청결했음.
창문을 열고 오른쪽으로 고개를 내밀면에펠탑이 보인다.
주방 이용도 용이했고,보안이 특히 잘되는 아파트였다.
조용하고 안전한 주거지에 위치해있고 프랑프릭스,모노프릭스,까르푸 모두 도보10분내에 위치해있었음.
티비없는거 제외하고는 거의다 갖춰져있음.
가격대비 정말 좋은 숙소인듯하다

Luca hat uns sehr freundlich mit vielen Tipps und Empfehlungen empfangen. Wir konnten sogar schon am Vormittag in das Apartment. Er war immer für uns erreichbar und bot uns sogar einen späten Check out um 15h an. Ausstattung schlicht  mit allem Notwendigen. Vom Klopapier bis zum Einkaufsbeutel fanden wir alles was wir brauchten. WLAN und Schnellladestation stellte Luca uns kostenlos zur Verfügung 
Das Vier Personen Doppelbett ist sehr bequem. Selbst vom Bett aus bietet sich ein grandioser Ausblick aus der 31ten Etage über Paris. Das absolute Highlight ist der Blick auf den Eifelturm wenn man sich etwas aus dem Fenster lehnt. 
Eine Etage höher befindet sich ein kleiner Pool den die Kinder gern genutzt haben und ein wahnsinns Rundumblick auf die Stadt.
Metro, Restaurants und Einkaufsmöglichkeiten fußläufig in wenigen Minuten zu erreichen.
Sicherheitskameras und 24h Pförtnerservice vorhanden. 
Wir verbrachten zwei sehr schöne Tage dort und werden wiederkommen.

Luca is wonderful  host. The place is very much centre in Paris and only 10 Min walking distance to Eiffel Tower. The apartment is filled with all amenities for a short stay in Paris, and my family enjoyed a lot with Luca's place. We came little early as our flight arrives early morning and he tried his level best to arrange the room as much as early and we really appreciated the support and kindness to us.

31층 높이에 파리 전경이 전부 보였구요 고개 빼꼼 하면 에펠탑 보입니다! 
근데 30층까지만 엘레베이터 있고 1층은 계단이에요.
위치도 너무 좋구요 동네도 너무 안전합니다!
It was perfect. Quick response, clean, close effel tower.
The apartment is just great, and the look from the 31th floor makes it awesome!
Magnífico alojamiento, es mejor de lo que se ve en las fotos. Tiene una excelente ubicación y servicios impecables. La recepción por parte de Luca y la comunicación en general, muy cálida y amable.
El lugar tiene unas vistas impresionantes y Luca fue super amable. Hizo de nuestra estancia en Paris una muy buena experiencia.
Muy recomendado, muy céntrico, camas cómodas. Buena comunicación con el propietario. A 5 minutos del metro, cerca de centro comercial. Todo limpio

Excelente Airbnb, con una vista inmejorable hacia la ciudad, caminando unos 10-15 minutos de la Torre Eiffel, Luca muy servicial y pendiente; me gusto mucho y volveria alojarme alli! todo me parecio excelente, el unico detalle pequeño e irrelevante para mi fue la ducha que es un poco pequeña, pero nada que la vista no compensa!
Very nice appartment. Great location and safe area. We would suggest this place!

정말 단점을 꼽기 어려운 숙소입니다. 숙소의 위치, 청결, 호스트분의 안내와 친절 , 안에 구비된 물건들까지 너무 좋은 숙소였습니다. 다만 침대옆에 콘센트가 없다는 점 빼고는 크게 불편한 점을 찾기가 어렵고 너무나 좋았습니다.  센강과 에펠탑도 창문에서 고개빼꼼 내밀면 윗부분이 거의 다 보이기 때문에 굳이 나갈필요없이 숙소에서 봐도 될 정도로 아름답습니다. 그리고 정말 친절한 호스트님 까지! 다음에 파리에 오면 다시한번 더 꼭 묵고 싶은 숙소입니다!
I liked everything very much, the view from the window is beautiful, the apartment is cozy, thanks for the hospitality
the best kind person I've ever met in paris. He even help us to find lost cell-phone. and the house was perfect.

Luca es una Excelente persona muy servicial y atento!!!  Siempre preocupado por nosotros tanto en lo referente al departamento como en aportarnos detalles en referencia a cómo movernos en la ciudad. Es excelente el departamento, una vista increíble y muy buena localización.  Súper completo y muy muy recomendable.
good

겨울인데도 불구하고 생각보다 더 따뜻햇어요! 에펠탑은 보기보다 더 가까이 보야서 좋앗어요!! 근처에 한인마트도 잇고 마트도 가깝고 지하철역도 가깝고 깨긋합니다! 
4명이서 묵어도 전혀 불편함이 없엇어요 다시 파리오면 여기에 묵고싶네용ㅎㅎㅎ
호스트가 정말정말 친절합니다. 어떤 문의에도 빠르고 친절하게 답해줘서 숙소를 찾아가는데부터 체크아웃까지 마음 편하게 진행할 수 있었습니다. 청결한 건 물론이고 세느강과 파리 야경이 정말 멋진 숙소입니다!!
AMAZING location with a great view of the eiffel tower and an amazing view of all of Paris from the roof! Would definitely stay here again if I'm back in paris!

Luca was extremely helpful and friendly. We met him when we checked in. He walked us through the apartment and gave recommendations around the area. Very responsive. The view is amazing. It’s one of my favorite Airbnb stays so far.

Luca's place is great! Great view of the Eiffel Tower. He was very helpful during our stay, shared recommendations and was very accommodating. Definitely recommend this place for your stay while in Paris.

너무 좋았어요. 사진보다 훨씬 좋아서 감탄했어요.. 파리의 이런 고급 아파트에서 지낼 수 있을 줄은 몰랐는데 깜짝 놀랄정도로 만족스러워요. 집에 세탁기와 세제도 있어서 빨래를 할 수 있어요. 접시와 수저 등도 잘 구비되어 있어요. 집도 아주 깨끗했어요. 특히 좋았던 건 크고 넓은 창문이 있고 고개를 내밀면 에펠탑이 보여요! 밤에 집에서 감상하는 야경이 너무 멋있었어요. 지하철 6호선 역까지는 걸어서 5~10분정도 걸려서 접근성도 좋은 것 같아요. 루카는 너무너무 친절했어요. 체크인때 짐도 들어주고 집 주변 관광지와 편의시설에 대해 설명도 해줬어요. 쏘 스윗ㅠㅠ 다시 파리에 온다면 루카의 집에 다시 머물고 싶어요.
Nice views in a great location. No TV was a bit different for myself however it just allowed us more time roaming Paris and checking out the amazing city
Buen apartamento, muy bien situado, cerca de sitios de interés y de sitios de servicios como mercados y restaurantes.

Great location from which to explore Paris. Fantasic views of the Seine from the large living room windows. The flat is very close to the metro but you can walk to the Eiffel Tower, restuarants and shops easily. We didn't meet Luca but he was very good at responding quickly to any questions and giving advice. The studio is in a very iconic tower block  and interestingly there's a swimming pool on the roof!!  I'd definately recommend staying here.
Quizás el mejor Airbnb que he tomado, todo mucho mejor de lo esperado, sin duda lo elegiría de nuevo para mí próximo viaje a París, gracias!
Highly recommend, the host was very attentive, very clean and excellent location.

Luca is the best host. He was very kind and so sweet.
The apartment is very safe and it has very nice view. If I come back Paris again, I will stay here again.

Luca is very kind, he helped us in everything, he give us recomendations. We were for and  flat was perfect, it is clean and comfortable. It has a great location, it is near of the underground, around 10 minutes walking. And it has an incredible view to the tour Eiffel. 
Luca is amazing and he has the perfect place to stay in París.

Great location within walking distance from Bir Hakeim station and Eiffel Tower. Tastefully furnished and clean with great view from the 31st floor overlooking river Seine. Best of all, Luca is very hospitalible and will go the extra mile to accomodate your needs and just a mesage away!
Amazing views from the apartment. Luca was very friendly and would definitely stay at his place again!
Luca súper atento cordial y el apartamento increíble recomendado 100 %.

This is such a great location for visitors to Paris. The views from the apartment are stunning. Although the unit is compact, it has everything you need and there is a wonderful supermarket just a short walk away. Look out the large windows to your right and the iconic Eiffel Tower is there so close!  There are a few stairs involved (a 1 floor climb) but, waking up to the views are well worth it.
정말 완벽했습니다!
Perfect location. Fantastic views. Room is small for an apartment, but set up so well that you don't notice. Beds are comfortable and water is hot!
Luca’s place was great and he is an awesome host! It was everything described and more. The view is amazing and even better that you can see the Eiffel Tower. Definitely would stay here again!
Lucas apartment is in an amazing location and he was extremely helpful
Great studio to stay in with view of the Eiffel tower and a very short walk alway from it. Luca is a great friendly host.

Pueden esperar un alojamiento muy cercano a las mayores atracciones de Paris. Muy conectado con el transporte público y vistas de ensueño. El sitio tiene todas las comodidades que necesiten y no se arrepentirán de su reserva en ningún momento.

Wr had a great stay  at Luca's place. The location is great, close to metro, shops and Eiffel tower! Luca is a great host and responds instantly which makes it so easy to communicate.
The flat had everything we need. My perosnal favourite was a bed mattress which was super comfortable and great to sleep on after a long day of exploring the city. 
great place,highly recommend.

Luca’s place is really great, it is much better than the picture, really clean and spacious. The amenities that he provide is complete. Luca also a great host, even-though I never met him in person, but he always reply my message quickly and he always make sure that my stay is comfortable. Thank you Luca, definitely will recommend your place to everyone.

Es un lugar con una vista maravillosa con todo lo necesario para una estancia perfecta..todo impecable .comodo y bien ubicado. 
Luca estuvo atento a todo lo que (Website hidden by Airbnb) gracias Luca . Lo recomiendo totalmente!!
Luca was a fabulous host. The place has a beautiful view of the Eiffel Tower and is in a wonderful area.

一開窗就是愛菲爾和塞納河
非常完美的景色,超級便利的地點,
房間比照片顯示好太多,超出預期的棒
位於在捷運站附近,步行Tour Eiffel約10分鐘
捷運站出來回家的路上就有自助結帳超市,非常便宜便利
Luca是超級友善也非常親切的房東,不僅回覆速度快
並且熱心回答任何問題,而且每天都會關心房客和提供協助
這是我第一次使用Abnb,在巴黎Luca的房子留下非常美好的回憶
Excelente ubicación, excelente anfitrión, excelente lugar. Simplemente la mejor opción!
Nice place.The host is very helpful.

lugar muito aconchegante, uma vista incrivel para a torre! perto da maioria dos pontos turisticos e estações de metro, simplesmente um lugar fantástico para quem deseja conhecer paris! e o anfitrião super atencioso. recomendo muito wsse lugar!
Perfect accomodation. Beautiful view, comfortable appartment, excellent shower and mattress. Luca was helpful and quickly available at all times. Could not be happier

Luca is an absolutely fantastic host. He came by to welcome us and give us the key to the place. He told us all the nearby tourist attractions, and it was so easy to access the place. The place was so near to the eiffel tower so there was no need to use the public transportation much. Highly recommended.

루카의 숙소 최고에요!! 나중에 알게됬죠 루카의 숙소만큼 좋은 곳이 없었다는걸 ㅜㅜ캐리어28인치 2개 펼쳐놓아도 공간이 많이 남고 이층침대라 각자 편안히 숙면을 취할수 있었고 무엇보다 에펠탑!!! 창문에서 고개 내밀어야 보이는 사이드뷰인건 알고있었지만 생각보다 크게 보였고 로맨틱했어요!! 그리고 세탁기가 있어서 너무 좋았어요. 루카의 메시지답변도 굉장히 빠른편이고 계속 도와주려고 하는 루카에게 감사의 인사를 드리고 싶어요. 인덕션이 제대로 작동안된다고 했는데 인덕션은 멀쩡했어요. 위에 냄비를 얹어야 작동이 되는 인덕션이었어요....ㅠㅠ 
근처 한인마트도 두군데 있고 까르푸도 10분거리에 있어요
파리에서도 고급아파트라 보안 철저하고 매일 아침 일어나기 싫어서 결국 하루는 오후1시까지 빈둥빈둥대다가 나갔답니다.
사요궁까지 걸어서 15분소요되요. 다음에도 파리오면 루카의 숙소 올꺼에요!!!

Luca’s apartment is ideally located and the view of the Eiffel Tower is amazing from the apartment window. Luca is very friendly and is an amazing host. We had a wonderful time staying at the apartment.

위치가 좋습니다. 처음 에펠탑야경을 보기위해 이곳으로 잡았는데 위험함 없이 잘 다녔고, 주변에 괜찮은 한인마트가 있어서 해먹기에도 아주 유용했습니다. 몽쥬약국2호점도 도보로 갈수있는 거리입니다. 호스트분의 세심함이 집에서도 잘 나타납니다. 필요한건 거의 다 갖추어져 있었으며 머무는동안 더있고 싶다라는 생각이 들정도로 편하게 지냈습니다. 그리고 창문을 열면 옆쪽에 에펠탑이 보이는건 알고 있었는데 실제로 보니 꽤 잘보여서 좋았습니다.
Outstanding host and awesome with tips. Great place to stay. Central and full of amenities. Highly recommended for a city break. Safe and clean.

It is all the same with the details provided. A safe and convenient place to stay when travel in Paris. Gorgeous with the Paris Eiffel Tower view from the apartment. Will stay at the same place when revisit the city in future. Thank you for hosting us.

한국분들이 많이 머무는 곳이라 집안 곳곳에 한국의 흔적을 찾아볼 수 있어요 ㅋㅋ
후추, 라면스프같은 조미료며 신협 부채며 ㅋㅋㅋ
굉장히 만족스럽게 머물다 갑니다! 
다음에 파리오게되면 또 이곳에 머물고 싶어요.
에펠탑이 보이는 위치가 너무 좋았어요! 호스트도 엄청 친절했어요

파리에 다시 오게 된다면 여기에 머물거예요. 숙소 정말 깨끗합니다. 파리에서 머물렀던 곳 중에서 제일 좋았어요. 호스트의 응답도 정말 빨랐어요. 5분을 넘긴적이 없는 것 같음. Luca는 정말 젠틀해요. 체크인 시간 전에 짐보관 해줍니다. 캐리어 진짜 무거웠는데 Luca가 숙소 안까지 다 옮겨줬어요. 정말 감사했어요. 침구랑 수건에서 좋은 향이 나요. 침대도 정말 편안했어요. 다른곳에서는 알람 전에 눈 떳는데 여기서는 침대에서 일어나기 싫을 정도였음. 집은 사진으로 보이는 것보다 크고 심플하니 이뻤어요. Luca가 사진을 너무 못 찍었어요. 제가 방 사진 찍어서 제공해주고 싶었어요ㅋㅋ 그리고 에펠뷰! 정면은 아니지만 사진보다 훨씬 크게 보여요. 저랑 언니는 감탄했어요! 밖에 안 나가고  집에서 맥주 한 잔 하면서 바라봤어요. 노을지는 모습도 넘나 이뻤음.. 창문 열어놓고 침대에 누워서 계속 보고 있었어요. Luca에게 좋은 숙소를 제공해줘서 고맙다는 표현을 하고 싶었는데 짧은 영어실력이라 말을 못했어요. 정말 잘 머물다 갑니다. 적극추천해요!
Great place, the view in the morning of the tower is spectacular!! Luca is very helpful and friendly, the appartment conveniently located and clean and perfect for 4 people. Definitely recommended!!

좋은 위치, 훌륭한 호스트, 깨끗한 숙소, 좋은 이웃들과 안정성. 전부 완벽했습니다 
빠른 소통이 되는 호스트도 좋았고
에펠탑이 보이는 숙소, 그리고 31층이라 에펠이 아닌 다른 뷰도 좋았습니다.
Luca가 깨끗한 성격인지 숙소도 깨끗했구요. 이것저것 질문을 많이했었는데 친절하게 설명해줘서 좋았습니다
다음에 파리에 온다면 꼭 다시 오고싶은 숙소예요!! 강력 추천!!
Para recomendar. Excelente ubicación, apartamento muy cómodo y con una increíble vista. Muy atento Luca y siempre dando recomendaciones. Contaba con todo lo necesario.

Everything was perfect! Luca was a great host. He responded very quickly and he was very kind to tell us many location tips. The place is very clean, It had everything we need and It had amazing view! If we have the chance to visit Paris again we will definately stay there!

Excelente departamento. Excelente ubicación y limpieza. Muy cómodo.  La cama arriba no es un problema en cuanto la subida y bajada es perfecta. Pero lo más importante es la atención de Luca. Excelente anfitrión!  Lo recomiendo

This has to be the most beautiful place to witness the Eiffel Tower. Luca was a phenomenal host. He answered all our questions quickly and was extremely polite! We appreciated everything in the apartment. It has everything you need. We will be sharing this location with all of our family and friends for future visits.

야경, 위치, 숙소의 편안함 모두 최고
특히 에펠탑이 보이는 뷰는 환상적이었음
Thanks Luca
You are the greatest host ever I met.

Luca’s apartment was so fantastic and marvelous to stay 
I stayed with mom and she was so satisfied with the view and location
Because it is located in very clean and safe area 
I strongly recommend this apartment for all the visitors to paris :) 
Merci Luca !
사진으로 보는것과 같이 청결하고 넓으며, 매일밤 에펠탑 반짝이는걸 볼 수있어요. 그리고 호스트분과의 연락도 잘되며, 무엇보다도 안전한 지역이라, 늦은밤에 숙소 돌아올때도 무섭지 않았어요. 쉬운 체크인, 아웃도 편했고요.
though i couldn't visit the top of eiffel towel, thanks to this place i could see the nice view of paris.

Me, my wife and 9 year old had a great stay at Luca’s apartment in August’18. The apartment was clean and well prepared for us. The pantry stocked with coffee/tea etc. The area is safe and has a number of boulangeries as well as restaurants within a few mins walk. While the metro is close and we used it a number of times, we also used Uber from centre of Paris and it was always under € 10. The views of the tower from the window are amazing, if you ever need a reminder that you are in Paris ! 
Best of all, Luca was very responsive and helpful which made our stay all the more enjoyable!
Worth the stay just for the amazing view alone! Luca was a gracious host, very helpful and responsive. Highly recommend it!

Luca’s apartment is even better than the original photos showed it. There is a roof top pool with a 360 degree view of Paris from above! Hard to beat! I would definitely recommend staying here! Luca was friendly and very responsive! No complaints at all!
Lovely bright apartment with amazing views. Has everything you could need. Close to the Eiffel Tower. The swimming pool was a bonus - and one my whole family enjoyed
Apartamento confortavel com uma vista linda para a Torre Effiel,  e muito bem localizado nao tinha nada a reclamar!
Great place with a great location and an amazing view! The host was very responsive and we had a great although short time in Paris. Highly recommend this place!

뷰가 좋은건 알고 있었지만 예상했던 것 보다 훨씬 좋았어요~ 다만 고소공포증있으면 엄청 무서워요..ㅎ Luca의 친절함과 멋있는 뷰와 조용하고 깔끔한 공간이었어요. 주위에 모두 주택가?라 안전한거 같기도 했어요. 6호선 Bir-Hakeim역과 RER C Champ de mars-Tour Eiffel역에서 도보로 10분정도밖에 안걸려서 거리도 무척 좋았습니다. Thanks Luca, see you later.

다 좋아요! 다음에 파리에 온다면 여기로 다시 에어비앤비 할래요~
Everything was good. 
Location : walk possible from subway station
Safety : very safe at night
It’s the best place to stay in Paris! Loved being in a safe neighborhood. Eifeltower close and shopping nearby. Beds were comfortable! Great view from top!

Luca's studio apartment is perfectly situated for trips to the Eiffel tower and only moments from both the Metro and the RER so it's easy to get around town and in & out of the city. The neighborhood is quite lovely: to the east is the Tower and the Champ de Mars and the Quai Branly along the Seine, but also take time to walk west and see the bustling commercial district, a park, and even France's Statue of Liberty. The apartment itself is compact but has everything you need for a family of 3 or 4.

My sister and I traveled to Paris with our two teenage children and spent three nights at Luca’s apartment. Even though we were 30 mins late arriving, Luca was waiting for us and was such a nice guy. He answered all my messages promptly and even checked in via message after our first night, to see if we needed anything! The location of the apartment was a 5 minute walk to Bir Hakeim Metro station and about a 20 minute walk to the Eiffel Tower along the Seine. The neighborhood is urban but seemed very safe and Luca assured us it was. There are lots of cafes and restaurants about a 5 minute walk away, located on the Main Street by the train tracks. Luca’s apartment is very clean and comfortable and the four of us slept well. The bottom sofa was converted into a bed when we arrived and Luca had kindly provided two large bottles of water which were left in the fridge for us. We did not cook while we were in Paris, but there are plates, pans, silverware available. The apartment was modern and clean. The large windows gave us a bird’s eye view of the Seine and Paris. The view from the rooftop area was spectacular!

Luca's apartment is absolutely beautiful! The view from the window was incredible (probably the best in Paris)  and it was the perfect space for 4 people! 
Luca went above and beyond for us, his local knowledge and the tips and recommendations he gave us were very useful. We really enjoyed our stay and appreciated all the little extras he did for us!  
Would highly recommend!

Luca is the prefect host, a quick walk thru when we arrived, a run down of the local area and checked to make sure everything was to our satisfaction.  Great cozy space, clean with all the things need for prefect stay.

Ottimo soggiorno a Parigi. Appartamento centrale (10 min a piedi dalla tour Eiffel), quartiere tranquillissimo (abbiamo girovagato fino a tarda sera tranquillamente con una bimba a seguito). Pulizia eccellente e Host disponibilissimo e davvero gentile. Vista mozzafiato sulla Senna e tour Eiffel. Consigliatissimo.
Luca was a welcoming and kind host. We had a fantastic time at the apartment and will recommend it highly to others. Must be said...surely some of the best views in all of Paris!
Excelente apartamento! Totalmente recomendado. Luca es un gran hospedador
정말 좋습니다. 이 가격에 이정도 컨디션, 에펠탑과의 위치 등은 너무나 손색이 없습니다. 대중교통이용도 M6 노선과 per C노선을 이용할구 있어서 편리하였습니다.

This apartment is located very close to the Eiffel tower with the a lovely view of the city and the tower.  Luca is an excellent host, communicative and prompt. We landed earlier than the check in time and he volunteered to keep our luggage, which was such a relief for my family. Thanks again Luca!

Otiimo. Posizione Ecccellente. Vista mozzafiato. Luca disponibile, corretto, gentilissimo e preciso. Appartamento piccolo ma pulito e dotato di tutto il necessario per un breve soggiorno.  Quando torno a Parigi lo conattaterò di nuovo.

Luca's apartment was in great location.  5-6 min walk to Bir-Hakeim station, 5-6 min walk to a supermarket and a shopping center, 7-8 min walk to Eiffel tower.  Easy access and great view, you can see the Eiffel tower and the river from the apartment.  We walked to the supermarket and bought things to make breakfast.  Luca even kept our luggage the day we left, so we can walk around for the last time in Paris.  Not for loud people. I will definitely recommend this apartment to anyone.

The location of the place is good and is walkable distance to Eiffel. The place was clean and comfortable. Luca was helpful to pick up our baggage as we arrived quite early of the check in time. Luca can make changes to the check in time which would help travellers. It was a pleasure staying and will like to visit again.

Location was absolutely fantastic very near to Effile Tower, Tracadero.  Amazing view from 31st floor. Also metro RER stations are 5 minutes walk. Luca was kind enough to give local tips and always available through airbnb app.

This apartment met all of our needs and then some! Luca was a great host and checked on us to ensure everything was going good. The views from this apartment are amazing, and the location was very convenient!
Near sightseeings. Luca is very friendly and hospitable. The window view is amazing.

I am not one to give out five stars easily but I would HIGHLY recommend Lucas studio apartment. Blown away by the view and Lucas service! He was willing to help with tips, bags, etc. truly a great stay and when we make it back to Paris we will be staying there again!
Insane view of the Eiffel Tower. Luca is super friendly and responsive and was a great host.
체크인하실때는 문이 열렸다고 그냥 들어가시면 안되고 기다리셨다가 꼭 호스트나 도우미?분과 함께 들어가셔야해요. 그걸 모르고 그냥 들어갔다가 살짝 당황했어요. 그외에는 모두 만족스러운 숙소였어요.

We really enjoyed our stay! Lucas was a brilliant host, very attentive and communicative. The place was great located, clean and it has an astonishing view of the Eiffel tour. It was absolutely amazing! I highly recommend it!
호스트가 정말 친절합니다. 세심한 배려가 최고입니다. 우리는 이 숙소에 머무는 동안 호스트의 도움을 여러번 받았습니다. 숙소 근처에는 에펠탑이 있습니다. 야경이 매우 환상적입니다. 숙소는 정말 깨끗하고 예쁩니다. 다음에 다시 오고 싶어요
호스트가 정말 착했어요 체크인 시간보다 이르게 도착해서 짐도 맡아주고 체크인 시간에 다시 들어가니 짐도 올려놔 주셨더라구요 숙소도 깨끗하고 전망도 좋고 다 좋았습니다 다만 에펠탑 뷰라고 하기엔 창문 너머로 목을 완전 빼서 오른쪽을 봐야 에펠탑이 보여요 그치만 전망은 좋습니다 ~~

Luca’s home was perfect for our short stay in Paris. We were close to some amazing landmarks, shops and restaurants. Luca was extremely accommodating and welcoming. He gave us great information on things to do nearby and was overall a great host! The home was clean and had the most amazing view of Paris. Highly recommended!

Happy to stay here as its literally near to most places in Paris. Eiffel Tower, Trocadero, river. As well as cafe and resto.
Luca waiting for us until late for check in and gi ing fast response for queries.

Defo will stay here when we traveling to Paris again

최대 장점은 뷰입니다. 15구의 31층에 위치하고 30층 까진 엘베 한층은 계단입니다. 15구 자체가 동양인이 많고 한인마트 대형마트도 있어서 좋은 반면 숙소는 두역의 중간에 위치해서 좀 걷긴 해야합다.
세면대 물이 잘안빠지고 싱크대에서 약간의 냄새가 낫지만 침구나 수건은 깔끔했고 호스트 루카가 직접 체크인하고 친절하게 설명해 줬습니다. 그리고 와이파이 대신 무제한 심카드를 제공해주는데 잘터지고 엄청 좋더라구요. 몇가지 단점을 적긴했지만 정보공유 차원이고 전체적으로 훌륭한 숙소입니다. 추천!

Mil Gracias, el apartamento muy lindo, bien ubicado, Luca muy atento de cada detalle y muy servicial desde nuestra llegada hasta el momento de partir. 
Muy recomendado, ademas muy bien ubicado a pocas calles de la Torre Eiffel
숙소의 위치는 우선 좋아요 집앞에 모노플렉스랑 한인마트도 있구요 집앞에 좋은 레스토랑도 있어서 꼭 가보세요 호스트가 수시로 상황 체크해주고 문제도 바로 해결해줘서 만족입니다. 아 야경은 집에서 보는게 최고에요

Luca is the perfect host. He goes above and beyond to make sure your stay is perfect. His place is perfectly situated to explore Paris and the flat is spotlessly clean. The thing that makes it even better is the view - wow! Thanks Luca you make Airbnb special!

Luca’s place is very quaint, and simple. Very close to Eiffel Tower and great view from the 31st floor! Elevator takes you to the 30th floor, then you must walk up one flight of stairs. The WiFi was down the day we stayed, but Luca kindly provided a SIM card with internet to use. Also very communicative whenever needed. 
Thanks Luca!

Lovely studio apartment that served my partner, daughter and I well.  She slept on the bottom bunk, and my partner and I slept on the top which was easy to get to with stairs.  The apartment was clean and had everything we needed.  Luca was very responsive and hospitable via the airbnb messenger. We had a very nice stay.

Excelente ubicación en barrio tranquilo, cerca de la estación del metro. 

El apartamento es pequeño pero la vista lo compensa.

전체적으로 굉장히 마음에 드는 숙소 중 하나였어요. 꼭대기 층이라 따로 야경 보러갈 필요없이 집에서 즐기는 야경 좋았어요. 창 밖으로 몸을 빼면 에펠탑이 보이긴 하나 더 정확한 에펠뷰를 원하시는 분들은 다른 숙소가 더 나을 듯해요. 위치는 버스나 지하철은 보통 5~10분정도 걸어야하는데 그정도도 괜찮다면 오케이입니다. 

숙소 보안 잘 되어있고요. 근처 치안 좋습니다. 큰 마트 모노플렉스랑 쇼핑몰 근처에 있어요.

파리 숙소중에 샤워기 수압 약한 곳 간혹있는데 여기는 샤워부스 넓고 좋았어요. 조리도구 다 갖춰져있고요.커피,티,씨리얼도 구비되어있고요. 여기는 집에 와이파이가 없고 심카드를 줍니다. 밖에서도 쓸 수 있는데 저희는 두명이고 심카드 하나를 나눠쓰고 있던 중이어서 아주 유용하게 잘 썼어요.

 호스트 굉장히 친절하고 세심하게 배려합니다. 정말 좋았어요. 저희는 4일 있었는데 너무 편하게 잘 있다가 갑니다 ㅎ
The location is great and the view is outstanding, highly recommended

Der Ausblick ist wunderbar. 30. Etage mit Aufzug. Direkt an der Seine gelegen.
Nach jedem Ausflug konnten wir uns mit dem Blick über Paris entspannen.
Der Oberhammer war eine Sim-Karte für Internetnutzung, die uns zur Verfügung gestellt wurde. Natürlich KOSTENLOS. Vielen Danke nochmal.
Großes Lob an Luca. Antworten auf Fragen per Mail kamen schnell.
Excellent place close to the metro and the Eiffel tower. Everything was clean and as described. Luca was a friendly host.

Luca's apartment is a treasure. Exactly as depicted in the pictures- a small, clean studio with the most amazing view of Paris I have ever seen. It was an easy walk to the Eiffel Tower. Luca was also the best host, flexible and very sweet. I highly recommend his place!

Luca is very nice and thoughtful person, he prepared everything you might need in the room. The room is clean, bright and quiet. You can see Eiffel Tower from the there. I was very happy to stay there and would choose it again if I come by Paris.

정말 정말 좋았던 숙소!! 유럽 여행중 가장 좋았던 숙소라고 생각이 듭니다.
아파트 정면에서 안보이지만 고개를 내밀면 에펠탑이 보이며 에펠탑에 가까운 위치에 있습니다. 또한 아파트라 깨끗하고 쾌적하며 깔끔합니다. 좋은 시설과 4명이서 지내기에 충분한 크기의 방입니다. 또한 호스트가 매우 친절하며 중간에 뭐 불편한건 없는지 확인차 메세지로 물어봅니다. 이 숙소가 만실이라 다른곳에서 3박 여기서 2박을했는데 처음부터 여기서 묵었다면 더 좋은 파리 여행이 되었을거같네요!! 추천합니다!!

일단 높은 곳이라서 숙소 뷰가 너무 좋았어요!커피머신,커피포트,소금,후추,펜네파스타면,시리얼 등 많은 게 구비되어있었고 식기류도 많아서 엄청 좋았어요~그리고 숙소가 엄청 깔끔하고 수건이랑 휴지도 넉넉하게 사용할 수 있었어요!
약간 아쉬웠던 점은 루카 집은 31층인데 엘레베이터로는 30층까지만 갈 수 있어요 ㅠㅠ
Excellent location, excellent Loca,thank you!

This space is very close to the Eiffel Tower. You have a great view of the tower and you can watch it sparkle at night by the hour. Luca is very accommodating as he held our bags upon arrival and departure. The space is nice and clean with comfortable beds. There is a pool on the top floor that is pretty cold. There is a 360 degree view of Paris from that floor as well.
Adoramos a estadia! A vista é simplesmente incrível! O local é bem localizado! Tornou-se um local espacial em paris, ficamos noivos no airbnb de Luca! Perfeito!

I had a great stay at Luca's pleace. It's so clean, and very harm. Luca was so friendly and nice
Hope I can go there again

일단 저녁에 나가지 않아도 에펠탑을 볼 수 있다는 점이 너무 좋았습니다. 31층으로 건물의 가장 꼭대기 층이라 전망이 정말 좋았어요!! 그리고 호스트가 너무너무 친절하셨고 답장도 빠르십니다! 제가 라디에이터 온도를 올리고 싶어서 문의를 드렸는데 그건 불가능하지만 원하면 본인이 직접 오시겠다고 하실만큼 친절하셨습니다. 그렇다고 추운 정도?는 아닙니다! 많은 종류의 차가 준비되어있었고 화장실도 깨끗했습니다. 정말 단 하나 불편했던 점은 세탁기 입니다... 탈수 할때 세탁기가 흔들릴정도였습니다. 나중에는 무서워서 그냥 꺼버렸네요. 숙소는 전체적으로 추천합니다!!

Si no te quedas aquí probablemente no consigas nada que supere este lugar. La entrada fue sencilla aunque nos retrasamos no tuvimos ningún problema ya que Luca es una persona totalmente accesible. No lo conocimos en persona esperamos repetir París en septiembre a ver si nos toca la suerte de conocerle. GRACIAS LUCA.

- Great location - easy walk to Eiffel Tower, lots of shops and metro.

- Unit has all the amenities you could need, neat & clean, Amazing view of the city (especially sparkling Eiffel Tower in the evening)

- Luca is a great host! Very helpful and responsive, makes the whole experience easy and enjoyable.
Very friendly with a space that is reasonably priced

A cosy place in a great location for both sights and public transport. The host was always quick to respond to messages and was very accommodating. Also had a great view of the Eiffel Tower. Would highly recommend.
O apartamento é excelente, limpo, bem equipado e bem localizado próximo a Torre Eiffel, restaurantes, mercados e metro. O Luca é uma pessoa excelente e nos ajudou muito.

에펠탑에서 도보로 10분 정도의 거리에 한인마트 및 현지 대형마트가 근처에 있어서 관광지 이동 및 식품 구입이 매우 편리하였습니다. 
31층에서 바라보는 파리 시내 전경도 좋았고, 고개를 돌리면 보이는 에펠탑도 좋았습니다.

Luca nos ha hecho pasar una estancia genial, hemos tenido muy buena comunicación y ha estado al pendiente en todo momento. El apartamento está ubicado en un barrio muy tranquilo y con una vista a la ciudad maravillosa donde además, está muy cerca de Trocadéro, La Torre Eiffel,  el Río Sena, Radio France. Y a tan solo unas cuadras puedes encontrar una estación para tomar un bus o el metro.

Excelente ubicación, llegas a la torre Eiffel caminando 8-10min, estación del metro muy cerca. Barrio muy tranquilo. 
Nosotros somos una familia de 4 y estuvo perfecto para nosotros ( literas de 2 camas matrimoniales)
La cocineta tiene todo lo necesario. 
Luca estuvo siempre atento a contestar nuestras dudas y ayudarnos.

Location was good and great View. Actually at first meet with host little bit problem. But it is alright...But I never make some noise. One time I make some noisy, after that day host little bit warning to me. And  house little bit small to stay 4people.
We had 5 weeks of travelling accross Europe and amongst the 3 stars or above  accomodation this is the best value for money.

Excelente ubicación, muy cerca de la torre y de otros sitios de interès. El apartamento muy aseado, agradable y con una vista espectacular de la ciudad; lugar ideal para parejas y familia incluyendo niños. Luca es una persona amable dispuesta a solucionar cualquier inquietud. Recomendado

very nice place. Nice view form the apartment.. there was also a swiming pool.. 
The host was nice. 
I recomend the place.
Luca ist sehr angenehme und sehr Nette Person, immer wieder gerne

No puedo decir absolutamente nada negativo del apartamento de Luca. Ubicación excelente, zona muy buena y segura de París, a unos 15 min a pie de la propia torre Eiffel, con paradas de metro a unos 6 min andando, colchones cómodos, baño fantástico con las toallas y productos para el aseo, te dejaba hasta el café y justo abajo del edificio había un supermercado. Pero lo mejor y más impactante, las vistas desde la habitación, son inmejorables. Viajé con mis amigas y nos hemos sentido muy afortunadas de haber podido disfrutar de ese increíble alojamiento. Luca ha estado muy atento siempre, contestando a todas nuestras dudas, y preguntándonos si todo estaba bien. No he podido tener el placer de conocerlo en persona pero lo tenía todo preparado a nuestra llegada. Gracias Luca por dejarnos pasar unos días buenísimos en tu casa. Sin duda volveré a repetir.
The apartment was beautiful with view on the city, near Eiffel Tower, metro station or supermarket. Luca was very friendly host, all was perfect :-)
Luca was a perfect host. His Apartment was the best choice for me and my family in Paris.

Luca was an amazing host. And his place is gorgeous. You have a wonderful view of the city of Paris! We couldn't have asked for a better spot. My girlfriend & I also arrived almost an hour late due to complications at the airport. Luca was extremely patient & friendly with us the whole time. We would definitely recommend Luca's place.
숙소 정말 마음에 들었어요! 일단 31층이다 보니 뷰가 환상이었고, 깨끗했고, 넓고,에펠탑까지도 금방 걸어갈수 있어요! 무엇보다 호스트분 답변이 빨라서 좋았어요! :)
El departamento a pesar de ser chico está muy bien distribuido. Está muy cerca del metro y de la torre. Luca fue muy amable al recibirnos y aconsejarnos sobre la cuidad

Luca's place was amazing! Very centrally located in Paris and a 10 minute walk to the Eiffel Tower.The view from the room of entire Paris was amazing and we woke up everyday to a beautiful view of the Seine River and Eiffel Tower.Luca's hospitality went above and beyond our expectations and he made our stay absolutely wonderful.Thank you Luca,we look forward to visiting again and staying at your residence!!

Luca's apartment is perfect for a couple or a small family or a single traveler. It is located 10min walk to Eiffel tower, 5min to M6 train station, a few steps to restaurants and shops. The building is quiet and well maintained. The view is great overlooking Sein and Eiffel Tower. The apartment is very neat and really organized. It is has everything necessary for a small family. I was amazed how the apartment can be organized so practical and still feel spacious. We really appreciate our host thoughtfulness and hospitality.

Luca is a great host, warm and friendly yet very professional. Always prompt with his responses to all our queries (small and big). He personally met us and showed us around the apartment.
The apartment is perfect for 2-3 people, centrally located (walking distance to the metro and also the Eiffel Tower) you also have a view of the Eiffel Tower apart from the panoramic view of the city (the apartment is on the 31st floor)
We had a pleasant stay.

We had a great stay at Luca's place! He is quick to answer communication and a great host! You cannot beat the view of this room and it is close to public transit. Would definitely stay here if visiting Paris again!

This apartment has a great location,  walkable diatance to Eiffel Tower. Nice clean with all ammenties, Lucas was extremely helpful, i was arriving way early in the morning so he even agree to store our luggages in his car so that we may go out for sight seeing. You will have to take care of the breakfast yourself, rest everything is top class

파리에 다시 가도 이 숙소 갈만큼 아주 훌륭합니다. 고층이라 일단 뷰가 너무 좋습니다. 그리고 지하철 역에서 5분정도 위치해 있어 접근성도 아주 좋습니다. 근처 학교들이 있어 치안도 문제없고 5분거리에 슈퍼와 한인슈퍼도 있어 편리했습니다. 숙소 내부도 좋았어요. 호스트 LUCA도 직접 체크인 해주며 메세지로 계속 챙겨주었습니다.    완전완전×100000 강추합니다!
We love the apartment. Its very clean and have a beautifull view to eifell Tower. Luca is a good host.

숙소가 정말 좋았어요! 화장실도 깨끗하고 이불, 수건도 깨끗했어요. 세탁기, 전자레인지, 커피포트, 헤어드라이기 등 필요한게 거의 다 있어요!!! 그리고 숙소 근처에 한인마트랑 모노프릭스(마트)가 있어서 편했어요!
이 숙소에서 제일 좋았던 점은 전망이에요!!! 매일매일 센느강을 볼수있고 창문열면 에펠탑도 볼수있고 정말정말 좋아요 다음에 또 파리에 오게된다면 또 오고싶은 곳이에요!!!

Luca's studio is in a secured modern building and it is walking distance to the metro duplex. The studio itself is on the 31st floor though the elevator stops at the 30th floor. You walk a short flight to reach the studio. 

The studio is functionally equipped. It has a commanding view of the river and to the right, the Eiffel Tower. It can sleep 3. 

Luca is a great host. He is punctual, communicative and strives to make sure everything is well for you. 

I enjoyed staying at Luca's place while in Paris.
Luca's place gives you a wonderful view of the city, is clean and comfortable and very  close to many of the right/left bank areas. Highly recommend.

뷰가 아주 환상적이에요
지하철 역도 가깝고 숙소도 넓고 깨끗해요
호스트도 친절하네요

Yo viaje con mis amigas  y nos hospedamos en el precioso y muy bien ubicado apartamento de Lucas, el cual fue muy amable y atento con nostras en todo momento. El apartamento tiene unas vistas increíbles  y piscina en la ultima planta, ademas  esta caminando a 5 min de la torre eiffel, ademas de estar bien comunicado con el metro trenes y autobuses. Sin duda alguna mis amigas y yo volveríamos a repetir
位于塞纳河边高层临河景观公寓,所在区域治安好｡适合三口之家或三个大人一个孩子入住｡步行到地铁站视脚程快慢十分钟之内,公交车站步行五分钟,公交车站旁就有小超市｡可无人交钥匙退房｡有基本厨具和餐具｡巴黎短期停留的好选择!
The location of this apartment was great; so close to the Eiffel Tower and right next to the train station. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed.

This place is probably the best studio available on airbnb in Paris. I highly recommend it if you get a chance to rent it out. The studio is bigger than most places in Paris and the view is to die for. There is nothing comparable and it is pretty hard to sleep at night with such a magnificent view. Also, there is no a/c but if you leave the windows open, there is enough wind and breeze to keep the studio at a very comfortable level. I highly recommend it to everyone!
Great view and comfortable for our family of 4.

창밖으로 에펠탑을 볼 수 있고, 걸어서 에펠탑에 갈 수 있습니다. 실제로 본 에펠탑은 사진보다 오묘한 빛깔입니다. 
숙소는 교통이 편하고, 가까이 수퍼마켓이 있어서 아이들과 지내기 좋습니다. 
루카는 친절하고,저의 질문에 항상 빠르게 대답해 주었어요. 
처음 위치를 정할 때 좀더 번화가로 할지 고민했었는데
여기서 루브르 박물관이든 그외 다른 관광지가 지하철로 30분이면 갈 수 있어서 별 상관 없습니다.
파리 지하철, 버스 갈아 타는 것도 재미 있습니다.
시간이 없어 기념품을 못 샀는데 마지막 날 여기 지하철 역에서 에펠탑 열쇠고리를 살 수 있었어요.
소형 드럼 세탁기가 안열려 세탁물을 꺼내지 못해 고생했는데
우리 다음에 올 게스트가 도와줘서 꺼냈어요.
친절한 루카와 그의 친구 게스트에게 감사해요.

A beautiful view on the 31 floor to see the Effie tower at mid height! We had an internet connection issue that Luca fixed immediately, and he was very willing to help us explore the city! Wonderful stay!

Luca was extremely helpful and attentive. The apartment is clean and up to date. Provided towels and access to the pool. He left water bottles for us which was awesome. You could view the Eiffel Tower and the river from the balcony. it's very close to it (about a 10 min walk). Trains are about 10 min away.  Unfortunately while we were there the wifi did not work which slowed up down. The sink was also out of order.
The place was perfect for us! Beautiful view of the Eiffel Tower and walking distance to everything we wanted to see!
The place is very convenient and has a scenic view of Eiffel Tower! Affordable yet very comfortable!
I love fantastic panoramic view of this room. It is recommended for you to stay here

This was by far the best Airbnb I have ever stayed out. The view is beautiful, the host was friendly and always super helpful. He left laundry detergent for our use, waters, beers, and some food to start us off. The only downfall was having no AC but it wasn't too bad with the window open day and night. It's perfect for 2-4 people! And pretty close to everything. If you don't mind walking it's a hour walk from the love lock bridge and the cathedral but if you don't wish to walk it is very close to a train station. Overall, great stay!
Great place for our short weekend stay in Paris - amazing city views & easy location to everything in the city!
Excellent place, to explore Paris. Great view. Nice host. Reasonable price .

Lo studio di Luca è incantevole: luminoso, pulito, essenziale ma confortevole. Senza dimenticare una  vista sulla Senna e sulla città (Tour Eiffel compresa) da mozzare il fiato. C'è davvero tutto per rendere il  soggiorno a Parigi indimenticabile.
It was marvelous
He was very helpful showing us the immediate area. Also the location was great and the flat was very clean and cozy.

Luca is the most kind and gracious host. Our flight was delayed, but he waited for us. The studio is spacious with Ikea furniture dispite it's compact space. The view of the Eiffel is breath taking from the right side of the window. We will definitely consider this place again!
Everything was good
Spectacular location, very close to Eiffel tower and great views. Pool great for kids.
pas de commentaire
pas de commentaire

Merci Jonathan pour votre hospitalité et votre disponibilité malgré cette période de confinement compliquée.

Logement idéalement situé, quartier calme et parking disponible si besoin.

Je recommande fortement.
L’appartement était super, bien propre assez bien situé, franchement rien à dire

Désastreux, cette appartement est catastrophique!  

Travaux toute la nuit impossible de fermer l'oeuil, le propriétaire posséder son appartement sur le même pas palier et se PROSTITUE.

Pour continuer cela j'ai été agresser physiquement et menacer par des jeunes hommes qui nous ont virer de l'appartement violacent.

Des poursuites judiciaire sont en court.
Logement à éviter et fuir !!!
Super appartenant, parfaitement bien placé. Jonathan répond vite et est adorable !
M. Jonathan est super sympa. Et la maison est très propre, on a bien passé une nuit là.
Tout étais top thank you
Logement très propre et très bien situé.

Tremendous value for the money on this gem near Bastille. Really clean, in fact, possibly the CLEANEST airbnb I have ever stayed in. Nice features such as a variety of coffee choices, candles lit upon arrival, and a large comfy flat.
Super

Un très bel appartement situé en plein coeur de Paris, doté d'une vue incroyable !

Propre et lumineux
Emplacement juste a côté  de la ligne 4 c'est très pratique. Appartement très lumineux. Dernier étage sans bruit.
J'ai adoré, c'était parfait !

Très bon séjour chez Marie, l’appartement est charmant et correspond aux photos, voire mieux, avec pleine vue sur le Sacré-Coeur et les toits parisiens.
À deux pas de la station de métro Porte de Clignancourt, il nous a été facile de faire le tour de la ville en seulement 4 jours.
Un tout petit bémol pour le chauffage, un souffleur est mis a disposition mais en dépit de cela il faisait un peu froid.

Je recommande !
Appartement conforme aux photos, très agréable et bien situé. Idéal pour un petit week-end à Paris.
Un appartement lumineux, avec une très belle vue sur Montmartre. Et une petite terrasse pour en profiter. La proximité du métro et du tram est vraiment appréciable.

Super appartement. Conforme aux photos. Le balcon est un plus. Situé juste à proximité des transports cela est très pratique. 

Petit bemol: le sol n'était pas très propre et il n y avait pas de rideaux mais des volets pas très couvrants !
bel appartement.  correspond aux photos

Super séjour chez Marie. L'emplacement de l'appartement est vraiment pratique il y a une magnifique vue sur la basilique sacrée coeur. L'appartement est propre et lumineux comme sur les photos je recommande !!
Je recommande vivement l appartmernt. Il a un charme fou et est très bien situé.

L’hôte a annulé la réservation le jour même de notre arrivée, alors que nous étions à l’aéroport sur le point d’embarquer, nous nous sommes retrouvés à Paris sans logement et sans plan B, autant dire que ce n’est pas la meilleure façon de commencer un voyage. L’hôte n’est clairement pas fiable.

Marie’s appartement is cozy, luminous  and offers an amazing view of Montmartre and the Sacrée Coeur. It’s really next to many options of transport: metro, bus, tram and taxis. There are also a lot of food shops and stores nearby. Marie answers very promptly and is ready to help. We had an amazing stay.
Amazing view! I could even see the Eiffel tower.
This view is spectacular. Pretty much exactly like in the pictures!

Ideale Verbindung zum öffentlichen Verkehr. Wunderbare Lage nah am Zentrum und mit toller Aussicht auf dem Mont-Martre. In der Unterkunft können sie eine tolle geräumes Schlafzimmer erwarten und eine praktische Küche.
Ziemlich am Rand der Stadt gelegen, jedoch super nah an der U-Bahn. Schöne kleine Wohnung mit atemberaubendem Blick vom Balkon. Freundliche Gastgeberin mit schnellen Antworten.

The apartment is located right near public transportation, which makes it convenient to travel wherever you need to go. However, the place was not as clean as it was listed. The bathroom has significant amounts of mold and peeling paint. Also, open food items were left in the refrigerator. The bedroom area was clean and the view was amazing.
very attractive apartment with a beautiful view
A wonderful flat with a spectacular view.
lovely parisian home!

Marie was really helpfull and always answers very quick. The appartment is exactly like the pictures and really cozy. The view is absolutely amazing. The public transport is really close and you can go everywhere really fast. The only thing what we didnt like was the dodgy neighborhood especially at night.

We were very happy staying at Marie's place. The view was very nice and it is as you see in the pictures. Although it is located at a relatively busy street, once you close the balcony doors, the room is quiet. There is a very nice restaurant in front called Le Recyclerie, very nice and interesting. Metro was literally outside the main door. Marie also gave clear instructions to us.

Ein wirklich schönes kleines Appartement, modern, sehr pariserisch eingerichtet und ein fantastischer Panorama über die Dächer, Sacre-Coeur im Blick, hell und sonnig.
Sehr gern wieder!
Beautiful space with amazing views. Will definitely be back!
Very cool little apartment right near the Montmarte neighborhood. We had a good time using this as our central location.

We had an amazing stay at Maries place, the location and the view were stunning. The apartment was cosy and the atmosphere at night was very relaxing. We had no issue check-ing in, the host even announced us that we could check-in earlier. Metro station, cafes, restaurants, fast-food right in front of the buildings' entrance.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

An idyllic place to stay in Paris in a non-tourist area with an incredible view, metro and bus station conveniently located right outside the front door as well as a great patisserie.  It's about a 25 minute metro ride to the main tourist attractions and museums, strongly encourage visitors to walk to the flea market nearby. Look forward to returning to Paris and staying here again!

Marie’s places was a comfy inviting apartment with some amazing views of Paris. Waking up to the smell of fresh baked pastries from the cafe down stairs is something I will always remember. Check in was a bit difficult as the original key pick up location was closed but was able to have if sorted out in a matter of minutes. Be sure to have email and contact number on hand just in case. A great place to stay for singles and couples.

We very much enjoyed our stay. Fantastic balcony and view. Metro on doorstep with access to central Paris. Everything you need for a short stay in Paris with a Parisian feel. More towels needed.. as one large and one hand towel is not enough for 2 people over 4 nights! Also would be great if the cupboard would allow hanging space for guests. Thank you so much :)

This space is exactly as described and is accurate to the photos shared: a clean, open space with a wonderful view of Paris in a fantastic location. I highly recommend to anyone visiting Paris and is hoping to be in a location that makes one feel as though they live in Paris and are not simply a tourist of the town.

It is a nice place to sleep and stay at as many studios are smaller in Paris. It is also very close to the station. Great view. Tip: make sure to take pictures of the entire apartment so nothing gets pinned on you for being broken when it is obvious they didn’t check the apt completely prior to my arrival.

My boyfriend and I spent in Marie's apartment two nights. The apartment is very cozy and located next to the metro station Porte de Clignancourt. Marie always answered very fast to doubts and questions making it very easy to connect and even if she was not there she left the keys in a shop very close to the apartment. The apartment is very nice, well furnished and with an amazing view (you can see the Sacre Coeur directly from the bedroom, it was incredible!) and with many lights that make the atmosphere even more romantic! Unfortunately, it was not possible to use the balcony (that has the same amazing view) because of very bad weather. The kitchen is very cozy as well and even if it's not very big it was enough to cook some things (and save some money too!) and there are two supermarkets very close to the apartment too. Recommended!

Nice apartment for a weekendtrip in paris with a lovely view!
Marie is easy to contact and replies within minutes:)

Marie was very responsive and helpful from the moment of booking and during our stay. 

The apartment was nice, but further out than we expected from the city center. Minimal on comforts such as single towel each & only a thin sheet and single pillow for bedding, no blankets. Apartment is also cluttered with personal items, no storage. 

A good place to lay your head and live out of a suitcase.

Marie’s place was beautiful! It has a great view of the city and Sacré-Cœur. We loved drinking coffee on the balcony in the morning! Place was easy to find and they key was easy to access. The apartment is right next to a metro station and within walking distance of Sacré-Cœur and the Moulin Rouge. Wi-Fi was fantastic. Would definitely recommend! Great place for a couple or solo traveler.

Very chic apartment with the most stunning view of Sacre Coeur. The terrasse is lovely and daylight pours into the main room which is set up with the essentials (desk, comfy chairs). Perfect size for one.

Marie’s place is very charming and welcoming. The view was absolutely incredible and it was great to return to this lovely apartment after a long day of exploring. Marie is a great host and responded to all of our questions quickly.

Nice little flat perfect for a solo traveler. Situated right next to the metro, so you can easily get to most places. Marie is very communicative and responds quickly to messages. Located in a real neighborhood, so you get that living in Paris feeling.
A cozy little bed sit accessible to trains. Easy walk to Sacre Coeur and surrounds. Great for the price.

Hübsches kleines Appartement, 
Metro vor der Tür,  Ausstattung eher spartanisch
She is very responsive. And I had a great time there. Very nice view.

We had such a nice stay in this apartment. It has a small balcony with a beautiful view. The interior was very nice and Marie responded very fast. It is a bit unhandy that there are no curtains, so it was very bright in the morning (plus the white walls that reflect light even more) and other people have the possibility to look inside. Also, we thought the amount of messages we received from Marie was a bit much, but I can imagine other people like it.
Great place! 10 m from the Metro and super nice apartment. Marie was so helpful and answered Every question i had!
Marie is very responsive and helpful, also recommended experiences to do and gave us a coupon, that was very nice!

This is a great unique space. It is quaint and cute, has great views of the city, and is equally bright and sunny. The location is perfect for accessing public transportation and is close to multiple markets and eatery. One of my favorite aspects of the studio was the balcony, as I had my breakfast there on multiple occasions. I also appreciated that the host was just  a quick message away if I needed anything, which was great. Honestly, didn't have any issues with the place itself, aside from the elevator not working on the last night, but that's outside of the host control.

Great place to stay for one or two people. View of Sacre Cour and the tip of eiffel tower. If you want to feel like you live in Paris, this is it. Lift is small if u have lots of luggage but works well. Charming and neat.
Marie’s place was beautiful! Pictures are very accurate. We loved being able to make dinner and eat it on the small, but adorable balcony!
This is a steal. A wonderful view of Paris and a table and chairs on a balcony. Space is light and open. 5 steps away from the metro station too!
This was a great place to stay and I would recommend it if you are looking for a taste of French living, very rustic style.

Marie has opened up to you her brightly lit but shaded rooftop eyrie - with a balcony - for a price to wonder at.  What a great experience to get a little taste of living in the upper floors of Paris!  The elevator one door down from her entry made coming and going super easy.
Marie is quick to respond and positive and helpful.

The ground-floor neighborhood is noisy and a bit of an adventure.  As a single female traveler, I felt a need to be observant; if I had been with my husband it would have been little issue at all.

The metro is at the foot of the building, either left or right - and is the north end last stop of line 4, which goes directly downtown to line 1 that will take you to nearly everything tourist would want.  This was very convenient and easy for getting downtown, and assured a seat when heading into town since the train was always empty at arrival.  : )

Thanks, Marie, for a fun chance to feel like a real Parisian for 4 days!  : )
В целом все понравилось! Отличный вид из окна. Квартира полностью соответствует фото.
Loft très spacieux et confortable. Kelly est très accueillante et réactive.
Bon sejour

Magnifique appartement, un vrai cocon pour un week-end parfait
Encore mieux en vrai que sur les photos !
Très bien équipé, petit balcon très agréable, situé à proximité de toutes commodités 
Kelly est une hôte disponible et sympathique 
Nous reviendrons sans hésitation lors de notre prochaine visite !

L’appartement de Kelly est très agréable. La décoration est superbe c’est encore mieux en vrai que sur les photos. Le logement est idéalement situé et bien équipé. 
Kelly a été ultra réactive et arrangeante avec nous, merci encore. Nous recommandons fortement son appartement!
Tout était parfait!
bien placé, mais vaut mieux avoir des boules Quies sur soit !
Belle appartement et super séjours !

Le logement de Kelly est magnifique, très joliment décoré. Il est effectivement très cosy et on s'y sent tout de suite très à l'aise. La localisation par rapport à Dauphine est idéal, proche du métro Rue de la Pompe. Je recommande ce logement aussi parce qu'il est parfaitement équipé, on ne manque de rien !

Nous remercions Kelly et son accueil dans son superbe appartement. Joli cocon où l’on se sent comme chez soi, superbe déco, parfaitement équipé et idéalement placé à proximité du métro dans un quartier très agréable. 
Ce logement a clairement contribué à la réussite de notre superbe week-end Marathon de Paris !
Au plaisir de se voir lors d’un prochain séjour.
Nous recommandons vivement l’appartement de Kelly !

L'appartement de Kelly est très agréable et joliment décoré...on s'y sent bien...!! La qualité de la literie est excellente, vous y passerez d'agréables nuits. Le logement ne manque de rien et est proche des commerces et lignes de métro. J'y retournerai lors d'une prochaine escapade parisienne sans problème...!!

J’ai eu un coup coeur pour l’appartement , il est très cosy . Très proche de l’arc de triomphe et à deux pas de Trocadéro . Plusieurs stations de métro (ligne 9, ligne 1 et ligne 6) très pratique ... merci pour votre accueil et de votre cadeau que j’ai beaucoup apprécié .

Thanks a lot Kelly! Your apartment was great. Real AirBnB experience! The location was in one of the most beautiful districts in Paris. The flat - sparkling clean, we had everything that we needed. Communicating Kelly was very easy, she responded very quickly and everything went fine! We highly recommend Kelly as a host and her apartment!

L’appartement de Kelly est formidable. Très sympa et fonctionnel dans un immeuble bien entretenu. Le balcon est super pour boir son café du matin. Kelly est très gentille et la communication avec elle vraiment facille. On recommande fortement ce petit loft cosy dans un des meilleurs quartiers de Paris.

Appartement très agréable à vivre pour un célibataire ou un couple. Il est très bien situé dans un quartier chic et commerçant et à proximité des coins touristiques de paris. Champs Élysée, Trocadéro, opéra, etc. Le balcon l’été est un vrai bonheur . Merci à Kelly pour l’accueil

J’ai passé un séjour très agréable chez Kelly. L’appartement est très cosy et le balcon aménagé est vraiment un must l’été. Le quartier est très agréable avec de nombreux commerces de proximité et de boutiques pour le shopping, et la ligne 9 du métro et le bus 52 donnent vraiment accès à beaucoup de quartier de paris. Je remercie Kelly pour la flexibilité qu’elle offre à ses voyageurs à l’arrivée comme au départ. 
Je suggère juste que Kelly laisse sur la table un petit guide d’utilisation des équipements, code wifi, etc.
Merci à Kelly. Je recommande vivement son appartement et je reviendrai sans problème s’il est encore disponible.

Nice little apartment and well located not far from the Trocadéro. But the kitchen and the bathroom were not clean, dust on the floor, broken toilets, dirty fridge.
Can do better..

Joli studio, bien décoré et bien situé.
Malheureusement la salle de bain et la cuisine laissent à désirer (wc cassé, tâches, poussière, ampoules non remplacées, frigo salle...)
À notre arrivée Kelly n’était déjà plus là, la clé sous le paillasson.. Pas possible d’obtenir des draps propres supplémentaires pour notre séjour d’une semaine.  Peut faire mieux..
Thanks to Kelly for his welcome. The apartment was very clean
Great location, great flat. Home away from home!

Stylish, cozy, well-equipped studio apartment, exactly as advertised. In an upscale neighborhood and within walking distance of shops and restaurants, as well as the Bois de Boulogne (large wooded park on the west side of Paris). Some guests may dislike the hand-held shower head in the bathtub; typically French, though, for an authentic French experience. Kelly was very responsive and check-in/check-out were a breeze.
I Really enjoyed the location.  Very good value for Paris
I was really very enjoyed to live in this apartment!) Stylish, functional, with a nice balcony) Also bed was very soft and comfortable. Thank you very much Kelly!)
AMAZING!!! My best stay ever in Paris!!

A nice cozy space with a great location. Perfect for me during my time working in Paris with close transport links. Kelly responded quickly to my questions and the cleaner who came after week 1 was a great benefit.
Enjoyed my stay! Loved the area. Apartment was stylish and comfortable!

I was in Paris for a meeting at the OECD and, as a previous review has noted, Kelly's apartment is in a great location about 10 minutes walk away. The apartment itself is very stylish and well located for bakeries, supermarkets, public transport, etc. I didn't actually meet Kelly but she was very responsive to messages and her instructions for check in were easy to follow. I would happily stay again.
Cute, great location, lovely balcony and wonderfully comfy bed! Really a pleasure and I'd stay again in a heartbeat.

I was in Paris for the OECD forum which is about a 15 mins walk from Kelly's. Therefore, I did not have much time for leisure but enjoyed a great stay. Kelly's flat is spotlessly clean and comfortable. The bed is particularly nice and with addition of electronic shutters on the windows, the flat can be made nice and dark for a good sleep. The place is spacious by Paris standards and in a nice building - and neighborhood. There is a shop downstairs in the same building and a great cafe/bakery on the corner. No shortage of amenities, cafes and restaurants, supermarkets near by and within easy distance of a number of metro lines. Kelly was a super host - very responsive, helpful and lovely. Highly recommended!

I stayed at Kelly's place for a bit more than 6 weeks and I was very pleased. It is a well equipped apartment, bigger than most 1-bedroom studios in Paris (with elevator!) and at a great location. There is a maid that comes once a week to clean the place which makes things easier for a long séjour. Also, the communication with the host was always quick and efficient. I would love to stay there again!

I really enjoyed staying at Kelly's studio which is even better than the pictures – tastefully decorated and quite new. It is also located in one of the poshest areas in Paris. In addition to that, Kelly is an amazing host, always responding to my questions within an hour and very accommodating. I would highly recommend her place for the holiday in Paris.

Nous avons passé une très bon séjour. L'appartement est d'une propreté incroyable ! Aucun bruits, une hôte très gentille et attentive à nos besoins. Je recommande vivement cette adresse :)

Ness has a really nice apartment 2 stations away from Paris Nord. The station is a 2mins walk from the apartment with a supermarket directly in front of the apartment. Ness was an amazing host, she made sure to tell me how to get to the apartment and even helped me to buy the train tickets to the station. She even made sure to add necessities which came in handy when I didn’t want to cook! You can tell that she cares for the apartment as the 9 months she put Into renovating it really paid off. I would highly recommend staying with Ness. 

Ness a un très bel appartement à 2 stations de Paris Nord. La gare est à 2 minutes à pied de l'appartement avec un supermarché juste en face de l'appartement. Ness était un hôte exceptionnel, elle m'a dit comment aller à l'appartement et m'a même aidée à acheter les billets de train pour la gare. Elle s’est même assurée d’ajouter des produits de première nécessité qui me permettaient de ne pas cuisiner! Vous pouvez dire qu'elle se soucie de l'appartement car les 9 mois qu'elle a consacrés à la rénovation l'ont réellement porté à bien. Je recommande vivement de rester avec Ness.

Sur St Denis pour une formation à Générali, je me suis trouvée à 2 rues du lieu et c'était parfait, avec en prime, un Monoprix à 1 rue! L'appartement est tout confort, une très jolie déco et tout est très bien pensé et neuf. Le lit est très confortable. Tout était très propre, merci encore pour l'accueil, je reviendrais avec plaisir.
l'appartement de Ness était simplement propre et très vivable avec tous les équipements. Je demande à d'autres voyageurs juste d'aller essayer un de leur séjour chez Ness.
