J'ai beaucoup apprécié l'accueil de Thierry, simple, naturel,  et avec un café. La chambre était tout à fait conforme à l'annonce et à mes attentes. Je ne pensais pas pouvoir dormir dans un environnement aussi calme, en pleine région parisienne avec, en bonus, un volet parfaitement occultant. C'était ma première expérience avec airbnb et j'en suis très satisfait. 
Bref, un excellente prestation pour un prix modique.

parfait!!!!!!!
que dire de plus, que l acceuil est delicieux, que les serviettes sont douces, que je pense avoir reussi mon examen a cause de leur literie qui m a bien repose avant et apres l epreuve.
Allez y sans crainte, proche d un centre commercial toute commodites bref en 1 mot 
EXCELLENT

Thierry et Pascale sont des gens absolument charmants et très soucieux du bien-être des leurs hôtes. On se sent chez eux comme à la maison. J'ai passé 2 nuits au calme et j'ai apprécié la qualité de la literie. J'ai également apprécié les serviettes à disposition, les sanitaires à proximité, un placard pour mettre mes affaires, l'accès internet... Enfin bref, si j'ai besoin de revenir à Arcueil je connais déjà mon point de chute.
Accueil très sympathique, la chambre est calme et agréable. Adresse très pratique à côté du centre des examens :-).

Nous avons été accueilli avec beaucoup de gentillesse. Thierry et sa femme sont des hôtes discrets mais disponibles ce qui fait que l'on se sent "comme à la maison". La chambre est coquette et très calme. Nous y avons très bien dormi. La bonne surprise : les serviettes de toilettes sont fournies avec la chambre. Le métro est tout à côté. Je conseille cette adresse sans hésiter.

Thierry et Pascale sont des gens charmants. Leur maison est facile d'accès et aisée à trouver. L'accueil était chaleureux, Thierry m'ayant dès mon arrivée proposer une boisson chaude. Quant à la propreté de la chambre et de la salle de bain, rien n'a redire ! J'ai réellement apprécié ce court séjour et je n'hésiterai pas à y retourner si besoin. Je les conseille vivement.

Thierry m'a très bien accueillie et nous avons discuté autour d'une tasse de thé.
La chambre était conforme à la description et le quartier est calme.
Le logement est à proximité immédiate du RER B, ce qui est très pratique pour regagner Paris.
Mon séjour fut bref, mais j'ai été très bien accueilli. Et effectivement, c'est bien possible de trouver des maisons au calme à Paris !

J'ai passé trois jour chez Thierry et tout c'est super bien passé !
Très bon accueil, le quartier est super calme parfait pour passer des examens surtout que la maison des examens est à trois minutes à pieds !
Excellente localisation. Hôte très sympathique. Je recommande vivement.

Chambre bien au calme, propre et très confortable.
Appartement tout près du RER et B et aussi des principales lignes BUS.
Les hôtes sont bienveillants et très disponibles.
Rien à signaler
Merci pour le séjour
Très bon
La chambre est très calme et confortable. La communication avec les hôtes est très facile, nous n'avons manqué de rien! Le prix est très intéressant, je recommande!
Un bon séjour et une bonne communication avec eux. Ils m'ont offert le petit-déjeuner le jour où je suis parti.
Merci beaucoup pour ton accueil et ta gentillesse. Nous avons passé un très beau séjour grâce à ta simplicité et tes conseils. Au plaisir!
Thierry est très accueillant et gentil. C'est tout à fait propre et on a tout ce qu'on a besoin. Près de transports publique. Proche de Paris centre. J'ai bien aimé mon séjour.

Chambre très propre, bien aménagée pour travailler (étudiant ou chercheur), tranquille et bien éclairée avec une jolie vue. La salle de bain est partagée, mais elle a été toujours libre pendant mon séjour. Accès cuisine très amical. Hôte accueillante et discrète. Tout près du RER B (station Laplace, zone 2) qui vous mène directement à CDG (sauf jour de grève, oú il faut changer de train à Gare du Nord).  Très bon rapport qualité/prix.À conseiller absolumment!
Ils sont très doux et très aimables
Très bon séjour chez Thierry et son épouse sans oublier "Cloclo". Chambre très agréable et très calme et accueil très chaleureux.
The host canceled this reservation 46 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Hôte très agréable, était disponible dés mon arrivée dans l'après midi et arrangeante. Logement propre, fidèle à la description et aux photos, bien situé proche Rer et calme la nuit. A mis à ma disposition Sdb+wc et propose même un petit dej pour pas cher du tout ! Je recommande vivement.
Fue una estancia agradable la habitación corresponde muy bien al anuncio, Thierry al igual que su mujer fueron muy amables y atentos ,si tengo que volver a Arcueil  repetiré    sin duda.

I stayed 2 days in this room. Monsieur and Madame are very welcoming and careful. They concerned about my check-in time so I did check-in easily when I need. Communications are also good. They speak English, too:) An espresso of monsieur was great! I am sorry that I couldn't talk a lot with them because I was busy with something to do. 
The room is on the 2nd floor and very clean and comfortable with white and pink. The bed is enough for 2 person but I used alone. I love the room and the house! Lovely and cozy.
The bathroom is also clean. There are shampoo, soap, body cleanser, hot water and hair dryer. I think family Pelissier (monsieur, madame and a daughter) are good host for every guest!
It makes me easy for 2 days. Thanks a lot for your favor!
I hope I will see you again as a neighbor:)
All was good with the stay, thanks.
Very good communication with the host. Great location, close to the market and public transport. Room and bathroom nice and clean. They have a very friendly kitty too. Thank you for everything.
Very nice and helpful hosts. Good localization of the house. It's worth staying there :)
Certamenteun po troppo fuori mano  per chi vuole riposarsi tra un  giro e altro  la padrona di casa cordiale  e gentile   dovrebbe curare di piu la camera mettendo cuscini nuovi. Enuovi copriletti
Everthing was ok

Good if you wanna visit Paris . 
The anfitrión are good .

The place is better than what is shown in the pictures. The best thing about this place is the location, very close to the metro station ( 5 mins walk), very convinient.
The room and washroom was clean and there was a stand fan provided as well. The bed was big enough for 2 people.We had to check in late ( bus was delayed) and she had no issues about it. She also let us keep our luggage after check in which we collected later in the day after siteseeing. Overall value for money!
Everything was great. Thanks for good time in Paris
깨끗한 숙소 그리고 창문너머로 보이는 풍경 무엇보다도 Rer 이랑 가까워서 정말 좋았습니다.
Sitio correcto. Mal acceso para gente con movilidad reducida

Great value little room with easy access to the centre of Paris by metro. No one else was there when we stayed so we ended up having the whole house to ourselves. Only gripe was the comfort of the pillows and there were no alternatives  provided when we asked for them.
Очень близко от метро , центра города и аэропорта Орли!

Really lovely hosts who are willing to go out of their way to make everything work. Nice spot just out of town right by the train. A little hot in the room due to a hot summer but the fan helped a lot. Thankyou so much for having us, could’ve happily stayed for longer
ﾊﾟﾘ市内では無いですが､ｱｸｾｽ(特に空港への)が良く､ﾎｽﾄさんも気さくで良い方でした｡お部屋も快適に過ごせました｡

The place itself was nice. Hosts were also kind. Important to note that they have a cat, they smoke inside so it smells strongly like cigarettes, and there are some bugs & flies. Regardless, a good stay for the price.
I really recommend :) Very kind people
A home away from home

Great hospitality. Would highly recommend staying here. The room is very clean and well located next to the RER line. The hosts went out of their way to help us call Air France for our missing luggage and giving us directions in the city. They even lent us a small backpack to carry our stuff in for a day! Would love to stay here again.
Very nice host, clean room, easy to find, close to the RER!
Great!
Very nice host, flexible check-in time, clean room. Really enjoyed my stay there.
Quite and nice place with easy access to Paris city.
A very nice and cozy room, very convenient in transport. If you travel in one or two person, i surely recommend this room.
Good :-)
I had a very great experience renting the room there. Hosts were very hospitable, the premises were super clean.

Mi experiencia con Thierry y Pascale ha sido verdaderamente fantástica. He estado durante cinco meses conviviendo con ellos sin ningún problema. Son personas muy amables, acogedoras y atentas. Hablo de "convivencia" porque creo que es la palabra que mejor define mi estancia en Arcueil con ellos. 

Estoy segura de que tanto para períodos largos como el mío, como para estancias más cortas, este es un alojamiento en el que el huésped puede sentirse como en casa.

Review for air bnb:

We throughly enjoyed our stay here. Accommodations met our needs. Conveniently located within walking distance to metro station and only a few stops away from the city center. The couple that hosted us were very friendly and helpful. Would definitely stay here again!
Check in was a little bit late than posted but everything else was as expected. Thanks

The host was so great! He greeted me with a smile and delicious cold drink :) The room on the second floor was so clean, comfortable, and so cute! It's perfect! I felt as comfortable as if I had been in my own home.
It was very quiet around the house. And the house are near by train station "Laplace". There are some shops around the station, for example cafe, restaurant, little super market, and so on. It's so convenient.
I want to stay Thierry's house again next time in Paris too!

La habitación y baño son muy limpios y cómodos, el vecindario es algo tranquilo, hay una estación de metro a 10 minutos caminando pero está un poco sola la zona, la respuesta de la anfitriona muy rápida y buena. En general es un buen lugar solo un poco alejado del centro y tracciones turísticas
Nice host .

Preciosa habitación, muy cómoda y limpia. Baño compartido muy limpio. Cerca de Rer permite desplazarse con facilidad a cualquier lugar de París. Los anfitriones muy amables y el desayuno por un costo mínimo muy completo. Lo recomiendo!
Only 10 min metro ride into the city, they were very friendly and sweet! They literally sat down with us and gave us so many tips! It was well priced and a quiet location.
Fomos bem recebidas. O acesso ao quarto tem umas escadas íngremes. No geral, correu bem! O bilhete dos transportes fica mais caro porque a casa fica fora da ilha de Paris.
Perfect, everything I needed
It’s a good place and worth to stay. The house is comfortable and close to train station. Quite and feel safe. I absolutely will come there again!
오를리 공항에서 가깝고 샤를드골 공항도 RER을 타고 쉽게 갈 수 있습니다.
Clean and cozy room. Pleasant stay.

He estado tres meses en la casa. Aunque se encuentra en la zona 2, está cerca del centro. Todo queda asequible. 
Son majos, y aunque sólo hay un baño, hicieron lo posible por facilitar su uso. Lo recomiendo!

Good location, close to RER station, not far from anywhere, commercial center, CDG,Orly airport.

Thierry' s daughter Pauline is a very nice girl and helpful. Feel like home.

I may come again when visit Paris next time .
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Thierry was a great host; his wife let us in early in the morning and check in/out was flexible. This accommodation is not in central Paris, but it is close to the RER station (5 min walk) which takes you directly into the city center. The only downside of this Airbnb was that the owner smoked indoors, so we could smell the smoke throughout the home (especially at night). Other than that, it was a very comfortable accommodation for a reasonable price. Would recommend.

The place is good located, near  RER and groceries. The room is very cosy, bed is comfortable. Bathroom is clean. They have a very funny and nice cat. 
 P.S. Thank you for coffee! :)

Thierry is a warm and friendly host. The room is on the second floor with the family mostly living in the first floor. We had private space with a bathroom onthe second floor. The room and the bathroom were both warm during winter and cozy.
Very nice stay in a very clean apartment.
Both husband wife were welcoming though the wife, Pascale, has the better English. Near the metro but quiet. Moderate sized room with no air. Allowed me to wash my clothes. Very nice.

Thierry was a very helpful host. I didn't spend much time with him as I had some appointments, but Thierry was very helpful in showing me the right public transport connection and guiding me to his parking spot. 

The guest room is very cosy and the bed is comfortable. Bathroom is clean. 

Thanks for being a great host!

We enjoyed a 1 night stay. The hosts were friendly, the bed was comfortable, and the room was clean. The downside was I am very allergic to cats and they have a cat and the listing says no smoking, but we could smell smoke, which I am also allergic to. Otherwise it is a good deal.

We had a nice stay, the host was helpful and we had a great time in Paris.

The neighborhood is safe, the house is super quiet and the position is just perfect: in 25 minutes you get to the heart of Paris and the place is quite close to the RER station. The bed is comfortable and we liked the apartment.

The only (really small - hence the 5 star review) complaint is about the stairs: they are quite steep. It could be an issue for someone with mobility problems.

If (when) we go back to Paris we'll definitely go back to Thierry's place!

La habitación fue muy buena , encontrar el lugar fue difícil pero estuvieron muy atentos para ayufarno , lo único difícil es el costo de la estación cercana del metro  es un poco más costosa que en el centro de paris
This is a nice place in a quiet area. Very nice hosts and a clean room. Thank you! :)

I had two great days and three very recreative nights in Paris...thanks to very friendly, helpful and familial hosts. One evening we even watched a rugby game together eating jambon and drinking beer. After that we had pizza for dinner and always nice chats during the breakfasts (with home made marmelade), for which they got up earlier just for me on Saturday AND Sunday. This is what I call outstanding hospitality. Thanks again for everything and see you (or your daughter) in Munich for a beer tasting.
It was a wonderful, easygoing stay. Thierry and his widzę are extremalnie nice people!

Very helpful and warm hosts! Went out of their way to help us and gave us a lot of useful tips and information. Absolutely loved the place! Nice small villa on the outskirts of paris...very clean and cozy...a short walk from the train station through which it is well connected with the heart of the city...all im all, a very pleasing stay!

Un appartement etonnant, lumineux et  chaleureux, tres original dans sa conception. Pour tous les amoureux des objets qui ont une memoire ! (high-tech lovers s'abstenir). Dominique loue l'etage entier sous les toits, ce qui fait un grand espace de vie, avec un lit double, un petit bureau , une salle de bain, bibliotheque, etc.
Accueil tres sympathique.
Hôte très sympathique et accueillant. Chambre propre et agréable avec un vrai univers de culture.
Très bon rapport qualité-prix, très pratique pour l'accès a la maison des examens
Hébergement au calme, très bien situé près de la maison des examens et du centre commercial La vache noire

Très bon séjour chez Dominique : l'appartement est très sympa, juste à côté du RER et de la maison des examens, la chambre est grande, propre et très bien équipée (gros plus pour la bouilloire et le balcon!). Dominique est un hôte disponible et prévenant.
Dominique sait accueillir pour que le séjour se passe à merveille !
Logement conforme à la description dans l'annonce. Dominique et accueillant et avenant. Je recommande sans hésiter!

Personnellement je n’ai pas beaucoup aimé, je ne me suis pas sentie à l’aise du tout. L’appartement est vieux et les meubles aussi, il y avait de la poussière et on a l’impression que quelqu’un vit déjà là-bas.
Logement très éclairé dans une rue charmante.
Un hôte très à l'écoute et accueillant dans un logement tout à fait charmant et atypique. Je recommande !
Très bon hôte, très attentif. Appartement très propre et agréable. Très bien situé.
En déplacement pour un concours à la maison des examens, le logement est à 10 min à pied c’est super pratique! Dominique est très accueillant, très sympas et avenant je vous recommande vivement !
Dominique est présent pour ses clients.  Décoration très plaisante. Je recommande.
Super accueil, quartier calme et reposant, la petite terrasse est un plus. Super host.

Logement très atypique avec un super accueil par Dominique.
C'est un peu usé mais c'est un endroit qui a vraiment une âme particulière.
Hôte super, je vous le recommande

Un super accueil et une personne vraiment fantastique et chaleureuse !!!
Je vous conseil vraiment Dominique, l’accueil , le lieux , et plus à découvrir
Très bon hôte, à 5 min de la maison des examens. Je recommande

Logement à deux pas du centre d'examen, de la gare et d'un centre commercial.
Très lumineux avec un accueil chaleureux

Un logement atypique, artistique, chaleureux et très charmant que je recommande fortement. L'emplacement est parfait, au calme d'une petite allée arborée. La chambre en suite est agréable, confortable, jolie, très bien équipée.  L'hôte est très attentionné, disponible et sympathique. Ca vaut absolument le coup à tous égards. Bons séjours aux prochains ! *
Vous serez très bien reçu, merci encore!

Le logement de domminique est très près de Paris bien au calme dans l esprit verrière artiste une procédure d arrivée très bien faite un. hôte très gentils tre prévenant je recommande fortement merci à lui
Très bon séjour, emplacement calme et idéal, à 2 pas de la Maison des examens.
Mon voyage s’est très bien passé merci

Hôte très soucieux et attentionné.
Je recommande fortement
Merci à Dominique de s'être adapté à vos horaires nocturne. Chambre très spécieuse dans un appartement vraiment atypique. Encore merci.
Petit nid perché très agréable
Très bonne soirée au calme à deux pas de la maison des Examens
Le cadre est agréable et la rencontre tout à fait plaisante. Dominique est une personne accueillante et prête à rendre service. On recommande
bien
ambiance unique et très agréable!
Bon accueil, Dominique est super
Situation géographique  idéale par rapport à la maison des examens. Logement très correct et fonctionnel.
La chambre est spacieuse et le quartier est silencieux. Dominique est très attentionné et je le remercie pour son accueil.

Lieu bien placé et agréable dans un ancien atelier parisien transformé en habitation. Proche des transports, facile à trouver et avec toutes les commodités nécessaires. Dominique est très sympa et s'adapte facilement à vos horaires. Un bon séjour dans l'ensemble.
Très bien en tout point !
chambre conforme à la description, au calme, spacieuse, très proche du RER donc très pratique, informations très claires pour rejoindre l'appartement - A conseiller!
Lit confortable et propre dans un lieu permettant une liaison directe avec l’aéroport CDG. Un seul inconvénient : l’absence de TV . Mais très bon rapport qualité prix.
Très bon parti
Tout s est tres bien passe, merci dominique!
La chambre est spacieuse, avec un lit double confortable et une salle de bain privative. Le quartier est très calme, et Dominique est vraiment accueillant et disponible. Je recommande.
Hôte très gentil et disponible. La chambre dispose de tout le confort nécessaire avec sa propre salle de bain. Je recommande vivement.
Logement parfaitement situé, avec beaucoup de charme et d'authenticité. Terrasse petite mais très agréable le sour
Je recommande ce logement, qui est accessible et spacieux ! Merci encore
Je n'ai pas eu la chance de rencontrer Dominique, mais j'ai été accueillie par son amie Cécile que je remercie encore une fois! Je recommande cette chambre :)
Très belle chambre avec clim Hyper appréciable. Excellent accueil, sympathique et simple. Merci.

Dominique est une personne disponible et réactive à chaque message envoyé. Super accueil.
Chambre avec terrasse et salle de bain et une vue très sympa.
On ne manquera pas d’y retourner lors d’un prochain séjour sur Paris
Un loft végétal et un hôte musical, un régal pour passer un séjour à Paris !!!
logement calme bien qu'en centre ville à 2 pas du centre d'examen.
Accueil bienveillant et disponibilité de Dominique. Logement atypique à proximité de la maison des examens. Très bonne expérience.
Très bien.
Merci
Grande chambre avec balcon et salle de bain a-collé conforme aux photos. Dominique est très accueillant et disponible pour vous accueillir et vous conseiller.
Toujours aussi bien, idéal pour des concours ou des exams à passer à coté
Appart impeccable et très bien situé pour se rendre à Orly, on s'est juste croisé avec Dominique donc rien de plus à ajouter

Si vous passez un examen ou autre  à la  maison des examens, n'hésitez pas car c'est   tout près, idem pour l'arrivée par le  RER. Ambiance agréable et j'ai trouvé une petite oasis musicale très agréable...

La chambre est telle que décrite dans l'annonce. Elle est très confortable et calme. situation parfaite à proximité du RER, en quelques minutes dans Paris. Dominique est un hôte agréable et arrangeant. Nous nous sommes sentis bien chez lui et reviendrons avec plaisir !
Très bon accueil, conditions nickel rien à redire.
Parfait pour une étape à Paris ... Le RER est à peine 200m

Nous avons passé un merveilleux séjour dans le logement de Dominique, 
Je recommande !
Très bon logement avec tout ce qu'il faut ! Dominique est très serviable et très sympathique ! Je recommande fortement !

L'emplacement est parfait à 5min du RER B qui mène directement à Paris. Alors que je n'ai pas vu un message de Dominique pour l'heure d'arrivée il s'est arrangé pour m'accueillir quand même. Je recommande le lieu et l'hôte!
Cette chambre est tout a fait appropriée pour tous ceux qui passent un concours à la Maison des Examens (4 minutes à pied). L'accueil est chaleureux et la déco inspirante.

Idéalement situé pour passer un examen! 
Arrangeant. 
Merci !
très joli appartement style ancien atelier, avec balcon. Très calme. Proche du RER B et de la maison des examens. hôte accueillant et très arrangeant.
Hôte accueillant et lieu atypique avec une vrai âme, je recommande!
Séjour court mais très agréable ! Le logement est conforme aux photos et très charmant
Hébergement atypique, accueil très sympa, une adresse à retenir !Merci Dominique !

Logement conforme aux photos. Propre et sympathique. Endroit atypique, bon accueil de l'hôte. 
A noter : on passe directement dans la pièce de vie et de nuit de l'hôte, pour accéder à la chambre. Heureusement malgré une heure très matinale de retour au logement, Dominique a été très compréhensif.

la chambre est spacieuse. Avec une terrasse. 
l'accueil de Dominique est excellent
endroit charmant et calme

Dominique nous a très bien acceuillit. L'appartement a vraiment du charme et très musical. Nous avons adoré.
La chambre possède d'une salle de bain privative ainsi que d'une petite terrasse.
De plus il est très bien situé pour ce rendre au centre se Paris ou l'aéroport d Orly.
Conforme à la description. Proche de la Station du RER. Nous a proposé gentillement un café à notre départ
Bien
Très bon emplacement, joli logement, Dominique est très attentif et arrangeant, en plus d'être une personne fort sympathique!
Lieu original bien desservi depuis Paris et proche des transports en commun
Bon séjour chez Dominique, bon accueil et chambre sympathique
Grande réactivité de Dominique qui nous a réservé un accueil fort sympathique dans un lieu très agréable et dépaysant aux portes de Paris . À réserver sans hésiter !!
chambre très tranquille dans la douceur de la musique

Dans un quartier calme à deux pas du centre de Paris, ce bel appartement plein de charme, ancien atelier de sculpture devenu appartement ayant gardé toute son ambiance artistique est tenu par un hôte agréable et disponible. Le + : une terrasse, une salle de bain et de bons bouquins ! 
Je recommande :)
Bon accueil chez Dominique, simple et très convivial

C’était vraiment un bon moment qu’on a passé chez Dominique. Une super réception, Dani, sa sœur est super gentille et la localisation est super. Juste à côté de la station de tram. J’aimerais bien retourner chez Dominique la prochaine fois que je vais à Paris

Logement conforme à la description. Chambre à l’étage avec salle de bain! Dominique est très attentionné et s’assure que le séjour se passe dans les meilleurs condition. Pendant le séjour Dominique dort sur le canapé dans le salon ce qui peut faire bizarre toutefois je recommande sans réserve!
Dominique est un hôte chaleureux et accueillant. Son appartement est lumineux, propre et idéalement placé.
J'ai aimé l'appartement original, chambre et salle de bain impeccable, la petite terrasse qui donne sur les toits. Quartier calme. Merci à Dominique pour son accueil, facilité à une heure tardive.
Super accueil, nous a attendu malgré une arrivée très tardive, très gentil, jolie chambre, rien à dire!!
Séjour très agréable pour me rendre à mon concours à la maison des examens. Le logement est situé à 5min à pieds ! Dominique est très gentil, à l'écoute et disponible. Je recommande !
Dominique a été très accueillant et la chambre avec sdb qu'il propose est idéale pour être au calme entre deux épreuves d'un concours au Siec, qui est littéralement à 5min à pied.
Très bon accueil, un lieu charmant.

Il a été très gentil avec mon frère et moi. Vraiment, c’est très joli l’appartement. On l’aimait complètement. 
Je lui recommande.
Je recommande. Très propre. Très atypique.
Logement spacieux et très calme. J avais un concours à la maison des examens... 10 min à pied, top!!
Super chambre en pleine autonomie avec salle de bain et wc privatif, chauffage indépendant en plus de celui central, pour les concours c’est l’idéal.

Dominique est super sympa, très accueillant et très bien placer pour se déplacer partout dans Paris. Vous allez vous régaler si vous héberger chez lui.

Dominique is a great host and makes you feel very welcome. The accommodation is in the perfect place to be able to tram all over Paris. You won’t regret staying there in his cosy home.
Dominique est un hote très agréable et arrangeant!
Appartement en duplex, chambre à l'étage avec salle de bain attenante. Hôte accueillant et très arrangeant. Je le conseille.
Superbe séjour! Très beau loft , atypique et coket ! Je recommande super bien placé :)

Je recommande sans réserve le logement de Dominique pour sa proximité des transports en commun, son originalité et la beauté de la chambre. Je recommande Dominique pour son accueil chaleureux, sa disponibilité et sa passion pour son univers musical. Un vrai artiste!
La musique au cœur du logement. Un univers atypique.
Dominique est très prévenant et sympathique, la chambre est magnifique. J'y reviendrai avec plaisir
Très bon séjour chez Dominique, je recommande
Super séjour chez Dominique. Accueil chaleureux dans un appartement d'artiste, atypique, avec une chambre très agréable avec sa salle de bain privative (et la terrasse). Top donc !
Dominique est un très bon hôte : arrangeant, maison agréable, grande chambre et salle de bains propres, lit très confortable, à 5 minutes du RER. Je recommande !

J'ai passé un séjour très agréable chez Dominique.
Appartement très calme, et prêt de la station Laplace du RER B.
Il est très simple de se rendre au centre de Paris.
Merci encore Dominique pour tout!
Rien à dire. Bien reçu. Je recommande.
Très joli studio, bien placé et abordable. Dominique a été très réactif au téléphone et nous a bien accueilli
Parfait, rien à redire!

Dominique nous a bien reçu  tres sympa    
L endroit est calme  pres du rer b  chambre sympa mais  un peut encombrée  par des affaires personnelles  surtout la douche  
Un peut de froid la  nuit     entrée  qui traverse le petit studio     donc en gros pour un ou 2 jours c est pas mal

Dominique est un hôte très accueillant, la chambre et la salle de bain sont spacieuses et très propres. Le quartier, très calme, permet de bien se reposer. Dominique avait gentiment mis une bouilloire et du thé à notre disposition. Bref, je recommande ce logement.
nous avant eu un beau temp chez Dominique:-)

Chambre climatisée et stylée.
Le nom n’est pas marqué sur la boîte poste ni à la porte. Il faut verifier à l’hôte l’étage où la chambre se trouve.

Dominique est discret, tout en étant serviable et attentionné. Très bien situé près d'un rer et de la ville de Paris qui est très accessible. La pièce est très lumineuse et avec les volets ont peut dormir et s'y reposer.
Très confortable et jolie, je recommande!
C'était t Dominique est une personne intéressante, gentille et généreux. Sa maison est super cool, très bohémienne.
Very great . Very Nice person he is.

Dominique’s place is really cool with unique architecture. Lots of Windows ans light but there are also “volets”, descending blinds which allow you to sleep late should you choose. There is a nice roof-top patio next to the bedroom. We will certainly look at staying here again for our next trip to Paris. 

À recommander sans hésiter. :)
A great stay at Dominique’s place. Lovely room with its own bathroom, private balcony and probably the most comfortable bed I’ve slept in.  Highly recommended.
great stay! clean home and convenient location!
Cool
Dominique Is a great host. Always aware of us. He gave us many suggestions about how to move, to eat, etc.  He's place so confortable. Near the station and Easy to Reach.

Dominique is a very uncomplicated, friendly and easy going person! He recommended us a couple of good places and we loved his apartment, which is a unique mix of sound studio and museum, since you will see something new and fascinating around every corner. Thanks for having us!
everything was great! dominique is so friendly and thoughtful. the room is comfortable and we felt safe. highly recommend staying here for an affordable place outside of central paris!

Dominique was a perfect host, the previous communication was fluenty and and always helped us with the doubts about the location and near places of interest. The apartment was clean and had all the necessary things for a comfortable stay, also is quite  close to metro and bus stations (3min).  I highly  recommend this apartment !

샤를드골 공항에서 RER B로 가기가 쉬웠어요
가격에 비하여 편리하고 4층에 위치하고 베란다가 있어 시원함
무거운 짐으로 가기는 쉽지 않았음
Very accommodating and with good communication. Place is nice and a peaceful place. Would love to go back here again.

Zuhause eines Musikers wie er im Buche steht.
Die Dachwohnung war gemütlich mit schönem Blick über die Dächer Paries.
Gute Lage, denn Bahn und Bus sind in unmittelbarer Nähe auch das Zentrum ist grundsätzlich nicht weit und in 10 min mit den öffentl. Verkehrsmittel zu erreichen. 
Die Wohnung befindet sich im Obergeschoss von Dominiques Zuhause.  Das ist mal noch wahres airbnb.
Wir kommen gerne nochmal wieder.

I could say compliments to Dominique himself for days :) Not only he was perfectly friendly but his house is something that you won't see often in reality. Dominique has great taste in everything and of course particularly in music. Thank you very much for letting us play one of your acoustic guitars :) Also thank you very much for printing our tickets for the plane. Arcueil by the way is very convenient and close to Paris, you can simply walk down to the centre in up to an hour.
위치가 좋고 깨끗한 동네에 위치하고 있습니다. 저렴한 가격과 화장실이 함께 있어서 좋습니다. 더욱이 도메니끄가 굉장히 친절합니다. 다만 화장실 문이 아니고 커튼으로 되어있어서 초기 커플분들은 힘드실지도..ㅋㅋ
Dominique molto ospitale e disponibile! La posizione poco fuori dal centro permette di rilassarsi e comunque è ben collegata a tutto.

Dominique es un gran anfitrión, la habitación tiene mucho estilo y es muy confortable. Dominique estuvo siempre pendiente de que todo estuviera bien y dispuesto a ayudarnos en lo que necesitáramos. Gran anfitrión!
Great place and the most hospitable host!
He is super cool , the place is so comfortable and espacious  and he helped us so much, he made a us feel so good
Couldn't ask for a better experience ! Toooo good
老爷爷超级好!圣诞节还做饭给我们吃,就是来的时机不对,巴黎罢工出行不太方便

One of the best Airbnb experiences I ever got! Dominique is super cool and friendly. He plays great music. The room is so beautiful and well decorated. You can tell that this is a place full of stories at the first sight. 

We ran into the strike so public transportation doesn’t work so well. But its location is quite near RER B station. Very convenient if you come staying when there’s no strike! 

It’s been an amazing experience. I definitely recommend this place to everyone. 

Dominique超级酷,也非常热情｡地址在巴黎近郊,离市中心的绝对距离其实不远｡这里是他的音乐工作室+家,房间在二楼,一走进感觉像是来到了电影场景里~非常可爱的体验,如果避开罢工来就好了｡
很希望和Dominique再聊聊天哈哈哈哈｡
总之,五星好评!
Dominique’s place was great. Close to the station and had a wonderful patisserie shop down the street. He was very kind and we enjoyed our stay.
Great space, lovely stylish room. Would definitely recommend

El lugar tiene imágenes y decoraciones escalofriantes, la cama es dura. Al llegar Dominique nos recibió muy amablemente, es músico y toca bien pero la última noche estuvo tocando hasta tarde y batallamos un poco para dormir.
Clean, beautiful, easy to check in! If the strikes weren’t happening, it would have been an ideal place to stay for longer. If you’re lucky you’ll get to hear some live music!
Great stay.  No problems.  Nice room.
Dominique has a wonderful room like an atelier really cosy, that he rents out. I stayed there for some days, I can only warmly recommend this place.
Great place to stay when visiting Paris.
Muy bueno, amable y de confianza.

El alojamiento de Dominique tiene la mejor ubicación en una zona muy bella y tranquila , la habitación es muy funcional y tiene todos los servicios, Dominique estuvo al tanto de nosotros , nos dió información en todo momento, muy recomendado.

I wish I had more time to spend with Dom! He welcomed us in with music, offered me ginger and lemon when I needed a warm drink for my cold, told us about his days with the Gipsy Kings, and played us more music as we walked out after check out. Dom is a fascinating person and a great host and you should totally stay at his place if you're near Paris!

This place is super cool and has a great view. The room itself has a nice little balcony. The automatic blinds are amazing and very convenient!
2 things to note: the room has no lock from the outside. And I’m guessing the bedroom is the hosts, not a spare, so there’s a lot stuff in the room. Overall, I was very comfortable here. He was very polite and kind.

Lovely quiet little spot that I crashed at one night after attending my friend's wedding. Only briefly met Dominique in the early morning when I got back, but he seemed like a friendly host! The downstairs is mostly his studio space and guests can use the upstairs bedroom and bathroom with good privacy. Provides a comfortable home-like vibe while travelling if you are a creative person or used to hanging out in the homes of creative people.

El alojamiento esta muy bien ubicado y tiene mucho estilo, sobre todo si te gusta el arte. Dominique es una excelente persona y estuvo preocupado porque estuvieramos comodos todo el tiempo. Un lugar totalmente recomendado.

Dominique was a wonderful host.
Location of the place was not far from Laplace Train Station ( RER B ).....walking distance about 5 min.
We added value to our Navigo Decouverte  Passes & took the Train  from CDG Airport.
We didnt mind that it is on the 3rd floor & no lift.
There is a Bakery in the corner where we bought Brioche &  Croissants for Breakfast  & some desserts.
We enjoyed our stay and will come back again.

Dominique was a thoughtful host, and very quick to communicate excellent directions to his place, which was easy to get to. Get off the train, walk one block slightly uphill, turn left, right, easy. His place is on the first floor, above the ground floor, and the room is up one more flight, so there are three flights of stairs to the bedroom. The room has a lovely terrace, a big comfortable firm bed, a very nice and clean bathroom, and a desk to sit at, make your tea, etc. I had a lovely stay, and I'd happily stay there again. It was very convenient for getting to an early train the next morning. Many thanks to Dominique!

Listen if you want a truly authentic stay Jamie's place is to die for . Jamie himself is a musician and isn't shy sharing his tunes in the evening. There is a balcony you can sit out on and eat your pastries as the wife and I did. It's bear the RER, which makes access into Paris easy. I can not stress it enough if you want authentic and not commercialized this is the place to go!!!

Dominique's house is not far from public transportation, we come a bit early and he welcoming us very good. The room is so good and like bohemian charm. The most we like is we can listening to Dominique when he playing the music.
很好 小区特别舒服

Lieber Dominique, danke für einen wunderschönen Paris-Aufenthalt. Von Beginn an hat alles sehr zuverlässig geklappt und wir fühlten uns bestens aufgehoben bei Dir. Tolle Kommunikation und herzliche Gastgeberschaft inklusive. Gerne beim nächsten Paris-Trip wieder!
It was a short stay but very pleasant. Would recommend it 100%
Dominique’s place was lovely and artistic! The balcony was very nice and he really thought of everything to make our stay nice, even including an outlet converter.
If you want a value for money place to stay, close to both Paris and Orly airport this is the place to stay
nice location, nice host, nice bedroom
El departamento bien ubicado, en una zona segura, un buen lugar para alojarse, nos tocó que Cecile nos atienda y todo fue excelente
The location is near to the station Laplace. It is very convenient to go to center paris and the CDG airport by taking the train of line RER B.

It was very warm and homely place. Special thanks to Dominique to allow us to have early check-in. Easily connected to main city, very near metro station. We loved our stay there, specially the small terrace and the kitchen
Very lovely hosts, situated in a nice location near public transport
Recomendamos 100% este alojamiento. Dominique fue un excelente anfitrión, muy cordial y atento. La habitación estaba limpia, cómoda y bien decorada, además cuenta con un excelente vista.
너무 친절하시고 테라스 뷰도 너무 예뻤습니다! 엘레베이터가 없어서 짐 옮기는게 힘들었지만 거의 다 도와주셨어요!! 정말 친절하시고 방도 아기자기 예쁩니다!

Лучше место ever! Интересная атмосферная квартира. Очень уютная. Понравится любителям музыки. 
Доминик очень гостпериимный хозяин.
Дом расположен в тихом районе во 2 транспортной зоне Парижа. Пара минут пешком до станции RER. С RER легко пересесть на метро и добраться в любую часть города. Рекомендую брать билеты Mobilis или Visite для безлимитных поездок на любом транспорте.
Very near from “La Placé” train station from there you can get to any Main place in Paris, Dominique is a very kind person!
Eu e meu noivo passamos três dias na casa de Dominique. A hospitalidade dele e de Cecile foram ótimas! O quarto estava bem arrumado e o local tem fácil acesso ao trem metropolitano.

La casa de Dominique estaba impecable. Todo estaba limpio y todo fue según lo puesto en la publicación.
Dominique estaba de viaje al realizar nuestra estadía pero Cecile fue excelente con nosotros.
Recomendable.
We couldn't meet him, but Cecile was kind and she took our baggage to the station.
여러분들도 꼭 가보셨으면 좋겠네요

집주인분께서 굉장히 친절하십니다.
복층으로 이루어진 공간을 사용할 수 있어 답답함이 없습니다.
에어컨이 구비되어 있어 쾌적합니다.
다만, 이미 비치되어 있는 물건들이 다소 많아 본인의 소지품과 헷갈릴 수 있으니까 각별한 주의가  필요합니다.

아무 생각 없이 숙소 잡았었는데 공항에서부터 환승 없이 올 수 있다는 점이 매우 큰 장점이었어요 집 찾아가기도 쉽고요 호스트가 매우 친절하게 방 전체를 설명해줍니다 계단이 많다는거 빼면 그럭저럭 좋았어요 근데 방에 개미가 있어서 바닥에 캐리어 펼쳐놨더니 캐리어에 개미 다 꼬여가지고 다음 도시에서도 개미때문에 개고생함 ㅜㅜ 옷 사이에 죽어있고 .. 참고하세여
Great location! Dominque was an amazing host would definitely come back:)

Dominique always answered to my questions very quickly, was helpful and understanding. He provided us a clean, well-equipped apartment, in which I and my boyfriend could really feel the “French lifestyle”. He lives in a nice, quiet neighborhood which is quite well accessible from the city. Dominique himself is a friendly, open-minded person, who takes care of his guests and even provides further help if it’s necessary for you without a question. I personally loved staying there because of Dominique’s and his home’s really good vibes, it was very homey, and we really enjoyed staying there.

Melhor anfitrião, além de ser uma ótima pessoa, se empenhar ao máximo pra lhe ajudar, ainda traz o espírito de Paris pra sua estadia com suas belas músicas... Indico a todos.. Vai fazer sua viagem ficar com mais cara de Paris..
Encanto bohemio

Really easy transport links and a few minutes from a shopping centre. The apartment itself was as described, a little messy but to be expected for a lived in apartment.  We really enjoyed our stay and would recommend this apartment. There was a great view from the balcony!

He was always heads up for any messages so comunication was great. Its warm in summer but nothing that his air conditioning cant fix! The little terrace is great for an afternoon tea and also check the surroundings of the neighbourhood
Lovely stay! The shower was confusing so make sure to ask upfront about that.

Dominique is a great host. He was very helpful with local information. We even went to dinner to experience some real French cuisine on my last evening. 
It was like visiting a friend.

Excellent value for a trip to Paris. Very short walk to train which takes you into the center of Paris in ~20 mins. Dominique is very kind and offered me suggestions for food and things to do in his neighborhood.

Dominique is a great Airbnb host. He goes out of his way to make sure you feel comfortable. Great checkin process, he’s kind, and his place is in a great location (5 minute walk from la place metro station). You can also take the train straight from the airport to his place without transferring train lines. GREAT VALUE.

Buena ubicación, si bien no está en París el metro está muy cerca y el acceso es muy sencillo. Zona bonita con opciones de comida a buen precio. La panadería mas cercana es verdaderamente deliciosa también hay un supermercado. La habitación es muy cómoda y el anfitrión adorable

Dominique was an excellent host who had everything ready for us when we arrived (he even ran the aircon to cool down the room before arrival).  He's a very relaxed and accommodating host and we enjoyed our stay.

I was a bit nervous because this was my first BNB. Dominique was very welcoming. He had a jug of cool water waiting for us in our room, which was very welcome on the hot afternoon of our arrival. 
The restaurant he suggested was great! Our favourite for our time in Paris! 
HIs home is a bit of a commute from the main tourist areas, but nice and quiet. The patio was a nice spot for breakfasts. The local bakery was nice too. We were comfortable walking there from the train, even in the evenings.
Dominique was a great help with transit information. We had a LOT of issues with trains. Maybe just bad timing, maybe because we aren't used to using public transit. Dominique was very helpful and even printed off directions for us once when we were really at a loss for how to get where we needed to be. ( (Hidden by Airbnb) maps would only give directions that included a train station in Paris that was not in service for repairs! Dominique found us ways to bus around it.)
I would definitely choose to stay there again if I am back in the area.
Dominique’s place is well located about 3 minutes from the Metro , besides he is a great musician who will play Piano or guitar for you. He also went out of his way to help me.

The place was wonderful, nice views of the surrounding area from the balcony. Great value and a good location, only a 5 minute walk from the RER and around the corner from a very nice bakery. We would stay here again.

Dominique is a great host, very easy to communicate with. The place is very nice and very private, it was a comfortable bed, a private bathroom and a nice view. It's located in a quite neighborhood and very close to a RER station that connects directly to the Charles de Gaulle airport. We had a pleasant time at Dominique's!

Loved this Airbnb! It had everything we needed for a quick stay before flying out of CDG the next day, and especially loved that it was a very short walk to RER. Comfy bed, strong wifi, AC. Dominique was very flexible about check in time and so welcoming. He’s a kind, friendly soul and we absolutely loved listening to him make music downstairs!
Dominique is so nice and he sings well. And the location is so good.

Dominique is very kind. The village is outside París, but worth the Time because Arcueil is gorgeous. The location Is great. Just 2 blocks away from the subway, 15 mins to París.  The room has great terrace where you can have your own bohemian night with wine and music. 

We had a great time!
Domenique es un buen anfitrión.. Muy bohemio.. Es músico. Pero no afecta tu tranquilidad
Dominique was amazing with great recommendations for local restaurants

Dominique is an amazing host. He is extremely  approachable with whatever help is required. The place is as listed just that the bathroom space does not have a door and there are too many stuff in the bathroom which might be a problem for Indian travellers. If that is not a problem then the place is highly recommended especially because of Dominique who is a very friendly and warm person.

Dominique’s place is in a perfect location, on the same train line as the airport and main train station as well as the line into the centre of Paris. A short walk 5 minutes from the station. Dominique was very accommodating, we arrived late at night and left very early in the morning which he didn’t mind.  We had a lovely stay, it was clean, spacious and had lots of character. Would definitely recommend to anyone wanting to visit Paris, great value for money.

Great stay! Dominique is very friendly, fast to communicate and a very talented musician. He even gave us an impromptu performance :-). The room was big and comfy, and the AC unit was very much welcome in these hot days. Location is very close to Laplace station and there is a lovely boulangerie (aux délices d’Arcueil) nearby for a quick breakfast. Would definitely stay again!
Would not stay while construction is going on

Wow, what a beautiful place near Paris! Cecile was marvelous in helping us while Dominique was away. We really loved this spot and it was a close train ride to the city. I would love to stay here again and meet Dominique. His flat was fantastic and very hospitable. Thank you!

El apartamento es cerca a una estación, supermercados, es seguro. El apartamento tiene todo lo que necesitas es muy limpio y tranquilo. Dominique y Cecile siempre estuvieron pendiente de colaborarnos en todo lo que necesitamos.

Dominique is a great host. He is very friendly and accommodating. He gives great tips and communicates well. This place is so close from the metro which is very convenient. I recommend this place if you are looking for an alternative to an expensive hotel. It is just outside Paris, so it is noticeably quieter than the city.

This accommodation is the best place in Paris if you’re traveling under budget, considering the value and the location.
Dominique was so helpful and very responsive to our messages, and in my opinion he’s a great host same as being a great musician

We enjoyed our stay at Dominique's place mid April. He was a very accomodating host and communicates very well in english. His flat is located in a safe neighborhood, which is near the metro station, good if you're staying out late.
Ben raggiungibile dai servizi, zona tranquilla.

Dominique is a great host always willing to answer any questions or problems you may have. The apartment is close to the metro and restaurants within 5 min walking distance. Space is in a quiet neighbourhood the room is warm and comes with a balcony terrace. Highly recommend when staying in Paris on a budget. I suggest visiting Le Ptit Bistro for good authentic French food nearby.

Dominique is amazing! This place is fantastic. It’s so close to everything. We took a one hour walk to Paris and were so enchanted with everything we saw. He also gave us two recommendations to eat that were phenomenal—definitely check out le petit bistrot which is a 5 minute walk away. Dominique greeted us with coffee and amazing music. This was my first experience with an AirBnB and it set the standard so high. His house is filled with so many beautiful pieces of art and Knick knacks. We super appreciated the black out shutters as we were jet lagged and he was so flexible with our check out so we could go eat. Definitely will be back. And this neighbourhood is underrated. Beautiful and quiet and right by the RER making the trip to the airport quick.
Quarto confortável, não tive nenhum tipo de problema, anfitrião prestativo é o bairro é agradável também.

Although we only stayed at Dominique's place for one night, it was a great experience! He was flexible with check-in and check-out arrangements, which we really appreciated. His instructions and communication were very clear, and he welcomed us warmly. We also enjoyed the music he played during the day! The room was clean and spacious, and his place is located close to an RER station just outside Paris. We would recommend staying at his house, thanks Dominique!
Dominique é um ótimo anfitrião, muito atencioso e nossa hospedagem foi perfeita. Ótimas musicas e uma bela localização com metro e mercados próximos. Recomendado sempre.

Dominique helped us out at the very last moment when we couldn't reach our first Airbnb host. We were very much welcome. The apartment is very cosy and the interesting chat and music performance is for free :) highly recommendable!

Dominique was very friendly and gave me some tips to go around the city, 10 out of 10 for him.

Amazing and super clean place, very well located, only a few minutes away from the Train station Gare de Laplace, again, 10 out of 10 for the place. 

If you want a good place to stay in a quiet part of the city with good transport options i will recommend this place one and hundred times  !!

Es un lugar tranquilo para descansar,  con una buena vista y buena calefacción.  Cuenta con estación de transporte cerca y es muy importante porque se debe tomar siempre transporte cuando se quiera ir a Paris. El sitio es bastante cerca del aeropuerto Orly.
Tuve problemas de avión y llegue al día siguiente de mi reserva pero Dominique se portó cual caballero al ayudarme en todo

The place is about 10 minutes walk from Laplace RER Station and can be easily found on G-map. It has all the grocery stores nearby. 
The room was quite small and I felt it was a bit clumsy because of those exercise machines. It appeared to be a store room by first look but I was on a bag packing mode so I didn't think much of the room. Just came there and slept. 
Dominique is a good host, and he really sings pretty good. You can find many musical instruments in his house. 

Overall it was a good place to spend nights.
Cerca del metro, su ubicación es lo mas destacable.
Excelente anfitrión, sin dudas la mejor experiencia que tuve desde que uso Airbnb
Dominiqueに会えなかったのは残念でしたが､Dominiqueのsisterが対応してくれました｡とても優しい人でした!朝早く出発するときも､起きて見送ってくれました｡部屋もとても綺麗で写真通りでした｡階段が少し大変でしたが､全て良かったです!ありがとうございます､
Es un ambiente cálido, con todo a la mano. Los anfitriones siempre muy atentos y amables.

This is place is good for the price. Dominique was pretty nice about time and check in, also advices about trains (it’s really important, since in France is so confuse how to get trains). The problem for us was the bathroom, so small and the shower or so hot or so cold. It’s kind of confuse know what we can use, because there’s so many things over there. But it’s pretty close of one station and the bed is comfortable.
Nice Apartment with good connection to Paris downtown. :)
Dominique is friendly and speaks fluent English. His apartment is quirky and comfortable,  also very well located at 5 mins walk from Laplace RER B station.
Thanks, Dominique! Your place is amazing. Dominique has always been a disposition. He helped me every moment than I needed. I recommend his place!
距離較遠｡

Room was spacious and close to the train, very bright and full of precious, colorful, things. It was bigger than I expected. When I arrived in Paris there was at first a train issue but Dominique quickly responded asking if he could help. When I got there he explained where everything was, told me where to get snacks. I stayed only one night but he reassured me I could ask any questions. He is a fantastic host!
Excelente atención, el lugar muy lindo, fácil acceso a trenes hasta el centro de Paris. Ujna muy linda experiencia Airbnb
el lugar es muy limpio, es un excelente anfitrión , te ayuda en lo que necesitas, y es extremadamente servicial , totalmente recomendable
beautiful place and an amazing host. I would recommend him to everyone
도미니크가 너무 친절했고, 숙소 찾아가는데도 무리가 없었습니다. 의사소통이 원활했으며, 우리를 배려해주는 마음이 느껴졌습니다. 침구에섫약깐쉰내?가졲끔났엃엻 그것뺅곤좋았엃욜

Dominique is an amazing host, the place is in a very nice zone, which feels safe, quiet and far from the busy center but at the same time near to a RER station so you can reach main monuments or attractions in Paris in around half hour. Also, there are restaurants and markets for groceries at a minimum walking distance from his place. Totally recommended.

A casa do Dominique é muito bacana. Só que tem muitas escadas. Para quem está de mala não é recomendável.. melhor para mochileiros. a escada para subir até o quarto é muito íngreme e estreita. Foi bem difícil para subir e descer. Mas o quarto é igual a descrição. Tem aquecedor.. chuveiro quente e fica perto das linhas de trem. Muito confortável a cama e bem quentinha para o frio. E Dominique é muito simpático, educado e ele e sua mulher são cantores maravilhosos e simpáticos.
Dominique was very kind and willing to offer a great stay. His place is well located, a few blocks from de Metro station.
Nice place by Dominique who is very hospitable.
He is a musician and there is often music playing but it’s not too loud and doesn’t go too late

he pasado muy buena estancia en París, muy cerca del centro con una estación del RER a muy pocos metros. Dominique es muy amable amanece de la música y te explica mucho sobre como moverte. el barrio es muy tranquilo sin ruidos
Excelente persona... muy hospitalario... y siempre dispuesto  a ayudar... 100 % recomendado

Really easy to get to from the centre of Paris. Dominique was a fantastic host, really helpful. The apartment was beautiful, had a lot of personality. The bed was so comfortable, we slept so well there.

El apartamento de Dominique está ubicado en una excelente zona
, de fácil acceso al tren y llegas a los principales atractivos turísticos en menos de 20 minutos. 
Dominique es muy cool !! nos tocó escuchar su música y es muy bonita.
Super recomendado!
Freindly and kind host :)
Very clean and cute space outside the city center
Cool loft outside of Paris! Lots of character!
Nice cozy place, not too far from the city centre. Dominique was very nice and flexible!

Dominique is a great host.  Everyday he asked if everything was fine and told us to let him know if we needed anything.  His house is a great place as it's very close to the metro station.  What made me feel like I was home was the smile he had everytime we walked in his house. Also, the one day we overslept he immediately got on his phone to try and arrange transportation for us not to miss a tour.  He made us feel welcomed  shared his work with us and even sang us a song.  Thank you for everything Dominique
Отличный интерьер, очень гостеприимный хозяин, есть все необходимое и даже больше! Удобная кровать! Замечательное расположение, удобно добираться до Парижа.
Es un lugar especial a las afueras de Paris.

Dominique is very kind and has a charming apartment outside of Paris. Very easy to get into the city and VERY easy to get to CDG airport. Take a bit, but it's a straight shot. Perfect place to stay if you're looking a bit outside of Paris.
Excelente , volvería a hospedarme ahí si vuelvo a París.
Really nice place to stay. The neighborhood area feel safe. Close to RER B train station. Dominique is super nice !

Es un cuarto bastante privado y muy espacioso. Tiene todo, calefacción, una buena ducha, buen baño y mucha agua. Caliente y fría. La cama es cómoda y tienes espejos para poder arreglarte. Para una o dos personas es bastante cómodo.

Dominique was a wonderful host. He accommodated to our needs and even let us check in when it was late at night. The room has a really nice, artsy touch to it which we really liked. He also gave very clear instructions on how to get to his place. Would definitely come back again if we were to stop in Paris in the future! Thanks Dominique!

Dominique's place is quite stylish and rustic, with lovely views and nice decorations. Dominique was lovely and a very accomodating host, and the place is in a great location near the RER B train station.

excelente lugar sobre un distrito muy tranquilo el metro está súper cerca y a los viajeros que vengan o pasen más de dos días les recomiendo adquirir el metro Paris Navigo pour 28 euros y una foto infantil  disfrutan el metro en todas las zonas hasta Disneyland, aeropuertos, Versalles durante una semana no se limiten que si está un poco lejos en verdad teniendo un pase de metro así todo es más cerca y rápido claro no olviden su wifi portátil o internet para saber las conexiones en metro

Muy buena ubicación para moverte del aeropuerto y al centro de paris súper cerca , y en el tren ren súper barato , solo estuvimos una noche y fue muy bueno ya que la ubicación es perfecta y el anfitrión muy amable
Dominique is very nice and the room had everything we needed. It was clean and comfortable. There are restaurants em metro stations just a few steps away from the building.

Dominique is a great person and host. I like his place very much. The location is very much convenient travelling by RAR to Paris. If I will go back to Paris again, his place definitely will be my first choice.

Yo recomiendo 100% este alojamiento, nos dio todas las facilidades, nos ayudó mucho y nos sentimos muy acogidos. La pieza era maravillosa, mucho mejor que como la imaginaba y tenía todo lo necesario para tener una buena estadía.

Dominique was an amazing host. He was great. He provided us with great suggestions on where to go and how to get there. Check in was great he was always available, heater in room was great for chilly weather. Loved the balcony for fresh air. Overall a nice environment. He let us leave our luggage on check out day go hang out come back hang at his place up until it was time to go to airport! Thank you

good and superhost. responded well when I asked about local tips. he also was flexible with check in and check out time. the room is very special with its own balcony and nice bathroom as well as small gym in the room.

Gracias Diminique , me sentí muy cómoda durante nuestra estadía, nos ayudaste mucho y eso lo valoramos y agradecemos. Me encanto tu preocupación y esmero para que estemos bien . La zona linda y tranquila, muy cerca al tren. Gracias totales
Nos hemos sentido muy a gusto en casa de Dominique, es un anfitrión muy agradable e intenta ayudar en todo.
La experiencia fue excelente , resaltamos su amabilidad , disposición en todo momento y la limpieza de su casa , muy recomendable .

Su hospitalidad lo vale todo!
Para los que les gusta ver todo muy ordenado pues tal vez no les guste

Dominique's place was clean and comfortable, and located very close to an RER station so it's easy and quick to get to and from central Paris. Dominique was welcoming, helpful and responsive to messages. Would definitely recommend!
Close to many food shops.
Super good location..beautiful apartment full of character.. dom was super welcoming too! P.s comfortable bed!

Nice small room for 2 in Laplace (do note its slightly out the Paris Zone, so dont take the 10 tickets pass and instead get the train passes from Laplace station. 
Pro; Affordable, good host, decent room, 
Con: No bathroom doors

Dominique‘s airbnb liegt etwas außerhalb von Paris ist aber wirklich leicht und schnell erreichbar! Es ist für Reisende zu empfehlen die Paris besuchen wollen aber trotzdem etwas Ruhe brauchen. 
Wir kommen gerne wieder!
Great stay! We would recommend !
Great communication, hospitality and very clean, what more could you ask for!
Dominique’s place is perfect for 2 people and he is great as well  transportation is quite feasible from where he stays

I was traveling solo and only staying for 2 nights at Dominique's flat. When I was checking-in on my first night, it was a bit confusing where the entrance to the building was (like another reviewer had mentioned), but Dominique quickly answered his phone and told me how to get in. As I came in, he was still cleaning the apartment... He apologized and said he didn't want to rush the previous guests out, so that was why he was delayed. So I just had to awkwardly wait around while he finished cleaning. The next day and night there was fine.

BUT, on my last morning there, I was woken up around 7 in the morning by Dominique calling me, and asking if I could let his next airbnb guests in... he was staying at a friend's place, and had apparently messaged his next guests at 1am the night before, telling them they wouldn't be able to check-in until after 11am (the allotted time I had to check-out by).  They received his message while en route, and far too late for them to delay their travels. So, they were now waiting outside of his flat. It was VERY awkward, and I felt INCREDIBLY uncomfortable letting them in. Once I let them in, I went back to bed - since I did have a right to stay a few more hours until my check-out time of 11am. But, I was woken up AGAIN by some yelling going on downstairs between Dominique and said guests! So I inevitably gave up on sleeping, and just packed up and checked-out before 11am.

Moral of the story? If you decide to stay at Dominique's, I highly suggest you triple-check with him the check-in and check-out times you two agreed upon, so you don't have to experience this for yourself.
Eclectic space not too far from the metro stop! The balcony is an amazing space to relax and Dom was really nice! Thanks for everything!!
Dominique was a good host, it was a pleasant experience staying at La place.

We had a great stay at Dom’s place despite a slight problem getting in at first. The location is great, Laplace station (if you want to get into Paris) is very close as well as the presence of restaurants and greengrocers round the corner. We didn’t see Dom very much which gave us a lot more privacy than expected which was welcomed. However, when we did need him, he was just a phone call away and very helpful. Overall, we would recommend his place as it enables you to see a more authentic side to Paris in its suburbs.

The room was charming and comfortable but Dom was not as responsive as he should have been. Dom lives there usually but was away. I was left waiting at 10:30 at night though he knew full well I was getting there late and said it was absolutely fine and had left me instructions to call his neighbour. His neighbour didn’t respond either for a while. When he did and we met he was a genuinely lovely man. I thought it kind to send Dom a message thanking him when I left. I didn’t want to make too much of being kept waiting and I had slept well and enjoyed the room. But he didn’t respond to this and I thought this was amiss and left a sour taste.

Dominique’s place was not just cozy and lovely but well located too! 
It’s located in a nice quiet residential area which is just 5 min walk from the station, from there it’s very easy to get to central Paris and CDG. Since I spent 2 nights earlier in super noisy area in the city i really enjoyed peaceful nights on a large comfy bed :) Thanks again Dominique and Dany!

Dominique's place is so lovely! AC is amazing, bed was made and the room is perfectly clean. WiFi is available, as well as tea in the morning. We were met in person by Dominique's sister who was super friendly and lovely to us, making it the perfect final accomodation stop of our trip. Would definitely recccomend!

Muy buen anfitrión,  llegamos a las 9 de la mañana y nos dejo pasar a la habitación aun siendo tan pronto e interesándose por ayudar en todo.  
La casa esta muy cerca de una parada  de tren que en diez minutos estás en el centro y comunica directamente  con el aeropuerto. 
La casa tiene mucho encanto con la. Música.  Lo recomiendo

La casa de Dominique es muy acogedora, y él es un tipo tranquilo y muy amable que te facilita mucho las cosas y siempre dispuesto a ayudar. Lejos del centro para ir andando pero al lado del RER B (cercanías) que te deja en la Catedral de Notre Dame en 20 minutos. Si volviera a París repetiría estancia con Dominique, gracias por todo.

Nice little place :). Very good location, you can find there some grocery stores and also RER B station. We would recommend it to everyone, especially to the music lovers cause Dominique is musician. :)

The house is spacious and unique. It is much closer to the metro station than I expected which is very convenient to get to the city center. Dominique is so nice and friendly. I really enjoy listening his music. It reminds me that I'm still in Paris when I'm just staying in the room.

Dominique was so kind and hospitable. His place was so cool, with so many instruments and lovely music playing all the time! We were only there for one night, it was perfect and the AC definitely helped during hot July.

It is located in 2nd zone of Paris. There are some bakeries and supermarkets close to the apartament. Dominique was a great host, he even gave to us a bottle of wine when we arrived! Overall, his apartment is very unique and you can expect a real french experience!
Dominique was a nice host. I only stayed one night leaving from CDG the next day. The room had AC which helps for the hot Paris summers. The terrace is nice too.
Lugar muy acogedor, con un host atento. Además está a 15 minutos del centro de París en tren. 100% recomendado.

Great location as it’s only 15 minutes to city of Paris.
Dominique is a fantastic guy!!!! Really lovely and loves his place. Unfortunately it’s not that tidy and the communication on location is not the best! Hard to find
Dominique was very nice and provided many useful information to us!

The room is very spacious with good amount of storage,  awesome bed, get so dark with all the curtains closed, which I loved so much. It's very close to RER B subway. Dominique is a really nice person and very communicative. I highly recommend this to anyone.
Fabulous stay; Dominique has an incredible space and wonderful hospitality!
De lo mejor!
It's a great Parisian house. The house hasany stories to tell and is rich in history. Great location in a quiet neighborhood. Very close to Laplace train station. Dominique is a good host.
Dominique is very accomodating & replies to my queries in timely manner. His loft is cozy.
Very near to metro.Perfectly fine for Paris trip.

My husband and I stayed at Dominique's for 6 nights. The room is nice with private bathroom and toilet. His place is close to Laplace station. There is a nice boulangerie nearby for breakfast and many restaurants near the station. It's about 40-45 mins from CDG airport. Dominique was a great host, there were some issues with shower, which he fixed it next day itself.

Dominique's place is fantastic! It's close to the metro station and from there it's really easy to travel to Paris! The room is stylishly decorated with a lot of cool stuff and the little balcony is nice too. The only downside was that the shower didn't work to great, but that's really all. All in all: we had a great stay!

La casa es muy acogedora y cómoda, nos sentimos cómodos.
 Fuimos muy bien recibidos. Todo estaba limpio y en condiciones.
Dominique fue muy amable con nosotros y se esforzó en ayudarnos a pesar de que no háblanos el mismo idioma. 
Estábamos un poco alejados del centro pero en el metro llegamos a todos lados rápidamente, es fácil ubicarse. 
Recomendamos el lugar!!!
Really friendly and helpful. Close to metro station and shopping mall. I wish every Host was like Dominique!

Dominique's place is a little gem, it feels like stepping into a different universe. Dominique was very considerate, and coming to the room at night felt like coming home, had everything I could need. I also loved the book collection, it added even more to the cosy feeling of the place. The neighbourhood is very calm, and very close to the RER & bus station to go pretty much anywhere (Around 20min to Paris). Would most certainly recommend, and will be looking forward to going back there some day!

It was a great stay at Dominique’s place.the place is really stylish with all the amenities including a private bathroom. In fact you get the entire floor with a private terrace as well. 
An absolutely  recommended place.
I enjoyed staying in Dominique's apartment. The room is large and  comfortable. Dominique is very friendly and helped me a lot.  I felt at home and I would very much recommend this place.

Our stay was great! Dominique was very kind and personable, and sent his neighbors to meet us on our first night since he had a concert. The apartment is lovely - lots of plants and light, and hearing the music from downstairs was so nice. It’s only 5 minutes from the Laplace RER stop, too, which was very convenient.
Dominique was an excellent host! The apartment was located only a short train ride to the centre of Paris so value for money is spot on here. Highly recommended.
Dominique’s a great guy and a great place
Sehr netter unkomplizierter Gastgeber. Hat sofort auf Anfragen reagiert. Mir hat auch die Vorstadt Atmosphäre mit guter Stadtbahn Anbindung gefallen. Gerne wieder.
We love the room because its spacious and has balcony and private bathroom. It's near the train station and a mall. Dominique is also accommodating. The house is easy to find as well.

This place is amazing, and honestly it was our dream apartment. There’s a lot of charm to the place, and the bed is super big and comfy! Dominique was very accommodating and rushed down to meet us and made us some hot water and tea as we had just walked down from the train station in the rain. The train station is also very close, so it wasn’t a hassle to get to the house. Overall, definitely recommend staying here! There’s also a Franprix about a 6 minute walk away if you want to get some snacks!

We enjoyed staying in Dominique's quaint apartment, it was very comfortable and we felt very much at home. The room was large with a nice big window and a balcony, the bathroom was great, lots of hot water and a tub! Dominique was a very sweet host, we were very lucky to hear some of his music as well as listen to a female vocalist with a lovely voice. This was the perfect experience for us...very real!

Super Unterkunft für Low-Budget-Reisen! Die Wohnung hat wirklich Flair, Dominique ist sehr zuvorkommend, und mit dem RER ist man in einer Viertelstunde im Zentrum von Paris. Nur Reisende, die viel Wert auf Privatsphäre legen, sind hier eher falsch, da das Zimmer recht hellhörig zum Wohnzimmer ist, wo Dominique schläft, wenn er Gäste hat. Dafür hat man oft musikalische Untermalung ;) Danke für den sympathischen Aufenthalt!

Dominique is an amazing host. After the first step in his appartment you know that he is a real musician :) he showed us the room and helped us with anything he could. While we were having dinner he was producing music. The atmosphere was superb. The place is 5 mins away from the metro station. And you reach the centre in 20 to 25 mins. I totally recommend this place.

Adoramos estar no lar de Dominique.
Um ambiente agradável e muito amável.
Como bom músico que é nos agraciou com belas canções!
Adoramos muito e entramos no clima de Paris na melhor forma.
能够在巴黎当地居住是一段很棒的经历｡多米尼克老爷爷人很友善,演奏的音乐也很好听｡卧室空间大,舒适,整洁｡希望他未来一切都好｡
Dominique is a great host! He is very thoughtful, nice and caring. The bedroom is very cozy, warm and with your own privacy. Location is good as well. I highly recommend to stay with Dominique.
Located in a good locality. Closed to metro.Good hospitality

Very warm and nice host. The house is very quiant, just as I thought París would be. Is clean, welcoming and Dominique helped me with my cold. The room is private and has lovely windows and terrace. 

Definitely a parisian home to stay and have a nice rest.
Excelente hospitalidad, muy cercana a transporte público, todo es muy limpio.
Ótima localização, perto de metrô e ele foi muito simpático e prestativo. Recomendo.

Dominique's place is outstanding value for the price. A homely, considered and well provisioned space, conveniently located not far from the metro in a nice neighborhood, there is little more you could ask for in Paris.  Dominique is a great host, there to help, easy going and something of a legend. Highly recommend.

Dominique’s house is one of the best places from all of my Airbnb experiences. The place is very close to transportation which can leads you directly to the center and airports. The place is kind secluded from street so that it is quiet for us to have rest. The great parts about the place is the house itself. It is very artistic that it has many music instruments and art decorations. Also, since my friend is studying piano performance, she is very fascinated with the house. In addition, the house has everything we need which makes us feel like living at home, like cooking by ourselves and feeding the cute cat. More importantly, Dominique is really an amazing host that he is very concerned about our feeling and experience in the house even though he is not able to come to see us. He is very warm and nice to us when we asked him questions. But it is a pity that I did not see him. If I go to Paris next time, I would prefer to choose to live there again. Hope I can have the chance to meet him next time! Merci!!!
Dominique is always attentive to your every need. Very nice guy. The place makes you feel like at home and so does his adorable cat.

Dominique from the moment of booking through to the difficulties of my  delayed flight into Paris graciously exceeded all my expectations in his fast communications  and in his extraordinary offers of generous assistance that he freely bestowed upon me.  I unreservedly highly recommend Dominique as your premier choice of host in Paris.  Dominique lives just 2 minutes walk on the direct line from Charles de Gaulle airport so extremely convenient.  I very much look forward to to my next reservation with Dominique.

Dominique was such an amazing host! We arrived a day earlier and needed a place to sleep for the night and I’m so happy we did! He responded very quickly every time and met us at the front door when we arrived  and gave us a great tour. He made us soup for dinner and provided us with snacks being that most places were closed because it was rather late. The following morning he made us coffee and provided us with croissants for breakfast. He was kind enough to walk us to the local bank and the metro station and speak to the clerk for us being that we do not speak French. He also sent us a map of the metro and a cool place to check out some bands. His apartment is lovely with a great terrace to enjoy your morning coffee! Dominique was so hospitable and accommodating. We had a lovely stay, wish we stayed longer! He is a short way outside of the city but definitely worth the stay. Thanks again for everything, hope to see you again!
Je recommande fortement, séjour somptueux
Chambre parfaite , rien a dire , n’hésitez surtout pas c’est magique ..
TOP , je recommande ++++++++++++++++++

Suite exceptionnelle, propre, isolée et calme avec une belle vue sur le sacré cœur. 

Reproches : déjeuner compris dans le prix de notre chambre, nous avons demandé à le prendre dans la chambre, 21€ pour monter 8 étages. Le jus d'orange était inbuvable.

C'est vraiment dommage de ne pas faire attention à ces petits détails au regard de la qualité de la suite et des équipements proposés.

Le hall d'entrée n'est pas très chaleureux et l'ascenseur assez flippant. 

A quelques détails prêts cela aurait pu être parfait !

Une fois dans la chambre, tout est réussi !

Magnifique séjour, très bel appart/hotel, la chambre et les différentes vues de la terrasse et des fenêtres sont toute incroyables. Très romantique pour une soirée à deux. L'accueil a été très agréable et très chaleureux, rien à re dire... J'espère y revenir très prochainement !

The host was great, the communication  was seemless, the apartment was fantastic, the staff at the hotel really nice and helpful, location is one of the best in Paris,
the lobby  and elevators are old and not clean, I really hope they renovate the them soon, but as soon as you pass the lobby and elevators, you are in a wonderful Apt in the heart of Paris, tastefully renovated, bright, spacious, and with an amazing view. Great value. I will stay there again. I have lived in Paris and now traveling to Paris often for work, I know Paris well and to me this apt was one of the best I have ever stayed in the heart of Paris.

The suite was great with a spacious and renovated bathroom. There was a cute little terrace that you could hang out and through some of the windows you could see sacre cour in the distance. 
it was nice that it was part of the hotel so amenities were taken care of and it was much more renovated than the rest of the hotel. Great location on a shopping street and convenient area to plaza vendome, walking distance of many shops, restaurants, etc.
Merci~ pour tout.

Tout d'abord Silia & Yanis sont extrêmement gentils. L'appartement est tout neuf avec un design et propreté exceptionnelle. On a vraiment l'impression qu'on est à l'hôtel de 5 étoiles. Les lits super confortables, dans la cuisine on trouve tout ce qu'il faut pour préparer les repas, donc de l'autre côté on se sent comme dans une vraie à la maison. 
Un seul bémol c'est la distance du métro (environ 15min à pied), mais bientôt ils vont débuter la nouvelle ligne de tramway qui est beaucoup plus proche.
Je recommande fortement et je reviendrais avec plaisir chez Silia et Yanis si je vais séjourner encore à Paris. Merci pour tout

Très bon séjour chez Silia et Yanis, les hôtes sont vraiment très gentils. L’appartement est refait à neuf, tout confort pour passer un agréable moment.

Aux portes de Paris, le logement de Yanis est idéal. La chambre que j'ai occupée était parfaite. Propre, calme et les espaces communs étaient parfaits. Je recommande
Endroit très propre très design rien a dire a conseiller très fortement
