A small and sweet hotel in a good location. We walked from the Eurostar at the Gare  du Nord , checked in, and then walked to the Philharmonie, with dinner on the way: what more could you ask for?! Some nice little cafes nearby, on the canal, and VERY close to the metro too. Very friendly and helpful staff. Pretty much perfect!
Everything was really great! The staff is very helpful and polite.
The hotel is aged ;  the room was very small the staff was great; if you just need a place to sleep - the location is okay.

Bijou, clean, and conveniently situated. 
Very friendly English-speaking staff. Recommend if on a budget.
Bien ubicado, buen trato, buen servicio.
Muy buena ubicación junto al metro, todos muy amables,  sin duda totalmente recomendable
This place was wonderful, the employees were amazing and very friendly, and the amenities were well worth the price!
Für eine Städtereise nach Paris ist die Unterkunft sehr empfehlenswert. Der Aufenthalt war unkompliziert. Das Personal war freundlich und hat uns gute Tipps gegeben.

Nergens in de beschrijving van airbnb staat de naam van het hotel nml Hotel Tilde. Dat was wat verwarrend bij aankomst. Kamer kleiner dan verwacht maar  oké voor 2 nachtjes Parijs. Locatie ideaal en zeer dichtbij metro Riquet. Zeer vriendelijk personeel. Prima verblijf gehad.
Room smells fresh and was very clean.

A really trendy, clean place to stay. Within a two minutes walk of a metro line to take you all over Paris. Situated next to a mini supermarket for any snacks and refreshments. Helpful and friendly staff. The Nespresso machines in the room were a huge bonus too!
Easy connection with metro and friendly staff
Leuk klein hotel, lag voor ons perfect gelegen. 150 m van het eerste metro station.
Room was loud with street and metro, but staff and accommodations were excellent. Also, not the safest of neighborhoods, but right next to an easy metro stop for getting around.
ｽｰﾂｹｰｽを床で広げられないくらい狭いお部屋でした｡ﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑから下水?の臭いがして､夜中ﾄﾞｱを閉めてもﾍﾞｯﾄﾞﾙｰﾑにまで臭いが来たのが少し気になりました｡ｽﾀｯﾌの方はﾁｪｯｸｱｳﾄ後ｽｰﾂｹｰｽを預ける際などとても親切に対応してくださりとてもよかったです｡
The biggest plus is the staff, super cordial and nice and will try to help you in any way that they can. Continental breakfast was very classy and they have free water bottles.

we enjoyed our stay; however we were frustrated by the shower doors.  Every time we showered we had a water fall on to the floor. 
bad wifi.

Front desk was amazingly helpful. Even loaned us a converter when our phone was dying. Room was small and clean. Hallway and bathroom were worn, but it didn’t bother us. Neighborhood not convenient to sites, but if you are looking for clean budget accommodations where you feel safe, you would like this.
Great place to stay for a reasonable price
Prima hotel voor paar dagen Parijs. Metro dichtbij en aardige medewerkers
Perfect location right along the canal, amazing staff, and an all round excellent experience!
It was fine if you just intend to use it for sleep and a base - the location is good. The room itself is quite small and so is the toilet. But overall fine
The staffs are nice and very accommodating.

Very nice little room. Did exactly what we needed and gave us a base for 2 days exploring Paris. Breakfast at €10 was very good also. The room was small but great for 2. The bathroom was great and the bed was very comfortable. Would highly recommend.
짐을 미리 맡길 수 있었어요. 하지만 침실에 갳및갗 있어요. 방도 많잋 좁앛욫.

SWEET LITTLE DIRTY ROOM 

Normally I don't write reviews, but now I make an exception because I had the worst experience. 

The hotel didn't matched with my expectations. It was very dirty and the smell in the hotel was so bad. When we arrived the ground of the hall was full of dirty laundry. The room was super small, dated and just not cleaned at all. There was dust everywhere and in the bathroom  there was mold. The shower didn't work, after showering 2 minutes the bathroom was full of water. When asking the hotel staff for a solution, they just gave us towels to clean it ourselves. 
There is also a lot of noise and you hear the metro passing by. We are also very happy that we didn't book the breakfast as it looked very sad. 
Last but not least, we booked a parking spot for the duration of our stay. The last day they wanted us to leave early in the morning, so we could not enjoy another day in Paris. So we had to search for another parking spot ourselves. 
The service is really bad!

So when looking for a hotel in Paris, keep searching!
위치는 북역이랑 가까워요 에펠탑에서는 조금 멀지만 파리 지하철이 잘되있어서 괜찮습니다 방에 음섁뮬 걔쟤고 걔면 쟥은 걔미 뱨글거리게 섕겨욤 깨미 짭느라 고섕함
Die Unterkunft ist schlicht und geeignet für eine kurze Durchreise. Lage war super, da nächste Metro (M 7) fußläufig. Hotelpersonal sehr nett und zuvorkommend.
Nice place, would stay here again!
A sweet hotel with a lovely canal nearby.

Very nice little hotel. smaller room than expected but we were out most of the time anyway so it wasn't a problem. made use of the coffee machines in the room as it was there. easy to get into central Paris using the Metro. overall good stay
great place to stay
The place is clean and the staff were really helpful. The room is a bit small but is  ok for 2 people. What I like the most is that it is near the metro station which makes travelling easier.
n/a
Very good value for money. Very good transport links into Paris. Staff were very friendly.

Nice hotel close to metro stop Riquet, so you can discover Paris by foot or by public transport when you jump out of bed. Clean room, nice warm shower, and a Nespresso machine to use (you get a few cups as a welcome gift). Staff is very friendly and helpful. We found the mattress a bit too soft, but that is a matter of taste. The room was also a bit cold, and we only realised the next day that the AC could be used as heating. The walls are not too thick, so unfortunately we were a bit disturbed by other guests in the corridor. Free bottles of water were a very nice gesture, but not a very eco-friendly solution.

The room was cute and charming! And I loved how close it was to the metro line! It’s perfect for a person who is going to spend most of the day touring and out enjoying Paris. And the staff are really helpful

The place is just as described. It’s close to two metro stations (one was closed while we were there) and Gare du Nord. The room is tight but you can expect that in Paris for the price. Only complaints would be the tiny bugs we found crawling on the walls and lack of ice in the hotel. I will also say this neighborhood isn’t ideal to walk alone in at night.
Nice and cosy place to stay for a weekend getaway. Slightly smaller than expected but charming nonetheless.
Excelente estadía en el hotel, respondieron todas mis dudas. Sin duda volvería.
not a good choice
This was affordable and cozy which is perfect for young travelers. The people behind the front desk were especially helpful and informative during the transportation strikes.
Prijs kwaliteit waardig! Mooie kamers, maar uiterst klein. Zeer beperkt ontbijt, maar alles was aanwezig en heerlijke koffie!
Great value for money, welcoming and clean place
Buena ubicación.
Receptionists were very helpful and got us checked in immediately

Toplocatie, prettig personeel. 
Ruimte en bed kleiner dan gedacht maar verder ontzettend netjes. Douche kon wel wat steviger.

The hotel is well situated near Metro stations and there is someone in reception at all times. The receptionists were incredibly kind and helpful. The room was very comfortable and clean. I would definitely stay there again.

The hotel is situated right next to a metro station which is helpful however when we were there the metros were on strike so ended up having to walk and it was about an hour walking distance from all the main places. The hotel room was small but that was expected and was great for a head down.

The only thing I can say positive about this stay was how nice the staff was. They were amazing and helpful. The room itself was awful. The room was very small, which I knew it was going to be on the smaller end but it was tiny. When we arrived the light bulb was out in the hallway, I asked for it to be replaced because it was very dark. It never got done in the 5 days we were there. I had to turn the flashlight on my phone to see and open our door. There were stains on my sheets. The bathroom was very small with the shower even tinier. You had to sit on the toilet sideways because the wall was in the way of sitting on it the right way. The toilet seat was hanging on and breaking. One night there were no towels given to us and I asked for some. I was literally only given 2. One for each of us no extras. The carpeting was so stained. I also didn’t like the fact that we had to leave our room card with the front desk everytime we left the room. I think for the price I expected a little more.

This stay was great for the price. If you are anything like me, you only stay in a place to rest and shower when traveling. This place is ideal for people who just need a place to sleep after a long day of exploring Paris. Convenient amenities and perfect for a short trip to Paris.
Great place to stay. Near public transportation and a few stores are just outside the hotel. Would recommend.

Todo está muy limpio y la habitación está bien. El único problema es que en el cuarto de baño las ventanas están selladas con cinta adhesiva y entra mucho frío. No está súper lejos del centro pero tampoco está muy cerca.

Overall nice stay. The area is a bit out of the way from the main city center of Paris. It was only an issue for us because there were still transit strikes making it difficult to get to and from the hotel.
The communication was very easy and quick. The area is OK.
Good guiding in the receipt and the rooms are in good condition.
Alojamiento calidad precio adecuado, ubicación buena.

Great stay for my long layover. The front desk staff was extremely helpful. It was easy to find and was perfect for a short stay. It was smaller than expected in the room so there would not have been a lot of room if I had my suitcase and stayed more than one night. But perfect for what I needed it for!!

Ótima estada no Hotel Tilde. Recepcionistas maravilhosos e atenciosos. Super solícitos. O espaço era tudo o que imaginávamos. Devido a greve, ficou um pouco difícil de se locomover até o centro, mas dá para andar até a Gare Du Nord e a Gare de l’Este (20 minutos de caminhada). Em um ambiente normal (sem greve) é um espaço ótimo a se considerar! Espero voltar em outra oportunidade.
Super cute hotel in a less noisy part of the city. And the receptionist were all very helpful!

Rooms were very dirt after checkin.
After a reclemation they fixed it.
Room is small but fine.
Service was fine.
Lovely space in good location.
A great spot. Very stylish, clean and central spot. Staff were friendly and very helpful.
Very nice place, easy to access by subway or bus, and the staff was incredibly nice.
Hotel is ok. Rooms very small and quite out of the way from the city. However all good

Das Hotel Tilde können wir gerne weiterempfehlen. Das Design hat uns gut gefallen, der Aufbau war charmant und mit dem Aufzug war auch der 5. Stock kein Problem ;) Das Personal war sehr freundlich, zuvorkommend und hilfsbereit. Auch auf Englisch konnte man sich sehr gut austauschen. Leider hat unser Wasserhahn getropft und die Klimaanlage etwas gesponnen, was uns ab und an geweckt hatte. Die Mitarbeiter zeigten sich dabei sehr bemüht, auch wenn das Problem zunächst nicht gelöst werden konnte. Das Zimmer erscheint erstmal sehr klein, was im Vergleich zu Pariser Verhältnissen normal zu sein scheint. Für die Garderobe ist eine kleine Nische vorhanden. Auf dem Schreibtisch ist die Nespressomaschine, es ist aber noch etwas Platz für Kleinigkeiten. Einen Safe gibt es nicht. Das Bett war sehr bequem! Das kann man nur empfehlen. Das Bad war völlig ausreichend. Durch den geschickten Aufbau ist sowohl bei der Toilette als auch bei der Dusche überraschend viel Platz,  viel Ablagefläche gibt es aber nicht. Anfangs fanden wir im Bad auffallend viele Flecken und Staub, das haben wir kurzerhand selbst weggemacht. Ansonsten war es gut und auch mit hochwertigen Marken verarbeitet. Das Frühstück ist für französische Verhältnisse üppig ausgestattet gewesen. Wir waren leider zur Zeit des Streiks (12/2019) dort. Ohne die Metro waren einige Ecken von Paris nur mit größerem Aufwand zu erreichen, so nahmen wir es dann auch lieber in Kauf ca. 30 min zum Montmartre zu laufen, statt mit den Ersatzbussen zu fahren. Wem es aber weniger ums Sightseeing geht, der findet auch in Fußnähe des Hotels viele interessante Ecken wie den Kanal oder das Restaurant im Schiff um die Ecke. Alles in Allem waren wir mit dem Hotel sehr zufrieden!
The room is nice but it’s a little bit small

Nice place to stay and very friendly hospitality from all the staff. Just so happened we were there during the strikes so, we spend a bit too much on the transportation. But if its not due to strikes, this place so near to the Subway.  Worth for money.
Decent place,would stay again.

The concierge was very friendly and helpful. The location is great if you need quick access to Gare du Nord or Gare de L’est. However, do not be fooled by the photos. Our room had lots of carpet stains, the sheets had stains, and there were ants on the table. Surprisingly the bathroom’s cleanliness was adequate.
Buen alojamiento, la gente es muy amable el único inconveniente es que hablaban muy poco español.
Clean, 24/7 and friendly reception, recommended
very small room

A wonderful little stay. The room was extremely small, and not exactly what we had been expecting, but it’s a great bang for your buck and the hotel is well decorated and cute. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful too. We were also able to check into our room early, which was lovely. 

The location of the hotel is okay. We were there during the strike so we unfortunately were not able to use the subway to get around. It was about a 18min walk to Paris gare de l’Est where we took our main trains in and out of Paris, so we simply walked and had no problems at all when we arrived and departed Paris. For daily getting around we took the bus, which was overly crowded due to the strike, but on any other occasion the hotel is well connected by subway into the center of the city! 

While the neighborhood isn’t posh, it’s filled with cheap options for quick bites to eat, which was nice coming back late at night. The little bakery right next door was lovely, and on the other side of the hotel is a grocery store open till 11pm, also very convenient.   

Overall we really enjoyed our stay here and would recommend it!
Good place, bad customer service
Good location and very friendly staff.  The breakfast was convenient and fair-priced.
Great place, great location, very good value for the price! I recommend!
Cozy , neat,  and nice hotel. Very clean and comfortable. Multiple metros in walking distance, very nice stay.
全体的に酷かったです｡ﾒｯｾｰｼﾞが来て､予約した通りの部屋は用意できなくなったと言われ､予約した部屋とは違う部屋が割り当てられました｡写真と全然違い､清潔感がなかったです｡高いお金を払ったので返して欲しいです｡部屋にｺﾞﾐ箱は無く､ｱﾒﾆﾃｨも全然ありませんでした｡
Siamo, molto felici di essere stati vostri ospiti, torneremo sicuramente.

My boyfriend and I, who are both students, went on a city trip to Paris for 3 nights. We came across Naïm’s Hotel Tilde and it seemed really cozy and subtle. First of all, the prices for us as students were amazing! Second, location. When we arrived, we had to walk around 20 min from Gare du Nord, which was doable, especially because the weather was great! Our bad luck was that the public transport was dramatic because of the strikes... however, if it would have worked there was a metro station close by and otherwise walking is still doable! Third, the room. It was smaller then expected, however, you have a good bed, perfect bathroom and some space for your jackets and bags. All in all, perfect for a city trip!

The place is a good, affordable choice for a short trip to Paris. It is actally a hotel with tiny rooms that provided us a good place to rest during our visit. The rooms have some modern details but in general they are quite basic. The employeea were very helpful when we asked for information on how to reach the city centre. Overall a good experience.
Very kind people. Helpfull when we have quistion en hotel people find it out. Goed place with some good people. The bed was good and the shower also. Thats most important in my eyes.
Very nice little hotel. Kind and friendly staff. We definitely can recommend for short stay in Paris.
Prettig verblijf
Good place. Can be recommended without hesitation.
Rooms are small

A fairly old building with a musty smell throughout however we were looked after during our time in Paris... the only downfall being cleanliness really. The maids always knocked on our door to clean our room really early in the morning which ended up in us declining due to not being ready or showered, resulting in our room not being cleaned the whole stay. I did go down to ask for towels and we were supplied with fresh ones and soaps. You are entitled to bottles of water at the hotel which you can take at anytime but eating is not permitted in the rooms so do make sure you eat out. There is a metro on the Same street as the hotel so you can get into the centre of Paris easily... and we would definitely recommend the cafe on the corner of the street situated on the left side of the hotel about 6 minutes down the road!

The check in staff was very helpful and friendly. The bedroom was small but very comfortable and clean. Unfortunately we were in Paris during the strikes so public transit was down so getting downtown was a bit hard, but it is extremely close to a metro station and would connect you well if it were running. Only downside was that we were told we had complimentary breakfast at check in but were charged 18 euros at check out since we booked through Airbnb. It was a small miscommunication but overall staff were extremely friendly and helpful
Very nice place.
Nice place, nicely situated
Perfect place to stay if you are a tourist visiting Paris. :)
Wonderful staff & great location near the metro. The room was compact but good value.
Thanks for a great stay!
Muito simples e limpo. Não gostei da internet e do local.
Great stay!

The location of the hotel is good, near many metro stations but since we were here during the strike it didn’t really make much of a difference for us. Cleanliness could be improved, we found mould on the bathroom heater (which didn’t work) and the bed sheets did not seem very clean. There was also dirt floating in the water of the nespresso coffee machine when we arrived. Take note that the room is extremely small (no space to even open my suitcase) and the walls are also very thin. However, the staff were very nice.

Great location! 
Small room but enough for a weekend in Paris. 
The staff is very useful and nice, the breakfast is delicious and worth it. 
I totally recommend this place. 
Thanks guys!
j

A quite good place to get in for a trip to Paris. It is a little bit outside the city but in general easy to reach. The metro is nearby which drives you - for example - directly to Louvre. (In our special situation  with the general strike, the location of the hotel was horrible because busses where overcrowded and there only goes one bus line. If you are good by foot you can walk to it. )
Communication is quick and friendly. 
For those who need a good breakfast I can recommend it - you’ll find what you need and get enough for starting your day.
This might as well be the best quality hotel for the asked price.

Simple, clean hotel. Close to the metro so you can easily get into the Centre of Paris. Staff are very nice and accommodating. The rooms are small which I was already expecting. Although in some rooms the bed has to be against a wall so someone has to draw the short draw and sleep against the wall. If you’re in Paris for the weekend you’re certainly not going to be spending too much time in the hotel - so for the price this hotel is totally acceptable!
The room was gorgeous it’s exactly as shown in the pictures. Front Desk was super friendly and location was perfect. Would definitely be back soon
Nice little hotel off the beaten path. The front desk staff were excellent- very friendly and helpful. Highly recommend!
Cozy place and a great location to access all of Paris from. Our hostess was very knowledgeable of the area and warmly welcomed us. Highly recommend
The room was very small and breakfast was not included although the description suggested it was. I felt it was decent but a bit overpriced for the location
We had a lovely stay at Hotel Tilde, everything was super easy, communication, finding the place and checking in. The room was lovely and had all the necessary amenities. Would recommend!
Fijn en heel schoon hotel, redelijk dicht bij de toeristische attracties (ongeveer 10 minuutjes met de metro). Personeel in het hotel was bijzonder vriendelijk. Ik zou hotel tilde zeker aanraden.

the rooms are VERY small. The bed was very comfortable and the shower was very good.
Very close to St Martins Canal and Le Marais, which was as we wanted . Great location. The hotel reception was very good and helpful.  But generally the whole experience was a little impersonal.
absolutely lovely and super accommodating
Nice, cosy place! I stayed for one night, it was perfect, near to the metro station.
A great and convenient location to stay in. The hospitality was excellent. Would recommend this place to anyone visiting Paris! Thank you Naim!

Ever smiling reception, ready to help hosts, great location (literally 2 steps from the metro station), clean and tidy room, luggage storage even after checkout. An overall great experience worth the money. Highly recommend !!
central spot, your go-to-hotel in order to discover Paris.
Very nice place on a great location
Lindo lugar fácil para llegar

The location of the hotel is very close to metro station but it’s not a safe location especially if it’s bit late at night or less people around. It’s a hotel and some of the hotel staffs are really friendly and helpful. For my 3 night stay in Paris, 2 of the receptionists were great but one of them was very rude.
Nice place- pretty comfy bed. Near a bakery, market and butchers. Very close to the metro.

I am happy whatever I get 
Price was good too honestly
Nice, cheap. But bathroom sink was too small.  Quite right choice for the price. Thank you for everthing
Great central location with very supportive people to help learn the area.
Excelente servicio, habitación pequeña pero muy limpia y cómoda.
Great place to stay for a weekend in Paris. Right by the metro and canal, cute restaurants nearby, and very kind staff. I had an amazing time!
great hotel!
This was a cozy room for a great price in the heart of paris, it was super easy to get in and super convenient.

Although getting a different room than the one we saw in the pictures, the hostel was the same and we enjoyed our stay 100 percent! Everything was clean and cute and the room smelled amazing. The staff was incredibly nice, the breakfast incredibly tasty and the location perfect for discovering the city of Paris. With an easy check-in and check-out, the possibility to leave the luggage and the metro-station on no more than a 100 meters walk from the hostel, we couldn't possibly have found a better place to stay for this price! We would definitely recommend this to anyone exploring Paris. :)
Ok für einen Trip in die Stadt. Müsste mal wieder renoviert werden.
Good location right by a metro exit. Not too noisy. Great staff. Stayed an extra night. Good shower. Would stay again.

This was a cute and great location! The hosts were so kind and helped us out immensely! We rebooked with them for our trip back! Well located close to a metro station and easy access! :) Thank you for your amazing service!

5 mins walk to the metro and although there are not cafes etc right near by there are things all within 5 mins walk.  Small room but as described and very clean.  Simple breakfast was really nice.  Very friendly people working in this hotel all speaking brilliant English.

Super Service.
Sehr sauber. 
Gepäck konnte am Anreisetag vor dem Checkin bzw. am Abreisetag nach dem Checkout abgestellt werden.
Super Lage, direkt an der Metro.
Unser Zimmer war etwas klein.
Super

Great location. Just a few steps away after exiting metro station. Staff members are friendly and welcoming. They provided us with rooms despite us arriving earlier than check in time. Wifi sometimes does not work.

It’s a very cute hotel 40 mins by metro from the Eifel Tower. In general the receptionists were really friendly and the service was very quick. It’s next to the metro so you will reach every sightseeing very easily. I really can recommend this hotel.

Nice, small place in the 19th Arrandisment in Paris! Very close to the Metro station Riquet and the canal! There are some pretty cafes around the hotel. The room is small but nice! Good bed, clean and stylish bathroom. There is even a nespresso machine in the room and one can get bottles of water for free at the reception! Would recommend for a weekend getaway in Paris!

We really loved our stay Naïm’s boutique hotel. We arrived very early (6 hours before check-in time) just to already drop off our bags and then visit the city before checking in, but when we told the guy from the reception we had a very long drive and hardly any sleep he immediately went to see if there was a room that was already available for us so we could catch up some sleep before we went into the city. Thanks so much for that!! 
Also, the subway station is literally 5 meters from the hotel which is perfect!
Would recommend this place to anyone!

Very nice experience. Rooms were rather small, however, it is only a place to sleep. The hotel is located very close to a metro station, making it very easy to access anything and anywhere you want to go in Paris. I was incredibly impressed with the members of staff working on reception, who were all extremely polite, helpful and courteous. I would not hesitate to recommend staying here as it was great value for money, very clean and very welcoming. Thank you once again! :)

The hotel was far better than I had expected. The staff was super awesome, and multi lingual, which worked in my case as I am American and don’t speak French. Very clean, and accessible. I will definitely be staying here again ever in Paris.
Good place for that price for a night in Paris. Clean, cosy and good matras. Quite small but normal for rooms in Paris. Very clean and very good communication and we had a great night

Naïm,
Thank you for the hospitality during our visit in Paris. We loved the location and the room. 

Hotel Tilde is a great boutique hotel located in a cool neighborhood close to the canal and restaurants. Hotel tilde not only offers great value but its proximity to the Riquet and Stalingrad metro station is very convenient.  We had a great experience.

While visiting Paris solo I stayed at this location. It was very clean and safe! Lots of shops / food spots around. The staff who works at the front desk are super cool and knowledgeable on the surrounding area! I wouldn’t try and fit NO MORE than two people on this room at all times but besides that it was an A+ I’d definitely rebook one my next trip to Paris

Naim's place is very nice. It is a hotel set up, so there are many other guests, a gym, and an option to have breakfast for a small added cost. My only complaint would be that the showers were a little small and there was no shelf to put soap/shampoo etc. Overall, we had a great time here.
Great front desk staff!
Een klein hotel maar alle voorzieningen waren aanwezig en schoon. Dichtbij het metrostation en in een prima buurt. Leuk hotel om een paar nachtjes te overnachten met gastvrij personeel.

The room we stayed in was rather small, which was unexpected. The air-con in the room didn’t work, so made the room feel really stuffy and uncomfortable. We had to have the window open to keep the room fresh. The TV was just in French, so it would not be ideal for non-speaking people. The reception staff are really helpful and friendly. The hotel overall is getting a little old and worn out, needs a facelift.

Room is really small, narrow and dirty. 
Area is quite far but easy to transport and convenient.
Good location and convenient Metro stop. Great value, clean, friendly staff,  and very comfortable bed- Merci

We stayed at Hotel Tilde for only one night. The room is tiny, but functional, so be mindful of the luggage you bring into the room. There is an elevator up to the room which is convenient.The metro is a 3 minute walk from the hotel and there is a small bakery next door. Although breakfast is mentioned in the listing, it is extra, so account for the time to grab some when you're there. The reception is manned at all times, so it's nice to have someone to talk to if you need something.
A really good place to stay i you are looking to explore a non-typical, but interesting, part of paris.  Local to the metro that gets you anywhere you want to be.
Es un hotel boutique cómodo, la ubicación no es la mejor, a mi parecer se ve un poco inseguro, sobretodo de noche, pero la atención fue muy buena, los empleados son muy amables y atentos.
Little bit out of the way, but a lovely place to stay nonetheless. Cleans rooms and great service.
Great stay!

Verdaderamente es un hotel pequeñito pero muy reconfortante, agradable y en una zona maravillosa de París,cerca de cositas importantes,la cama es estupendo,y la gente que te atiende también,sobre todo agradezco a Kim que intentara hablar español para entenderme,de verdad me he sentido como en casa.
Великолепный номер,приятный персонал,идеальная чистота.Все продумано до мелочей!просто супер отель!Благодарим!

The hotel room was cosy and had everything you need.  There were also windows with street view in our room which I really loved. The reception is open 24/7 and people at the hotel are very helpful and friendly. The stay was really pleasant.
A clean and good value hotel with great desk service. Rooms are modest but very pleasant.
A wonderful boutique hotel. Thank you.
Nice hotel in a unique neighborhood. Restaurants nearby were great!
Staff are very nice and welcoming, the room is not the cleanest, and the surrounding area felt unsafe.
Kleines, aber schönes Hotel. Sehr nettes Personal an der Rezeption und gute Lage! Wir würden auf jeden Fall nochmal kommen :)

Hotel Tilde is a great little hotel in a very interesting and bustling part of Paris. The amenities were great, everything was clean, and breakfast was convenient and pleasant. Alison at the front desk was very kind and helpful. I would love to go back!

This was a cute little hotel. They have a small dining area downstairs. They have an elevator which was great. They let us check in early and kept bags safe while we traveled city  until check in. Room was very tiny but updated and very clean. Staff was friendly and kind.

El hotel está muy bien ubicado, cerca de una estación del metro, las habitaciones son muy lindas, te dan agua, café y pastelitos sin costo, te ayudan en todo lo que pueden, a nosotras nos ayudaron a llegar a nuestro vuelo sin perderlo.

Small but not as small as some people are complaining, you are in Paris its going to be small. Everything was fine with the room and reception were super friendly. 
During the one night we stayed there was a very drunk man in the next room whistling and shouting loudly and banging furniture all night so didn't sleep much, but its more the location than the hotel itself.
Thanks for the hospitality
A little worn around the edges but comfortable and quiet. Communication was great around check-in. Bit further out from the center but near the metro (and canal) so wasn’t really an issue
Nice room and staff was very attentive and helpful!
Very clean and beautiful hotel and cleab. Room was way smaller than it looked in the pictures. Staff was arogant and unfriendly. Location was perfecr right next to the metro station.
My stay at the hotel was fine. I really loved the location and that it‘s next to the canal.

非常不负责的房东｡房子是预约确认的,不是立即确认｡我当天晚上发的预约申请,房东确认了之后告诉我订的房子没有了,让我换房子,地点房型都差不多｡ 我就觉得很莫名其妙,这些信息明明可以在确认之前向我询问,为什么要先确认订单再告诉我没房子?我表达了不想更换的意愿,并且要求他立刻取消订单｡他说他不能操作,让我联系airbnb的客服｡于是我打客服电话 ,客服介入了之后,房东还是自己取消了订单｡可是中间浪费了很多时间和精力｡总之是无良商家,一定要小心!
A hospitality focused hotel that provided a clean and modern space to stay in. Would definitely recommend again to anyone.

Overall we had an ok one night stay. Decent location right next to metro station. Room was clean but shower when on high drained onto floor instead of into drain. Sink was extremely difficult to use as it is very small and right under shelf. Don’t even try to wash your face. Room was very small but affordable compared to other places in Paris. Staff was friendly but wouldn’t give us more than the strict rule of two coffee pods for our shower issues the night prior. Definitely not a true Airbnb but it worked for one night.

Me and my girlfriend had a great stay at Hotel Tilde.
Its good locadet between two Metro Stations which easy to use and the canal.
Its clean and comfy and you have many options in this area
 (supermarkets, a bakery next door and if you need Subway and Dominos) 
There was nothing negative to say only the area around can Look a little bit Rough, 
but we felt safe every time.
We only stayed one night at Naims place but it was was exactly as described and very comfortable. Thanks Naim!
Affordable and convenient. Nice place!

Myself & my 8yr old daughter had a great stay ... the hotel was clean and really convenient for the metro and travelling around Paris. St Martin’s canal which is just around the corner was a lovely surprise with lots of little cafes & bars and a great place to people watch on an evening xx

Thank you for a lovely 2 night stay. 
The gym area was perfect. Breakfast was €9 and I think that was too much for what it was. I had expected the room to be smaller from previous reviews but found it to be a comfortable space. The Metro lines are very convenient and the hotel is very close (10-15minutes) to Gare du Nord. 
We felt the same as previous reviews and did not feel safe on the street at night but they have a receptionist (who were all very lovely) at the front 24/7 to ensure no one else can enter the premise.
The location is very near to the metro station M7 as soon as you step out you will find this hotel. And they are very helpful even though they agree to keep your luggage after the checkout.
A very pretty, friendly place. Make sure you find the canal! A beautiful place to bike, run, walk, or hang out.
The host canceled this reservation 113 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

If you’re looking to stay in a cheap place with not much expectation then this place may suit you. I know that Paris hotel rooms are tight, but this one was especially small for the bedroom area. Our sheets had holes in them and the sink was so small, we got water all over the floor whenever we used it. The carpets seemed dirty throughout the hotel too.  The location itself isn’t far from a hip and trendy neighborhood, but be careful at night. We were warned by some locals before coming here to be aware while out, especially at night. It is right next to a metro stop though and they have people at the desk 24 hours. They also allowed us to leave our bags while we went out during the day for no charge even though we had already checked out.  If you’re looking for a more spacious space for an Air B&B, look around, but for a small budget room for a night, it works.
This was a cute little room that was great for the one night we stayed. The staff was welcoming and helpful! It was smaller than I expected but the bathroom was a nice size.
Excelente alojamiento, privado y muy cómodo.

This is a great little hotel. I didn’t know what to expect as I’ve never booked a hotel through Airbnb but it was perfect. It was so clean, had a coffee machine, hairdryer and air conditioning! The location is a bit out from the usual touristy parts of Paris but I preferred that to see a bit of the real part of Paris. It’s right be the canal which has loads of bars and cute restaurants on canal boats. And the hotel is right by several metro stations so getting anywhere we needed was very easy. Really recommend as great value!
Great stay! Would stay again!
Inside looks very nic mwould not say from outSide  very close to the metro
Great hospitality, friendly staff in accomodating our needs. Will definetly come back ! Oh, also great location to Paris’ top attractions. Merci !
Ok

My experience matched the description: clean, well located near the canal and metro, boutique in the sense of small, and good value. The helpfulness of the staff and the petit déjeuner exceeded my expectations.
Room was very small. Barely enough place to walk around in the room. Easy access to metro.

Camera pulita, ci è stato comunicato che ci avrebbero assegnato un altra stanza in quanto quella prenotata era già stata occupata, alla conferma di prenotazione. Pur avendoci rassicurati sul fatto che avrebbe avuto la stessa dimensione il letto era a una piazza e mezza anziche matrimoniale ed il bagno molto piccolo. Ci aspettavamo una riduzione di prezzo che non è avvenuta. Ad ogni modo il soggiorno è stato molto piacevole ed el letto era veramente comodo

All staff we encountered were really helpful and polite making our stay a lot more comfortable. The location of the hotel was great, it is only about 1 minute walk away from the metro so We were able to use this to get around Paris. I would not recommend getting the metro late at night to this station however.

Albergo molto carino, buona posizione per visitare la città, il personale è disponibilissimo e gentile h24, le stanze sono leggermente più piccole di quanto sembrino in foto ma è perfetto di una vacanza di 5 giorni come la nostra, piccolissima pecca a volte c’erano dei minuscoli insetti sulla scrivania e su un comodino, tuttavia lo consiglio per chi vuole visitare la città ed essere vicini ai mezzi.

This is a really small room but honestly everything you need. Nice staff who are available 24/7 and speak good English and generously tolerate bad French. Great value room. The area isn't too special but so close to the train stations and an easy walk away from gorgeous parks. Bathroom and shower were good. We didn't have towels when we arrived and it took about an hour for them to bring them when we asked, but otherwise a great stay!
aangenaam hotel - zeer vriendelijk aan de receptie - goed ontbijt. Vlakbij metro, wel ver van centrum.

This place is 100% one of the best places I’ve ever booked with Airbnb. 24/7 service so came in handy when my flight landed late at night. Metro is 5 steps away from the entrance. Breakfast buffet was super reasonable. Thank you to the entire team at Hotel Tilde!
This room was perfect for my short stay in Paris. The air conditioner was a plus since it was so humid! Proximity to two metro lines and Gare du Nord makes this place an excellent stay.
Very nice for a short stay.
Gut per Metro angebunden und nah am Canal Saint Martin, klein aber fein :)
Nice little hotel, great service
Muy bueno todo! Es hermoso el hotel y los recepcionistaa muy amables!! Volvería a quedarme!
Nice little hotel room near the trains. Easy to come in and out. Preferable if you’re staying in Paris for only two/three days.
The little hotel is just outside the metro station and making the location very convenient. The staff at reception was very friendly.  We would come back.
Wonderful place with an excellent location! The staff is very friendly and helpful :)
Great place to stay, small but super cute room! Comfortable location and amazing bakery just next to the hotel. I would choose it again:)
Good location, helpful staff, room is tiny though

This was a great place to stay for a few nights. I stayed with a girlfriend and although the room was small, we had enough space with two suitcases. We were very comfortable. The bed was excellent and the water pressure in the shower was good. Everything’s small but that’s Parisian charm and we didn’t have any issues. Free coffee pods for the Nespresso each day and concierge was excellent and 24/7. Location is perfect for walking or metro.

A nice place. Lovely breakfast and recommend including this. They also catered for my husband who is Coeliac at no extra charge. It is a boutique hotel. Room was very small. Sufficient for our stay. Clean.
Everything was really good!! Clean and the staff really nice

방은 좁지만 아늑하고 나름 지낼만 했어요. 근데 침대를 포함한 방에 먼지가 약간 쌓인 느낌이 들었어요. 방에 오래 있으면 목이 칼칼할 정도로. 근데 창문은 있어서 환기하면 괜찮아요. 호텔 클리닝 잘해주시고 직원 분들이 많이 친절하세요. 로비에 공짜로 제공되는 빵이 엄청 맛있었어요.
지하철역이랑 위치가 가까워요. 파리 주요 관광명소랑 30분내외로 걸렸던 것 같아요.

The room is small but nice, clean and comfortable. Very close to the metro station.
Recommended for short stays.
Place wasn't that small like other people discribe. We had allot of fun staying here. Amazing places to eat nearby (next to the river)
Little room in a fantastic location - metro station less that a minute away. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Air condition was a bit smelly.
Close to the metro. We were allowed to drop our bags early when we arrived before check-in.
Lovely place!! Really friendly staff and clean and secure - nice location as well!!
Check in impeccabile e personale molto gentile. Le condizioni e la posizione della struttura sono terribili
Location is in a safe building and right next to public transport, host communicated quickly and effectively

The little room was perfect for 4 nights :) Good and friendly service. Pretty nice area around the channel at the hotel. The next metro station is very close to the hotel you have to go only 2 minutes. I‘ll come again!
the place was exactly as described, clean and easy to be reached and the Staff was really nice. I will definitely recommend it for everyone, especially for Couples
Perfect little room for one night. Free water bottles and fruit at reception. Seamless check in and check out.

Wonderful little hotel in a pretty accessible part of Paris. Short Metro ride to the central city with plenty of stores, cafes, and bars in the nearby neighborhood. 24/7 front desk makes everything a breeze.

I loved our stay in Hotel Tilde! It was very convenient, just a 2 minute walk to the metro. It was so easy to go around Paris and the room was very nice, clean and cozy. Staff was also very helpful and I really enjoyed the breakfast. It was overall a very nice experience and would consider booking again if I visit Paris.

The hotel is located close to subway stops, and has all the essentials to make your stay in Paris fun. It’s on the small side but still sweet - and won’t break your budget. The canal is right behind it with 2 movie theaters, restaurants for all budgets, a fantastic book / dvd / music store, and the amusements at the Paris beach... plus 4 + Supermarkets and great Bakeries in this diverse part of Paris - Turks, North Africans, Asians and everyday Parisians mixing there!

Not bad. There were large brown stains on the bed, which we asked to have changed every single night. Unfortunately, the sheets were never changed throughout our 3 night stay. Room is small but comfortable. Close to metro stations.

El hotel Tilde ha sido perfecto para nuestro propósito; descansar por las noches en una habitación acogedora. Servicios de hotel en un Airbnb!! La habitación hecha y las toallas cambiadas todos los días! Los recepcionistas son muy muy atentos y nos han ayudado con todas las preguntas que teníamos. Una opción muy recomendable para cuando se visita Paris. Nosotros repetiremos

The staff were extremely friendly and helpful, and welcoming towards my boyfriend and I during our stay. The room itself was basic and clean and had everything we needed; however, we did have a couple of issues. It was a double room but was two single beds pushed together, which wasn’t ideal as they would continually separate. Also, the air conditioner leaked quite badly, to the point that we weren’t able to use it at all for fear of making it worse. We reported this twice but it was leaking for the whole of our three-night stay. This meant that it got extremely hot overnight (being on a busy road meant we couldn’t leave the windows open due to noise) and this coupled with the two single beds pushed together made sleeping a little uncomfortable. Overall the room was okay for the price, and the staff were lovely, but an actual double and working air conditioning would have made our stay more pleasant.

The room was small but did it's job. The shower was great. The sink was tiny. I couldn't wash my face without spilling water all over the floor. It was close to the metro which helped. The people at the desk were all very helpful and friendly.
Supernice place and metrostation riquet is only a 1 minute walk!

hii. we were at Tilde hotel for 5 days. it was a nice experience. the room was small, cozy and clean. the most important things for us were the lift, AC and the connection to the city center. very close to metro station and it goes directly to the center.  there was a super market just next to the hotel. hotel receptions were very kind and helpful. there is no iron in the room but if you need one they will kindly give you one. and if you need fridge  they will put your food in their fridge. over all every thing was nice and the host was very kind. highly recommended. enjoy Paris

Nice hotel with a very convenient location. Just down the street is the metro station "Riquet", Louvre is 15-20 mins from there and Gare L'Est just 5 mins. Staff is very welcoming and friendly, we were able to store our luggage before check-in and on our departure day, since the train left in the evening. Room was really tiny and not very modern, but clean. AC worked, but is quite loud.

Hotel Tilde is a great space with wonderful amenities, beyond what I have come to expect from other 3 star hotels in Paris. For example, there is a fitness room equipped with treadmill, elliptical, stationary bikes, free weights, and multi-purpose weight machine. Each room also has a Nespresso machine for coffee and tea.  We also enjoyed free, unlimited bottled water which was very much appreciated given we were there during the heatwave. 

The location is a bit far from central Paris, but great for exploring some lesser known hot spots of Paris like Paris Plage, Parc de la Vilette, and Canal St. Martin.  Despite being more on the periphery of Paris, the hotel is literally steps away from  the Riquet Metro (7), and just a bit further from Stalingrad (2, 5, 7).  

Overall, very pleased with my stay at Hotel Tilde, and would definitely return in the future because of the excellent service and top-notch amenities.
Good quality for good price, very close to a nice canal with student atmosphere. I will come again.

Cozy room, clean with air-conditioning. Even has a coffee machine and located very close to the metro with easy access to the Eiffel Tower, Champ Elysee, etc. Also lovely Patisserie shop nearby and 2 supermarkets next to the hotel and across the road. Would recommend
Super lokalizacja, ładny pokój z czystą łazienką oraz dobrą klimatyzacją. Pokój sprzątany był codziennie.

It says Sweet Little Room so you should obviously expect the room to be small. It was just enough for me and my husband since we only have a small amount of luggage, yet it was clean and the air condition is a super plus point for the scorching hot Paris at the time we were there. 
We were also surprised at first that it's just a few steps from the Metro station. Yay! Downside of this though is you can hear the trains but we didn't really care.
The best part of our stay was the kindness and hospitality that all the staff (or owners?) showed. They're a great bunch, always smiling and very accommodating.

We stayed during one of the record high temperatures and we greatly appreciated the AC and elevator! The rooms are nicely remodeled and very clean. The location provides a local experience. Metro is a 5-10min walk, taking 30-40min to get to sights like the Eiffel tower or Notre Dame. The nearby canal is very active at night with many cafes. Be mindful of surroundings.
Fantastic place - lovely staff, very nice rooms, nice location near the canal. Would recommend.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Naim's hotel is really clean and the staff is super friendly. They are available 24/7 and they are eager to help!

Checking into the hotel was easy and it was convenient to be able to leave our luggage there ahead of check in. The location is great in a more residential part of Paris along a beautiful canal. We stayed 1 night, but everything was perfectly fine. Would definitely stay again if I'm back in Paris and want to be closer to the airport.

I stayed with my daughter for a night in this little hotel and we were so happy about everything there. The woman at check-in was so kind and immediately told us exactly what we wanted to know about what we wanted to do in Paris and we were able to take the free bottles of water we needed. The room was cool with air conditioning and smelling good when we came in from the very hot travel. Small but clean and shower great, tea & coffee machine great, good bed. The location is fabulous, with the canal/beach/bars/food  just down the road, the delicious patisserie on the corner, the supermarket next door, metro minutes away. We loved it and would definitely go back there next time.
Excellent service

Naiim's place is a lovely hotel with small, but perfectly formed, rooms. The staff at both check-in and check-out were fantastic and extremely helpful.

The only minor issue we had was that it felt a little unsafe when walking back to the hotel, but we were only there for one night and it could've been because we weren't familiar with the area.
Lovely stay. We accidentally left a picture and they even scanned it to us!

Hotel Tilde was lovely and made check-in incredibly easy. The staff was very friendly and they were able to hold our bags so we could go out and explore before check-in. We loved the neighborhood and the hotel is very close to a beautiful channel-side area with great bars and restaurants. For two backpackers our stay was luxurious. The only downside is I felt like the carpet could have been cleaner, but overall the room was well worth it.

Very kind and friendly receptionists 
(24/7 available) 

A nice room for the given price. Check in & out was very quick and uncomplicated. 

Parking garage is like 3 min. away from the Hotel. (20€/day)
A bit far from the center but also close to the Metro station.
I wouldn't recommend, you can find much better accommodations for the same price. Far too small, electrical issues, broken toilet and not very clean. Issues ignored by front desk. Disappointing.
great place, great host
This was a great little place to stay! It was very affordable and clean and had good amenities. It wasn’t too far from any major monuments which was a plus as well.

Great place to stay for some days in Paris. We enjoyed it very much. Modern, very clean rooms, we slept very well, the beds are really comfortable. Metro is very close, just a few meters from the hotel. The staff at the reception is very friendly, polite and very helpful.
Thank you very much for everything. We had a great time in Paris and we would highly recommend this place to anyone who plans to visit Paris.
The room was exactly how it was described. It was clean, the bed was wonderful and it was on a good location that connects easily with the rest of the city!
Decent place, fairly close to trains and buses. Very small room and bathroom.

We hebben een geweldige ervaring gehad bij Naïm in hotel Tilde. De ligging van het hotel is ideaal aangezien er zich een metro station vlak naast het hotel bevind. Een week voor ons vertrek wijzigde onze kamer maar dit bleek achteraf niet zo een probleem te zijn aangezien de nieuwe kamer die we kregen toegewezen dezelfde afmetingen en voorziening had. De voorzieningen waren top, handdoeken, shampoo en zeep zijn beschikbaar in de kamer en elke dag komen ze de lakens verversen. Ik raad deze plaats ten zeerste aan als je een gezellig kamertje zoekt om te verblijven in Parijs.

Ótima estadia, boa limpeza, equipe sempre gentil, o quarto era bem pequeno porem bem montado e confortavel não comprometendo nossa estadia.
Marcelo
Good place to stay for a short time in Paris . Near by metro stations and has good restaurants nearby.
Nice and well maintained space! Reception was excellent
Perfect little hotel, classy and trendy, friendly hosts and nice location!
Great location. Comfortable room. Very helpful staff. Perfect for a weekend in Paris.

We loved staying here! Appreciated the air conditioning considering the summer heat wave. We were a block away from the St. Martin canals and hung out by the water amidst the summer festivities! It is very close to metro stations which were easy to navigate. The room was quite lovely and efficient in terms of use of space... and the bed was extremely comfortable, we had a great sleep for both nights that we stayed here.

A great room for the given price. Although the room is smaller than it looks in the description, but it was quite clean with all the amenities. There was even a coffee machine in the room. The hotel staff was quite polite and helpful, gave us some local tips and helped with directions as well. The place is located quite close to the metro station.
Everyone there was so friendly and helpful!

Heel leuk hotel. Het personeel is erg vriendelijk en de kamer is precies zoals op de foto's. Alles is schoon en ook stijlvol ingericht. Het metro station is een paar meter verderop en je bent binnen een kwartiertje in het centrum van Parijs. Top verblijf gehad!
It's quite small but it's a very cozy and functional boutique hotel.

Es un hotel que esta bien comparando calidad precio.
No se puede pedir mucho más.
Prolijo, bueno calidad de sábanas y Tohallas y tranquilo

This was a lovely little hotel near several Metro stops. The hotel was modern, and the bed was very comfortable. The shower was very nice. The hotel was very kind in holding our luggage during the days before check-in and after check-out. There is a good bakery just next door.

It's a basic hotel with a warm welcome in a great location for Villette. The area is not very touristy and feels a bit "rough", but I loved the authenticity and there are some decent restaurants within walking distance.
Good location close to the metro and train station. Possibility to leave our luggage after check out. Nespresso machine in the room. Good wifi.
This is a great little hotel right off of the Riquet metro stop. A bit far from downtown, but easy access with the metro right outside. Nice, clean, air conditioned room.

This room was a bit smaller than we expected. The sink was pretty small and hard to use with a shelf right above it. We would probably choose to stay in a different part of Paris next time, but it was at least very easy to get to other parts of Paris from this location, and it was just a short walk from a fun hangout spot by the water. Free croissants were appreciated, and the AC worked great! The staff was awesome - very friendly and helpful with whatever we needed.

The Hotel Tilde is a small hotel not too far from the center (15 -30mins by metro depending where you wanna go). The room and bathroom were both very small but still offered everything you need (air conditioning, hair dryer etc). However, the bed is very narrow. For a couple it might be alright but for two friends who want to share a room, it is almost too small as you really lie at the edge of the bed. Breakfast wasn’t included. Be booked it separately and it was good (offered boiled eggs, bread, coffee, juices, cheese, ham, jam, honey, nutella and sweet pastries. Only the first coffee is included. 
I was in the gym of the hotel and for being such a small hotel and having it in a small room it offered everything you need for a little workout.
This Airbnb is a hotel. Cool neighborhood by the canal!

The person who checked us in was friendly and helpful and the room when we arrived looked great. Unfortunately, there were a few issues that we later discovered that were problematic. First, the shower did not drain, nor did it have a functional door to contain the water. We did not notice until after the first shower that the water had overflowed out of the shower and bathroom onto the carpet in the bedroom, wetting our luggage. We used towels for the floor and to try to dry things, but the night-time front desk person was quite unhelpful when we called down to inform them of the problem and need for more towels. The toilet also ran all night, which was loud in the small room. The bed was comfortable, but overall I expected better for the cost of the place.
Above and beyond hospitality! Very kind and generous in speaking English to us and making sure we had everything that we needed.  We would stay here again.
Was okay. Room very small.  Bathroom good

The location is perfect, very close to metro and bus stops. There is a supermarket next door which is very convenient. The checkin/checkout process was quick and smooth. Although it is placed on a big avenue, there was no noise. All in all, great experience. Recommended!

All as described. Great to stay for cheap with a 24/7 reception! Lovely staff and nice small bakery next door. Tip: Grab a coffee, croissant and walk behind the hotel to the little river on a sunny morning for your breakfast! Lovely staff!
Overall okay stay, shower and bathroom were not as clean as would have liked, staff were very slow but attentive, hotel decor is nice, but not in a great location in the city.

My spouse and I stayed here during our recent trip and we loved it. It's small (of course, as it's Europe), but it's well equipped, staff is very friendly and it's close to two metro stations. We had a very pleasant stay. The area around the hotel was very cool with almost zero tourists, which was very refreshing. I highly recommend this for short trips.

This little hotel is perfect for exploring a new part of the city that is often not visited by tourists. walking distance from several metros and Parc des Buttes-Chaumont with breakfast and 24 hour security.

This was my first time in France and I had mixed feelings after hearing locals were rude to tourists and even turned down for lodging but I was welcomed with a big smile. Not only that but I was given advice on sight seeing, places to eat, etc. They even offered to keep my bags stored after I checked out until I was ready to go to the airport. They made my first experience incredible and I wouldn’t change it for anything. The room was great, clean, with a decent view and a minute’s walk to the canal. I’m so grateful to have scored such a wonderful spot.

This is a beautiful place at an excellent price. There are several really good bakeries nearby and a canal just one block away which is a beautiful place to sit, read, or eat. If you want to see a less tourist-filled portion of Paris for a good price - this is a good find. The staff was very kind and helpful. Our room had a slight mold smell, likely from the angle of the shower head and lot of water falling to the floor - I'm not sure that every room has this issue.

Was overwhelmed by how clean the place was. 

The location is great as well. One of the best, if not the best Airbnb, I’ve had in years. 

Cheers, 
RA
The place was as expected. It was small but stylish
Very stylish but small room. A little bit out of the way from the centre but very easily accessible by metro. Great staff!
Perfect weekend stay
Great place!

The place was very good. Close to two metro stations. You are able to reach the city center in about 15 min. The staff is very friendly and helpful all the time. The 24/7 desk is perfect for any inconvenience during the stay. The price and place were really good for Paris expensive prices. Would highly recommend this place.
It is very close to the Metro Station, they response very quick, very thoughtful, the room is very small, other than that, everything is fine
Een gezellig en warm hotel. Meer dan prima verblijf!
Todo perfecto! Volveré!
Great amenities for the value! The location wasn’t one of our favorite areas in Paris, but the hotel and staff were awesome. Very nice use of space in the room.
This is a great location.

We had a great stay, 
The room was small (like all rooms in paris and like it said on the ad for the room) but very nice and clean.
We didn’t book the breakfast but they offered it to us for my boyfriends birthday , so we could enjoy the breakfast that morning.
Thank you so much! Truly an awesome place to stay and easier to get to airport in the morning. Recommend 100%.

Quite room with friendly staff, close to transit to see the sights within Paris. 

I have to mention the staff again: truly top notch, it was absolutely a pleasure to work with them.
Very comfortable spot in Paris; highly recommend! It was nice to stay in a hotel for a change :)
Great value!
the hotel is very close to gare du nord but further away from the center. The hotel was clean and the free tea, coffee and waterbottles were a nice extra. The room is small but very nice and clean

Perfect hotel for a stay in Paris. The hotel is located right next to a supermarket and the metro station which goes straight to Pont Neuf. Also the room is exactly the same as on the pictures, the bed is excellent and everything is very clean. We would highly recommend this hotel.
Super! Pulito, e centrale per i mezzi.

Pleasant stay however much smaller than photo suggest
Staff very good and helpful 
Hotel in walking distance to Metro 
Room very clean however some parts of hotel requiring better upkeep
Gezginlerin iyi fiyata yüksek fayda sağlayabileceği bir tesis. Konum, temizlik, çalışanlar.. Hepsi yeterli derecede iyi

Todo muy bien aunque un poco pequeño es exactamente lo que te ofrecen en el anuncio.
Muy bien ubicado cerca al metro y fácil de ubicar.

Das Hotel ist sehr sauber und bietet alles für einen Kurzurlaub in Paris.
Die Hotelmitarbeiter sind sehr freundlich und ermöglichen einen total unkomplizierten Check-In.
Zwar liegt das Hotel etwas außerhalb, aber mit der Metro kann man alles innerhalb von 15 Minuten erreichen.
Perfect for a short city break. Good location. Excellent staff. An amazing bakery next door.  Would definitely stay again!
Everything was great. Very nice and helpful staff! :)
Nice and quite place. I could be a little cleaner and Restauration.  The employers were really nice and welcoming.
Small but clean room, perfect for what I needed as I’m a tourist.

The hotel staff is good.... except for the Airbnb reference when pointing out deficiencies to repair. As if that is a reason for certain hospitality failures:

Small sink with shelf covering it about 12 inches above it. You can’t spit out your toothpaste into the sink.  Water can only splash on the floor in front. This is just too funky for an otherwise nice looking bathroom.

No sink stopper so don’t lose your earring down the drain. Impossible to wash undies which could have nicely dried on the heated towel bar.

No space for personal toiletries.

The mirror shelf mentioned should be removed. It is faulty design.  In its place a corner shelf and over a the toilet shelf could have been designed to accommodate.

The bath cabinet door was crooked on the hinge and required maintenance.

There was care taken with the design of some aspects of the bath. However the fore-mentioned along with a bit of mold in the shower caulking made the bath funky and irritating.

The bedroom is tiny and the bed takes all the floor space.
Enjoyed my stay, well located and affordable. Rooms are small but reasonable.

Although the room was quite small, it is overall of great value. Super clean and comfortable and the location is just steps away from the metro. Water and refreshments always available in the lobby and it’s a nice and quiet place.
Lovely staff and great location right next to the tube and supermarket.
Indirizzo completamente errato stanza piccola e sporca personale maleducato menefreghista e anche scocciato da evitare assolutamente

Sehr schönes, kleines Zimmer in sehr guter Lage für eine Städtereise (Metro Riquet direkt am Hotel). 
Freundliches und hilfsbereites Personal, das bei Sprachproblemen sofort Englisch sprach!
Sehr gute Sauberkeit, Zimmer wurden täglich gereinigt!
Gerne wieder :)
Very nice, clean, and enjoyable. Room is quite small, but big enough for 2 people. Nice People.
Great and friendly service. Good value for the price!

Kleine kamer met genoeg ruimte voor je spullen. Centrum is wel ver weg, maar de metro stopt voor de deur van het hotel, dus is niet persé een probleem. Doen als je het niet erg vindt om met de metro te gaan en hele dag op pad te zijn, niet doen als je in het centrum wil zitten en soms terug naar hotel wil.
Very Nice stay, friendly staff and clean rooms. Would reccomend
Very close to metro and very nice stay! Nespresso machine in the room for coffee and everything was clean and orderly!

One of the best location we could have choose. You can reach to every point easily. And the Station "Riquet" is exactly in front of the door seriously exactly in front of it. So with our 1 week Metro card, it was amazing. Driving home is like you have your own train station. And the rooms are tidy and perfect! And the bottle water a day, was very helpful! Very very kind and love full stuff! Thanks a lot, i can only recommend this place, also the best price!
Clean, nice staff. Small, but every space you need. Stalingrad metro station is right arond the corner and takes you to Paris Centre in 20 minutes!
Great place, metres away from the tube stop. Definitely recommend

Lovely boutique hotel right next to underground metropolitan station. Staff are lovely and room is as described with a comfy bed, hot shower & coffee machine.  Staff even let me borrow an sewing kit as I had a button issue - very kind.  We did not try the breakfast as we only had a short time in Paris and wanted to explore, but it looked very good and seemed popular 
Thanks for a lovely stay
Nice little place,right next to the metro,lovely service at the front desk!!
Wonderful location, clean space, great value for the price. we will be back and have recommended the place to friends.
Small but nice room, very friendly personal. Directly at the Hotel is a metro-station, some supermarkets and bakeries.
Would recommend to anyone looking to stay in Paris! Clean and the staff was very friendly!
Gezellige kamer met de nodige voorzieningen ! Een aanrader voor zijn prijs en zeker niet twijfelen indien vrij !
Nice option! The rooms are clean and cozy. The locations is great. Next to a metro station.

The room was very clean and the staff was nice. I found it off-putting and unsettling that they made us leave our room key at the front desk when we left every morning. Our passports and valuables were in the room and while it was fine, and I was sure it would be, it was totally new to me and something that I wasn’t comfortable doing. The pictures make the room look larger than it was. It was nearly impossible for both me and my husband to get ready at the same time as there was no walking room. It was just the bed and the bathroom, nothing else. Even though we arrived after check in, the room wasn’t finished being cleaned when we arrived and after a 9 hour flight, all we wanted was to shower and relax. The cleaning lady quickly finished (not sure if that’s a good thing) and we were able to access the room.  Other than that, the bed was comfy, the shower was great and it was quiet. I appreciated the free water they gave us, the map, and staff help navigating the metro— made exploring town easy.
Di certo non tornerei.
Hôtel pulito basico ma confortevole , la stanza pur essendo piccola era ben disposta . Unico difetto la rumorosità della strada.

The room was very small, but super clean. There are two subway stations nearby. The channel is also very nice. Many supermarkets in the neighborhood. It's not the most romantic hotel and the area, but for a stay in Paris it's fine if you do not want to spend too much time in the hotel room. The view was unfortunately on a house wall.
This is an awesome stay in Paris only about a 15 min metro ride to downtown city. The place is super clean and all the staff are so nice and willing to help and give recommendations. Highly recommend

Very responsive and friendly hosts. Room is part of a boutique hotel, located a bit outside of central Paris - but we still managed to walk 30 minutes to the center. Room was clean and had everything we needed, was a bit smaller than what the pictures show but perfect for our one night stay.
Great little boutique style hotel near the centre with excellent connections to the rest of Paris. Friendly staff and lovely room!

We enjoyed our Trip in Paris. The Check in was Very easy and everybody was Very Friendly. Metro Station, super Market and Restaurants are all nearby. Bed is big enough for two but the room was smaller than expected. But we still had a Very comfortable stay there.
Great place, clean and great hospitality.
Room much smaller than expected based on pictures, but further than that it was nice.
Schöne, kleine Unterkunft mit super netten Leuten. Sehr preiswert, gerne wieder.
It's amazing

Good hotel, friendly staff but sheets on the bed had rips in them and the carpet on the stairwell appeared to be rotting. Overall had a nice stay but would recommend more for people looking for basic accomodation whilst exploring Paris.
Really nice experience. Recommended!
It was good for one night. I have to see pretty tiny and no refrigerator or microwave so we had to make it with what we had but overall it was a nice hotel!
Xxx
A lovely place with wonderful front staff. Excellent bakery nearby and close to Metro.

It is located in a lovely area with good tube access to the centre. Everywhere was immaculately clean and staff could not have been more pleasant. Overall a fantastic stay. Would highly recommend and would go back!
We loved our stay at this cute little place. It was small but suited our needs just fine!
Its a good place for sleep a few days
Great hospitality and service! The room is exactly as pictured, and I really enjoyed my stay!
Everything in Paris is a little small, but this hotel is comfy, clean and a nice atmosphere. So it's much easier to accept the smallness
Top

It's a small Room but lovely. The Room is very clean. The Personal on the Reception was very friendly and gave us tips. The Metro is near the Hotel and you can drive with subway to all places in Paris....The Breakfast in Hotel cost 9Euro per Person. But we didnt eat. All over Paris you will find many patisseries... and the pastry there is delicious. 
It was a nice stay and citytrip. thank you!
Great place, very clean, nice location.
Good value for money and sufficient for a short stay and very clean. Very good hospitality. If light sleeper as myself, make sure to bring ear plugs!
Nice and clean place. The hosts are very friendly!£
Really enjoyed my stay here, clean room and kind staff!
Looks like the picture! Very kind people.
sympa
Parfait en amoureux

Bonne établissement, propreté impeccable. rien a dire. attention toute les chambres ne correspondent pas aux photos affichés . Certaine sont vraiment petites. j'en ai fait l'expérience.
A part cela. je valide cette établissement.
Super hôtel proche de la gare très pratique, jolie chambre bien équipée, je recommande :)
C'est un HOTEL classique mais correct
Sans hésitation et sans regret bien au contraire je recommande vivement cet endroit

Très bonne chambre. Il manque juste un peu d’eau, de thé ou quelques boissons à disposition. Ou même du shampooing au cas où...car pour le prix, on s’attend à avoir des petites touches d’intention ! 
Mais à part ça,  je recommande cet chambre !
Très jolie chambre, lit douillet et grande salle de bain avec baignoire. Vue sympa sur la tour Montparnasse. SUPER accueil !
Tout était parfait et très propre. Gros plus pour la gentillesse du personnel. Vous pouvez y aller les yeux fermés. A 2 pas de la gare Montparnasse.
Génial
Chambre parfaite. Rapport qualité prix impeccable
Emplacement idéal. Hôtel très propre
Je vous recommande,très bon hôtel près des commerce restaurant . Très bien situé
Très bon hôtel, bien située, un bon service.
Très bon hôtel
conforme
10/10 would recommend
Great location for a quick stay near Gare Montparnasse! Also had great dinner and crepe recommendations.
Loved the room, large and really nice. The area was soo awesome. Everything was walking distance
Great place for couple staying few nights in Paris. Easy to get to any place in downtown.
Mycket bra förutom alldeles för dyr frukost med de man fick välja på.
Do not miss the experience of view of Montparnasse tower through the roof window right on your bed. Romantic, stylish, clean. Unique!
Clean , stylish , well located , excellent value . Quiet
5 stars!
Very pleasant, very well located, very nice staff

Estupenda localización rodeado de cines, restaurantes y con parada de bus, metro y taxi a unos pasos. Muy bien localizado para conocer y recorrer la ciudad. La habitación algo más pequeña de lo esperado (en Paris no esperábamos mucho más la verdad), pero limpia y muy nuevo todo. Solo le pondría una nota a las máquinas de aire que están un poco viejunas. Pero por un precio tan razonable no creo que hubiera podido encontrar nada mejor.

Stilrent og ingen gamle klamme tæpper, som man specielt i Paris med alle hundelortene vil sætte pris på ;)
Personalet er yderst hjælpsomme, venlige og har brede smil.
Jeg kommer helt klart tilbage igen
Lovely hotel next to Montparnasse Station.
Very characterful and quaint place. We loved it. I cooked gnocchi.

Super accueil et super séjours. 
Toujours là pour répondre à chacune de nos questions 
Appartement proche des commerces et d’un parc, idéal pour aller se balader.
pas de commentaire
un accueil très chaleureux vous fera passer un agréable séjour chez Ella
belle personne, aime recevoir!
Un havre de douceur pour se reposer d une journée parisienne

Les sanitaires également très propres et ella fourni tout le necessaire en produits d'hygiène. Je ne suis resté chez elle que pour dormir une nuit et j'y retourne sans problème si besoin.

Ella est très accueillante... nous y retournerons assurément

Super accueil, Ella est hyper sympa. La chambre est très confortable et tout est très propre.
Très bon accueil ! Logement propre et bien situé, à moins de 15mn à pied du Zénith !
Très bon séjour. Ella s’est montré très disponible. Bon accueil et bonne communication.

Très bon accueil, et l'appartement est proche du métro et situé dans un quartier calme finalement.
Tout confort, idéal pour passer une ou plusieurs nuits, Ella est très agréable. Je recommande ce logement.

Ella m'a offert un accueil très chaleureux. La chambre et la salle de bain sont spacieuses et confortables. Je reviendrai

Logement facile à trouver et agréable. Ella nous a très bien accueillies et nous a donné de bon conseils.
Appartement propre confortable et bien localisé. Ella est très gentille et arrangeante. Je recommande vivement.

Arrivée très facile, Ella est venue me chercher sur le lieu de parking pour me conduire à l'appartement et me donner les infos nécessaires pour le séjour. Ella est très sympa et a passé du temps à me conseiller pour mes visites/sorties. La chambre est conforme aux photos et description, propre, confortable et résidence calme. Les plus, de l'eau, un ventilateur et un nécessaire thé/café dans la chambre. Merci !
Accueil agréable, Ella est très efficace pour indiquer les directions. Appartement propre, rien à redire.
