Great location for small restaurants of food from many different nationalities.  Very close to Pompidou Centre and Hotel De Ville.  Good communication from Clara.  Apartment is very small with windows only on the loft level (sleeping area, one double bed and one single bed).  Kitchen/living very small and on the ground level, not really suitable for 5 persons if more than one night is required.  We were 3 and found it cramped for 4 nights.

Clara’s appartment is very good located, you can go to Norte dame walking about 10min, also there is many restaurants and bars near by, just one or two blocks away, there is a supermarket cross the street, highly appreciated. Subway (metro) also one block far from the place.  You get what you see, all pictures are accurate. Check in is also easy to do.

We were quite disappointed with this property.  The main reason for this is that there is a very bad mould outbreak in the toilet. The smell of the mould is very strong inside the toilet and also is noticeable in other parts of the apartment.  The toilet also is broken, so every time you flush the toilet water leaks all over the floor. 

The overall cleanliness of the property was not great either. There was a lot of dust and it looks like the bare minimum is done for each clean. A thorough clean is very much needed. 

It looks like the photos are quite outdated and don’t give a fair reflection of the current state of the property.  For example there is a few furnishings pictured in the living room, which aren’t actually there.
The bathroom and toilet are pictured looking very clean and modern, whereas that’s not the case. There is a lot of mildew present in the shower and the mould in the toilet as mentioned. 

The place is need of a bit of a restoration. For example, the kitchen stools are very wobbly and we could only use one, as the others felt unsafe.  A piece of the stairway also came loose while using the stairs. 

On a positive note, our host Clara was very responsive to our messages and did provide a temporary solution for the leaking toilet. 

Also the location was very good and we really loved the neighbourhood.
Really great location, but if you are going to stay more nights is not suitable for 5 persons - it is quite compact an only one bathroom and toilet are available.
This is a stylish and fun apartment in the heart of a great walking area for travelers!
A great location. Good for a couple of close friends

It was a well designed space and perfectly located in the city center.  Amenities include WiFi, washer/dryer and fans. The bathroom leak made the stay less pleasant, however. I also almost fell down on the stool that I sat on when it almost collapsed from missing screws.

Clara é uma ótima anfitriã! Pelo apartamento ficar no térreo facilitou minha estadia com meus pais! A localização é ótima! Mercados, bares, restaurantes e patisseries nos arredores!
Os cuidados que a Clara mostrou ter tido foram muito satisfatórios!!

The location is amazing and Clara provided a binder with information about what to do and how to get there. The space is great, and it’s quirky layout only adds to the charm. When we left it was a few minute walk to the subway that goes straight to the airport, very convenient.

Spacious apartment  in one of the most lively neighborhoods in Paris. Close to great food, the metro, and attractions. Comfortably fit 4 adults in this apartment. Clara was responsive and accommodating all weekend.
bueno
very good
Not applicable
Apto com excelente localização.

This is a very clean, nicely decorated and functional apartment. It is on the ground floor, so no stairs to carry heavy luggage up. It has a pleasant garden in the entry area. I would be very happy to stay here again. Access was readily managed although we arrived a little early.

The location is perfect; check-in was smooth. I would recommend it specifically for this. However, the disturbing odor from objects in the bathroom and care of the place in general did not meet the price or expectations.

Well located apartment in a smart part of Paris, but lovely and quiet despite being so central.  Comfortable beds and pillows (which is rare).  We were a party of four, so found the apartment a little too cozy, but would be great for a couple.   Would have liked a towel for the downstairs toilet and some more mugs.  Communication with Clara and check in arrangements were excellent.

Clara's place was clean, well kept and in a great location. Her place was a nice fit for my family of 3. Close to cafe's, grocery market, metro, and the George Pompidou Center. It was easy to get around thanks to Clara's suggestions.

Centrally Located, close to metro stations.
Super easy check in instruction and the appartment is totally georgeous!
Nice apartment, good location
The self check-in is the easiest and most straightforward one I had. The place is very clean, good location. Strongly recommend!

Clara is a great host and has a funky little apartment in the centre of Paris. It is probably best suited for couples due to its size and locality. As a previous guest also suggested it probably just needs a little tlc.

Very well located and clean apartment in a pleasant area of Paris! Very easy to access the attractions we were interested in, felt very safe in the area and found good breakfast restaurants as well as small grocery stores. The apartment looks just as on the pictures, is clean and fresh. We were 4 (2 adults and 2 teenagers) staying in the apartment and it worked very well. Clean and fresh smell in the apartment.
A bit hot though since no AC nor fan is available in the apartment and only possible to open windows on one side ( only windows on one side of the building)
Can definitely recommend this cozy apartment!
El apartamento se encuentra bien ubicado en un buen sector, cerca del metro y de restaurantes. Sin embargo, hubo notorias falencias en la atención y la disponibilidad de elementos para la estancia.

This apartment is in a fabulous location. It is in an old building, so it is not perfect and new. It can be a little noisy from the neighbours in the evenings, but was not too bad. It is exactly as it looks in the pictures, the facilities were pleasant. It’s location is the best feature. We would definitely stay here again.

This is the worst Airbnb that we have experienced. Unless the hostess can get rid of the molds throughout this property in addition to thoroughly clean this property , I do not recommend it to anyone.
Very convenient location.  Clean and comfortable.

Clara’s home is small but comfortable and in a great location to walk to a number of Paris’s most well known landmarks. It was perfect for my partner and I and our three small children - especially as it is only minutes walk from the Anne Frank Garden, a quiet oasis with green grass to sit and picnic on, which is a rarity in the middle of Paris.

Great location! Easy access to the metro. Upstairs beds were great! The couch/bed in the living area is not comfortable due to missing some boards in the frame. We put the mattress on the floor which was fine.
Clara is a great communicator and the location was nice, but there were no wash cloths, kitchen towels, and the apartment was a lot smaller than it appeared in the pictures.

Casa di Clara è in ottima posizione. A due passi da moltissimi locali e dal Centre Pompidou. È piccola ma accogliete. Non la consiglierei per 5 persone. Il divano letto è da cambiare. Per 3 persone invece è sicuramente ok.  Il check-in è stato semplice e Clara sempre molto disponibile.
The location of Clara’s flight was ideal to get to/from CDG airport and throughout the city itself.  Thanks Clara!

Excellent location, easy entry and communicative host. That said, photos of the apartment did not match the reality. Leftover wet towels from the previous occupants, excessive mold in the shower, broken sofa bed and general dirt and grime in the apartment made for quite an unpleasant stay. Definitely more shabby than chic.
Close to trains and walkable to Notre Dame and plenty of cafes and shopping

A great place within a walking distance to many attractions. Stylish and cosy appartment you want to stay much longer than one night! The only issue - 40 euro charge for cleaning the appartment, when the layer of the dust on the mirror downstairs allows you to draw on it.
Location is very very close to multiple stations and many amenities. Excellent check-in process. Nice cute apartment. Very easy to communicate with the host. Will stay here during our next visit .

Clara’s place has an excellent location, close to the public transportation, shopping mall, supermarket, restaurant, bars, etc 
We were 5 adults and stayed for 5 days, it was comfortable, even sleeping in the sofá bed, and it had all the utensils we needed to cook little meals, and also fast WiFi connection!
Clara was very helpful and fast when I had questions about the apartment.
Would absolutely recommend this!

Sehr gute Lage! Es haperte nur an kleinen Details, wie z.B. Zu wenig Toilettenpapier. Preis-Leistung war auch nicht so toll. Habe dazu aber auch keine grossen Erfahrungen bezüglich Konkurrenz.  Wäre der Preis ein bisschen günstiger gäbe es mindestens ein gut.

The place is in a brilliant location, however we did not enjoy our stay.  The reasons were:-
-All the bedding smelled of smoke
-The floors were not clean
-The stools were very wobbly and unsafe
-The shower needed a good clean and had mould.
-There was only one broken wine glass and one cup.

In fairness, we reported this and Clara was able to bring some brand new duvet covers, and personally cleaned the floors and shower for us, and this was appreciated and meant we didn’t ask for a refund.  She also brought a few cups and explained that the chairs are in the process of being replaced.

Overall it was a real shame as the location is fabulous, and the decor is lovely.  There are worse places in Paris.  If I knew the faults were rectified before arriving, and I wasn’t worried about the smell of smoke or travelling without my family, I would consider staying again, however these were deal breakers for us.  Clara’s response was good which is a good sign, but my advice to future travellers would be to check other reviews, and perhaps contact Clara in advance to see if these problems persist - I truly hope not, to realise the potential of this property.

Sadly this experience highlights for me the risk of AirBNB where quality is hard to assure in advance.
La localización es muy buena. El apartamento estaba muy sucio,no lo recomiendo
Outstanding walkable location, close to 2 metro lines. Tons of restaurants, bakeries, bars around. Comfortable and clean!

Slept 4 very comfortably. The place is small but that should be expected in such a great location. Very central and easy to walk just about anywhere. Clara was very helpful and responsive! Would definitely recommend.
Excellent place into the heart of the city.

Vi var fire gamle kolleger, der havde en hyggelig weekend i Paris, hvor Claras lejlighed lå helt perfekt. Den ligger i stuen, så man er ude på gaden lynhurtigt. Alligevel er der ikke gadestøj, idet den ligger i et baghus. Vi havde selv en musikafspiller med, hvilket var en god ide. Sengene er gode, og bruseren er skøn. Man kan høre andre beboere i huset gå på trappen og gå i bad. Jeg kan anbefale at leje Claras sted.

Great apartment - convenient to lots of good restaurants. 
Shower could use some updating, but very comfortable and quiet. 
Would definitely stay here again.
Great location ; nice apartment ; would recommend

Great, great location. Very close to metro, food, nightlife, etc.   Easy to access and great for luggage since it’s on the first floor. Clean, beds for everyone that stayed, though the overall space got tight at times.
Very good place to stay, great location close to Pompidou and many other Paris Landmarks, The communication with Clara was quick, in general I Recommend this apartment.
Clara’s place was great! Well located and very comfortable.
L'appartamento è piccolo ma molto confortevole situato in una zona comoda ai servizi e nella stessa strada arrivi al Centre Pompidou.
Lovely little apartment in a  great location.

We had a very nice stay at the appartment for a weekend trip to Paris. The appartment is very much like in the pictures. The first floor with the beds is very spacious and light, the bottom floor a bit more dark, but not a problem at all. The beds were fine, the sofa-bed was a bit hans. The shower had good waterpressure, the toilet (which is seperate from the shower) was a bit small.
The location was very good and close to 4 different metros, supermarkets and the lovely areas of Marias.
It was a very good stay for a weekend for 5 people, would definitely stay again!
Clara gave great arrival info. Her place is close to 2 Metro stops and there is a grocery super close. So many restaurants to choose from too!

Great location and really useful apartment if you want 3 separate beds at a reasonable price.  Be aware there is no privacy between the 3 sleeping spaces if that matters to you. Also you may want to know that the toilet is downstairs.

 It's a quiet place, very close to the Pompidou and we walked every from the flat.  It's well maintained, and has some basic store goods in the cupboard which is helpful.  Think about taking coffee pods with you if you want to be sure to have some, though the supermarket two minutes away is open late and has everything you could need.  Ciara leaves really helpful local tips and advice, and check in and out were easy and straighforward.
地方很精致，离蓬皮杜艺术中心非常近，离地铁也很近，交通很方便。
Great location, easy communication with host.

Clara was amazing and her home was even better. Clara was very flexible and helpful. Her home was very clean and it was right in the centre which was very convenient. We had such an amazing time. Thank you for hosting us Clara :)
Great place, nice and central. As four friends we were very comfortable here. Also the benefit of a shower that really DROPS on you. lush
great location and nice host, merci!
A nice place to stay.
Great place for a small group of young people. Central, clean, chic!
Perfectly positioned. We were able to walk to all the major attractions.
The apartment is cuter than pictured. Some cleaning things to work out but other than that we loved it!

We loved the proximity to shops and popular sites such as the Louvre, Notre Dame, Pompidou Centre.  The apartment is privately tucked away and easy to find as Clara provided great directions.  Check in was a breeze and gave my family a taste of living in Paris.

Very easy to find and check-in was without issue. The space and layout is very funky, with nice little touches in design that make it a fun place to stay. It was very warm, and nice to come home to after a cool wet day sightseeing. Would recommend.
Great apartment in a great location. Perfect for our few days in Paris
The location is great, very easy to access from train and nearby other tourist attractions.

The location of Clara's apartment is excellent. There was plenty to do within walking distance from the apartment and the neighborhood was safe for us (2 women) to walk around, even at 3AM. We were able to walk to the apartment from the Paris East train station at 11PM with no issues and the transportation to Paris's main attractions is quite convenient.

Our only complaint was the status of the shower. The shower is a bit dated and the showerhead had seen cleaner days. Also, the heat was up quite high when we arrived so we had to turn the temperatures down and crack windows because it was so hot in the loft area where the beds were located.

Es una ubicación muy cómoda en el centro con múltiples lugares de comida y restaurantes bar por los qué estén interesados en éstos, está a  minutos caminando el metro más cercano y hay dos metros con conexiones aproximadamente a 10 minutos uno de estos te puede llevar a la torre Eiffel o a Disney, el hecho qué haya un supermercado en la esquina es muy cómodo, está perfecto para caminar cómo a 15 minutos de Notre Dame y a 20 hacía el museo del Louvre al igual que a 25 al jardín de Luxemburgo

It was a nice place ina good location with easy check in instructions.  Toilet being separate from shower seemed odd. It worked out to be better when there are several people staying.  Has 2 beds and a couch (pull out to become a bed possibly). Secure building in ground floor and no need to carry luggage up and down.
We had a wonderful experiences at Clara's apartment. It's very well located and stylishly furnished. Communication with Clara was very fluent and the check-in process was super convenient.

L'appartamento è carino e confortevole, a pochi passi dal centro di Parigi. Abbiamo alloggiato in 5 e gli spazi erano adeguati come da annuncio. L'unica nota negativa è stata la muffa sul soffitto del box doccia e nella toilette al piano terra, causata da un'infiltrazione che rilasciava un odore sgradevole.
Great location! SO many places to eat and shop with in 2 blocks of the apartment.  Was nice to be away from the touristy areas.
The house is in a busy city, the traffic is convenient and easy to find. The only downside was that there was no hot water after 11pm, and four people had the last bath without hot water.

Clara’s Place was very convenient, I’m very close proximity to the Pompidou Center, with cute bars and restaurants. The area felt safe and offered many bars and restaurants. It was a great experience. Thank you Clara!

Excellent location.  We only stayed for one night but managed to walk to the Lovre along the Seine, Notre Dame and visit the Pomdipou before returning back to the flat passing some great restaurants which were off the tourist route.  We ate at a fantastic modern Chinese restaurant a few minutes walk from the flat which suited us perfectly after being on our feet all day! Clara left a useful guide to all the top sites to visit.

Great location, literally in the heart of Paris close to everything. Also, although being in a prime location, this unit is on the ground floor at the end of a courtyard so very quiet! Getting in and out of the flat was a breeze, Clara was great. Tip: Do not shower at night, the water charges overnight and hot water is typically gone by 7pm, great temperature and pressure resumes right after midnight.

This is a perfect apartment for a short break in Paris. A wonderful location, nice and central, yet very peaceful. You walk in from a busy street, up a corridor and into a little open courtyard, unlock the door and you're in a little haven of quiet. The neighbours can be heard walking upstairs, but that's to be expected when in a city centre location in an apartment block. The apartment is fitted out well and was perfect for me and my 12 year old daughter.
excelente lugar y ubicación, queda cerca a todos los lugares, muy fácil el acceso a transporte público, muchos restaurantes por el lugar
Great place, I love the interior design, very secured place, accessible, near the metro, convenience store  and lot of restaurants around. Will surely recommend to friends!
Great apartment in a fantastic location, however it is feeling a little unloved. There was some dampness in the bathroom and the kitchen stools are loose and a bit wobbly. But we had a great time.
A great small place for travellers,walking distance from museums and pubs.
Clara's place was great - fantastic location, modern, clean, easy and she was great communicator. The beds were comfortable too. I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again!
Flat was central location, small but suitable for a short stay.

I booked Clara's place very last minute and thankfully, I got a response quickly that it was good to go. I really enjoyed the location as it's close to many restaurants, shops and touristic places you can walk to. I would definitely stay again. The bed to me was very comfortable, almost had me sleeping until noon. Thanks again Clara!

Clara's apartment was very clean and close to the city center. It was so easy to walk anywhere we wanted to go. Clara was very accommodating and informative during out booking process, as well as just before and after our stay.
Great location!

Tutto bene, alloggio carino, Clara molto disponibile e celere nelle risposte. I bagni purtroppo non sono il massimo per un appartamento ritenuto adatto a 5 persone. La stanza con il wc veramente troppo sacrificata (ricavata in un sottoscala) e il bagno con doccia al piano di sopra davvero piccolissimo. Soprattutto sarebbe opportuno un intervento mirato affinché la parete della doccia tornasse libera dalla muffa purtroppo veramente sgradevole nonostante il locale fosse di per sé pulito. Comunque il soggiorno é stato positivo: la posizione é la migliore possibile!
Interessante ligging! Leuk binnentuintje. Goede bedden boven, het zetelbed beneden minder comfortabel. Vriendelijke gastvrouw aan de telefoon.

Clara's place was very comfortable and cozy to stay, we stayed there for three nights and it's absolutely great! Very central located, lots of pub cafe and restaurant across the street, supermarket is just opposite street! Overall was really pleasant, recommended!
Great apartment.  Easy access to everything in Paris. Walkable to Notre Dame. Very close to metro. Easy check in and check out.
All great

El apartamento está muy bien situado, en pleno centro de París. Es pequeño, pero bien distribuido, nosotros fuimos cinco y nos apañamos bien. Tiene mucha información en él sobre París que ayuda a visitarlo. Además tuvimos un pequeño problema de menaje, y Clara nos atendió inmediatamente y al día siguiente estaba solucionado.
Bonito, algo bohemio y agradable. Muy céntrico.

Fantastic Communcation, allowed us to drop our bags off early
Fantastic Location, right in the heart of Paris, near restaurants bars clubs and tourist attractions
Beautiful Appartement, spacious but cosy, ideal for a couple or a group of friends.
Highly recommend!
Really enjoyed our stay, good location, good for a group of friends and good use of space!

We only had one night in the apartment but it added a wonderful finish to our holiday and none of us wanted to leave. Beautiful location, family friendly, quiet area, comfortable and cosy, it was a wonderful apartment, an all-rounder. Perfect fit even for a family of five. In our opinion, our trip to Paris was made ever more enjoyable by our stay in this apartment. A real icing on the cake. Thank you again! Conor
Fantastic spot. Great apartment. Highly recommend. Good communication.

Clara's place is in an ideal location, safe and well decorated.  However, we arrived to a full trash bin and mold riddled bathrooms.  The linens were not clean and we were left with a half roll of toilet paper to last 3 days.  Once contact was with the host, check-in and use of the apartment was easy.  If you don't mind tight quarters and she is able to fix the cleaning standards, her place would be hard to beat.
Great location, easy to get to and a comfortable place to come home to at the end of the day. Thanks.

Clara's place was great! The location was perfect, and the apartment was very chic. Loved the loft and openness of it all. We were 3 adults staying here and it was very comfortable for us. Check in/check out was super easy and I would absolutely stay here again if I am lucky enough to be in Paris. Thank you, Clara!

We were so excited to be in Paris and be at this listing. When I booked this AirBnB, Clara indicated that she would reach out to me a few days before check in and never did. I messaged her and called her the day before and never recieved a response. The morning of arrival we were waiting at the airport trying to confirm we had a place to stay. We had to call AirBnB and talk to a case manager about making alternative arrangements. This is not the kind of stress anyone wants during a trip abroad. Finally Clara responded but gave no explanation or apology for her lack of communication. Upon arrival, the home was not as clean as expected and the shower had mold in it. The only two good things about this listing were Clara allowing us to drop off luggage earlier then check in and the location. Lots of food options, shopping and places to drink.

El apartamento esta genial, el barrio tiene muy cerca un supermercado así como varios sitios diferentes donde cenar o donde tomar una cerveza tranquilamente.
Clara nos ayudado ante cualquier duda muy contentas con todo

Nice and cute little apartment. Good location and the best check-in process ever!!  Only compliant was one day around 5-6pm there was an impromptu gathering outside of the apartment with loud music, cigarette smokers and loud talking.
Excelente departamento para 2 personas, ubicado en una zona central con gran cercanía a la locomoción. Se podría mejorar la comunicación previa.

Fabulous location, so easy to walk to all the main sites. Funky modern flat and Clara is a very friendly, helpful host. Would recommend this to anyone and we would stay here again if in Paris without hesitation.
파리 중심가로 역이랑도 가깝고 예쁜 집이었어요~ Clara가 친절하게 안내해줘서 너무 고마웠어요~.. 주변에 상가랑 카페도 많아서 활기찬 여행이 되었어요.

Perfection location, easy and precise communication with Clara. In the center of Paris, closed to Centre Pompidou, surrounding by restaurents and bars. 4 Metro stops near by. No worry about the noise in the apartment as it's located at the backside of building. Cosy deco with personal taste, very clean. Fully recommended!!
非常好的一个公寓，适合朋友或者全家人一起。公寓内温馨舒适，方便寻找，靠近饭店和蓬皮杜中心，交通便利。房东非常好，及时问我们是否到达公寓，还提供一些方便的建议。非常推荐！

Tiene una ubicación excelente, es muy coqueto y confortable. Salvo alguna cosa como por ejemplo la falta de servilletas de papel o paño de cocina, todo lo demás estupendo. Como punto a mejorar, sería conveniente que el horario de salida fuera más flexible
Excellent location for a trip in Paris

Place was super cute and great location. Lots of different restaurants close by. We were able to walk to a few tourists places like Notre Dame and the Louvre which was nice; allowed us to save some money and explore the town. We had a small issue with some ants we found on out first day there. We got in touch with Clara immediately and she was right on to of it and got it taken care of and we didn't have any further issue.
Very good location and a cosy little apartment. We had a great stay!
The location is superb and easy to find. Easy to access public transport and restaurant, but need more prompt reply from host and improve little more on the floor cleanliness
Good place
Местоположение шикарное!
Nice place but inexistant hosting and late responses, i couldn't leave my luggage anywhere near, the host would not help and i had to go to the airport 6 hours before our flight

Clara's place was perfectly located with lots to see and do within just a short walk. It's also very well connected by the metro for visits across Paris.

The apartment was great, plenty of space and with everything we needed. it was also very quiet at night considering we were in such a lively area.

Clara's place it's the best! She gave us all the info we needed and the check in was pretty easy. The apartment is in an amazing centric spot, close to restaurants, bars, supermarkets and metro stations in a vibrant, fun and secure neighborhood. Perfect place to rest after walking around the hole day. The only little down side was in the mornings because sometimes we could hear steps up and down the stairs above the apartment although we didn't care much about this because we totally would stay here again. Love this place!

Clara's place was above and beyond what the pictures showed! It has high ceilings, plenty of natural light, and a really great home feeling while being away from home. Clara was extremely helpful and communicative. I will definitely look to stay here in the future.

The apartment is in a fantastic location - in the heart of the City, with the tourist attractions, bars and restaurants on the doorstep, but set off the road and incredibly quiet. Clara was a wonderful host, and kept in communication throughout the booking process and our stay in Paris. The apartment is very nicely decorated and cosy - I'd say it was ideal for our group (4 girls) or a family.  I would definitely stay there again and would highly recommend.

I stayed here on a girls weekend (4 ladies in total) and the location was perfect and we had plenty of space in the apartment. We were close to shops, bars, restaurants and sites. Clara was a great host and very accommodating. Would highly recommend for a couple or small group to stay.
Beautiful location and comfortable!

Stayed for 3nights at Paris with 3 guests. The place is spacious. Love the sleeping area. Everything is good, eateries, supermarket and metro are walking nearby.

However, we did not manage to see Clara in person while check-in the place. 

Things we are quite disappointed were no tv programmes installed, the kettle was kinda rusty as its been quite sometimes someone using it, we're not sure how to use the induction cooker and not sure where was the rubbiste chute. Did asked Clara how to use the induction cooker and she only can make it late morning where we are out & about. So we did not manage to cook our own meal at the premises.

I would like to neutral recommend this place cause its convienience to everything and security of the apartment.

This flat was exactly how it seems- charming, close to public transit, comfortable and affordable for the area. We liked that it wasn't right in the busy area of the Marais but was a bit more residential. Would definitely stay here again.

Tuvimos una gran experiencia en el departamento de Clara, un lugar chico pero acogedor, muy cercano a más de una línea de metro y perfectamente ubicado a unos pasos del Centre Pompidou. Perfectamente equipado, limpio y cómodo. Muy recomendable para alojarse en París.

Nice cosy little apartment in a quiet area but close to restaurants and bars. It was perfect for us as we were visiting a trade show so we just needed a nice quiet place to come home to sleep. Clara gives very informative tips on which metro to take to the apartment.  Please note that Rue De St Martin crosses the main road and don't do as we did and go in the wrong direction.
Great place for a couple to explore Paris.
The apartment is nice and well located..the only problem is that the bathroom is downstairs and it would have been nicer if it was next to the bedroom.

Check-in was completely seamless; and, the location of the apartment is well situated to all the common attractions and nuanced attractions and restaurants off the beaten path. Each of the beds upstairs are comfort and the futon downstairs can comfortably fit two people.
Great Space for a couple looking to explore Paris in a lovely loft space. Any more than 2 may get crowded. Excellent central location to
Buona soluzione, comoda, vicina a tutte le attrazioni. Centralissima.
The house is very nice and the location is good but the cleaning wasn't enough.

My friend and I loved our stay! It was plenty of room for two people in a great location -- it's a short walk to many sights and a handful of metro stops that got us around the city, there's cute cafe's and restaurants that are also within walking distance, and there's a grocery store just across the street (which was helpful since we were there over New Years when many things were closed and it's hard to get dinner reservations). Another thing to note is that the flat is very secure which is always important. Clara was quick to confirm our stay and very easy to communicate with before we arrived. Even the handy men working on the outside of the building were friendly and helpful when we arrived and were figuring out how to get into the flat.

Clara was amazing!!! Her home was just as the pictures described, and the location was absolutely incredible. I would not want to stay anywhere else in Paris. You are so close to everything and the room felt spacious. Also the pull out bed was very comfortable. :)

Muy bien situada, con todo lo necesario para pasar unos días en una ciudad tan maravillosa como París.

Clara ha estado siempre pendiente de nosotros.

Por comentar simplemente, las camas se encuentran en el piso de arriba sin separación

Easy check-in for this stylish and well-located place. Very comfortable beds and cute decor. Loved the nespresso machine and fast wifi. If you're someone who uses the bathroom in the night it can be tricky to navigate the stairs in the dark. In the back of the building so very very quiet and not much natural light but we didn't mind this as we were out all day anyhow. Really great neighborhood with lots of shopping and bars nearby.

Great central location, supermarket just across the street, very nice and pretty big apartment with comfortable beds. Clara is very comunicative, the check in system is safe and easy. And big plus for us as coffee lovers - best coffee in town is just around the corner - check Loustic! Deffinetly will recomend!

+ We had a nice stay at Clara's appartment. Although we were early, she offered to leave our luggage at the appartment until it was clean. She sent me all the information we needed for our stay.
- The shower ran over 
- There was a lot of mold in the bathroom/shower
Great location for a family trip. The hot water machine is only on during the night so you may or may not have hot water to take a shower at night. Location was great.
Central  & convenient little flat!
Great place！

A receptividade e comunicação com Clara foram excelentes. A localização é ótima, próxima de supermercado, padaria e transporte público. Apesar de problemas que tivemos com o aquecimento da água por duas noites,  a anfitriã mostrou-se disposta a resolver imediatamente. O apartamento é bem equipado e hospeda confortavelmente 3 pessoas.

We were a group of 5 friends and we found the place spacious enough for all of us. 
Place was very well equipped, plus it was comfortable and nicely furnished.
No street sound reaches the appartment.

Location was perfect. Great neighborhood. Well communicated to the entire city. 

Clara also provided a self made guide with tips and highlights.
Such a great apartment in the centre of Paris near the Pompidou museum. Clara had everything in order for our arrival. I would repeat if coming back to Paris
Cosy little apartment very well situated. Just perfect for a short trip.

The apartment was perfect for a family of 4 (our kids are 11 and 8) for one night. Very comfortable, clean and secure in a great area. It wouldn't be good for a family with younger kids as the stairs within the flat are all open, but ours are older so it was just fine for us.  Clara was extremely responsive and very helpful. Thank you.

The flat is located in anperf t spot , near everything from the Marais up to the Pompidou , from Notte dame up to the louvre . Excellent neighborhood and perfect for any type of need you may have . The flat has all the amenities for a short and long term stay . One big bed and a smallest one at the top floor and a couch that turns into a bed in the kitchen / living room . Modern Bathroom  and great design and taste into the decoration . Is the perfect space for a family or a couple . I would say it's the perfect pied a terre in Paris for anyone that needs to stay in the city from 1 up to weeks. I highly recommend it to any guest!!!

Vorab: Die Lage ist sehr gut, die Kommunikation ebenfalls. Weiter gefällt der Ordner, in welchem alle nützlichen Infos wie Metrostationen in der Nähe etc. zu finden sind. Das wars dann aber schon mit dem Positiven. Für 150.- für eine Nacht gab es ein schimmliges Bad, nasse Handtücher, viel grober Staub unter dem Bett, ein müffeliger Geruch nach abgestandenem Wasser und zu guter Letzt berechnete mir die Gastgeberin noch die volle 220.- Kaution, weil ich mich selber aus Versehen ausgeschlossen habe und sie angeblich das Schloss wechseln musste. Schlussendlich zahlte ich also 370.- für ein bei weitem nicht gutes Apartment.

좋은 숙소입니다. 바로 근처에 큰 경찰서가 있어서 치안도 좋아요. 단 복층이라서 왕복이 좀 지칩니다. 그리고 환기가 잘 안돼요. 
위치는 아주 좋아요. 퐁피두 센터에서 걸어서 5분이고, 그 외 다른 곳에 가기도 좋은 구역이에요.  호스트와의 의사소통도 원활합니다. 저의 경우에는 난방기 작동법을 몰라서 물었는데 답변도 바로 왔고 잘 잤냐고 몇 번이나 물어보는 점이 좋았어요. 바로 길 건너에 슈퍼마켓도 있어서 며칠 묵어도 좋을 것 같아요.
Clara was excellent at communicating throughout the visit!

Great communication, very smooth arrival arrangements. Excellent location for exploring Paris, within walking distance of a lot of attractions, and Metro station very close by. Supermarket only a few metres away. We greatly enjoyed our stay. Only slight negative point was that there wasn't a lot of comfortable seating in the living area, due to confinements of space, but as we spent most of our time out and about exploring Paris this wasn't too much of an issue. We would stay here again.

Great apartment in a busy neighborhood with easy access to everything you need in Paris! Easy to find, pictures exactly as apartment is and Clara was a great host with lots of communication!

Noises from neighbors can be loud as they walk about so please consider brining a noise machine if you are a light sleeper!

Highly recommend!

It was very easy and convenient to locate the hotel and easy to access the apartment. Due to the ground floor location the apartment was a little dark and the only windows were on the upper floor and we were a little worried about leaving them open at night as only one had a security grill. 
The apartment has a bit of a damp smell overall because of this and quite small for 4 people but very convenient to lots of shops and restaurants. The stools were very wobbly and either need replacing or fixing, and there was nowhere else to sit when the sofa bed was out. We ran out of hot water 2 of the 4 nights we were there although there was plenty of hot water in the mornings. There is a washing machine but no dryer so we had to drape towels everywhere. While there were some good aspects i don't think we'd stay again as there is better value apartments.

Die Lage und das Design des Appartments sind top. Viel besser kann man in Paris nicht wohnen. Schön wäre zu wissen gewesen, dass es unten in der Küche und im Wohnzimmer kein richtiges Tageslichtbad gibt. Jetzt zum Manko: die Wohnung war super dreckig. Auf Rückfrage wurde mir gesagt, die Wohnung sei geputzt. Der Teppich im Wohnzimmer hatte sehr viele Flecken und Krümmelrückstände, in der Toilette unten war überall alter Staub und der Boden dreckig. Im Schlafraum oben und im Bad waren riesige offensichtliche Schimmelstellen, das gleiche gilt für die Dusche. Gerne würde ich zur Anschaulichkeit hier Fotos hochladen. Das geht leider nicht.

We felt welcome and Clara tried to work with us on an early check-in.  However our flight was delayed and we did not need it.  We absolutely loved the neighborhood and were able to walk to many sites including Place des Vosges, Bastille, Notre Dame, the Seine, Tuileries Garden, Champs-Élysées and the Arc de Triumph.
There were 3 of us and it slept us very comfortably.  The apartment makes the best of a small space with natural light coming in from the courtyard window from the upstairs. 
We enjoyed the coffee house right next door along with the bakeries close by.  There were also many cafe's in the area to choose for a glass of wine or dinner.
Great location. Good price. Very quiet and secure. The apartment had everything we needed. Beds and pillows were very comfortable.
We had a great experience at Clara's. She was communicative and helpful at all times. The unit was cozy and convenient, and everything we expected.
Perfect little appartement in a great location! Clean and tidy and Clara was very easy to communicate with as a host! Would stay here again for sure!
Clara was lovely and helpful. The apartment was as advertised.

We thoroughly enjoyed our experience at Clara's very funky, well designed flat, and while it was somewhat tight quarters for a family of 5, the reality was we knew most of our trip would be exploring outdoors, and the uniqueness of the place was well worth the trade.  We ate breakfasts there and did cook one dinner, but knew in advance there wasn't an oven so were careful re groceries.   Excellent location, with easy access to groceries, patisseries, restaurants, and happily close to both the Seine and Gard du Nord. Clara was also very responsive re small issue with hot water, that was resolved quickly.  Thank you

Tolle Wohnung, absolut zentral mitten im Leben von Paris. Die Wohnung bietet alles was man braucht. Paris hatte über 30 Grad, aber in der Wohnung war es kühl und ruhig, da in einem schattigen Innenhof. Wenn ich wieder mal nach Paris komme ist dies meine erste Anlaufstelle. Clara vielen Dank!
Excelente ubicación. Las fotos son tal cual el departamento! Ideal para 2 personas. Clara respondió todas nuestras consultas en tiempo breve! Muchas gracias Clara!
The location of the apartment is perfect. It is in the center of a very lively area of the city. It is close to many train and rail stations. Clara has been always available
Clara was very prompt with email responses and was also proactive in checking by mail that everything was going well during our stay.
The apartment's location is perfect. All the services are nearby (Metro station, Taxi station, Supermarket, Pharmacy,Restaurants). The kitchen is complete. Miss. Clara is a helpful and kind person.

Clara was a great host, there was an issue with the hot water, we were able to communicate with her easily and she fixed the problem within a couple hours. Apartment is in a great location, close to transportation, walking distance to some sights, many restaurants, shopping and any last minute forgot items. I would definitely recommend this listing for small groups looking to easily enjoy Paris.

We had a wonderful stay in Clara's apartment.   The flat is very cosy but our family of two adults and two teenagers managed quite well, and the kitchen had all the amenities we needed.   The apartment sits at the end of a lovely passageway far from the street, so it's very quiet.  The location cannot be topped, in a neighborhood full of interesting restaurants, shops and sites.  We especially enjoyed the small food market just a two minute walk from the flat, which was immensely helpful whenever we needed to buy something on the spur of the moment.  We would definitely recommend Clara's flat to anyone visiting Paris.

The apartment was really nice and central, close to various stations in the Marais district. It was homely and fitted 4 adults nicely! Clara was responsive and easy to communicate. Will definitely recommend this to friends or families visiting Paris!
Great neighborhood, access to the apartment was easy
El alojamiento no es apto para cinco personas.  Sus ambientes son pequeños. No hay privacidad en los dormitorios
Well done, thank you!

We had a really nice stay in Clara's apartment. It was nice and cosy and 5 girls with the age around 20 could easily stay here.
It was very clean and the instructions to get the key were very clear. We had it in no time. Also to get to the apartment wasn't hard there is a metro station nearby. It's close to the centre Pompidou and there is a supermarket around the corner. 
Also contact with clara was easy she replied very quick and we could ask her anything. I really recommend staying here. Overall it was all very good, and a very nice stay.

Clara's apartment was great.  The location was perfect for us - close to the train station (and several transit stops). Also a short walk to the river, plenty of shops and restaurants, etc.  The apartment was very clean and neat - had everything we needed.  Clara is very quick to respond to any request or question via text.  Easy to find, plus she gave us the info for access which worked well for our late arrival from the airport.
Clara's flat is in an amazing location and is exactly as described. Check in was very easy even though I arrived at 2am, she was easy to communicate with before and during my stay.

Clara was a gracious and helpful host. We arrived at CDG at 7:30 in the morning and Clara allowed us to leave our luggage in the apartment at 11:30, before it was cleaned. This was very helpful to us. The apartment is just as in the pictures; no surprises! The location is excellent in a dynamic neighbourhood! It is walking distance to many wonderful Paris sites.

Clara's place is so great! You can find small supermarket  nearby called G20 and there are many nice restaurants around the place. Metro stations are also within few minutes walk. Clara is so kind that she helped us with information on leaving Paris by train and booked a taxi for us.
Clara was awesome every thing she said was spot on. The apartment was excellent the location is very good near a lot of good places.
房东很准时到达公寓等我们，虽然我们到达的比预计早，但是她还是让我们先放下行李。房子的位置非常好，方便我们出门工作。屋内的设备也应有竟有，只是没有替换的卫生纸，需要自己到超市购买。房间大小很舒服，适合3～4人合租。

Our arrival was well prepared and we easily found our way into the apartment, which is comfortable for up to 4 people, for 5 a bid tight. Location is great for visiting the centre and getting to/from the airport and int. train stations.
Great apartment.

We stayed at Clara's adorable apartment in June 2016. There were 4 of us, 2 adults and 2 grown sons. We loved that our boys didn't have to share a bed. The kitchen had all the utensils we needed, and towels and bedding was provided. It was very clean. Clara contacted us a couple of times to make sure we had everything we needed which was nice. She also responded quickly to a my emails and questions. She gave us RER train advice to Versailles which could have been difficult if we hadn't talked to her. Everything was nearby like restaurants, the metro and a grocery store. It is a perfect location for Le Marias area and walking distance to many Paris site seeing locations. I would recommend this apartment to a family of four or a family of five with two smaller children to share the double bed. We loved it!
Great appartment and very helpful

Great apartment in a great neighbourhood.  Clara was very helpful and friendly from our first dealings.  The check-in instructions were very clear.  The apartment is as expected and very comfortable and the location is excellent.  Thank you Clara!

Clara is a great and very flexible host.
I highly recommend her for anyone on business trips to Paris.

Clara was a wonderful host with an absolutely beautiful apartment. This was an AMAZING location with lots to do in walking distance and easy access to public transportation. I couldn't have asked for a better experience :)

Clara is a wonderful host. Clara responded really quickly to any questions and nothing is too much trouble. So nice!

The apartment is in a perfect location. Marais is a wonderful district and my friend and I could of spent many more days and hours walking along the streets. We want to go back!

It has a supermarket just around the corner and the boulangerie around the other corner is just amazing.

The apartment itself is compact but I guess that is Paris life! It was lovely having a breakfast bar. The shower is wonderfully powerful and the endless amount of hot water.
The apartment is really well designed and cute. Both beds are on a shared upper floor in the same open space.

Clara was an awesome host! She is very quick about responding and is very accommodating. I have rented many airbnbs in Paris and hers was by far the best. Great location and very spacious. I have stayed here twice now and hope to return.

I didn´t met Clara, but she was very helpful, communicative, giving all necessary instructions to get the keys.
The apartment is very pretty, it seemed recently renovated and painted. Although a little small, it´s very functional, with nice and comfortable furniture.
Location is wonderful, very central. Short walk to Pompidou and metro stations.

Some tips:
 - There is a supermarket, G20, in a near corner. Although it´s not the cheapest one, it is good and practical.
 - It has a Nespresso machine, so bring your capsules or buy in Paris
 - It has a microwave. In short walk, in rue Étienne Marcel, you can find a Picard store (if you don´t know it, it´s a french frozen food brand. It´s good). So, if you don´t want to spend a lot of time cooking and also save some money, go for it.
 - If you like walking, you can go to Louvre and Notre Dame. It´s a long walk, but it´s nice to see the city and avoid a sometimes-crowded metro.
 - Gare Paris Est (TGV) is 2km away, 10 euros taxi, including luggage.

-----

Aos amigos de língua lusófona, repito em português.
A Clara é bastante prestativa e comunicativa, apesar de não encontra-la, deu todas as orientações necessárias e mais.
O apartamento está muito bonito e foi recentemente reformado, mas não é muito grande. Os móveis são de boa qualidade, camas bem confortáveis.
A localização é ótima! Bastante central, caminhadas curtas até Pompidou e estações de metrô.
Bom comércio ao redor, com um mercado G20 na esquina, e muitos restaurantes. O apartamento possui um forno de microondas, e há uma loja da Picard bem próxima (rue Étienne Marcel). Se precisar economizar, compre refeições congeladas lá, são muito boas e práticas.
Finalmente, se gostas de andar bastante, faça-o. O metrô, apesar de prático, é muito cheio às vezes. Numa caminhada (+-2km) vai-se à Notre-Dame e Louvre

Clara is awesome and his crib too!
Located in the dead center of Paris, walking distance from every interesting place.. This is the place to be!

Je recommande vivement ! 

On a vraiment été très bien accueilli, le personnel est vraiment au top, très accueillant très poli et très à l’écoute. Ça donne vraiment envie de revenir ! La chambre était à l’ambiance romantique, grande et très propre.

Hôtel extrêmement bien localisée, chambre très propre et personnel aux aguets pour sa clientèle. Rien à redire nous avons passé un bon week end ! 

Merci Villa Opéra Drouot
Accueil chaleureux, superbe équipe !
Super hôtel !
pas de commentaire
pas de commentaire

Super accueil 
Disponible et réactive 
Appartement bien placé sur les quais
Accueil et suivi parfaits

Appartement très agréable tres bien placé très propre  calme et sécurisé 
Nous avons eu un soucis de wifi qui ne fonctionnait pas mais Pierre s est engagé à résoudre le problème 
Nous y re-séjournerons avec plaisir
Très bon emplacement appart conforme aux photos propre bien décoré .
Quartier très animé avec de nombreux restaurants. Malgré cette animation l'appartement est très calme et la chambre donne sur une cour intérieure.
Appartement impeccable très bien situé
Très bon séjour, je recommande cet appartement

Cette expérience a été la pire en 6 ans air bnb. Il n’y avait ni wifi, ni télé, et l’appartement n’était pas propre. Pierre ne m’a apporté aucune solution, et surtout m a traite avec mépris. Pour lui, je n’avais qu’a m accommode de la situation, et que ce n’était pas de sa faute mais de celle du propriétaire et qu’il ne pouvait donc rien faire. Donc ne vous attendez pas à un quelconque support. Hostnfly, qui est la conciergerie en charge de cet appartement, ne fournit aucun service. Les clés sont à récupérer dans un boitier, et il n’y a pas d’aide durant le séjour. Il est même légitime de se poser la question s’ils sont à Paris ou s’ils gèrent l’appartement depuis l’autre bout du monde.

A mon arrivée, je devais récupérer les clés dans un boitier qui se situe dans un Pub. Arrive à l’adresse, Le Pub était ferme depuis 3 semaines pour travaux.
Après beaucoup d’attente, j’ai dû me rendre à une autre adresse pour récupérer la paire de clés utilisait normalement par les femmes de ménage. Surtout quand j’ai dit à Pierre que je me trouvais devant le Pub et qu’il était ferme pour travaux, celui-ci a tout d’abord remis ma parole en doute en disant qu’il était impossible que le Pub soit ferme !!!!! Merci la confiance et l’accueil.
Comme je l’ai dit plus haut, il n’y avait ni wifi, ni télé, et il me manquait de tout dans l’appartement (cuisine …) Surtout en 4 jours rien n’a été entame pour essaye de résoudre quoi que ce soit. J’ai tout essayé pour être aider mais en vain.

A mon départ, et a nouveau il fallait déposer les clés dans un boitier ai effectué un départ a 5h30 du matin, et bien entendu l’endroit été ferme. J’ai donc dû retourner très vite à l’appartement pour déposer les clés, et courir à la gare pour nerf pas rater mon train. Encore du stress et toujours du stress.

Entre mon arrivée et mon départ, j’ai demandé dd l’aide car la connexion wifi était très importante pour mon travail. Après le deuxième jour j’ai compris qu’ils ne faisaient que me « balade » et qu’ils n’avaient aucune intention de m’aider. J’ai décidé alors de couper court à toute communication, car cela ne faisait que me mettre dans un état de stress inutile. 

Avec se typer de conciergerie HOSTNFLY, on s’écarte de l’esprit d’air bnb. Alors que le rôle doit être de facilite l’accueil des guest, cela se transforme en une entreprise à but uniquement lucratif. Facture le propriétaire, en minimisant les cout (ménage de qualité, aide aux voyageurs) afin de maximiser leur profil idée également pour eux étant de faire en sorte que leurs lacunes ne remontent pas jusqu’au propriétaire.

Bref, je conseil hautement Pierre et la compagnie HOSTNFLY. Surtout, ma mauvaise expérience n’est pas terminée avec eux, car alors que ce séjour a été un vrai cauchemar, ils essayent de me dénigrer de manière à rendre mes remarques moins crédibles. Mes précédentes expériences parlent pour moi.
Très bel appartement qui ne pourrait être mieux situé ! État impeccable et communication irréprochable avec l’hôte.    Je recommande à 100%!

I'm sorry to say it was an upsetting and time consuming stay.  
The flat is like presented in the picture but it was poorly cleaned and managed with amateurism.

LATE CHECK-IN
The check-in time was postponed at the last minutes as well as the place where to pick up the keys.
I had to spend more money to keep my luggage locked and to stay in a coffee to be safe from the cold. I haven't been refunded.

MISSING ESSENTIAL AMENITIES
No WiFi for 2 whole days. 

I also insisted on the WiFi (as the comments left by the very previous guest worried me a bit. This comment seems to have been deleted but actually the previous guest was probably right about his bad experience!). WiFi is INDISPENSABLE for my work and it was a profession stay. The conciergerie managing the flat assured me the issue with the Internet was fixed but it wasn't! 
The WI-FI did not work, and the flat concierge  was not able to propose me an alternative option. I was the one who proposed an option and it costed me money. I was reimbursed for the WIFI Mobile Terminal I bought) but lost 2 whole days that haven't been compensated in
anyways.

No hot water for 2 days. The issue has been fixed but I lost a lot of time waiting for a technician that did not come the first day and finally arrived the second.

LITTLE STORAGE
There is very few storage. I was alone for my entire 8nights stay and they was not enough place to put my belongings. The sole cupboard in the flat is half filled with the spare quilt, towels and the vaccum... 


VERY POOR CLEANING WHILE IN THE MIDDLE OF THE CORONAVIRUS CRISIS

Hence I expressly and clearly stated my expectations from this rental before entering it, the cleaning was superficial. 

Nobody can deal with a poor "professional cleaning" in the middle of the Corona virus crisis! So after a long travel I found myself cleaning all again.

The living room cushions were filthy (I have pictures), one of the living room coffe table still had sticky trails of glasses (I also have pictures). I removed it. It was disgusting.

The kitchen tea towels were dirty and smelly.
The kitchen working plan was left with coffe trails. During my entire stay I had to deal little flies and a horrible sewage smell coming from the kitchen sink ! No solution was proposed to solve that and this situation was very annoying as there're no separation/division between the living-room, the kitchen and the bedroom.
Therefore I had to buy a chlorox spray and to spray it every morning and night to fight and reduce the smell

  
The bedroom and the bathroom (hence the toilet boil was not perfectly impeccable) were OK.

To summarise the flat is like presented in the picture but it's poorly cleaned and managed with amateurism. If you're looking for a relaxing and peaceful stay don't book a stay here. Otherwise book it. One more time the flat is beautiful and the location great however my experience was bad for the above mentioned reasons.
Good luck!

This is a perfect location for a visit to Paris. You are close to Odéon metro or St Michel (RER B from airport - but stairs to carry your suitcase up!), and walking distance to all the major sights (Eiffel tower might be a bit of a long walk). The apartment was stylishly decorated which added to our Parisian experience. The space was large and had comfortable seating and sleeping for up to four guests. The  two flights of stairs to the apartment were a not issue, but some might find it difficult to carry heavy suitcases up the stairs. There are groceries, pâtisseries, boulangeries, cafés and restaurants within 5 minutes of the apartment. While the Irish pub close by did have loud guests leaving and talking loudly in the street in the middle of the night, it did not at all disturb our sleep as the bedroom was towards the back of the apartment facing a quiet courtyard.  The bed was firm but we prefer a firm mattress. There was tea and coffee, toilet paper and dish soap to get started which was very helpful.  We did not use the washing machine but if we stayed longer it would be great to have. There did not appear to be a dryer. The host was amazingly responsive when we had difficulties figuring out the television (perhaps written instructions in the apartment manual would be helpful?). The wifi was great, we had no issues during our stay. We loved this apartment, and were sad to leave. If we return to Paris one day, we would definitely stay here again if available!
Easy check in process and very good communication throughout! Everything was exactly as described and very comfortable. The location was excellent and could not have been better!!!
We had a great stay at Pierre’s place. It is a fantastic location and he is very responsive.

This flat is large, comfortable, light, and attractive; pictures represent the apartment well.  Location is perfect, in stylish neighborhood, close to all major sights, metro, RER, and bus lines.  Kitchen is tiny but adequate.  Bed is comfortable, linens good.  Bathroom is stylish and hot water was hot and plentiful.  Two flights to climb to apartment; half a flight to bedroom.  Pierre was very responsive to all our questions.  Instructions for finding the keys aren't as clear as they should be, but we found them without much difficulty.

A lovely apartment, our check-in and check-out was painless. The location is brilliant, the apartment was clean and everything worked well. Although it is located in a busy part of Paris the apartment was quiet and we were not kept awake by noise on the nearby streets as the bedroom is at the back of the apartment, away from the street. If we are ever back in Paris we would be very happy to stay here again.

I’m now in love with St Germaine! The apartment is perfectly situated in an area that’s central to all the great neighborhoods and surrounded by lots of gems.  The apartment is well appointed with what you need and Pierre was very helpful and responsive. It was a great spot for a few days.

This is an amazing apartment in a fantastic location in Paris. The communication before the trip, while we were there and for checkout were all superb and made our stay so much easier and stress free. We had a very late arrival in from the train station and and extremely early (4 am) airport departure and the private transfer cars service that Pierre suggested were a life saver. 

The location is the best part of this apartment. We stayed in a different part of the city earlier in the week, right across from Notre Dame, which was also amazing, but was far more touristy. This location allowed you to be walking distance to several places, like the Louvre and dozens of restaurants and shops, but you also truly felt like a local with the vibe of the neighborhood. The security for the building was also top notch and added to the great feeling in the neighborhood.

The apartment itself is quite nice. It's rather large for a Paris apartment and we were able to feel comfortable as a family of 4 with two teenage girls. It's very updated and has such a cool vibe as well. Opening the large french doors out on to the street and just watching the neighborhood was such a treat. There were a few small tweaks I would make to the apartment, like adding a few glasses, wine glasses, a few extra pillows and the beds were both rather hard to sleep on and the hot water seemed to run out extremely quickly. However, the location, the communication/hospitality and the overall amazing vibe of the place made this apartment one I would recommend to anyone and one we hope to return to several times.

Good location but there was issues with check in which resulted in waiting 2 hours for the key. The place had some issues: 
- used toothbrush's left in the bathroom
- used dried contact lenses on counters
- only 2 towels in a place for 4 people even when we requested more they never arrived
- no pillowcases
- the floor is dirty and there was a spill on it and it was sticky
- no hand soap 
- no hand towels or paper towels 
- one person cut their foot on something on the floor and it drew blood
- dishes and cups weren't washed and were dirty
- no trash bags

The location was fantastic and he responded quickly but it was still disappointing.

The location is great—in the center of great restaurants and bars and shops. It is a little noisy at night but to be expected in that part of town. The key retrieval is difficult. You have to get the keys from a laundry a few streets away and it is confusing. Although the host is responsive, compared to other places we have stayed there is no personal attention—had only one towel for 3 guests (in fairness he got us more towels from a courier late that night). And the shower drain wasn’t working so the bathroom and bedroom got wet with any shower—again, no attention to detail. It is clear this is just a rental and nobody really keeps an eye on the place. One thing is that the host does respond to complaints quickly although he couldn’t fix the drain until after we left.
Location can not be beat! Cool home base in Paris...

Хорошее жилье, как на фото. Оснащена всем необходимым. Пьер отвечает моментально и всегда на связи - вы будете чувствовать надежность с ним.
Но если вы мечтаете о тихом отдыхе и крепком сне - то это место не для вас. Раньше 3.30 вы не уснете. Внизу бар и постоянные вечеринки у соседей.
Зато в пешей доступности пекарни, бутики и просто уютные Парижские улочки. До Лувра 15 минут пешком.

Pierre's apartment is in a great location, is very well-decorated and is also very comfortable.  Pierre was responsive within a few minutes to each of the questions that we had. The photos on Airbnb accurately show the apartment.  Would stay here again.
비수기였던 12월 초에 방문했던 숙소입니다.  사진과 크게 다르지 않았고 넓고 깨끗했습니다.  호스트인 Pierre는 매우 친절하고 응답이 빨랐습니다.  가장 좋은 것은 역시 위치인데 퐁네프다리 바로 밑이고 라틴 지구의 맛집들과 가까웠으며 오르세나 루브르도 걸어갈 만 했습니다.  가족여행에 좋은 추억을 남겨준 숙소였습니다

The loft is ideally located in Saint Germain and very safe. You can walk to many attractions and other cute neighborhoods. The space is clean and has pretty much everything you could need. Pierre is very responsive. The only minor suggestions we had would be to bring washcloths/hand towels as none were provided. Also we were 3 adults staying for 4 nights and only 3 small towels were provided. It would’ve been nice to have some extras especially since the shower can get backed up (this was easily fixed) and we had to use some to soak up water. There were no pillow cases on the bed pillows - but I think that was a one off issue. The apartment was extremely clean otherwise. We would stay here again.

Amazing space, centrally located in the heart of one of Paris’s most charming neighborhoods with quick, easy access to public transport. The flat is surrounded by great restaurants and shops. It’s a beautiful loft with a comfortable bed. We were two adults with two young children who slept fine on the pullout couch. All around wonderful. I would certainly stay here again.
Pierre’s place was very nice and modern, and was easy to warm up with the heaters when it was cold. I also want to note the great communication. He will respond within 5 minutes most of the time.
Very good apartment, very clean and well located! Strong recommend!

The place was awesome! Close to everything anyone traveling to Paris could need. Metro was near by, as well as shops and restaurants. Check-in & out was seamless and the directions were very clear! Will be keeping this place in mind for future stays!
Great flat. Very good location close to all major sights. Thoroughly enjoyed it.
Clean, spacious apartment right in the middle of everything you need. Host was fantastic with communication also
Great location.  Great place for our family of 4...two adults and two kids under 10.  Thanks Pierre.
Amazing location and space
Amazing apartment in a wonderful neighborhood! Would love to stay here again.

This apartment was great! We had a wonderful time! Check-in was simple, apartment was clean, tastefully designed and great location. Great communication, and was very understanding when we had changes in our itinerary. Thanks again!
Perfect location and a lovely apartment! Quick and spotless communication with Pierre.

The apartment is lovely and you cannot beat the location. The 6th Arrondissement is my favorite. However we were required to pick up keys at a laundromat two blocks away from the apartment upon arriving in Paris. And we're only told that we needed to drop off keys at another location the day before leaving. Further, The hotel that we were sent to some five blocks away did not in the end except the keys saying it was their policy not too.  It made for a very difficult situation at 6:30 a.m. with kids and luggage while trying to get to the airport.   this Airbnb is managed by a management company called HostNfly.  If you rent this apartment,  ensure you understand the key delivery system before arrival.

Pierre's apartment was the perfect place to stay for our trip to Paris! The location was so fun - so many shops and restaurants in such an incredible neighborhood. And conveniently located next to the Seine and multiple metro stops. As others have mentioned, there is a pub outside, so it can be a bit noisy, but that doesn't bother us at all - we love city noises. Check in was super easy, only a block away to pick up and drop keys. Pierre was so helpful recommending tours, restaurants, luggage stasher (we arrived a few hours earlier than check in) and experiences in Paris. He even had a book of recommendations for the neighborhood in the apartment. Lastly, have to mention that the apartment itself was so cute. Loved the huge windows to open and let in the Paris sounds and smells. When we come back to Paris, we will definitely be staying here again!

I loved the place and the location. 
I would definitely book it again!

Pierre's place was great. We were right in the middle of everything. The apartment was very clean and stylish. I was traveling with two babies (2 year old and 15 month old) and had enough space for them to play and sleep in a portable crib. Pierre was an excellent host. He was very responsive, provided local tips, and gave me a tip on where to rent the portable crib. If traveling with children, I would definitely recommend the option where Host n Fly organizes a taxi service. The driver was fantastic and came with 2 carseats. Picking up the keys seems a little tricky in the beginning because you have to go to a separate location to get them from a lockbox, but it is actually right around the corner from the apartment. So it worked out fine. Thank you Pierre for a great stay.
Clean, quick responses, and great location!
Fantastic location and stylish space!
Very good location, relatively clean place.
This place is a gem! You will love how sparkling clean it is, its spaciousness, stylish comfort, and location, location, location!
房子位置便利,楼下就有很多餐馆和超市｡但是我们一家四口住,生活用品不太够用(纸巾只有两小卷)｡但除此之外,还是很好的选择!
Great location.  Cool loft-like apartment.  It made our trip to Paris very easy and care-free.

Great place to stay in a brilliant location with many restaurant options and shops nearby.  Stylish apartment which would be perfect for two but was also comfortable for our family of four.  Pierre was easy to deal with and left lots of useful tips about the area.  Highly recommend!

Beautiful apartment, excellent location! We loved Pierre’s apartment, it was exactly as expected if not better. We stayed there with 2 kids, this apartment can accommodate 4 people comfortably. The sleeper sofa was big enough for our two teenagers. The place is very clean and has this Parisian feel:) We loved the view from the window. The street it lively, but not as noisy as we thought. The apartment was very comfortable in summer even without a/c. Two big fans were provided and it was more than enough to cool it to a comfortable temperature. The location is fabulous!
Great location. Awesome apartment

Incomparable location in Paris! Very comfortable for a family of 4. The apartment is close to La Cite and other main attractions, easy access via metro to other areas of the city. The place is very cozy and clean.   Pierre was always quick and accurate on his comunicaciones and tips. Au revoir Paris!

Excelente ubicación, se puede llegar a muchos lugares sólo caminando!!! Un departamento con estilo y muy amplio, tener en cuenta que queda en un segundo piso (para mi sería el tercer piso). Si tienen maletas pesadas se les hará un poco  difícil subirlas.

Pierre’s loft was the perfect place for my wife & I and our 2 adult children. Definitely comfortable for 4 adults. Right in the heart of the Latin Quarter/St. Michel it was incredibly close to nightlife, restaurants and attractions such as The Louvre (12 minute walk), Notre Dame Cathedral (10 minute walk), Musée D’Orsay (18 minute walk) & the Seine (5 minute walk). Of course it’s very close to the Metro so you’re free to go anywhere. The loft featured a pullout bed and a large bed (Queen perhaps?), a dining area, stove, fridge, 2 industrial fans to beat the heat (we were there during a recent heat wave & the loft was very cool to sleep-not an issue) and other amenities. It’s also very close to a grocery store. The place was impeccably clean and very comfortable. The area was filled with bustling nightlife (cafes, restaurants and bars) and we never felt unsafe walking around during the day or after midnight. Although we never met Pierre, his communication was excellent. Loved this place! Thanks Pierre!
Fabulous apartment in a great area of Paris. Highly recommend
Amazing apartment in one of the best, quaint neighborhoods in Paris. Pierre was a wonderful host as well. Perfect for our family of 4.

We had a good time at Pierre’s plaice. It was beautiful and in a great location. The one thing to keep in mind is there is no air conditioning units and fans are not guaranteed. So if you are heat sensitive and Paris is hot, be aware of this. Otherwise, great location for families too.

Pierre’s second floor apartment is very stylist and located in a superb area.
One end The Seine the other end multiply dining options.
Easy walk to numerous attractions.
Supermarket just  around the corner.
Be prepared for the  stairs, but you come  to expect  this in these amazing old  buildings.Worth the effort.
The apartment can get very hot but made  bearable with two effective fans.
The  pick up and drop off of keys was rather inconvenient and could be improved.
We really enjoyed our stay and would recommend..

Lovely place, great spot, however, a few things to note. There were no amenities, no hand soap, no sugar, and a role and a half of toilet paper for 4 people. And if you want an extra cushion, you're out of luck, also the check-in process was a bit of a nightmare, incorrect pickup location, saw us dragging kids and bags all over the place. Other than that, it was a great place and communication with the host was very responsive.

Pierre's apartment is wonderful. Period. The location is excellent both for proximity to all the sights and museums, and for quick access to a lively neighborhood with tons of of eating options. Pierre was a super responsive and helpful host. We felt the apartment really augmented our stay in Paris.
Pierre was a great host - very responsive and hospitable. The apartment was sparkling clean, stylish, and in such a convenient location! Would highly recommend to anyone visiting Paris!
The place is extremely central and close to anything a visitor in Paris needs!

The location is amazing!  We knew that the area was fun, but the number of great cafes, restaurants and bars was much more than we expected.  Many of Paris’ main attractions are also a short walk, scooter or metro ride from Saint Germain as well.  The apartment was perfect for my wife and me and our two kids (8,6). 

The apartment was appropriately stocked with utensils and cookware that you’d need for a short stay.  Pierre was a great host and very responsive to any of our questions/needs.  We would absolutely stay there again.

The location of this studio is amazing. You can walk to Notre Dame and the Louve. The studio is also right next to many great restaurants. However, the studio is next to a British Pub that gets loud at night. My husband and I found it hard to sleep even with ear plugs and white noise on our cell phone. Also, we found the bed to be uncomfortable which added to a hard nights sleep.

The location is excellent, the apartment itself is as pictured (gorgeous, home-y, and modern), and the people in the complex are very nice. You will have to walk up some stairs, so be mindful of that if you have heavy luggage. But, trust me, it's absolutely worth it! Couldn't have asked for a better first Airbnb experience.
The location is superb. The space is very stylish and comfortable. Pierre is very responsive and helpful. Perfect place to explore the Left Bank and the Right!
A wonderful location and spacious place! Would recommend to anyone and everyone!

The location is amazing- we were close to everything!  The apartment is so chic and comfortable.  Pierre is a great host and responds to questions within minutes.  Check-in wasn’t too bad because we expected it to be some effort (from other reviews).  We would gladly stay here again.  
Thanks Pierre!

Pierre's apartment is excellent! The location is fantastic, right in the centre of everything and it felt very safe. The apartment itself is a very stylish loft with all the amenities, and very comfortable sleeping arrangements. Pierre is a good and accommodating host who responds very fast to communication and gave us many good tips about Paris. I would recommend his apartment highly to anyone visiting Paris.
We enjoyed our stay. Everything was exactly as pictured  and the location was fantastic! Pierre responded quickly and helped as needed. Would definitely recommend!

Excellent location.  Perfect for viewing Paris.  Came with 2 children ages 8 and 10 and the couch worked great for them.  Key pick-up from a lock box at a different location was a bit tricky but it turned out fine.  Tons of food choices in the area and an easy walk to Notre Dame which, very sadly, caught fire while we were there.... all around great communication from the host and a great place.

Pierre provided excellent communication before, during and after our trip. The apartment is beautiful and the location is unbeatable—the Seine, sightseeing, metro, food (FOOD!)—everything is within easy reach. Even with two children, it was very comfortable. We have spent a lot of time in Paris and found this stay to be very high on our list of experiences. We will certainly look for Pierre again on our next visit to Paris!
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Staying Pierre's place was a marvellous experience. The house is in the middle of the city, we went to everywhere by walking and we could find very good French restaurants and cafes by walking distance. The house is very clean and Pierre is a very welcoming host.
The apartment is super cute and is close to many of the main places there in Paris! It is also very clean. Great hospitality! I would totally stay there again!
Great location to metro, museums, night life and restaurants. Worked well for a family of four.

What a bright, wonderful loft, located in St. Germain. Close to everything from shops & restaurants, to the Seine and Museums!  Pierre was great to work with and check in/out was very easy and provided us with tips about the area!

Comfortable flat in good location for walking to Louvre, Musee D'Orsay, Notre Dame. Nearest convenience store about 10 mins. Restaurants nearby.  Winding staircase may not make it accessible for everyone.  Secure apartment with access being via a keypad door into courtyard and a locked gate to stairway.  The bedroom near courtyard is quieter at night.
Great stay! Very safe area and clean. Would come back!

What a gorgeous flat!  Perfect location for a gorgeous stay in Paris.  Lovely neighborhood allowing walkable access to everything.  Paris apartments can be very small, but this was just perfect for two of us.  Only wish we had stayed longer!  Very livable and conveniently furnished with lovely design.  Pierre was very quick to respond to any/all messages and made us feel very valued and cared for.  Would definitely recommend!

If you're looking for an apartment in Paris, agree to have a late check in, then have the owner never show up, then this is the apartment for you.  We had to move hotels 3 times in the 5 days that we were supposed to be in the apartment.  Two days after we arrived in Paris (after airbnb canceled the reservation and refunded our money) we received the check in information. Sorry to say this ruined our whole Paris experience.  I'm giving some more airbnb feedback on the side.
Great location! Walking distance to wonderful restaurants and popular bars and entertainment. Pierre was very communicative and helpful with recommendations across Paris.
Un lugar amplio, limpio y agradable. Una estupenda ubicación, sin ruidos. Está en un segundo piso, así que la única recomendación es llevar equipaje ligero.
Great location. Great place!

Si buscas un apartamento amplio, con cierto estilo  y bien situado este es el ideal.
Pero si priorizas la tranquilidad y descanso nocturno, sigue buscando otro, porque este no cumple las expectativas.
This apartment was in the best location and nice and clean. Pierre was quick to respond with any questions we had. Thanks again for bringing the keys and getting us all sorted much appreciated.

Great location and Pierre was very responsive throughout our stay. Check in can get tricky as you need to collect and drop keys at different locations which is not easy if you’re a young family and with lots of luggage to drag around.
It’s a cozy, nice apartment and the pictures do justice but it can get a bit tight for a family of four - we found the bathroom particularly small and unclean and not up to the mark at all.
