Perfectly placed apartment in the heart of Paris left bank. Superb location. The apartment was very clean, well equipped, comfortable, warm and welcoming. Communication with Pierre was easy, and responses prompt. Pierre was superbly accomodating to our needs. 
This apartment comes thoroughly recommended, and we won’t hesitate to stay here next time we’re in Paris.
Pierre’s place felt like home - easy access, perfect location, and clear communication through the whole stay. Would definitely recommend!

The location is amazing - right down the street from the Pont Neuf and walking distance to Notre Dame and various museums.  There are so many wonderful restaurants in the area as well.  Pack light as there is no elevator so you will need to carry your bags upstairs.  It was also nice that the sleeping area was in the rear of the studio so there wasn't street noise.
Nice place thanks Pierre

Pierre was truly an AMAZING host, his apartment was exactly as describe and immaculate.  He was very responsible every time I had questions and make sure we had everything we need to make our stay confortable and pleasant.  We cannot thank him enough for make out first stay in Paris so memorable.  We definitely will recommend his beautiful apartment to all people we know.

Great location, horrible host experience (Pierre).
It took 10+ calls and texts to the host to get the keys for the unit - 3+ hours in the rain waiting. The host seemed to not care at all, and was more of a scam artist than a AIRBNB partner. 

The unit had multiple issues and the host was informed immediately, promised to fix and did NOTHING. Bathroom sink would not drain, TV and Cable did not work, Bathroom Sliding door was stuck 100% open - nice for privacy!

The experience in Paris was great, the Parisians we met were wonderful and fun. Pierre, the host was the exception - I don't know if he was just and idiot, or a scam artist.  I will seek a refund...
This apartment is magical. An adorable hide away in the heart of Paris.  What a wonderful place. We can’t wait to come back.
Wonderful location, and Pierre was such an attentive and helpful host.

Check in did not work how it was supposed to, but Pierre was really responsive and got it worked out quickly.   Place was just like the photos and met our needs for a one week stay.  Neighborhood was great and everything we needed was within an easy walk.  Great location to stay to easily explore Paris.  Would book again without hesitation.  Would have given 5 stars if check in had been easier and cleaning crew had swept the floor.

Fantastic location , lovely clean open space well appointed .Pierre responds immediately when contacted.
I’d love to come back.

great location. big and nice apartment. one a bit annoying thing is that bathroom door !
but it’s not a big deal
location is absolutely amazing

Great location, best suited for a couple or close family, the bathrrom is off the bedroom so it was a little awkward for my adult sister to pass through. Be sure you turn the key to the apartment door all the way AND THEN an eigth of a turn more to open it, there is no functioning door handle. We had a hard time iwth htat but were able to get in touch and get it straightened out.

Great location. Entire stay was stress-free, especially the gathering of the keys. Pierre was great are responding to any questions we had during our stay. Sofa bed for the kids was comfortable. Highly recommend this property.

Pierre and his Hostfly reps made this stay very convenient and comfortable! His apartment is perfectly located in Saint Germain des Prés for easy access to  all of the must sites of Paris, either by foot or the metro station at St. Michel. Highly recommend this listing for so many reason! Will definitely inquire for future trips to Paris! Thanks Pierre!

Absolutely amazing place in an amazing location.   Walking distance to so many great areas.    Fabulous restaurants and bars just down the street.    This place is first class.   You will love your stay there.

If I could give 7 stars for location - would give that. Absolutely gem of an area with easy access to anywhere in town. Come out in evening and the energy of locals eating at rated restaurants is to be seen to be believed. The place is nicely done and the sheets et al are very chic and comfortable. The only reason we are not giving it 5 stars is check-in process and few nits in the apartment. If you are coming late - this place may be difficult one as one has to pick up keys at a bar and then get in another taxi (with luggage) to come here. At night we found it tough to find light switch in courtyard; it would be great if someone is there to help check-in. A partially working bathroom door, and a leaking kitchen sink were minor irritants in an otherwise great location.

We stayed in this flat for a full week, as part of our first trip to Paris. It was in a lovely location along the Seine, and was quite close to local restaurants, grocery stores, and shops. Although this location did not have as many homey qualities as other Airbnb experiences we've had, Pierre did a good job to make the space stylish and accommodating, and provided a booklet of local recommendations. I would certainly recommend this location for future travelers to Paris, especially for a short weekend stay in the city.

Our family of 4 stayed here... the apartment was perfect for us.  The location is A++, the best in Paris, and the apartment was a perfect place to relax before and after our adventures.  The kids took the fold out couch bed, and we had the loft area.  Plenty of space, and a clean, well appointed apartment.  Thank you, Pierre!
fantastic location.  true to promise. flexible arrival. attentive owner.

Excellent location, beautiful flat. Host was very accommodating of our early arrival from the US. The location is absolutely fantastic, steps from restaurants, bars, creperies and the pont neuf. Wasn’t loud at night except for one night when France won the World Cup semifinals :)

Check-in was very easy and our apologies again to Christina for being so late with the delay of the train. 

The location is fantastic. We walked everywhere with our two children (7 & 9 years) with no problems. The river is down the end of the street, plenty of restaurants and cafe and a market 200m away. 

The apartment was spacious and we loved the windows that open up out into the street. The added touch of two fans was definitely needed with the heat and greatly appreciated. 

The only issue was with the bathroom door which wouldn’t close properly but didn’t really cause too much of an problem for us. 

I would highly recommend Pierre’s apartment and would definitely stay again. Thanks for a great stay in Paris

Just as described and even better in person! Space is bright and comfortable and the location is awesome. Local contact Cristina was friendly and even though she didn't speak English, was resourceful with helping us answer questions. Would definitely stay here again.
Todo perfecto . Para repetir !
An unbelievably charming studio apartment in an amazing location!  Check in was simple and the place was spotless.

The apartment is as advertised and I would recommend the space. However, I could not say I would recommend the check in process or communication process. We were sent a lady named Ana, who didn’t speak english, to check us in. The only other complaint would be the host not replying when we requested more toilet paper so we went and bought ourselves more. The location is within walking distance to all of the central attractions which was lovely.

Great stay, location can’t be beat, although the building was a little noisy at times. We stayed here for our PARIS honeymoon and our hosts surprised us with roses upon our arrival. It was totally unanticipated and greatly appreciated.

The location was so good that it was easy to get around. There was a shopping center right next to it, so it was useful to buy groceries. Everything was comfortable because it was the main street. Above all, the room was bigger than I thought, so it was good for the four families to use. I think it was better than hotel use.
Super lokaal verblijf in het hartje van Parijs. Je bent overal heel snel en zeker geschikt voor een zakelijke reis.

Gemma & Lyron were lovely hosts, very communicative and very helpful! The apartment was smaller than we expected and is in quite a busy part of town so noisy at night. The apartment was very clean but basic and cold at night. It is one minute walk from a busy metro station and easy to get to from Gare Du Nord.
Had a great stay! Cute and cozy apt!
Gemma and Lyron were excellent hosts! They were quick to respond to messages and provided detailed instructions for arrival and check-in. I would absolutely stay there again.

Fuimos 4 personas (dos adultos, dos niños grandes) y estuvo cómodo. Decoración linda, con estilo, sofá/cama cómodo, lencería de cama y baño de buena calidad, bien equipado. De cortesía a nuestra llegada: cápsulas nespresso y agua. La ubicación increíble en el corazón de Le Marais pero silencioso lo cual permitió un buen descanso. Super agradecidos por todas sus atenciones Gemma & Lyron. 100% recomendable!
Very clean apartment in a great location, welcoming hosts and comfortable place - perfect for a weekend in paris!

The location is amazing for sure. The hosts are great and communication is amazing too! Otherwise the place is not totally as in the pictures. Some repairs have been done on the cheap side and there is some potential safety issues (loose cable around the electric box). This can be noisy - there is a background noise (from the heating system) at night: i was not able to sleep the first night but was totally fine with earplugs the nights after.

So depending on what you are looking for that can be a great place or not. This is definitely not the best Airbnb I experienced in Paris but definitely not the worst too! And for sure the location is unbeatable and communication is very great for sure, something to consider if you are here as a tourist!
Nice apartment, perfect for stay some business day or for holiday.
좋은 위치에 자리해있어 공항을 오간것 빼고는 모두 걸어다녔습니다. 넓고 편한공간에 편리한 주방덕에 한식을 자주 해먹을 수 있었어요!
Fantastic location for site seeing and a cosy retreat after busy days in the centre of Paris. We would definitely stay here again.

This flat is in a perfect location! It’s steps from the metro, although we didn’t use it much because the strike made it difficult to get anywhere. But this place is so close to most sights, we just walked! There are many cafes and restaurants and I found an incredible bakery right nearby.  Gemma and Lyron were so helpful with photos and descriptions of how the building entrance worked, making check-in super easy!   And, this was the only place we stayed the whole trip that provided enough coffee pods for us to each have a cup in the morning.
Apartment was exactly as depicted on Airbnb, very clean, great location, hosts were very quick to respond to questions.

The place was easy to find and was in the centre of lots of restaurants and a shopping centre. With only a 10 min walk to the Louvre, it was a great place to stay in. The place was clean, had great amenities and the communication between Gemma & Lyron was amazing. Quick response to everything. Definitely recommend!
Charming flat in a perfect location right in the heart of the city! We enjoyed staying there very much, definitely would return anytime!
Great place. Great host. Great stay.
This place is stunning!! Gemma and Lyron made us feel right at home. It’s in a perfect location and it’s super cozy!

Gemma & Lyron’s place is fantastically situated in the heart of Paris. I don’t think a better location could be found. 

The place is a cozy little spot and has everything needed for an enjoyable stay. The hosts were responsive with any questions we had.
We spent three nights in Gemma and Lyron’s apartment. Really comfortable place to stay and the central location is hard to top!
The department is brilliant and the hosts are so nice.

Strong WIFI, strong shower water pressure and drainage, and a comfortable bed. These are things I need for a great AirBnb stay. I got all of it and more at Gemma and Lyron’s place! A very stylish place with all necessities taken care of. Although we didn’t meet due to our own schedule, they were on top of all communications. The location is great and a bonus that the RER B train station entrance to CDG is just steps from the place.
Great space! Clean and very well located! Would definitely stay again.
This place was amazing. Great location and Gemma & Lyron were incredibly helpful.

Gemma and Lyron were fabulous hosts. They were very responsive and helpful. The apartment was perfect. Very nicely decorated and perfectly situated to explore Paris. We will definitely come back and would definitely recommend.
Great location, stylish and clean!
Thank you very much for your place, it’s was really great to stay in your apartment ( clean, very comfortable location, easy check in)

This is a fantastic location and value.  We were just steps away from access to central public transportation, great restaurants, a small convenience store, a laundromat and a great boulangerie.  I highly recommend staying here and just enjoy everything this amazing city has to offer.
Amazing, supper clean apartment in the heart of Paris.

The location is great. Lyron was really friendly and quick to response. The keybox for the check had some issues initially and Lyron quickly showed up and resolved the issue. The only thing I would like to remind future travelers is that after the check out, you will need to find a luggage storage place. Lyron gave us a good suggestion for it as well. Although the price is a little steep and requires a bit walking.

Gemma &Lyron are great hosts and are very quick to response.Their studio  is located very near the metro station within only 2-minute walking distance,and it is convenient to go everywhere in Paris. Strongly recommanded.

We absolutely loved staying here! It was a great location and had all of the amenities we needed. But most important, Gemma & Lyron were extremely accommodating. They communicated with us in a timely manor and even went out of their way to provide a fan for us. We accidentally left an extremely important valuable item to us in the air b n b and lyron went out of his way to meet up with us and give it back to us! I would recommend this place 10 times over! Thank you, thank you, thank you!
Very nice place in a great location. Perfect for my husband and I. Thank you!
Great location, in the heart of everything.

Gemma and Lyron were great guests and their space is just amazing. Perfectly located just in front of the subway and Forum Les Halles, 5 min walk to Louvre and 10 min to Quartier Latin. The whole city and surroundings are within close reach. The apartment is immaculately clean and well furnished, and communication with Lyron was perfect. 10/10, I recommend it to anyone who wants a comfortable and affordable stay in Paris.

Thank you so much for hosting us Gemma and Lyron. Amazing apartment, super close to everything (bars, restaurants, metro, shopping, attractions etc). Would highly recommend Gemma and Lyron place to anyone, they assisted with any of our needs and enquires, their space was everything we needed and more. We will definitely be back!

This space is just as described - close to shopping, restaurants, and walking distance to the Louvre. Lyron was very accommodating, meeting us outside with the keys on time and was a fast communicator whenever we had a question. The space is very clean and the outdoor terrace was a nice addition!

Gemma and Lyron's place is the perfect place for Paris getaway! We couldn't have asked for better hosts. They were very welcoming, accommodating and responsive. Their space was very stylish, clean, well-stocked and had great little touches that would make anyone feel at home. The location was near a good selection of restaurants and is close to a couple of main Metro stations for easy transportation.
Great location, cute apartment. Very friendly and accommodating hosts.
Location couldn't be better. Very cool, comfortable space with access to nice little private outdoor area. Will definitely stay again next time if it isn't booked.
Clean, centrally-located flat.  Great communication and easy, flexible checkin / checkout.  Gemma and Lyron are really nice, responsive hosts.  Thanks again.
Gemma and Lyon were extremely helpful with any issues and sorted them quickly. Their communication was great and the apartment was lovely. Great location for metro, Louvre, cafes and shops! Thank you
Nice room & perfect location. Thanks to Lyron’s advice and hospitality. I would choose it when I go to Paris.

Gemma & Lyron's place is a great apartment in the centre of Paris. The interior is well designed and comfortable with all the amenities and gadgets. Everything The apartment has lots of thoughtful touches such as adapters, bottled water and bathroom products. We found it  a great alternative to the usually small Paris hotels and it was much more comfortable stay.  Would stay again for future trips for sure.
Quiet, clean, comfortable space in a very central location.  Gemma and Lyron are great hosts, very responsive, and met us for check-in.  Would definitely stay again.
Schöne kleine Wohnung in echt guter Lage, Metro um die Ecke.
Amazing location, close to everything and stylish area. Would 100% stay again.
Very nice, polite, kind couple. Recommended
Alloggio molto accogliente, con tutti i servizi a disposizione e pulizia ottima

Gemma & Lyron were amazing hosts. Their apartment is in a perfect location and very close to pretty much every major site and few minutes walk to the Seine. The actual flat is stylish and even has a terrace. 

My flight got in late the first night so they made a reservation for me and my friend while I was in the air.  I can’t recommend this place enough and would gladly stay again.

Photos are 100% representative of the place. 
Clean, well decorated, and centrally located. Metro is steps away from the front door are as many pubs and restaurants. 
They provide clean towels, linens, and a small kitchenette. A cute patio allows for a little outdoor space (no view). 
They left us with wine, orangina, water, and coffee!! A small kitchenette is perfect to keep food and prepare snacks/small meals. 
Lyron communicated quickly after we booked and met us on site promptly at  check in.  They followed up later to make sure that we had everything we needed. 
This was an outstanding experience both with the host and the property.  
Thank you Gemma & Lyron.

Our stay was really amazing. Gemma & Lyron were available and nice. The apartment is perfectly situed, very clean and there is everything you need to feel at home. Wifi was really fast. I really recommend and will definitely come back in this flat. Thank you !
Très bonne communication. Très sérieux. Tout était conforme. Très bon séjour!
Apparemment efficace et très bien placé
Appartement haut de gamme très bien situé. Simplement parfait
Superbe logement et emplacement. Accueil chaleureux

Bel appartement et emplacement exceptionnel (à quelques pas des champs élysées.) Communication avec Thierry rapide et efficace.  Bref , séjour au top!

Merci à Thierry pour sa disponibilité.

Vraiment très satisfait, le propriétaire est très disponible et agréable, le logement est très bien agencé, propre et fonctionnel sans oublié la localisation qui est vraiment appréciable. Je recommande vivement !
Hôte accueillant et appartement superbe. Merci pour ce séjour
Très bel appartement. Beaucoup de style et de caractère. Excellent emplacement.

Appartement très bien situé, très proche des champs Élysée. Mais il a l’inconvénient de son avantage c’est que la rue est assez bruyante
Un très joli appartement, dans le style haussmannien. L'emplacement est super, et le balcon donne plus de charme à l'appartement. L'hôte est très réactif, et très acceuillant.

Très bel appartement à deux pas des Champs Élysées. Décoration design, accueil très professionnel. Idéal pour un séjour parisien.

C’est un excellent logement pour passé votre séjour à Paris. Idéalement situé il répondra à vos attentes par son design exceptionnel et toutes les attentions de son hôte. Je vous le recommande vivement.
Parfait en tous points.
Superbe appartement et emplacement idéal !
Super appartement très design et très bien placée

L appartement est magnifique la localisation est parfaite merci encore. 
Thierry est très serviable et très aimable.
Nous avons passé un excellent séjour. Appartement très agréable et tellement bien placé!
Nous avons était très bien reçu rien à reprocher nous conseillons vivement
Superbe adresse Idéalement localisée et Thierry très sympathique
Tres bon !
Appartement  très bien décoré, chaque chambre dispose d’une salle de bain. Propre et bien situé. Restaurant , transport et boutique à proximité. Hôte très réactif et accueillant
Appartement magnifique je vous le conseille fortement!! Merci a l'hote
Superbe appartement bien placé ! Très bon accueil !
Très disponible et sérieux ! arrangeant et aimable je recommande !
Superbe logement bien situé, hôte à l’écoute nous avons passé une nuit très agréable !
Super emplacement!
Thierry  est un hôte  tres sympa et prévenant. Appartement très  bien placé.
Super rapport qualité prix. Hôte très arrangeant et sympathique.
Accueillant chaleureux.. aucun problème
Super accueil le logement est fonctionnel et vraiment beau très bien situé au top!

房子位于香街附近,非常的便利,风景很美,房东很热心~

Excellent design and reception service
Excellent
Great place! Very good conditions!

This is the best appartment we ever been to in paris, best location (literraly on the champs Élysées)
very quite and peaceful, Perfect for relaxing,

thank you Thierry !

Der Gastgeber hat zu unserem Erschrecken den Müll den wir sorgfältig weg geräumt hatten wieder ausgeräumt und auf der Küchennische verteilt um davon ein Foto zu machen. Dieses Foto dann zu nutzen um von uns Reinigungskosten zu erhalten. Sehr traurig dieses Verhalten! 

Ansonsten ist das Appartement sehr gut eingerichtet und platziert , aber leider nicht so groß wie es auf den Fotos herüber kommt. 

Kein Spülmittel vorhanden - oder anderes Putzzeug . Also besser alles selber mit bringen
Fantastic!

As a family of five, two adults with three children (8,5,4 years old), we loved the flat. 
The flat was comfortable and had a good layout for a short stay. It has a nice minimalist decor. The pillows, duvets and mattresses were comfortable and the air conditioner worked very well. Thierry was a very good host.
Pretty cool

It is a lovely apartment with style. Very close to all the shops and main attractions, really enjoyed our stay. Thierry was extremely helpful and spoke perfect English. Recommend to anyone who is traveling with families.

We highly recommend this lovely place. It is centrally located to everything we needed or wanted to see in Paris. The apartment itself is situated in the very middle of a safe clean tourist-type neighborhood (think Times Square in NYC) with lots of tourist focused restaurants and shops. That said, we could walk outside the front door and be right at one of the premier Parisian breakfast spots with the best pastries we had or we could walk a block or two and have access to the subway to go anywhere else in Paris (we used the subway but primarily used Uber to get everywhere). The apartment is beautiful and very clean. We were very grateful to have found a lovely place that we could call home in Paris. The beds were comfortable, the showers were hot, and everything was spartan. Rahim was incredibly friendly, helpful, and always available. We couldn’t have asked for a better experience on our first trip to Paris!  Thank you!

The apartment is super clean and good looking. It has two small bedrooms, one living room with a small kitchen and two separated bathrooms and toilettes. One of the bedrooms is dark because the windows face the wall. the other bedroom has got a lot of light. The hosts are very nice and welcoming. They were super careful and always easy to reach. However, I’d like to have a bigger bed, that one felt a little bit too small :)

This house looks like “the” house i would like to live in Paris, and that’s why we booked it with my colleagues on a business trip to Paris... but we were unable to stay in Paris for that long because of the Corona Virus outbreak. Unfortunately, even though we paid the whole amount upfront, since all our business meetings were cancelled, we weren’t allowed to stay in Paris and although Thierry was very helpful texting us before we had this issue, didnt help us at all with a refund. With such an important matter surrounding the world we would appreciate more understanding.

Great communication, which is important. The accommodation is so beautiful. The shower, the bed, the kitchen.. Al perfect!

The neighbourhood is very posh!
Great stay. Very easy to connect to attractions. Room is beautiful and clean
Great location.  Thierry very prompt on dealing with all issues.  The apartment feels quite secure and safe.  I would say this apartment is perhaps a little on the small side for a family of 5.

We have just returned from a stay at this property and Thierry was a fantastic host. Very good with communication from the moment we made the booking. Including during our stay when we had questions. 

The location of the apartment couldn't have been better. What a fantastic position to stay for a weekend in Paris. 

The property itself was styled just like the images, classy and modern, which is exactly to my taste. 

Like a lot of online adverts the apartment was smaller than the pictures suggest. It has 3 rooms. Two bedrooms and one average sized living space which includes the kitchen and dining area but was still plenty for what we needed. 

The only suggestion we would have to improve our stay would be to replace the mattresses with more expensive, more comfortable ones and to improve the noise from the main road for the front bedroom. Difficult to sleep when you hear the noise from the main road. 

Overall a good stay with a great host.
this place is awesome

Pro: very kind host, very clean, washer and dryer free on site, location on Champs-Élysées, nice bed sheets 
Cons :very noisy close to Champs-Élysées so bring your earplugs , much  much smaller then picture shows . Kitchen amenities limited

my family and i had a wonderful time in the apartment. everything was well sort out and the location was magnificent. thierry is the best host i’ve had so far; he is very thoughtful and welcoming. 
10/10 would recommend this apartment!
Great flat! In the same bloke of Ladurée!! In the middle of Champs-Elysées, walk- in distance to Arc d Triompe and great restaurants and shops. We will definitely come back soon!
Excellent place, super clean, best location. Loved the place. Will totally recommend over and over again.
Great place with everything you need in an outstanding location

We had a wonderful stay at this apartment. The location could not be beat, the apartment itself was incredibly beautiful and comfortable and Thierry made check in and out a breeze. It was a difficult time because of the transportation strikes and he worked with our changing schedules which I really appreciated. It is across the way from Laduree which has an amazing breakfast, close to all major shopping on the Champs-Élysées and has the most adorable little kitchen if you feel like making something yourself. We were sad to leave and I am saving this Airbnb for the next time we are in Paris.

Thierry was a great host. He accommodated us by letting us store our luggage a little earlier than checkin time, which was very helpful.
The apartment very nice with beautiful beds and bathrooms, though it was a little smaller than it looked in the pictures.
The location was perfect to stroll to the Arc de Triomphe and all good restaurants nearby. Ladurée was just outside the building.
Amazing location, the host Thierry is very thoughtful, understanding, and kind. Made sure all of our needs were met. Very comfortable and clean. Great Host and Home
Excelente ubicación. Perfecto para conocer sitios de interés.
Had a awesome time at this flat and it was super close to everything.

Just as advertised! Superb location, right by the main shopping area of Champ Elysee. The host responded very quickly upon our arrival to Paris and we were able to check in without any issues. Will definitely consider booking this place again if I am back in the area.

Beautiful and stunning apartment in a great location.  It also had high-quality sheets. Thiery was very helpful checking in and even helped us with the suitcases up to the apartment.  With minor work such as fixing the dishwasher, little dust cleaning and removing a few clustered pieces of furniture, I would have given him 5 stars!
The location was absolutely perfect. The host was very easy to contact. Check in and check out was made extremely easy.

Great apartment in a great location. Easy access to metro, shops and sights. Beautiful building and stylish accommodation. Comfortable enough for 5 of us. Thierry was quick to respond to questions prior to our stay and whilst there we dealt with Rahim who was also helpful. Would recommend this place.
Very comfortable and beautiful flat in perfect location.

El departamento esta super ubicado, a media calle de campos Eliseos, muy limpio, muy cómodas las recámaras, cada una cuenta con su wc, regadera y lavabo, todos los mensajes que le envié a Thierry obtuve respuesta inmediata, no lo conocí pero la persona que nos envió para recibirnos fué muy amable, nos dió todas las indicaciones del departamento y donde hacer el super, nuestra estancia fue muy agradable.  
Solo mencionar que hay un bar junto al departamento y por las noches se oye un poco el ruido, la 2da recámara no tiene ventana por lo que es obscura.  Pero esto no perjudicó en lo absoluto nuestra estancia.

I booked this apartment for my sister family, while we stayed in another apartment near by. According to my sister this apartment was good with a great location. Everything was working and very stylish.

Thierry’s apartment was in a top location: right in the middle of Champ Elysees! Laduree is only steps away. The apartment was stylish with a cute Parisian-style balcony. It was on the 4th floor but there was an elevator for use. The only thing that could be improved is the comfortability of the beds. The mattresses were a bit thin so they weren’t the most comfortable. Overall, I would recommend staying at Thierry’s apartment!
The apartment is stylish, clean with great amenities. Great location. Fabulous host. Definitely value for money.

Good location.
Nice and clean apartment.
Worth to stay!

Beautiful place in a beautiful location.
Sharp communication and great accommodation.
Highly recommended.
Thank you Rahim!

Pavel

We stayed in this Airbnb with work colleges for one weekend. 

On the first night staying in the apartment, we arrived home late from dinner and went straight to bed. The next morning we received a police and eviction threat for 'making too much noise when entering the building'. We did not party in the apartment or play music etc.. 

This was quite concerning and scary to wake up and receive this message and a simple phone call instead of a threating text message would have been better. 

The ground floor tenant also yelled when I used the common courtyard to make a private phone call or take the rubbish out.

The apartment was beautiful, but the hospitality for a vacation apartment was very inappropriate and as such, I wouldn't stay here again.
This location is 5 stars!  We were able to see the finish of the Tour De France!
In the heart of Paris, stylish apartment, close to shopping, restaurants, sightseeing. I would recommend this place to anybody who wants to stay in the center. Very secure and clean.
Excellent apartment...

Would recommend this Parisienne experience to anyone who needs a comfy and convenient place to stay in the heart of the most popular places to see in Paris.  The communication and check in procedures were smooth and easy. The place has two full bedrooms and bathrooms as well as a pull out couch and air conditioning making our family of five feel comfortable .  We did not want to cook but enjoyed having a refrigerator to store some wine and cheese and snacks. We did appreciate having use of a washer and dryer right down the hall included as well .  All in all enjoyed our short stay in Paris thanks to Thierry sharing his fabulous apartment
Bright, clean and convenient - a perfecting base for exploring the city. Excellent value for the location.
Great quiet location.  Very close to everything and very convenient.  Overall wonderful stay and highly recommended.

Beautiful apartment located in a great area with excellent transport links. The place is very well-furnished with lovely decor. We were staying there as a hen party and had a brilliant time all round. Thierry is a friendly and welcoming host and could advise us on good nightspots and places to visit. Overall we loved our stay.
Excelente ubicación a pocos metros de campos elíseos, muy seguro y agradable.
Amazing ... 100% recommended.
Wonderful locations and bright lovely apartment just like the photos.
Amazing location !! Amazing apartment!! Super clean ! All the necessary facilities are there and the hosts are very hospitableand welcoming. Highly recommend !!
Everything about this property is exceptional, good for small family, quiet place easy access

This space is fantastic! The location is literally steps away from the Champs Elysées, great balcony and the apartment itself is decorated very nicely and extremely comfortable for the 5 of us that stayed here. A true Parisian experience!

The apartment is chic, spacious and well-located! Right next to Avenue des Champs-Élysées with metro stops & the Arc de Triomphe a short walk away. Couldn’t found a better place for our bachelorette festivities. Thierry was very helpful and responsive. Hope to stay here again on future visits to Paris!
Lovely place! Continent location and very clean.

Thierry is an excellent host. the apartment is very stylish, spotlessly clean and so close to local attractions, a plethora of restaurants and the metro. Thierry himself was very friendly and helpful throughout our booking and stay. I would highly recommend a stay here
everything is great~^^
Great location! Thank you for your hospitality
Thierrys place is excellent! great location and very clean new apartment. lots of accessories including a nespresso machine! highly recommend as the apartment has everything a family would want.
Perfect host and stunning flat in perfect location. Thank you
Óptima localización, apartamento impecable y muy funcional. Bien vale el precio!
The place was just perfect

This place is great, very centrally located and gorgeous interiors. We stayed here just two of us and found it very spacious for what we needed. You could easily stay with two couples. The location is excellent! The apartment was very clean and comfortable. Would stay again.
Great location. Conveniently equipped.  Right choice for getting a feeling of living in Paris.
Really lovely, spacious apartment in a fantastic location. Thierry was a very helpful and communicative host.
Thierry’s place is highly recommended. It offers great value for money. The location is second to none and the apartment has a great design and stylish touches.
Perfect location & beautiful apartment.
Stylish apartment just off the Champs-Elysées. Would stay again and not hesitate to recommend
这个公寓的位置是绝对优势的!就在香榭大道旁边,步行6分钟就到LV专门店｡10-20分钟就是各大名品店｡步行6分钟有一家超市｡全屋都是双重隔音门窗,所以不会吵闹!还有一个非常漂亮的小阳台,拍摄的好地方｡用2个独立的浴室和卫生间,非常方便!厨房只适合简单的煮食｡因为是新装修的,所以有一股油漆味!

Thierry was a very thoughtful host. He met us at the apartment (even after we arrived late), had someone to assist us in carrying up our suitcases while the elevator was down and walked us through all of the amenities. It was beautifully decorated and in such a wonderfully central location. Would definitely suggest staying here!
Great host. Great location.
Very nice place and location! Thierry was also very responsive to our requests.

Thierry’s place is sleek, modern, well equipped and in the most magnificent location. This apartment has a large living area, perfect for small family or two couples.

We would strongly recommend this to anyone looking for a convenient stay in Paris!
Ottimo tutto
Great apartment we loved our trip and my children would like to go back!

Very nice flat with very good location! We all happy with our stay in this beautiful apartment, Thierry is a very nice person, I will choose the apartment again next time I come to Paris. Thank you Thierry
Beautiful place in a perfect location just a few steps away from the Champs Elysees.  Perfect for pour family.  I would highly recommend.

Great host and great apartment. Less than 100 yards from Champs-Elysées. We travelled with 2 kids and our parents and the apartment was a perfect size for us. Great food options close by and a grocery store was a few blocks away. The pictures are an accurate description of the apartment which was spotless clean when we arrived. Great Wi-Fi - which was helpful because I had to work while we were there. 
Thanks to our host for making the trip memorable.
The host canceled this reservation 145 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The host was very kind and friendly,, the location was super great,, the building was secured,, the apartment was clean and renewed and well equipped but the rooms were very small,,the  closets were very small,, the elevator was too old and small,, the wa

Thierry and his wife are great hosts. Their place is clean and close to the Arc de Triumph. If you don’t like touristy locations, then better look elsewhere. We were 4 people and there was plenty of space.
Maravilhoso
It was a wonderful experience staying in Thierry’s apartment. He is a great host. Very helpful. Location is perfect. You can’t ask for more in Paris. Highly recommended.

This Airbnb was amazing! Perfect location right off of the Champs de Elysee. The apartment itself was beautiful and had just been remodeled. The showers were a great size and the beds were some of the most comfortable I’ve ever slept on. The air conditioning also made this stay very pleasant. Thierry was very easy to communicate with and was there to greet us upon checking in. When I return to Paris I would definitely stay at this Airbnb again!
Amazing location, brought family and was no issue. If you are looking for a place central and perfect. Pick this residence.

Nous avons était très bien reçu rien à reprocher nous conseillons vivement
Superbe adresse Idéalement localisée et Thierry très sympathique
Tres bon !
Appartement  très bien décoré, chaque chambre dispose d’une salle de bain. Propre et bien situé. Restaurant , transport et boutique à proximité. Hôte très réactif et accueillant
Appartement magnifique je vous le conseille fortement!! Merci a l'hote
Superbe appartement bien placé ! Très bon accueil !
Très disponible et sérieux ! arrangeant et aimable je recommande !
Superbe logement bien situé, hôte à l’écoute nous avons passé une nuit très agréable !
Super emplacement!
Thierry  est un hôte  tres sympa et prévenant. Appartement très  bien placé.
Super rapport qualité prix. Hôte très arrangeant et sympathique.
Accueillant chaleureux.. aucun problème
Super accueil le logement est fonctionnel et vraiment beau très bien situé au top!
L'emplacement parfait!
房子位于香街附近,非常的便利,风景很美,房东很热心~
It’s ok
Excellent design and reception service
Excellent
Great place! Very good conditions!

This is the best appartment we ever been to in paris, best location (literraly on the champs Élysées)
very quite and peaceful, Perfect for relaxing,

thank you Thierry !

Der Gastgeber hat zu unserem Erschrecken den Müll den wir sorgfältig weg geräumt hatten wieder ausgeräumt und auf der Küchennische verteilt um davon ein Foto zu machen. Dieses Foto dann zu nutzen um von uns Reinigungskosten zu erhalten. Sehr traurig dieses Verhalten! 

Ansonsten ist das Appartement sehr gut eingerichtet und platziert , aber leider nicht so groß wie es auf den Fotos herüber kommt. 

Kein Spülmittel vorhanden - oder anderes Putzzeug . Also besser alles selber mit bringen
Fantastic!

As a family of five, two adults with three children (8,5,4 years old), we loved the flat. 
The flat was comfortable and had a good layout for a short stay. It has a nice minimalist decor. The pillows, duvets and mattresses were comfortable and the air conditioner worked very well. Thierry was a very good host.
Pretty cool

It is a lovely apartment with style. Very close to all the shops and main attractions, really enjoyed our stay. Thierry was extremely helpful and spoke perfect English. Recommend to anyone who is traveling with families.

We highly recommend this lovely place. It is centrally located to everything we needed or wanted to see in Paris. The apartment itself is situated in the very middle of a safe clean tourist-type neighborhood (think Times Square in NYC) with lots of tourist focused restaurants and shops. That said, we could walk outside the front door and be right at one of the premier Parisian breakfast spots with the best pastries we had or we could walk a block or two and have access to the subway to go anywhere else in Paris (we used the subway but primarily used Uber to get everywhere). The apartment is beautiful and very clean. We were very grateful to have found a lovely place that we could call home in Paris. The beds were comfortable, the showers were hot, and everything was spartan. Rahim was incredibly friendly, helpful, and always available. We couldn’t have asked for a better experience on our first trip to Paris!  Thank you!

The apartment is super clean and good looking. It has two small bedrooms, one living room with a small kitchen and two separated bathrooms and toilettes. One of the bedrooms is dark because the windows face the wall. the other bedroom has got a lot of light. The hosts are very nice and welcoming. They were super careful and always easy to reach. However, I’d like to have a bigger bed, that one felt a little bit too small :)

This house looks like “the” house i would like to live in Paris, and that’s why we booked it with my colleagues on a business trip to Paris... but we were unable to stay in Paris for that long because of the Corona Virus outbreak. Unfortunately, even though we paid the whole amount upfront, since all our business meetings were cancelled, we weren’t allowed to stay in Paris and although Thierry was very helpful texting us before we had this issue, didnt help us at all with a refund. With such an important matter surrounding the world we would appreciate more understanding.

Great communication, which is important. The accommodation is so beautiful. The shower, the bed, the kitchen.. Al perfect!

The neighbourhood is very posh!
Great stay. Very easy to connect to attractions. Room is beautiful and clean
Great location.  Thierry very prompt on dealing with all issues.  The apartment feels quite secure and safe.  I would say this apartment is perhaps a little on the small side for a family of 5.

We have just returned from a stay at this property and Thierry was a fantastic host. Very good with communication from the moment we made the booking. Including during our stay when we had questions. 

The location of the apartment couldn't have been better. What a fantastic position to stay for a weekend in Paris. 

The property itself was styled just like the images, classy and modern, which is exactly to my taste. 

Like a lot of online adverts the apartment was smaller than the pictures suggest. It has 3 rooms. Two bedrooms and one average sized living space which includes the kitchen and dining area but was still plenty for what we needed. 

The only suggestion we would have to improve our stay would be to replace the mattresses with more expensive, more comfortable ones and to improve the noise from the main road for the front bedroom. Difficult to sleep when you hear the noise from the main road. 

Overall a good stay with a great host.
this place is awesome

Pro: very kind host, very clean, washer and dryer free on site, location on Champs-Élysées, nice bed sheets 
Cons :very noisy close to Champs-Élysées so bring your earplugs , much  much smaller then picture shows . Kitchen amenities limited

my family and i had a wonderful time in the apartment. everything was well sort out and the location was magnificent. thierry is the best host i’ve had so far; he is very thoughtful and welcoming. 
10/10 would recommend this apartment!
Great flat! In the same bloke of Ladurée!! In the middle of Champs-Elysées, walk- in distance to Arc d Triompe and great restaurants and shops. We will definitely come back soon!
Excellent place, super clean, best location. Loved the place. Will totally recommend over and over again.
Great place with everything you need in an outstanding location

We had a wonderful stay at this apartment. The location could not be beat, the apartment itself was incredibly beautiful and comfortable and Thierry made check in and out a breeze. It was a difficult time because of the transportation strikes and he worked with our changing schedules which I really appreciated. It is across the way from Laduree which has an amazing breakfast, close to all major shopping on the Champs-Élysées and has the most adorable little kitchen if you feel like making something yourself. We were sad to leave and I am saving this Airbnb for the next time we are in Paris.

Thierry was a great host. He accommodated us by letting us store our luggage a little earlier than checkin time, which was very helpful.
The apartment very nice with beautiful beds and bathrooms, though it was a little smaller than it looked in the pictures.
The location was perfect to stroll to the Arc de Triomphe and all good restaurants nearby. Ladurée was just outside the building.
Amazing location, the host Thierry is very thoughtful, understanding, and kind. Made sure all of our needs were met. Very comfortable and clean. Great Host and Home
Excelente ubicación. Perfecto para conocer sitios de interés.
Had a awesome time at this flat and it was super close to everything.

Just as advertised! Superb location, right by the main shopping area of Champ Elysee. The host responded very quickly upon our arrival to Paris and we were able to check in without any issues. Will definitely consider booking this place again if I am back in the area.

Beautiful and stunning apartment in a great location.  It also had high-quality sheets. Thiery was very helpful checking in and even helped us with the suitcases up to the apartment.  With minor work such as fixing the dishwasher, little dust cleaning and removing a few clustered pieces of furniture, I would have given him 5 stars!
The location was absolutely perfect. The host was very easy to contact. Check in and check out was made extremely easy.

Great apartment in a great location. Easy access to metro, shops and sights. Beautiful building and stylish accommodation. Comfortable enough for 5 of us. Thierry was quick to respond to questions prior to our stay and whilst there we dealt with Rahim who was also helpful. Would recommend this place.
Very comfortable and beautiful flat in perfect location.

El departamento esta super ubicado, a media calle de campos Eliseos, muy limpio, muy cómodas las recámaras, cada una cuenta con su wc, regadera y lavabo, todos los mensajes que le envié a Thierry obtuve respuesta inmediata, no lo conocí pero la persona que nos envió para recibirnos fué muy amable, nos dió todas las indicaciones del departamento y donde hacer el super, nuestra estancia fue muy agradable.  
Solo mencionar que hay un bar junto al departamento y por las noches se oye un poco el ruido, la 2da recámara no tiene ventana por lo que es obscura.  Pero esto no perjudicó en lo absoluto nuestra estancia.

I booked this apartment for my sister family, while we stayed in another apartment near by. According to my sister this apartment was good with a great location. Everything was working and very stylish.

Thierry’s apartment was in a top location: right in the middle of Champ Elysees! Laduree is only steps away. The apartment was stylish with a cute Parisian-style balcony. It was on the 4th floor but there was an elevator for use. The only thing that could be improved is the comfortability of the beds. The mattresses were a bit thin so they weren’t the most comfortable. Overall, I would recommend staying at Thierry’s apartment!
The apartment is stylish, clean with great amenities. Great location. Fabulous host. Definitely value for money.

Good location.
Nice and clean apartment.
Worth to stay!

Beautiful place in a beautiful location.
Sharp communication and great accommodation.
Highly recommended.
Thank you Rahim!

Pavel

We stayed in this Airbnb with work colleges for one weekend. 

On the first night staying in the apartment, we arrived home late from dinner and went straight to bed. The next morning we received a police and eviction threat for 'making too much noise when entering the building'. We did not party in the apartment or play music etc.. 

This was quite concerning and scary to wake up and receive this message and a simple phone call instead of a threating text message would have been better. 

The ground floor tenant also yelled when I used the common courtyard to make a private phone call or take the rubbish out.

The apartment was beautiful, but the hospitality for a vacation apartment was very inappropriate and as such, I wouldn't stay here again.
This location is 5 stars!  We were able to see the finish of the Tour De France!
In the heart of Paris, stylish apartment, close to shopping, restaurants, sightseeing. I would recommend this place to anybody who wants to stay in the center. Very secure and clean.
Excellent apartment...

Would recommend this Parisienne experience to anyone who needs a comfy and convenient place to stay in the heart of the most popular places to see in Paris.  The communication and check in procedures were smooth and easy. The place has two full bedrooms and bathrooms as well as a pull out couch and air conditioning making our family of five feel comfortable .  We did not want to cook but enjoyed having a refrigerator to store some wine and cheese and snacks. We did appreciate having use of a washer and dryer right down the hall included as well .  All in all enjoyed our short stay in Paris thanks to Thierry sharing his fabulous apartment
Bright, clean and convenient - a perfecting base for exploring the city. Excellent value for the location.
Great quiet location.  Very close to everything and very convenient.  Overall wonderful stay and highly recommended.

Beautiful apartment located in a great area with excellent transport links. The place is very well-furnished with lovely decor. We were staying there as a hen party and had a brilliant time all round. Thierry is a friendly and welcoming host and could advise us on good nightspots and places to visit. Overall we loved our stay.
Excelente ubicación a pocos metros de campos elíseos, muy seguro y agradable.
Amazing ... 100% recommended.
Wonderful locations and bright lovely apartment just like the photos.
Amazing location !! Amazing apartment!! Super clean ! All the necessary facilities are there and the hosts are very hospitableand welcoming. Highly recommend !!
Everything about this property is exceptional, good for small family, quiet place easy access

This space is fantastic! The location is literally steps away from the Champs Elysées, great balcony and the apartment itself is decorated very nicely and extremely comfortable for the 5 of us that stayed here. A true Parisian experience!

The apartment is chic, spacious and well-located! Right next to Avenue des Champs-Élysées with metro stops & the Arc de Triomphe a short walk away. Couldn’t found a better place for our bachelorette festivities. Thierry was very helpful and responsive. Hope to stay here again on future visits to Paris!
Lovely place! Continent location and very clean.

Thierry is an excellent host. the apartment is very stylish, spotlessly clean and so close to local attractions, a plethora of restaurants and the metro. Thierry himself was very friendly and helpful throughout our booking and stay. I would highly recommend a stay here
everything is great~^^
Great location! Thank you for your hospitality
Thierrys place is excellent! great location and very clean new apartment. lots of accessories including a nespresso machine! highly recommend as the apartment has everything a family would want.
Perfect host and stunning flat in perfect location. Thank you
Óptima localización, apartamento impecable y muy funcional. Bien vale el precio!
The place was just perfect

This place is great, very centrally located and gorgeous interiors. We stayed here just two of us and found it very spacious for what we needed. You could easily stay with two couples. The location is excellent! The apartment was very clean and comfortable. Would stay again.
Great location. Conveniently equipped.  Right choice for getting a feeling of living in Paris.
Really lovely, spacious apartment in a fantastic location. Thierry was a very helpful and communicative host.
Thierry’s place is highly recommended. It offers great value for money. The location is second to none and the apartment has a great design and stylish touches.
Perfect location & beautiful apartment.
Stylish apartment just off the Champs-Elysées. Would stay again and not hesitate to recommend
这个公寓的位置是绝对优势的!就在香榭大道旁边,步行6分钟就到LV专门店｡10-20分钟就是各大名品店｡步行6分钟有一家超市｡全屋都是双重隔音门窗,所以不会吵闹!还有一个非常漂亮的小阳台,拍摄的好地方｡用2个独立的浴室和卫生间,非常方便!厨房只适合简单的煮食｡因为是新装修的,所以有一股油漆味!

Thierry was a very thoughtful host. He met us at the apartment (even after we arrived late), had someone to assist us in carrying up our suitcases while the elevator was down and walked us through all of the amenities. It was beautifully decorated and in such a wonderfully central location. Would definitely suggest staying here!
Great host. Great location.
Very nice place and location! Thierry was also very responsive to our requests.

Thierry’s place is sleek, modern, well equipped and in the most magnificent location. This apartment has a large living area, perfect for small family or two couples.

We would strongly recommend this to anyone looking for a convenient stay in Paris!
Ottimo tutto
Great apartment we loved our trip and my children would like to go back!

Very nice flat with very good location! We all happy with our stay in this beautiful apartment, Thierry is a very nice person, I will choose the apartment again next time I come to Paris. Thank you Thierry
Beautiful place in a perfect location just a few steps away from the Champs Elysees.  Perfect for pour family.  I would highly recommend.

Great host and great apartment. Less than 100 yards from Champs-Elysées. We travelled with 2 kids and our parents and the apartment was a perfect size for us. Great food options close by and a grocery store was a few blocks away. The pictures are an accurate description of the apartment which was spotless clean when we arrived. Great Wi-Fi - which was helpful because I had to work while we were there. 
Thanks to our host for making the trip memorable.
The host canceled this reservation 145 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The host was very kind and friendly,, the location was super great,, the building was secured,, the apartment was clean and renewed and well equipped but the rooms were very small,,the  closets were very small,, the elevator was too old and small,, the wa

Thierry and his wife are great hosts. Their place is clean and close to the Arc de Triumph. If you don’t like touristy locations, then better look elsewhere. We were 4 people and there was plenty of space.
Maravilhoso
It was a wonderful experience staying in Thierry’s apartment. He is a great host. Very helpful. Location is perfect. You can’t ask for more in Paris. Highly recommended.

This Airbnb was amazing! Perfect location right off of the Champs de Elysee. The apartment itself was beautiful and had just been remodeled. The showers were a great size and the beds were some of the most comfortable I’ve ever slept on. The air conditioning also made this stay very pleasant. Thierry was very easy to communicate with and was there to greet us upon checking in. When I return to Paris I would definitely stay at this Airbnb again!
Amazing location, brought family and was no issue. If you are looking for a place central and perfect. Pick this residence.
Toujours aussi agréable c
Parfait ! Autant l'accueil que l'aménagement, merci !
Le studio est très joli, propre et bien équipé. L'environnement est agréable et calme. Nous avons été très bien accueillies et avons passé un bon séjour.
2ème passage consécutif et toujours aussi bien ... merci aux hôtes accueillants et accessibles

Très bon accueil.
Le gîte est aménagé avec attention.

Un petit jardin très agréable et cocooning
