Prima verblijf bij Richard en Dilek. De studio was niet zo schoon als ik zou verwachten en lag aan een smalle straat waardoor het geluid voor voorbij rijdende auto’s sterk weerkaatste. Ook was het jammer dat de verwarming niet uit kon, het was erg warm in de studio.
The location is convenient and the room is  tidy. Everything is good. Richard is very friendly and nice. Good place to stay. :)
Good communication, very clean and comfortable apartment with good location. We enjoyed our stay in Paris.
멋진 숙소다. 친절한 호스트는 도움을 많이 주었다. 주위는 조용하며 숙소는 깔끔하고 청결했다. 개인실이라고 되어 있지만 전체를 빌리는 만큼의 편의성을 가지고 있다. 다음 파리에 온다면 이곳에 또 오고싶다.

It was such a sweet little suite. 
Your own private entrance, nice sized bathroom, full kitchenette, bright and comfortable.
We were glad that Richard was there to greet us as he also helped us carry our luggage up the stairs. 
Close to the RER, (zone 3 so costs more than zone 1-2) a couple of shops and a couple of cafes it is a convenient location.

The house is located in a quite and clean district which is good for rest. The host responds very quickly to questions and offers a lot of help to me find my lost package. Fair price for travelers staying in Paris. But one thing to be noticed is waiting time for metro to Gentilly is quite long and it is suggested to stop at citie university station and walk to the place.
he is very nice .every time i ask questions .he will answer it so quikly.that palace near metro sation also very convient from orly airport
Richard家比想象中的要大,离地铁很近,周边也很干净也很安静,楼下就有餐厅,步行几分钟就到超市,唯一缺陷就是位置不属于市区,接送服务需要加收!家里配备的东西都比较齐全,挺满意的,

Slightly far from the city centre, in exchange for very quiet neighbourhood. Easily reachable via train service and around 5 minutes walk depends on which route you taking. There’s no elevator in the unit and the room is at third floor, thus if you’re traveling with large luggages will have a good workout
Um apartamento voltado para estudantes e muito adequado para tal. Foi uma boa experiencia.

We chose to stay at Richard & Dilek’s because the Orly Airport is located quite near & we had an early flight in the morning; Richard helped us out beforehand how to travel the fastest - thanks for that, it was really helpful information! 
We had everything we could have wished for as we stayed one night. 
We only did not know, that the ticket prices are higher when traveling to Paris city (which is easy by RER & fast, too!) & didn’t feel too comfy with the neighborhood, but all in all it was very nice! Thank you!!
Nice place to stay !

My wife and me had a very pleasant stay at R & D’s place. It is a small but very nice, clean, and confortable studio,  well located (very close to RER B Gentilly station), in a quiet neighborhood. Richard was very quick in answering and in providing in time all necessary instructions. Everything in the flat was in perfect working order, including fast and reliable wifi. We would definitely recommend it, as as a strategic choice for a stay in Paris.
Wonderful hosts and a nice place to stay with plenty of room and a nice kitchen area.

Richard and Dilek's apartment is very clean and located really close to the RER line. The AirBnb is really well organized so check in and out was very smooth. Bed is super comfy and all amenities are there for you to use. The fan was helpful in the summer heat but quite old and noisy. This is a more of a private studio apartment so if you are looking for privacy and time alone you are in luck. If you want a homey atmosphere with people around, you might want to consider another place.
RERのB線のGentilly駅より徒歩5分の位置にあり､ﾊﾟﾘの中心部に出るには非常に便利です｡近くにｽｰﾊﾟｰやｺｲﾝﾗﾝﾄﾞﾘｰ､ｶﾌｪ､ﾚｽﾄﾗﾝ､中華風の日本料理店もあります｡部屋は清潔で冷蔵庫､ｷｯﾁﾝがあります｡予約が完了するとｱｸｾｽやﾁｪｯｸｲﾝに関する詳しい情報が届くので楽にﾁｪｯｸｲﾝできます｡ﾎｽﾄに連絡するとすぐに返事が返ってくるので助かります｡
We had a wonderful stay at Richard‘s place. The place was super clean and close to the next RER B station. We‘ll hopefully be back soon again!

Richard and Dilek’s cozy apartment was ideal for two people daytripping into Paris. It’s a little outside of the city center but only 2 minutes walk to the RER train station and about 10 minutes into pairs from there. There was quick and easy access to the local shops (they even provided a helpful map). Overall we really enjoyed our stay here and would recommend it to future guests.

Very nice studio. Great location, as it was easy to reach all the tourist spots. ;) 
Comfortable bed and equipped with everything we could need.
Richard and Dilek gave us some good advice for our stay in Paris. The communication was very good!
주택가라 조용하고 1존이랑 그리 멀지도 않고 좋았어요 무엇보다 호스트가 너무 친절하고 정말 빠르게 응답 해줬어요
A nice cozy apartment very reasonable and close to the metro station!
Richard was an awesome host, helped us with everything. The room was perfect for our needs.

Highly recommended. We had a really great time in such a lovely studio room. Great location with around 20mins to central Paris by metro, walking distance to store and restaurants. The host is extraordinary helpful!!

乾淨的房間,且交通方便
住起來很舒適
Everything perfect, even print our boarding passes, would be happy to come again! Regards

Great little studio, very close to the metro. It was a great place to stay for the weekend but the commute back and forth on the train started to become overwhelming. But otherwise easy to use metro system and worth the price!
距离景点不太远｡去小巴黎那一圈基本都是2.8欧地铁｡离地铁站很近｡有便利店,可以做饭｡很安静,房东也很好｡入住挺方便的｡
房間簡單整齊乾淨,有基本廚具可以煮飯,沒有提供微波爐與吹風機,離RER很近旁邊也有超市很方便

It was close to RER B so good to get to the middle of the Paris. It was neat and clean and also spacious. Also kitchen was really useful. Richard and Dilek respond so quickly that I had no problem. Everything was nice! Thank you so much:)
Great service, beautiful home, close to Paris. 10 min Uber to all the important places. Outside the city enough do that it's quiet. Host very accommodating and thoughtful. Clean apartment.
Great Place!
Great!
Posto accogliente, fornito di tutte le prime necessità, vicino al treno e alle biciclette in zona tranquilla. Proprietari molto gentili e disponibili.

Fijne plek, makkelijk te bereiken met openbaar vervoer. Voor ons ideale locatie vanwege landen op twee luchthavens (ORY en CDG).
De studio is super voor een weekendje weg; rustig en privé, met alles wat je nodig hebt. Een bakker op de hoek van de straat, metro/RER vlakbij. Je bent snel in het centrum.

Richard en Dalek dachten mee met ons late arriveren en reageerden supersnel op berichten. 

Tip: de koffie bij de Portugese bakker naast het station is lekker! Ook goeie broodjes daar.

The studio is very confortable and clean, near to RER station and supermarket. Richard and Dilek are very accesible.
Very very suggested!!

Prior to arrival, Richard and Dilek provided a lot of useful information which I found very helpful. The place is close to metro station, in a quiet neighbourhood. The room is spacious, new, very clean. Mine also had a nice street view. 
The only down side for me was the fact I had to drag my 20kg luggage by myself to the 3rd floor on the narrow staircase because I checked in late.
Nice and clean studio, had all the basics. Host was kind and helpful
We had a great stay at the apartment! Everything was nice and tidy as described.

We only stayed one night but it was great for what we needed, quiet and easily accessible from the airport and city. It was clean and having private access to a kitchen and bathroom is a huge plus. Richard was very helpful and provided us with everything we needed including directions for restaurants and supermarkets (which are right down the road) we highly recommend this place.
Great place, simple but perfect to sleep in and explore Paris. Great hosts, would stay again.
Everything was just perfect. Close to the city and everything you need
Excellent hosts! Great place to get out and about in Paris. Terrific communication and comfy bed. Highly recommended for singles or couples.
非常棒的房子,有小厨房可以自己做简餐,房东提供了一切必要的东西,附近就有超市,房东人也超赞!

Richard welcomed us and explained everything to us. He was also always available if we had any questions. The apartment is a bit out of Paris but very well connected to the city center (15-20min with RER) and very close to the RER station. There are also Velib bicycles 2min away if you might prefer seeing Paris on a bike :)
However, the apartment doesn't have AC, so it was quite hot inside during our stay. It was also not as clean as we expected it to be considering the reviews. The kitchen equipment is very very basic. All in all, we expected more of this apartment. However, it suited us nicely for the 3 days we were staying there. I would recommend it if you don't plan to stay long and if you mostly plan to eat outside :)
離車站很近,附近也有超市,房間很乾淨
Nice location, close to the Gentilly metro station for easy access to the centre of Paris. Quiet neighbourhood, very clean Apartment.

I don't think you could ask for a better little place to spend some time exploring Paris. When we first met them he helped us carry our luggage upstairs, and was very helpful in getting us situated and explained about how best to get around, recommended a few places to visit, and explained how to work all the stuff in the apartment. While we never needed assistance, I have no doubt they would have helped if we ever needed anything. He even offered to vacuum the place and replace the sheets halfway through our stay! Extremely nice people and willing to help.

The area of town the studio is in, Gentilly, is a small little place right outside the city. There's a grocery store 5 minutes away next to the RER B station that is extremely convenient. If you walk in one direction you hit a nice little town, some restaurants and a nice park, good for exploring and taking a not too crowded suburban walk. The other direction you start to hit the more urban areas with shops and a nice large park near the university. Very good place to walk around in and isn't too crowded either. The subway will take you to the center of Paris in less than 20 minutes, and you can go anywhere from there. Tip - If you're going out a lot on the subway purchase a Navigo, they have much fewer issues than tickets and can go to zone 2 where Gentilly is. The apartment has a handful of cooking supplies, towels, and linens for you to use, all clean and very usable. 

Overall, amazing experience, and I wouldn't hesitate to recommended this place to anyone.

Nice apartment and nice host, the room is clean and the neighborhood is quiet.
We are happy to stay here in Paris.

Good experience.
The host always reply message in time.

Richard was great and met us when we arrived, the apartment was as shown in the pictures, very clean, warm and had electric shutters meaning it was nice and dark on a night for sleeping. The location was amazing, so close to the metro, only a few stops to central Paris, great place to stay and we will be recommending it to our friends, thanks Richard and Dilek!

Nice room with floor heating(visited during winter) and the host was really friendly. He received me although i reached quite late. Just 3-4 minutes walk from Gentilly train station. Have 2 supermakets near the room. Overall i had a pleasant stay
The studio is just out of zone 1 but only a 10-15 minutes walk from Cite Universitaire station. It's nice and quiet and all the amenities are as described. Recommended for travelling on a budget.
Very comfortable and very clean apartment! However, if sightseeing in Paris know you must purchase train tickets for Gentilly and train tickets for Paris. The only downside was the location.

The studio is very nice, clean, and very close to the RER B (Gentily stop). In order to avoid extra transportation fare because of its location in zone 2, you can walk to Cite Universitaire station (zone 1) in 10 mins.  Clearly, value for money. Richard is a very nice person and very helpful. I would recommend this place to any couple with less budget and who wants to live as close as possible to zone 1 (Paris).

Value for money. Ideal for a couple. The location is in Zone 2, which is not Paris. But in order to avoid a bit expensive local transport tickets from Zone 2, one can walk to zone 1 (Cite Universitaire) and enjoy cheap tickets to explore Paris. The only drawback is that there is no microwave. Richard is a very nice person and always available. A very nice place to spend couple of days to enjoy Paris.

The apartment was spotless, modern, bright, warm and exactly as advertised. The underfloor heating was very effective but we hardly needed it, despite the chilly weather. Richard was welcoming and a good host.
The host was so kind and helpful. We were happy during our stay there.

The studio is clean and tidy, Richard and Dilek are really nice, it's near to the subway station and tramway station, there are also some bus stations but I didn't take the buses, in one word, it's easy to go to the city center and everywhere I want. I recommend.
Everything was perfectly as expected - as usual !!

It was exactly as described. Really nice and clean.

Also, I was happy to see that there was a coffee maker and some coffee ready to be made :)
We enjoyed Richard's place. Safe, clean, and very convenient location. Excellent place to stay!
The room is very comfortable, big enough for two people and has a lot of light there. In addition, the location is easy to find. Really enjoy my first airbnb experience!

Had a great stay here . Perfect sized apartment to sleep and eat .

Served its purpose. Thank you Richard and Dilek
在巴黎的四天三晚,住在Mr Richard的民宿真心的满意,地段幽静,空气清新,屋内有单独的厨房和浴室,私密空间很好,Mr Richard也非常绅士,屋内环境整洁干净,建议可以在厨房配备微波炉,方便时吃披萨｡Mr Richard的厨房配有冰箱,非常方便储藏食品,浴室配有沐浴液､洗发露等洗浴用品,很是方便,堪称完美的民宿,同时也谢谢Mr Richard的周到接待｡
Yet again, everything was perfectly fine staying at Richard et Dilek at Gentilly. Things couldn't have been better, and I still recommend staying here !

Very good option for one or two guest, the room was very clean, Richard gave me clear instructions on how to find and acces the apartment, very close to train station, the neighborhood is very good also

This apartment is a lovely place to stay. It was exactly as described and the host was very accommodating. Even though I arrived rather late in the evening, he was very gracious and explained everything with care and patience. I didn't have a chance to explore as I had a flight to catch the very next day but I do hope to return some day and check out the local scene.

The place was great! Very clean and the perfect size. Richard and Dilek were very helpful and gave detailed information so I never felt lost or alone. The grocery store and  metro station are close which makes everything easier. Would definitely stay there again.
Buena comunicación, buena limpieza, aunque está alejado de París centro o isla, el acceso es fácil y rápido por RER B vía Gentily. Lo recomiendo.

Me encanto el apartamento muy cómodo, bonito y limpio, totalmente privado, el anfitrión explico muy bien para llegar al sitio de la habitación. El barrio es tranquilo y tiene pequeños supermercados y restaurantes, lo único es que no es cercano a los sitios turísticos, toca salir en metro, pero la estación del metro está cerca.

The room itself is really nice. There's even the floor heater, so it's very comfortable in the winter. The space is just right - not particularly spacious, but will never feel crowded. The only drawback of this room is its location. But you should know the location before booking the room and yet it's impossible to have such room, such price in downtown. In total, I think it's suitable for the traveler who stays for several days and don't mind spending some time for walking everyday. Btw, Richard is also friendly and welling to help.
Rechard和Dilek是一对很好很善良的夫妻,在预订之前会耐心回答我们的问题,即使我们在很晚的时候打电话他们也会接并耐心告诉我们房源的具体位置,即使我们到的很晚,他们也在耐心等我们,房间和图片一样,所在的街区距离zone 1 的最后一站也很近,可以节约不少交通费｡最后退房的时候还为我们稍稍延迟了几十分钟｡总之,谢谢房东的招待~

Richard and Dilek made sure, that we had everything we needed. Even information about how to get to the main tourist attractions and the closest supermarkets.
It was a really nice place to stay and I'm happy to have found this little treasure. Thank you!
Yet another good experience with Richard et Dilek. I still recommend to stay here - and will come back myself another time !!

I enjoyed staying in Richard & Dilek's studio for the second time now, and I hope it will not be the last! It is very nice, clean and conveniently located close to an RER station with connections to central Paris. And the hosts are very friendly and helpful !! I give my very best recommendations for this studio.
Un lugar muy lindo, limpio y cerca del transporte. Tiene mercados cerca y Richard super amable persona. Gracias! excelente lugar para conocer Paris por unos dias.
Perfect

Richard made sure to explain how everything works on mine and my girlfriends arrival. He also let us know he was happy to answer any questions we would have. The place was very clean and the bed comfortable! It is in an excellent position as main attractions are only about 20 minutes by train. There is a very convenient grocery store nearby right off the Gentilly train stop, that was a life saver by the way. Overall I would say the place is a ten out of ten. I am very glad to have stayed here. Thank you for having us Richard!

Perfect place to stay! The room is very clean and it has everything you need. Richard was very kind and they took the time to paste maps of everything we needed as laundy or places where to eat.  It was an excellent experience! Thank you Richard!

The room is excellent and it's location is good as the RER station is just a 5 minute walk away. Richard is very helpful as he provided the basic info about the neighborhood such as supermarkets. The instruction for checking in is very clear as I couldn't meet Richard when I reach there. He booked a cab for us to CDG airport as my flight is too early and RER wasn't running at the time.
The room was excelente, very pretty and clean, the neighborhood is not the best. But cost benefit its ok!

Richard and Dilek was very friendly and helpful. I fined the flat very easily. The flat was clean and Richard and Dilek explains everything very clearly. Thank you Richard & Dilek. I will be in London if you need me:) Gulay.

I had a very good stay in the studio - small but still spacious and light, well equipped and very comfortable. It was very easy to find and access and Richard and Dilek gave quick and thorough answers. Also there was a lot of information on public transport, things to see etc. I give my very best recommendations for this studio!

We were told the place is a little out of town - but when you come from a place where you travel 15km to get to work, then this is no big deal. Technically, yes, Gentilly is sub-urban Paris and you have to use the RER(B) to get to Richard/Dilek's place but with the kind of connectivity you have its fine.
We (Hidden by Airbnb) d for the easiest way to get to the residence and were told to take the RER to Cite Universitare. Actually, Gentilly is where you need to get off - the station is about 10 minutes from Rue le Cocq. We actually took a taxi and nearly missed the place - because you have to look hard for the No.10!
Richard had told us that they may not be at home when we arrive - but all his instructions were perfect. We had no issues reaching accessing the room. They did come in a little later and say "Hello" and made sure we were comfortable. Assured us the area was absolutely safe. By the way, Richard is super prompt in replying to any queries.
The room itself is very comfortable. It has basically everything you need. We are foodies - looking for French favourites, so we didn't bother using the kitchen (except for one coffee). The bed is comfortable for two. There is plenty of storage space (though a few more hooks to hang clothes would have been great). The wifi works superb. The bath and toilet are functional.
There are good places to eat at nearby. A "bakery" round the corner. A shop selling essentials including wines a few steps away from this corner. A laundry was pointed out nearby but we didn't go in that direction. In general, convenience was evident.
Overall, the four nights spent at Richard and Dilek's were worth every cent. Highly recommended. Would love to come back again!
Richard是非常好的房东,房间也非常干净整洁,下次来巴黎还会入住Richard家,非常好

All our contacts with Richard prior to our arrival were extremely helpful. He was there to meet us with maps and city guides about Paris, the apartment is on the second floor but Richard helped us with our luggages, he was extremely polite, friendly and happy to help, making us feel warm and welcome. Perfect location and safe. Thank you so much Richard, hope to see you again soon!
The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Good place to stay For the price. Very prívate and comforatable. A little bit far walking from Paris city, but near a metro station. Richard and Dilak were very nice and helped us in any need! A bakery near by and supermarkets! 
Great time in Paris!

Sehr modernes, sauberes und angenehmes Studio in der Nähe des Boulevard Périphérique (aber trotzdem ruhig). Richard war ein sehr netter Gastgeber und stand für alle Fragen zur Verfügung. Ich habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt, vielen Dank!
Excelente experiencia, muy lindo y cómodo el studio, y cercano a las líneas de metro. Richard y Delek excelente anfitriones, y la limpieza mas que excelente!
Nice room and good location close to city (~20min to notre dame) Worth the money. Richard and dilek are nice too.

This was a great place to stay. Richard and Dilek were both nice and easy to work with. It was great to have our own apartment, and only a 10 minute scooter ride into the city! I would bring earplugs, the street below is quite noisy. But other than that we had a great stay!

The room is very good and close the subway.
Thx u

Richard is very nice and helpful host!! Everything was perfect! The studio is very comfortable and cosy. There is everything you can need. BTW there is a nice bakery near, where is a big variety of tasty and cheap things)
Very lovely apartment in Gentilly. Hosts made us feel very welcome and helped us with anything we needed, directions or simply a corkscrew. A perfect place to stay in Paris

A very pleasant studio in an excellent location, only 5 Metro stops to Notre Dame and less than 5 minute walk to Gentilly station.  Apartment is nicely furnished. A very lovely pair of hosts - great communication and explained things within the flat on day of arrival.  A few details to improve on: unfortunately the WiFi did not work for the whole trip so no internet in the room. Also, bathroom bin was not emptied from previous guests.

Richard and Dilek have been really helpful throughout our stay here at Paris. Upon arrival, they have tried their best to provide us with directions to various attractions and the room is in absolutely top notch condition! Richard even helped us to call a taxi for our departure to the airport because we needed to leave at 5am and we do not speak French. We are so thankful to him for he was not obliged to help us at all but he did it out of his kindness. This accommodation is away from the hassle in Paris (Gentilly is in Zone 2) which we really appreciate and it is really close to the Gentilly Metro station. All in all, staying at Richard and Dilek's place make the entire trip so much more enjoyable! Highly recommended if you prefer to cook and stay away from all the touristy crowd.

A great place to stay, the place is a small studio, photos do the place justice, however does seem a little smaller then the photos, has all the amenities, it may get hot during the day if you stayed there all day, but that was not an issue as we only used it to sleep, also  Richard was very accommodating and helpful. I would definitely recommend the place

I like Richard's place a lot. It is very clean and tidy. You have almost everything you need. Very private and quiet studio apt. Richard is very nice host, due to my flight schedule, I arrived around 11pm at Paris CDG airport, and he is very nice to wait for me to check in late. The apt is 3 mins walking to train station. It is just at the edge of Paris central circle, about 15 mins train ride to center. I am happy to recommend Richard's place to other airbnb traveller.

Excelente experiencia! Fue mi primera vez utilizando airbnb, quede bastante satisfecho.
La atención de Richard fue súper buena, la habitación súper limpia súper moderna y súper privada. Lo recomiendo muchísimo, y de todas maneras al volver a París volveré a tomar la habitación.

Richard nagyon kedves és segítőkész házigazda volt, a lakás is a leírtaknak tökéletesen megfelelt. Kényelmes, otthonos és tiszta volt. A környék könnyen megközelíthető, a metró 5 perc gyalog. Köszönöm.
Great place to stay! Clean and comfortable room near the RER station. Richard very helpfull and kind.

It was great house for us. It was very clean. and close with gentilly station. 
Richard and dilek are very kind and friendly. 
I want to stay, when i visit paris again.  
숙소 정말 괜찮아요 깨끗하고 방에 싱크대와 화장실이 딸려있어서 편합니다. 주인분들도 상냥해요. 역에서 걸어서 5분도 안되는 위치에 있어요. 3층이라 캐리어 들고 갈때 약간 힘들었지만 리차드가 도와줬어요. 아주 친절한 호스트입니다. 다시 파리에 간다면 머물고 싶은 숙소입니다.
I had a lovely stay there! The house have a good location, is was neat and clean and Dilek was very nice and explained how everything worked when we arrived. I would advise it!
非常干净,舒适,交通很方便,周围就有超市,去火车站飞机场都很方便,很适合情侣入住,单独的私人空间,晚上也很安静,如果去巴黎旅游的朋友,我推荐这一家,关键是价格比较合理｡如果有洗衣粉晾衣架就更好了｡

We really loved to stay at richard and dilek apartment. They was very helpfull and kind with us. The studio is very comfortable and it's not far from paris centre, just 15 minutes by train. If we ever retun to paris, we definitely will go back!

Richard and Dilek are very nice and hospitable. The room is very cozy, warm and comfortable. Even if it is not very big it has everything you need (fridge, cooker, wc, shower...)

The place is close to a Velib station, so you can go around by bike. Moreover there is a little shop open 24/24 where we were able to get something to eat.
I do recommend this place to spend some days in Paris!

Richard and Dilek were the sweetest and welcoming hosts. The private apartment I stayed at was the most beautiful place I have ever slept including my own home. Everything is brand new and modern including electric blinds to block the light from the windows. The apartment is just a five minute walk to the train which is just a ten minute ride to Paris. Richard and Dilek invited me to have tea with them before I left and we spoke for a long time. They are good hearted people and I would love to stay with them again. Thank you both so much!

Good directions helped us get quick to the location. Safe area, 4 min walking time to RER station. Host made us feel welcome. Place looks like on the pictures, nice and clean. I would recommand it to a friend.

We asked for wine opener and he get that for us in no time, what was very nice of him.
Unfortunatelly we have noticed while on the airport we still have it in a back pack.
Sorry for that and we will mail one for you asap.

Tip: Last RER to get there is shortly after 12:00am. Taxi cost from Eiffel Tower around €15

Richard has been really helpful and collaborative and provided me with all the information I needed about the surroundings, the services, the apartment. The apartment is in very good conditions, newly refurbished, well equipped and the cleaning service is excellent. The area is really quiet, thus you can enjoy Paris during the day, and sleep in a silent place during the night :) I would absolutely recommend this place to stay.
The neighbourhood is really quiet and offers many services. Also the rer b station is pretty close and allows you to reach central paris in less than 15 minutes.
It was really amazing experience. The hosts were a lovely couple who helped me eve get train tickets and tell me a lot of good things.

I'm very satisfied with the room. The room is nice and clean. Good location. Richard is friendly and responsive...and very appreciate to allow us for late checkout. I will stay here again if I come to Paris.

Richard and Dilek made me feel extremely welcome and at home. The apartment was wonderful. It is a new and very modern studio apartment. The metro stop is less than a 5 minute walk away and from there, its a quick trip into the city. Richard explained everything well and made it clear that he would always be available if we had any questions.

Literally the best weekend me and my boyfriend had. Beautiful studio apartment. Affordable. My next trip would be spent at this apartment again. The host were so flexible and lovely and the communication between client and host was quick and consistent.  Literally 3mins  walk from the nearest station and mini market. 5* in terms of do it yourself basis.

This was a perfect place for my stay in Paris! The apartment is new and clean, everything works well and is beautiful! Richard and Dilek were wonderful hosts. The location was pretty good, somewhat close to the RER station so by public transportation to the main attractions, it took about 30 minutes, which we didn't mind at all since that was a nice way to see some of Paris as well. There are grocery stores and restaurants close by and the studio is located in a quiet part of town so there was not a lot of street noise. I would definitely recommend this place!
It's nice room! Comfortable and clean,and near metro! It's a good choice to live here! Everything is perfect! Thank you !:D

Alexandre est un super hôte, il très réactif et l’appartement est très bien placer.
Je recommande fortement.

Alexandre est un hôte très sympathique et réactif
Très bel appartement, bien agencé et très proche des commodités, merci beaucoup!
J'ai passé une excellente semaine chez Alexandre. Appartement très agréable et  confortable. Très bonne literie. Je recommande ++.
Très propre, très fonctionnel.

Après nous avoir accueillis très chaleureusement, Alexandra nous a aussi aidé pour le stationnement à proximité immédiate du logement. Concernant l'appartement, il est tout à fait conforme à l'annonce et nous sommes très contents de notre séjour. Je vous le recommande vivement.
Logement fidèle au descriptif! Hôte très accueillant et proposant même des circuits de visite ! A recommander !
Belle appartement dans un  quartier calmes mais avec toutes les commodités. Un hôte très à l'écoute je recommande +++
N est pas pu y aller pour cause du covid 19 mais hôte très sympathique qui n a pas refuser le remboursement intégral.

Nous avons passé un agréable week-end à  proximité immédiate de Paris.
Appartement agréable et fonctionnel.
A réserver sans hésiter.
Conforme à la description, hôte accueillant, appartement au top !

Logement très bien situé, propre, bien équipé, Alexandre est un hôte exceptionnel qui vous accueille comme des amis, ses précieux et nombreux renseignements et conseils facilitent le déroulement du séjour. Grand merci.
Logement propre, chambres et cuisine de bonne taille. Très bonne literie, et surtout appartement non bruyant
Super logement

Le logement est très lumineux, très bien équipé et tout à fait adapté pour 8 personnes. A proximité des lignes de bus et métro pour faciliter les déplacements vers Paris.
Je le conseille pour plusieurs.
Appartement propre, très bon accueil et bien équipé. Nous avons passé un bon séjour
Acceuil du propriétaire, équipement exceptionnel du logement, je recommande vivement

Appartement tres propre, calme et spacieux, avec une cuisine super bien équipée et moderne
Bonne Literie dans les chambres
L'appartement est très bien équipé, les chambres sont spacieuses.
Appartement très propre et pratique pour des collègues en visite sur salon pro à Paris > les 3 vraies chambres permettent de conserver une indispensable intimité.

Tout était parfait et conforme à la description.
Proximité des transports et des commerces.
Merci Alexandre nous recommandons vivement cet appartement
Excellent appartement, très sympa, très beau, super déco......

Appartement au top , arrêt de bus à proximité ! Une bouteille de vin nous attendais dans le frigo, une attention qui nous a bien fait plaisir.
Je recommande ce logement et y retournerais avec plaisir

Appartement accueillant et confortable, nous avons passé un excellent séjour.
L’accueil a été parfait. L'équipement a répondu à nos attentes.

Le logement est spacieux, avec l'équipement nécessaire et surtout faut bien le signaler un ensemble de verre, de couverts et assiettes qui sont complètement harmonieux.
Une petite touche d'attention également disponible dans le logement.
Également ce qui nous a frappé c'est que Alexandre a cherché avec nous des emplacements de stationnement pour nos véhicules et remorque.
En tout cas personnellement je recommande l'hospitalité d'Alexandre ainsi que ce logement très bien situé
Un havre de paix. Conforme a nos attentes
Appartement très agréable, fonctionnelle, très joliment décoré, avec petite vue sur la Tour Eiffel. Alexandre est très sympathique et de bons conseils, je recommande ce logement.
Nous étions 7 amis et nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Alexandre. Il a été très disponible et nous a donné des adresses dans le quartier et dans Paris. Je recommande ce logement !
hôte attentif et a l écoute , fait tout pour vous rendre agréable votre séjour.
Excellente expérience ! Alexandre est très sympathique et a pris le temps de me présenter son logement lors de l’accueil. C’était très propre et bien placé (a moins de 10 minutes du métro). Parfait !
Appartement spacieux, parfaitement aménagé et décoré, un hôte sympathique et très réactif, tous les éléments étaient réunis pour passer un bon séjour, merci à vous
Alexandre est un hôte très attentionné et très réactif à nos demandes de renseignements. L’appartement est bien équipé et agréable.
Appartement spacieux, propre et très bien équipé. Un logeur très avenant et qui devance les besoins de ses clients. A recommander +++
Super logement, super hôte !
Pièces spacieuses, literie confortable et équipements optimaux, le logement d'Alexandre à parfaitement répondu à mes attentes.
À recommander !

Alexandre est sympathique et présent lors de l'arrivée afin que tout se passe au mieux.
Le logement est spacieux et avec équipement et confort nécessaire tant pour séjour cours que long. Dommage pour le réveil très tôt dû aux travaux du voisinage, mais indépendant de sa volonté. Logement à recommander pour séjours aux portes de Paris.

L’accueil chez Alexandre a été sans faute. L’appartement est vaste, bien aéré avec des fenêtres sur 3 côtés et beaucoup de lumière. L’insonorisation est très efficace. Nous n’avons jamais entendu les voisins. Tout le nécessaire (cuisine et salle de bain) est fourni. L’appartement était étincelant à notre arrivée. Paris est facilement accessible par 2 stations de métro, chacune à 10 minutes de marche. Un séjour parfait à Paris!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour chez Alexandre. Son accueil et sa flexibilité étaient très agréable! 
Nous recommandons sans hésiter!!
je vous recommande!
Super

Excellent host and amazing apartment. Alexandre is very thoughtful and helpful with his guests. Will come back if I have a numerous family to bring to Paris.

Do recommend 110%!
Great place to stay near Paris, definitely recommend!

Tolles großzügiges Appartement, was perfekt ausgestattet ist. Wir waren sehr zufrieden und würden diese Wohnung jederzeit wieder wählen. Komplette Abwicklung war sehr angenehm und unkompliziert. Alexandre ist ein sehr angenehmer Gastgeber. Gerne kommen wir wieder.
This place is amazing right next to the bus and 10 minute walk to the metro. Alexandre was great and very thoughtful tips to get around Paris. Thank you Alexandre!!
ﾎｽﾄからの連絡がすぐに返ってきて困った事があってもすぐに解決出来たのでよかったです
非常不错的地方,这个区域也比较安全｡房东很热情,考虑的很周到,满意!

This place was great! We arrived later than expected but were still able to meet with Alexandre to get the keys. He showed us around the apartment and gave us some tips to deal with the current travel disruptions going on in Paris. The disruptions did not give us too many issues, we just had to walk about 10-12 minutes to a train station to head into town. If there weren't any disruptions, there is a bus stop very close to the apartment which would have been convenient. Despite us walking to the train station most days, it never took us more than 30 minutes to get to our destination. The location was also close to a couple grocery stores, which we took full advantage of. 


We were thankful for 2 toilets and 3 rooms since we had 5 guests, and everyone was able to get their own comfortable bed with a nice blanket.

I suppose the only downside is that there are only stairs to get up to the apartment on the third or fourth floor. So, be aware that there aren't any options for those who cannot physically use the stairs. We did not have any problems however. 

I would definitely recommend this place. It was affordable, great location, great host, great wifi, and we could even watch Netflix!

Alexandre was an amazing host with an amazing Airbnb! He waited for our arrival but due to our train being late- we did not get to meet. He left me very thorough instruction on how to get in and was very responsive to my questions. The Airbnb was very clean and spacious. Alexandre also gave me tips on transportation as well as places to go. Highly recommend!

Alexandre ha sido encantador con nosotros. Ha estado disponible en todo momento, nos recibió con una cálida acogida y nos ayudó desde el primer momento a que nuestra estancia fuera inolvidable. El apartamento está muy bien equipado, la zona es tranquila y hemos disfrutado de unos días increíbles.
Excelente apartamento, excelente anfitrião. O apartamento é muito bom para família com até 8 pessoas.
Alexandre has a really nice place, nice location, very clean and had everything we needed! Also he helped us a lot with local tips and suggestions! Really fast responses and very flexible!

A lovely apartment that is spacious and clean which was very much value for money. Although it was a bit out of the centre of Paris, public transport was accessible enough and Malakoff was a nice and cheaper area. Alexandre was very attentive, provided lots of information and responded to all of our concerns quickly. Would highly recommend.

Alexandre was great host. Ticks every box. The apartment was located in a convenient place for our trip and had all the amenities we needed. He even gave us a bottle of Prosecco as a welcome gift. Highly recommended. Thanks Alexandre!
Heel fijn!

Alexandre is an excellent host. He is attentive and gives the most detailed welcome and suggestions for things to do in Paris and the area near his apartment. The apartment is clean and Alexandre had so many nice little touches to truly make us feel welcomed.

Excellent stay at Malakoff.. was a perfect location for seeing all of the sights of central Paris with my family. Lovely clean apartment with all of the amenities needed. A short but sweet stay! Would return!

We really enjoyed our stay!  Alexandre did a wonderful job communicating from the beginning.  He was quick to answer any questions and gave GREAT suggestions of things to do in the area.  He met us at the place, explained everything and always answered questions.  It is a little bit from the city but the bus is just around the corner and the metro is down the street.  Thank you for a great stay Alexandre!

This apartment was very comfortable. Exactly as describe, it has 3 full bedrooms and 2 1/2 bathrooms. The apartment itself it’s not super big but the main areas such as rooms and kitchen are spacious. This apartment has a full kitchen which it was awesome for us that cooked breakfast and dinner the whole stay. The apartment was very clean. Location is safe and close to the train stations to transfer to central Paris. Alexandre was an excellent host, he provided us with so much information that helped me planned the trip and gave us a tour of the apartment and explained how everything worked. Thank you! Definitely recommend it.

Wir haben das Appartment ausgewählt gehabt, da eine Reise mit 5 Personen nach Paris anstand. Das Appartment ist geräumig, neben dem Wohnzimmer sind drei Schlafzimmer (1x Doppelbett, 1x 2 Betten, 1x 3 Betten), Bad , Toilette und Küche vorhanden. Wer möchte, kann Wäsche waschen und trocknen. Ebenso gibt es einen Geschirrspüler. Massig Küchenutensilien und auch bereits diverse Kleinigkeiten für das Kochen, sowie Wasser waren von Ihm gestellt.
Alles ist sauber und intakt. Die Übergabe und auch der Check-out waren unkompliziert, Alexandre hat uns persönlich begrüsst und alles ausführlich erklärt. Zur Metro läuft man circa 15 Minuten, in der Umgebung gibt es alles, was man braucht, inkl. zwei Bäckern und Kneipen.
Der Clou war die Garage, so konnten wir zu fünft mit einem Auto anreisen.
Wenn wir wieder mit einer kleinen Truppe kommen, werden wir gerne hier wieder vorbei kommen.

The flat is great, super clean, spacious and has everything that you need - tea, coffee, mineral water, jams, washing machine, etc etc. We were travelling as a group of 5 and there was enough space for everybody. While the city is not located in the centre, there is a direct metro to get to the centre. We are not surprised that Alexandre is a superhost on airbnb. Before our journey, he sent us his tips and recommendations. Highly recommended!

This is an absolutely wonderful, spacious apartment.  Super clean place, very safe neighborhood, close to bus and metro, great connections to both Paris center and Versailles. One thing I was really grateful for were comfortable beds and just overall nice place to stay. I wish we could've stayed longer. This was probably the best airbnb I've ever stayed in.

eine perfekt ausgestattete Wohnung ( Waschmaschine, Geschirrspüler; Kaffeemaschine..) sehr sauber, sehr gute Betten,sehr aufmerksamer Vermieter- Wasserflaschen wurden besorgt, Kaffee, Tee, Marmeladen, Zucker gab es zur freien Verfügung,ebenso bekamen wir eine gute Flasche Sekt zur Begrüßung! alles wurde gut erklärt
Excelente hospedaje mejor de lo que esperamos, el apartamento es nuevo y con muchos espacios, quedamos mucho más que satisfechos. La atención de Alexandre fue increíble. 100% recomendable
Extremly helpful, sympathic host, ani well-equipped cozy location in quiet, pleasant area of Paris. I totally recommend this place to spend Time in France as a larger group of people.

El piso estaba súper limpio y en muy buenas condiciones, El Barrio es muy tranquilo, alquilamos coche y aparcamos sin problema y todos los lugares de interés están a 15 mint en coche y a 15 min del aeropuerto de orly , el anfitrión encantador y muy detallista, recomendable al 100%
Excelente apartamento, muy tranquilo el lugar, Alexandre es un excelente anfitrión, les recomiendo!!!

Du bor lidt væk fra storbyens vrimmel, i hyggelige omgivelser...
Alexandre er en nærværende vært, altid klar til at hjælpe.
Der stod vand og vin til os da vi kom, det havde vi ikke forventet, og vi nød at have en stille og fredelig base, under vores ophold i Paris.
Vi vil gerne bo her igen, en anden gang.
Un espai acollidor, net i tot correcte, en una zona molt tranquila, nosaltres hi varem estar molt bé.
Alojamiento muy recomendable, fácil acceso a Paris centro. Apartamento muy confortable, con plaza de garaje. Muy buena opción para visitar Paris. Gracias a Chantal y Alexandre.

Alexander’s place is very nice and very well located. It is very specious, clean and comfortable. The location is very convenient as it is quick and easy to commute to central Paris.  Alexander is an amazing host. Communication was great at all times! I totally recommend this place.
Very nice apartment. Extremely clean. Very helpful, answered questions quickly.
Alexandre is a great host, he will go the extra mile to assist you during your stay. The apartment was clean and comfortable.

We had a great family holiday with 2 teenagers. The flat is in a quiet part of Paris, with good access to the centre on the Metro. The highlight of the trip was cycling around Paris using the Vélib cycle scheme. There are bikes 2 minutes from the flat. Sign up online and use a code to unlock the bikes.
Very friendly host, with lots of helpful information, would definitely recommend!
This was a great stay. Wish we could have stayed longer. Excellent response time. Helpful. Flexible. Fabulous space.  Thank you!
Thanks to the host we had a nice stay. The place is beautiful, very nice, clean, comfortable and the little walk to the Metro was not bad at all and there is a supermarket mot far from the place ♥️
Hi I recommend this apartment to any people especially for families with small children it’s very safe area and apartment is very nice and clean. Easy to access the public transport
The place was great! Good location, very clean. Thank you!
Alexandre y Chantal son muy amables. El lugar super cómodo e impecable. Muy recomendable.

The appartment of Alexandre was great. It is located on so safe place, next to two metro stations, there are a lot of restaurants and shops near there, the host was so kind, helpful and very clean appartment. The WiFi is very fast, its perfect for work and we enjoyed the playstation. We will come back again!
Nice and big place, superb host and outstanding accommodation

Eine Top Wohnung, sehr sauber und groß, ein sehr hilfsbereiter und netter Vermieter, alles was man braucht ist in der Nähe, ein angenehmes Viertel. Im ganzen sehr zu empfehlen und wir würden jederzeit wieder buchen!
El apartamento es impecable, estuvimos alojados durante 4 días con mi familia, alexandre fue siempre atento con nosotros desde la llegada, fácil acceso al metro. Recomendadisimo al 100%
Очень гостеприимный приём, уютная чистая квартира со всем необходимым, удобное расположение от центра. Рекомендуем к проживанию.

We had a wonderful stay at Alexandre’s. Place was spotless and well equipped. Even had a Play Station 4 for the teenagers after long days touring the city. Spacious for a family of four with room to spare in a quiet neighborhood and easy access to subways. Alexandre was a great host who provided a tremendous amount of information and showed us around the apartment and immediate neighborhood.

My two colleagues and I spent six days in Alexander's apartment. We are very satisfied with everything. Alexander was very helpful and friendly from the moment we reserved his place. He provided us with many useful tips, not just about the accommodation we rented, but also about the shops, restaurants, transportation, etc.
Alexander’s apartment is located in a very quiet and beautiful neighborhood. It is easily reached by the metro in combination with a bus or a 10-minute walk. The apartment is very spacious and equipped with all that is needed during the stay. 
I would definitely recommend Alexander’s apartment to anyone who is planning his trip to Paris.

Ha sido una semana estupenda,el apartamento es recomendable 100 por cien, éramos ocho personas y estábamos cómodos .Esta superbien distribuido.Limpiza perfecta,comodidad,no le falta ningún detalle.Nos dejo comida necesaria suficiente para empezar al igual que jabones,papel ,detergentes..
La ubicación es genial ya que la parada del metro está muy cerquita y el bus al lado.La zona es tranquila .
Alexandre muy amable ya que nos ayudó en todo lo que necesitamos y te prepara hasta el itinerario de lo que hacer y (Website hidden by Airbnb) diez.
Thank you so much for the amazing hospitality. My family and I were impressed with how helpful you were.  Great experience.

Friendliest and most helpful host I have met by far. Place was very functional and additional touches like having milk, water and everything we need on standby was really great. Place was very clean (the helper/cleaner) wiped down even the handles knobs and walls! Will definitely stay here again if I’m back! Thanks alexandre for the prompt responses and great patient suggestions

Alexandre was a fantastic host !!!! Casa is perfect for spending a few days in Paris with friends! Perfectly clean, very comfortable with everything you could need. So close to Subway, all amenities around .... Communication with Alexander was easy, friendly and very fast. I can highly recommend this house !!!!!! Our stay in Paris was simply FANTASTIC! Thanks for everything .... !!!!
Great host! Super helpful and accommodating. Plenty of space in the apartment for a group of people. Quiet little area with train and restaurants in walking distance. We enjoyed our stay!

Alexandre es un anfitrión inmejorable. Ha sido muy atento con nosotros en todo momento y nos ha dado unas muy buenas recomendaciones de supermercados y restaurantes. También nos ha facilitado mucha información sobre el transporte público, lo cual nos ha ayudado enormemente en nuestro viaje en París. Esta bastante bien ubicado, no esta céntrico, pero está en un barrio tranquilo y bien comunicado con el centro de París. Consideramos que tal vez el precio es un poco elevado en cuanto a las características del alojamiento, ya que es un bloque de pisos bastante antiguo. No tiene ascensor, y está ubicado en un tercer piso, una cuestión a valorar para algunos viajeros con problemas de movilidad. Cabe resaltar por encima de todo, el trato de Alexandre, quien ha estado disponible para resolver cualquier duda en todo momento además de haber sido muy atento el día de nuestra llegada. 
Sin duda para repetir!

What a kind host! Chantal and Alexander were gracious enough to leave a bottle of Champagne chilled in the fridge for us water and coffee and light food available, such a godsend after a rough trip from the US to Paris. The space was simple and clean and exactly as described and pictured. The only thing that was unpleasant was bringing up the luggage on the stairs but it was worth the trouble. I recommend taking a taxi or uber from the airport instead of the train because there were way too many stairs to deal with when rolling big luggage around.

Alexandre was the perfect host, from waiting outside to greet us as we came to the very end and messaging to check if we were okay throughout our trip. The apartment was very clean and spacious, and had the all amenities we could have needed as we found central Paris very expensive for food there was a (halal) amazing takeaway just a few steps from the door which was a much cheaper option for us in the evening after long days out! Alexandre even walked us to the local mini supermarket which was super nice of him. I would deffo recommend this apartment for a family friendly and quiet stay in Paris!
Everything was more than perfect! Alexandre is a super nice person and very helpful. Thank you again for everything

A spacious apartment in a nice area on the outskirts of Paris. Clean, with all basic amenities available. Alexandre was very responsive and gave good tips on travel in and out of Paris. The metro is about a 10 minute walk from the apartment, with plenty of regular trains into the centre of Paris. Would highly recommend.
Perfect location, good host, very helpful and quick to reply

Alexandre is a wonderful host so far with my Airbnb experience.We had a pleasant stay at Alexandre ‘s place. He is very helpful. He gave us a clear and perfect information to reach the landmarks from his place. Also he showed us some local backery to have our breakfast. I would like to stay again definitely when we visit Paris in future.

I cannot say enough good things about this host.  He responds immediately. He offered detailed instructions on how to get to local and major attractions as well as metro stations and grocery markets.  He helped guide us from the airport. His apartment fit my family of 7 perfectly.  It was clean and spacious and had everything we needed.  Plenty of closet space, outlets, cookware, etc.  the building is quiet so I had to remind my family to speak softly and walk quietly when we came home late from the soccer game or Normandy but no one complained so I think we were fine.   An experience with an Air BnB can either make or break a vacation and Alexandre helped make our vacation perfect!  So perfect, in fact, I will specifically look him up again if/when we come back to Paris.

Such a beautiful place. Classy minimalist design. & provides everything you need. Alexandre was such a gracious & helpful host, communicating with him was very easy. We loved everything about the apartment. It was very well kept, cozy & clean. Chantal was also very kind & helpful.
Muy Buena atencion, el apartamento comodo, bonito, lo recomiendo

This apartment was perfect for me and 5 friends on vacation in Paris. The apartment was clean and had everything you will need! Would definitely stay here again. Alexandre was extremely helpful and went above and beyond to make sure we had all that we needed.

Perfect location between two different metro lines to access city settled within a beautiful and safe neighborhood.  Very clean apartment and Alexandre was brilliant in meeting our needs and requests!  Highly recommended!
Great place, near to metro and near to the city.
We really love Alexandre's place, he was very helpful when we arrived and made us feel at home. The apartment had everything we needed for our stay and we had a great time.

Alexandre ha sido un gran anfitrión. Nos ha dado muchísima  información totalmente útil para organizar nuestra estancia en Paris. El apartamento esta muy bien, situado cerca de 2 estaciones de metro que te acercan rápidamente a Paris.
Se trata de una zona muy tranquila. Totalmente recomendable. Sin duda volveríamos al apartamento. Gracias por todo Alexandre.
L'appartement proposé par Marine est propre, très cosy, avec de petites attentions (bonbons, jus de fruits, jeu de carte...) qui font que l'on s'y sent comme chez soi !
Nous retournerons avec plaisir chez Marine. Lorsque nous retournerons chez nos enfants
Logement conforme à la description! Propre et Literie super! Endroit calme !! Je recommande
Logement très agréable et cosy. Hôte très réactive et sympathique. Au top je recommande !

Appartement très propre, soigné, fonctionnel et bien équipé, en bonus, les petites attentions des propriétaires.
Je recommande par contre il ne faut pas être trop grand !
Très belle endroit calme et apaisant, hôtel très compréhensible et attentionnée, je vous recommande  .
Logement propre et proche de l’aéroport. L’arrivée autonome est très pratique et facile.

Le logement de Marine est très agréable, parfaitement propre et il y a beaucoup de petites attentions pour les visiteurs . Nous avons pu dormir paisiblement. Si besoin, nous y retournerons les yeux fermés.

Séjour très agréable, appartement d’une propreté impeccable avec tous les équipements nécessaires.
Très satisfaite !
Très jolie location où l’on se sent bien, proche du T7
Très bien aménagé et très calme. Je recommande.
Logement impeccable , Marine et son mari sont très réactifs. Je conseille ce logement.
Accueil très sympathique de Marine et Guillaume. Très réactifs dans tous nos échanges avant et pendant le séjour. Le logement est calme et propre.
Appartement spacieux et propre. Hôte disponible, réactif et accueillant. Je valide.
Toujours aussi bien. Calme, studio fonctionnel, hôtes super sympa. Je recommande vivement.

Superbe séjour dans ce magnifique petit cocon ! Marine est très réactive lorsque nous avons une question. L’arrivée comme le départ se sont fait en autonomie. Tout est mis en place pour qu’on se sente parfaitement bien. L’appartement est décoré de façon moderne et avec goût. Point très important également, le logement est totalement propre. Tout simplement magnifique ! 
Merci encore à Marine & Guillaume. 
À bientôt peut être ☺️

Magali & Jean-Jacques

J’ai passé un très bon moment avec ma copine dans ce logement qui était très propre et conforme à la description. Un très bon rapport qualité prix je n’hésiterais pas à le réserver une seconde fois. Et merci pour les petites attentions :)

J'ai passé un séjour très court mais j'ai été surpris par l'organisation et la souplesse de Marine, la propreté irréprochable du logement. Celui ci est bien équipé, très agréable.
L'arrivée était autonome mais on a été très bien accueillis (livret d'accueil, petits gâteaux etc.)
Très agréablement surpris,je conseille fortement
Cocon parfait. Cet endroit est recommandé
Logement propre et au calme. Je recommande
Superbe ! Je recommande vivement !
Petit cocon très agréable, chambre vraiment spacieuse, propreté irréprochable ! Très bon séjour !
Superbe accueil avec un décore très convivial et un endroit calme . Je recommande fortement

Vraiment rien a dire l'appartement est super bien et surtout propre.
Marine est une personne adorable, gentille, accueillante, souriante...
Merci beaucoup

Ce n’est pas un hasard si cela fais deux fois que je retrouves dans la liste des commentaires ! Le petit cocon de Marine est si charmant qu’il est difficile de s’en défaire ! Merci encore une fois Marine !

On a passé un très bon séjour chez Marine. 
Merci de votre hospitalité.
Arrivée en autonomie très explicite rien a dire , logement très propres tel que sur les photos. Marine très réactives aux questions. Parfait.
Logement très propre, agréable et chaleureux. Hôte particulièrement attentionnée ! Merci Marine...

Très très très contente de ce court séjour chez Marine et Guillaume. Petit logement, teeeeellement mignon, très cocon, on s’y sent vrmt bien, presque chez soit. 
Je recommande fortement

Hôte agréable et aux petits soins 
Mention spéciale pour la propreté une notion qui échappe à beaucoup d’hôtes
Très beau logement situé dans un endroit très calme. Je recommande

Merci à Marine et Guillaume pour cette bulle conforme aux photos de la description ! Une décoration soignée et aucun problème de propreté

Super logement, très agréable, calme et conforme à la description. Hôte très attentionnée. Merci à vous Marine de faire les choses aussi bien. Nous avons adoré notre séjour dans ce logement très mignon!
Très chic appartement

Superbe séjour, une touche d’attention à l’arrivée, un emplacement idéale et une discrétion des hôtes idéals. Je recommande sincèrement ce logement parfait pour un sejour en couple, avec une température agréable malgré la chaleur dehors. La propreté était au rdv ça fait du bien. Accueil impeccable, logement très bien équipé, très propre. Quartier nickel et très calme. Je recommande vivement.

Très bon séjour , appartement très propre, un très bonne accueil...

Petit  appartement très sympathique, très bon accueil des hôtes, très propres !
Appartement très propre et calme à recommander sans soucis proche de tous commerces.

Merci infiniment marine pour tout car franchement on s'attendait pas.. tout est top ...votre accueil chaleureux et aussi de votre compréhension  car on arrivait tard vers 22h...appartement propre..calme..bien situé..décoration bien soignée...j'ai trop kiffé les barres au céréales ...

Logement parfait et bien équipé, mais surtout très propre, j'ai passé un séjour très agréable. Un grand merci à marine et Guillaume qui ont été très sympathiques,disponible mais en même temps discret. 
Je recommande sans hésitation.

Merci Marine pour sa réactivité, son accueil et sa confiance. 

L’appartement est refait à neuf, très propre et bien situé. Rue calme et entrée indépendante de la maison avec une spacieuse chambre. 

Nous reviendrons avec plaisir.
Super agréable, endroit intime spacieux, propre avec des hôtes super cool. Communication rapide et pratique.
logement très propre, bien placé et surtout au calme
Appartement impeccable, très bien décoré et un très bon accueil. Idéal pour se détendre et déconnecter. Un grand merci à Marie pour son souci des détails.
Très joli appartement, et très bon accueil de la part de Marine.
Excellent !

We booked Marines place last minute to catch a flight and she was an amazing host, responded quickly and made sure to stay in touch with us the entire time. The bed is comfortable and the suite is very charming. Would recommend!
I enjoyed my stay at Marine’s place. The apartment was cosy and clean as advertised and Marine was a great host!

Adorable little musical themed boutique hotel with exceptional hosts at check-in. It's located in the heart of many musical instrument shops so very fitting theme! Convenient location with a mostly flat 15-min stroll to Galeries Lafayette at Haussmann. There are also a variety of good local restaurants for those who prefer to stay close.
The room was so romantic! We were very lucky to have a balcony which added to the atmosphere. A perfect weekend away!

I had a wonderful stay at this super chic boutique hotel and I was pleasantly surprised to find out that I was their first AirBnB guest! I loved all the cool patterns in every corner of the common areas and my room was super clean and very well-laid out. The staff were extremely helpful and just so delightful! The hotel is picture perfect in every way and great value for money. The breakfast was amazing and well worth the money! I was on a work trip but my stay at Idol made it feel less so because I immediately felt relaxed when I walked in the door. I really look forward to visiting Paris again and staying at this lovely place.
Très bon emplacement. Chambre agréable pour une famille
Super beau, confortable pour tous les quatre, spacieux et emplacement de choix !!
très bien accueilli bonne situation géographique

Excellent Hôtel ! Nous avons été très bien accueillis. La décoration de l'hôtel nous emmène hors du temps. La suite était très confortable, très propre et spacieuse avec un balcon utilisable avec vue sur les toits parisiens. 
Le petit déjeuner continental est copieux et bon.
Je reviendrai sans hésitation !
Très bien placé et calme

It was a very pleasant stay at the Villa Opera Hotel, it was a cozy room and the service was excellent. Amazing breakfast and amenities. When I return to Paris, I will definitely stay in the same place since the location was also very accessible.

Además el personal hablaba francés, inglés y algunos español, hasta donde pude observar :) y la amabilidad fue excepcional.

Ce fut un séjour très agréable dans une chambre confortable et le service était excellent. Quand je reviens à Paris, je vais certainement rester au même endroit car l'emplacement était également très accessible.
Super nice. Great location and great space especially for the price. Highly recommend!

Great stay at this fine and perfect Hotel. Room was quite big and the location was excellent (even walking distance from the Opera)! Nice bars and restaurants around. We surtainly can recommend this place!
El sitio está muy bien ubicado, limpio y corresponde muy bien al anuncio. Las personas de recepción estuvieron muy atentos a cada petición y amablemente hicieron todo lo que solicitamos

Very “Parisian” for this first timer. Red fabric wall coverings, antiques, comfortable mattress, very clean bathroom. The breakfast was all you can ask for. Hearty and filling, very good. Great breakfast room too! The front desk lady was very friendly and accommodating. The location worked out very well for us. I highly recommend!
Wonderful staff and fantastic location. This is an outstanding place to stay in Paris.

This place was great! The room is actually part of a hotel so it was very easy to access and check in was seamless! The complimentary breakfast in the morning was delightful. The hotel is very charming and the aesthetic makes you feel like royalty. I would stay here again!
Muy recomendable!
We loved the stay at Villa Opera, it is a fabulous hotel in a great location! Would highly recommend and look forward to visiting again!
Hotel is Super lovely with nice balcony view from room, breakfast was awesome!

Great location; friendly people; good value for the money; excellent breakfast; great atmosphere (older, typical Parisian building; near Musee Grevin and Folies Bergeres; many restaurants and stores next door). Very easy to get from/to Gare du Nord and Gare de l'Est.

I needed a place urgently for one night in Paris, and found Jean’s place!

Most Parisian Airbnb’s are located in un-safe areas and marketed to tourists as ‘Parisian experience’ and highly over charged. This was one of the few experiences in Paris where I’d have happily paid more.

Jean’s place is located in a safe, clean area that’s 10 mins to central Paris.

Comfortable bed, airy, aesthetic space!

Jean himself was an amazing host! He cooked dinner for me, and even served breakfast! 

And was an amazing person/host to talk to in every way!

I come to Paris for 24 hour stays and this will be my go to from now on! Highly recommend!

Apartment located close to subway from where you can reach the center of Paris in 20 min. They are also close to Château de Vincennes and Parc floral de Paris. Apartment is clean and Jean Michel is very nice and gentle host. The sofa is big which was very comfortable for me since I am 190 cm. This apartment will be ideal for a single traveller to spend a weekend in Paris.
停车方便,沙发床,房主人很好,很热心,为我提供了早餐｡推荐

Jean Michel was a great host. I booked late but he was very accommodating. And his place was exactly what I needed:simple, clean, and well-located.

Jean Michel é stato molto gentile e accogliente considerando che ho riservato il giorno stesso e sono arrivato tardi la sera. Zona tranquilla e divano letto comodo. Grande disponibilità e colazione ottima.
très bon accueil rien à dire !

This was my second time staying with Jean Michele and I had another wonderful stay. He is very easy to have a chat with and loves to help with any questions you may have about getting around Paris. I highly recommend staying here for a short stay!

Highly recommend! Jean Michele’s place is perfect for a short stay and is located close to public transport and shops. The sofa bed is comfortable and a good size. He also cooked a nice dinner and prepared breakfast the next morning and I did not expect that. He loves to have a chat and is also really into traveling. Not many hosts go out of their way and give you their time like Jean does. I can’t fault anything!
Great location, simple but clean, friendly host
Der Gastgeber war nett und hilfsbereit, die Unterkunft war prima, alles wie beschrieben.
Mr Jean Michel was a great host , very welcoming, he made me breakfast two times, his place quite nice & organized. Very close to the metro Station, 3 minutes walking . I highly recommend him .

Jean-Michel è stato veramente molto gentile ed ospitale! Ha risposto sempre molto rapidamente alle domande e il check in è stato facile e veloce. La sistemazione non è forse adatta per un lungo periodo ma per pochi giorni è perfetto. Il quartiere di Montreuil è a mio parere uno dei migliori al di fuori di Parigi. La fermata della metro è a 5min dalla casa.

I wish I had my laptop to write this review because I could write so much. Jean accepted my request last-minute, and accepted me even when I arrived an hour before I was supposed to. He made me dinner and breakfast, and is a great chef (like he literature was a legit chef in France). He was super kind and left me with a photo of the Eiffel Tower that he took while he was on a boat on the Seine. Highly highly highly recommend.

Jean is a quiet lreflective sort of fellow.
He's extremely easy to get along with and goes out on a limb to ensure his guests are made to feel at home.

His environment has a relaxed arty feel to it and is naturally well lit.

If you do choose to stay at Jean's then you are in for a treat.

Hugh  

(The Naked Ape) on Flickr
The apartment was very clean and tidy, great value for the price. Jean Michel is a great host, very helpful and polite.

A top host who caters to your every need, Jean Michel is great company and you can see he really values 'partage' (which, I learnt, means sharing) - after staying at his place you will too. The apartment is well equipped for a carefree and comfortable stay, so whatever your expectations, you won't be disappointed.
nice quite place i was really thankful for possibly to stay in Jean flat. He is a great and kind guy. thank you for everything !!

Отличный вариант для одинокого путешественника, рядом с метро Croix de Chavaux (7 минут ходьбы)

This was my first Airbnb trip and it reminded me a bit more of Couchsurfing than a b&b as I had to be out of the apartment from 9am-9pm (host had the only key). This lined up with my plans so I didn’t have a problem with it but something to keep in mind! That said Jean Michel was friendly and offered dinner as well as breakfast which was great value considering the place was cheaper than most hostels to begin with. I would stay again!

Jean Michel's place is just a metro ride away from the city center! His hospitality is the best! He cooked me dinner and breakfast. On top of that, he did my laundry! I'd recommend his place to anyone.

Лучший приём который у меня был. Jean лично встретил. Квартира большая и уютная. Показал всё, объяснил. Общались через (Hidden by Airbnb) переводчик, так что языковой барьер преодолели. Очень интересный собеседник. Накормил ужином и завтраком. Всем советую)
Un sitio estupendo, cerca de los transportes y el piso es super chulo y se duerme genail. Jean-Michele es super super SIMPATICO!!!
Jean Michel is a wonderful person , and very helpful.   Waited for me till late and also helped me manage my luggage while I went to see the city.  I will always prefer to return to stay with him.
The flat is charming. Metro and RER stations are nearby. Jean Michel was very hospitable. Extremely nice place to stay.

Jean Michel is a warm, hospitable host who truly makes you feel at home. Check-in was smooth, he offered me breakfast, dinner, coffee and wine. I recommend him without a hint of hesitation, he really is a super host who is perfect for Airbnb.

Jean Was an outstanding host and very considerate. I was experiencing all sorts of trouble with transportation and reaching the apartment due to railway construction but Jean made sure to wait for me until I arrived (12:30 AM). The space is accurately described. It is basically a sofa bed in the living room however for the value this was a great accommodation. I had a great nights sleep. about 10 minutes by foot is the train station.
Jean was very kind during my stay, an amazing host. He even made me dinner, I had a great time getting to know him. I would’ve stayed longer if I could.
Jean Michel es una persona super amable y simpática. Excelente anfitrión. Hasta la próxima.
Expect the best. Hes in a great area that is surrounded by many places. I wish Jean the very best. Very helpful with the local things and I thank him dearly for his hospitality.
Jean Michel es un chico muy majo y le gusta preocuparse si no estoy cómodo. Gracias por todo
Best host ever.
100% recommended!!
总体来讲很不错,在住宿费用昂贵的巴黎,这个价格的民宿也不多见｡地点开谷歌导航还是比较好找,下地铁走10分钟左右｡房东人很好,迟到了2小时到,也没有说什么｡早上还给准备了早餐,非常棒｡沙发床展开后很大很宽｡
Superou as expectativas, Jean Michel é muito receptivo e generoso, sempre pronto para ajudar!
호스트 Jean에게 정말 고마웠다고 얘기하고 싶네요. 가성비 정말 괜찮았습니다! 위치도 좋았구요! Thank you so much, Jean!!!

Jean-Michel is indeed is a super host. He was supportive when I got confused with the check-in time and informed him with my late arrival beforehand. He gave me some very clear and easy-to-follow instructions to find the place (which is actually very well located, not far from Gare-de-Lyon). His home is very clean and cozy and also has style. I had a good chat with him and learned about some interesting French things from him.
Jean Michel es un hombre amable y atento. La estancia en su hogar fue muy agradable. Lo recomiendo!!
Kind and friendly
Muy buen anfitrión y el lugar muy agradable. Lo recomiendo mucho.
Best airbnb Ive ever stayed at. So friendly and really felt like just staying at a friends house. Only recommend for travelers who just need one or two nights! Overall, best Airbnb.

Place is really good:):)

His shared room is really cozy, clean, beautiful and nice.

I had to get out early in the morning for leaving but he got up for me and gave me coffee.
His warmful personality is really good for me.

Nice place ! The host is a warming personality French. The place is a little far away from city Center but it's the best value for money. The place is clean and comforting. Even tough the bathroom was a little too small. Nevertheless I enjoyed my stay and would

Jean is the best AIRBNB that I´ve had till now. He is really friendly, funny and always trying to help. He cooked a really nice dinner for me and the breakfast is also good. His appartment is really nice. You get much more of what you pay for!!!! Thanks a lot Jean!!! Cést la vie :)
Jean was very friendly and accommodating! We had a nice dinner and breakfast - he is a great cook. Additionally, his home was clean and put-together. No issues! Definitely will book again.
Nice place, good location really close to Paris, only 2 or 3 stops on local transport into the city. Couch was decent and nice guy.
He help to me whatever I need and we talk about everything.Thank you for good hospitality, awesome dinner and breakfast Jean Michel. See you soon next time :)

Amicable and accommodating host who shows a real French hospitality. For me he went out of his way to cook dinner, and provide any info I needed. His cuisine is top-notch! Merci de nouveau Jean-Mivchel.
Jean Michel was a super nice host. I came pretty late, but we had some drinks and a nice chat. He even made us dinner. Top lad!

The best host I have had on airbnb. I arrived late and Jean made me dinner, shared with me some beer, wine and delicious French after dinner drinks (les digestifs) and gave me very helpful directions around Paris. I was also able to do some much needed laundry which was extremely useful. 

The apartment has delightful character, it's clean, and it is right beside a station for the m1 metro line (the last station, château de Vincennes). Approximately a half hour to the center of Paris, 45 minutes to the arc de triomphe. 

Jean is very friendly and accommodating, including letting me into the apartment after I had returned late from dinner with friends. I would definitely recommend this host to other Travellers. 

Merci d'être un hôte incroyable !

Jean Michelle is a great host, when I arrived he was making dinner and he shared with me, we had a awesome chat and he is really nice. The apartment isnt very close to the center of Paris but you can easily go in the metro. The bed-couch was very confortable and he even made te breakfast. Very recomended!

Thanx Jean Michel. Felt nice with chats, food and wine. This was a very last minute solution for me and it felt perfect in a couch surfing way. If I would have stayed for a week or so - I might would have seen it as a problem not having my own key - but in this case I came at evening - met a friend and his delicous food - left in the morning. So perfect.

All good. It was a first for me to actually stay on the living room couch (sofabed) and pay for it, but it was good. It felt like staying at a friend's friend's place. Jean Michel obviously took his responsibility hosting seriously. There was only one key, but he made a big effort to make it work, so it was fine. 
Thank you!
J.M. its a really good host, he has so much care about his guests and the house its very warmthfull. Jean M. Its a entertaining speaker and a good traveler too. Recommend
I never even rented from this location I don't even understand how this happened

Attention logement non conforme. Entre les photos, les informations de l'intérieur du logement et la réalité il y a un monde !
Nous n'aurions jamais réservé ce logement même à un prix plus bas si nous avions eu connaissance de la réalité.
Entre l'extrême chaleur sans ventilateur dans la chambre, le matériel dégradé un peu partout ( lit cassé sur les cotés, rideaux et volets cassés, ventilateur cassé, douche désagréable...) la saleté partout,  le bruit autour du logement, l'environnement du logement, l'immeuble et l'appartement sales, mauvaises odeurs également...
C'est à croire que le logement n'est pas nettoyé après le passage d'un client. 
Il y avait un caleçon de quelqu'un sous le lit avec beaucoup de saletés en tout genre et des reste de drogue !
Les draps des lits nous grattaient beaucoup.

 C'est inadmissible à quel point les détails de l'annonce ne correspondent pas du tout à ce que nous avons vu.
Le logement à également l'air bien plus grand sur photo.
Nous ne savons même pas si le propriétaire qui communique agréablement dans ses messages a conscience de tout cela.
Nous sommes partis tôt, dégoûtés, sans parlé au propriétaire.

Nous vous souhaitons de ne jamais vivre cette mauvaise expérience...

L'appartement de Philippe est lumineux et TRÈS BUEN SITUÉ. Tout est à proximité. C'est génial. Le canapé et le lit sont confortables. Il y a tout ce dont on a besoin dans l'appartement.
