방은 둘이 지내기 괜찮았어요. 프론트 직원들도 친절했어요. 할인해서 그런지 저렴하게 예약하고 방도 발코니 방으로 줘서 좋았습니다. 씰쑤롬 낡짜륽 짤 몼 옐앿했는델 엘얼삐앤삐엣설 볂경 욜청하닠깣 핞참 답잎 없떠랏궃욯. 직웒뜷이 엘얼삐앤삐늖 홖읺 안핯늖겇 같앞욜.  홏텔 홈펳잊질에 있늖 메잃 줄솧로 뼌꼉 욯청해얗합닛닻.

The first and the last two last pictures or not pics for a standard classic room.  There is no space to put a chair or a desk in a standard classic room
There is an elevator the room was clean if you get lucky which I was you can get a shower that is arranged to be small but comfortable

otherwise the bed is very comfortable and the room was clean and they do not smell however the paint on the shower tiles is flaking.
Farouk's place is great and situated in very calm neighborhood. The staff was very welcoming and supper supportive. The room was supplied with everything you can need.
非常漂亮的酒店
Thank you

Excelente hotel!! La habitación es más chica que lo que se ve en la foto, pero nosotros pasamos solo 1 noche y fue excelente. La calidad de la habitación es muy buena, camada muy cómoda y las toallas suaves, el baño excelente con buena presión de agua. La zona estaba bien para lo que necesitábamos.

Super Service, freundliches Personal, gemütliches Ambiente,
Tolle Ausstattung der Zimmer, geräumiges Badezimmer

Hotel aconchegante e confortável, bom custo benefício, os funcionários são educados, tem um mercado Carrefour pertinho, porém o maior problema ao meu ver é não ter frigobar dentro do quarto, você quer guardar uma água, ou até um lanche pequeno, e fica difícil... Tem a geladeira lá em baixo, na cozinha do hotel... Mas n é confortável ficar descendo pra pegar uma água por ex... Enfim, tem metrô perto, tem recepção 24h ... Teve um ponto negativo, mas eu recomendo a estadia...

I really rate this as an excellent find, for a reasonable rate, in a good location with delightful staff and good facilities. Great buffet breakfast available, daily papers, great bathrooms, sparkly clean and crisp white sheets. I was there at a tricky time with the yellow jackets and virus restrictions to implement; and throughout they were informative and helpful. Would definitely recommend and hope to return in easier times
This place is great! You are gonna feel really confortable and personal are so nice and friendly. I’m sure if I come back to París I’ll stay here again!
Very clean room en nice people!
Excellent hotel

Добротный небольшой отель. Прекрасно расположен. Рядом метро, большой ТЦ с возможностью вполне приличного шопинга, множество кафе и ресторанов. Основные музеи (Лувр, Орсе, Оранжери и др.) находятся на удалении 2-3 км, но мы с женой с легкостью их преодолевали пешком, одновременно гуляя и созерцая чудесные маленькие улочки и бесподобную архитектуру Парижа. Казалось, за 6 дней можно увидеть все, но мы заблуждались! Наматывая ежедневно по 20000 шагов мы не успели посетить все запланируемые места! Поэтому с удовольствием вернемся еще раз, т.к. влюбились в Париж с первого взгляда!
Excellent service before and during the stay!
Excellent location! Check in was very easy, and the staff was very kind and helpful. The room was super clean, and the bed very comfortable! A great place to stay!
Great little hotel. Very close to the metro and not that far from the Seine. Didn’t purchase breakfast so can’t speak to that.
Loved this place. The hospitality was amazing, everything was good. We will be back!

The hotel was ok, friendly staff and located close to the metro as well as walkable distance (25/30 mins) to the city center. We didn’t spend any additional time here as there was no space to relax, besides sitting on the bed. So if you plan on being out all day seeing Paris then it’s fine considering prices in the city. The room was much smaller than those in the photos and was cold when we arrived (although we turned on the AC and that seemed to sort out the problem).
Great place, easy to find and ideal if you’re just going for a few days. Lovely staff too!
Nice and clean hotel. Well situated and friendly staff.
O local é limpo e muito organizado!

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay here. The staff were friendly and the room was sparkling clean. The location also makes it easy to get to anywhere in Paris easily. Highly recommended. I plan on staying here again soon.

It was really nice hotel; fancy, clean and bed was comfy and the location was so nice. There were many restaurants and convenience stores near by. And the bus stop and metro station were also near. I really recommend here to stay!
Nice hotel with small charming rooms, satisfying breakfast offer and excellent hospitality. The cost effectiveness is amazing for Paris.
Very nice place and location! Easy to get there via metro. It is a hotel room, so it is sparkling clean with sufficient amenities! Worthy of value!
The bathroom was a little bit tiny, but very good for the money!
Nice hotel in Paris at a reasonable price

Un accueil à la hauteur de l'endroit.. Merci à Gaspard pour toutes ces attentions.
Je reviendrai c'est sûr!
Informations d’arrivée très claires et simples. Appartement très propre et agréable.
Très bien à tout point de vue. Je recommande.

Un petit cocon de calme au cœur de Paris. Des restaurants et bars fort sympathiques à deux pas. Un appartement design et propre totalement conforme aux photos. Et un hôtes totalement réactif prêt à tout pour que vous passiez un excellent séjour. Que demandez de plus ? Allez y les yeux fermés, vous ne pouvez pas être déçu.

Séjour plus qu'agréable passé au sein de ce duplex tout confort, situé à l'arrière d'une cour calme.  Belle surprise en plein coeur du 9eme.
Décoration et charme de l'appartement tip top!
Gaspard est un hôte très sympathique et accueillant.
Merci :)
Bel appartement fonctionnel. Chambre et salle de bain très agréables. Gaspard est un hôte accueillant, souriant et attentionné !
Gaspard est un hôte prévenant, l'appartement est très agréable, beau et lumineux dans un cadre et un quartier très sympa. N'hésitez pas c'est une excellente adresse pour un séjour parisien.
Localisation parfaite, le métro est juste à côté, plusieurs bons restaurants à proximité. Le design de l’appartement nous faisait sentir comme dans un hôtel. Très propre et confortable.

Petit hôtel particulier au calme sur cour dans un quartier très vivant. Décoration raffinée et confort absolu. Gaspard, l'hôte, est passionné et dévoué. Le quartier est formidable, riche en belles adresses, une autre façon de découvrir ou redécouvrir Paris.

Gaspard était très attentif et serviable. Je peux vraiment recommander son appartement. D'ailleurs, nous avons recu du vin et du café. Nous étions vraiment étonnant, comme rapide et spontané il a repondu sur notre messages.
À la prochaine

Superbe. Facil, Bien situé, Je recommande! 
Rien a dire, que du bonheur que d'avoir l'impression d'être 
dans une ambiance propre, sereine, appartement et en même temps avoir ce coté Hotel. Genial.
Merci Mr Gaspard

Gaspard est super gentil , ses appartements sont beaux , élégants et soignés , c'est entre l'hôtel et l'appartement ce qui m'a aussi plu et très propre .
Design unique et agréable . Dans un beau quartier que j'aime : vivant et calme à la fois . Pas de vue mais de grandes fenêtres et de la luminosité en masse ! 
Et Gaspard est très réactif et présent pour donner des outils et partager son expérience de Paris .
Super !
Super !
Best Airbnb in Paris ! I will come back soon. Thank you Gaspard and see you next time !

Very nice flat as described and aligned with pictures. The place is really quiet and comfortable in a very Fun neighborhood Pigalle Abbesses Martyrs...Gaspard is very nice and warming. Thank you I will probably come back

Nous avons passé un excellent dans un appartement alliant confort et charmes. Le toit panoramique et la salle de bain a italienne en sont les principaux atouts. Sans publier la situation géographique, idéale pour profiter de Paris.

the perfect apartment. In my favorite neighborhood, that is blowing up with amazing bars, restaurants and coffee shops every day. Yet the apartment is completely quiet, no noise at all at night. Modern, everything is new and updated, yet the building is still charming. An odd medium between apartment and hotel, more services than a typical apartment yet less than a hotel, which was a bit confusing, but I would absolutely return! Gaspard is great and communication is rapid. The only thing you should know before arriving is that there isn't a formal closet, but a rolling rack was provided with hangers.

Gaspard’s place is beautiful. I stayed there for one night and it was a good experience. Clean, well decorated and with a great bathroom. Check-in was easy and Gaspard is a friendly person who reacts quickly. 
I would definitely go back there.

This place has its pros and cons. On the positive side it is lovely! The skylight is beautiful. And I love the location, it is convenient. The building is also great and the flat is simple but stylish. On the down side, I find the check in process to be time consuming (you have to download an app and scan and it doesn't always work immediately). The host wasn't responsive early on. And there was an issue with a water leak. However Gaspard was very apologetic, and took care of the issue right away once I informed him, which I do appreciate. We were able to discuss and rectify the issue. Overall I would say he cares very much about his guest experience and is kind, which is important - and a great place to stay if you want a lovely flat.

Gaspard's place is absolutely beautiful and communication was excellent.  Just be aware, that there's no closet to hang you clothes (but a rollaway that can be brought in) and that the toilet is downstairs (so, if you're one of those people that get up in the middle of the night to go, like me, you will have to be careful going down the spiral staircase half a sleep).  However, the huge stunning walk-in shower upstair was awesome!

Everything was perfect. The location couldn’t be better. Pigalle is a wonderful neighborhood with plenty of great restaurants and bars within a block. The wet room is a nice touch after a long day of walking the city in the cold. I will definitely stay here again. Merci Gaspard
Genuinely super host, very attentive and professional .
Great place to stay and look forward to coming back. Gas pars is great and also very helpful.

We had a great stay here! The apartment was very clean and comfortable. It’s also located in a lively area, near restaurants and right down the street from a metro stop, which made getting around Paris so much easier. Gaspard was also a great host! We had the pleasure of meeting him and he offered some really good recommendations of where to eat in the area. He was also very responsive and helpful any time we messaged him. We would absolutely recommend staying here.

Beautiful small apartment in the 9th district of Paris. Cosy, clean and well decorated, I strongly recommend Gaspard’s place if you want have a taste of the real Paris and a safe place to stay. Gaspard is a reliable and very reactive host. Access to the apartment is well explained and secure. Thank you Gaspard, I’ll definitely will come back to your place !
Great place in a great neighborhood!! Loved meeting Gaspard and his local recommendations/expertise for places to eat etc were great !  Highly recommended for a couple traveling in Paris !
Awesome place to stay

The neighbourhood is excellent. Surrounded by many great cafes, restaurants and bars.

The  building is very charming and decorated with a lot of character. 

The unit itself I stayed in was disappointing, unfortunately.

The camera angles in the photos suggest a much larger space. It is actually very small. 

The skylight with retractable cover was beautiful and really lit the place well. So nice in the morning. But the window itself was filthy.

Per the photos there is a sizeable shower rom off of the bedroom. But unfortunately, the way it was constructed Has lead to water seeping into the door frame / warping the door and causing water damage in the first floor ceiling. This was a known issue prior to my arrival and I was not informed. Unfortunately when I finished my shower, I discovered the kitchen counter, floor - and everything I had left there - was soaked.

If I was told prior I could have staked towels up in front of the door to avoid this happening. 

Gaspard assured me the  would be fixed for the next guest and that it has been too busy this summer to take time for repairs. He also compensated me for this. 

There is a very light turn down service - a cleaning lady gives the place a quick once-over which is nice.

Safety is of no concern whatsoever. The security it great in the building and the area is fine.

From arriving to checkout, we had a fantastic stay.  Gaspard took the time to show us the rooms and all the features.  His advice for things to do around town were wonderful.  You can tell he loves what he does and his properties show.  Definitely recommend a stay!

The place is in a great location next to a lot of public transportation whether you are taking the metro or the buses which are easy to use and get around. There are many cafe’s and shops around including a bunch of grocery stores near by. We loved the bar right on the corner of the block but there are so many options in just a short walk! The apartment is clean, modern and quiet! Gasped gives you a cell phone for hot spot WiFi connection which helps a lot and you can use the phone as a map and recommendations for nearby restaurants. I would really recommend this apartment! Gaspard is reachable and responds quickly, he will check in to make sure everything is going well and even dropped off entrance keys Incase our phone’s battery died which was very considerate! I really like the hairdryer! The apartment has everything you would need like a bottle opener, glasses, plates, knives, cutting board etc. Also a small note you will need to take stairs. It’s not too bad but should be noted. Not only to get to the apartment but there is a spiral staircase and the shower is on the second floor while the toilet is on the first floor, which didn’t bother us. The shower was great! It’s big and after a long day of walking the shower was a huge plus! The apartment isn’t too big but comfortable. There isn’t too much storage space so we unpacked one luggage and one we kept downstairs. My husband and I would love to stay here again and looking forward to coming back!

My partner and I travelled Europe for about two and a half weeks, and our first stop was at this airbnb with Gaspard. We believe our stay at Gaspard's was the best experience of our trip. The extra touches (having a phone with wifi), the responsiveness (responding to our messages within seconds to minutes) and the information/recommendations on where to eat/ explore really went above and beyond. We would recommend this place to any future guests. Thanks again, Gaspard!
Lovely stay. Most amazing shower in Paris! Which was extra helpful during this heat wave. Thank you for a lovely stay, Gaspard!

Staying at Gaspard’s place was amazing! My husband and I have absolutely no complaints! You should just book right now!  

Gaspard met us upon arrival and gave us more of a hotel experience!  We had key cards to get into the private residence where our apartment was.  He works on premises, so he is available most of the time to answer questions. 

The apartment was fantastic!  Staying in the Pigalle/Montmartre area was one of the best choices we made! There are bakeries, bars, restaurants, and shopping right at your finger tips. But you are only a 30 minute walk, 10 minute uber, or 15 minute bike ride from the heart of the city.  

Gaspard includes a cellular hotspot for you to use throughout your entire stay! This means you can take his device with you and use your phone all over the city!  It was such a nice and thoughtful touch! 

I can’t recommend this apartment enough! (Or just finding another residence where he is your host)

Beautiful. perfectly equipped apartments,  located in magnificent part of Paris.
The apartment was very clean, communication was easy and host very friendly and supportive.

Great place. You'll feel like a local. Learn French, but you can get by without it, I just think life would be so much easier in Paris if you spoke french, anyway... Gaspard is very quick to respond and anything you need he can accommodate (extra pillows, towels, freshen up the place, etc) Very close to the metro, either walk up to Pigalle station or down to St. Georges. Although Pigalle was a tad bit closer walking down the neighborhood to St. Georges was my favorite. Small liquor store right next to the building for bottled water. Lots of restaurants  and bars near by. The place we stayed was 3 flights up, just to be clear.. Not really an issue but if you have heavy baggage, then beware. Washer + Dryer is in the basement just so there is no confusion and there's only one... so just let Gasp know if you need to use it. Place is clean, comfortable, bed is nice a full queen, which may be harder to come by. Shower is on the 2nd floor where the bed is and the toilet is down stairs on the main floor.
Amazing experience.. Gaspard thought of it all!
Great location in the heart of Montmartre, and a very clean place with a spacious shower.  Highly recommend for a couple.

Gaspard’s apartment is amazing. It has two levels, stylish adjustable sun roofs, a gorgeous bathtub/waterfall shower and he even provides you with a portable WiFi hotspot to help you commute around the city. I would highly recommend.

We loved staying at Gaspards place. He was amazingly quick to answer any questions and provided us with a local phone to use for mobile hotspot which made our trip super easy.  The location is great and very easy to get around. Some fun bars in the area made it a perfect stay. 10/10 would recommend

This unit is in a fairly quiet little side neighborhood in Montmartre, just a short stroll from Le Moulin Rouge.

There is a wonderful bakery around the corner and several good bistros very near by.

The Place Pegalle metro stop is a short walk away too which makes getting into and out of the city center easy. 

A nice touch, Gaspard leaves a mobile phone for guests to use as a WiFi router both in the unit and while out and about in the city. This was a lifesaver for us.
Gaspard was a great host, there to welcome us and explain everything about the apartment, which was located in a great area. The keyless entry was a great plus.
Great place and much more space for the same price as hotels nearby.

This is our second experience staying at Gaspard’s place. It is quiet, safe, spotlessly clean and conveniently located. We travel to France for work and this has been, by far, the best place for us and we look forward to our next visit.
Excellent location, responsive host and wonderful space. Would definitely stay again!

Gaspard's apartment was perfect for our 4 day stay in Paris. The location is incredibly convenient as it's so near the Pigalle train stop, but there are also tons of restaurants, cafes and tourist sites right in the neighborhood. The apartment was spotless and Gaspard responded immediately to any question/need we had during our trip. We were even able to do laundry in the building! Would definitely recommend to any future travelers.
Gaspard是一个特别热情的房东,住这里基本上跟酒店一样了,还特别贴心的提供了一个手机,可以打电话还可以当作wifi｡房东回复的也特别快,基本上是有求必应了!Gaspard还特别细心的在mapstr上面为住客提供了他推荐去的地方｡这里离红磨坊很近,交通也很方便,地铁走路五分钟｡
Hi there
Great spot in Paris close to the metro station. Beautifully decorated and clean apartment with top quality amenities including free mobile phone with WiFi hotspot. Highly recommend.
Gaspard is professional and hospitable. Exactly as advertised.

Gaspard's place is extremely stylish, with a very cool and streamlined check in system. The apartment is walking distance from lots of cool restaurants, bars and shops, and Gare du Nord station is only a short journey on the metro or in a taxi. We had a great stay at Gaspard's apartment, and the hospitality was fantastic; someone was there to greet us and take us to the room even though we arrived quite late at night. I highly recommend staying here if you're visiting Paris! Thanks!
Excellent location. Host is extremely helpful

Over and beyond with accommodations and really quick responses. The spot was exactly like the photos and in the perfect location close to everything. I would definitely stay here again and recommend friends.

Gaspard and his place are amazing! Gaspard was incredibly helpful with recommendations and local tips also helped me with my laundry which was incredibly kind. The room itself is amazing with all the amenities you need and more! I would come back to Paris just to stay here.

Had an amazing time stay at Gaspard’s place I would recommend it to anyone who wants an amazing stay in Paris! Flat looked just like the pictures and was perfect! Only problem was the WiFi was very slow and ended up just using my data and you was meant to be able to cast to the tv but because the WiFi was so slow it wouldn’t work... so tv was rather pointless and also no English channels so tv was quiet Useless for English speaking guests. The code system for the main door to the building was abit temperament so that wasn’t great but other than that it was amazing!
Thank you

AirBnb should clone Gaspard as he is as good a host as I've ever experienced! Very prompt and accurate with his correspondence and very patient and informative with his advice. This was my first time in Paris and he helped me make it very successful and memorable.
Great space and location.  Would recommend to anyone travelling through the area.  Gaspard was easy to deal with and accessible for any questions which arose.
Gaspard is a wonderful host and his property is amazing. 10/10.

This was my first time to Europe and I could not have landed a better host, space and location.  Gaspards place is magical, such a beautiful esthetic, charming courtyard, incredible host and wonderful location!  Everything in the area is super cute & walkable! When I come back to Paris I’ll definitely be staying here again! I’d highly recommend this spot!

Great and comfortable place in a very convenient location near Pigalle metro. Lots of lovely restaurants for dinner or breakfast near the apartment. Gaspard was great to communicate with. The apartment was very clean, comfortable bed with all amenities required. Would definitely stay there again.
房东超级热情好客,人超级的好｡英语也很棒｡家里特别温馨 fei chang zhi f非常值得入住!
Perfect location close to many great attractions. Gaspard is a super helpful host. I highly recommend this place/host, and I would definitely stay here again.

This place was amazing. We had so much fun in Paris and everything Gaspard did made the trip that much better. The place was so fun and clean and the air conditioning was really nice lol. That phone also was such a nice extra thing to include. It helped us get around Paris so much easier. Next time we are in Paris, we definitely want to stay here again. 

Thank you!

An amazing place to stay. I grew up coming to France a lot, but this place is incredible. The neighborhood is super lively but the apartment itself is tucked away on the inside of a courtyard. Gaspard is a great guy and helped us whenever we needed anything. I’m recommending this place to everyone I know.
This is a wonderful place, in a nice location from which it's easy to get anywhere.
근처에 지하철 역이 가까워서 편리하였고 호스트가 매우 친절해서 편하게 있다가 가네요! 추천 합니다~!
Great place, location and hospitality

Thanks for a wonderful stay. Great space - super clean, bright and airy. 

Communication with Gaspard was great, super fast replies and simple instructions. 

Great location, loads of great restaurants, convenience stores and bars. Couple of mins from the metro too. 

I can’t recommend this place enough.

Such a fabulous, stylish and relaxing place to stay! Lovely quiet retreat off the bustling streets of Paris. A great base to go and explore Paris and collapse after fun days and nights! Would not hesitate to recommend!

Couldn’t have asked for a better location. The space was petite, super stylish and a great place for 2 people. Gaspard was very communicative, gave us great tips for the neighborhood and he also provided us a local phone to take around so we could always connect to it’s WiFi. Will definitely come back for a visit!
Great location and wonderful accommodating host. I would definitely stay here again.
Really great place all-round. Location, the duplex itself and how quiet the place is given that there’s plenty to do the moment you step out. Would highly recommend.

Charming, simple but functional 
Definitely reccomended 
Great bathroom
The Pigalle area is quite vibrant
Easy to get around Paris from the apartment. In a great area if you like to go to bars and on a quiet road 2 minutes walk from the metro. Would defiantly stay here again!

Gaspard's place was wonderful and very cute. It's a nice size for Paris and the duplex makes it feel spacious with the very high ceilings, and not to mention the glass window on the roof. Very clean & highly recommend for a Paris stay!
Wonderful place in a great, central, walkable location. Lots of restaurants close by. Gaspard was a lovely host.

Gaspard was a great host, easy to contact, gave good advise and was very friendly. The apartment was just like it looked like in the pictures. Everything was clean and comfortable and we loved the location. The apartment is very close to the metro, stores, restaurants, nightlife and i felt like we had everything we needed in the neigbourhood. Would definetly want to come again to Gaspards apartment and recommend it to others.
Gaspard is really nice house keeper,the apartment near Moulin rouge,clean…quiet…Unfortunately there is no elevator,but thanks a lot!see u!
Great stay, great place, and great location. We will stay again when visiting Paris. The apartment matches the description. Lots of room for 2 people.
入住新公寓,因为不想提行李所以选择了最方便的入门一楼,很有欧式设计风格的房子,包括洗手间的浴缸,淋浴设备都非常完美高雅｡这是我们第一次在法国入住这么满意的房子,地方离购物景点也方便,就近还去了趟蒙马特小镇,离的很近｡爱上法国,从点点滴滴开始｡未见到房东本人,但是见到可爱的房东朋友跟房东家的管家,深感友好热情｡体验非常好,谢谢贴心的房东准备的一瓶葡萄酒,

Gaspard's apartment was perfect! The location was even better than we anticipated. Communication was great, check-in/check-out was super easy, we would definitely book Gaspard's apartment again next time we're in Paris.

Great apartment with great service from the owner!  Location near lots of places to eat/drink, close to Metro, grocery nearby.  Well protected, and quiet.
Great place!
Loved staying in Gaspard's apartment . It was really comfy , clean, quiet . In a great area . Gaspard is lovely and really helpful in many ways . Great host , great place . Will visit again !

Gorgeous apartment, as seen in photos. Very clean, quiet and great location. We felt very much at home. Conveniently located near Pigalle metro station and several grocery stores. Gaspard was always available and easy to communicate with. He even had a bottle of wine for us upon arrival. There is a good reason why Gaspard is rated Superhost! 

Très bel appartement tel que sur les photos. Très propre, dans un endroit paisible et bien situé. Nous nous sommes sentis très a l'aise. Emplacement pratique - proche de la station Pigalle (métro) et de plusieurs marchés. Gaspard était très disponible et facile a rejoindre. Il nous avait même accueilli avec une bouteille de vin. Il mérite pleinement son titre de Superhost.

Awesome apartment, loved the set up and decor. Great location and Gaspard carries your luggage up for you and has coffee and wine waiting for you.
Would recommend and stay again
Carolyn and Michael
Gaspard's apartment was chic, clean, central and very comfortable. I will definitely be back and would think of no other place to stay but at Le Victor.

What a gem! My first time visiting Paris and I got in from taking the train late. Gaspard made sure to coordinate leaving the key so I was able to get into the apartment. He even went so far as to come back the next day to lend me an adapter to charge my phone. He responded to my text messages in a timely manner and was so welcoming during my stay. I will definitely be back and recommend Gaspard's place to anyone visiting the city of love.
This was the second time I stayed at Le Victor and it did not disappoint. The flat is lovely and Gaspard, as always, was very helpful, responsive and accommodating.

Good description, excelent location and a very very helpful host. 
Thanks!

We could not have chosen a better apartment than Gaspard's place: the metro station is just 2 mins walk with access to two different metro lines and so you can literally go to any place in Paris within 30 mins! Super neat interior with all the furniture and appliances very new and well maintained!
Not to mention Gaspard was so helpful in both when we checked in and also when we checked out.
We would definitely visit again if we were in Paris!!!

Great experience with Gaspard. We were late arriving and he was very nice about leaving the key at a location nearby for us to pick up. It was very easy to find and was a beautiful complex decorated with a unique and creative flair. He was very responsive to all our needs. Enjoyed our stay!

I loved my stay at Gaspard's Le Victor. It a boutique hotel like residence and has been my favorite place thus far that I've stayed at on Airbnb. Clean, quiet, awesome location, professional, communicative, high end experience and high end building/apartment. Couldn't recommend it more.
Warm welcome and great flat for the 2 days I spend there

Everything was absolutely perfect during our stay with Gaspard.  The apartment was a dream! Gaspard was so helpful, heaps of awesome suggestions for local restaurants, helped with our loads of washing, even stored our bags for the morning.  I can't wait to go back to Paris just to stay!
Great neighbourhood and location. Smooth check in/out. Cool, clean rooms. Gaspard is sweet, down to earth and professional. Will definitely recommend.

Gaspard was a phenomenal host and helpful throughout our stay. The flat was brilliant and in the location we wanted. He was ready to meet us and looked after our bags before we caught our train a allowing us to see more of Paris!

Gaspard was amazing, he came on time and gave me all the instructions. Whenever I needed something, he was there to arrange it. The apartment is beautiful, exactly as shown in airbnb. The location is perfect and the neighborhood fantastic with lots of nice restaurants, bars and shops. The apartment is very quiet, I had a great sleep there. Gaspard knows all the restaurants and you can get any information from him.

I had a great stay at Gaspard's place. The building is really nice and the apartment is exactly as in the picture. Beautiful. Gaspard is a great host, easy to communicate with. My plane had delay because of bad weather and even if I arrived there really late in the night, Gaspard waited for me to personally give me the key and show me the apartment. Thank you very much, I had a great stay! I definitely recommend it!

My wife and I enjoyed the Le Victor experience for the second time last weekend. The fact that we returned speaks for itself. The duplex apartment is located in one of the most up and coming areas of Paris in South Pigalle.  You are moments away from fantastic restaurants, artisan bakers, picturesque terrace cafes and all night speakeasy cocktail dens. Not to mention being just a few streets away from Monmartre, the scene of 1000 paintings. The apartment itself is simple but stylishly appointees. A huge bathroom and robust shower, espresso maker with coffee supplied, even a bottle of wine in the fridge. There are several stairs and no lift so keep that in mind.  A primary reason for returning to Le Victor was down to the host and owner Gaspard, who manages to find the right balance of being completely at your disposal whilst being completely out of your way at the same time. From recommendations of the local area, providing additional appliances at the apartment (like iron), to general jovial chat, Gadpard is the perfect host and genuinely want to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.  Le Victor was an excellent find for us and we will be returning soon for sure.
I booked the apartment as a gift and they have returned with a glowing reference after an excellent weekend. A very helpful host and so easy to deal with

Absolutely faultless. 100% perfect. The flat was second-to-none and the host made both my partner and myself very welcome. Very clean- hotel standard- and the location was excellent. 30 min walk to the river, 50 min to Eiffle Tower, and the local area in very vibrant. 

I shall be using Garpard again, and shall recommend him to any friends and family visiting Paris.

Gaspard's atelier duplux is perfect and well appointed just as he describes, a real treat. Quiet and easy to access and Gaspard is a proper host and very helpful and responsive. Thanks so much Gaspard!

Pigalle was a new neighbourhood for me and I loved it.  It has the right  balance of grit, young and interesting businesses, pleasant streets and accessibility.  

Gaspard obviously had great foresight when he converted the building into Le Victor. It suits the neighbourhood well.  As for the flat, it was super nice.  It has interesting design and decor, extremely clean and very comfortable.  There were small touches (flowers in the foyer, the welcome wine and coffee, Gaspard's helpful map of the area) that made the experience that much more enjoyable.  I welcome the opportunity to stay there again.

Gaspard like my family care about us, Thank you so so so much...
Everything was perfect.
Next time I will choose again.
Thanks again, Don't forget!If you come to Shanghai, must let me know.

Gaspard was very communicative and helpful. Place is as pictured. Clean and bed is very comfortable. Check in and out were easy! Thanks for being such a great host Gaspard! I will be sure to stay here again when in Paris next.

I've stayed at quite a few Airbnb places in the past, but this has to be one of the best, not just from an accommodation perspective, but also from the care and attention Gaspard brings.
You could not ask for a more friendly and approachable host, he is an absolute gent!

The photos speak for themselves. Yes, there aren't many for the moment, but having stayed there, I can really recommend what you see is what you get: good quality finishings, great walk-in wet room and lovely comfortable bed. The kitchenette has basic crockery allowing you to quickly knock something up, but I didn't have to - there are so many great places to eat just around the corner. Again, Gaspard can offer good recommendations on where to eat.

There's a lot of light on the mezzanine / bedroom area with the large velux-style windows which have a remote controlled motorised shutter allowing you to have a lie-in in the summer if you wish.
The internet worked well (several access points available).
The only reservation I could make is that the room is rather warm when it gets really hot outside, especially with the bed on the upper level, but it's a minor detail.

Overall, a lovely place, an awesome host and great quality products (Aesop shampoo and shower gels).

Can not recommend highly enough.

We had a great time at Atelier Duplex recently. The apartment is very high quality, good design with attention to detail. The duplex layout and, huge windows as well as a skylight with an electric blind make the property stand out especially. 

Gaspard is a very welcoming and helpful host. He gave tips how to reach the property, provided local recommendations for dining and very kindly left a bottle of wine and coffee capsules for us on arrival. He certainly knows and as well as enjoys what he is doing. 

We thought the location was great. It's lively, has character and is very convenient for reaching a lot of Paris without using much transport. 

Thoroughly recommend Atelier Duplex hosted by Gaspard!

My mom and I stayed in this beautiful apartment for three days and loved every moment! The location is perfectly centered between everything we wanted to see and it is in such an awesome part of town. Gaspard couldn't have been more wonderfully helpful! He had such incredible recommendations for restaurants in the area and helped with all of our transportation questions. The building is beautiful, the loft is beautiful. All in all 100% would come back :) thank you so much Gaspard!

Great location, just 200m away from the Metro station Pigalle. Gaspard was extremely nice and helpful, ensuring easy collection of the keys and check-out. He told us where we can find nice restaurants and bakeries. The apartment was very clean and we also loved the style of the furnitures. We absolutely recommend this apartment!!!

Great location, with lots of bars and restaurants in the area to choose from, plus convenient transport links close by. Gaspard was extremely helpful, ensuring easy collection of the keys and check-out. There was even a bottle of wine on arrival! Only slight issue was slow wifi. Otherwise a great stay!

Gaspard was a fantastic host. The apartment is impeccably clean and very comfortable. It has everything one might need. I highly recommend staying here for both the apartment itself, and Gaspard's hospitality.

We have just returned from a wonderful few days in Paris, which was made even better by Gaspard and his lovely apartment. The location is fantastic; an easy walk up to Montmartre and close to lots of restaurants and bars. The apartment was very clean and modern and, in true Parisian fashion, very chic! Gaspard was happy to help with restaurant recommendations and even left us a bottle of wine to help us settle in. We will certainly visit again!!

The apartment was as nice and charming as the impression we got from the images on airbnb. It was even a little bigger than expected and a very luxurious accommodation for two. 

The location is perfect – 2 minutes walking distance from the Pigalle metro station, good shopping facilities as well as great restaurants and cafés. 

We stayed 3 nights and was in touch with our host Gaspard a couple of times during our stay. He was always very quick to respond, had nice recommendations and made us feel very much at home. His experience with hospitality is very apparent as he provides a great service and has a keen eye for detail.

All together we could not have been happier with our stay and will not hesitate to recommend this apartment to anyone!

seriously, this was one of the best travel experiences! first, the host, gaspard. so gracious and welcoming and helpful!  the apartment is beautiful, even the photos don't do it justice. we happen to LOVE his taste (both in the common areas and in the apartment). beautiful furniture and fixtures and everything was perfect. super clean and everything felt brand new. also, the location is amazing. a very short walk to several metro stops and a short walk to seriously excellent restaurants and all good food options. not the touristy kinds, but the neighborhood places that we love. the only problem was that eventually we had to leave to come home. we can't wait to return!
L’hôtel est très bien placé, l’accueil chaleureux et le calme et la propreté de la chambre ont contribué à ce que l’on passe un très bon séjour.
merci beaucoup
Une chambre stylé avec une très jolie vue. Près de Notre- Dame, bonne location. Je recommende!
Idéalement situé, propre, accueil sympathique

Emplacement idéal pour le tourisme, les restos et les transports. La chambre classique est vraiment bien équipée et elle est spacieuse. Très bon accueil des réceptionnistes. Petit déjeuner avec des produits frais. J'y retourne la semaine prochaine !
Chambre propre qui correspond  a la description, très bien située et accueil très agréable et réactif.

Nous avons obtenu un surclassement pour une chambre avec terrasse!
Bonne adresse.

Hôtel tellement bien placé, un petit peu bruyant vu le quartier, mais nous avons pu visiter une grande partie de Paris à Pied et ça c'était génial ! 
Quartier vivant avec bars, restaurants, magasins... 
Marine est tellement agréable, souriante, elle peut vous conseiller pour des visites, merci pour votre gentillesse. 
La chambre est irréprochable c'était très propre, rien à dire sur la propreté ! 
La salle d'eau est petite c'est vrai mais elle est propre et c'est le plus important.

Super hôtel ! Marine est accueillante et très souriante. J’arrive en fin de matinée et la chambre est déjà prête. J’avais effectué une réservation pour une chambre standard et Marine m’attribue une grande suite au dernier étage avec vue sur les toits parisiens et baignoire. La chambre est spacieuse, silencieuse, très propre et très lumineuse. L’hôtel est agréable, le personnel très sympathique et la réception est ouverte 24/24.

En bref 3 jours supers remplis de belles suprises ! 

Merci Marine :)
Très bon emplacement de l’hôtel et chambre très propre la seule remarque serait qu’il n’y a pas de salle de bain et que la douche se trouve dans la chambre. Super séjour dans cet hôtel

Chambre petite mais confortable. Hôtel très bien situé proche du Louvre, métro et RER. Super accueil, la réception est ouverte 24h/24, les hôtes et hôtesses d'accueil sont très sympathiques.

Super accueil, la chambre était disponible plus tôt que prévue ce qui m’arrangeait énormément, de plus j’ai été surclassée dans une chambre plus grande et très charmante. Un hôtel très bien situé à Paris juste à coté du musée de Cluny, de la place Saint Michel et du Boulevard Saint-Germain. Accueil chaleureux et qualité de service. Nous avons passé un séjour très agréable. L’emplacement est idéal, dans le quartier Saint Michel à deux pas de Notre Dame. La chambre était très propre et le personnel charmant. Nous reviendrons sans hésiter!

Nous avons été très bien accueillis au sein de cet hôtel. Je recommande vivement ce lieu qui se trouve à proximité des places emblématiques de Paris. Le personnel s’est montré très disponible et à l’écoute. Enfin, la chambre était fidèle aux photos et d’une propreté irréprochable.
Super emplacement à deux pas de grands lieux touristiques, je recommande !

Hôtel tout simplement impeccable ! Très bien situé, faible prix et d'excellente qualité. Je recommande vivement ! Deco un peu vieillotte et chambre petite mais propre.  L’emplacement est idéal. Parfait pour un court séjour dans la capitale

Merci pour cette accueil fort sympathique et professionnel , mon séjour à Paris était vraiment bien.

Das Hotel befindet sich an einer sehr guten Lage (alles quasi gut erreichbar) Supermarkt in der nähe sowie Tabak-Shop um die Ecke (McDo, Starbucks auch) Bei meinem Aufenthalt war die Check-In Zeit um 9-11 Datiert, wir mussten warten bis 15 Uhr. Man kann seine Koffer dort ablegen somit nicht so schlimm jedoch schade weil man mit der Antwort „Es sind noch Leute im Zimmer“ zufrieden sein solle. Die Zimmer sind sehr hellhörig man hört alles von nebenan.
Nice hotel to stay!
Perfect location to explore Paris!
Great location! But be aware that the room is TINY!! Cannot do anything in the washroom without the door being open and the shower leaks somehow and the floor gets soaked.

A fantastic location, super close to Notre-Dame and lots of pubs and restaurants. Super fast access to  the Metro. Room was perfect size for two, toilet was in a separate space about the size of a closet. Shower was amazing as it was a rain style mounted in the center of the stall. Hotel staff speak English rather well which we were extremely happy with! They offer breakfast of juice, coffees, yogurt, and pastry basket for €10/person. Windows come with blackout curtains and may look old style, but they really do keep street noise down well. (We stayed during the final football match between Paris and Bayern so the pubs were pandemonium but we still slept like babies!)

Unser Zimmer war sehr charmant und sauber. Es gab ausreichend Platz für uns zwei, ein Kühlschrank und im Fernsehen einige englische sowie deutsche Fernsehsender. Das Hotel liegt sehr zentral und es gibt viele schöne Cafés und Bars direkt um die Ecke. Die Bedienung sprach sehr gut englisch und war sehr gastfreundlich. Gerne wieder !

Tolle Pariser Unterkunft mit nahegelegenen Cafés und Restaurants. Abendprogramm direkt im Viertel möglich. Zum Frühstück kann ich wärmstens die Crêperie de Cluny empfehlen. Köstliches pariser Frühstück gleich ums Eck.

My experience was excellent and I highly recommend this hotel to anybody that wanna spend some time in Paris. The location is amazing, the hotel is beautiful and the reception extremely helpful and friendly. I will definitely come back asap
The location was great, the staff was really friendly and we had a great stay. Would totally recommend it
Super süßes Hotel in einer top Lage. Preis Leistung absolut gerechtfertigt. Sehr nettes Personal!! Immer gerne wieder :)
The hotel is very near to the metro station and tourists spot like Louve. And the area has many restaurants to choose.
Just one word: Perfect

The hotel is located in a pretty good destination, in the central part of the city.  The night does not include breakfast, and breakfast is paid € 10 and is made of bread, butter, jam, yogurt, juice and coffee.
A very nice stay, perfect location!
Amazing location! We were upgraded to a lovely room with 2 little balconies, it was a wonderful trip. Staff were great with the current situation of Covid and very helpful.
The location was lovely, with plenty of restaurants nearby. The staff at the front desk were wonderful and very helpful!

Behalve dat het bed een beetje ingezakt was, was het een top ervaring. Geweldige locatie en gastvriendelijk. Locatie geweldig en kamer grootte goed. Ontbijt te duur, 10 eu /persoon/ochtend. Je kan in de buurt erg lekker ontbijt kopen voor minder geld.
Perfect location & very clean and cosy space
great place to stay!

Nah zum Metro und auch zu zahlreichen Restaurants. Das Frühstück für 10€ pro Person war recht mager. In den nahegelegenen Bäckereien kann man für Ähnliches Geld mehr und besser frühstücken. 
Preis-Leistungsverhältnis ist ok.
Ottima posizione. Personale gentile e disponibile, peccato che la nostra stanza fosse polverosa e chiusa da molto tempo.
Nice place as you would expect it. Close to everything in the middle of "tourist area"

Gorgeous little boutique hotel in an amazing location. We will be back here for our next trip to Paris!

Great hotel for a good price. 5 minutes walk from Notre-Dame.

Die Unterkunft hat uns sehr gut gefallen. Wir waren mitten in Paris. Das Quartier Latin bietet viele Möglichkeiten, nicht zuletzt tolle Restaurants.
Die Gastgeberin war außerordentlich freundlich und bemüht.
Amazing stay with great location, AC and everything we need. Great value for money
100% recommend!Fantastic clean and cozy place in the heart of Paris surrounded by restaurants, bars and lots of important sights.Easy communication and super friendly staff!
such a cute room in the center of paris, lots of bars and cute restaurants are close by :) the staff is very friendly! 10/10 would recommend
The perfect place to stay in the Latin Quarter. Brilliant location and very friendly staff!

My husband and I stayed for 4 nights here. We were absolutely blown away by the location and how central it is to everything. Super cute wee apartment, we were fortunate enough to have a super cute wee balcony (room 215). Would highly recommend.
Loved the hotel, very nice room, clean and locationwise you're right in the middle of Paris on the beautiful Boulevard Saint-Michel.

This is an absolute amazing place to stay for people who just like us want to explore Paris in a few days. It is super central, so you can go to every corner of Paris and always get back easily at any time. The room was super comfortable (we got an upgrade which was super nice, but I am sure the room in the picture is perfectly fine too!!), the bed is one of the best we ever slept in and the staff is super kind and always willing to help. 100% recommendable!!
Nice hotel in the city centre, would stay there again :)
Great location, fantastic room. Hope to stay here again for future visits to Paris! Highly recommended.
Mooie locatie en vriendelijk personeel. Niet erg schoon en ook kleine ruimte.

We stayed in Paris for 4 nights and there couldn’t have been a better place to stay for the amazing value for money! Located just around the corner from the Notre Damn cathedral and the Seine river, you can get pretty much anywhere super fast! We had a lovely city view from our balcony and the staff were incredibly friendly and helped us with anything we needed. Thank you for this amazing accommodation, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay!
房间地理位置很好,入住方便快捷

For our first time in Paris, our stay was perfect! Our room had such a cool element of modern loft meets old world. The staff were lovely and hospitality. I highly recommend this boutique hotel. We will definitely be back!

Positiv ist natürlich, dass sich das Hotel mitten im Zentrum von Paris befindet und es viele Restaurants/Cafés/Supermärkte in der Nähe gibt. Allerdings muss man beachten, dass es aufgrund von Corona kein Frühstück und keinen Wasserkocher gibt und das Zimmer während des Aufenthaltes nicht gereinigt wird. Der Boden war leider nicht wirklich sauber. Unser Zimmer sah nicht wie auf den Fotos aus, weil wir kein separates Badezimmer hatten. Die Toilette war zwar getrennt, das Waschbecken befindet sich allerdings im Zimmer und die Dusche auch (einfach durch den Duschvohang getrennt).  Außerdem sind die Wände und auch die Decke sehr dünn, man hört so gut wie alles und dadurch dass man sich mitten im Zentrum befindet, ist es auch nachts auf den Straßen laut. Die Info ist vielleicht wichtig für Personen, die Schlafprobleme/-schwierigkeiten haben. Insgesamt ist es aber eine gute Variante, wenn man für ein paar Tage nach Paris fährt/fliegt, weil man wahrscheinlich für diesen Preis im Zentrum nicht besseres finden wird und die Unannehmlichkeiten eher durch Corona entstanden sind.
Muy buen lugar , excelente ubicación
Sehr gute Lage, schöne Zimmer! Alles top :-)
Amazing stay.
Great place! I definitely would recommend this stay!
A great little hotel, in the fabulous buzzing Latin quarter of Paris. The room was immaculate. You feel secure and comfortable.
Great place for a short stay in Paris! Very good location and clean rooms.

It‘s a sweet little hotel in a nice area in Paris. We enjoyed being so close to the next metro station (2 minutes to Saint Michel). The people working in the hotel were very polite and helpful. Overall, we were very happy with our choice.
Lovely stay, great location & fantastic staff
Nice position, clean room
все понравилось, отличное место расположение, единственный минус для прибывших на собственном авто - это отсутствие личной парковки, городская парковка рядом 40€ в сутки.

Great place to stay as it is so close to main attractions. Just 5 min walk to Notre - Dame Cathedral. The room was clean and tidy, but a bit too small. There is no parking available at the hotel, therefore you will need to pay for parking in a private car park which is 1 min walk by the hotel. Make sure you book in advance as it’s quite expensive.
Fantastic location in the center of Paris. Lovely neighbourhood surrounded from restaurant and cafe, near to Notre Dame and just 15 min walk to the Louvre. Highly recommended!

Very nice hotel for an affordable price. Great little balcony and a clean, comfortable room! Best area for having a good time in Paris, especially for young people/couples. Lots of restaurants and bars nearby. We enjoyed our stay very much!
Fantastic small hotel, incredible location, nice staff, would definitely come again and can recommend to anyone
A hotel right next to the Notre Dame, very central place. The room was small but clean. We got upgraded to a room with balcony which made our stay even more fun!
A great example to kick the stereotype of unfriendly parisians. People were lovely! The place was clean, really well placed and of good taste. I recommend.
Nice hotel in de city centre!
Posizione ottima! Camera di dimensioni contenute,  pulizia ottima, carino arredamento. Rapporto qualità/ prezzo  ottimo.  Consigliatissimo!
Very nice location

Great room and very clean. Good location, Louvre is a 20 minute walk and the Seine is right around the corner where you can sit with a bottle of wine. Nearby the hotel there are a few streets with a lot of restaurants. The metropolitan is also nearby around a three minute walk.
Super Lage, neue, fast schalldichte Fenster, 2 einzelne Bett und in der Nähe alles was man braucht (Cafes, Lebensmittel, Bus & Bahn).

We had an amazing stay for 2 nights at this boutique hotel in the heart of Paris. Everything was just beyond expectation: best location (the hotel is close to all the attractions and right at the most vibrant area), very nice and friendly staffs who spoke good English. We even got an upgrade to a better room with a beautiful view on the top of the hotel, was sparkling clean, very stylish and very comfy bed. Highly recommend! We definitely will be back to this gem next time to Paris.

Assez correct dans l'ensemble, dommage quelques défauts sur l'hygiène de la baignoire et son rideau de protection ..

Aucune communication avec l’hôte, obligé d’appeler l’accueil de l’hôtel pour avoir plus d’informations. Hôtel très bien situé, chambres avec du cachet et personnel à l’écoute et très sympathique. Seule ombre au tableau, le ménage qui pourrait être mieux réalisé.

Bon accueil, personnel très agréable, chambre assez spacieuse, manque juste un peu d’intimité au niveau des toilettes surtout (Ouverture entre le mur et la porte assez grande pour qu’on puisse voir la personne aux toilettes)

Toutefois, des serviettes propres ont été fournies chaque jour.

I was expecting champagne on arrival as instructed by myself to the hotel host he said it would be in the room waiting along with strawberries and rose petals, it was my girlfriend’s birthday and wanted it to be special so that did spoil mine and my girls mood. Very clean and helpful as the first room wasn’t what I was expecting so we were moved to a second room. The hotel workers  in the hotel were polite and I would stay there again as the location is spot on!
This hotel is at perfect location, Notre Dame and Seine river is within walking distance. Very traveler-friendly.

El hotel está bien. El servicio que te brindan los del hotel es buena. Sin embargo, no recomiendo que lo reserven a través de el espacio de Frederic ya que nunca contesta los mensajes, teníamos muchas dudas y no contestó.

We had a great stay at the hotel. The room was beautiful and we loved the details. The location was great and the woman at the front desk was very helpful. We had a lovely stay and would stay again.

Great location in St Germain, close to the metro and lots of nice bars and places to eat. Room was tidy and had everything we needed.
Fantastic service and simply amazing room in a superb location. Will definitely be returning
